# notes:                
01001001	Ainau anai bag God safam a tafanam ifourai .
01001002	Tafanam on wagan wat ato men abi tani i yen on , wouman on kamit tefan engon ikiman , ato God an Ayu on tefanai isisin i nan i nat .
01001003	Ato God iyau , “ Ratafin etagawai ” ato itagawai ,
01001004	God it ratafin on obin , on mes On ratafin on wouman emon ikuseb .
01001005	God ratafin on i wabai , “ Ra ” , ato wouman on i wabai “ Fom . ” Rabirabi inai isawar ato fomenei inat , On min ra ainauin .
01001006	Namon God iyau , “ Sanaf basunai ematar ato sareu ekuseb turin tefanai a turin babanai , ”
01001007	On mes God sanaf iyein ato sareu ikuseb sareu sanaf babanai a sareu sanaf tefanai . Ato on nanaba imatar .
01001008	God on sanaf i wabai , “ Kasakasau . ” Rabirabi inai isawar ato fomenei inat ato on min ra bairuin .
01001009	Ato God iyau , “ Sareu ato kasakasau babanai on enai efan kaitamom ei kaita . Ato ei yamai motob rar ranin egat . ” Ato on nanaba imatar .
01001010	God on motob rar ranin iwabai “ Tafanam . ” Ato sareu ibi kaita on i wabai “ Kamit . ” Ato God it on obin .
01001011	Namon God iyau , “ Motobai on wengar a wayo magis magis sekubou , fani on uwas fesi auman ato fani on uwas fofous mat , asi dam asi damai . ” Ato nanaba imatar .
01001012	Motobai nan wengar a wayo magis magis sikubou sigai , fani on uwas fesi auman ato fani on fofous mat , asi dam asi damai . Ato God it on obin .
01001013	Ato rabirabi inai isawar ato fomenei inat . On min ra baitonin .
01001014	Ato God iyau , “ Kasakasau an sanafai nan ratafin ematar , ato fom ekuseb ra mabinai a fom mabinai ato eiyamai matu , ra a kwanda asi bai yoboen mes .
01001015	Ato ratafin kasakasau an sanafai sematar tafanam in tagawai . ” Ato nanaba imatar .
01001016	God ratafin gagamis ruam ifouren , ratafin gagamin on wera , ra in kaifarai aurin ato ratafin anaminei on roke , fom in kaifarai aurin . Ato on siribod mat ifouren .
01001017	God kasakasau an sanafai osi ratafis iya tafanam in tagawai mes .
01001018	Mat asi ratafin on ra a fom it kaifarai ato ratafin on wouman emon it kuseb , ato God it on obin .
01001019	Ato rabirabi inai isawar ato fomenei inat . On min ra baibatin .
01001020	Ato God iyau , “ Eiyamai sareuai on sawar yayawasis sigaraba eibonuen ato kiwiu tafanam tefanai , kasakasauai nan sinarob sin rabon . ”
01001021	On mes God kamit an bobaitu gagamis , sawar yayawasis a sawar bai yayobis magis magis a kiwiu er fafes auman on asi dam asi damai engon ifouren . God it on obin .
01001022	God imomoginen ato iyau , “ Wonatoub nanatum sini son ato kamit amon woni bonuai ato ei yamai kiwiu tafanamai sini son . ”
01001023	Ato rabirabi inai isawar ato fomenei inat , on min ra bainimin .
01001024	Ato God iyau , “ Eiyamai tafanamai sawar yayawasis asi dam asi dam sin matar , gogabur an bobaitu , abi abi gugudis motob tefanai sekakayam on , a rega an bobaitu asi dam asi damai . ” Ato nanaba imatar .
01001025	God on rega an bobaitu , gogabur an bobaitu a sawar gugudis motob tefanai sekakayam on engon iyamen asi dam asi damai . Ato God it on obin .
01001026	Namon God iyau , “ Ot ari orot jever tan fouris sinnat ot magit matat ati itin ba sin matar . Ato osi kamit an iyan , tefan an kiwiu , bobaitu tafanam engon tutufin a sawar gugudis motob tefanai sekakayam on engon sin kaifaren . ”
01001027	On mes God orot jever ifouris sinnat On Toun magin matan ba simatar , God Toun magin matan ba on orot jever ifouris . On orot jever ifouris .
01001028	God imomogines ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi nanatum babaisonis wonitu sinarat sinan tafanam engon tutufin sini bonuai ato sawar tafanamai sen on engon osi sin kaifaren . Yau baibad abitem ato kamit an iyan , tefan an kiwiu a sawar gugudis motob tefanai sekakayam on engon omi won kaifaren . ”
01001029	Namon God iyau , “ Yau on tafanamai wengar uwas seyaya engon tutufin a wengar uwas fofous aumas engon tutufin on ato abitem omi ami bayu mes wonam .
01001030	Yau on wengar rorous a wayo ato aboen tafanamai bobaitu tutuenis engon , kiwiu tefanai serorob , a sawar gugudis motobai sekakayam engon on asi bayu mes aites on sinam . ” Ato nanaba imatar .
01001031	God sawar abi abi engon ifofouren iten on obin bag . Ato rabirabi inai isawar ato fomenei inat . On min ra nimtereban kaitamom .
01002001	On etai God safam a tafanam a sawar ta ta amonai sen on engon ifouren isawar .
01002002	Ra nimtereban bairuinai God bobo engon tutufin ifofouren on i sawaren , on mes on ra nimtereban bairuin bobo engon tutufin emon on i yarir .
01002003	Ato God on ra nimtereban bairuin imomoginai ato iyamai ra kakafaiin imatar , yabin On bobo engon tutufin ifofouren on isawaren weie on emon i yarir .
01002004	Atonio on safam a tafanam mamaba imamatar on an dudur . On an werai BADA God safam a tafanam ifourai ,
01002005	on nan on men wengar a wayo tani motobai ikubou igai mes , yabin BADA God on usan men iyamai tafanamai iyar a men orot tani nan imama on motobai it tar i tab .
01002006	Baise sareu motob emon igai ato motob tefan engon inunubai .
01002007	BADA God on motob an fofou emon on orot ifourai , weie yawas an yabat on aburunai ibabain ato orot inat yawasin imatar .
01002008	Namon BADA God on Eden au wera matan emon nan masau ibofefes , ato orot ibi matarai on nan iyein .
01002009	BADA God on wengar magis magis a wengar uwas aam auris obis an babaton on nan ifouren sikubobouis sigai . On masau basunai on yawas an wengar on nan i tatawar . A wengar tani ato sagob initem menan on yawas obin a yawas komasin on mat nan i tatawar .
01002010	Sareu masau ibi nunubai on Eden emon isusur , on nan on i kuseb sareu matas bat simatar .
01002011	Sareu ainauin wabin on Pishon , on Havilah tafanam amonai yai ebi kibubuai , on nan on agim gold sen .
01002012	On tafanam an agim gold on obin , wengar kerin yanden ninibin a agim an baiyan gagamin wabin onix on mat nan sen .
01002013	Sareu bairuin wabin on Gihon , on Cush tafanam amonai yai ebi kibubuai ,
01002014	Sareu baitonin wabin on Tigris , on Asshur au wera matan na yai .
01002015	BADA God on orot ibo Eden Masauai nan iyein masau it tar i tab a it kaifarai mes .
01002016	Ato BADA God on orot dura wawaninai iyawur iyau , “ Om on wengar uwas atonio masauai on engon unam ;
01002017	baise om men wengar ato sagob initem menan on obin a komasin on uwan unan mes . Om on wengar uwan u nanin on arimon totor wat unarab . ”
01002018	BADA God iyau , “ Men iyobin arimon orot ekesin mom inama in masisibu . Yau arimon on orot an bai baisotin turan an fourai ini baisin . ”
01002019	On mes BADA God on motob ibo ato on emon bobaitu tutuenis a tefan an kiwiu engon tutufin ifouren , ato i boen inat orot aurin iteit wabis itites mes . Ato orot mamaba bobaitu kakaita kakaita ibi wabis min on nanaba seyoyores .
01002020	On mes orot on gogabur an bobaitu , tefan an kiwiu a motob an bobaitu tutuenis engon i wabis . Baise Adam an bai baisotin turan on men i gaturai on .
01002021	On mes BADA God orot i yamai nousin ifot bag i yen bubur . Ato on nana i yen bubur ato God on orot sesebin rarik tani i boseir ato anefanin on korofin ibo iyafotai .
01002022	Namon BADA God on orot sesebin rarik emon jever ifourai ato ibo inat orot aurin .
01002023	Ato orot iyau , “ Ensairen ! Ari weie nin on yau tou au rarik a yau tou au biou turin . On arimon ani wabai , ‘ Jever , ’ yabin God on yau au rarik emon i matarai . ”
01002024	On yabinai orot arimon ayon taman ini kirires ato inan jever rus sini kaita ato osi rus arimon sinnat usin kaitamom sin matar .
01002025	Orot awan jever rus on keremomotis , baise osi men sibo mamai on .
01003001	BADA God on rega an bobaitu engon ifofouris sanasi , mota on kutatabir an sagobotin bag men bobaitu fani ba . Mota on jever aurin iyau , “ Omi min dura bag , God iyawurem atonio masau amonai on men wengar uwan tani wonan i ? ”
01003002	Jever on mota iyawur iyau , “ Wei on masau amonai wengar uwas on engon wanam .
01003003	Baise God on iyau , ‘ Omi wengar ato masau basunai bag etatawar on uwan men wonan a men won ruyein mes , ato omi on wonbi yamai on arimon wonarab . ’ ”
01003004	Baise mota on jever iyawur iyau , “ Omi dura bag arimon men wonarab on .
01003005	Yabin God isagob omi wengar uwan won boai wo nanin on arimon matam sin ruserenis wonnat God ba won matar , ato arimon won sagob menan on obin a menan on komasin . ”
01003006	Namon jever wengar uwan it on bayu obin ato wakiroron isoror , mat inonot on igogoi bag gigiboan it boai , on mes jever wengar uwan tani ibo iyan . On awan orot bisinai imama on turin i tai iyan .
01003007	Namon osi rus matas on siruserenis , ato tous sisagobis on keremomotis . On mes osi bubudau rorous sisagiren ato beber mes siyafofotes .
01003008	On rabirabi wera saminai orot awan rus on BADA God masauai ibibib on rarabin sitatam , on mes osi rus sinai wengar sanasi siyob .
01003009	Baise BADA God on orot aurin iyor iyau , “ Adam , om menan ? ”
01003010	Orot iyafotai iyau , “ Yau atatamim Om masauai ubib u nat on mes aber au ob , yabin yau on keremomotiu . ”
01003011	Ato God iyau , “ Iyafan ikasonem om keremomotim ? Om wengar uwan ato dura wawaninai asofafarim men utan on ubo uyan bait ? ”
01003012	Orot iyafotai iyau , “ Jever ato om ubiteu on wengar uwan turin iteu aan . ”
01003013	Namon BADA God on jever aurin iyau , “ Atonio bobo on aifan uyamai ? ” Ato jever iyafotai iyau , “ Mota min on i kuyoyowiu ato abo aan . ”
01003014	On mes BADA God mota aurin iyau , “ Om atonio bobo uyamai on mes , om on gogabur asi bobaitu a rega asi bobaitu engon tefasi on om audabim ! Om arimon yamui un dudun ato arimon fofou unam am yawas tutufinai .
01003015	Ato Yau arimon ani yamai om a jever rum on sanamui on wonbi magigiren bonen a om am fesi a jever an fesi mat on sinbi ragit bonen . Ato osi tani on arimon unim in fasfinim ato om on arimon ann etun ungiai . ”
01003016	Namon God on jever aurin iyau , “ Om unbi nafot nan on arimon usi baban gagamin anitem , om arimon usi baban auman fifirig unitu . Baise om on arimon nana awam orot un gogoiai bisinai wat . Ato om arimon on an faiwar babanai unama . ”
01003017	Ato God on Adam aurin iyau , “ Om dura wawaninai asofafarim wengar uwan men u tan , ato om awam fonan utatam ubo uyan on mes , Yau motob on au dabai . Om arimon am yawas tutufinai bobo gagamin bag unabo weie bayu in matar u nan
01003018	Gwagwar a wayo aisikis on arimon sin kubouis sinag am masau sin toutanis , om arimon wengar a wayo rorous motob emon segeg on unam .
01003019	Om arimon bobo wawanin unabo abar un takakair un reben weie bayu in matar . Om wantoan nana bobo wawanin un bobo mom asir unarab ato au motob un matabir men unsur , yabin Yau on motob emon afourim . Yau on fofou emon afourim on mes om un matabir men au fofou . ”
01003020	Adam awan i wabai Eve , on an yabin min sabu yawasis semama , osi ayos .
01003021	BADA God bobaitu korofis on iyamen beber mes , ato Adam awan rus iyotes .
01003022	Ato BADA God iyau , “ Orot ari inat ot ba imatar , on sawar engon tutufin obin a komasin on isagob . On men tani basitai iman inotet ingat wengar yayawasin ba uwan in boai inan , ato yawasin wantoan inama . ”
01003023	On mes BADA God orot i faitan Eden masau emon igat , efan menan God orot ifourai nan masau it tar i tab mes .
01003024	BADA God on orot a jever ifaitanis sigat gibunai , on anea wawanin a seri wairaf wamemeran auman au nan au gibun ebi tabubu on Eden Masau au wera matan na iya eta it kakaifarai onai sabu men yawas an wengar aurin sitar mes .
01004001	Adam awan Eve rus siyen ato jever inafot fifi orot ituai wabin iyor Cain . Jever iyau , “ Yau BADA an baibaisai on fifi orot aituai . ”
01004002	On gibunai jever on Cain tain Abel ba ituai ato osi sirat gagamis simatar weie , Abel on sheep kaifarotin imatar ato Cain on masau bofefesotin imatar .
01004003	Wera fani sisawar gibunai Cain an masau emon bayu fani iboen inat BADA aurin sirifu ikutetai .
01004004	Baise Abel on an foro sheep sanasi abou boboun tani on iyasubun iweyab bios momos wat iboen inat . BADA on Abel a an sirifu ikutetai aurin on iyasisir ,
01004005	baise Cain an sirifu ikutetai on BADA it men iyasisir . On mes Cain iyatatab kwakwan ato magin iwani .
01004006	Namon BADA on Cain aurin iyau , “ Om aibo mes ebi yatatab ? Om aibo mes magim iwani ?
01004007	Om bobo obin wat un fofour on Yau arimon ani basitem . Baise om men bobo obis un fofour on bokomas on ebotitiwag ini ragitem mes . Bokomas on egogoi bag in boem , baise om un faskikin bokomas un bomerubai . ”
01004008	Namon Cain on tain Abel aurin iyau , “ Ot tagat tanai au masau . ” On an werai osi masauai nan Cain imisir tain Abel irab iyasubun .
01004009	Namon BADA on Cain aurin iyau , “ Om taim Abel on menan ? ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Yau men asagob . Ato nin min yau au bobo taiu an kaifarai mes i ? ”
01004010	BADA iyau , “ Om aifan uiyamai ? Etatam om taim an tara on orot jever ba motob emon auriu eyoyor .
01004011	Om taim uyasubun ato an tara on igaror isur motobai . On fasinai Yau audabim ato om arimon atonio motob emon on an faitanim un gat .
01004012	Om atonio motobai masau un bobo on men arimon bayu yabin obin inyein on . Om arimon am mair ma ambin ato asir amui uni dadanamim mom tafanam au engonai . ”
01004013	Ato Cain on BADA aurin iyau , “ Yau au baimaki ubiteu on gagamin bag men fofonin an boai on .
01004014	Om on ari atonio motob emon urukouwiu a gat , ato arimon magim emon mat anob . Yau arimon tafanamai au goa ambin ato etai ani dadanam , ato iyai iyafan in gatureu on arimon inasubunueu . ”
01004015	Baise BADA on Cain iyawur iyau , “ Ambin bag . Iyai iyafan om inasubun on arimon an garamin nimtereban ruam ba on tefanai nanaba ani makiai . ” Namon BADA on Cain usinai kukufot iyein onai iyai iyafan in gaturai on men inasubun .
01004016	On mes Cain on BADA magin emon igat inai Eden wera matan Nod tafanamai nan ima .
01004017	Cain awan rus siyen ato inafot natun orot Enoch ituai . On gibunai Cain on mafam gagamin iyoyonin min on natun fifi orot wabin Enoch on iwab seirai .
01004018	Enoch natun Irad irat , ato Irad on Mehujael taman , a Mehujael on Methushael taman a Methushael on Lamech taman .
01004019	Lamech on jever ruam iawanis , tani wabin Adah ato tani wabin Zillah ,
01004020	Adah natun orot Jabal ituai , on min iyabon ato guwi ai sima gogabur an bobaitu sibi tues on osi tamas .
01004021	On tain on Jubal ; on min iyabon ato tataf a orof sikwakwareren on osi tamas .
01004022	Zillah mat on natun orot Tubal-Cain ituai , on min bai yuyur ta , ta on agim bronze a agim iron ai iteteren . Tubal-Cain robun min Naamah .
01004023	Lamech awawan ruam iyawures iyau , “ Omi Adah a Zillah , rum tainam won reben . Omi Lamech awawan au dura won tatam , yau orot ibi gawudeu aurin on asubun a orot boboun kiyam ibiteu on asubun .
01004024	Iyafan Cain inasubun on arimon baimaki ra nimtereban ruam in boai ato iyafan Lamech inasubun on arimon baimaki ra orot ton , orot ta aurin auyotoat an yayatan nimtereban ruam inboai ( 77 ) . ”
01004025	Adam awan rus siyen men ato jever fifi tani ba ituai ato i wabai Seth , ato iyau , “ God on fifi tani ba iteu Abel an efan irorog , yabin Cain tain iyasubun on mes . ”
01004026	Seth on eb natun orot irat ato i wabai Enosh . On an werai sabu si bosuruf BADA si kwakwafirai .
01005001	Adam wawan agirin wabis min atonio . On an rai God sabu ifofouris on , On Toun an itin ba ifouris .
01005002	God on orot jever ifouris weie imomogines , ato i wabis , “ orot a jever . ”
01005003	Adam ima an kwanda 130 weie natun orot Seth irat . Seth min taman an itin ba irat .
01005004	Seth irat gibunai Adam on kwanda 800 ba ima weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01005005	Ato on ima an kwanda 930 weie irabob .
01005006	Seth ima an kwanda 105 an rai on natun orot Enosh irat .
01005007	Enosh irat on gibunai , Seth on kwanda 807 ba ima weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01005008	Ato Seth ima an kwanda 912 weie irabob .
01005009	Namon Enosh ima an kwanda on orot bat , orot ta aurin auyotoat weie on natun orot Kenan irat .
01005010	Ato Kenan irat gibunai Enosh on ima kwanda 815 on amonai weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01005011	Enosh ima an kwanda 905 weie irabob .
01005012	Namon Kenan ima an kwanda orot ton , orot ta aurin auyotoat an rai , on natun orot Mahalalel irat .
01005013	Mahalalel irat gibunai , Kenan ima an kwanda 840 weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01005014	Ato Kenan ima an kwanda 910 , weie irabob .
01005015	Namon Mahalalel ima an kwanda orot ton an yayatan nim weie natun orot Jared irat .
01005016	Ato Jared irat gibunai , Mahalalel on kwanda 830 ba ima weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01005017	Mahalalel on ima an kwanda 895 weie irabob .
01005018	Namon Jared on ima an kwanda 162 weie natun orot Enoch irat .
01005019	Ato Enoch irat gibunai , Jared on kwanda 800 ba ima weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01005020	Jared an ima kwanda 962 weie irabob .
01005021	Namon Enoch ima an kwanda orot ton an yayatan nim weie natun orot Methuselah irat .
01005022	On gibunai , Enoch an kwanda 300 ato on God ituranai rus si kaita sima , ato on nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01005023	Enoch on an kwanda 365 ba ima .
01005024	Ato Enoch on an yawas tutufinai God ituranai rus si kaita simama , on mes God ibo igai au safam .
01005025	Methuselah ima an kwanda 187 weie natun orot Lamech irat .
01005026	Ato Lamech irat gibunai , Methuselah on an kwanda 782 ba ima , weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01005027	Ato Methuselah ima an kwanda 969 weie irabob .
01005028	Lamech ima an kwanda 182 weie natun orot irat .
01005029	On wabin iyor Noah , ato iyau , “ On arimon ini basit in kaifaret ati bai sababan a usi baban an werai , yabin ato motob on BADA iyaudabai yen . ”
01005030	Noah irat gibunai on Lamech ima an kwanda 595 weie on nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01005031	Lamech ima an kwanda 777 weie irabob .
01005032	On gibunai Noah ima an kwanda 500 weie on nanatun orot ton sirat . Osi wabis min , Shem , Ham a Japheth .
01006001	On an rai sabu ibosuruf irarat tafanam au engon ibonu ato nanatus jeverig mat sirat .
01006002	Osi God nanatun orot sabu tafanamai nanatus jeverig sites on momogis fafa on mes asi gogoi nanaba siboes siawanis .
01006003	Namon BADA iyau , “ Yau au yabat aratein ato sabu abites on men arimon sinama au wantoan mes , yabin osi on sabu maiauis . Osi on men sinama inan kwanda 120 ini sobonai mes . ”
01006004	On an werai a wera gibunai sabu on gagamis kokoiis bag simama . Osi on God nanatun orot ato tafanamai sabu nanatus jeverig sibi awanis on nanatus sirat sabu faiwaris a wabis gagamis bag ainau simama .
01006005	Ato BADA it sabu tafanamai simama asi yawas on komasis bag , mat osi sabu asi bainonot ra fufur sibi nonot on engon komasis wat .
01006006	Ato BADA inonotai on iyobin sabu tafanamai on men it ifouris on mes nunuan on ibaban kwakwan .
01006007	On mes BADA iyau , “ Basit Yau sabu tafanamai afofouris on engon ani komasis a an fufun insawar , bobaitu , kiwiu a motob tefanai sawar yayawasis bai yayobis on mat engon ani komasis , yabin abi yababan on aibo mes nanaba afouris . ”
01006008	Baise BADA on Noah aurin iyasisir .
01006009	Atonio on Noah an dudur . On nanatun orot engon ton : Shem , Ham a Japheth . Noah an yawas on totorin wat , on tafanamai sabu sanasi imama on an ubar tani ambin . On God ituranai rus kaitanei wat sibibib .
01006010	
01006011	Baise God matanai sabu tafanamai simama asi yawas sifofour on engon komasin wat . Tafanam au engon on bai gagam a yawasis komsis wat on ibonu .
01006012	God iyeit tafanam au engon it on komasin bag , yabin sabu engon tutufin on yawas komasis wat sifofour simama .
01006013	On mes God on Noah iyawur iyau , “ Yau ai nonot nono sabu engon tutufin an fufun insawar , yabin tafanam amonai on gamo a bai gagam wat on awan ibonu . Yau on dura bag tafanam a sabu engon ani komasis .
01006014	On mes om wengar obin tani unboai ato on nan am wa unyon , ato amonai efan engon un botitiwag , weie amonai a kounai on fotu rababarinai wat on un bobabaren .
01006015	Om wa un yoyonin an weroromin on 130 mita , ato wa an tayabarin on 22 mita , ato wa amon emon igai au uwayob on 13 mita .
01006016	Om wa tefan an guwi un yoyonin on men un iyamai insur kwakwan wa rewan engon in yafotai mes . Ab om 5 mita nanaba on masar uni kirir ato ratafin inar . Ato wa amonai ma an efan on engon ton uniyamen , tani on babanai , tani on basunai a tani on tefanai ato metewan on kaitamom sesebinai un yein .
01006017	Yau arimon sareu gagamin ani yafarai tafanam au engon in boai ato sawar yayawasis semama on engon ini komasis . Ato sawar engon tutufin tafanamai semama on engon sinarab .
01006018	Ato baise yau arimon rut dura bo baibasit tani yamai weie om awam rum a nanatum orot awawas mat on wonan wa amonai wonar .
01006019	Om on bobaitu a sawar yayawasis ruruam ruruam , orot a jever on un boes mat wa amonai wonar ato un kaifares yawasis sinama .
01006020	Mat om kiwiu asi dam ta ta on ruruam ruruam , orot a jever a bobaitu gagamis a gugudis asi dam ta ta a sawar bai yayobis asi dam ta ta motobai sekakayam on mat engon un boes wa amonai wonar un kaifares yawasis sinama .
01006021	Om on bayu magis ta ta menan aam aurin on engon unabo ato nan efan kaita unyadodog , fani om aurim a fani osi mat auris . ”
01006022	God mamaba Noah i forai on engon nanaba ifour .
01007001	BADA on Noah iyawur iyau , “ Om awam a nanatum orot awawas mat engon eboes , ato wonai wa amonai worui , yabin Yau agaturem om ekesim wat nin tafanamai on am yawas totorin wat efofour .
01007002	Ato bobaitu ta ta gumidaris awawas mat on nimtereban ruam nanaba eboen , ato bobaitu men gumidaris on eb awawas mat kakaita kakaita eboen ,
01007003	a on eb kiwiu magis magis awawas mat engon nimtereban ruam eboen , yabin osi bobaitu kiwiu min arimon tafanamai yawasis sinama ato sinatoub men .
01007004	Ato ari inan ra nimtereban ruam gibunai , yau usan gagamin ani yafarai arimon inyayar mom inan ra orot ruam a fom orot ruam insawar . Ato orot jever a bobaitu yawasis mamaba afofouren on engon an fufun sin sawar . ”
01007005	BADA mamaba Noah iforai on engon nanaba ifour .
01007006	Noah an kwanda 600 an rai on sareu gagamin bag tafanamai igat .
01007007	On awan rus a nanatun orot awawas mat engon sinai wa amonai sirui , onai sareu gagamin on men iti komasis mes .
01007008	Bobaitu gumidaris a men gumidaris , a mat kiwiu , sawar yayawasis , bai yayobis kakaita kakaita awawas mat ,
01007009	on sinat Noah mat wa amonai sirui , mamaba BADA dura wawaninai iyau on nanaba .
01007010	Ra nimtereban ruam gibunai sareu gagamin bag igat tafanam engon ikiman .
01007011	On an werai Noah min an kwanda 600 , ra auyotoat an yayatan nimtereban ruam , roke bairuinai nan sareu matas ta ta motob babanai sitasesebis , safam asi metewan engon siruserenis ato usan gagamin bag isur .
01007012	Ato usan min tafanamai nana iyayar mom ra orot ruam a fom orot ruam isawar .
01007013	On ra kaitamomai usan ibosuruf iyayar an werai Noah awan rus , nanatun orot ton ; Shem , Ham a Japheth awawas mat on engon sinai wa amonai sirui .
01007014	Gogabur a rega asi bobaitu ta ta gugudis gagamis , kiwiu ta ta , sawar yayawasis bai yayobis motobai sekakayam ta ta engon mat sinai .
01007015	Sawar yawasis ta ta awawas awawas mat on Noah mat sinai wa amonai sirui .
01007016	Ato bobaitu orot jever kakaita kakaita mamaba God Noah iforai i yau on nanaba sinai sirui weie BADA Toun metewan irufot fotai .
01007017	Ra orot ruam amonai usan on nana iyayar ato sareu gagamin igat ibururum igai motob engon ikiman ato wa iyarugai .
01007018	Sareu on ibururum igai ato iborit , on mes wa on sareu tefanai i yaru .
01007019	Ato sareu on ibururum igai oyau gagamis tefas mat egnon ikiman .
01007020	On sareu on ibururum igai oyau gagamis tefas isobonai igai aiyetun bag ato an fofon on mita nimtereban ruam ibo .
01007021	Ato rega an bobaitu magis magis simama a kiwiu ta ta , bobaitu gugudis yawasis nin tafanamai simama on , sabu mat engon sirabob isawar .
01007022	Sawar engon ato tafanamai siyaratein yawasis simama on engon sirabob isawar .
01007023	Ato sawar yayawasis nin tafanamai simama on engon ifufun , sabu a bobaitu ato motobai sibibib a kiwiu aiyetunai osi mat engon tafanam emon ifufun . Noah ekesin mom a iyabon on mat wa amonai sirui on siyawas .
01007024	Ra 150 amonai on sareu on nana ibururum i yen .
01008001	Baise God on Noah a bobaitu mat engon nan wa amonai simama on men inosfotes on . God on yabat iyamai isisin ato sareu ibosuruf itiririn isusur .
01008002	A motob babanai sareu sigegeg on iyafotai a safamai sareu an metewan on irufotai ato usan iyayar on ibotan ,
01008003	ato sareu on sunub sunub itiririn isusur mom asir ra 150 isawar .
01008004	Roke nimtereban ruam amonai ra auyotoat an yayatan nimtereban ruam nan on wa inat Ararat oyauai iyagai .
01008005	Sareu on nana itiririn isur i nan , ato roke auyotoat an ra ainauinai nan on oyau tefas sirerebis .
01008006	Ra orot ruam isawar gibunai Noah on wa an gigo iruseren ,
01008007	ato owe on iyafarai igat , baise owe on asir irorob i nan i nat mom sareu engon itiririn isur isawar ato motob rerebai igat .
01008008	Namon Noah on kiwiu kumag ba iyafarai igat sareu ititai mamaba itiririn isur isawar ai ambin .
01008009	baise on werai sareu on nana motob engon ikiman i yen on mes kumag on men efan tani igaturai nan itamair iti yarir . On mes on irob imatabir men inat wa aurin ato Noah iman iyotet igat ibo men irui .
01008010	Basit Noah on ra nimtereban ruam ba imousin ato kumag iyafarai men igat inai .
01008011	On rabirabi on kumag awanai wengar olive roroun igi auman imatabir men inat Noah aurin . On nan Noah isagob on sareu itiririn isur .
01008012	Namon on ra nimtereban ruam ba imousin ato kiwiu kumag iyafarai men igat inai , baise ari on men imatabir men .
01008013	On an rai Noah an kwanda 601 , on roke ainauin an ra ainauin nan on sareu motobai on ibosuruf i raran . Noah on wa tefanai guwi on iruseren ato it on motob iraran .
01008014	Roke bairuin an ra orot kaitamom an yayatan nimtereban ruam amonai on motob engon iraran isawar .
01008015	Namon God on Noah aurin iyau ,
01008016	“ Om awam rum a nanatum orot awawas mat on engon wa emon wogat .
01008017	Om sawar yayawasis asi itis ta ta ato mat womama , osi min kiwiu a bobaitu , sawar yayawasis ato motobai sekakayam on engon eboes mat wogat , onai osi arimon sinatoub ato tafanam engon sini bonuai . ”
01008018	On mes Noah awan rus a nanatun orot awawas mat engon wa emon sigat sinai .
01008019	Bobaitu engon a sawar yayawasis motobai sekakayam engon a kiwiu asi dam ta ta engon on asi kuayoai asi kuayoai nan wa emon sigat sinai .
01008020	Noah on sirifu agim kema iyon BADA aurin ; on bobaitu a kiwiu gumidaris ta ta asi itin itinai iboen ato tutufis agim kema tefanai iteren sirifu ikutetai .
01008021	BADA atonio sirifu yanden ninibin on iyasisirai ato iyau , “ Yau men meyan arimon sabu bobo aifan sebi yamai fasinai on motob an audabai men ; Yau asagob ari wera sabu bobous asi bainonot on komasis . Yau men meyan arimon sawar yawasis ani komasen men , ato ari wera afofour ba .
01008022	Tafanam nana yen on arimon fesi bofefes an wera , bayu kuwain an wera , sibuin an wera a forabin an wera , kwanda an wera a baimar an wera , ra a fom . Atonio osi matu on arimon nanaba sinen au wantoan . ”
01009001	Namon God on Noah a on nanatun orot mat engon imomogines ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi nanatum fifirig sigaraba wonitu ato ami dam warar inarat tafanam engon ini bonuai .
01009002	Tafanamai bobaitu tutuenis engon , kiwiu aiyetunai engon , sawar tutufin motobai sekakayam a kamit an iyan engon on arimon omi sin beruem . Osi engon min arimon omi ami baibad babanai sinama .
01009003	Omi on sawar yayawasis engon semama a sekakayam on engon ami bayu mes wonam , mamaba Yau matan ainau bofefes asi kanefu abitem ba . Ari osi sawar engon on abitem ami bayu mes .
01009004	Baise sawar kaitamom on masono bionai tara i nen on men wo nan mes , yabin yawas on tara ai nan yen .
01009005	Ato orot jever iyafan turan an yawas e boseir on arimon ani makiai inarab a bobaitu ato orot jever an yawas e boseir on eb arimon ani makiai inarab .
01009006	Iyai iyafan orot jever iyasubun on an garamin orot jever emon sinasubun . Yabin God orot jever ifourai on Toun an itin ba ibo .
01009007	Ato omi on fifirig sigaraba wonitu ato ami dam warar inarat onai tafanam engon sini bonuai . ”
01009008	Namon God on Noah nanatun orot mat auris iyau ,
01009009	“ Yau ari au dura bo baibasit abi yamai omi a omi wawam agirim gibui sin rarat auris mat .
01009010	A mat osi sawar yawasis engon , kiwiu , gogabur an bobaitu a bobaitu tutuenis engon a tafanamai sawar yayawasis engon tutufin mat ato wa amon emon wo gat auris mat abi yamai .
01009011	Yau atonio dura ai on au dura bo baibasit omi mat tabi yamai : Yau men arimon gibui sareu gagamin ani yamai ingat sawar yayawasis asi yawas in boseseiren mes , a men arimon gibui sareu gagamin ani yamai ingat tafanam ini komasai mes . ”
01009012	Ato God iyau , “ Yau atonio dura bo baibasit an matair omi mat sanati abi yamai a sawar yayawasis engon tutufin mat womama auris a sabu gibui sin rarat engon mat auris .
01009013	Yau au tarub on kasakasauai ayein ato on , on arimon dura bo baibasit an matair mes ini yamai Yau a tafanam mat sanayi .
01009014	On an rai yau kasakasau ani yamai ingat aiyetunai i naru nan on tarub mat min on kasakasauai in robotet .
01009015	Yau arimon au dura bo baibasit omi Yau mat a sawar yayawasisi engon mat tabi yamai on an nos . Men arimon sareu gagamin ani yamai in gat men tafanamai sawar yayawasis engon tutufin ini komasen .
01009016	On an rai tarub kasakasauai in rorobotet anitai on , yau arimon ato dura bo baibasit wantoanin on an nos , God a sawar yayawasis sanasi tafanamai itis ta ta engon auris . ”
01009017	On mes God on Noah aurin iyau , “ Atonio on dura bo baibasit an matair yau a tafanamai yawas engon sanati aiyamai . ”
01009018	Noah nanatun orot iyabon ato wa amon emon si gat on Shem , Ham a Japheth . ( Ham on Canaan taman )
01009019	Atonio on Noah nanatun orot ton , ato osi nanatus wawas agiris emon on sitagege tafanam au engon inbonu .
01009020	Noah on tar ba an orot ato on ainau ibosuruf masauai wengar wine itanum .
01009021	On an werai on sareu wine turin itoman , on ibosuruf ikokok ato on sawar igabobounen keremomotin an guwi amonai i yen bubur .
01009022	Canaan taman Ham on taman Noah keremomotin i yen bubur it ato igat tuan a tain ikasones .
01009023	Namon Shem a Japheth rus beber sibo abarasi sitarasour , weie aufut aufut sirui tamas keremomotin i yen bubur on sisabutan . Osi magis on sab siya onai tamas keremomotin i yen bubur on men sititai mes .
01009024	On an werai Noah unin iyobin ato imisir men , on isagob natun giyamomos Ham on bobo aifan iyamai .
01009025	On mes iyau , “ Canaan , yau audabim , om arimon agirotim bag un matar tutuam uni agires . ”
01009026	Mat on eb iyau , “ Yau abi fefeyan au BADA God aurin on Shem ini momoginai ato ini yamai Canaan on innat Shem an agirotin inmatar . ”
01009027	Yau abi fefeyan au BADA on Japheth an motob on ini ratai ato Japheth on Shem an goa tafanam in boai . Ato Canaan on on an agirotin in matar . ”
01009028	Sareu gagamin igat gibunai on Noah an kwanda on 350 ba ima .
01009029	On engon ibi kaita on Noah an kwanda 950 ima weie irabob .
01010001	Atonio on Noah nanatun fifirig orot wabis : Shem , Ham a Japheth . Atonio fifirig ton on sareu gagamin igat gibunai on nanatus sirat .
01010002	Japheth nanatun fifirig orot wabis on Gomer , Magog , Madai , Javan , Tubal , Meshech a Tiras .
01010003	Gomer nanatun wawan agirin on Ashkenaz , Ripahath a Togarmah .
01010004	Javan nanatun wawan agirin on Elishah , Spain , Cyprus a Rhodes ;
01010005	atonio osi dam warar on tore a nua ai nan simama . Osi min Japheth nanatun wawan agirin an dam on dam ta ta a tafanam sigaraba sanasi sima ato osi engon on fonas ta ta sibi kakafun .
01010006	Ham nanatun fifirig orot wabis on Cush , Egypt , Libya a Canaan .
01010007	Cush nanatun wawan agirin on Seba , Havilah , Sabtah , Raamah a Sabteca . Raamah nanatun wawan agirin on Sheba a Dedan .
01010008	Cush natun orot irat wabin Nimrod , on orot ainau inat orot faiwarin bag imatar , i yo igagam tafanam ibo .
01010009	BADA an baibais emon on inat masono bo am an orot gagamin imatar , on mes sabu sebi kakafun sau , “ Om orot iyafan Nimrod ba on unnat regai bo am an orot gagamin bag un matar . ”
01010010	Ainau on Nimrod mafam gagamis ton on i kakaifaren ; Babylon , Erech a Akkad . Osi min Babylonia tafanam amonai .
01010011	Nimrod on Babylonia tafanam emon on inai Assyria nan mafam gagamis i goyon , osi mafam gagamis min Nineveh , Rehoboth Ir , Calah ,
01010012	a Resen , on Nineveh a mafam gagamin Calah basunai .
01010013	Ato Egypt nanatun wawan agirin on Lydia , Anam , Lehab , Naphtuh ,
01010014	Pathrus , Casluh a Crete . Philistia sabu on Crete emon sinat .
01010015	Canaan nanatun orot wabis on Sidon a Heth .
01010016	Canaan on eb wawan agirin on Jebus , Amor , Girbash ,
01010017	Hivi , Ark a Sini ,
01010018	Arvad , Zemar a Hamath . On gibunai osi Canaan dam kakaita kakaita on sisonag sinai efan ta ta nan sima .
01010019	Canaan an tafanam an farat on Sidon mafam ibosuruf au gorof na inai Gerar mafam farat nan igat , on min Gaza mafam bisinai . Ato osi asi tafanam an farat turin min nan ibosuruf men au wera matan na inai au mafam Sodom a Gomorrah , Adamah , a Zeboiim nan igat on min Lasha efan bisinai .
01010020	Atonio on Ham nanatun wawan agirin . Osi dam kakaita kakaita on sinai tafanam ta ta nan sima ato osi dam min asi dura ta ta nan sibi kakafun .
01010021	Shem on Japheth tuan ainau orot , on an dam warar on Hebrew yangan .
01010022	Shem nanatun orot wabis on Elam , Asshur , Arphaxad , Lud a Aram on osi asi dam iwabis .
01010023	Aram wawan agirin on Uz , Hul , Gether a Meshech yangan .
01010024	Arphaxad taman on Shelah ato on taman on Eber .
01010025	Eber on nanatun orot ruam : Fifi orot tani wabin on Peleg , yabin Peleg irat imama an werai on sabu on tafanamai simama on sikuseb mabis mabis sinai . Ato on wab Peleg an yabin min “ Sikuseb . ” Ato Peleg tain tani wabin on Joktan .
01010026	Joktan nanatun wawan agirin on Almodad , Sheleph , Hazarmaveth , Jerah ,
01010027	Hadoram , Uzal , Diklah ,
01010028	Obal , Abimael , Sheba ,
01010029	Ophir , Havilah a Jobab . Atonio osi engon on Joktan nanatun orot wawan agirin wat .
01010030	Ato osi dam on tafanam Mesha farat nan simama on inai Sephar nan igat na au wera matan oyau oyau tafanamai nan .
01010031	Atonio on Shem nanatun wawan agirin . On dam kakaita kakaita on tafanam ta ta nan sima ato osi engon min asi dura ta ta nan sibi kakafun .
01010032	Atonio osi dam warar wab kakaita kakaita , asi tafanam asi tafanam ai simama , osi engon on Noah nanatun wawan agirin wat . Sareu gagamin igat gibunai , Noah nanatun wawan agirin on sisonag sinai tafanam ta ta engon ibonu .
01011001	Anai bag sabu tafanam tutufin engon on asi dura kaitamom wat sibi kakafun .
01011002	On an rai osi sibib sinai au wera matan na ato efan roubabanai sigaturai , on min Babylon tafanamai nan . Namon osi nan sigoyon sima .
01011003	Osi tous wat sikakafun bonen siyau , “ Omi wonat ! Ot motobai noukwat tan boai tan gamatabir ato tan teren sin wani agim ba sin matar . ” On mes sabu sibosuruf dura mamaba si yau on nanaba sifour noukwat siteren agim ba simatar nan situbabarai . A sawar rababarin wabin kolta on siboen sibo titiwag nan noukwat tetern on sit bobabarai it bokikin mes .
01011004	Namon osi sikakafun siyau , “ Ot ari on mafam gagamin tanyon ato on amonai on goa ann weromin mat tanyon inag inan safam aiyetun in boai . Ot tani yamai wabit tan yein ato men mabit mabit tan sonag mes . ”
01011005	Namon BADA isur inat mafam gagamin a goa ann weromin sabu sibi goyon on ititai mes .
01011006	Ato BADA ikakafun iyau , “ Woit , atonio sabu on kaitamom wat ato dura on kaitamom wat sebi kakafun ; osi atonio bobo sefofour on nin on sebosuruf . Osi men weromin , asi bobo aifan segogoi sinafour on arimon fofonin sini yamai mom .
01011007	Ot tansur asi dura on tani kitabiren sini tagogoiis ato arimon tuturas fonas men sintatam sin sagob dura aifan sebi kakafun on . ”
01011008	On mes BADA sabu ikugeyis sinai tafanam au engonai nan sima . Ato osi mafam gagamin siyoyonin min si tuge kirir .
01011009	On mes on mafam gagamin min siyor Babylon , yabin on nan BADA sabu engon tutufin asi dura ikitabiren sitagogois ato ikugeyis mabis mabis sitagege tafanam tutufin engon ibonu .
01011010	Atonio on Shem nanatun wawan agirin . Sareu gagamin igat gibunai kwanda ruam isawar , Shem an kwanda on orot wat nim weie , on natun orot irat wabin Arphaxad .
01011011	On gibunai on ima inai an kwanda 500 weie , nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01011012	Arphaxad an kwanda on orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat an yayatan nim ( 35 ) weie on natun orot irat wabin Shelah .
01011013	On gibunai on ima inai an kwanda 403 weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01011014	Shelah an kwanda on orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat ( 30 ) weie on natun orot irat wabin Eber .
01011015	On gibunai on ima inai an kwanda 403 weie on nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01011016	Eber an kwanda on orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat an yayatan bat ( 34 ) weie natun orot irat wabin Peleg .
01011017	On gibunai on ima inai an kwanda 430 weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01011018	Peleg an kwanda on orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat ( 30 ) weie natun orot irat wabin Reu .
01011019	On gibunai on ima inai an kwanda 209 weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01011020	Reu an kwanda on orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat an yayatan ruam ( 32 ) weie natun orot irat wabin Serug .
01011021	On gibunai on ima inai an kwanda 207 weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01011022	Serug an kwanda on orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat ( 30 ) weie natun orot irat wabin Nahor .
01011023	On gibunai on ima inai an kwanda 200 weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01011024	Nahor an kwanda orot kaitamom an yayatan nimtereban bat ( 24 ) weie natun orot irat wabin Terah .
01011025	On gibunai on ima inai an kwanda 119 weie nanatun orot a jever fani ba sirat .
01011026	Terah an kwanda on orot ton , orot ta aurin auyotoat ( 70 ) weie on nanatun orot Abram , Nahor a Haran ba sirat .
01011027	Atonio on Terah an dam warar an dudur . On min Abram , Nahor a Haran osi tamas . Haran on Lot taman .
01011028	Baise Haran on orot boboun imama ato nan an rat baren Ur mafami nan irabob , on min Babylonia tafanam amonai . Ato on taman Terah on nana ima .
01011029	Abram on Sarai iawan ato Nahor on Haran natun jeverei Milcah iawan . Haran min Milcah a Iscah rus tamas .
01011030	Sarai on arin on mes men fifi ta ituai on .
01011031	Terah on natun Abram , wawan Lot , on min Haran natun orot a rawan jever Sarai , on min natun Abram awan , osi engon iboes ato Ur mafam Babylonia tafanam emon sigat sitan au Canaan tafanam aurin . Osi sinai Haran sigat ato nan sigoyon sima .
01011032	Terah ima inai an kwanda 205 weie irabob .
01012001	BADA on Abram iyawur iyau , “ Om am tafanam , taitaim tutuam , tamam an dam warar on eikirires ato egat enai tafanam anbi yoboem on nan ungat .
01012002	Yau arimon ani yamai nanatum wawam agirim inison ato tafanam engon in bonu . Yau arimon ani momoginem ato wabim ani yamai inarat , om fasimui on sabu engon arimon obin sin boai .
01012003	Yau arimon sabu iyabon om aurim obin sebi yamai on arimon obin auris ani yamai . Ato iyai iyafan in audabim on arimon an garamin an audabai , ato om fasimui on sabu engon tafanamai arimon obin sinboai . ”
01012004	On mes Abram igat mamaba BADA i yawur nanaba , ato abun Lot on rus sinai . Abram an kwanda on orot ton , orot ta aurin auyotoat an yayatan nim , ( 75 ) on an werai Haran mafam ikirir igat .
01012005	Abram on awan Sarai , abun Lot , asi sawar engon a an agirotis ato Haran nan i boes on engon mat sigat sinai Canaan tafanamai sigat .
01012006	Abram on Canaan tafanamai ibib inat wengar gagamin wabin Moreh itatawar an faratai , Shechem nan . On an werai Canaan sabu min on tafanamai simama .
01012007	BADA on Abram aurin irobotet ato iyawur iyau , “ Atonio tafanam on arimon om wawam agirim anites . ” On mes Abram on sirifu agim kema iyon BADA aurin ikutetai efan menan BADA aurin irorobotet nan .
01012008	Namon on Shechem emon inai Bethel oyau oyau tafanamai au wera matan na nan an guwi iyon . Bethel tafanam on au wera sifun na ato Ai tafanam on au wera matan na . On nan Abram sirifu agim kema tani ba iyon BADA aurin , ato nan kwafirai .
01012009	Namon Abram ibosuruf men inanawan i nan mom inai Negev tafanamai igat .
01012010	On an werai Canaan tafanamai on gomar imatar , on mes Abram isur inai Egypt nan wera dibon wat itama yabin min afoi gagamin i raran .
01012011	Osi sinat Egypt mafam aurin sibi ufin ato Abram on awan Sarai aurin iyau , “ Yau sagob om on jever momogim an babaton .
01012012	On an werai Egypt sabu om sinitem on arimon sinau , ‘ Atonio jever on , on orot awan . ’ Namon osi arimon yau sinasubunueu baise om on arimon sini kirirem unama .
01012013	On mes om unawures unau , yau on om robum , onai on yau arimon om fasimui on sin kaifareu tiwag yawasiu anama . ”
01012014	On an werai Abram inat au Egypt ato , osi Egypt sabu jever sit on momogin an babaton .
01012015	Ato on an werai Egypt an aiwab orot an babadis jever sit on sinai aiwab orot matanai jever an itin obin aurin on siduduran , ato sibo sinai aiwab orot an goai .
01012016	Egypt an aiwab orot inos Abram on robun Sarai , on fasinai on Abram aurin an obin iyamai an sheep a cow fani , donkey toub a tona fani , agirotis jever a orot fani a camel fani on ibogai isiwarai .
01012017	Baise BADA on sawau fesar wawanis iyafaren Egypt an aiwab orot a on an goa amonai sabu simama auris , yabin aiwab orot on Abram awan Sarai ibo awan mes on fasinai .
01012018	On mes Egyot aiwab orot on Abram iyor inat aurin ato itetemai iyau , “ Om yau auriu aifan uiyamai ? Om aibo mes men ukasoneu Sarai on om awam i ?
01012019	Om aibo mes uyau , ‘ Sarai on yau robu , ’ on mes yau abo awau mes . Om awam atonio ebo ato rum wogat wonai ! ”
01012020	Namon Egypt an aiwab orot an babadis dura wawaninai ifores sinai Abram awan rus siboes siyafares . Osi si gat on asi sawar tutufin osi ibi noanis on engon mat siboen sigat .
01013001	On mes Abram awan rus , abun Lot a asi sawar engon tutufin mat siboen Egypt emon sigat sinai au Negev tafanam .
01013002	Abram on foro bobaitu , agim silver a agim gold emon on inat sawarotin imatar .
01013003	Ato on tafanam Negev emon on imateter inai Bethel tafanamai nan . Menan ainau an guwi iyon imama nan , on min Bethel a Ai basusi .
01013004	On efanai min matan ainau Abram sirifu agim kema iyon ato nan BADA ikwafirai .
01013005	Lot on eb on abun Abram ba rus sibibib on toun an sheep , goat , cow , awan nanatun a an bobo otis sigaraba mat iboes sinai .
01013006	Ato Abram a Lot rus asi bobaitu on sison kwakwan ato on motobai wayo on men fofonin arimon nan kaita sitama .
01013007	On mes Abram an bobaitu kaifarotis a Lot an bobaitu kaifarotis amosi gam imatar . On an werai Canaan sabu a Perizz sabu min nana on tafanamai simama .
01013008	Namon Abram on Lot iyawur iyau , “ Om on yau abu , on mes om am bobo otis a yau au bobo otis on men sitagam on .
01013009	Om matam ereben enai tafanam namui yen on eit ato erubin , weie om rut tan kuseb . Om on au asugagaf un nanan on , yau arimon au asumaiau anan ; ato om au asumaiau un nanan on , yau arimon au asugagaf anan . ”
01013010	Lot matan iyeit inai Jordon roubaban sareu nunub on it . Ato on sareu nunub min on nanaba inai Zoar mafam aurin na , ato an itin on BADA an masau ba ai Egypt tafanam ba . ( On an rai on BADA mafam gagamis Sodom a Gomorrah on men ikomasen . )
01013011	On mes Lot toun on Jordon roubaban sareu nunub tutufin on irubin ato au wera matan na inai . Abram a Lot rus min on nan sikuseb .
01013012	Abram on Canaan tafanamai ima ato Lot on mafam gagamis sanasi mafam Sodom bisinai roubabanai nan guwi iyon ima .
01013013	Sodom sabu asi yawas on komasin bag , osi BADA matanai on ra fufur bobo komasis bag sifofour .
01013014	Lot on Abram ikirir inai gibunai , BADA Abram iyawur iyau , “ Om menan etatawar nan on matam yeit enai au tanam a au gorof , au wera matan a au wera sifun .
01013015	Yau arimon tafanam engon ato ei tai on om anitem , om a wawam agirim auris mat ato on min arimon om ini noanim au wantoan .
01013016	Yau arimon nanatum wawam agirim sigaraba motob an fofou ba on anitem , ato iyai iyafan fofonin motob an fofou iniyab on fofonin wawam agirim iniyab .
01013017	Om emisir ebib enai tafanam au engon efatete einateteai yabin yau arimon on tafanam engon anitem . ”
01013018	On mes Abram on efan ikirir ato ikoi inai Hebron mafam nan Mamre wengar gagamis bisisi nan igoyon ima . Ato on nan sirifu agim kema iyon BADA aurin .
01014001	Wera fani sisawar gibunai , baigagam gagamin bag on nan Canaan tafanamai imatar . Ato aiwabis bat wabis min : Amraphel on Shinar mafam emon , Arioch on Ellasar mafam emon , Kedorlaomer on Elam mafam emon a Tidal on Goiim mafam emon on sigat tafanam tani an aiwabis engon nim on mat siti gagam mes . Osi aiwabis nim wabis min : Bera on Sodom an aiwab , Birsha on Gomorrah an aiwab , Admah on Shinab an aiwab a Shemeber on Zeboiim an aiwab a Bela an aiwab orot ( on mafam min ari seyoyorai Zoar ) ,
01014002	
01014003	Osi aiwabis bat on Siddim roubabanai ( on roubaban min seyoyorai Una Kamitin ) nan wou orot kuayo gagamn mat sikaita .
01014004	Kwanda engon auyotoat an yayatan ruam , osi aiwabis on Kedorlaomer an baibad babanai sima baise kwanda auyotoat an yayatan ton amonai osi sibosuruf Kedorlaomer fonan siseseir .
01014005	Kwanda auyotoat an yayatan bat amonai Kedorlaomer a aiwabis ton asi wou orot mat sikaita sigat Rephai , on Ashteroth Karnaim nan , Zuz on Ham nan , Emit on Shaveh Kiriath nan sigagam sisowar sabu engon sibomerubes .
01014006	Mat osi sigagam sisowar Hor sabu , Seir oyau oyau nan simama a nana inai El Paran efan koiteterin bisinai simama on engon sibomerubes .
01014007	Namon osi simatabir men sinai au En Misphat ( on min ari seyoyorai Kadesh ) , on nan sigagam sisowar Amalek tafanamai sabu engon tutufin sibomerubes a Amor yangan iyabon Hazazon Tamar nan simama on mat engon sibomerubes .
01014008	Namon Sodom an aiwab , Gomorrah an aiwab , Admah an aiwab , Zeboiim an aiwab a Bela an aiwab ( on min ari seyoyorai Zoar ) . Osi aiwabis nim on sigat sinai Siddim roubabanai nan bai gagam an uwar sitein aiwabis bat mat siti gagam mes . Osi aiwabis bat min Kedorlaomer , Amraphel , Tidal a Arioch .
01014009	
01014010	On roubabanai nan on dogu amosi kolta rababaris si yen ato on an rai Sodom a Gomorrah asi aiwabis asi wou orot mat si yai on , asi wou orot fani on osi dogu amosi sifeu ato aiwab orot ton a asi wou orot fani on siyayai sinai au oyau .
01014011	Aiwab orot bat sisowar ato Sodom a Gomorrah asi sawar obis engon tutufin a asi bayu mat siboen sinai .
01014012	Osi Abram abun Lot a an sawar gugu mat on engon siboen , yabin on Lot min Sodom nan imama .
01014013	Orot tani i yai on totor wat inai Hebrew orot Abram ikasonai . Abram on Amor orot Mamre an wengar gagamis bisisi imama , on Eshcol a Aner tais tuas , osi min Abram tuturan , on mat sikaita simama .
01014014	On an rai Abram dura itatam abun Lot on sifatumai , on an wou orot engon 318 iyabon on mat simama on iruayois ato iboes mat sigib yeinis sinai Dan mafamai nan .
01014015	Fom amonai Abram an orot engon ikusesebis asi efan asi efanai nan iyeinis ato mat sigagam sisowar ato sifaitanis sinai au Hobah mafam , Damascus au gorof na .
01014016	Abram on sawar engon igaturen iboen men . Mat on abun Lot a an sawar gugu , jever fani a agirotis fani iboes imatabir .
01014017	Abram on isowar Kedorlaomer a an aiwab tuturan mat ibomerubes gibunai imatabir men . On i nat au go ato Sodom an aiwab orot on Shaveh roubaban emon igat it nefotai mes . ( on Shaveh roubaban min ari seyoyorai Aiwab An Roubaban )
01014018	Namon Melchizedek , Salem an aiwab orot a God Aiyetunenei Bag an tafaror bai netewarotin on rafi sarar a sareu wine iboen inat Abram aurin .
01014019	Melchizedek on Abram imomoginai ato iyawur iyau , “ God Aiyetunenei Bag , on safam a tafanam Fourisotin on ini momoginem .
01014020	God Aiyetunenei Bag on tani fain tani duranai yabin on faiwar item ugagam usowar am ragit engon ubomerubes . ” Ato Abram abi abi bai gagam emon iboen i nat on matas engon auyotoat iya ato on emon matan tani on ibo aiwab orot Melchizedek itai .
01014021	Sodom an aiwab orot on Abram iyawur iyau , “ Om abi abi engon tutufin on un botanen , baise au sabu wat on eiteu men . ”
01014022	Abram iyafotai iyau , “ Yau on BADA God Aiyetunenei Bag , safam tafanam Fourisotin Wabinai abi faro ,
01014023	yau men arimon am sawar gugu ai akikiman an uram turin wat on an botan , onai om unau yau emon Abram inat sawarotin imatar .
01014024	Yau tou auriu on men abi tani an botan on , baise bayu ato au orot si yam on wat an botan . Baise yau tuturau Aner , Eshcol a Mamre on sawar turin wonites yabin osi on yau mat wanai wai gagam . ”
01015001	Abram Lot ibaisin gibunai , BADA on bomomoutai nan dura ibo igat Abram aurin ato iyawur iyau , “ Om men unaber mes . Yau arimon om am beyan mes ba an matar an rufafarim ; ato am siwar on arimon gagamin bag anitem . ”
01015002	Baise Abram iyau , “ O BADA au Aiwab , abi siwar arimon uniteu , yau on natu ambin on mes an rarabob gibunai on au bobo orot Eliezer Damascus emon on au buder engon on ini noanai . ”
01015003	Ato Abram iyau , “ Om fifirig men uiteu , on mes yau au bobo orot on arimon au buder engon on ini noanai . ”
01015004	Namon BADA on bomomoutai dura ibo igat Abram iyawur men iyau , “ Atonio bobo orot Eliezer on men arimon om am buder ini noanai on , baise om toum natum orot on arimon om am buder ini noanai . ”
01015005	BADA on Abram guwi emon ibo igat au koun ato iyawur iyau , “ Om au safam etage ato efourtobon siribod uniyab , om am dam warar min arimon on nanaba inison siribod ba . ”
01015006	Abram on BADA itutumai , on mes BADA on Abram aurin iyasisir ato iyamai inat an yawas totorin imatar .
01015007	Namon BADA on Abram iyawur iyau , “ Yau on BADA , yau on Ur mafam Babylonia tafanam emon abo nanawaiim ugat , atonio tafanam ati tem om iti noanim mes . ”
01015008	Baise Abram iyau , “ BADA au Aiwab , yau mamaba an sagob atonio tafanam on arimon yau ini noaniu ? ”
01015009	On mes BADA on Abram iyafotai iyau , “ Om Cow , goat a sheep tona kakaita kakaita asi kwanda ton a kumag a maufor on eboen enat auriu . ”
01015010	Abram osi bobaitu iboen inat God aurin , iyasububunuen weie on basusi itaraseseben ruruam simatar ato reban reban iya , baise kiwiu on men itaraseseben on .
01015011	Namon kikim sisur bobaitu bios sitam mes , baise Abram ifaitanis sinai .
01015012	On an rai wera inai isofafir , Abram iyeinir nousin ifot bag iyen bubur , ato wouman beruber komasin on inat itaragabuai .
01015013	Namon BADA Abram aurin iyau , “ Om am dam warar on arimon sabu touman sin matar sabu fani asi tafanamai sinama , ato tafanam matuanis on sin misir sini yames auris sini agir a sini kokosaris inan kwanda 400 insawar .
01015014	Baise yau arimon osi sabu iyabon siyames sebi agires on ani makies , ato on an werai tafanam touman sinbi kirir on , osi arimon sawar gagamin auman sin boen singat .
01015015	Ato om toum on arimon nana unama inan uni orokwar bag weie tufai unarab ato sin garobim .
01015016	Om nanatum a wawam mat on engon wonarab in sawar weie om agirim on sin matabir men sinnat atonio tafanam sin boai . Yau Amor sabu on men gariwat an faitanis singat . Ab osi asi bobo komasis sin fofour on inarat gagamin bag weie osi ani makies ato an faitanis singat . ”
01015017	Wera inai isur iwouman ato rakaita si gun er an wairaf bakur auman a tafa yoyourin mat nan sirobotet ato bobaitu biyos si yen on sanasi sirabon sinai .
01015018	On rai BADA on Abram rus dura bo baibasit siyamai ato BADA on Abram iyawur iyau , “ Yau aumatanim om am dam warar on atonio tafanam engon tutufin anites . Egypt sareu kafakakai an farat inai Euphrates sareu gagamin an faratai .
01015019	Mat osi arimon Ken yangan , Kenizz yangan , Kadmon yangan ,
01015020	Hitt yangan , Perizz yangan , Rephai yangan ,
01015021	Amor yangan , Canaan yangan , Girgash yangan a Jebus yangan asi tafanam mat engon sin boai . ”
01016001	Abram awan Sarai on men fifi tani ituai on . Baise Sarai an bobo jeverei wabin Hagar , on min Egypt emon on rus simama ,
01016002	on mes Sarai on Abram aurin iyau , “ BADA on yau irufoteu men fofonin fifirig anitu on . On mes om enai au bobo jeverei rum wonen ; tait on jeverei emon weie fifi inituai weineu . ” Ato Sarai dura aifan i yau on Abram ibasitai .
01016003	On mes Abram awan Sarai on an bobo jeverei Hagar , Egypt emon on ibo awan Abram itai on awan mes . ( Abram tafanam Canaan nan ima kwanda auyotoat isawar gibunai atonio bobo imatar . )
01016004	On mes Abram on Hagar rus siyen ato Hagar inafot . On an rai Hagar isagob on inafot , on ibosuruf igigimemen a on an bada jever Sarai ibi suweiganai .
01016005	Namon Sarai on Abram aurin iyau , “ Om am komasin emon on Hagar yau ebi sisiweiu . Yau au bobo jeverei aitem , ato ari isagob on inafot on mes yau ebi sisiweiu . BADA om yau rut ati dura in fofon , iyafan an dura on totorin wat ! ”
01016006	Abram iyafotai iyau , “ Obin bag , am bobo jeverei on om am baibad babanai emama ato aifan enonosin on nanaba aurin unafour . ” Namon Sarai on yawas wawaninai Hagar aurin ifofour , on mes Hagar iyayai inai .
01016007	BADA an anea on efan koiteterinai kibubur sareu bisinai nan Hagar igaturai . On kibubur sareu min eta au Shur i nan bisinai .
01016008	Ato anea iyau , “ Hagar , Sarai an bobo jever om men emon ne unat ato aume na enan ? ” Hagar iyafotai iyau , “ Yau au bada jever Sarai on a ai kirir . ”
01016009	Namon BADA an anea iyau , “ Om ematabir men enai am bada jever aurin ato on an baibad babanai unama unabo . ”
01016010	Namon anea an dura ibotein iyau , “ Yau arimon am dam warar sigaraba bag anitem , ato men iyafan tani fofonin iniyab on .
01016011	Om arimon fifi orot unituai , wabin un yorai Ishmael , yabin BADA am yababan am tou on itatam nono .
01016012	Baise om natum orot on arimon rega donkey ba inama , on arimon sabu engon auris ini ragit ato sabu engon min natum orot aurin sini ragit . On arimon ekesin wat mabinai inama , men an dam warar mat . ”
01016013	On mes Hagar on toun itetemai iyau , “ yau min dura bag God ait ato an mama sabu an kasones ? ” BADA on Hagar aurin ikakafun on mes Hagar on wabin iyor , “ God on yau eiteu . ”
01016014	On fasinai dogu sareu ato Kadesh mafam a Bered efan basusi yen on sabu seyoyorai , “ BADA Yayawain On yau eiteu , on an dogu Sareu . ”
01016015	Hagar on Abram natun orot ituai ato Abram iwabai Ishmael .
01016016	On an werai Abram an kwanda on orot wat bat an yayatan nimtereban kaitamom . ( 86 )
01017001	On an werai Abram an kwanda on orot wat bat , orot ta aurin auyotoat an yayatan bat , BADA on Abram aurin irobotet ato iyawur iyau , “ Yau on God Faiwariu bag . Om Yau auriu uni fonabo a ra fufur am yawas totoris wat unafour .
01017002	Yau arimon au dura bo baibasit rut tani yamai ato am dam warar on sigaraba anitem . ”
01017003	Abram sindan irou i kwafir isur magin motob iruyein , ato God on iyawur iyau ,
01017004	“ Yau atonio dura bo baibasit om rut tabi yamai : Yau au matanim , om on arimon sabu sigaraba wawas agiris un matar .
01017005	Om wabim Abram yen on abi kitabirai Abraham , yabin Yau afofourim unnat sabu sigaraba wawas agiris un matar .
01017006	Yau arimon wawam agirim sigaraba anitem , ato am dam warar ini son tafanam engon sin boai . Ato fani on arimon sin nat aiwab sin matar .
01017007	Yau arimon aumatan om aurim a wawam agirim gibui sin rarat auris on an bokikin dura bo baibasit mes wantoan inen . Yau on arimon om am God a wawam agirim asi God .
01017008	Om ari ato Canaan tafanamai emama on sabu fani asi tafanam . Ato Yau arimon om a wawam agirim atonio tafanam tutufin engon anitem nan wonama au wantoan , ato Yau on arimon om wawam agirim asi God . ”
01017009	God on Abraham aurin iyau , “ Om a wawam agirim gibui serarat mat on woni fonabo au dura bo baibasit won bokikin :
01017010	Om a wawam agirim on engon woni basit ato orot engon sanamui on woni askibubues .
01017011	Ato ari ra on un bosuruf fifirig orot gugudis serarat ra nimtereban bai tonin gibunai on engon woni askibubues , on eb om am agirotis am goai sirarat a agirotis tafanam fani emon u totobonis on engon woni askibubues . Onai ini yoboet om a Yau rut on basuti dura bo baibasit on yen .
01017012	
01017013	Orot kakaita kakaita engon woni askibubues . Atonio usis an matair nan bai yoboen ini yamai on Yau au dura bo baibasit om Yau rut basuti on wantoan inen .
01017014	Orot iyafan men woni askibubuai on arimon men an sabu mat sinama mes . Yabin on orot min Yau au dura bo baibasit iyastob ato on mabinai bag inama .
01017015	Mat God on Abraham aurin iyau , “ Om awam wabin Sarai on men gibui unyorai men Sarai . On ari on wabin Sarah .
01017016	Yau arimon Sarah ani momoginai ato on dura bag natum fifi orot inituai weinem . Yau arimon ani momoginai ato on innat sabu engon tutufin ayos in matar . Ato arimon wawan agirin sanasi on fani on arimon aiwab sin matar .
01017017	Abraham sindan irou ikwafir isur magin motob iruyein iserer ato toun aurin iyau , “ Orot an kwanda orot wat nim min fofonin arimon fifi orot inarat i ? Ato Sarah an kwanda orot wat bat , orot ta aurin auyotoat min fofonin arimon fifi ini tuai i ? ”
01017018	Abraham on God aurin iyau , “ Abi fefeyanim , fofonin aumatan yau auriu ubi yamai on Ishmael on buder on it boai i ?
01017019	Baise God iyau , “ Ambin bag ! Om awam Sarah on arimon natun fifi orot ini tuai ato wabin un yorai Isaac . Yau au dura bo baibasit on fifi orot a wawan agirin auris ani yamai . On dura bo baibasit on arimon inen wantoan au wantoan .
01017020	Om Ishmael aurin ubi fefeyaniu on atatam nono . Yau arimon ani momoginai a nanatun a wawan agirin sigaraba anitai . On arimon aiwabis auyotoat an yayatan ruam tamas in matar a Yau arimon an fourai wawan agirin sinnat sabu faiwaris bag sin matar .
01017021	Baise Yau arimon au dura bo baibasit on natum Isaac aurin an bokikin . On fifi orot min arimon Sarah inituai atonio wera nanaba inan kwanda tani . ”
01017022	On an werai God on Abraham aurin dura ikakafun isawar ato On ikirir inai .
01017023	On ra kaitamomai Abraham on God aurin ifonabo ato natun Ishmael a orot fani an goai simama on engon iaskibubues , on eb Abraham an agirotis on an goai sirarat a agirotis fani tafanam fani emon itotobonis , osi engon iaskibubues .
01017024	Abraham an kwanda on orot wat bat , orot ta aurin auyotoat an yayatan nimtereban bat ( 99 ) , ato on natun Ishmael an kwanda on auyotoat an yayatan ton , ato rus engon siaskibubues .
01017025	
01017026	Osi rus on ra kaitamomai nan siaskibubues .
01017027	Abraham an agirotis mat engon siaskibubues .
01018001	BADA on Abraham aurin irobotet menan Mamre wengar gagamis sitatawar nan . Abraham on aiyet nanaba an guwi metewan awanai nan imair imama , yabin wera i foforab kwakwan on mes .
01018002	Abraham matan iyeit inai orot ton nan sitatawar ites . On ites mom on ra kaita imisir i yayai igat inai it nefotes mes . On sindan irou ikwafir isur magin motob iruyein ,
01018003	ato iyawures iyau , “ Au kavian , abi fefeyanim wotawar men woni kirireu wonan mes , yau on atonio , omi aurim anabo .
01018004	Omi nin wengar babanai wonbi yarir ato yau sareu an boai annat amm won souen .
01018005	Yau arimon ami bayu kafakai an botitiwag onai omi faiwar won boai weie ami etai wonabib wonan . Omi wonat yau au goai on mes yau omi aurim anabo . ” Osi orot ton siyafotai siyau , “ Basit , dura ato uyau on nanaba tanafour . ”
01018006	Abraham sasasan wat imatabir men an guwi amonai irui ato Sarah aurin iyau , “ Gariwat ! Rafi obin ato baik amonai yen on ebo egamatabir sarar eteren . ”
01018007	Namon Abraham iyayai inai an bobaitu sigaraba sitatawar on nan ato sanasi tona boboun momon on ibo ato an agirotin itai , on sasasan wat iyasubun itab .
01018008	Abraham rura momon turin , cow an sus a cow bios iboen ato orot ton nasi nan iya . Osi orot ton bayu si yam ato Abraham on wengar babanai nan bisisi itatawar .
01018009	Namon orot ton Abraham sitetemai siyau , “ Om awam Sarah on menan ? ” Ato on iyafotes iyau , “ Sarah on guwi amonai emama . ”
01018010	Osi sanasi orot tani on iyau , “ Ari ra inan roke nimtereban bat insawar gibunai , yau arimon an matabir men ato om awam Sarah on arimon fifi orot inituai . ” Sarah on ato orot dura ibi kakafun on kounai bag guwi metewan awanai imair imama i tatam .
01018011	Abraham Sarah rus on si orokwar si jenekwar bag , ato Sarah on fifirig baitu an wera on i sawarai .
01018012	On mes Sarah on toun aurin i serer ato iyau , “ Yau ari on ai jenekwar a atumususur , mat awau on eb i orokwar ato men fofonin rui wanen wani yasisir on . ”
01018013	Namon BADA on Abraham itetemai iyau , “ Aibo mes Sarah i serer ato iyau , ‘ Yau on ai jenekwar bag ato men fofonin fifi ani tuai on ? ’
01018014	Atonio on men bobo aifan tani wawanin BADA aurin on . Yau awurem au , ari ra inan roke nimtereban bat insawar weie yau an matabir men ato Sarah arimon fifi orot ini tuai . ”
01018015	Ato Sarah on iber ato isosouf iyau , “ Yau men aserer on . ” Baise BADA iyafotai iyau , “ Ambin , om dura bag u serer . ”
01018016	Namon orot ton simisir ato sinai efan menan Sodom mafam gagamin siti nateteai mes . Ato Abraham on osi mat sinai eta nenenai iti kirires sitan mes .
01018017	Ato BADA on Toun aurin ikakafun iyau , “ Yau atonio bobo an fofour on men Abraham ani buniai mes .
01018018	Abraham wawan agirin arimon sabu gagamis a faiwaris bag sin matar . Ato on orot fasinai , Yau arimon sabu tutufin engon ani momogines .
01018019	Yau on arubinai onai on nanatun , wawan agirin dura wawaninai inawures Yau auriu sini fonabo a bobo obis a totoris wat sinafour . Osi on bobo sin fofour on Yau arimon bobo tutufin engon aurin anafour mamaba au matanai ba . ”
01018020	Namon BADA on Abraham aurin iyau , “ Yau dura atatam Sodom a Gomorrah sabu on yawas ta ta komasis sigaraba sefofour ato asi bokomas on irat kwakwan .
01018021	On mes Yau an sur anan sabu anites an sagob dura aifan atatam on dura bag ai ambin . ”
01018022	Namon orot ruam simisir sinai au Sodom , baise BADA on Abraham rus nan sima .
01018023	Abraham on BADA aurin i tawadudun ato itetemai iyau , “ Om on dura bag arimon sabu obis a sabu komasis mat uni komasis ?
01018024	Ato sabu obis orot ruam , orot ta aurin auyotoat ( 50 ) nan mafam gagamin amonai sin mama on , Om arimon osi mat engon uni komasis ? Om fofonin sabu orot ruam , orot ta aurin auyotoat ut nosis ato uti yawasis ?
01018025	Dura bag men sabu obis on sabu komasis mat uni rabobis on . On men yawas obin on . Om men nanaba uni yamai . Om bobo nanaba un fofour on sabu obis a sabu komasis mat engon baimaki sin boai . On men yawas obin on . Om tafanam tutufin engon an bai gurubaban orot on mes bobo totorin wat unafour . ”
01018026	BADA iyafotai iyau , “ Yau sabu obis orot ruam , orot ta aurin auyotoat Sodom mafam amonai an gagatures on yau arimon osi fasisi on mafam gagamin tutufin an kaberai . ”
01018027	Abraham ikakafun men iyau , “ BADA , yau on isar fofou wat baise yau on uniu e rerekab aurim dura ani kakafun men .
01018028	Baise tait sabu obis on men orot ruam , orot ta aurin auyotoat on , arimon sabu orot ruam an yayatan nim wat . Ato sabu nim ambin min , Om arimon mafam gagamin uni komasai ? BADA iyafotai iyau , “ Yau sabu obis orot ruam an yayatan nim an gagatures on , Yau arimon men mafam gagamin ani komasai on . ”
01018029	Abraham ikakafun men iyau , “ Ato sabu arimon orot ruam wat nan sin mama on mamaba . ” BADA iyafotai iyau , “ Sabu obis orot ruam wat nan on , men arimon mafam gagamin ani komasai on . ”
01018030	Abraham iyau , “ BADA abi fefeyanim men auriu uni yatatab mes , baise yau ani kakafun men . Ato sabu obis orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat on arimon mamaba ? ” BADA iyau , “ Yau sabu obis orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat an gagatures on , yau arimon men mafam gagamin ani komasai on . ”
01018031	Abraham iyau , “ BADA abi fefeyanim yau uniu e rerekab aurim nana anbi kakafun on einotbureu . Ato sabu obis orot kaitamom wat un gagatures on arimon mamaba ? ” BADA iyau , “ Yau sabu obis orot kaitamom wat an gagatures on , arimon men mafam gagamin ani komasai on . ”
01018032	Abraham iyau , “ BADA abi fefeyanim , auriu men uni yatatab mes . Yau agogoi dura kaitamom wat ba aurim ani kakafun . Ato sabu auyotoat un gagatures on arimon mamaba ? ” BADA iyau , “ Yau sabu obis auyotoat wat an gagatures on , Yau arimon men mafam gagamin ani komasai on . ”
01018033	BADA on Abraham aurin ikakafun isawar ato inai . Ato Abraham on imatabir men inai an au go .
01019001	On an rai anea ruam on rabirabi sinat au Sodom ato Lot on mafam gagamin an furi awanai nan imair imama . On iyeit osi ites mom on , on imisir ato inai it nefotes mes . On nasi sindan irou ikwafir isur magin motob iruyein ,
01019002	ato iyau , “ Kavian , yau on atonio , omi aurim anabo ato abi fefeyanim , omi wonat au goai . Omi amm won souen ato fom mat nin tanen weie raso fomenei fomenei won misir ato ami etai wonabib wonan . ” Baise osi siyafotai siyau , “ Ambin , wei fom on arimon nin mafam gagamin an furi amonai efan farabai nan wanen . ”
01019003	On nana i dodois on mes mat sinai an goai . Lot an bobo orot ifores rafi sarar fani siteren a siu obis si botitiwag nanawan sabu auris . Osi si botitiwag isawar ato sites siyam .
01019004	Nanawan sabu ruam on sibo titiwagis sitar siten bubur mes ato Sodom mafam gagamin an orot engon tutufin , orot bobous a oroti engon sinat Lot an goa sireben fifin .
01019005	Osi Lot aurin siyor ato sitetemai iyau , “ Ato orot sinat ari fom om mat en mes on menan ? Om wei auri eboes egat . ” Sodom orot sigogoi on osi mat siti yayar mes .
01019006	Lot igat au koun ato metewan koun emon irufot .
01019007	On auris iyau , “ Tuturau , abi fefeyanim , omi men bobo komasin on nanaba woni yamai mes !
01019008	Woit , yau nanatu jeverig ruam , osi on matafis semama . Yau osi an boes an gat omi aurim ato aifan wogogoi nanaba auris wonafour . Baise atonio orot auris on men aifan tani wonafour mes ; osi on nanawanotis sinat au goa rufafarin amonai semama . ”
01019009	Baise osi siyau , “ Om on orot toumanim , wei ai eta erereb . Om iyafan on wei unawurei nanaba wanafour ? Om men wai eta unrereb on , wei arimon komasin bag om aurim wanafour men osi orot ruam ba . ” Ato osi Lot au gib na sirukou ato sigai metewan sitaseb sitar mes .
01019010	Baise orot ruam goa amon emon on imas siyotet igat Lot sitein men irui ato metewan sirufot .
01019011	Namon osi orot ruam on sabu engon tutufin ato kounai sitatawar on sirou matas si wouman , men fofonin metewan sititai on .
01019012	Orot ruam Lot siyawur siyau , “ Om abaim tani wat nin emama ; nanatum orot , nanatum jeverig , rarawam orot ai dam warar fani nin mafam gagaminai semama on un boes won gat ,
01019013	yabin wei atonio efan wani komasai . BADA atonio osi sabu asi dura komasis gagamis on itatam nono , ato wei iyafarei wanat Sodom wani komasai mes . ”
01019014	Namon Lot inai orot iyabon nanatun jeverig siti awanis mes on iyawures iyau , “ Omi gariwat atonio efan woi kirir wogat ; BADA efan ini komasai . ” Baise osi sinos on ibi kobo .
01019015	Ra i yabaseb nan ato anea sifourtobon Lot siti yagiginai mes . Osi siyau , “ Om awam a nanatum jeverig ruam eboes ato gariwat wogat . Omi on nanaba won fofour on arimon men ami yawas woni siwanen on , an rai BADA mafam gagamin inbi komasai nan . ”
01019016	Baise Lot on inonot sisit on mes men gariwat iyayob on . On fasinai orot ruam on Lot a on awan a nanatun jeverig ruam imasi siboen ato sibo nanawaiis mafam gagamin emon sigat . Yabin BADA on Lot an dam wara mat ikaberes .
01019017	Namon anea tani iyau , “ Omi ami yawas wonnos woni yai ! Men au gib won rutabir a men rou babanai won tawar mes . Omi au oyau woni yai onai omi men wonarab . ”
01019018	Baise Lot iyafotes iyau , “ Ambin ! au kavian , abi fefeyanim men woni yamai on nanaba eta weromin wanan mes .
01019019	Om on am moa obin yau auriu a ukabereu , mat Om yau uyawasiu . Baise yau men fofonin anayai anan oyauai angat on . Komasin arimon innat in boeu anarab .
01019020	Ato om mafam kafakakai uit i ? On on akwafui . Eiyameu nan ani yai anan , eit on asir mafam kafakakai wat ato yau arimon in rufafareu . ”
01019021	Anea iyafotai iyau , “ Engon basit wat , abi basitem . On mafam arimon men ani komasai .
01019022	Baise om gariwat uniyai , Yau men bobo aifan tani ani yamai ab om ainau unan on efanai ungat weie . Lot on mafam aurin iyor kafakakai , on mes on mafam wabin min seyoyorai Zoar .
01019023	Wera igegeg an rai on Lot inat Zoar igat .
01019024	Ra kaita BADA agim forabis wairaf auman safam emon i yafarai usan ba iyar isur mafam gagamis Sodom a Gomorrah tefasi ,
01019025	ato roubabanai sabu simama engon tutufin a nan wengar a wayo sigegeg on engon i komasen .
01019026	Baise Lot awan on au gib i rutabir men ato on ra kaita iki tabirai inat agim kamitin imatar nan itawar .
01019027	On ra kaitamomai Abraham fomenei fomenei imisir sasasan wat inai efan menan ainau BADA nanai i tatawar on nan .
01019028	On iyeit isur Sodom a Gomorrah iten a roubaban tutufin engon on bakur it motob emon igeg . On bakur igegeg an itin on momo fofotar yaras bakur gugugurin egeg ba on i geg .
01019029	God mafam gagamis ato roubabanai si yen on engon ikomasen menan Lot imama nan , baise On Abraham an baifefeyan on inonotai on mes Lot komasin it gagaturai emon on irufafarai ibo igat iyawas .
01019030	Lot on Zoar nan ma on iber , on mes on a nanatun jeverig ruam mat sigai oyauai nan agim dogu amonai sima .
01019031	Ra kaitamom ainau jeverei on tain aurin iyau , “ Ot tamat on ebi orokwar ato nin tafanamai on orot ambin iyafan arimon ini awanit fifirig tanitu , ato tafanamai sabu sefofour ba .
01019032	Om enat ot tamat tani yamai in toman ini kokok , onai ot mat tanen ato on emon on ot fifirig tanitu . ”
01019033	On fom osi jeverig ruam on tamas sareu wine sitai itoman ato ainau jeverei on rus siyen . Baise tamas on itoman kwakwan i kokok on mes men isagob jeverei mamaba bisinai i yen imimisir on .
01019034	Ra bairuinai ainau jeverei on tain giya jever iyawur iyau , “ Yau fom tamat rui waien ; ato ari fom on tani yamai in toman ini kokok men ato om ba rum wonen . Namon ot tamat emon on arimon fifirig tanitu . ”
01019035	On mes on fom tamas sibo si tomanai kwakwan i kokok ato giya jeverei ba taman rus siyen . On bobo min on nanaba imatar men , tamas itoman kwakwan i kokok ato men isagob jeverei mamaba bisinai i yen imimisir on .
01019036	Atonio on etaiai Lot nanatun jeverig ruam tous tamas emon on sinafot .
01019037	Ainau jeverei fifi orot ituai , on i wabai Moab . On fifi wawan agirin min ari seyoyores Moab yangan .
01019038	Giya jeverei on eb fifi orot ituai , on i wabai Ben-Ammi . On fifi wawan agirin min ari seyoyores Ammon yangan .
01020001	Abraham Mamre emon au baban na isur inai Canaan tafanam turinai ato Kadesh a Shur basusi nan ima . On gibunai on inai Gerar nan imama ,
01020002	Abraham on Gerar sabu ikasones awan Sarah on on robun . On mes Gerar an aiwab orot Abimelech on an bobo orot iyawures sinai Sarah sibo sinat aurin .
01020003	Fom tani God bomomoutai nan Abimelech iyawur iyau , “ Om on arimon unarab , yabin ato jever on toutabinin on ubo . ”
01020004	Baise Abimelech on men jever usin iruyein ato iyau , “ BADA , yau on au komasin ambin ! Ato Om min yau au sabu mat unikomasi i ?
01020005	Abraham toun iyau on robun Sarah ato Sarah on eb nanaba iyau . Yau atonio afofour on au not rubunaginai wat a mat yau men komasin ta aiyamai on . ”
01020006	God on bomomoutai iyafotai iyau , “ Dura bag , yau asagob om ufofour on am not rubunaginai wat on mes , osi emon aru fafarem Yau auriu men ut bokomas a men ai basitem jever usin ut botobon . ”
01020007	Baise ari on jever ebo awan orot eitai men . Abraham on au bairuruotin , on arimon om aurim inbayoi ato om men unarab . Baise om jever men un bibitai men on , Yau tainam ayeyeinin on om arimon unarab , om a am sabu mat engon .
01020008	Ra itom fomenei Abimelech an bobo babadis engon iyores sinat ato bobo aifan imamatar on ikasones , ato osi men sunub siber .
01020009	Namon Abimelech on Abraham iyor inat ato itetemai iyau , “ Om wei auri aifan ufour ? Yau aifan komasin om aurim afour mes on atonio komasin gagamin ubo unat yau au bai aiwab amonai ? Men iyafan tani itafour on om yau auriu ufour .
01020010	Om aibo mes atonio bobo nanaba ufour ? ”
01020011	Abraham iyafotai iyau , “ Yau atonio bobo afour yabin yau men ai nonot omi on God wokakafai . On fasinai yau ai dura bag omi arimon wotasubunueu ato awau wot boai .
01020012	Dura bag on yau robu . On on yau tamau natun , baise men ayou emon on ato abo ai awan .
01020013	On mes on an rai tamau an goa emon God iyafareu anai tafanam toumanai , yau Sarah aurin au , ‘ Om un faskikin yau auriu on bai yoboen unbi yamai sabu un kakasones yau on om robum . ”
01020014	Namon Abimelech on Sarah ibo Abraham itai men a sheep , cow a agirotis mat itai .
01020015	Abimelech on Abraham aurin iyau , “ Au motob tutufin atonio ato om am gogoiai efan menan un rubin on nan unama . ”
01020016	Ato on irutabir Sarah aurin iyau , “ Yau on robum agim silver 1000 nanaba abitai , onai sabu iyabon om mat womama in kasones om on am komasin ambin , sabu engon arimon sin sagob om on men aifan komasin ufour . ”
01020017	Bobo aifan Abraham awan Sarah aurin imatar on mes , BADA iyamai Abimelech an aiwab goa amonai jever men fofonin fifirig sititu on . On mes Abraham ibayoi Abimelech aurin ato God iyawasai . Abimelech awan a an agirotis jeverig mat siyawas ato fofonin arimon fifirig sinitu .
01020018	
01021001	BADA on Sarah imomoginai ato mamaba iyau matanai on nanaba ifour ,
01021002	Abraham iorokwar tefanai weie Sarah inafot ato fifi orot ituai . Fifi irarat on God wera iyau i yen on nan irat .
01021003	Abraham fifi orot iwabai Isaac .
01021004	Ato Isaac irat ra nimtereban ton an werai on Abraham natun iaskibubuai , mamaba God iyau i yen on nanaba .
01021005	Abraham an kwanda on orot wat nim ( 100 ) an werai on Isaac irat .
01021006	Sarah iyau , “ God on yasisir a serer ibo inat auriu . Sabu engon durau sin tatam arimon yau mat wan serer . ”
01021007	Namon on dura ibotein men iyau , “ Iyafan wat Abraham itetemai , Sarah min arimon fifi inituai i ? Ato baise woit ! orokwar tefanai yau natun orot aituai . ”
01021008	Fifi orot irat gagamin ato sibi tasiarai an werai nan Abraham forag gagamin iyamai .
01021009	Ra tani Abraham natun Ishmael , Egypt jever Hagar ibituai on , on Sarah natun Isaac rus sikwakwarer .
01021010	Sarah osi ites ato Abraham aurin iyau , “ Atonio agir jeverei natun fifi orot rus on eiyafares senai . Atonio jever natun on men yau natu Isaac an buder turin in boai mes .
01021011	On dura emon on Abraham men sunub iyababan , yabin Ishmael mat on eb on natun .
01021012	Baise God on Abraham iyawur iyau , “ Om fifi a am agir jever Hagar auris men uni yababan mes . Aifan Sarah yawurem on nananba eiyamai , yabin Isaac emon on arimon wawam agirim sinarat , on min au matanim nono .
01021013	Yau arimon agir jeverei natun on eb nanatun sigaraba anitai , onai osi arimon sinat tafanam tutufin an sabu sin matar . On mat min om natum orot . ”
01021014	Ra itom fomenei fomenei Abraham bayu fani iboen a kibub foro korofinai siyamai on sareu ibonuai ato Hagar itai . Abraham fifi orot Hagar kounai iyagai ato iyafares sinai . Hagar natun rus sidadanam sinai Beersheba efan koiteterinai nan sigat .
01021015	Sareu engon isawar an werai , Hagar on fifi wengar babasi nan ikirir ,
01021016	ato on kafakai wat inai mabinai nan imair . On toun aurin ikakafun iyau , “ Yau men fofonin natu anitai inarab on . ” On nan imair imama ato ibosuruf itotou .
01021017	God on fifi itotou on itatam ato an anea safam emon Hagar aurin ikakafun iyau , “ Hagar , om aifan ebi yababanim ? Men unaber mes . God on fifi an tou itatam .
01021018	Om emisir enai fifi ebogai ato ekubainunubai . Yau arimon on wawan agirin an fouris sinnat sabu sigaraba bag sin matar . ”
01021019	Namon God Hagar matan iruseren ato sareu dogu it . On inai ato kibub sareu ibonuai ato turin fifi orot itomanai .
01021020	God on fifi bisinai imama ato fifi on irat gagamin imatar . Ishamel on efan koiteterinai nan ima ato inat bo am an orot gagamin bag imatar .
01021021	Fifi orot on nan Paran efan koiteterinai imama ato ayon on inai Egypt nan jeverei igatuai wein on iti awan mes .
01021022	On an werai Abimelech a bai gagam an bai netewar orot gagamin wabin Phicol rus sinai Abraham aurin . Namon Abimelech on Abraham iyawur iyau , “ Yau asagob , God on bisimui emama on mes bobo engon tutufin ebi yamen .
01021023	On mes om God matanai unau mataniu on om men baisigogo yawas yau auriu , nanatu auris a wawau agiriu auris unafour mes . Yau on bobo obin wat aurim afour on mes om unau mataniu an garamin bobo obin wat auriu unafour a atonio tafanam amonai emama aurin mat . ”
01021024	Abraham iyau , “ Engon basit wat , yau au matanim . ”
01021025	Namon Abraham mat iyawarib Abimelech aurin ato an agirotis simisir waniai nan sareu dogu tani siyabaruai aurin on .
01021026	Basie Abimelech iyau , “ Yau men asagob atonio bobo on iyafan iyamai . On aurin on men dura tani ukasoneu on , yau ato ari weie atatam . ”
01021027	Namon Abraham sheep a cow fani iboen Abimelech itai ato rus dura bo baibasit siyamai .
01021028	Abraham on an sheep unis sigaraba amon emon on sheep bobous nimtereban ruam iboseseren mabisi iya ,
01021029	ato Abimelech on itetemai iyau , “ Om aibo mes on bobo nanaba ufour ? ”
01021030	Abraham iyafotai iyau , “ Yau agogoi om atonio sheep bobous nimtereban ruam on unabo ini noanim . Ato om bobo nanaba unbi yamai on , ebi dura bag dogu sareu on yau asar . ”
01021031	On mes on efan siyor Beersheba , yabin on nan on orot ruam siyaumatan bonen .
01021032	Osi dura bo baibasit Beersheba nan siyamai isawar gibunai , Abimelech a Phicol rus simatabir men sinai au Philistia .
01021033	Namon Abraham wengar tamarisk ibo Beersheba nan itanum ato BADA God Mama Wantoanin on ikwafirai .
01021034	Abraham wera weromin bag Philistia nan ima .
01022001	Kwanda fani sisawar gibunai , God on Abraham an baitutum irutobonai ato iyawur iyau , “ Abraham ! ” Ato Abraham iyafotai iyau , “ Men , yau nio ! ”
01022002	Namon God iyawur iyau , “ Om natum kaitamom wat Isaac , om am nuabo bag on unboai unan Moriah tafanamai nan . Yau arimon oyau tani ani yoboem on tefanai nan natum unasubun ato unterai sirifu mes auriu un kutetai . ”
01022003	Ra itom fomenei , Abraham imisir an donkey tefanai sifumama iyous ibo titiwag , weie sirifu terin an wegar fani iyasutuenen donkey tafanai iyagai . On natun orot Isaac a an bobo orot ruam iboes mat sinai tafanam menan God iyawur on nan .
01022004	Ra baitoninai Abraham matan iyeit inai efan nanenei nan it .
01022005	Ato on an bobo orot ruam iyawures , “ Omi nin donkey mat won mama ato yau on fifi orot rui wanan nan God wan kwafirai ato wan matabir men wannat . ”
01022006	Abraham sirifu terin an wengar ikafurir ibo natun Isaac itai iyabar ato on toun on wairaf ai duf a nikok iboen . Osi kaitenei sibib si nan ,
01022007	ato Isaac awan itagai taman itetemai iyau , “ Bab ! ” Abraham iyafotai iyau , “ Men , yau natu ? ” Isaac iyau , “ Wairaf a nikok on atonio ato sheep boboun sirifu terin aurin on menan ? ”
01022008	Abraham iyafotai iyau , “ Yau natu , God Toun on arimon sheep boboun in bononoat sirifu terin aurin , ” ato rus kaitenei sibib sinai .
01022009	Namon osi sinai efan menan God iyawur on nan sigat , Abraham sirifu agim kema iyon ato wengar tefanai iruyabar , weie on natun Isaac ann , iman ifatumen ato sirifu agim kema tefanai iyenuai .
01022010	Abraham iman iyof an nikok ibo , asun itagai natun itasubun mes .
01022011	Ra kaita BADA an anea safam emon aurin iyorir iyau , “ Abraham , Abraham ! ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Men , yau nio . ”
01022012	Anea iyawur iyau , “ Om imam men fifi orot usinai unyein a men aifan tani aurin uni yamai mes . Ari weie asagob om on God e kakafai yabin om natum orot kaitamom wat on God aurin men urugagarai on . ”
