01022013	Namon Abraham au koun na irutabir ato iyeit rega fofotanai sheep tona an geg ai nan wengar famenai itarun itatawar it . Abraham inai sheep tona ibo iyasubun ato natun orot an efan igaraminai sirifu iter God aurin ikutetai .
01022014	On fasinai Abraham on efan iwabai iyau , “ BADA Arimon Inbononoat ” on mes sabu ari ra nana seyoyorai sau , “ BADA An Oyauai Nan Arimon Inbononoat . ”
01022015	BADA an anea wera bairuin ba safam emon Abraham aurin iyorir ato iyawur iyau ,
01022016	“ BADA ato nanaba iyau , ‘ Yau Tou Wabiui abi faro yabin om Yau auriu uifonabo ato natum orot kaitamom wat men urugagarai on ,
01022017	yau arimon dura bag ani momoginem ato ani yamai wawam agirim on sinison safamai siribod a tore an gasa ba . Om wawam agirim on arimon sinsowar asi ragit sin bomerubes ato asi mafam gagamis on osi sini noanis .
01022018	Om am fesi faisisi on sabu tafanam au engon arimon bai momogin sin boai , yabin om yau auriu uifonabo on mes . ’ ”
01022019	Namon Abraham natun Isaac rus simatabir men sinai an bobo orot ruam auris ato engonei simisir sinai au Beersheba . Ato Abraham on Beersheba nan ima .
01022020	Wera fani sisawar gibunai , Abraham on tain Nahor awan Milcah duran itatam on fifirig nimtereban ton itu .
01022021	Fifi ainau orot wabin on Uz , fifi orot bairuin wabin on Buz , fifi orot baitonin wabin on Kemuel , ( on min Aram taman )
01022022	Namon fifirig nim ba wabis on Chesed , Hazo , Pildash , Jidlaph a Bethuel .
01022023	Bethuel min Rebecca taman . Osi fifirig orot nimtereban ton on Abraham tain awan Milcah itu .
01022024	Mat Nahor awan ufuigeg wabin Reumah on eb nanatun wabis on Tebah , Gaham , Tahash a Maacah on itu .
01023001	Sarah ima inai an kwanda 127 ibo .
01023002	On Hebron nan irabob Canaan tafanam amonai ato Abraham on Sarah aurin iyababan ato irous ibo touousai .
01023003	On efan menan awan rabobin i yen on ikirir ato inai Hitt yangan auris ; ato iyawures iyau ,
01023004	“ Yau on nanawan orot nin amomui amama ; motob turin auriu won kutetai an tobon on nan yau awau an garobai . ”
01023005	Osi siyafotai siyau ,
01023006	“ Wai kavian , om wei wai dura un tatami . Wei waitem om on bai netewar orot faiwarim bag , on mes om garob an efan obin wat erubin ato nan awam egarobai . Wei engon wabi yasisir garob efan wanitem , on nan awam un garob . ”
01023007	Namon Abraham auris uson itur
01023008	ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi wonbi basiteu awau nin an gagarob on , abi fefeyanim Zohar natun Ephron on wotawur weineu .
01023009	Yau abi fefeyanai fofonin on an Mechpelah agim dogu ato motob matanai yen on yau ititeu . Yau abifefeyanai on an baiyan tutufin initeu ato omi matamui ani baiyan ato on garob efan min innat yau ininoaniu . ”
01023010	Ephron toun on an sabu Hitt yangan mat on mafam gagamin an furi awan sesebinai simair simama , on nan emon ibi yafot on osi sabu engon sitatam .
01023011	Ephron iyau , “ Au kavian , om au dura etatam . Om atonio agim dogu on men un tobon mes . Yau au agim dogu a motob tutufin mat engon on asir anitem mom . Yau au sabu matasi au motob asir abitem mom ato on nan awam un garob . ”
01023012	Namon Abraham Hitt yangan nasi uson itur ,
01023013	ato osi tainan tainan sitatam Abraham Ephron aurin iyau , “ Yau abi fefeyanim tainam ereben un tatamiu , yau motob an baiyan tutufin ani baiyanim on un boai ato yau awau nan an garob . ”
01023014	Ephron Abraham iyafotai iyau ,
01023015	“ Yau au kavian , motob an baiyan an fofon on agim silver 400 ato baise ot men ato baiyan an fofon aurin tani yamai rut basuti ma in komas . Om motob asir ebo mom ato awam nan egarob . ”
01023016	Ephron motob an baiyan ibaton ato Abraham ibasit , on mes Hitt yangan matasi bai totobonotis sefofour ba on agim silver iyab inai ifofonin ato Ephron itai .
01023017	On mes Ephron an motob Mechpelah amonai Mamre nan au wera matan na , on motob agim dogu mat a wengar engon on amonai on Abraham inoanai .
01023018	Hitt yangan ato mafam gagamin an furi awan sesebinai sikuayo sibi dudur on engon sisagob Abraham noan .
01023019	Namon Abraham awan Sarah on on agim dogu amonai igarob Canaan tafanamai nan .
01023020	On mes motob a agim dogu ato Hitt yangan ibinoanis on inat Abraham an rasi dogu mes imatar .
01024001	Abraham ari on iorokwar isawar . Ato on bobo aifan engon tutufin ifofour on BADA imomoginai .
01024002	Ra kaitamom , Abaraham an bobo orot atamanin on goa amonai sawar engon tutufin ikakaifaren on aurin iyau , “ Om imam sasanawui eiwan ato unau matan .
01024003	Yau agogoi Om safam a tafanam an BADA God Wabinai uni faro on , om men arimon nin Canaan sabu sanasi yau natu orot awan un rubinai mes .
01024004	Om totor un matabir unan tafanam menan yau au rat barenai nan ato yau au dam warar amosi emon , yau natu orot Isaac awan jeverei un boai . ”
01024005	Baise bobo orot itetemai iyau , “ Ato jeverei in tinan men an boai an nanat mes on mamaba ? Enonosin arimon fofonin natum orot an boai an matabir men om am tafanamai ? ”
01024006	Abraham iyafotai iyau , “ Ambin ! Om natu men un boai un matabir au tafanamai mes .
01024007	BADA , safam an God on tamau an goa a yau au rat baren tafanam emon iboeu agat ato ifaro on arimon atonio motob on wawau agiriu inites . On an anea arimon ini yafarai onai ini netewarim unan natu orot awan un boai ato un matabir .
01024008	Ato jeverei in tinan men in gogoi rum won nanat mes on , yau au baifaro emon irufanim . Baise bobo kaitamom wat on , yau natu on men un boai un matabir unan men yau au tafanamai . ”
01024009	On mes bobo orot iman an bada Abraham sasananai iwanen ato ifaro mamaba Abraham i yawur on itafour mes .
01024010	Namon bobo orot an bada Abraham an camel engon auyotoat iboen a siwar obis fani iboen ato inai Abraham tain Nahor an mafam gagamin aurin Mesopotamia tafanamai nan .
01024011	On an werai on inai dogu sareu mafam gagamin kounai igat mom on camel iyames sindas sirouen . On min irabirabi , on an werai jever sigat sareu sitasu mes .
01024012	Namon bobo orot ibayoi ifefeyan iyau , “ O BADA , yau au bada Abraham an God , ari ra eibaisiu au bobo innat obin in matar ato am moa obin uniyamai au bada Abraham aurin .
01024013	Eit ! Yau atonio dogu sareu bisinai atatawar , ato mafam gagamin an jeverig on se gat sareu sinasu .
01024014	Yau arimon jeverei tani anawur , ‘ Karun , am kibub eyirai esur ato sareu eiteu atoman . ’ Ato on jeverei am bobo orot Isaac aurin un rurubinai mes on , arimon auriu inau , ‘ Basit , au bada , etoman . ’ Namon on in botein inau , ‘ Yau arimon am camel mat asi sareu an boai sin toman . On bobo nanaba in mamatar on yau arimon an sagob Om am moa obin on au bada Abraham aurin ufour . ’
01024015	Bobo orot on nana ibabayoi ato jeverei boboun wabin Rebecca on abaranai sareu kibub iyabar mat inat igat . On min Abraham tain Nahor awan Milcah rus natus Bethuel , on natun jeverei .
01024016	On jeverei on mamarag ato matafin , men orot tani rus siyen on . On isur inai dogu sareuai nan kibub sareu ibonuai ato imatabir men inat .
01024017	Bobo orot iyayai inai inefotai ato iyawur iyau , “ Karun , fofonin am kibub emon sareu utiteu at toman i . ”
01024018	Jeverei iyafotai iyau , “ Au kavian , basit sareu un toman ” on ra kaita kibub abaran emon iyeirai isur imanai ibotan ato itai itoman .
01024019	Rebecca sareu itai itoman isawar gibunai ato iyau , “ Yau anan sareu an boai annat am camel mat auris ato anites sin toman inan ini fofonis . ”
01024020	On ra kaita an kibub sareu bobaitu asi didiwagai irir isawar ato iyayai inai dogu sareuai nan sareu turin ba isun ibo inat auris , on bobo nanaba ifour i nan i nat sareu ibi kayam mom asir camel engon sareu sitoman ifofonis .
01024021	Ato orot on dura ambin asi matanai wat ibi mateteai it sagob mamaba BADA on an bobo iyamai inat obin emamatar ai ambin .
01024022	On an werai jeverei camel sareu ites sitoman isawar weie , orot agim gold aburus an urakof an baiyan gagamin ibo ato aburunai iyein a agim gold kwasi tayabaris ruam on asunai iganen .
01024023	Namon on itetemai iyau , “ Om ekasoneu , om tamam on iyafan a an goai efan fofonin yau au orot mat ari fom wat nan waten ? ”
01024024	On iyafotai iyau , “ Yau tamau on Bethuel a wa wau orot jever on Nahor a Milcah .
01024025	Wei ai goai on wayo ison kwakwan sen fofonin camel bayu sinam a ai goa amonai on eb efan yen fofonin omi mat wonen . ”
01024026	Namon orot sindan irou ato BADA ikwafirai .
01024027	On iyau , “ Yau BADA ani fain , yau au bada Abraham an God , on an kaber a faskikinai an aumatan au bada aurin ibokikin . Ato yau on BADA ibototoriu totor wat anat au bada Abraham an dam warar auris agat . ”
01024028	Jeverei iyayai inai ayon an goai ato bobo engon tutufin simamatar auris on idudur .
01024029	Rebecca robun wabin on Laban . On an werai on robun aburunai urakof a asunai kwasi iten a dura mamaba orot jeverei i yawur on idudur i tatam on , on iyayai inai ato orot igaturai dogu sareuai nan camel sesebisi itatawar ,
01024030	
01024031	ato iyawur iyau , “ Om enat rut tanan au go . Om orot on BADA imomoginem . Aibo mes nin kounai etatawar ? Yau au goai on efan abo titiwag yen om aurim a am camel mat auris . ”
01024032	On mes Abraham an bobo orot on Laban rus sinai au go . Ato Laban an bobo orot on camel tefasi emon sawar siyeiren ato asi bayu siboen sinat sites siyam . Namon sareu sibo sinat Abraham an bobo orot a on an orot mat ass sit souen mes .
01024033	Namon bayu nanai siyein , baise on iyau , “ Yau men gariwat bayu anam mes , ab ainau on dura an kasonem unsagob yau aibo mes anat nin . ” Laban iyau , “ Basit , ekasonei . ”
01024034	On mes bobo orot on ibosuruf dura ikakafun iyau , “ Yau on Abraham an bobo orot .
01024035	BADA on yau au bada Abraham gagaminai bag imomoginai ato sawarotin imatar . On bobaitu engon ; sheep , goat , cow , agim silver , agim gold a orot jever agirotis on engon itai .
01024036	Yau au bada awan Sarah on ijenekwar an werai fifi orot ituai , ato yau au bada an buder engon natun itai .
01024037	Yau au bada iyameu ai faro on an dura ati fonaboai mes . On iyawureu iyau , ‘ Om men Canaan tafanam emon jeverei un rubin yau natu awan mes .
01024038	Baise om unan tamau an sabu , an dam warar amosi natu awan nan unrubin .
01024039	Ato yau au bada aitetemai au , ‘ Ato jeverei men in gogoi yau rui wan nanat on arimon mamaba ?
01024040	On iyafoteu iyau , ‘ BADA ato ra fufur abi fonaboai On arimon an anea ini yafarai om rum wonan bainonot aifan on iniyamai weinem . Om arimon tou au sabu emon natu awan unboai , yau tamau an dam warar emon .
01024041	Eta on kaitamom wat . Om unan yau au dam warar auris ato osi men sini basitem jeverei unboai unnanat on arimon om baifaro emon on in rufanim .
01024042	Yau ari rabirabi anat dogu sareuai nan ato abayoi , ‘ Yau au bada Abraham an BADA God , karun , eibaisiu au bobo innat obin inmatar .
01024043	Yau atonio dogu sareuai . On an werai jeverei boboun sareu boin mes in gagat on , yau arimon ani fefeyanai an kibub emon sareu initeu an toman .
01024044	Ato on jeverei inbi basit sareu initeu an totoman a toun in gogoi camel asi sareu inboai inites sin totoman on , yau asagob jeverei min on urubinai au bada natu awan mes . ’
01024045	Yau nana ababayoi ato Rebecca abaranai kibub auman inat ato isur dogu sareuai sareu itsun mes . Yau awur au , ‘ Karun , sareu eiteu an toman . ’
01024046	On ra kaita an kibub abaran emon iyeirai isur ato iyau , ‘ Etoman a mat am camel sareu anites sin toman . ’ On mes yau sareu atoman ato on camel ba asi sareu ites sitoman .
01024047	Yau aitetemai au , ‘ Om iyafan natun jeverei ? ’ Ato on iyafoteu iyau , ‘ Yau on Bethuel natun jeverei , Bethuel on Nahor a Milcah rus natus . ’ Namon yau urakof aburunai ayein a asunai kwasi ai ganen .
01024048	Namon yau sindau arou ato BADA akwafirai . Yau BADA anifain , yau bada Abraham an God . On ibo totoriu totor wat anat yau au bada an dam warar auris ato jeverei agaturai on natun awan mes .
01024049	Basit omi ari won gogoi ami moa obin a dura bagai wat au bada Abraham aurin wonbi yamai on basit rerebai won kasoneu . O omi men won gogoi mes on eb rerebai won kasoneu ato yau an sagob au bainonot ani yamai . ”
01024050	Namon Laban a Bethuel rus siyafotai siyau , “ Atonio bobo on BADA emon , on mes wei men eta tani yen aifan wanau on .
01024051	Rebecca on atonio , om ebo ato enai am bada Abraham natun orot awan mes inmatar , mamaba BADA Toun i yau nanaba . ”
01024052	On an rai Abraham an bobo orot atonio dura itatam on , on sindan irou ikwafir isur magin motob iruyein ato BADA ikwafirai .
01024053	Namon bobo orot on monag sawar agim silver a agim goldai sibi yamen on a beber iyateten ato iboen Rebecca itai . Mat on siwar baiyas gagamis bag on robun a ayon ites .
01024054	Namon Abraham an bobo orot an orot mat si nat on bayu siyam sitom ato fom nan mat siyen . Osi fomenei simisir ato Abraham an bobo orot on iyau , “ Yau agogoi an matabir men anan au bada aurin . ”
01024055	Baise Rebecca robun orot a ayon rus siyafotai siyau , “ Jeverei on eikirir tafaror kaitamom o ra auyotoat nanaba mat wanama weie on gibui inan . ”
01024056	Baise Abraham an bobo orot on iyawures iyau , “ Men won botaniu mes . BADA on ibaisiu au bib iyamai inat obin imatar ; on mes woni yafareu anan au bada Abraham aurin . ”
01024057	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Basit ot jeverei tayor enat ato tai tetemai tait . ”
01024058	On mes osi Rebecca siyor inat ato sitetemai siyau , “ Om egogoi atonio orot rum wonan i ? ” On iyafotes iyau , “ Eee ! yau rui anan . ”
01024059	On mes osi Rebecca a an fio kaifar jever on sikirires ato Abraham an bobo orot a on an orot fani mat sinai .
01024060	Ato osi atonio dura ai on Rebecca simomoginai ato siyawur siyau : “ Wei robui . Om arimon sabu babaisonis ayos unmatar ! Om wawam agirim arimon asi ragit sin bomerubes ato asi mafam gagamis sin boai ! ”
01024061	Namon Rebecca a an bobo jeverei rus sibotitiwag ato asi camel tefasi sigai simair . Abraham an bobo orot Rebecca ibo ato tafanam sikirir sinai .
01024062	Isaac on Dogu Sareu BADA Yayawasin Yau Eiteu On An Dogu Sareu emon inat Canaan tafanam turinai nan imama .
01024063	Rabirabi tani Isaac igat inai masauai ibibib ato matan ireben inai on camel si nat on ites .
01024064	On an werai Rebecca iyeit Isaac it on an camel emon isur
01024065	ato Abraham an bobo orot itetemai iyau , “ Orot ato masau ai ibib aurit e nat on iyafan ? ” Bobo orot iyafotai iyau , “ On min yau au bada Isaac . ” On mes Rebecca beber ibo ato magin ikukum .
01024066	Namon bobo orot ato bobo engon tutufin ifofour on Isaac ikasonai .
01024067	Isaac on Rebecca ibo sinai ayon Sarah an guwi ai sirui ato nan iawan sima . Isaac on Rebecca inuaboai ato on emon kubainunub ibo , on an rai ayon irabob gibunai .
01025001	Abraham jever tani ba iawan , on wabin min Keturah .
01025002	On jever nanatun sirarat wabis on Zimran , Jokshan , Medan , Midian , Ishbak a Shuah .
01025003	Sheba a Dedan rus tamas on Jokshan a Dedan wawan agirin on Asshur yangan , Letush yangan a Leumm yangan .
01025004	Midian nanatun on Ephah , Epher , Hanoch , Abida a Eldaah . Atonio osi engon on Keturah wawan agirin .
01025005	Abraham an buder engon on Isaac aurin ikirir ;
01025006	baise Abraham on nana yawasin imama an werai on siwar awawan ufuigeg nanatun sibitu on ites . Namon osi fifirig gigiawan on iyafares sinai au wera matan tafanam nan sitama mes , yabin Abraham on men igogoi osi fifirig on Isaac mat sitama .
01025007	Abraham iorokwar bag weie irarabob an kwanda on 175 .
01025008	
01025009	On nanatun Isaac a Ishmael , Machpelah agim doguai nan sigarob , Mamre bisinai au wera matan na , on min Ephron an motobai , Ephron min Zohar Hitt orot natun .
01025010	Motob ato Abraham Hitt yangan auris itotobon on , on nan Abraham a awan Sarah rus sigarobis .
01025011	Abraham irabob gibunai , God on Isaac imomoginai . Isaac on Dogu Sareu wabin BADA Yayawasin Yau Eiteu On An Dogu Sareu bisinai nan ima .
01025012	Atonio on Ishmael nanatun wawan agirin an dudur , Ishmael on Abraham natun , Sarah an agir jeverei Egypt emon wabin Hagar on ituai .
01025013	Ishmael nanatun mamaba sirat i nan , osi wabis on atonio : Nebaioth , Kedar , Adbeel Mibsam ,
01025014	Mishma , Dumah , Massa ,
01025015	Hadad , Tema , Jetur , Naphish a Kedemah .
01025016	Osi on dam auyotoat an yayatan ruam nanatun wawas agiris , ato osi wabis min asi goa mafam siwab seiris .
01025017	Ishmael an kwanda on 137 weie irabob .
01025018	Ishmael an dam warar on Havilah a Shur tafanam basunai nan sima , Egypt au wera matan na , eta au Assyria i nan on nan . Abraham nanatun wawan agirin fani on ma komasis fasisi on mes osi mabisi nan sima .
01025019	Atonio on Abraham natun Isaac an dudur .
01025020	Isaac an kwanda orot ruam an rai on Rebecca iawan , on min Bethuel natun jeverei a Laban robun , osi min Aram emon sinat Mesopotamia nan .
01025021	Rebecca on arin on mes Isaac on BADA aurin ibayoi awan Rebecca aurin fifi itituai mes . BADA on Isaac an bayoi iyafotai ato on awan Rebecca on inafot .
01025022	Fifirig orot sisiru on Rebecca yanai simama ato osi rus on sibi yerarat . On mes Rebecca iyau , “ Aibo mes atonio bobo on nanaba emamatar yau auriu ? ” On mes on inai BADA iti tetemai an baiyafot it boai mes .
01025023	BADA on aurin iyau , “ Tafanam ruam om yam amonai ; om arimon sabu ruam unitu , osi sin kuseb ato tani on arimon in faiwar kwakwan men tani ba . Ainau orot on arimon giya orot ini agirai . ”
01025024	Rebecca an wera inat itotoub on fifirig orot sisiru sirat .
01025025	Fifi orot ainau irarat on usin mururin , ato usin engon on bubunin youbin wat on sitau , on beber usinai i takwakwarai bait , on mes on wabin siyor Esau .
01025026	On gibunai fifi giya bairuin ba irarat on imanai Esau ann etun on aumiet bag ibokikin auman irat , on mes on siyor Jacob . Isaac on an kwanda orot wat ton , on an rai Rebecca on osi fifirig sisiru itu .
01025027	Fifirig sirat orot simatar , ato Esau on bo am an orot imatar ato on an gogoi on regai inabib , baise Jacob on orot rutanobin ato an gogoi on goai wat imama .
01025028	Isaac an nuabo on Esau , yabin Isaac an gogoi on rega masono Esau ibobo wain on i yam , baise Rebecca an nuabo on Jacob .
01025029	Ra tani Jacob bayu ibi tab ato Esau regai nan ibibib on bitanan igi kwakwan auman imatabir men inat .
01025030	Esau on Jacob aurin iyau , “ Yau bayu mes bag ararabob . Gariwat , om bayu a sosof mururin ato ebi tab on turin eiteu . ” ( On fasinai Esau wabin tani min siyor Edom . )
01025031	Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Om ainau on am abou an buder on yau uniteu , weie yau bayu anitem . ”
01025032	Esau iyau , “ Engon basit wat ! Yau on kafakakai mom anarab , ato abou an buder on arimon men aifan obin tani ini yamai yau auriu on . ”
01025033	On mes Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Basit , om ainau on yau auriu unifaro ato am abou an buder on uniteu . On mes Esau baifaro an aumatan Jacob aurin iyamai ato an abou an buder on ibo itai . ”
01025034	Namon Jacob sarar fani a sosof turin itai . Esau on bayu iyam itom isawar weie imisir inai . Esau atonio bobo nanaba ifour an itinai on abou an buder on aurin on asir yabin wagan wat .
01026001	Gomar tani on tafanamai imatar , men ainau Abraham an werai imamatar ba . On mes Isaac inai Gerar nan Philistia asi aiwab orot Abimelech aurin .
01026002	BADA on Isaac aurin irobotet ato iyawur iyau , “ Om men unan au Egypt mes , om nin tafanamai ema mamaba awurem on nanaba .
01026003	Om atonio tafanamai on kafakakai unama ato Yau arimon om bisimui anama ato ani momoginem . Yau arimon tafanam engon tutufin on om a nanatum wawam agirim aurim anitem . Yau aumatan tamam Abraham aurin abi yamai on arimon an bokikin .
01026004	Yau arimon ani yamai nanatum wawam agirim sinison ato siribod safamai sen ba a atonio tafanam engon mat anites . Om am fesi fasisi on sabu tafanam au engon arimon ani momogines .
01026005	Yau arimon ani momoginem yabin Abraham fonau ibo au baifafaro a au baifofor engon ikaifaren . ”
01026006	On mes Isaac on Gerar nan ima .
01026007	On an werai Gerar tafanam an orot Isaac sitetemai awan aurin . On iyawures iyau , “ On on yau robu . ” Men fofonin itau on awan , yabin on iber on tafanam matuanis arimon sitasubun ato Rebecca sit boai , yabin on jever on momogin fafa .
01026008	Isaac wera weromin nan ima , namon ra tani aiwab orot Abimelech an gigo emon isirir isur ato Isaac a Rebecca rus on sirorout sibi yayan on ites .
01026009	On mes Abimelech Isaac iyor inat aurin ato iyawur iyau , “ Ari weie asagob ato jever on om awam ! Om aibo mes uyau on om robum ? ” Isaac iyafotai iyau , “ Yabin yau ai nonot on ari atau nin on yau awau ato omi arimon wotasubunueu . ”
01026010	Abimelech iyau , “ Om aifan wei auri ufour ? Om am komasin emon on fofonin yau au orot tani on awam rus siten ato bit gagamin bag watabar . ”
01026011	Abimelech sabu engon auris isosoan iyau , “ Iyai iyafan atonio orot awan rus auris bobo komasis in fofour on arimon inarab . ”
01026012	Isaac on motobai fesi ibofefes ato on kwanda kaitamom amonai on bayu gagamin bag ikuwain men ato fesi itatanum ba , yabin BADA imomoginai on mes .
01026013	Isaac on sawarotin imatar ato an sawar on nana irat igai asir on inat sawar an aiwab orot imatar .
01026014	On an sheep , cow a an bobo orot jever on ison kwakwan on mes Philistia sabu sibi boboarai .
01026015	On fasinai osi Philistia yangan simisir dogu sareu ainau Isaac taman Abraham an bobo orot sisasar on engon sitounen men sigai .
01026016	Namon Abimelech Isaac iyawur iyau , “ Om wei ai tafanam on eikirir egat . Om ari unat orot faiwarim bag umatar men wei ba . ”
01026017	On mes Isaac igat inai Gerar roubabanai nan an guwi iyon ato nan ima .
01026018	Ainau bag Abraham an werai , on dogu sareu on sigaraba isaren ato on irabob gibunai , Philistia sabu motob sibo sitounen men igai . On mes Isaac an bobo orot mat on dogu sareu sisaren men . Isaac taman Abraham dogu sareu wabis ibites on wab kaitamom min Isaac ites men .
01026019	Isaac an bobo orot roubabanai nan dogu sareu sisar ato kibubur sareu sigaturai .
01026020	Gerar an sheep kaifarotis on Isaac an sheep kaifarotis mat sigam ato siyawures siyau , “ Atonio dogu sareu on wei noai . ” On mes Isaac dogu sareu on i wabai , “ Gamo . ”
01026021	Namon Isaac an bobo orot dogu sareu tani ba sisar , baise osi on mat aurin sigamo , on mes Isaac on i wabai , “ Gigit . ”
01026022	On efan ikirir inai mabinai nan ato dogu sareu tani ba sisar , on nan motob on an dura ambin . On mes i wabai , “ Rurufanin , ” ato iyau , “ Ari weie BADA atonio motobai efan itet a arimon an obin gagamin tan boai .
01026023	Isaac tafanam Gerar ikirir inai au Beersheba .
01026024	On fom BADA on Isaac aurin irobotet ato iyawur iyau , “ Yau om tamam Abraham an God . Om men unaber mes , Yau on om bisimui . Yau arimon ani momoginem a nanatum wawam agirim babaisonis anitem , yabin Yau au agir orot Abraham aurin aumatan . ”
01026025	Isaac sirifu agim kema nan iyon ato BADA ikwafirai . Namon an guwi nan iyon ato an bobo sabu dogu sareu sisar .
01026026	Abimelech an au baiyaten orot wabin Ahuzzath a bai gagam an bai netewar orot wabin Phicol mat on Gerar tafanam emon sinat Isaac sititai mes .
01026027	On mes Isaac itetemis iyau , “ Omi on ari aibo mes wonat woniteu mes ? Omi ainau on yau woi ragiteu ato woi teteriu ami tafanam ai kirir agat ? ”
01026028	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Ari weie wei wait bunag BADA on om bisimui , on mes wei wainonot wau on dura bag wat dura bo baibasit basuti tani yamai . Wei wagogoi unaumatan ,
01026029	on om wei auri men bobo komasis uni yamen , mamaba wei om aurim wai yamai tufai wai kirirem unai ba . Ari weie irubunag BADA on om imomoginem .
01026030	Namon Isaac osi auris forag ibotitiwag ato osi siyam sitom .
01026031	Ra itom fomenei , Isaac Abimelech rus aumatan siyamai ato sifaro bonen . Isaac iyau baitotoris ato tufai ikirires sinai .
01026032	On wera kaitamomai Isaac an bobo sabu dogu sareu sisasarai aurin on sinat ato siyawur siyau , “ Wei sareu wagaturai . ”
01026033	On mes Isaac dogu sareu i wabai , “ Shibah . ” Ato ari on mafam gagamin min wabin seyoyorai Beersheba — “ On an yabin min Bai faro an dogu sareu . ”
01026034	Esau an kwanda orot ruam weie Hitt jeverig ruam iawanis , Beeri natun jeverei Judith a Elon natun jeverei Basemath .
01026035	Baise Esau awawan ruam asi yawas sibi yamai on yababan gagamin sibo sinat Isaac a Rebecca rus auris .
01027001	Isaac ari on iorokwar ato matan sifot . On natun orot abou iyor inat ato iyawur iyau , “ Yau natu ! ” Esau iyafotai iyau , “ Men bab , yau nio . ”
01027002	Isaac iyau , “ Yau on ai orokwar ato men asagob meyan arimon anarab .
01027003	Om am fidu an iyo mat eboen ato egat enai regai masono tani unyoai ato un boai unnat weineu .
01027004	Yau au gogoi bayu momonin on nanaba eitab ato ebo enat auriu . Yau on bayu anam in sawar gibunai arimon au bai momogin kanfoun anitem weie anarab . ”
01027005	On an rai Isaac on Esau aurin dura ibi kakafun on Rebecca itatam . On mes on an werai Esau igat inai regai bib mes ,
01027006	Rebecca natun Jacob iyawur iyau , “ Yau ato arimon atatam tamam on Esau iyawur iyau ,
01027007	‘ Om masono tani ebo enat ato eitab weineu . Yau anam in sawar gibunai ato yau arimon BADA matanai au bai momogin anitem weie anarab . ’ ”
01027008	Rebecca an dura ibotein iyau , “ Ari weie natu , om fonau etatam ato aifan anau on nanaba uni yamai .
01027009	Om enai goat unis sigaraba setatawar amosi on goat bobous momos ruam eboen enat ani taben ato on emon tamam an gogoi bayu momonin an botitiwag .
01027010	Om un boai unan tamam unitai inam ato arimon an bai momogin initem weie inarab . ”
01027011	Baise Jacob ayon iyawur iyau , “ Om usagob Esau on bubunin youbin ato yau on usiu rumomoyin .
01027012	Tamau usiu in bototobon mes on ingatureu yau abi sigoai on , arimon yau tou an au dabiu ato arimon men bai momogin an boai on . ”
01027013	Fifi ayon iyafotai iyau , “ Yau natu , aifan audab on eikirir yau an boai , yau dura aifan au on bobo nanaba eiyamai , om enai goat ruam eboen enat auriu . ”
01027014	On mes on inai ato goat ruam on iboen inat ayon itai , ato Rebecca bayu momonis itaben ibotitiwagen mamaba Isaac an gogoi i yau nanaba .
01027015	Namon Rebecca on Esau usin an bai takwakwaren obis bag goai iya si yen on iboen Jacob itakwakwarai .
01027016	Rebecca goat korofis iboen Jacob imanai a anyonai menan usin rumomois on nan ibo babaren .
01027017	Namon on bayu momonis a rafi sarar teteren mat on natun Jacob itai .
01027018	Namon Jacob inai taman aurin ato iyau , “ Bab . ” Isaac iyafotai iyau , “ Men , yau natu , om iyafan . ”
01027019	Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Yau on natum ainau orot Esau . Om dura mamaba uyawureu on aiyamai . Karun , emisir emair ato bayu momonis abo titiwag abo anat on unam weie ato am bai momogin uniteu . ”
01027020	Isaac itetemai iyau , “ Yau natu , om mamaba gariwat bag ugaturai ? Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ BADA am God ibaisiu agaturai . ”
01027021	Isaac on Jacob iyawur iyau , “ Om auriu auriu enat usim an botobon an sagob . Om on dura bag Esau ai ambin ? ”
01027022	Jacob irui taman Isaac bisinai bag ato Isaac on natun usin ibotobon ato iyau , “ Om fonam on Jacob fonan , baise imam abotobon on Esau iman . ”
01027023	Isaac men irubunagai on Jacob , baise on iman on er bubunin tuan Esau iman ba . Isaac on an bai momogin ititai mes ,
01027024	baise itetemai men iyau , “ Om min dura bag yau natu Esau i ? ” Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Dura bag , yau on Esau . ”
01027025	Isaac iyau , “ Yau natu , au gogoi bayu momonis ubotitiwag on ebo enat anam , on gibunai weie au yau bai momogin anitem . ” Jacob bayu iboen inat ato itai iyam a sareu wine mat ibo inat itai itoman .
01027026	Namon on taman Isaac iyau , “ Yau natu , om auriu auriu enat ato eyaniu . ”
01027027	On mes on inat bisinai ato iyaan . On an werai Isaac on Esau an bai takwakwaren yanden itatam on imomoginai ato iyau , “ Aee , yau natu yanden on motob ato BADA imomoginai on yanden ba .
01027028	Yau God abi fefeyanai on safam an turub initem a tafanam an mour ungaturai . On sawareg a sareu wine bobous gagaminai initem .
01027029	Mat On ini yamai arimon sabu tafanam engon tutufinai on om sini agirem a sabu engon tutufin arimon om sin kakafem . Om arimon taitaim tutuam engon uni netewaris , a ayom nanatun wawan agirin arimon om sin kakafem . Osi sabu iyabon sau dabim on God arimon inau dabis a osi sabu iyabon sebi momoginem on God arimon arimon ini momomgines .
01027030	Isaac on Jacob imomoginai isawar ato Jacob on sasasan wat taman ikirir inai mom on , tuan Esau ba regai ibibib on imatabir inat igat .
01027031	On mat bayu momonis itaben ato iboen inai taman aurin . Ato iyau , “ Karun tamau , om emisir emair bayu momonis ato aurim abo titiwag abo anat on unam weie am bai momogin uniteu . ”
01027032	Isaac itetemai iyau , “ Om iyafan ? ” Esau iyafotai iyau , “ Yau om natum ainau orot , Esau . ”
01027033	Isaac on men sunub iror ato ibosuruf usin engon sibiror ato iyau , “ Ato nan on iyafan bobaitu iyasubun ibo inat auriu i ? Yau ato arimon aam isawar mom ato om unat . Yau au bai momogin kanfoun on engon tutufin on aitai , ato dura bag arimon on ini noanai au wantoan . ”
01027034	On an werai Esau taman an dura itatam mom on , fonan gagaminai iyoku itou fufuan ato ifefeyan iyau , “ Tamau , yau mat am bai momogin eiteu . ”
01027035	Isaac iyafotai iyau , “ Om taim inat isigoweu . Ato om am bai momogin on , on ibo .
01027036	Esau iyau , “ Atonio on wera bairuin ba yau isigoweu . Men taniyoi on , on mes wabin min Jacob . Yau au abou an buder on , on ibo ato ari on au bai momogin ba ibo . ” Namon Esau on taman itetemai iyau , “ Om men buder tani ubotan yau auriu i ? ”
01027037	Isaac iyafotai iyau , “ Yau on aiyamai inat om am bada mes imatar a mat dam warar on sinnat on an bobo sabu mes simatar , a sawareg a sareu wine boboun gagaminai aitai . Yau natu , men aifan tani yen arimon aurim ani yamai . ”
01027038	Esau on nana taman idodoai ibi fefeyanai i yau “ Tamau om am bai momogin min on wat i ? Yau mat eimomogineu . ” On ibosuruf itou .
01027039	Namon on taman Isaac iyafotai iyau , “ Om am ma on tafanam an mour emon mabimui unama uni bitanangi a safam an turub emon mat mabimui unama .
01027040	Om arimon baiyo bai gagamai nan bayu un gaturai unamair unama , ato taim uni agirai . Baise on an werai unbi fonaseir on , om arimon on an an baibad emon on toum un kusebim mabimui unama . ”
01027041	Esau tain Jacob aurin on gigit nana i yen yabin taman on Jacob imomoginai on mes . Esau inonot iyau , “ Tamau an rabob an ra on inat iufin nono ato tou yababan insawar gibunai on yau Jacob anasubun . ”
01027042	Baise on an werai Rebecca itatam Esau aifan iyau . On mes dura iyafar Jacob inat ato iyawur iyau , “ Untatam , om tuam Esau on ebi nonotai inasubunuem mes .
01027043	On mes natu , yau dura aifan au on nanaba unafour . Om ari bag unan tafanam Haran nan robu Laban aurin .
01027044	Ato om nan rum kafakakai wonama weie tuam an yatatab on insibu insur .
01027045	On an rai om tuam an yatatab insawar a ato bobo aifan aurin ubiyamai on mat ininosfotai weie , yau dura ani yafar ato un matabir men unnat . Yau men agogoi ra kaitamom amonai on nanatu ruam engon ani siwanim . ”
01027046	Namon Rebecca on Isaac iyawur iyau , “ Yau Hitt jever mat ma on abi suweigan . Ato Jacob ba awan on tafanam emon inbi awan mes on , yau arimon men anama on . ”
01028001	Isaac on Jacob iyor irui ato imomoginai weie bai sosoan dura iyawur iyau , “ Om men Canaan jever uni awan mes .
01028002	Ab om rouser unan Mesopotamia tafanamai nan wawam Bethuel aurin , nan on om ayom taman . Ato om on abum Laban natun jeverei tani un iawan .
01028003	Yau God Faiwarin Bag abi fefeyanai On arimon am tabin inimomoginai a nanatum babaisonis initem onai om unnat tafanamai on sabu engon tutufin tamas mes un matar .
01028004	Yau God abi fefeyanai ini momoginem nanatum wawam agirim mat ato Abraham ibi momoginai ba , ato motob touman mat om ini noanim ato menan emama on min God ibo Abraham itai .
01028005	Isaac on Jacob iyafarai inai Mesopotamia tafanam nan Laban aurin , on min Bethuel natun orot Aram emon . Laban on Rebecca robun orot ato Rebecca on Jacob a Esau rus ayos .
01028006	Esau isagob Isaac on Jacob imomoginai ato iyafarai inai Mesopotamia tafanamai nan jever in boai ini awan mes . Mat on eb isagob on an werai Isaac on Jacob ibi momoginai on dura wawaninai iyawur men Canaan jever ini awan mes .
01028007	Ato on eb isagob Jacob on ayon taman fonas ibo inai au Mesopotamia .
01028008	Esau ari weie isagob taman Isaac on Canaan jever on men ebi basites .
01028009	Esau min awawan mat ato on inai Abraham natun Ishmael aurin ato natun jeverei Mahalath on iawan , on min Nebaioth robun .
01028010	Jacob on Beersheba ikirir ato ibosuruf ibib inai au Haran tafanam .
01028011	Wera isofafir ato on inat efan kakafaiinai nan igat ato nan iten mes . On iyeinir unin agimai irubogai iten bubur mes .
01028012	On ibomomout on wewen it motob emon itaseb igai inai au safam , on nan anea sigegeg a sisusur .
01028013	Ato Jacob on BADA it nan sesebinai itatawar ato iyawur iyau , “ Yau on BADA , Abraham a Isaac rus asi God , Yau arimon atonio tafanam menan uyeinir yen on om a om nanatum wawam agirim mat anites .
01028014	Om nanatum wawam agirim on sini son ato tafanamai motob an fofou ba , ato osi arimon motob ato semama on sinkutuwe siniratai ingat bag inan au wera matan , au wera sifun , au tanam , au gorof ato om a nanatum wawam agirim fasimui on Yau tafanamai sabu engon tutufin on ani momogines .
01028015	Om unsagob on , Yau on arimon om bisimui anama ato an rufafarem menan menan un nanan nan , ato arimon an boem un matabir men unnat atonio tafanamai . Yau arimon nana bisimui anama ato bobo aifan au matanim on engon ani yamen . ”
01028016	Namon Jacob en bubur emon imisir an bomomout inonotai ato iyau , “ Dura bag ! BADA on nin , On on atonio efanai ato yau men asagob . ”
01028017	On iber ato iyau , “ Atonio on kakaf gogom an efan ! Nin on God an goa a safam an metewan awan . ”
01028018	Jacob on ra itom fomenei bag imisir , agim unin irubogai i yen on ibo ato matair mes irou . Namon olive an momon kerin tefanai idebur isur God Wabinai imutai .
01028019	On efan wabin iyor Bethel . ( On mafam gagamin min ainau wabin siyoyorai Luz . )
01028020	Namon Jacob baifaro dura iyamai BADA aurin ato iyau : Om yau bisiwui unmama a un rufafareu atonio au eta an bibib amonai a au bayu a usiu an bai takwakwaren uniteu ,
01028021	ato yau obinai wat an matabir men anan tamau an tafanam aurin on , Om on arimon yau au God mes unama .
01028022	Atonio matair agim arou on arimon God an kwafir goa mes , ato yau arimon sawar engon unbi biteu on yau matas auyotoat anaya ato on amonai matan kaitamom on om anitem men .
01029001	Jacob nana ibib inai ato inat sabu au wera matan tafanamai nan simama on auris igat .
01029002	On matan i yeit on dogu sareu it , ato sheep kuayo matas engon ton on nan siki bubuai si yen . Osi sheep min on dogu sareu emon sareu sitotoman , ato agim gagamin on dogu sareu awan siyayafotai .
01029003	On an rai sheep engon si nat sibi kaita weie sheep kaifarotis dogu awan emon agim sirurukou i gat ato sareu sibites sitotoman isasawar weie agim sirurukou irur men an efanai .
01029004	Jacob sheep kaifarotis itetemis iyau , “ Yau tuturau , omi on men emon ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei on Haran yangan . ”
01029005	On itetemis iyau , “ Omi Nahor wawan Laban min wosagobai i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Aee , wei wasagobai . ”
01029006	Jacob on itetemis iyau , “ On min basit emama i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ On basit emama , ato eit , on natun jeverei Rachel on ato an sheep mat sibib se nat . ”
01029007	Jacob iyau , “ Ari on aiyet ato wera men ibo on sheep un boes unar asi goai , om sareu eites setoman ato eboes ematabir men wayo sinam . ”
01029008	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei men fofonin nanaba wani yamai , ainau on sheep engon sinat nin sini kaita weie dogu awan emon agim wan rukou inan ato sheep sareu wanites sin toman . ”
01029009	Jacob on nana sheep kaifarotis auris ibi kakafun ato Rachel taman Laban an sheep mat sinat .
01029010	On an werai Jacob on Rachel a abun Laban an sheep mat ites on , on totor inai dogu sareu awan agim irukou ato sheep sareu ites sitoman .
01029011	Namon Jacob on Rachel ibo yayanin ato aumiet itou .
01029012	On iyawur iyau , “ Yau on om tamam an tara , Rebecca natun orot . ” Ato jeverei iyayai inai taman ikasonai .
01029013	On an werai Laban abun Jacob duran itatam , on iyayai inat inefotai , irous iboyayanin ato ibo inat goa amonai sirui . Jacob bobo aifan simamatar on engon abun Laban aurin idudur .
01029014	Laban iyau , “ Ai , dura bag , om on yau biou au tara turin . ” Ato Jacob nan roke kaitamom ima .
01029015	Laban imisir Jacob iyawur iyau , “ Om men yau au dam warar on mes bobo asir unabo on . Om ekasoneu am baiyan biyam egogoi unboai ? ”
01029016	Laban nanatun jeverig ruam ; ainau jeverei on wabin Leah , ato giya jeverei wabin on Rachel .
01029017	Leah on matan obis , ato baise Rachel on mamarag .
01029018	Jacob on Rachel inuaboai kwakwan , on mes iyau , “ Yau arimon kwanda nimtereban ruam aurim anabo ato an garamin on natum giya jeverei Rachel on uniteu ani awan . ”
01029019	Laban iyafotai iyau , “ Iyobin bag , yau om anitem uni awan ato men orot tani abi nonotai on , on mes nana bisiwui ema . ”
01029020	Jacob on kwanda nimtereban ruam bobo iboen onai Rachel it boai . Ato Jacob ibobo an nanianai on sitau on ra ton o bat nanaba iboen bait , yabin on Rachel inuaboai kwakwan on mes .
01029021	Namon Jacob on Laban iyawur iyau , “ Wera ato abobo on ai sawarai nono , om natum jeverei eiteu ani awan . ”
01029022	On mes Laban tabin an forag ibotitiwag ato sabu engon ibebegis sinat .
01029023	Baise on fom Laban on rouser Leah on ibo inai Jacob itai rus siyen .
01029024	Laban an agir jeverei Zilpah on natun Leah itai an bobo jeverei mes .
01029025	Ra itom fomenei weie Jacob it isagob on Leah ato Laban iyawur iyau , “ Om aibo mes on nanaba aurim ufour ? Yau Rachel aurin on aboen ato aibo mes uisigoweu ? ”
01029026	Laban iyau , “ Wei nin ai kik on men nanaba yen gigiawan ainau setatabin weie ainauan on gibui .
01029027	Om emousin atonio tabin forag tafaror kaitamom on insawar weie giya jeverei Rachel ba wanitem , on an garamin on kwanda nimtereban ruam ba auriu unabo . ”
01029028	Jacob ibasit ato tabin an forag yasisir tafaror kaitamom isawar gibunai Laban natun jeverei Rachel ba itai awan mes .
01029029	Laban an agir jeverei Bilhah on natun jeverei Rachel itai on an bobo jeverei mes .
01029030	Jacob on Rachel ba rus siyen a on inuaboai kwakwan bag men Leah ba . Namon Laban aurin kwanda nimtereban ruam ba iboen .
01029031	On an werai BADA it on Jacob an nuabo Leah aurin on kafakakai wat ato Rachel on ibi nuaboai kwakwan , on mes iyamai Leah on fofonin fifirig initu , baise Rachel on fifirig ambin .
01029032	Leah inafot ato natun orot irat . On iyau , “ BADA au yababan it ato ari weie yau awau arimon ini nuaboiu . ” On mes iwabai Reuben .
01029033	On inafot men ato natun orot tani ba irat . On iyau , “ BADA natu orot iteu men , yabin On itatam Jacob on yau men ebi nuaboiu . ” On mes iwabai Simeon .
01029034	On min on inafot men ato natun orot tani ba irat . On iyau , “ Ari weie awau arimon yau bisiwui wat , yabin nanatun orot ton aitu . ” On mes i wabai Levi .
01029035	Namon Leah inafot men ato natun orot tani ba irat . On iyau , “ Ari weie yau BADA ani fain ani duduranai . ” On mes iwabai Judah . Namon on fifirig baitu ibotan .
01030001	On an rai Rachel isagob on Jacob natun men tani ituai , on mes on tuan Leah on ibi natutumurai ato Jacob iyawur iyau , “ Fifirig uniteu ai yau anarab . ”
01030002	Jacob iyatatab Rachel aurin ato iyau , “ Yau men fofonin God an efan an boai . On Toun iyafotem men fifirig ebitu . ”
01030003	Namon Rachel iyau , “ Au bobo jeverei Bilhah on atonio ; om rum wonen ato on fifi inituai weineu , on nanaba on yau annat fifirig ayos an matar . ”
01030004	On mes Rachel an bobo jeverei Bilhah on awan Jacob itai ato rus siyen .
01030005	Ato Bilhah inafot ato Jacob natun orot ituai .
01030006	Namon Rachel iyau , “ God yau au gogoi fofonin on irubin , au bayoi itatam ato fifi orot iteu , ” on mes i wabai Dan .
01030007	Bilhah inafot men ato Jacob natun orot bairuin ba ituai .
01030008	Rachel iyau , “ Yau tuau Leah rui ai yawasai on wai yerarat inat , baise yau asowar . ” On mes i wabai Naphtali .
01030009	On an rai Leah toun isagobai on an toub iyastin on mes an bobo jeverei Zilpah on Jacob itai awan mes .
01030010	Namon Zilpah on Jacob natun orot ituai .
01030011	Leah iyau , “ Yau au obin agaturai , ” on mes i wabai Gad .
01030012	Zilpah on Jacob natun orot tani ba ituai .
01030013	Namon Leah iyau , “ Yau on men sunub abi yasisir ! Ari weie jever engon tutufin sin yoreu , Yasisir , ” on mes i wabai Asher .
01030014	Sawareg kuwain an werai Reuben regai irui ato jor an wengar igaturai ibo inat ayon Leah aurin . Rachel imisir Leah iyawur iyau , “ Karun , abi fefeyanim , natum an jor turin eiteu . ”
01030015	Leah iyafotai iyau , “ Awau ubo on men ifofonim i ? Ari on egogoi natu an jor turin ba un boai . ” Rachel iyawur iyau , “ Om natum an jor turin uniteu on arimon fom Jacob rum wonen . ”
01030016	On an werai Jacob rabirabi bobo emon imatabir inat , Leah igat inefotai ato iyawur iyau , “ Om ari fom on rut tanen , yabin min natu an jor ai on atobonim . ” On mes fom rus siyen .
01030017	God on Leah an bayoi iyafotai ato inafot ato Jacob natun bainimin ba ituai .
01030018	Leah iyau , “ God au baiyan iteu , yabin au agir jever awau aitai , ” on mes i wabai Issachar .
01030019	Leah inafot men ato Jacob natun orot nimtereban kaitamom ba ituai .
01030020	On iyau , “ God au siwar momogin iteu , ari weie awau in kakafeu , yabin nanatun orot wat nimtereban kaitamom aitu . ” On mes iwabai Zebulun .
01030021	Gibui bag on natun jeverei irat ato iwabai Dinah .
01030022	Namon God on ari weie Rachel inos an bayoi iyafotai , ato yan iki tabirai men fifirig initu .
01030023	On inafot ato natun orot ituai . On iyau , “ God natu orot ibiteu on au mamai engon iboseir .
01030024	Rachel fifi iwabai Joseph . On iyau , “ Yau ababayoi , BADA on arimon fifi tani ba initeu . ”
01030025	On an werai Joseph irat gibunai , Jacob imisir Laban iyawur iyau , “ Yau agogoi an matabir men anan au go au tafanamai .
01030026	Om awawau nanatu mat engon eiteu , yabin osi auris on yau om aurim aboen ato yau anan . Om usagob yau mamaba wawaninai bag ai agirem on . ”
01030027	Laban iyawur iyau , “ Om emon obin an gagaturai mes on , karun , abi fefeyanim , ema . Yau au itinai asagob on , om fasimui on BADA yau imomogineu . ”
01030028	Laban dura ibotein iyau , “ Ekasoneu ! om baiyan biyam egogoi ato yau ani baiyanim . ”
01030029	Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Om usagob yau au bobo obin bag ai yamai am sheep akaifares tiwag on mes om am sheep irat inai sison kwakwan bag .
01030030	Om ainau am bobaitu on ruamom mom u botan ato yau anat weie irat gagamin a ison kwakwan bag ato yau au bobo emon on BADA imomoginem . Baise ari on yau tou awau nanatu asi obin aurin anabo . ”
01030031	Laban itetemai iyau , “ Ato aifan ani baiyanim ? ” Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Yau men agogoi baiyan tani , om atonio dura unbi basitai on yau arimon nana am sheep an kaifares :
01030032	Yau ari on am sheep engon aneit an rubin sheep bobous fufufum a goat usis farem mat on an boseseiren . Osi on yau au baiyan .
01030033	Namon om ra gibui unanat mes on om sasasan wat uniten un sagob yau on ai dura bag ai ambin . On an werai ato sheep au baiyan mes aboen on uni nateteyen goat tani men faremin a fufufum a sheep tani men gugugurin un gagaturen on , om arimon un sagob yau on om bisimui emon abainauen . ”
01030034	Laban iyafotai iyau , “ Yau abi basitai , aifan uyau on nanaba tani yamai . ”
01030035	Baise on ra kaitamomai Laban goat tona usis gigirumis a faremis a toub engon usis fufufum a faremis engon iboseseren , sheep guguguris mat engon iboseseiren . On nanatun orot iyeinis sikaifares ,
01030036	Namon Laban atonio sheep mat iboes ato inai ra ton an bib an weromin fofonin nan . Baise Jacob on Laban an sheep fani on ikakaifares .
01030037	Jacob wengar ta ta fafames on iboen ato korofis sanan sanan iseseren a isukakairen ato wengar fous kakakaiis sigat .
01030038	Atonio wengar fafames on sheep menan sareu totom asi didiwag yen on nan nasi iya . On nan iya yabin bobaitu sareu toman mes se nat ato on nan sebi yayar .
01030039	Ato goat wengar fafames nanai sini yayar ato nanatus arimon usis faremis sinarat .
01030040	Jacob an sheep a an goat ikusebis mabis mabis iya weie magis engon Laban an sheep a goat gigirumis a fufufum auris na iya . On eta ai on toun an sheep a goat on sison ato mabisi ikaifaren ato Laban an sheep a goat on eb mabisi .
01030041	On an rai sheep usis obis wawanis sibi yayar , Jacob on wengar fames nasi iyaya ato sareu an didiwag efanai ato wengar fafames bisisi nan sibi yayar .
01030042	Baise on wengar fames on men sheep usis teinis samisamis nasi iyaya on . On mes Laban an sheep on usis teinis samisamis ato Jacob an sheep on usis obis wawanis wat .
01030043	On eta ai Jacob on inat sawarotin orot gagamin imatar , an bobaitu on irat bag , an agir orot , jever a an camel a donkey mat .
01031001	Jacob itatam on Laban nanatun si yau , “ Jacob on ot tamat an sawar ibi noanai on engon tutufin iboen . Ato ot tamat aifan ibi noanai on emon on sawar an aiwab orot imatar .
01031002	A mat Jacob it isagob on Laban an yawas aurin ifofour on men ainau ba .
01031003	Namon BADA on Jacob iyawur iyau , “ Om ematabir men enai tatamam a am dam warar asi tafanamai . Yau arimon om bisimui anama . ”
01031004	On mes Jacob dura iyafar Rachel a Leah rus auris sit nat menan an bobaitu ikakaifares on nan .
01031005	On iyawures iyau , “ Ari aitai on , omi tamam an yawas yau auriu on men ainau ifofour ba ; baise tamau an God on yau bisiwui emama .
01031006	Omi rum wosagob yau tamam aurin on au faiwar tutufinai aboen .
01031007	Baise on isigoeu au baiyan on wera auyotoat nanaba men fofon kaitamomai iteu on . Baise God on yau irufafareu .
01031008	On an werai Laban inau , ‘ Goat ato usis faremis on om am baiyan , ’ bobaitu engon sin totoub on faremis . Ato on an werai inau , ‘ Tisasamaris on om am baiyan , ’ bobaitu engon sin totoub on nanatus bobous on tisasamaris wat .
01031009	On mes God on tamam an bobaitu engon iyabaruai ato yau iteu .
01031010	Bobaitu si baiyayar an werai on yau abomomout goat tona usis tisasamaris , faremis a gigirumis on goat toub mat sibi yayar on aites .
01031011	God an anea bomomoutai iyawureu iyau , ‘ Jacob ! ’ Yau ai yafotai au , ‘ Men , yau nio . ’
01031012	Ato God an anea iyau , ‘ Eit ! goat tona usis tisasamaris , faremis a gigirumis on goat toub mat sebiyayar . Yau atonio bobo anafour in matar , yabin Laban abi abi engon aurim ibi yamen on aiten . ’
01031013	Yau God min on Bethel nan aurim arobotet , menan matair agim Yau auriu ukutetai ato rura momon kerin umutai ato auriu aumatan dura uiyamai . Om ari bag atonio tafanam eikirir ato un matabir men unan am rat baren tafanamai nan . ”
01031014	Namon Rachel a Leah rus Jacob siyafotai siyau , “ Wei tamai an buder on men tani yen wan boai on . ”
01031015	On wei e boei on nanawan jeverig ba . Om wei utobonei , ato men on wat on , baise on wei ai baiyan an agim on engon ireben isawar .
01031016	Sawar a agim an bai aiwab engon ato God wei tamai emon iyabaruai on wei noai a nanatui noas . On mes God mamaba iyawurem on eiyamai .
01031017	On mes Jacob ibotitiwag ato imisir awan ruam a nanatun iboes camel tefasi iyagagaiis .
01031018	Ato an bobaitu engon iboes ainau iyafares si nan a mat on an sawar engon tutufin ato tafanam Mesopotamia imama ibinoanai on engon iboen imatabir men taman Isaac an tafanam Canaan aurin .
01031019	On an werai Laban on inai an sheep bubunis it yaragen mes ato Rachel on ufutai taman an goai irui an bai yuyur god on ibo tawaseiren .
01031020	Jacob on Laban isigoai men ikasonai isagob on yai kirir .
01031021	On mes on an sawar engon tutufin iboen mat iyayai . On Euphrates sareu irabon weie on ibosuruf inai Gilead oyau oyau tafanam aurin .
01031022	Ra ton isawar gibunai weie sabu Laban sikasonai on Jacob iyayai .
01031023	Laban an dam warar orot iboes Jacob gibunai sifaitan sinai wera nimtereban ruam weie Gilead oyau oyau tafanamai nan sibotan .
01031024	On fom God bomomoutai Laban iyawur iyau , “ Om un kaifarai tiwag Jacob men dura ai unau beberuai mes . ”
01031025	Jacob an guwi on Gilead oyauai iyon imama . Ato Laban an dam warar mat sinat sibotanai ato osi on eb asi guwi on nan Gilead oyauai siyonen .
01031026	Ra itom weie rus osi sinofoten ato Laban imisir Jacob iyawur iyau , “ Om aibo mes usigoweu ato nanatu jeverig uboes uyayai , an itin on sitau ragitai sebi gagam sefafatumes sai ba ?
01031027	Om aibo mes usigoweu ato bubuniai uyayai kirireu ? Om yau ut kasoneu ato yau arimon dour tatafai , yasisirai a kwarerai nan ati yafarem utan .
01031028	Om men wera uteu ato wawau at boyayanis a nanatu jeverig atau baitotoris , om on ojis asi bobo on uiyamai .
01031029	Yau on faiwar yen fofonin ati komasim , baise on fom on tamam an God iyawureu men eta tani ai nan dura ai anau beberuem mes .
01031030	Yau asagob om am gogoi bag on un matabir men unan am tafanam aurin on mes ukirireu , baise aibo mes au bai yuyur god on ubo tawaseiren ? ”
01031031	Jacob on Laban iyafotai iyau , “ Yau aber , yabin yau ai nonot on om arimon nanatum wani ai nan utabarueu on mes .
01031032	Baise om nin iyafan un gaturai on om am bai yuyur god ibo tawaseiren , on min unasubun . Nin ati dam warar matasi , nan toum erunanag eiten aifan om noam on eboen . ” Jacob on men isagob Rachel on Laban an bai yuyur god ibo tawaseiren .
01031033	Laban irui Jacob an guwi ai inuen , weie inai Leah an guwi ai ba , a bobo jever ruam asi guwi ai ba , baise an bai yuyur god men igaturen . Namon on inai Rachel an guwi ai ba irui .
01031034	Rachel on goa asi bai yuyur god on iboen camel an sifumama amonai iwanen ato tefanai imair imama . Laban guwi amos engon irunanagen baise osi bai yuyur god men igaturen .
01031035	Rachel taman iyawur iyau , “ Au bada , auriu abi ebi yatatab , yau men fofonin namui an misir an tawar ; yabin yau ari on au roke abo amama . ” On mes Laban guwi amonai irunanag wat ato an bai yuyur god men igaturen .
01031036	On mes Jacob iyatatab kwakwan ato yatatabai nan Laban iyawur iyau , “ Yau abifan komasin wat aurim aiyamai i ? Abi sofafar astob on fasinai om faiwar ubo kouwui ufaitaniu unat nin ugat ?
01031037	Ari on au sawar engon tutufin urunanagen ato am goa sawar aifan wat ugaturai on om noam i ? Om nin basunai eyatet egat om am dam warar a yau au dam warar engon matasi sinitai , weie osi sinau iyafan on dura bag .
01031038	Yau om rut tamama ari on kwanda orot kaitamom isawar ato am sheep a am goat usis engon obis wat sitotoub sirarat , a mat yau men am bobaitu boboun tani aan on .
01031039	On an rai rega kuke tutuenis sheep tani siyasubun on , yau men a boai a nat abi yoboem on , baise yau tou sheep tani a boai abi garaminai . Ato om fom ai rai sheep tani kuke tutuenis siyasubun aurin on dura wawaninai u yawureu ato tani a boai anat abi garaminai .
01031040	Ra sigaraba wera forabin i tabiu a fom an nuba sibuin imotobiu , men fofonin aten bubur .
01031041	Ato kwanda orot kaitamom bisimui amama on atonio nanaba wat . Kwanda auyotoat an yayatan bat on nanatum jeverig ruam auris aboen , a kwanda nimtereban kaitamom on am bobaitu akaifares . Ato om nana au baiyan on wera auyotoat nanaba men fofon kaitamomai uiteu on .
01031042	Ato baise tatamau Abraham a Isaac asi God men yau bisiwui it mama mes on , om arimon erimau bag uti yafareu atan . Baise God au yababan a bobo aifan abi yamai on it , ato on fasinai On rarab fom dura wawaninai iyawurem on om bobo fetag ufour . ”
01031043	Laban on Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Atonio jeverig on yau nanatu , nanatus min yau nanatu a sawar engon tutufin ato eiten on yau noau a mat atonio bobaitu on yau au bobaitu . Baise men fofonin ari aifan ani yamai nanatu jeverig nanatus mat auris .
01031044	Om enat yau rut dura bo baibasit tani yamai , nin agim tanyon inag ato on tanitai on ati not inrurar on om yau rut dura tabi basitai on .
01031045	On mes Jacob agim gagamin kaitamom ibo tefanai irou matair mes .
01031046	On an dam warar orot iyawures agim siruayo ato siyadodog igai . Namon osi agim ato sibi yadodog on sesebinai simair bayu siyam .
01031047	Laban on agim-yadodog iyor Jegar-Sahadutha ato Jacob on iyor Galeed .
01031048	Laban imisir Jacob iyawur iyau , “ Atonio agim-yadodog on om yau rut ati not in rurar . ” On mes on efan wabin iyor Galeed .
01031049	Laban on eb iyau , “ Om yau rut on mabit mabit tanama , baise BADA on arimon inbi mateteit . ” On mes on efan wabin iyor Mizpah .
01031050	Laban dura ibotein iyau , “ Om nanatu jeverig men un kaifares tiwag ai jever tani unbi awan on men an sagob , baise un sagob on God on ebi mateteit . ”
01031051	Laban Jacob aurin mat iyau , “ Agim atonio yau aya dodog igai , om yau rut sanati a atonio on matair agim .
01031052	Atonio agim-yadodog a atonio matair agim on not e rurar . Yau on men ani giserai an rabon om an yowim an rabim mes a om eb men uni giseirai un rabon yau un yowiu un rabiu mes .
01031053	Abraham an God a Nahor an God , osi tatamas asi God arimon sanati ini gurubabanit . ” On mes Jacob taman Isaac an God ikwakwafirai on Wabinai ifaro .
01031054	Namon Jacob bobaitu tani iyasubun ato oyau tefanai sirifu ikutetai , an dam warar ibebegis sinat ato mat bayu siyam sitom isawar weie osi nan oyauai siyen .
01031055	Ra itom fomenei fomenei Laban imisir nanatun jeverig a wawan fifirig ibo yayanis a iyau baitotoris weie ikirires imatabir men inai an au go .
01032001	Jacob an dam warar mat asi etai sibib si nan men ato God an anea fani sinat sinefotai .
01032002	On an werai Jacob on anea ites mom on iyau , “ Nin on God an guwi efan , ” on mes on efan i wabai Mahanaim .
01032003	Jacob dura bo bibotis ainau iyafares sinai Edom tafanamai tuan Esau aurin .
01032004	On iyau baiyates iyau , “ Omi atoio dura nanaba au bada Esau wonawur : ‘ Am agirotin Jacob iyau , ’ ‘ Yau Laban rui weromin maiau wama inat ari weie amatabir men anat .
01032005	Yau on er au cow , donkey , sheep , goat a au agir jever a agir orot . Au bada , yau dura aurim abi yafar , onai om yau auriu on am ya obin ut boai . ”
01032006	On an werai dura bo bibotis sinat Jacob aurin ato siyawur siyau , “ Wei wanai tuam Esau aurin ato ari bag on igat e nat nono om in nefotim mes . On an orot on 400 iboes mat senat . ”
01032007	Jacob atonio dura itatam on iber kwakwan an not engon ifeu . On an sabu mat simama on ikusebis kuayo matas ruam simatar . On an sheep , goat , cow a camel on eb nanaba ikusebis ruam simatar .
01032008	On atonio nanaba inonot , “ Esau innat kuayo matan ainauin auris inbi ragit on , kuayo matan bairuin on sinayai sinan . ”
01032009	Namon Jacob ibayoi iyau , “ O yau wawau Abraham an God , a tamau Isaac an God . O BADA Om yau un tatamiu , Om uyawureu uyau , ‘ Yau an matabir men au tafanamai a au dam warar auris ato Om uyau mataniu arimon bobo obis uni yamen auriu .
01032010	Yau on agirotiu a yau men orot obiu , baise om am kaber a am moa obin auriu ebi yamai . Ainau bag yau Jordan sareu arabon on men aifan tani abo auman arabon on ab au tutuk wat on abo arabon ato ari amamatabir on au kuayo matas ruam mat a nat .
01032011	Yau aurim ababayoi tuau Esau iman emon uni yawasiu . Yau abeber , yabin on e nat on yau a jever fifi mat engon ini ragitei . ’
01032012	Baise om u yawureu uyau , ‘ Om arimon un kaifareu tiwag a arimon uni yamai wawau agiriu sini son tore an gasa ba ato men fofonin sini yab . ’ ”
01032013	Jacob fom kaitamom nan iyen gibunai on an bobaitu sanasi on tuan Esau an siwar irubinen .
01032014	goat toub on 200 , goat tona on orot kaitamom , sheep toub on 200 , sheep tona on orot kaitamom .
01032015	Camel toub nanatus auman on orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat , cow toub on orot ruam , cow tona on auyotoat , donkey toub on orot kaitamom a donkey tona on auyotoat .
01032016	On an bobo sabu on bobaitu matas ta ta nan iyeinis sin kaifaren , ato an bobo sabu iyawures iyau , “ Yau au nau wotawar ato wonitai bobaitu matas ta ta basusi on sanas sinen . ”
01032017	On an bobo orot ainau in tatawar on iyau baiyatai iyau , “ On an werai tuau Esau in nefotem ato ini tetemim inau , ‘ Om am bada iyafan ? Om aumen enan ? Atonio bobaitu engon namui on iyafan ebi noanai ? ’
01032018	Om uni yafotai unau , ‘ Om am bobo orot Jacob noan . Osi on siwar an bada Esau aurin ebi yafar . Jacob toun on gibui bag e nat . ’ ”
01032019	Jacob on dura kaitamom min iyabonai bobaitu kaifarotis bairuin , baitonin a matas ta ta engon iyawures : “ On an werai Esau won nefotai , omi on dura kaitamom on nanaba wonawur . ’
01032020	Omi won sagob wonau , ‘ Aee , am bobo orot Jacob on gibui e nat , ’ ” Jacob inonot , “ Siwar ato ainau ai yafar e nan onai arimon nunuan an boai , weie on an werai magin anitai on abi tutum on arimon ini notbureu .
01032021	Jacob an siwar on engon iyafaren sinai , ato on ekesin on fom an guwi ai iyen .
01032022	On fom kaitamom Jacob imisir awawan ruam , bobo jever ruam a nanatun auyotoat an yayatan kaitamom iboes ato Jabbok sareu menan tefa on nan sirabon .
01032023	On iyafares sirabon gibunai on an sawar engon mat iyafaren sirabon .
01032024	Ato Jacob on ekesin nan sikirir . Namon orot tani inat iforousai rus siyen sififirur mom inai ra iyabaseb .
01032025	On an werai orot it on men fofonin Jacob it bomerubai on mes On Jacob gesagesanai irab ikuseren .
01032026	Namon orot iyau , “ Ra etotom , om eikirireu Yau anai . ” Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Om bai momogin unitai weie yau ani kirirem unan . ”
01032027	Orot Jacob itetemai iyau , “ Om wabim mamaba ? ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Yau wabiu Jacob . ”
01032028	Namon orot iyau , “ Om wabim on men arimon sin yorem Jacob baise sin yorem Israel , yabin om God rum a orot fani mat woi yerarat ato tefasi ukayam . ”
01032029	Jacob iyau , “ Karun , abi fefeyanim , om wabim ekasoneu . ” Baise on iyafotai iyau , “ Om aibo mes egogoi wabiu un sagob ? ” Namon on Jacob imomoginai .
01032030	On mes Jacob on efan wabin iyor Peniel , on an yabin min yau God rui magi wai ruruai ato yau nana yawasiu amama .
01032031	Jacob Peniel ibi kirir auman auman wera igai , ato ibi sait auman , yabin on an fui ikuseiren .
01032032	On fasinai inat ari Israel yangan foro touyan an fui matan karukar on men sam on , yabin Jacob min on rarikai nan sirab .
01033001	Jacob on iyeit inai Esau an orot 400 mat si nat ites , on mes fifirig ikusebis Leah , Rachel a bobo jever ruam amosi .
01033002	Bobo jever ruam nanatus mat ainau iyeinis sitawar weie Leah nanatun mat osi gibusi sitawar ato Rachel Joseph rus on gibui bag sitawar .
01033003	Ato Jacob toun on ainau an dam warar nasi itawar inai . Namon on ra nimtereban ruam nanaba uson itur ikwafir isur magin motob iruyein mom inai tuan orot aurin igat .
01033004	Baise Esau iyayai Jacob inefotai ato iman anjonai ireben bonai irous iboyayanin ato rus sibotouousis .
01033005	Namon Esau iyeit jever a fifirig ites ato itetem , “ Atonio sabu on iyabon om mat wonat ? ” Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Osi on yau nanatu God an kaber emon yau am agirotiu iteu . ”
01033006	Namon bobo jever ruam nanatus mat sinat Esau nanai sindas siruouen usos situr sikwafirai .
01033007	Namon Leah nanatun mat sinat sindas sirouen usos situr sikwafirai ato gibui bag on Rachel natun Joseph rus sinat sindas sirouen usos situr sikwafirai .
01033008	Esau on Jacob itetemai iyau , “ Ato bobaitu mat ainau abi nofoten on an yabin aifan ? ” Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Au bada nan on om am ya obin aurin . ”
01033009	Baise Esau iyau , “ Yau taiu , yau au bobaitu on sigaraba , aifan noam on ebotan . ”
01033010	Jacob iyau , “ Ambin , om am ya obin ini dura bag mes on au siwar ei basitai ato ebo . Om magim aitai on God magin aitai ba , on emon om ari uboeu tiwag .
01033011	Karun , abi fefeyanim , fofonin atonio siwar om aurim aboen anat on ei basitai eboen ; God on yau ikabereu aifan au gogoi on engon iteu . ” Jacob nana i dodoai ato Esau ibasitai iboen .
01033012	Namon Esau iyau , “ Ot tan botitiwag ato tan misir tanan , yau arimon aninau anan . ”
01033013	Baise Jacob iyawur iyau , “ Au bada , om usagob fifirig on usis sisam a yau on sheep a bobaitu fani nanatus mat abi nonotis . Men fofonin ari ra kaitamom bai yagiginai nan tanan on , arimon bobaitu engon sinarab .
01033014	Karun , abi fefeyanim , om einau enai , ato yau arimon sunub sunub ani gibubunuem annat , fofoninai ana bib bobaitu a fifirig mat weie arimon Edom nan tani nefoten . ”
01033015	Esau iyau , “ Basit au orot fani on om bisimui ani kirires . ” Baise Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Au bada , aibo mes on nanaba ebi yamai , baise on on om am ya obin aurin . ”
01033016	On mes on rai Esau ibosuruf imatabir men inai au Edom .
01033017	Baise Jacob on au Sukkoth inai nan an goa iyon , a bobaitu asi guwi mat iyonen . On mes efan min wabin iyor Sukkoth .
01033018	On kounai Jacob Mesopotamia emon imatabir on obinai inat Shechem mafam gagamin Canaan tafanamai igat , ato on an guwi on motob ato mafam gagamin bisinai , on nan iyon .
01033019	On Hamor wawan agirin Shechem taman emon on motob turin agim silver orot wat nim , onai itobon .
01033020	On nan sirifu agim kema iyon ato iwabai El Elohe Israel asi God .
01034001	Ra tani Jacob a Leah rus natus jeverei wabin Dinah on inai Canaan jever it fasiues mes .
01034002	On an werai orot wabin Hamor on Hivi dam emon ato on min tafanam an aiwab orot imama . On natun orot wabin on Shechem on Dinah it igogoiai ato irous aurin bobo komasin ifour ikafotai .
01034003	Shechem on Dinah it on momogin fafa . On mes on nunuan tutufinai inuaboai a on ifourtobon dura obis wat on jeverei aurin ibi kakafun nunuan it boai mes .
01034004	On mes Shechem on taman Hamor iyawur iyau , “ Bab yau agogoi atonio jeverei Dinah un boai ato yau on ani awan . ”
01034005	On gibunai Jacob isagob Shechem on natun jeverei aurin bobo komasin ifour . Baise on nanatun orot engon sigat sinai asi bobaitu sikakaifares on mes Jacob on men dura aifan tani ikakafun ato imousin sit matabir sitnat au go weie dura iti kakafun .
01034006	Shechem taman Hamor on igat inai Jacob rus siti kakafun mes .
01034007	On werai Jacob nanatun bobo isawar simatabir men sinat on dura sitatam Shechem on osi robus Dinah aurin bobo komasin ifour ikafotai . Osi nunuas iyababan ato siyatatab kwakwan yabin Shechem ato Jacob natun jeverei aurin yawas komasin ifofour on Israel amonai on mamai gagamin ato on bobo nanaba on men it matar .
01034008	Baise Hamor on Jacob nanatun mat iyawures iyau , “ Yau natu orot Shechem on nunuan tutufinai Dinah egogoai , karun , abi fefeyanim , jeverei woitai ini awan .
01034009	Ot dura bo baibasit taniyamai ato wei on omi ami jeverei wani awanis ato omi on eb wei ai jeverig woni awanis .
01034010	Ato omi wei ai tafanamai mat tanamair tanama ato tafanam on ruruseren omi aurim nan wonama , wonabib a motob wonabo sini noanim . ”
01034011	Namon Shechem on Dinah taman a rorobun auris iyau , “ Omi ami ya obin on woiteu ato yau arimon aifan ami gogoi on ani yamai .
01034012	Omi jeverei woniteu ani awan on ato wonawureu aifan siwar wogogoi on anitem . Mat kekes an rat menan fofonin on wonawureu ; yau arimon an baiyan mamaba woyeyeinin on nanaba ani baiyan . ”
01034013	Ato Jacob nanatun on Hamor natun Shechem rus auris on men dura bagai siyafotes on . Osi sisosoufis yabin Shechem on osi robus Dinah aurin bobo komasin ifour ikafotai .
01034014	Osi siyawur siyau , “ Wei orot ato men siaskibubuai on men robui wanitai ini awan on . On arimon wei auri on mamai gagamin bag .
01034015	Wei eta kaitamomai wat nan baibasit wanitem . Omi ami orot engon woni askibubues wonnat wei ba won matar .
01034016	Namon wei arimon wani basitem wei omi ami jeverei wani awanis ato omi on eb wei ai jeverig woni awanis a mat omi amomui wanamair wanama ato mat dam kaitamom tan matar .
01034017	Baise dura ato askibubu aurin wau on men won bibasitai on , wei arimon jeverei wan boai wanan . ”
01034018	Hamor natun Shechem rus atonio dura sitatam on sibasitai .
01034019	Shechem on ra kaita inai ato siaskibubuai , yabin on Jacob natun jeverei on inuaboai kwakwan . Shechem min wabin on gagamin an dam warar amosi .
01034020	On mes Hamor natun Shechem rus sinai asi mafam gagamin an furi awanai nan on sabu engon auris sikakafun .
01034021	Osi siyawures siyau , “ Atonio osi orot on sabu obis tani kirires nin tafanamai mat tanama ato amonai sinama sini totobon . Tafanam on irat kwakwan fofonin osi mat auris . Ot osi nanatus jeverig tani awanis ato osi mat ot nanatut jeverig sini awanis .
01034022	Baise atonio bobo kaitamom aurin on tani basit on arimon atonio sabu mat engon kaitenei tanama . On min ot orot engon tutufin sini askibubuet tannat osi ba tan matar .
01034023	Ot ati baibasit wat on tanites ato asi bobaitu a asi sawar engon on ot sini noanit ato sanati sinamair sinama . ”
01034024	Sabu engon tutufin sinat Hamor natun Shechem rus asi dura sitatan on engon sibasit , ato orot engon on mafam gagamin amonai on siaskibubues .
01034025	Ra ton isawar gibunai , orot engon sibi askibubues on gawud auman simama , Jacob nanatun orot ruam , Simeon a Levi , osi min Dinah rorobun bag , asi seri siboen ato sinai mafam gagaminai sunub sirui sisafures mom ato orot engon siyasubunues .
01034026	Osi Hamor natun Shechem rus mat seriai siyasubunues . Namon osi Dinah Shechem an goa emon sibo ato sigat sinai .
01034027	On an rai Simeon a Levi sabu siyasubunues isawar gibunai , Jacob nanatun orot fani on engon sinat mafam gagamin amonai gugu engon siboen yabin robus Dinah aurin bobo komasin sibi yamai sikakafotai aurin on an soi sibo .
01034028	On mes osi ainauan gigiawan on ato mafam gagamin amonai a kounai nan sheep , cow a donkey nan simama on engon siboen .
01034029	Osi on sawar asi baiyas gagamis , jever fifi engon sifatumes , asi buder a asi goa amonai sawar si yen on engon siboen mat sinai .
01034030	Namon Jacob on Simeon a Levi rus iyawures iyau , “ Omi on bit gagamin bag on wobo wonat auriu yau wabiu woikomasai . Omi on bobo wobi yamai on Canaan sabu a Perizz sabu engon nin tafanamai semama on arimon yau sini sisiweiiu . Ot sabu men sigaraba on ato osi fofonin engon sini kaita sinnat sini ragiteu on , yau au dam warar mat fofonin engon sinasubunuet insawar .
01034031	Baise osi ainauan gigiawan on siyafotai siyau , “ Wei men fofonin robui wani kirir on nanaba aurin sinafour eta eta an jever ba . ”
01035001	Namon God on Jacob aurin iyau , “ Om egai au Bethel ato nan unama . Om sirifu agim kema Yau am God auriu unyon . Yau min on efanai nan aurim arobotet , on an rai tuam Esau u yai kirir nan . ”
01035002	On mes Jacob an dam warar , awawan , nanatun a sabu iyabon nan mat simama on iyawures iyau , “ Omi sabu touman asi god ta ta ato bisimui sen on won rebenen . Omi toum won yamuyarim ato beber gumidaris wonoten .
01035003	Namon ot tani wabunag ato tan misir tanag au Bethel , on nan yau arimon God aurin sirifu agim kema an yon . On God min yau au yababan an rai on i baisiu a menan menan a nan on yau bisiwui ima . ”
01035004	On mes osi sabu touman asi god ta ta a tainas buwor si yoten on engon tutufin Jacob sitai . Ato on Shechem nan wengar Dunar gagamin babanai isar i tounen .
01035005	On an werai Jacob nanatun mat sibosuruf sibib , God an beruber gagamin on ato mafam gagamis bisisi si yen on engon i taragabues , on mes osi mafam sabu on men fofonis gibusi sit faitanis sitan on .
01035006	Jacob an sabu engon mat sinat mafam Luz nan sigat , on min ari seyoyorai Bethel , Canaan tafanam amonai nan .
01035007	On sirifu agim kema iyon ato efan wabin iyor , “ Bethel an God ” , yabin on an werai Jacob on tuan orot i yayai kirir i nan ato God Toun on nan aurin irobotet .
01035008	Rebecca an fio jever Deborah on nan irabob ato wengar Dunar gagamin babanai sigarob , Bethel bisinai . On mes wabin siyor , ‘ Tou an Dunar ’ .
01035009	On an werai Jacob Mesopotamia emon imatabir i nat men , ato God on nan aurin iroboet men ato imomoginai .
01035010	God iyawur iyau , “ Om wabim on Jacob ato men gibui sin yorem men Jacob , ab om wabim on sin yorai Israel . ” Om mes God i wabai Israel .
01035011	Ato God iyawur iyau , “ Yau on God Faiwariu Bag ! Om fifirig sigaraba unitu ato tafanamai sabu on arimon inison kwakwan , ato om nanatum wawam agirim fani on arimon aiwab sin matar .
01035012	Yau tafanam ato Abraham a Isaac abites on arimon anitem , ato on motob min nanatum wawam agirim mat anites . ”
01035013	Namon God on efan menan Jacob aurin ibi kakafun on ikirir ato igai .
01035014	On nan Jacob matair agim menan God aurin ibi kakafun nan irou ato sareu wine a rura momon an kerin on tefanai ideburen ikutetai God aurin .
01035015	On mes Jacob on efan iyor Bethel menan God on aurin ibi kakafun nan .
01035016	Namon Jacob an dam warar mat Bethel sikirir sinai . On an werai osi sinat Ephrath mafam aurin sibi ufin ato Rachel on fifi itarat aurin on koun igigiai ato usi baban gagamin i boai .
01035017	On usi baban gagamin bag i boai an werai , on an bai totoubis jever iyawur iyau , “ Rachel , om men unaber mes , om fifi orot tani ba uni tuai . ”
01035018	Baise Rachel on irarabob , ato an aratein kanfoun ibi sawarai on fifi i wabai Ben-Oni . Baise taman on i wabai Benjamin .
01035019	Ato Rachel irabob ato Ephrath eta rewanai nan sigarobai , on min Bethlehem .
01035020	Jacob matair agim nan Rachel an budi tefanai irou , ato ari ra agim min nan nana yen .
01035021	Jacob i nanawan inai Midgal Eder ikirir inai rebanai nan an guwi iyon . ( Midgal Eder an yabin min kaifarotin bobaitu ekakaifares an goa ann weromin . )
01035022	Jacob on nana on tafanamai imama ato natun Reuben on inai taman awan ufuigeg jever wabin Bilhah on rus siyen ; Jacob on dura itatam on i yatatab kwakwan . Jacob nanatun orot wat engon auyotoat an yayatan ruam .
01035023	Leah nanatun orot , osi wabis min Reuben , ( Jacob natun ainau orot ) , Simeon , Levi , Judah , Issachar a Zebulun .
01035024	Rachel nanatun orot , osi wabis min Joseph a Benjamin .
01035025	Rachel an bobo jever Bilhah nanatun orot , osi wabis min Dan a Naphtali .
01035026	Leah an bobo jever Zilpah nanatun orot , osi wabis min Gad a Asher . Atonio osi fifirig orot engon on Jacob nanatun ato osi Mesopotamia nan sirat .
01035027	Jacob inat au go taman Isaac aurin Mamre mafamai nan , Hebron bisinai menan Abraham a Isaac rus simama nan .
01035028	Isaac ima an kwanda 180
01035029	ato on iorokwar bag weie irabob , ato nanatun Esau a Jacob rus sigarobai .
01036001	Atonio osi on Esau nanatun wawan agirin , on min wabin tani seyoyorai Edom .
01036002	Esau on Canaan jever iawanis . Jever ainaiun wabin on Adah , on min Hitt orot wabin Elon on natun jeverei . Jever bairuin wabin on Oholibamah , on min Anah natun jeverei ato on Zibeon Hivi orot on wawan jeverei .
01036003	ato jever baitonin wabin on Basemath , on min Ishmael natun jeverei a Nebaioth robun .
01036004	Ato Adah natun orot Eliphas ituai ; Basemath natun orot Reuel ituai
01036005	ato Oholibamah on nanatun orot Jeush , Jalam a Korah itues . Osi fifirig orot engon on Esau nanatun Canaan nan sirat .
01036006	Namon Esau awawan , nanatun orot , nanatun jeverig a dam warar engon , an bobaitu a sawar gugu ato Canaan tafanamai imama ibinoanai on engon iboen ato tain Jacob ikirir igat inai tafanam taniai nan ima .
01036007	Esau tain Jacob ikirir inai yabin osi rus asi sawar gugu on irat kwakwan bag a asi bobaitu on sison kwakwan , on mes men fofonin rus efan kaitamomai sitama on .
01036008	On mes Esau on oyau tafanam wabin Seir , on nan ima . Esau wabin tani min seyoyorai Edom .
01036009	Atonio on Esau nanatun wawan agirin asi dudur . Osi min Edom yangan nan oyau Seir nan simama .
01036010	Esau nanatun orot wabis on : Eliphaz , Esau awan Adah on ituai a Reuel on Esau awan Basemath on ituai .
01036011	Eliphaz nanatun orot , osi wabis on Teman , Omar , Zepho , Gatam a Kenaz .
01036012	Esau natun Eliphaz mat awan tani wabin Timna , on natun Amalek . Atonio fifi orot on Esau awan Adah , on wawan .
01036013	Reuel nanatun orot , osi wabis on Nahath , Zerah , Shammah a Mizzah . Atonio fifirig orot on Esau awan Basemath on wawan .
01036014	Esau awan Oholibamah on nanatun engon ton itu : Osi min Jeush , Jalem a Korah . Oholibamah min Anah natun jeverei a Zibeon wawan jeverei .
01036015	Atonio on dam ta ta Esau emon . On natun ainau orot wabin Eliphaz on nanatun wabis on : Teman , Omar , Zepho , Kezaz , Korah , Gatam a Amalek , osi engon on Esau awan Adah on wawan orot .
01036016	
01036017	Esau natun Reuel on nanatun , osi amosi on dam ta ta on ato nanaba : Nahath , Zerah , Shammah a Mizzah . Osi min Esau awan Basemath on wawan orot .
01036018	Atonio osi dam ta ta on Esau awan Oholibamah , Anah natun jeverei nanatun orot , osi wabis min Jeush , Jalam a Korah .
01036019	Atonio dam ta ta on Esau , on min Edom on nanatun wawan agirin .
01036020	Atonio on Seir nanatun orot osi min Hor yangan , ainau Edom nan simama , osi wabis min Lotan , Shobal , Zibeon a Anah ,
01036021	Dishon , Ezer a Disham , osi min Seir nanatun , Hor dam unis Edom nan simama .
01036022	Lotan nanatun orot , osi wabis min Hori a Homam ato Lotan robun on Timna .
01036023	Atonio on Shobal nanatun orot , osi wabis min Alvan , Menahath , Ebal , Shepho a Onam .
01036024	Zibeon nanatun orot , osi wabis min Aiah a Anah . Atonio Anah min on efan koiteterinai nan taman an donkey ikakaifares ato kibubur sareu forabin igaturai .
01036025	Anah nanatun , osi wabis min Dishon a Oholibamah , on min Anah natun jeverei .
01036026	Dishon nanatun orot , osi wabis min Hemdan , Eshban , Ithran a Cheran .
01036027	Atonio osi on Ezer nanatun orot , osi wabis min Bilhan , Zaavan a Akan .
01036028	Atonio on Dishan nanatun orot , osi wabis min Uz a Aran .
01036029	Atonio on Hor sabu asi dam unis Seir tafanamai simama , osi wabis min Lotan , Shobal , Zibeon , Anah , Dishon , Ezer a Dishan .
01036030	
01036031	Atonio on aiwabis ainau Edom tafanamai sibi aiwab weie Israel aiwab imatar .
01036032	Boar natun Bela on Edom tafanamai ibi aiwab , an mafam gagamin wabin Dinhabah .
01036033	Bela irabob gibunai Zerah natun Jobab , Bozrah emon on Bela an efan ibo iaiwab .
01036034	Jobab irabob gibunai , Husham , Teman tafanam emon on an efan ibo i aiwab .
01036035	Husham irabob gibunai Bedad natun Hadad on an efan ibo i aiwab . Hadad inai Moab tafanamai nan Midian sabu mat sibi gagam ato Hadad i sowar ibo merubes . Hadad an mafam gagamin wabin min Avith .
01036036	Hadad irabob gibunai Samlah , Masrekah emon on an efan ibo i aiwab .
01036037	Samlah irabob gibunai Shaul , Rehoboth emon Euphrates sareu bisinai on an efan ibo i aiwab .
01036038	Shaul irabob gibunai Achbor natun Baal-hanan on an efan ibo i aiwab .
01036039	Achbor natun Baal-hanan irabob gibunai Hadar on an efan ibo i aiwab . An mafam gagamin wabin Pau ato awan wabin Mehetabel , Matred natun jeverei a Me-zahab wawan jeverei .
01036040	Atonio osi on Edom yangan asi dam unis wabis : Timna , Alvah , Jetheth , Oholibamah , Elah , Pinon , Kenaz , Teman , Mibzar , Magdiel a Iram . Osi dam kakaita kakaita on mafam mabis mabis on tafanamai nan simair sima , ato osi dam unis wabis on mafam siwabis . On min Esau Edom yangan wawas agiris .
01036041	
01036042	
01036043	
01037001	Jacob nana Canaan tafanamai ima , menan taman imama nan ,
01037002	ato atonio on Jacob an dam warar asi dudur . Joseph on jorei boboun an kwanda auyotoat an yayatan nimtereban ruam on taitain tutuan mat sheep a goat si kakaifares . Osi fifirig min taman awawan ufuigeg ruam , Bilhah a Zilpah nanatus . Ato taitain tutuan aifan bobo komasis sibi yamen on i nat tamas ikakasonai .
01037003	Jacob wabin tani min Israel , on Joseph inuaboai kwakwan bag men nanatun fani ba , yabin on iorokwar bag weie Joseph irat . On Joseph an bai takwakwaren obin weromin a imas mat weromis iyamai wein .
01037004	On an werai taitain tutuan sit on osi tamas on Joseph inuaboai kwakwan men osi ba , on mes tais tuas sisusuneai kwakwan ato men moa obinai aurin sibi kakafun .
01037005	Fom tani Joseph ibomomout ato taitain tutuan on bomomout ikakasones on , osi aumiet bag sisusuneai .
01037006	Joseph on iyawures iyau , “ Eii ! Omi au bomomout anau wontatam .
01037007	Ot engon masauai sawareg tagegedauen ato ra kaita yau au kafurir on imisir totor itawar . Ato omi ami kafurir on yau au kafurir siki bubuai ato aurin usos situr sisur . ”
01037008	Baise Joseph taitain tutuan on dura sitatam ato siyawur siyau , “ Om enonosin om aiwab orot unmatar ato wei auri uni bad i ? ” On mes osi nana aumiet bag sibi susuneai yabin on an bomomout a an dura aifan osi auris ibi kakafun on fasinai .
01037009	Namon Joseph bomomout tani ba it ato taitain tutuan ikasones iyau , “ Yau bomomout tani ba ait , on nan ait on wera , roke a siribod auyotoat an yayatan kaitamom on yau auriu usos situtur . ”
01037010	Joseph an bomomout mat on taman iyawur , ato taman imisir igam iyawur iyau , “ On bomomout on aifan ? Om enonosin on ayom , taitaim tutuam a yau on wannat om aurim usoi wantur i ? ”
01037011	Joseph taitain tutuan on sibi boboarai baise taman on bomomout aurin on nana ibi nonotai .
01037012	Ra kaitamom Joseph taitain tutuan sinai Shechem nan tamas an bobaitu sit kaifares mes .
01037013	Jacob on Joseph iyawur iyau , “ Yau agogoi unan au Shechem , menan taitaim tutuam bobaitu sekakaifares nan . ” Joseph iyafotai iyau , “ Basit tamau , yau anan . ”
01037014	Jacob on natun iyawur iyau , “ Om enai unites , taitaim tutuam a bobaitu mat engon basit wat ai ambin , ato un matabir un kasoneu . ” On mes on taman Hebron roubaban emon iyafarai inai Shechem igat ,
01037015	ato on efanai taitain tutuan inunuenis , ato orot tani Joseph aurin igat ato itetemai iyau , “ Om abifan enunuen ? ”
01037016	On iyafotai iyau , “ Yau taitaiu tutuau anunuenis , osi nin asi bobaitu si kakaifares , fofonin ut kasoneu osi on menan ? ”
01037017	Orot iyawur iyau , “ Osi sinai nono , atatamis siyau on au Dothan senan . ” On mes Joseph taitain tutuan gibusi inai Dothan nan igatures .
01037018	Joseph taitain tutuan on nanenei nan sit i nat , ato weie on auris it nat iti ufin , osi siyanu sitasubun mes .
01037019	Osi tous sanasi siyau bonen , “ Woit ! Bomomout otin atonio e nat .
01037020	Omi ne wonat , ari weie tanasubun ato dogu sareu simamutinis sen on tani amonai tan ribirirai insur ; namon ot tanau on rega an bobaitu tutuenis siyan . Ato tanitai on an bomomout emon arimon aifan in matar . ”
01037021	Reuben on taitain asi dura itatamis ato ifourtobon Joseph iti yawasai mes . On iyau , “ Ot men tanasubun mes .
01037022	Ot asir efan koiteterinai atonio dogu sareu rar raninai tan ribirirai insur ato men usi baban tanitai . ” On dura nanaba iyawures yabin on inonot taitain tutuan emon on iti yawasai ato iti yafarai men it matabir taman aurin .
01037023	On an werai Joseph inat taitain tutuan auris igat mom , osi an bai takwakwaren weromin imas weromis mat on sisafef si boseir .
01037024	Namon osi Joseph sibo ato dogu sareu rar ranin amonai siribirirai isur .
01037025	Namon osi simair bayu sitam mes ato matas si yeit on Ishmael yangan Gilead emon si nan au Egypt on sites . Osi asi camel tefasi on asi fio yandes ninibis asi baiyas gagamis ta ta on siyagagaien siboen si nat .
01037026	Judah taitain tutuan auris iyau , “ Ot tait tanasubun tani buniai weie on amon emon min arimon aifan wat tan boai ? ”
01037027	Ot on Ishmael yangan auris tan tobonai . On nanaba tani yamai on men arimon fifi usin taniruyein on . Yabin fifi on ot tait tuat a ot ati tara biot turin . ” On taitain tutuan engon si basit .
01037028	On an werai Midian bai totobonotis sinat sigat , Joseph taitain tutuan on Joseph dogu emon siti bogai igai , ato Ishmael yangan auris agim silver orot kaitamomai sitobonai ato sibo sinai au Egypt .
01037029	On gibunai Reuben imatabir men inat dogu sareuai ato it on Joseph nan ambin ato on iyababan kwakwan an beber isafef .
01037030	On taitain auris imatabir inai ato iyau , “ Fifi on nan ambin ! Yau arimon abifan ani yamai ? ”
01037031	Namon osi goat tani siyasubun ato Joseph an bai takwakwaren sibo tara ai sitamumun .
01037032	Osi an bai takwakwaren sibo simatabir men sinat tamas aurin ato siyawur siyau , “ Wei atonio bai takwakwaren on nan i yen wagaturai . Om eit tait , atonio bai takwakwaren min om natum noan i ? ”
