01037033	Jacob on natun an bai takwakwaren it tiwag isagob ato iyau , “ Dura bag ! Nin on yau natu Joseph an bai takwakwaren . Rega an kuke tutuenis fani siyasubun . Yau natu Joseph on sisafefai gugud imatar ato siyan . ”
01037034	Jacob iyabbaban ato beber gadur iyoten ato natun aurin ra weromin itou iroro .
01037035	On nanatun fifirig jeverig sinat sit kubainunubai mes , baise on men igogoi sit kubainunubai ato iyau , “ Yau nana natu an roro auman an mama anarab . On mes on natun Joseph aurin on nana itou roro auman ima .
01037036	On werai Egypt nan on eb Midian yangan Joseph Potiphar aurin sitobonai . Potiphar min Egypt aiwab orot an goa kaifarotin gagamin a on toum min kaifarotis asi bai netewar orot gagamin .
01038001	Wera fani sisawar gibunai Judah taitain tutuan ikirires ato inai orot wabin Hirah on rus sitama mes , on min Adullam mafam emon .
01038002	On nan Judah on Canaan orot wabin Shua natun jeverei igaturai . On iawan ato rus siyen ;
01038003	on jeverei inafot ato natun orot ituai wabin iyor Er .
01038004	Gibui on inafot men ato natun orot ituai wabin iyor Onan .
01038005	On min on fifi orot tani ba ituai wabin iyor Shelah . Ato Judah min Achzib nan imama nan fifi orot irat .
01038006	Judah on natun ainau orot wabin Er on awan irubin . On jeverei min wabin Tamar .
01038007	Baise Judah natun ainau orot Er on bobo komasis BADA matanai ifofour ; on mes BADA on Er iyasubun irabob .
01038008	Namon Judah on Er tain orot Onan iyawur iyau , “ Om enai tuam rabobin an kena rum wonen . Ot ati baifafaro iyau nanaba on tuam nanatun ambin inarab inan on tain giya orot on jever iniawan ato fifirig sinarat on tuan orot rabobin nanatun mes . ”
01038009	Baise Onan isagob fifirig sin rarat on men arimon on nanatun on . On fasinai on tuan kena rus si yen on , an sareu motobai idedebur isusur onai on men fifi tani itarat tuan orot aurin on .
01038010	Onan bobo aifan ibi yamai on komasin BADA matanai , on mes BADA on Onan mat iyasubun irabob .
01038011	Namon Judah rawan jever Tamar iyawur iyau , “ Om un matabir men unan tamam an goai nana kena un mama ato yau natu orot Shelah inarat gagamin in matar . ” On nanaba iyau yabin on iber , ari Shelah ba inarab ato tutuan sirarabob ba . On mes Tamar imatabir men inai taman an goai imama .
01038012	Kwanda fani sisawar gibunai Judah awan , Shua natun jeverei on irabob . Judah on an roro wera isawar gibunai , on turan Hirah on min Adullam emon on rus sinai efan Timnah nan sabu on an sheep bubunis siyayaragen on itites mes .
01038013	Sabu fani Tamar siyawur on rawan orot Judah on enan au efan Timnah nan an sheep bubunis in yaragen mes .
01038014	Tamar on isagob nono Judah natun giyamomos Shelah on irat orot imatar ato men sitai iawan on . On mes on kena an bai takwakwaren usinai si yen on iboseseren ato beber ibo magin ikukum toun ibuniai . Ato on inai Enaim mafam an eta awanai nan imair imama . On eta kaitamom min on inai Timnah mafamai igat .
01038015	On an rai Judah ibib inat it on men isagob on yabin on magin ikukum on mes . On inos on eta eta an jever .
01038016	On aurin Judah irabon inai eta rebanai ato iyau , “ Yau agogoi rut tanen . ” Judah on men isagob on rawan jever . Tamar iyau , “ Om rut tanen aurin on aifan wat arimon uniteu ? ”
01038017	On iyafotai iyau , “ Yau au goat boboun etatar on aurim ani yafar . ” Ato jever iyau , “ Basit wat , ato om sawar tani uniteu on aumatan ba bisiwui an kakaifarai weie gibui goat uni yafar . ”
01038018	Judah itetemai iyau , “ Ato aifan egogoi anitem on aumatan ba bisimui i nen ? ” Jever iyafotai iyau , “ Om anjomui damud er wabim auman on a am tutuk on un iteu . ” On mes Judah sawar iboen jever itai . Namon on rus siyen ato jever inafot .
01038019	Tamar inai au go , on magin beber iboseir ato an kena bai takwakwaren on iyoten men .
01038020	On gibunai Judah on turan Hirah iyafarai goat boboun ibo inai jever ititai ato an garamin aumatan sawar ato bisinai si yen on itabo mes . Baise on jever men igaturai on .
01038021	Hirah on Enaim an orot fani nan on itetemis iyau , “ Eta eta an jever nin eta rewanai imama on menan ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Nin men eta eta an jever tani emama on . ”
01038022	On mes Hirah imatabir men inai Judah aurin ato iyau , “ Yau eta eta an jever men agaturai on . Ato orot on mafam emon on eb siyau , ‘ Nin men eta eta an jever tani emama on . ’ ”
01038023	Namon Judah iyau , “ Na eikirir , sawar aifan bisinai sen on bagun on ini noanai . Ot men tagogoi sabu sini koboit sin sererit . Yau afourtobon ati baiyanai , baise om jever men ugaturai on . ”
01038024	Roke ton isawar gibunai , sabu fani on Judah siyawur siyau , “ Om rawam jever Tamar on eta eta an jever ba fetag fetag orot mat si yen simimisir ato ari on inafot . ” Judah dura wawaninai iyau , “ Omi wobo wogat ato wairafai woter inaras inarab . ”
01038025	Osi Tamar sibo si gat ato dura iyafar rawan orot aurin iyau , “ Yau on orot iyafan atonio osi sawar ebi noanai on emon on ai nafot . Omi woi nateteyen tait , iyafan an sawar , damud wab auman a tutuk . ”
01038026	Judah sawar iten isagob ato iyau , “ On on bobo obin iyamai , yabin yau dura aifan au on men aiyamai , natu orot Shelah men aitai iawan , ato Judah men gibui rus siyen .
01038027	On an wera inat Tamar i tatoub mes on osi sigaturai on arimon fifirig orot sisiru sinarat .
01038028	On koun igigiyai usi baban gagamin i boai an werai on fifi tani iman ainau iyotet igat ato bai totoubis an jever on fifi iman ibo uram mururinai iyous ato iyau , “ Atonio on ainau irat . ”
01038029	Baise on iman itein irui men ato tain giya orot on i nau irat , on mes bai totoubis an jever iyau , “ Om ato nanaba toum am eta uwawar ugat ! ” ato on iwabai Perez .
01038030	Gibui on tuan imanai uram mururin auman irat ato i wabai Zerah .
01039001	Ishmael yangan Joseph sibo sisur sinai Egypt nan ato Potiphar itobon inat an bobo orot mes imatar . Potiphar min Egypt aiwab orot an goa amonai an bobo an orot gagamin a on toun min aiwab orot an goa kaifarotis asi bai netewar orot .
01039002	BADA on Joseph bisinai imama on mes iyamai an bobo on engon obis totoris wat ifofour . On an bada Egypt orot an goai imama ,
01039003	ato Potiphar it isagob BADA on Joseph bisinai imama on mes an bobo aifan ibi yamen on engon tutufin obis wat .
01039004	Potiphar on Joseph aurin iyasisir kwakwan bag , on mes iyamai inat an bobo orot mes imatar . On Joseph baibad itai bobo orot engon Potiphar an goa amonai sibobo on asi orot gagamin imatar a an sawar engon on Joseph imanai iyagai .
01039005	On an werai nan Joseph fasinai on BADA Egypt orot an goa amonai sawar engon tutufin on ibi noanai a an masau mat engon imomoginen .
01039006	On mes Potiphar on Joseph itutumai ato an sawar engon on ibi noanai on iyabonai Joseph an baibad babanai on ikakaifaren ato on men aifain tani ibi nonotai on . Baise on toun on bayu mamaba inam inatom an eta wat on ikakaifarai . Joseph an itin on obin a ann iman irou irat .
01039007	Ato wera men weromin gibunai , on an bada awan jever ibosuruf Joseph i gogoi ai ato iyawur rus siten mes .
01039008	Baise Joseph men igogoi ato an bada awan jever iyawur iyau , “ Etei . Om un sagob on yau au bada orot itutumeu go amonai sawar engon tutufin yau au baibad babanai iyein akakaifaren , on mes goa amon an bobo on men tani ebi nonotai on , yabin yau on nin .
01039009	Yau au baibad atonio goa amonai on , on rui fofon , mat on men aifan sofafar tani auriu iyein on . Ab bobo kaitamom wat men ibiteu on om , yabin om on au bada orot awan . Yau men fofonin on bobo komasin nanaba ani yamai ato God matanai arimon an bokomas .
01039010	Jever on ra fufur Joseph irurutobonai , baise on men i gogoi rus siten .
01039011	Baise ra kaitamom Joseph irui goa amonai an bobo itabo mes . On werai nan bobo orot on men iyafan tani on bobo efanai .
01039012	Potiphar awan on Joseph an beberai ibo ato iyau , “ Om enat rut tanen . ” Baise Joseph on jever iman iyaskou ato goa emon iyayai igat ato jever on Joseph an beber wat on ibotan .
01039013	On an werai jever it on Joseph an beber on imanai ikirir ato goa emon iyayai igat ,
01039014	jever on an goa bobo orot auris iyor ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi atonio beber woit ! Yau awau on atonio Hebrew orot ibo inat ot ati goai on mamai gagamin itet . On yau auriu irui ato igogoi rui waten mes , baise yau aumiet bag ai yoku .
01039015	Ato on an werai itatam yau aumiet bag ai yoku , on mes on an beber yau bisiwui ikirir ato iyayai igat . ”
01039016	Jever on Joseph an beber iyein i yen ato awan orot inat au go .
01039017	Namon on dudur kaitamom min awan aurin idudur iyau , “ Atonio Hebrew agir orot om ubo u nat on auriu irui ato bobo komasin iti yamai iti mamaiiu mes .
01039018	Baise on an werai yau aumiet bag ai yoku on mes , on an beber bisiwui ikirir ato iyayai igat . ”
01039019	On an werai Joseph an bada orot on awan jever an dudur itatam aifan Joseph ibi yamai on i yatatab kwakwan .
01039020	Ato on an orot iyafares Joseph sifatumai ato fafatum goai siwan , menan aiwab orot an fafatum sabu simama nan . Ato Joseph min on nan ima .
01039021	Baise BADA on Joseph bisinai imama a ibi momoginai on mes fafatum goa an bai netewar orot Joseph itai on nunuan iboai .
01039022	On mes fafatum goa an bai netewar orot on Joseph irubinai ato baibad itai fafatum yangan fani a bobo engon ato fafatum goa amonai on i kakaifaren .
01039023	Fafatum goa an bai netewar orot on bobo aifan Joseph ibi tai on men ibi nonotai on , yabin BADA on Joseph bisinai imama ato iyamai bobo aifan engon ibi yamen on obis wat .
01040001	Wera fani sisawar gibunai , Egypt an aiwab orot an sareu wine kaifarotin a rafi teren an orot gagamin rus on asi aiwab orot aurin bobo komasin tani siyamai .
01040002	Aiwab orot on ato osi babad ruam auris iyatatab ,
01040003	ato ifatumes fafatum goai iwanis menan Joseph imama nan . On min kaifarotis asi bai netewar orot an goa .
01040004	Osi wera weromin fafatum goai sima ato kaifarotis asi bai netewar orot on Joseph irubinai osi asi bobo orot mes imatar .
01040005	Fom tani fafatum goai nan sareu wine kaifarotin a rafi teren orot gagamin rus sibomomout ato asi bomomout asi yabis on ta ta .
01040006	Ra itom fomenei Joseph inat auris ato asi itis iten on men sibi yasisir on .
01040007	On mes on itetemis iyau , “ Omi aibo mes wobi yababan ? ”
01040008	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei rui fom wa bomomout , baise men iyafan tani nin arimon wai bomomout asi yabis inau bubunag tiwag wantatam on . Namon Joseph iyawures iyau , “ God Toun on sagob ebites ato bomomout yabis sau bubunag , omi ami bomomout wo kasoneu an tatam . ”
01040009	On mes sareu wine kaifarotin iyau , “ Yau au bomomout ait on wengar wine on yau nawui i yen .
01040010	Ato on wengar wine on fafamen ton . On famen emon isisig igat roroun iyein ato sasasan wat uwan an beran iyein ato uwas sibosuruf simumurur .
01040011	Yau on aiwab orot an viga a botan . Yau uwan aboen abi rowen ato kerin on an vigai isur namon aiwab orot aitai . ”
01040012	Namon Joseph iyau bunagai iyau , “ Fafamen ton an yabin on ra ton .
01040013	Ra ton amonai aiwab orot arimon fafatum goa emon in boseirim ungat ato ainau am bobo ubobo nan in yeinim men . Om arimon ainau ufofour ba , an sareu wine kaifarotin un matar on bobo unabo .
01040014	Baise on an rai om am eta engon obin wat inan on karun , abi fefeyanim , yau men uni nosfoteu mes a am moa obin auriu uni yamai . Om aiwab orot aurin ei dudur ato ei baisiu atonio fafatum goa emon on an gat .
01040015	Yau on Hebrew tafanam emon si bainauiu mom siboeu anat nin , ato nin Egypt amonai on eb yau men bobo aifan tani ai komasai on fafatum goai siwaniu amama . ”
01040016	On an rai rafi teren an orot gagamin dura itatam on sareu wine kaifarotin an bomomout on obin bag on mes on ba Joseph iyawur iyau , “ Yau mat abomomout , yau on rafi kaifet engon ton on uniwui am teren .
01040017	Kaifet tefanai bag on rafi teteran ta ta ; on min rafi banag , afair a sarar aiwab orot aurin , baise kiwiu on , on kaifet amonai rafi si yam . ”
01040018	Joseph iyafotai iyau , “ On an yabin on atonio , kaifet ton on ra ton .
01040019	Ra ton amonai aiwab orot arimon fafatum goa emon in boseirim ungat ato anjom inasutin weie wengarai in sikonim ato kiwiu biom sinan . ”
01040020	Ra baitoninai , on min aiwab orot an rat ra on forag gagamin an babadis engon auris ibotitiwag . On sareu wine kaifarotin a rafi teren an orot gagamin rus fafatum goa emon iboseiris sigat an babadis nasi sitawar .
01040021	Aiwab orot on sareu wine kaifarotin an bobo ainau ibobo on itai men ,
01040022	baise aiwab orot on an bobo orot iyawures rafi teren an orot gagamin on sibo wengarai sisikonai . Joseph dura aifan i yau on bobo nanaba imatar .
01040023	Baise sareu wine kaifarotin on men meyan Joseph inonotai , on asir inosfotai mom .
01041001	Kwanda ruam inai isawar gibunai , Egypt an aiwab orot ibomomout on Nile sareu rewanai itatawar .
01041002	Ato cow engon nimtereban ruam usis obis kadidis on sareu emon sigai sinai tefai ato sibosuruf wayo si yam .
01041003	Namon cow engon nimtereban ruam ba sigai ; osi on usis teinis rarikis . Osi sinat ato cow ato sareu rewanai wayo si yam on bisisi sitawar .
01041004	Ato cow usis teinis rarikis on simisir cow usis obis kadidis on siyam isawar . Namon aiwab orot on bomomout i tai on iror imisir .
01041005	On iyeinir men iyen bubur ato bomomout tani ba it . On ibomomout on sawareg ann kaitamomai yabis engon nimtereban ruam siya gagamis tutufis obis ato simari .
01041006	Namon sawareg nimtereban ruam ba sisisigis sigat . Osi sawareg on men obis a gagaf rabis yabin kwanda an yabat forabin irabis on mes .
01041007	Namon sawareg gagaf rabis on simisir ato sawareg gagamis tutufis obis on sitonanis . Aiwab orot en bubur emon imisir weie , isagob on i bomomout .
01041008	On mes aiwab orot fomenei imisir ato magin an itin on men yasisir . Ato on dura iyafar Eygpt amonai orot gigiboanotis , kwakwairotis a baromotis engon siruayo ato an bomomout ikasones , baise men iyafan tani iyau bunag aurin .
01041009	Namon sareu wine kaifarotin on aiwab orot iyawur iyau , “ Yau ari aurim ani rufan , yau on bobo komasin aiyamai .
01041010	Ra kaitamom om yau a rafi teren an orot gagamin rui auri uyatatab ufatumei ato fafatum goa an bai netewar orot an goai nan ureberuei .
01041011	Fom kaitamom rafi teren an orot gagamin rui wa bomomout ato wai bomomout asi yabis on ta ta .
01041012	Hebrew jorei boboun on mat nan wamama , on min fafatum kaifarotis asi bai netewar orot an bobo orot . Wei wai bomomout wa kasonai ato asi yabis on mabi mabi iyau bunagen weinei mamaba wa bomomout on fofonisi .
01041013	On dura aifan iyau bubunagei on bobo engon nanaba simatar . Yau au bobo an efanai uyeiniu men , baise om rafi teren an orot gagamin on wengarai usikon . ”
01041014	Namon aiwab orot on sasasan wat an bobo orot iyafares sinai Joseph aurin ato fafatum goa emon on sibo sigat . On sareu iyeib , iyaragai ato sawar obis iyoten weie inat aiwab orot nanai itawar .
01041015	Aiwab orot on Joseph iyawur iyau , “ Yau abomomout ato men iyafan tani arimon itau bunag on . Baise yau sikasoneu on om fofonin bomomout asi yabis unau bubunagen . ”
01041016	Joseph iyafotai iyau , “ Aiwab gagamim , yau on men fofoniu , baise God on arimon inau bubunagim tiwag ato ini yasisirem . ”
01041017	Aiwab orot iyau , “ Yau abomomout on yau Nile sareu rewanai atatawar .
01041018	Ato cow engon nimtereban ruam usis obis kadidis on sareu emon sigai sinai tefai ato sibosuruf wayo si yam .
01041019	Namon cow nimtereban ruam ba sigai . Osi on usis teinis a rarikis ato asi itis on komasis bag . Yau Egypt amonai men meyan on nanaba aiten on .
01041020	Namon cow usis teinis rarikis on simisir cow obis kadidis on siyam isawar .
01041021	Baise men iyafan tani it isagob osi on tuturas siyam isawar , yabin osi itis on nana komasis . Namon yau en bubur emon amisir .
01041022	A mat au bomomout tani ait on sawareg ann kaitamomai on yabis nimtereban ruam gagamis tutufis obis iya ato simari .
01041023	Namon sawareg nimtereban ruam ba sisisigis sigat , osi on men obis gagaf rabis , yabin kwanda an yabat forabin irabis on mes .
01041024	Ato sawareg gagaf rabis on simisir sawareg obis gagamis simari on sitonanis . Yau au bomomout on gigiboanotis , kwakwairotis a baromotis akasones , baise men iyafan tani arimon auriu itau bunag on . ”
01041025	Namon Joseph on aiwab orot iyawur iyau , “ Atonio bomomout ruam on asi yabis on kaitamom . God iyoboem nono bobo aifan arimon iniyamai .
01041026	Cow nimtereban ruam usis obis kadidis min kwanda nimtereban ruam , a sawareg nimtereban ruam obis gagamis simari on eb kwanda nimtereban ruam . Osi ruam asi yabis on kaitamom .
01041027	Cow nimtereban ruam usis teinis rarikis gibui sigeg on a sawareg nimtereban ruam gagaf rabis kwanda an yabat forabin irabis . On an yabin min kwanda nimtereban ruam arimon gomar gagamin inmatar .
01041028	Dura ato mamaba awurem on nanaba God iyoboem nono bobo aifan arimon ini yamai .
01041029	Kwanda nimtereban ruam amonai Egypt tafanam engon on arimon mour gagamin inmatar .
01041030	On gibunai kwanda nimtereban ruam amonai on arimon gomar gagamin in matar , mour an kwanda obis on tani nosfoten yabin ato gomar in nanat on tafanam engon ini komasai .
01041031	Mour an wera tutufin on asir bainosfot inmatar yabin gomar kounai e nat on in komas kwakwan bag .
01041032	God bomomout ruam ibi yoboem asi yabis on kaitamom wat . On iyau nono yen ra gibui arimon ini yamen sin matar . Ato on min arimon sasasan wat in matar .
01041033	On mes aiwab orot , om ari bag not sagob gigiboan an orot on un rubin ato Egypt tafanam in kaifarai .
01041034	Om am bai netewar orot fani un rubines Egypt tafanam sin kaifarai . Ato mour an kwanda nimtereban amonai , osi orot jever sinawures asi bayu sin kukuwain on bayu matas engon nim sinyaya ato matan tani on sin boai mabinai sin yeyeinin .
01041035	Om unawures ato kwanda obis se nat nan on bayu engon tutufin sinboai sin tubabarai . Mat om faiwar unites mafam gagamis amosi goa gagamis sin yonen ato sawareg engon tutufin nan siniwan ato an kaifar yangan nan sin kaifarai .
01041036	On bayu on sini gosusur i nen sabu auris ato kwanda nimtereban ruam Egypt amonai gomar in mamatar aurin . On eta ai sabu Egypt amonai on men arimon sini bitanangi . ”
01041037	Aiwab orot an babadis mat atonio bainonot eta on sibasitai .
01041038	Ato iyawures iyau , “ Ot arimon men meyan orot tani Joseph ba tan gaturai , on orot on God an ayu bisinai emama . ”
01041039	Aiwab orot Joseph iyawur iyau , “ God ato osi engon iyoboem , men iyafan tani an sagob a gigiboan gagamin om ba .
01041040	Yau arimon an yeinim unnat au tafanam engon tutufin un kaifarai ato om dura aifan unau on au sabu engon fonam sinboai . Om am baibad on yau ekesiu wat babawui .
01041041	Yau ari arurubinem unnat uni gawan Egypt tafanam engon tutufin un kaifarai . ”
01041042	Aiwab orot imakokoanai urakof , aiwab asi baifafaro a kukufot er an fot auman on iboseir ato Joseph imakokoanai iwan . Usis bai takwakwaren obin fafa on iyotai a anyonai agim gold damud auman on igi domanai .
01041043	Ato an bai gagam wa bairuin on itai nan inabib , ato an bai gagam orot aunan sitawar ato siyoku siyau , “ Eta worereb ! Eta worereb ! ” Ato Joseph on irubinai baibad itai Egypt tafanam engon an Gawan imatar .
01041044	Aiwab orot on Joseph iyawur iyau , “ Yau on aiwab orot baise men iyafan tani Egypt tafanamai on an gogoi ai aifan ini yamai ab ainau om uni basit weie . ”
01041045	Aiwab orot Egypt yangan wabis Zephenath Paneah on Joseph itai , a Heliopolis mafam gagamin an tafaror bai netewar orot Potiphera natun jeverei , Asenath on Joseph itai iawan . Joseph an kwanda on orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat an werai on ibosuruf Egypt aiwab orot aurin ibobo . Aiwab orot an goa ikirir ato Egypt tafanam engon ibibib .
01041046	
01041047	Kwanda nimtereban ruam amonai bayu an mour on gagamin bag imatar .
01041048	Osi bayu engon Joseph an bobo yangan iyawures siboen mafam gagamisi nan goai situbabaren a mafam gugudis ta ta mat asi goa nan siyonen , ato bayu osi mafam masau emon i gat on asi goai bag situbabaren .
01041049	Sawareg on irat kwakwan bag Joseph men fofonin iti fofon , an itin on tore an gasa ba .
01041050	Weie gomar an kwanda it inat it gat , Joseph nanatun fifirig orot ruam on awan Asenath itu .
01041051	On iyau , “ God iyameu au bai kokosar engon ai nosfoten a tamau an dam warar mat . ” On mes natun ainau orot wabin iyor Manasseh .
01041052	On eb iyau , “ God nanatu iteu au yababan emon nin tafanamai . ” On mes natun gia orot wabin iyor Ephraim . ”
01041053	Kwanda nimtereban ruam mour an wera Egypt tafanam ibi yasisir on inat an kanfoun igat .
01041054	Ato gomar an kwanda nimtereban ruam on ibosuruf , mamaba Joseph i yau on nanaba . Ato gomar min tafanam fani mat iboes , baise Egypt amonai on bayu i yen .
01041055	On an rai Egypt sabu si bosuruf sibi bitanangi ato aiwab orot aurin bayu mes sibi fefeyan . On mes on iyawures iyau , “ Omi wonai Joseph woit , ato aifan inau on nanaba woni yamai . ”
01041056	On gomar on irat kwakwan Egypt tafanam engon ibo , on mes Joseph bayu sawareg goa gagamis engon iruserenen ato Egypt sabu sawareg sitotobon .
01041057	Sabu tafanam ta ta emon engon sinat Joseph bisinai sawareg sitotobon . Yabin gomar irat kwakwan tafanam ta ta engon ibo .
01042001	On an werai Jacob isagob Egypt nan on sawareg i yen , on mes on nanatun iyawures iyau , “ Omi aibo mes womair toum wobi ruruai bonen womama i ?
01042002	Yau dura atatam Egypt nan on sawareg sen , omi wosur wonai nan sawareg won tobon ato tanam yawasit tanama ”
01042003	On mes Joseph taitain tutuan auyotoat on sisur sinai Egypt nan sawareg sit tobon mes .
01042004	Baise Jacob on Joseph tain bag Benjamin on men iyafarai mat sinai on , yabin on iber fetag aifan tani aurin inmatar .
01042005	Sabu fani si nan on , Jacob nanatun min mat sinai sawareg sit tobon mes , yabin Canaan tafanam mat gomar gagamin imatar .
01042006	Joseph on gawan gagamin Egypt tafanamai imama ato sabu fafanam au engon min sinat on aurin sawareg sitotobon . Ato Joseph taitain tutuan sinat on nanai sindas sirou si kwafir sisur magis motob iruyein .
01042007	Joseph taitain tutuan ites on isagob nono baise on ibi yamai an itin on men isagobis ba . On dura wawaninai itetemis iyau , “ Omi men emon wonat ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei Canaan emon wanat bayu wan tobon mes . ’
01042008	Joseph taitain tutuan on ites isagob baise osi sit on men sisagob on .
01042009	On an bomomout ainau i bomomout on inonoten ato iyau , “ Omi on tafanam bai nateteotim , omi wonat wai tafanam an samisamis fani on woneit mes . ”
01042010	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Ambin bag ! wei ai bada . Wei wanat on om am agir ba , bayu wan tobon mes .
01042011	Wei ai bada , wei on ainauan gigiawan wat , wei men tafanam bai nateteoti on , wei on sabu obi wat . ”
01042012	Joseph iyawures iyau , “ Ambin ! Omi wonat wei ai tafanam an samisamin on wonitai mes . ”
01042013	Osi siyau , “ Wei ai bada , wei on ainauan gigiawan wat auyotoat an yayatan ruam . Wei fifirig orot engon on tamai orot kaitamom nan Canaan tafanamai emama . Ato wei tai tani on irabob ato ai giya momos bag on nan taman rus semama . ”
01042014	Baise Joseph iyafotes iyau , “ Yau au dura on au nono , omi on tafanam bai nateteotim .
01042015	Baise yau eta atonio ani yamai an sagob omi dura bag wat wobi kakafun : Yau on Egypt aiwab orot an faiwar babanai abi faro , omi ainau on ami giya momos won boai innat nin nawaui in tawar weie omi wonan au go .
01042016	Omi orot tani on inan giya momos in boai innat ato omi fani on nin fafatum goai wonama . Onai tanitai omi on dura bag wobi kakafun . Baise omi won bisigo on , yau on aiwab orot an faiwar babanai abi faro , omi on tafanam bai nateteotim . ”
01042017	Joseph dura ikakafun isawar ato osi engon fafatum goai iwanis nan ra ton sima .
01042018	Ra baitoninai Joseph iyawures iyau , “ Yau on God akakafai . On mes yau dura aifan au on nanaba wonbi yamai on arimon yawasim wonama .
01042019	Ot tani dura bag omi sabu obim wat on , omi orot tani on nin nana fafatum goai inama , menan womama nan . Omi fani on wonan bayu ato wototobonen on won boen wonan awawam nanatum sebi bitanangi auris .
01042020	Namon omi taim giya momos on won boai wonnat auriu . Onai ini dura bag omi on dura bag wat wobi kakafun ato yau men anasubunuem on . ” Osi engon sibasitai .
01042021	Namon osi tous wat siyau bonen , “ Dura bag ot tait giya aurin bobo komasin tafour on an garamin bai kokosar gagamin ato taboai ; on yababan gagamin amonai irui ato baibais mes ibi fefeyan on men fonan tatatam on . On fasinai ari ot ba atonio yababan amonai tarui . ”
01042022	Reuben iyawures iyau , “ Yau awurem fifi kafakakai men woti komasai , baise omi yau au dura men wotatam . On mes on an garamin on an rabob an baiyan on ato ta boai . ”
01042023	Joseph isagob osi dura aifan sibi kakafun , baise osi on men sisagob , yabin min basun an orot on dura ibi kitabir weines on fasinai .
01042024	Joseph ikirires igat mabinai nan itou . On yan ikwat weie imatabir men auris irui ikakafun ato an orot iyawures Simeon sibo ato taitain tutuan matasi sifatumai .
01042025	Joseph bobo orot iyawures taitain tutuan asi baik on sawareg siwanen awas sibonuen ato eta an bayu mat siwanen , a asi agim kukufet siboen asi bayu baik tefasi siwanen men . Ato agir orot min on bobo nanaba sifour .
01042026	On taitain tutuan asi sawareg sitotobon on donkey tefasi siyagagaien ato simisir sinai .
01042027	Osi efan menan fom kaita siten mes , ato orot tani an baik iruseren an donkey iti bayuai mes . Baise on agim kukufet on an baik tefanai bag i yen igaturai .
01042028	On taitain tutuan auris iyor iyau , “ Yau au agim siteu men ! Atonio au baik amonai yen . ” Osi nunuas engon sifeu , berai nan tuturas mat sitetemis bonen siyau , “ God aifan ot aurit iyamai ? ”
01042029	On an rai osi sinat tamas Jacob aurin Canaan nan ato osi bobo aifan auris imamatar on engon aurin sidudur :
01042030	Osi siyau , “ Egypt an gawan on dura wawaninai wei auri ikakafun a iubarei iyau on wei on an tafanam an bai nateteoti
01042031	Ato wei wai yafotai wau , ‘ Wei men tafanam bai nateteoti on , wei on sabu obi .
01042032	Wei ainauan gigiawan engon auyotoat an yayatan ruam . Ato wei on orot kaitamom nanatun wat . wei tai tuai tani on irabob ato giya momos on nan Canaan tamai rus semama . ’
01042033	Ato gawan orot iyafotei iyau , ‘ Eta atonio nanaba an sagob omi on dura bag sabu obim . Omi sanamui orot tani on rui wanama ato omi fani on sawareg won boen wonan awawam nanatum sebi bitanangi auris .
01042034	Omi taim giya momos on auriu won boai wonnat . Namon onai an sagob omi men tafanam bai nateteotim on , omi on sabu obim ato arimon Simeon anitem men , ato nin wonama woni totobon . ’ ”
01042035	Namon osi ainauan gigiawan asi baik sidedeburen on , osi engon asi agim kukufet sigaturen . Ato on an rai agim siten on , osi tamas Jacob mat on men sunub siber .
01042036	Osi tamas Jacob on iyawures iyau , “ Omi wogogoi on woni yameu nanatu engon ani siwanis i ? Joseph inai , Simeon ba inai ato ari on wogogoi Benjamin ba won boai wonan . Yau tamam on osi yawas engon auris abi kokosariu .
01042037	Reuben on taman aurin iyau , “ Yau Benjamin men an boai an matabir annat aurim on ; basit om nanatu orot ruam on unasubunues . Om yau auriu eikirir an kaifarai anan ato arimon an boai an matabir men annat aurim . ”
01042038	Baise Jacob iyau , “ Yau natu Benjiman men ani kirir won boai mat wonan . On tuan on irabob ato on tain ekesin wat emama . Yau abeber ari fetag etai nan sawar tani aurin in matar . Yau ai orokwar isawar ato aifan yababan won bibiteu on arimon inasubunueu . ”
01043001	Gomar Canaan amonai on ikomas kwakwan bag .
01043002	Jacob nanatun Egypt emon sawareg sitobon sibo sinat on engon siyam isawar . On mes on nanatun iyawures iyau , “ Omi won matabir men wonan ati bayu kafakai ba won tobon men . ”
01043003	Judah on taman iyawur iyau , “ Egypt an gawan on dura wawaninai iyawurei iyau , ‘ Omi men taim giya momos mat won nanat on , men auriu won nat magim aniten mes . ’
01043004	Om tai Benjamin mat uni yafarei wanan on , wei fofonin wanan am bayu wan tobon .
01043005	Baise om fifi men unbi yafarai on , wei mat arimon men fofonin wanan , yabin gawan iyau , ‘ Omi men taim giya momos mat won nanat on , men auriu wonnat magim aniten mes . ’ ”
01043006	Jacob iyau , “ Omi aibo mes atonio orot wokasonai omi taim aurin ato yau on yababan gagamin tani ba woiteu . ”
01043007	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Gawan on nana ibi tetemi ot ati dam warar aurin . Omi tamam min nana yawasin emama i ? Omi min taim tani mat i ? Wei on asir an bai tetem on wabi yafotai mom . Mamaba wat sagob on arimon inawurei tai wan boai mat wanan . ”
01043008	Namon Judah on taman iyawur iyau , “ Om fifi mat eiyafarei ato wei ari wat wan misir wanan . Onai ot arimon men tani bitanangi a tanarab on .
01043009	Yau tou au mataniu fifi on yau babawui an kaifarai . Ato men an boai an matabir men aurim on , on bit engon on yau an boai .
01043010	Om men nanaba weromin ut botani on , wei on ra bairuin ba watan nono ato ari on wat matabir men wat nat . ”
01043011	Osi tamas iyawures iyau , “ On nanaba won nonosin mes on atonio tafanam an bayu obis on wonabo gawan aurin . Omi on bayu an fio yanden ninibin kafakakain , manigeu kerin kafakakain , bayu an fio forabis , wengar pistachio uwas a wengar almond uwas on wonabo ami baik ai woni wanen an siwar mes .
01043012	Mat agim silver turin ba won boai tefan wonrab , yabin agim silver ato ami baik tefasi sibi wanen on won boai won matabir men . Ot men tasagob osi fetag siyamai bait .
01043013	Basit omi taim Benjiman wobo mat gariwat wonai gawan aurin .
01043014	Yau ababayoi God Faiwarin Bag an kaber emon ini yamai ato gawan moa obin inboai tuam a taim tuam Benjiman initem men , wonboes wonnat auriu . God in gogoi yau nanatu an bisiwanis mes on , basit ani siwanis . ”
01043015	On mes osi siwar siboen a agim silver sibo ato turin ba sibo tefan sirab , weie Benjamin mat simisir au Egypt sinai Joseph aurin sigat .
01043016	On an rai Joseph ites osi on Benjamin mat si nat , on an bobo orot an goa ekakaifarai on iyawur iyau , “ Om atonio orot on eboes enai au goai . Osi yau mat aiyet an bayu wanam . On mes om sheep tani yasubun ato ebotitiwag eitab . ”
01043017	Bobo orot mamaba Joseph i yawur on nanaba iyamai , ato taitain tutuan iboes sinai Joseph an goai .
01043018	On an werai iboes sinai goai ato osi siber sinonot ato siyau , “ Ot nin siboet tanat , yabin min ati agim ainau ato bayu ta totobon on siboen siwanen men . Osi arimon sin borarabit ato ati donkey sinabo ato ot min on tani agirai . ”
01043019	On mes osi sinat goa an metewanai ato Joseph an goa an bobo orot aurin sikakafun .
01043020	Osi siyawur siyau , “ Kavian , wei ai dura untatam , wei ainau wanat nin bayu watobon .
01043021	Wei wamatabir au go wa nan ato etai fom kaitamom waen . Wei ai baik waruserenen ato ai baik engon tefasi on agim matafis wagaturen men , on mes agim waboen men wanat aurim .
01043022	Wei agim silver fani ba mat waboen wanat bayu turin ba wan tobon . Wei men wasagob iyafan on ai agim ibo ai baik amonai iwanen men . ”
01043023	Namon bobo orot iyau , “ Omi men woni yababan a men wonaber . Omi ami God a tamam an God on agim silver ibo baik amonai omi aurim iwanen men . Omi agim wobi baiyan on abo nono . ” Namon on Simeon ibo igat auris .
01043024	Bobo orot on ainauan gigiawan iboes sirui Joseph an goai . On sareu ites ass sisouen ato on asi donkey i bayues .
01043025	Osi siwar si boseseren si botitiwagen ato Joseph aiyet in nanat on sinitai mes , yabin osi siyawures arimon on mat aiyet an bayu sinam .
01043026	On an werai Joseph inat goai , osi siwar siboen aurin sirui goa amonai ato nanai sindas sirouen usos situr sisur magis motob iruyein .
01043027	On asi yawas ma aurin on itetemis iyau , “ Omi tamam orokwar aurin on wokasoneu , on mamaba , usin basit a nana yawasin obin emama i ? ”
01043028	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei tamai , om am bobo orot kitumin , on men irabob , on yawasin emama . ” Ato osi engon nanai sindas sirouen usos situr sisur .
01043029	Namon Joseph tain Benjamin it ato iyau , “ On mes atonio on ami giya momos bag , on aurin on wo kasoneu . ” Ato on Benjamin aurin iyau , “ Yau natu , God ini momoginem . ”
01043030	Namon Joseph on tain Benjiman it on kafakakai mom itatou , on mes on ra kaita iyayai irui an en bubur efanai nan itou .
01043031	On gibunai Joseph on magin isou isawar ato igat . On yan ikwat weie iyawures siu siteb .
01043032	Joseph an sen on mabinai siyein ato taitain tutuan asi sen on mabisi siyein . Egypt bobo orot iyabon ato Joseph mat sena kaitamom si yam on ari on mabisi sites siyam , yabin osi asi kakaf a asi kik iyau nanaba men fofonin Hebrew yangan mat kaitanei siu sinam .
01043033	Ainauan gigiawan Joseph nanai asi kwanda ai nan simairis , ainau orot isur inai giya momos igat . Osi sit mamaba simairirin on tuturas mat sina bonen ato siduduran .
01043034	Siu on Joseph an kema emon siboen siraramis , ato Benjamin an siu on sabu nim asi sen fofonis on siyein , men taitain tutuan engon asi sen ba . Osi Joseph mat nana si yam sitotom mom asir sikokok .
01044001	Joseph an goa bobo orot iforai iyau , “ Osi orot asi baik ai bayu aumiet wat ei wanen sinabo sinan , a orot kakaita kakaita asi agim silver on eb baik tefasi nan ei wanen .
01044002	Namon yau au viga bonanamarin agim silver ai siyamai a agim silver sawareg aurin sibo sinat tobon mes on , on mat engon ei kaita tais giya momos an baik tefanai eiwan . ” Ato Joseph dura mamaba bobo orot i yawur on nanaba iyamen .
01044003	Ra itom fomenei fomenei bobo orot on taitain tutuan iyafares asi donkey siboen ato sinai .
01044004	On an rai osi mafam gagamin sikirir men weromin sinai mom , ato Joseph an goa bobo orot iyawur iyau , “ Om on gagariwat osi orot gibusi enai ato un boboes on unawures unau , ‘ Omi aibo mes bobo komasin auriu woiyamai ?
01044005	Omi aibo mes au bada an viga agim silver ai siyamai on wobainau ? ’ Omi viga ato wo boai on , yau au bada min on nan wat etotoman a on viga emon ebi yoboai sawar buburis gibui sin mamatar auris on eiten . Omi on bobo komasin gagamin bag woiyamai ! ”
01044006	On an rai bobo orot inai ibotanis ato Joseph dura mamaba i yawur on dura bainon nanaba iyawures .
01044007	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wai kavian , om abi dura ebi kakafun , wei men wasagob on . Wei dura bag wawurem on men bobo abifan tani on nanaba wai yamai on .
01044008	Om usagob wei tafanam Canaan nan agim silver ai baik tefasi si yen wagaturen on wa boen wamatabir men aurim . Ato mamaba uyau on am bada an goai agim silver ai agim gold on wat bainau .
01044009	Wai Kavian , wei sanayi iyafan tani un gaturai in boboai mes on , on inarab , ato wei engon on om am bada an agiroti wan matar . ”
01044010	On iyawures iyau , “ Yau abi basit , baise orot iyafan omi sanamui on viga i boai on ekesin wat on ini agirotin , ato omi fani on ubar emon on in rufanim wonan . ”
01044011	Namon osi sasasan wat asi baik au gabur siyeiren ato osi kakaita kakaita asi baik siruserenen .
01044012	Joseph an bobo orot matanubai asi baik engon irunanagen tiwag , ainau orot farat ibosuruf isur inai giya momos bag igat , ato viga on Benjamin an baik amonai igaturai .
01044013	On tutuan on siyababan kwakwan ato asi bai takwakwaren on sisafefen . Namon osi engon asi donkey tefasi asi sawar siya gagaiyen men ato simatabir sinai mafam gagamin aurin .
01044014	On an rai Judah taitain tutuan mat simatabir sinai Joseph an goai sigat on sit Joseph on nan nana imama . Osi engon nanai nan sindas sirouen usos situr .
01044015	Joseph iyawures iyau , “ Omi abifan woi yamai ? Omi men wosagob orot yau nanaba on au faiwar yen fofonin bobo buburis semamatar on arimon an sagob . ”
01044016	Judah iyafotai iyau , “ Wai kavian , abifan arimon aurim wanau ? Mamaba wanau wan rubunagi . God on wai komasin iyamai irerebai . On mes wei engon on om am agiroti , men ato iyafan bisinai viga sigagaturai ekesin wat on . ”
01044017	Joseph iyafotai iyau , “ O , ambin bag ! Yau men arimon nanaba ani yamai ! On iyafan viga i boai wat on arimon yau auriu ini agir . Omi fani on won matabir men obinai wat wonan tamam aurin . ”
01044018	Namon Judah on Joseph aurin igai ato iyawur iyau , “ Au kavian , karun , abi fefeyanim , ei basiteu obinai aurim ani kakafun . Men auriu uni yatatab mes , yabin om on aiwab orot rum fofon .
01044019	Au kavian , om wei ui tetemi uyau , ‘ Omi tamam mat a taim tani mat i ? ’
01044020	Wei wai yafotem wau , ‘ Eee , wei tamai on iorokwar , ato on iorokwar bag weie fifi giya momos irat . On fifi tuan orot on min irabob ato fifi ekesin mom ayon ibi tuai on yawasin emama . Ato tamai min on fifi inuaboai kwakwan bag . ’
01044021	Namon om uyawurei uyau , ‘ omi won boai wonnat nin ato tou mataui anitai ,
01044022	ato wei wai yafotem wau on , fifi on arimon taman men ini kirir , on taman in bikirir on arimon taman inarab . ’
01044023	Baise om uyawurei uyau , ‘ Om taim giya momos men mat won nanat on , omi men wonnat auriu . ’
01044024	On an rai wamatabir men wanai tamai aurin , aifan uyawurei on wa kasonai .
01044025	Namon on iyawurei wat matabir men bayu kafakakai ba wat tobon mes .
01044026	Wei wai yafotai wau , ‘ Wei men wanan on . Wei tai giya momos mat on wanan , ato ambin mes on , men wanan aurin .
01044027	Wei tamai ato nanaba iyawurei , ‘ Omi wosagob yau awau Rachel on nanatu orot ruam mom itu .
01044028	Tani on ikirireu nono . On rega an bobaitu tutuenis sisafefai , yabin on i nan nenei on men ait men .
01044029	Omi ari atonio ba yau emon won boseir ato aifan komasin aurin in mamatar on , omi yau yababan wobiteu ato on yababan emon inasbuniu , yabin yau on ai orokwar bag . ’ ”
01044030	Judah an dura ibotein iyau , “ Au kavian , ato ari yau men fifi mat an matabir men anan tamau aurin ato on an rai yau magiu initai ato fifi magin ini nayou on arimon inarab . On taman on fifi inuaboai kwakwan bag a on iorokwar bag on mes wei atonio yababan wan bibitai on arimon in rabob .
01044031	
01044032	Men on wat , yau fifi an yawas aurin on tamau aurin aumatan . Yau awur au , “ Yau fifi men an boai an matabir aurim , yau arimon au yawas tutufinai ubar an boai . ”
01044033	Au kavian , on mes karun abi fefeyanim , yau on ari nin anama on fifi an efan an boai ani agirotiu , ato on eikirir tutuan mat sin matabir sinan .
01044034	Yau on fifi men bisiwui on an matabir anan tamau aurin ? Ambin bag ! Yau men agogoi atonio komasin anitai innat tamau au tefan inag . ”
01045001	Joseph on men fofonin an bobo orot matasi toun iti totorai iti waniai on , on mes Egypt yangan engon tutufin iyawures goa emon sigat , weie Joseph taitain tutuan ikasones on iyafan .
01045002	Joseph fonan gagaminai bag itou ato Egypt yangan fonan sitatam . Ato duran sibotein inai aiwab orot an goa amonai sabu engon sitatam .
01045003	Namon Joseph on taitain tutuan iyawures iyau , “ Yau on Joseph . Yau tamau nana yawasin emama ? ” Baise taitain tutuan on men fofonin siti yafotai , yabin osi engon on siber kwakwan .
01045004	On mes Joseph iyawures iyau , “ Karun , abi fefeyanim , omi ne ne auriu wonat . ” Namon taitain tutuan aurin bag sinat . Ato on iyawures iyau , “ Yau on taim tuam Joseph . Omi ato wotoboniu atan Egypt nan ati agir mes .
01045005	Ato ari on men woni yakomas a men toum woni ubar bobonen yabin yau wotoboniu on mes . God Toun bag on iyafareu ainau anat nin sabu ani yawasis mes .
01045006	Ari on gomar an kwanda bairuin wat atonio tafanamai . Ato arimon kwanda nim ba amonai nan on bofefes a kuwain ambin .
01045007	On mes God ainau iyafareu anat atonio nin on omi ati baisim men wotarab mes . Yabin atonio yawas bai duduranin imamatar nan on nanatum wawam agirim fani min arimon in botanis yawasis nin tafanamai sinama .
01045008	On mes men dura bag omi yau woi yafareu anat nin on , baise God . Yau on God iyameu anat aiwab orot , on an bainetewar orot gagamin amatar . Yau on baibad abo aiwab orot an aiwab goa amonai an sabu engon akakaifares . Yau on Egypt tafanam engon tutufin akakaifarai .
01045009	Omi ari gariwat wonan tamau aurin ato wonawur wonau , “ Om natum Joseph on ato nanaba iyau , ‘ God iyameu anat Egypt tafanam engon tutufin akakaifarai . Yau auriu sasasan wat unnat . ’
01045010	Om arimon tafanam Goshen Egypt amonai nan unama , on min yau bisiui . Om , nanatum , awawam , am bobaitu a abi abi om ebi noanim engon mat .
01045011	Om Goshen amonai nan unama on , yau arimon an kaifarem . Gomar on arimon nana inan kwanda nim ba ato yau men agogoi om am dam warar a am bobaitu mat woni bitanangi . ”
01045012	Joseph an dura ibotein iyau , “ Omi engon a om Benjamin mat on ari weie woiteu wosagob yau on dura bag Joseph .
01045013	Omi tamau won kasonai mamaba nin Egypt amonai faiwar gagamin abo abotan a abi abi matamui woiten on mat engon won kasonai ato gariwat won boai won matabir wonnat auriu . ”
01045014	On tain Benjamin irous a Benjamin on eb tuan irous ato rus sitou .
01045015	Namon Joseph on nana itotou auman taitain tutuan kakaita kakaita irorousis iboyayanis . On gibunai weie taitain tutuan usis siforab ato sibosuruf Joseph mat sikakafun .
01045016	On an rai Egypt aiwab orot an bobo netewarotis mat dura sitatam Joseph taitain tutuan sinat on , osi men sunub siyasisir .
01045017	On mes aiwab orot on Joseph iyawur iyau , “ Om taitaim tutuam yawures asi bobaitu sinabo ato sin matabir men sinan au Canaan tafanam .
01045018	Om unawures tamam a ami dam warar mat engon sin boes sin matabir men sinat au Egypt . Yau arimon efan obin bag Egypt amonai anites . Ato osi auris on arimon bayu fofonin wat sinam sinama .
01045019	Osi yawures motob an wa gugudis Egypt emon sinabo awawas nanatu auris a tamas mat sin boai sin matabir sinnat .
01045020	Osi asi sawar fani sinbi kiriren auris on men sini yababan mes . Sawar obis obis engon tutufin Egypt tafanam amonai sen on engon osi asi sawar . ”
01045021	On mes Jacob nanatun aifan si yawures on nanaba sifour . Joseph motob an wa gugudis ites mamaba aiwab orot i yau ba a eta an bayu mat ites .
01045022	On taitain tutuan usis asi sawar on eb kakaita iraramis . Baise Benjamin on usin an sawar on nim a agim silver 300 on mat itai .
01045023	Joseph on Egypt sawar obis obis bag on iboen donkey auyotoat tefasis iyagagaien ato taman aurin iyafaren . Mat on donkey toub auyotoat tefasi on sawareg , rafi a bayu fani mat iyagagaien eta an bayu aurin .
01045024	Namon Joseph taitain tutuan iyawures sinan mes . On an ra osi sibosuruf sitan mes ato on iyawures iyau , “ Omi won nanan etai on men wonagam bonen mes . ”
01045025	Osi Egypt sikirir ato simatabir men sinai au Canaan tamas Jacob aurin .
01045026	Osi tamas sikasonai siyau , “ Joseph on nana yawasin emama . On Egypt tafanam engon ebi netewar . ” Osi tamas on dura itatam on iror ato men itutumes on .
01045027	On an werai osi aifan Joseph i yau on engon tamas sikasonai a motob an wa gugudis ato Joseph iyafaren sinat on sinboai sin matabir men au Egypt on iten weie , Jacob an not itotorai .
01045028	Namon Jacob iyau , “ Ari weie abi tutum ! Yau natu Joseph on nana yawasin emama . Yau anan anitai weie anarab . ”
01046001	On mes Jacob an sawar engon iwabunagen isawar ato on an dam warar mat sibosuruf sibib sin nan au Egypt . On an rai osi sinat efan Beersheba nan sigat , Jacob on nan sirifu ikutetai taman Isaac an God aurin .
01046002	On fom , God on bomomoutai Jacob aurin iyor iyau , “ Jacob ! Jacob ! ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Men , Yau nio . ”
01046003	Namon On iyau , “ Yau on God , om tamam Isaac an God , au Egypt nai aurin on men unaber mes ; Yau arimon on tafanamai nan ani yamem nanatum wawam agirim on sinarat gagamin bag sinmatar .
01046004	Yau arimon rut tanan au Egypt , ato Yau arimon nanatum wawam agirim on an boes men sin matabir atonio tafanamai . Ato om unarab weie Joseph toun imanai in garobim .
01046005	Jacob Beersheba emon igat inai . On nanatun on tamas sibo , nanatus gugudis a awawas siboes motob an wa gugudis ato Egypt an aiwab orot ibi yafaren on tefasi siyagagaiis .
01046006	Osi asi bobaitu a sawar gugu ato Canaan nan simama sibobo on siboen ato sinai au Egypt . Jacob nanatun wawan agirin engon iboes mat sinai :
01046007	on nanatun orot awawas mat a wawan orot jever engon iboes mat sinai au Egypt .
01046008	Atonio on Jacob an dam warar on iboes inai au Egypt on wabis : Jacob natun ainau orot wabin on Reuben ,
01046009	ato Reuben nanatun orot wabis min : Hanoch , Pallu , Hezron a Carmi .
01046010	Simeon a on nanatun orot wabis min : Jamuel , Jamin , Ohad , Jachin , Zohar a Canaan jever natun Shaul .
01046011	Levi a on nanatun orot wabis min : Gershon , Kohath a Merrari .
01046012	Judah a on nanatun orot wabis min : Shelah , Perez a Zerah ( Judah nanatun fani , Er a Onan on Canaan nan sirabob . ) Perez nanatun orot on Hezron a Hamul .
01046013	Issachar a on nanatun orot wabis min : Tola , Puah , Jashub a Shimron .
01046014	Zebulun a on nanatun orot wabis min : Sered , Elon a Jahleel .
01046015	Atonio fifirig orot on Leah awan Jacob rus nanatus , Leah Mesopotamia tafanamai itu a natun jeverei Dinah mat . Atonio osi engon on Leah nanatun wawan agirin orot kaitamom , orot ta aurin auyotoat an yayatan ton .
01046016	Gad a on nanatun orot wabis min : Zephon , Haggi , Shuni , Ezbon , Eri , Arod a Areli .
01046017	Asher a on nanatun orot wabis min : Imnah , Ishvah , Ishvi , Beriah a osi robus Serah . Beriah nanatun on Heber a Malchiel .
01046018	Atonio osi on Jacob nanatun wawan agirin Zilpah itu , engon auyotoat an yayatan nimtereban kaitamom . Zilpah on Laban ibo natun Leah itai an bobo jever mes .
01046019	Jacob awan Rachel on fifirig ruam itues : Joseph a Benjamin .
01046020	Egypt nan on Joseph nanatun orot ruam sirat : Manasseh a Ephraim , awan Asenath itu , on min tafaror bai netewar orot wabin Potiphera natun jeverei , Heliopolis mafam emon .
01046021	Benjamin nanatun on : Bela , Becher , Ashbel , Gera , Naaman , Ehi , Rosh , Muppim , Huppim a Ard .
01046022	Atonio osi on Jacob nanatun wawan agirin auyotoat an yayatan bat awan Rachel itu .
01046023	Dan a natun orot Hushim .
01046024	Naphtali a on nanatun orot wabis min : Jahzeel , Guni , Jezer a Shillem .
01046025	Atonio osi on Jacob nanatun wawan agirin nimtereban ruam Bilhah itu . Bilhah min Rachel an bobo jeverei taman Laban itai .
01046026	Jacob nanatun wawan agirin on an tara emon iyabon mat sinai au Egypt on orot wat ton an yayatan nimtereban kaitamom , men nanatun orot awawas mat siyabarai on .
01046027	Joseph nanatun orot ruam on Egypt nan sirat , ato osi mat sibi kaita on Jacob an dam warar on orot wat ton orot ta aurin auyotoat .
01046028	Jacob on Judah iyafarai ainau inai Joseph inawur innat Goshen tafanam ai nan in nefotes . Osi sinat sigat mom ,
01046029	Joseph on motob an wa ibo ato inai Goshen nan taman inefotai . On an werai sinofoten , Joseph on taman anjonai iman ireben bonai irous ato weromin bag itou .
01046030	Jacob on Joseph aurin iyau , “ Yau ari weie yasisirai anarab , yau aitem asagob nono om on nana yawasim emama . ”
01046031	Namon Joseph on taitain tutuan a taman an sabu mat auris ikakafun iyau , “ Yau on anan aiwab orot an kasonai in sagob on yau taitaiu tutuau a tamau an sabu mat Canaan simama on sinat auriu sigat .
01046032	Yau an kasonai insagob omi on sheep asi kaifarotim on mes sheep sigaraba woboen wonat a ami sawar engon mat sigaraba woboen mat wonat .
01046033	On an werai aiwab orot inyorem wonan ato on arimon ini tetemim inau , omi ami bobo on abifan ,
01046034	omi dura bag won kasonai in sagob on omi on bobaitu kaifarotim ato nanatum wawam agirim sifofour ba . A mat wonawur omi ami sawar engon woboen wonat ainau nanatum wawam agirim sifofour ba . On etaai on arimon in boem tafanam Goshen nan in yeinim wonama . ” Joseph dura atonio iyau yabin Egypt yangan on men asi gogoi on sinnat sheep kaifarotis auris sini ufin .
01047001	Joseph inai aiwaib orot aurin ato iyawur iyau , “ Yau tamau a taitaiu tutuau on engon Canaan emon asi sheep , goat , cow a asi sawar engon mat siboen sinat . Osi on ari Goshen tafanamai nan semama . ”
01047002	Joseph on taitain tutuan engon nim irubines ato sinat aiwab orot nanai sitawar .
01047003	Aiwab orot on itetemis iyau , “ Omi ami bobo on abifan ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Kavian , wei ai bobo on sheep kaifaroti , ainau tatamai a wawai agiri sifofour ba .
01047004	Wei wanat atonio tafanamai wera dibon wanama mes , yabin tafanam Canaan amonai on gomar gagamin imatar , motob iraran iwani , wayo sirabob ato wai bobaitu auris on bayu ambin . Karun , wabi fefeyanim fofonin uti basitei ato wei tafanam Goshen nan watama . ”
01047005	Aiwab orot on Joseph aurin iyau , “ Ari on tamam a taitaim tutuam sinat mat wonama .
01047006	Atonio tafanam Egypt on osi noas . Om ei kirires tafanam Goshen nan sinama , on tafanam on obin bag . Ato osi sanasi orot iyabon fofonis on baibad unites yau au bobaitu sin kaifares . ”
01047007	Namon Joseph on taman Jacob ibo inat aiwab orot aurin . Jacob aiwab orot imomoginai ,
01047008	ato aiwab orot on itetemai iyau , “ Om am kwanda on biyam ? ”
01047009	Jacob iyafotai iyau , “ Yau atonio tafanamai ai dadadanam abib on au kwanda 130 mom . Osi kwanda on men weromin bag ato yababan sigaraba maiau agaturen . Ato baise yau tatamau wawau agiriu asi kwanda on weromin bag sima men yau au kwanda ba . ”
01047010	Jacob on aiwab orot iyau baitotorai ato ikirir inai .
01047011	Namon Joseph on aiwab orot ifonaboai ato taman a taitin tutuan asi mair ma iyabunagai efan obin bag Egypt amonai ites , Rameses mafam gagamin bisinai .
01047012	Joseph on bayu ibononoat taman aurin , taitain tutuan , taman an dam warar a gugudis bag mat engon auris .
01047013	Gomar gagamin bag imatar ato tafanam au engon on bayu ambin . On an werai Egypt a Canaan sabu engon on bayu mes sirarabob ato usis engon sisam .
01047014	Joseph on Egypt a Canaan sabu sawareg sitotobon an agim on engon iboai i nan aiwab orot an goai .
01047015	On an rai Egypt a Canaan yangan asi agim engon bayu aurin sireben isawar , Egypt sabu on sinat Joseph aurin ato siyawur siyau , “ Karun , wabi fefeyanim fofonin bayu utitei ! Wei ai agim engon wareben isawar , ato wei bayu men wanam on ari atonio namui wanafeu wanarab . ”
01047016	Joseph iyafotes iyau , “ Omi ami agim won reben in sasawar mes on , basit , omi ami bobaitu on won boes wonnat ato an garamin on arimon bayu anitem . ”
01047017	On mes osi asi bobaitu horse , sheep , goat , cow a donkey on Joseph sitai ato an garamin on bayu ites . On kwanda amonai on osi bobaitu engon on sitai ato an garamin on bayu ites .
01047018	On kwanda inai isawar ato kwanda tani ba osi sinat Joseph aurin ato siyawur siyau , “ Wai kavian , wei arimon men aifan tani om matamu wani buni on . Wei ai agim engon wareben isawar a wai bobaitu mat engon on om inoanim . Wei men aifan tani auri yen arimon wanitem on . Ab wei toui usi a ai motob on wat on yen .
01047019	Om men uni kirirei wanarab mes mat ai motob on engon iraran fofou imatar . Om wei a ai motob mat on bayu ai etoboni mom . Wei on aiwab orot an agiroti wan matar ato ai motob on innat on ininoanai . Sawareg eitei on ini baisi wanama a fesi eitei ai masauai wan tanumen . ”
01047020	Joseph Egypt tafanam amonai motob engon itobon aiwab orot aurin . Egypt sabu engon tutufin asi motob sikuteten Joseph itobonen , yabin gomar on irat bag , on etaiai motob engon on aiwab orot inoanai .
01047021	Joseph on Egypt sabu iyames sinat agirotis simatar aiwab orot si agirai .
01047022	Baise motob kaitamom wat Joseph men itotobon on , tafaror asi bainetewarotis asi motob . Osi men fofonin on motob sitobon yabin aiwab orot on osi asi bobo aurin on ibi baiyanis . On mes osi auris agim fofonin asi bayu sitotobon .
01047023	Joseph sabu iyawures iyau , “ Omi woit , yau omi atobonim a ami motob mat engon atobonen aiwab orot aurin . On mes fesi anitem ato ami masauai won tanumen .
01047024	On an rai omi ami masauai bayu won kukuwain on , ami bayu matas engon nim wonaya . Omi matan kaitamom on won boai aiwab orot wonitai ato matas bat on won botan omi ami fesi mes a awawam nanatum mat ami bayu aurin . ”
01047025	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei ai kavian , om on wei ui yawasi . Om am obin on irat kwakwan wei auri ato wei wabi yasisir on wei wanat aiwab orot an agiroti mes wamatar . ”
01047026	On mes Joseph on baifafaro tani iyamai Egypt tafanam aurin . On an ra sabu asi masauai bayu sin kukuwain on , asi bayu matas nim sinaya ato matan kaitamom wat on sin boai aiwab orot sinitai ato matas bat on sin botan osi auris . Atonio baifafaro on ari nana yen . Tafaror an bai netewarotis ekesis wat asi motob on men aiwab orot inoanai on .
01047027	Israel sabu on nana Goshen nan sima Egypt tafanam amonai . Osi on sinat sawarotis simatar a mat nanatus mat on sison kwakwan .
01047028	Jacob on Egypt nan kwanda auyotoat an nimtereban ruam ima . On iyabarai on an kwanda on 147 .
01047029	On an Jacob an wera inat iufin itarab mes , ato on natun Joseph iyor inat ato iyawur iyau , “ Om imam sasanawui eiwan ato uni faro on men arimon Egypt nan un garobiu mes .
01047030	Yau an rarabob an ra on agogoi tatamau sigagarobis on nan won garobiu . Omi Egypt emon won boeu an gat menan tatamau sigagarobis on nan won garobiu . ” Joseph iyafotai iyau , “ Om dura aifan u yau on yau arimon on nanaba ani yamai . ”
01047031	Jacob ikakafun iyau , “ Om auriu eifaro . ” Ato Jacob ifaro iyau on arimon nanaba ini yamai . Namon Jacob on an tutukai iyen bar ato natun Joseph ikakaiwai .
01048001	Wera fani isawar gibunai , Joseph sikasonai on taman on isawau . On mes on nanatun ruam , Manasseh a Ephraim rus iboes ato sinai taman Jacob sit fasiuai mes .
01048002	On an werai Jacob sikasonai on natun Joseph inat in fasiuai mes , Jacob an faiwar engon ibo ato an en bubur efanai imisir imair .
01048003	Jacob on Joseph aurin iyau , “ God Faiwarin Bag , on Lus nan auriu irobotet Canaan tafanamai ato imomogineu .
01048004	On iyawureu iyau , ‘ Yau arimon fifirig sigaraba anitem , on emon arimon om nanatum wawam agirim inarat bag ; yau arimon atonio tafanam on om nanatum wawam agirim anites osi ininoanis au wantoan . ’ ”
01048005	Jacob an dura ibotein iyau , “ Joseph , om nanatum ruam on nin Egypt sirat weie yau anat nin bisimui , osi on yau an boes nanatu mes , Ephraim a Manasseh on yau nanatu bag Reuben a Simeon ba .
01048006	Om nanatum fani gibui sinrarat on om noam , tafanam ato osi inbi noanis on arimon Ephraim a Manasseh rus emon innat .
01048007	Yau atonio bobo abi yamai yabin ayom Rachel on yababan gagamin iteu . Yau Mesopotamia emon amatabir anat Ephrath aurin abi ufin on nan irabob . Yau Ephrath eta rewanai nan agarobai . ” ( Ephrath min ari seyoyorai Bethlehem )
01048008	On an rai Jacob on Joseph nanatun ites , on itetemai iyau , “ Osi fifirig on iyabon ? ”
01048009	Joseph iyafotai iyau , “ Osi on yau nanatu , yau nin Egypt amama on God iteu . ” Jacob iyawur iyau , “ Om fifirg eboes enat auriu ato ani momogines . ”
01048010	Jacob on matan idib yabin on iorokwar bag on mes on men fofonin itites tiwag on . Joseph fifirig iboes sinat aurin ato irousis iboyayanis .
01048011	Jacob on Joseph aurin iyau , “ Yau men anonosin om magim ati tai men on , ato ari God iyamai on om a nanatum mat magim aiten . ”
01048012	Namon Joseph on Jacob atefan emon fifirig ruam ibogaiis ato nanai sindan irou uson itur isur magin motob iruyein .
01048013	Joseph on Ephraim ibo Jacob asun asugagaf ai imairai a Manasseh ibo asun asumaiau ai imairai .
01048014	Baise Jacob on iman iyasbonai asumai au on Ephraim tefanai iyagai , on min giya orot ato iman asugagaf on Manasseh tefanai iyagai , on min ainau orot .
01048015	Namon on Joseph imomoginai iyau ; “ God ato yau tatamau Abraham a Isaac rus aurin sibobo on atonio fifirig eimomogines ! God ato yau ibi netewariu mom inat ari on , atonio osi eimomogines !
01048016	Anea ato komasis engon emon irufafareu on , osi eimomogines ! Yau wabiui , tatamau Abraham a Isaac wabis on atonio fifirig asi yawasai inen , ato nanatus wawas agiris on inison nin tafanamai . ”
01048017	Joseph it on taman iman asumaiau on Ephraim tefanai iyagai on men ibasitai , on mes on Ephraim uninai taman iman ibo it yabonai Manasseh uninai it yagai mes .
01048018	Joseph on taman iyawur iyau , “ Bada , men on nanaba on . Atonio fifi on ainau orot , imam asumaiau on tefanai eyagai . ”
01048019	Baise taman iman men iboseir ato iyau , “ Yau natu , yau asagob aifan abi yamai . Manasseh nanatun wawan agirin an sabu mat on arimon inarat bag , Baise on tain giya orot on arimon inarat gagamin bag men tuan ba , ato on nanatun wawan agirin on an sabu mat on arimon inison bag . ”
01048020	On mes on imomogines ato ibi kakafun i yau “ Israel yangan on bai momogin an rai omi wabim on sin kurereb . Osi arimon sinau , ‘ God it fourim Ephraim a Manasseh rus ba wot matar . ’ ” On an etai on Jacob Ephraim ainau iyein weie Manasseh .
01048021	Namon Jacob on Joseph iyawur iyau , “ Om ato uit , yau kafakai mom anarab , baise God on arimon omi mat ato arimon in boem won matabir men wonan wawam agirim asi tafanamai .
01048022	Yau Shechem tafanam an motob bubusar abitem on om aurim men taitaim tutuam mat auris on . On tafanam min Amor yangan mat au seri a au fidu ai ai gagam asowar a boai on . ”
01049001	Namon Jacob nanatun engon iyores ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi engon newat wonat wo kufifineu ato ra arimon gibui e nat omi aurim aifan in mamatar on an kasonem :
01049002	“ Omi Jacob nanatun , wonat bisiwui womair ato tamam Israel inbi kakafun on won tatam :
01049003	“ Reuben , yau natu ainau orot , om on yau au faiwar , om am rat emon on yau anat tamam amatar . Om on taseseirim a wafatatim nanatu engon tefasi .
01049004	Om on sareu e gat yan egagamatabir ba , baise om men arimon taitaim tutuam uni netewaris on , yabin om yau au goa an bobo jever rum woen . Ato tamam an en bubur efan on men ukakafai .
01049005	“ Simeon a Levi rus on ainau giya . Osi rus sebi basit bonen ato bai gagam sawar sebobo sabu sebi komasis .
01049006	Osi rus dura bubuniai nan sebi kakafun onai on men amosi anar mes a asi bai dudur amosi men ani kakafun on , yabin osi yatatabai on sabu sasububunues a bull seboes sas fifinimes asir yasisir kwarer ba sebi yamen .
01049007	Yau on asi yatatab on audabai , yabin osi on yas sowaris a yau on asi faiwar audabai , yabin osi on tous goyis . Yau on arimon an kugeyis sin tagege sinan mabis mabis Israel tafanam engon in boai ato sinan dam ta ta mat nan sinama .
01049008	“ Judah om taitaim tutuam arimon om sini faim , om ragit arimon anyosi nan unabo unarou . Taitaim tutuam arimon namui sindas sin rouen usos sintur .
01049009	Judah on kuke lion boboun ba , on sabu yasububunues ato emamatabir e nan an ob efanai nan yeinir yen usin ebi yarirai . Men iyafan tani aurin inan in kuneneai on .
01049010	Judah on arimon aiwab an kututu in boai . Ato nanatun wawan agirin arimon ra fufur sini netewar . Judah on nana inbi netewar weie Shiloh innat ato sabu engon tutufin sini fonabo a nanai sindas sin rouen usos sin tur .
01049011	On an donkey kafakai on wengar wine ai iyous etatawar , on wengar wine on obin an babaton . On an sawar on wengar uwan wine mururin kerin tara ba onai esosouen .
01049012	On sareu wine etotoman on mes matan fofous mururis , on yaya kakakaiin etotoman on mes wan kakakaiis .
01049013	“ Zebulun on kamit bisinai inama . On an tore on wa asi awaru obin . On an tafanam arimon inan Sidon mafamai ingat .
01049014	“ Issachar on wawanin donkey ba an sifumama sanasi yeinir yen .
01049015	Baise on it on bai yarir efan on iyobin an babaton . Ato on tafanam on yasisir nuabo efan . On mes on ekwakwafir an bit e kikin ato serukokou ai inabo agirotin ba .
01049016	“ Dan on arimon ini netewar an sabu auris . Osi on arimon Israel amonai dam fani ba .
01049017	Dan on arimon mota ba eta rewanai yen a mota wan rarabob ba on eta sesebinai yen , on horse yai an werai on ann etun egigiai ato orot horse bo ayaiotin on aufut aufut eribirirai esusur .
01049018	“ BADA , yau amomousin Om uni yawasiu mes .
01049019	“ Gad on arimon sabu bainauotis sini ragitai , baise on arimon in rutabir gibusi in faitanis inan .
01049020	“ Asher an tafanamai on arimon bayu obis in tanum in kuwain . On arimon bayu obis in bononoat aiwab orot aurin .
01049021	“ Naphtali on rega an goat jever ba fetag fetag bai yaiotin . On wengar ba fafamen obis eyaya .
01049022	“ Joseph on wengar wine ou bibiro otin ba kibubur sareu bisinai ato fafamen on fafa tefanai sirabon .
01049023	On an ragit wawaninai si ragitai ato si faitan sinai fiduai siyo .
01049024	Baise on an fidu on asir ibotan mom , ato iman iyamen siwani . Jacob an God Faiwarin Bag an faiwarai , Rufafarotin Kaifarotin Wabinai Israel an Tutut Agim .
01049025	On on om tamam an God on ibaisim , God Faiwarin Bag on imomoginem , an bai momogis usan aiyetun emon esusur a kibubur sareu motob emon segeg , a bai momogin ato jever fifirig sigaraba sinitu a bobaitu mat nanatus bobous sinitu .
01049026	Bai momogis om tamam aurin on gagamin bag men ato sawar obis oyau wantoanin an bai momogin ba , bai momogin om tamam aurin on gagamin bag men ato sawar obis oyau atamanis tefasi ba . Yau ababayoi atonio bai momogin on Joseph uninai inan , yabin on arimon innat taitain tutuan nasi intawar ini netewar .
01049027	“ Benjamin on rega an kuke gagamin tutuenin ba . Fomenei on masono yasubunuen yam ato rabirabi on sawar aifan ibobo on eraram . ”
01049028	Atonio on Israel an dam auyotoat an yayatan ruam . Atonio on tamas an bai kakaiu dura osi kakaita kakaita asi yawas mamaba on nanaba auris ikakafun ato imomogines .
01049029	Namon Jacob nanatun ifores iyau , “ Yau on kafakai mom anarab , usiu on tatamau mat agim dogu ato Hitt orot Ephron an motobai won garobiu ,
01049030	agim dogu ato Machpelah motobai Mamre au wera matan na Canaan tafanamai , ato Abraham Hitt orot Ephron emon motob mat itobon gagarob efan mes .
01049031	On nan on Abraham awan Sarah rus a Isaac awan Rebecca rus sigarobis ato Leah min on nan agarob ,
01049032	motob a dogu on Abraham nan Hitt yangan bisisi emon itobon . Omi on nan won garobiu . ”
01049033	On an werai Jacob nanatun dura iyau baiyates isawar , on ann ibo an en bubur efanai iya ato an kanfoun iyaratein ato irabob .
01050001	On an werai Joseph it on taman irabob , on mes on taman irous ibotouousai a magin iboyayanin .
01050002	Namon Joseph an fio orot iyores taman usin sibo titiwagai a fio simutai .
01050003	Fio orot Jacob usin siyayabunagai a fio sibi mutai on ra orot ruam isawar ato Egypt yangan on ra orot ton , orot ta aurin auyotoat on Jacob aurin sitou siyababan .
01050004	On an werai tou yababan isawar gibunai , Joseph on aiwab orot an bai netewarotis iyawures iyau , “ Karun , abi fefeyanim atonio dura wobo wonai aiwab orot aurin :
01050005	‘ On an werai tamau it rabob mes on , on iyawureu aumatanai on Canaan tafanamai toun budi ibotitiwag yen on nan an garobai . On mes karun abi fefeyanim , ei kirireu anan tamau an garobai weie an matabir . ’ ”
01050006	Aiwab orot iyafotai iyau , “ Om unan tamam un garobai , mamaba uyaumatan on nanaba . ”
01050007	On mes Joseph inai taman it garob mes . Egypt aiwab orot an bai netewarotis , kuayo ta ta an bai netewarotis a orot toufumis engon Joseph mat sinai .
01050008	On awan nanatun , taitain tutuan a taman an dam warar engon mat sinai . Osi nanatus gugudis a iyabon men fofonin sitan on sheep , goat a cow mat Goshen tafanamai nan sima .
01050009	Orot on bai gagam wa ato horse seteteinen sai on tafasi sigai simairirin a orot horse tefasi sigai simmair engon mat sinai , kuayo on gagamin bag .
01050010	Osi sinat mafam wabin Atad , Jordan Sareu au wera matan emon on nan sigat . On efanai on sabu sawareg sebobo fefemis seboseseiren ato yabis on mabisi seyaya . Osi nan ra weromin maiau usin si botan fonas gagaminai bag sitararag sibotouousai simama . Joseph on tafaror kaitamom amonai on taman aurin itou iroro .
01050011	On an rai Canaan sabu sites osi Atad nan sitotou on osi siyau , “ Osi Egypt yangan on tou yababan gagamin bag se boai ! ” On fasinai Canaan sabu on efan wabin siyor Abel Mizraim .
01050012	On mes Jacob nanatun mamaba ibi fores on nanaba siyamai .
01050013	Osi usin siyabar sinai Canaan tafanamai ato agim dogu Machpelah motobai nan Mamre bisinai sigarobai . Abraham on Ephron Hitt orot aurin on motob itobon gagarob efan mes .
01050014	Joseph taman igarob isawar gibunai , on taitain tutuan a sabu on mat sinai taman sigagarob on mat simatabir men sinat au Egypt .
01050015	Osi tamas irabob gibunai , Joseph taitain tutuan siyau , “ Ot ainau Joseph aurin komasin tai yamai in binonotai mes on , ari weie wan inyoai . ”
01050016	On mes osi dura siyafar Joseph aurin ato siyau , “ Weie tamam it rabob , on wei auri dura atonio nanaba ikakafun :
01050017	On iyawurei dura atonio nanaba wata wurem mes . ‘ Joseph , karun , yau abi fefeyanim om taitaim tutuam ei notbures , yawas fetag siyamai a bobo komasin bag aurim sifour . ’ Ato ari on wei tamam an God an agiroti , wei ba wabi fefeyanim , karun , om wei einotburei . ’ ” Joseph atonio dura itatam on iyababan itou .
01050018	Namon Jospeh taitain tutuan sinat on nanai sindas sirouen usos situr ato siyawur siyau , “ Wei on om am agiroti . ”
01050019	Baise Joseph iyawures iyau , “ Omi men wonaber mes , yau tou on men fofonin God an efanai an yeiniu mes .
01050020	Omi bubuniai woyanu yau woti komasiu mes , baise God on komasin on iyabatabir obin imatar sabu sigaraba iti yawasis mes , ato on min imatar .
01050021	Omi men aifan tani aurin wonaber mes . Yau arimon omi nanatum mat engon an kaifarem . ” Joseph taitain tutuan dura ai ikufaiwaris ato moa obinai auris ikakafun nunuas ibo .
01050022	Joseph on nana taman an dam warar mat Egypt simama , on an kwanda on 110 weie irabob .
01050023	On imama Ephraim nanatun a wawan sirat ites . On eb on imama natun Manasseh natun Makir nanatun iboes ikaifares sirat on nanatun mes .
01050024	Joseph taitain tutuan iyawures iyau , “ Yau kafakai mom anarab , baise God on dura bag arimon in kaifarem a ini netewarim wongat wonan tafanam ato menan Abraham , Isaac a Jacob auris ibi faro on nan won gat . ”
01050025	Namon Joseph on taitain tutuan ifefeyanis aurin siti faro mes . On iyawures iyau , “ Omi wau mataniu ato woi faro , on an werai God ini netewarim on tafanam aurin won nanan on , omi au rarik wonabo mat wonan . ”
01050026	Joseph ima inai an kwanda 110 ato on Egypt nan irabob . Ato on an fio orot usin sibo titiwagai simutai ato rabobis asi didiwagai siwan .
40001001	Atonio on Iesu Keriso wawan agirin wabis , Iesu on David an dam warar emon , David on Abraham an dam warar emon .
40001002	Abraham irarat an farat inai David irarat an farat , osi wabis on atonio : Abraham on Isaac taman , Isaac on Jacob taman , Jacob on Judah a on taitain tutuan mat on osi tamas ; namon Judah on Perez a Zerah osi tamas ( osi ayos wabin on Tamar ) , Perez on Hezron taman , Hezron on Ram taman , Ram on Amminadab taman , Amminadab on Nahshon taman , Nahshon on Salmon taman , Salmon on Boaz taman ( on ayon wabin min Rahab ) , Boaz on Obed taman , ( On ayon wabin min Ruth ) Obed on Jesse taman , a Jesse on Aiwab David taman .
40001003	
40001004	
40001005	
40001006	David on Solomon taman ( on ayon on orot wabin Uriah on awan ) , Solomon on Rehoboam taman , Rehoboam on Abijah taman , Abijah on Asa taman , Asa on Jehoshaphat taman , Jehoshaphat on Jehoram taman , Jehoram on Uzziah taman , Uzziah on Jotham taman , Jotham on Ahaz taman , Ahaz on Hezekiah taman , Hezekiah on Manasseh taman , Manasseh on Amon taman , Amon on Josiah taman , Josiah on Jehoiachin taitain mat tamas . Atonio an werai on Israel sabu siboes sinai Babylon nan sima .
40001007	
40001008	
40001009	
40001010	
40001011	
40001012	On an werai sabu Babylon simama gibunai an farat on inai Iesu irarat an farat , osi wawas agiris on wabis atonio : Jehoiachin on Shealtiel taman , Shealtiel on Zerubbabel taman , Zerubbabel on Abiud taman , Abiud on Eliakim taman , Eliakim on Azor taman , Azor on Zadok taman , Zadok on Achim taman , Achim on Eliud taman , Eliud on Eleazar taman , Eleazar on Matthan taman , Matthan on Jacob taman , Jacob on Joseph taman , ato Joseph on Mary iawan , ato Mary on Iesu ayon , On orot on seyoyorai , “ Keriso . ”
40001013	
40001014	
40001015	
40001016	
40001017	On mes osi sirarat an farat an farat ato Abraham emon inai David an farat on engon auyotoat sasagis baibatin nanaba a David irarat an farat inai sabu Babylon simama an farat on eb auyotoat sasagis baibatin nanaba a Keriso irarat an farat an farat on eb auyotoat sasagis baibatin nanaba .
40001018	Atonio on Iesu Keriso mamaba irarat on an dudur . On ayon Mary on Joseph aurin siyaumatan rus sittabin mes , baise osi men sitabin an ra on Mary toun isagobai on Ayu Kakafotin emon on inafot .
40001019	Joseph on ra fufur bobo obis wat ifofour baise on men igogoi wasai nan Mary itimamaiai ; on mes on an bainonot iyamai bubuniai nan asi aumatan on itastob mes .
40001020	On atonio bobo aurin on ibinonotai ato Bada an anea on fom Joseph iyenbubur nan bomomoutai aurin irobotet ato iyau , “ Joseph , David an dam warar emon , om Mary baiawanin aurin on men unaber mes . Yabin on Ayu Kakafotin emon on inafot .
40001021	On arimon natun orot inituai ato om wabin unyorai Iesu - yabin On arimon an sabu asi bokomas emon on iniyawasis . ”
40001022	Atonio osi bobo engon tutufin simamatar onai itidura bag mamaba Bada an Aubairuruotin awanai i’yau on , aubairuruotin on dura ato nanaba iyau ,
40001023	“ Jeverei matafin on arimon ininafot ato fifi orot inituai , On arimon sinyorai Immanuel ” ( on an yabin min , “ God on ot mat tamama . ” )
40001024	On an rai Joseph enbubur emon imisir ato Bada an anea mamaba i’yawur on nanaba ifour , Mary ibo iawan .
40001025	Baise Joseph on men fom tani Mary rus usis sikaita weie fifi orot ituai on . Ato Joseph fifi wabin iyor Iesu .
40002001	Iesu on Bethlehem mafam gagamin Judea tafanam amonai on nan irat , on an werai min Herod on aiwab orot imama . Wera men weromin gibunai sabu fani siribod an sagob gigiboanotis on wera matan emon sinat au Jerusalem
40002002	ato osi sitetem siyau , “ Fifi irat Jew yangan asi Aiwab mes on menan nan emama i ? Wei On an siribod wait wera matan emon igai ato wei wanat On wankwafirai mes . ”
40002003	Aiwab Herod on dura itatam mom on inonotai kwakwan a sabu engon tutufin Jerusalem simama osi mat on eb sinonotis kwakwan .
40002004	On an priest aiwabis a an Baifafaro an baibebeotis engon tutufin iyores siruayo ato itetemis iyau , “ Keriso min arimon menan nan inarat ? ”
40002005	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ On arimon Bethlehem mafam gagamin Judea tafanam amonai nan inarat . Yabin aubairuruotin on dura ato nanaba igayam iyau :
40002006	‘ Om Bethlehem mafam gagamim Judea tafanam amonai , om on dura bag gagamim bag Judah tafanam an bainetewarotis engon tefasi , om emon on arimon bainetewarotin tani innat , On arimon innat au sabu Israel yangan asi kaifarotin mes inmatar . ’ ”
40002007	On mes Herod on nanawanotis wera matan emon si’nat on bubuniai nan iyores sinat bisinai siruayo ato on nan itetemis , sikasonai isagob abi werai bag nan on siribod irobotet .
40002008	Namon on atonio duraiai nan iyafares sinai au Bethlehem , on iyau , “ Omi wonan ato fifi on wonnuen tiwag : ato wongagaturai on wonkasoneu ansagob ato yau mat anan an kwafirai . ”
40002009	Ato osi sinai , osi eta nenenai si’nan nan siribod kaitamom ato wera matan nan si’tai on sit men . On siribod on ainau nasi i’nan ato fifi menan i’yen on tefanai nan itawar . Osi on siribod si’tai on men sunub siyasisir on !
40002010	
40002011	Osi sinai goa amonai sirui ato osi fifi sit ayon Mary rus simama on , sindas sirou ato sikwafirai . Osi asi kekes amonai siwar agim gold , wengar tawai yanden ninibin a fifiu seteterai bakur egeg yanden eninib on siboseseiren sisiwarai .
40002012	Namon osi eta taniai simatabir men sinai asi tafanam aurin yabin God on bomomoutai nan iyawures men sinmatabir men Herod aurin .
40002013	Nanawanotis sinai gibunai , Bada an anea on bomomoutai nan irobotet Joseph aurin ato iyau , “ Herod on arimon fifi innuen ato inasubun . On mes om emisir fifi ayon rus eboes ato wonayai wonan au Egypt ato nan wonama weie Yau anawurem on nanaba tafanam wonikirir . ”
40002014	Joseph imisir fifi ayon rus iboes ato fom amonai sinai au Egypt .
40002015	Osi nan nana simama weie Herod irabob . Atonio bobo imatar onai itnat itidura bag mamaba Bada an aubairuruotin awanai i’yau on . On iyau , “ Yau Natu ayor Egypt emon igat . ”
40002016	On an werai Herod isagob nanawanotis wera matan emon si’nat on sisigoai , on mes on yan men sunub itatab . On dura wawaninai iyau wou yangan on fifirig orot gugudis Bethlehem mafam gagamin amonai a on mafam gagamin bisinai mafam gugudis amonai semama osi iyabon asi kwanda ruam a on babanai on sitasububunues mes - on atonio bobo ifour mamaba nanawanotis bisisi emon isasagob on , on an rai siribod irorobotet nan .
40002017	On etaiai mamaba aubairuruotin Jeremaiah i’yau on inat idura bag : On dura ato nanaba iyau ,
40002018	“ Fonas on Ramah mafam gagaminai sitatam , fonas on tou wawaninai bag setotou . Rachel on nanatun auris etotou ; on men egogoi sabu sinkubainunubai yabin osi engon tutufin sirabob on mes . ”
40002019	Herod irabob gibunai , Bada an anea on Egypt nan bomomoutai irobotet Joseph aurin
40002020	ato iyau , “ Om emisir fifi ayon rus eboes , ato unmatabir men unan au Israel tafanam , yabin osi iyabon sifofourtobon fifi sitasubun mes on sirabob . ”
40002021	On mes Joseph imisir fifi ayon rus iboes ato simatabir men sinai au Israel .
40002022	Baise Joseph dura itatam on Archelaus on taman Herod an efan ibo inat Judea yangan asi aiwab orot imatar on , Joseph iber men fofonin nan itan . God on bomomoutai nan Joseph iyaubaiyatai , on mes Joseph inai Galilee tafanamai nan
40002023	ato on inai mafam gagamin wabin Nazareth on nan an goa iyon ima . Ato aubairuruotis dura aifan awasi si’yau on inat idura bag : “ On arimon sinyorai Keriso on Nazareth mafam gagamin an Orot . ”
40003001	On an werai John Bapataito’otin on inat Judea efan koiteterinai nan ato ibosuruf sabu auris dura ibibino .
40003002	On iyau , “ Omi ya baikitabir wonboai yabin safam an Baiaiwab on inat iufin ! ”
40003003	John aurin on aubairuruotin Isaiah ibikakafun , on ato nanaba iyau , “ Orot tani efan koiteterinai eyoyor , ‘ Omi eta wonbotitiwag Bada aurin ; On an eta on totorin wat woniyamai on nan inabib ! ’ ”
40003004	John usin an baitakwakwaren on foro camel bubunin on siyamai nan ibitakwakwarai ; on nenen an kaid on foro korofin on igigin ato on an bayu on bouk on i’yam a manigeu kerin on isusuben .
40003005	Sabu Jerusalem emon sinat ; Judea tafanam au engon emon sinat , a sabu engon tutufin tafanam au engon Jordan Sareu bisinai sen on sinat John aurin .
40003006	Osi asi bokomas siyatet ato John on Jordan Sareuai nan ibapataitois .
40003007	John iyeit Pharisee a Sadducee sigaraba ites on aurin si’nat sitibapataito mes ato on osi auris iyau , “ Omi on mota nanatun — omi on iyafan ikasonem ato God an baimaki iniyafarai mes on wan emon wonayai kirir ?
40003008	Omi osi bobo ami yawasai wonafour iniyoboet tansagob on omi ya baikitabir wobo .
40003009	Ato omi men wonnos toum aurim nunuam amonai wonikakafun wonau , Abraham on wei wawai agiri . Yau awurem God atonio agim inabo ato Abraham an dam warar mes infouren !
40003010	God on kariwak ibotitiwag wengar awerorosi bag nan inasutuenen sinsur ; wengar engon uwas men obis si’nou on arimon inasutuenen sinsur ato wairafai inrebegagaien sinaraten .
40003011	Yau sareuai abibapataitoim on iniyoboet omi on ya baikitabir wobo , baise Orot Iyafan yau gibuwui innat on arimon Ayu Kakafotin a wairafai nan inibapataitoim . On on gagamin bag men yau ba ; yau on men orot obiu on fofonin ann kikiman wat atabar .
40003012	On imanai sif ibo ebotan , on nan sawareg engon tutufin inarou sinafeu . On arimon an sawareg wat on inruayoen bayu an goai nan intubabaren baise On arimon sawareg fefemis on inabo wairafai interen sinaraten ato on wairaf min arimon men inarab on . ”
40003013	On an werai Iesu on Galilee emon inat ato inai John aurin Jordan Sareuai nan John On itibapataitoai mes .
40003014	Baise John ifourtobon itiyamai Iesu nunuan itikitabirai mes . John iyau , “ Om on yau utibapataitoiu ato baise Om unat yau auriu ! ”
40003015	Baise Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Ari wera awurem on asir nanaba unafour mom . Yabin on etaiai ot God an gogoi nanaba on engon obinai wat tanafour . ” On mes John ibasitai on Iesu itibapataitoai mes .
40003016	Iesu ibapataito mom , On sareu emon igai . Namon safam On aurin on iruseren , ato On iyeit God an Ayu it safam emon kiwiu kumag ba isusur ato On tefanai itog .
40003017	Namon fonan safam emon inat iyau , “ Atonio on Yau Tou Natu au nuabo bag , Yau On aurin on abiyasisir . ”
40004001	Namon Ayu on Iesu ibonanawai igat efan koiteterinai nan Afaguban itrutobonai mes .
40004002	Iesu on nan an bayu ambin ima ra orot ruam a fom orot ruam nanaba , ato On bitanan igi .
40004003	Namon Afaguban inat On aurin ato iyau , “ Om God Natun mes on , atonio agim yawures sinikitabires rafi sarar sinmatar . ”
40004004	Baise Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ Orot jever on men fofonin bayu wat inam yawasin inama on , baise dura engon tutufin God ebikakafun on mat inigibubunuai yawasin inama ’ ”
40004005	Namon Afaguban Iesu ibo inai au Jerusalem , Mafam Gagamin Kakafaiinai nan , tafaror goa aiyetunai bag itawarai ,
40004006	ato On aurin iyau , “ Om God Natun mes on , nin emon ne esobit , yabin God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ Om aurim on God arimon an anea auris dura wawaninai inawures ; osi arimon imasi nan sinbogaiim ato Om men arimon amm agimai unkuwotob on . ’ ”
40004007	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ God an dura buk amonai mat sigayam siyau , ‘ Om Bada am God on men unrutobonai mes . ’ ”
40004008	Namon Afaguban on Iesu ibonanawai igat oyau aiyetunai bag nan ato tafanam engon tutufin asi baiaiwab a asi faiwar on iyoboai .
40004009	Afaguban iyau , “ Om yau auriu sindam unrou unkwafireu on , atonio osi sawar engon tutufin on anitem . ”
40004010	Namon Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Afaguban egat enai ! God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ Am Bada God on unkwafirai a On ekesin wat uniagirai ! ’ ”
40004011	Namon Afaguban inai ; ato anea sinat Iesu sibaisin .
40004012	On an rai Iesu dura itatam John on sibo fafatum goai sireberuai , On inai Galilee tafanamai nan .
40004013	On men Nazareth mafam gagaminai nan ima mes baise On inai Capernaum mafam gagaminai nan ima , on mafam gagamin on Galilee kamit bisinai , Zebulun a Naphtali tafanam amonai .
40004014	Atonio bobo imatar onai itnat itidura bag mamaba aubairuruotin Isaiah i’yau on ,
40004015	“ Tafanam Zebulun a tafanam Naphtali , eta inai kamitai igat , mat inai tafanam Jordan Sareu rebanai igat , a Galilee tafanam on sabu men Jew yangan on nan semama !
40004016	Sabu iyabon woumanai semama on arimon ratafin gagamin sinitai . Osi sabu iyabon tafanam rabob an wouman amonai semama on ratafin arimon intagawai . ”
40004017	On an werai Iesu ibosuruf an dura ibino : On iyau , “ Omi ya baikitabir wonboai , yabin safam an Baiaiwab on inat iufin ! ”
40004018	Iesu on Galilee kamit rewanai ibib i’nan , ato On iyeit sabu bosagotis ainau giya ruam on ites , Simon ( on seyoyorai Peter ) a on tain Andrew , osi kamitai nan uwatai sibobosag . Osi asi bobo on iyan sibobo ato sibitotobon .
40004019	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi wonat Yau woigibubunueu ato anibebeyim mamaba sabu wonboes . ”
40004020	Osi ra kaita asi uwat sikiriren ato On sigibubunuai sinai .
40004021	On inai ato iyeit sabu ainau giya ruam ba ites , James a John , osi on Zebedee nanatun . Osi tamas Zebedee mat asi wa tefanai simair uwat sibotitiwagen . Iesu osi iyores ,
40004022	ato osi ra kaita asi wa a tamas mat nan sikirires ato sinai On sigibubunuai .
40004023	Iesu inai Galilee tafanam au engonai bayoi goai nan sabu ibibebeyes , Wasagobin God an Baiaiwab aurin an dura on ibibino a sabu iyabon sawau magis magis siboen on engon ibiyawasis .
40004024	On duran on irat bag Syria tafanam au engon ibonu ato sabu osi iyabon sisasawau , sawau magis magis emon sibikokosaris a usibaban siboai : dau sabu tefasi simama auman , a dau sibiyames sifefeu wakafufus si’gat , a sabu raguraguis , osi siboes sinat on Iesu engon iyawasis .
40004025	Sabu kuayo gagamin on Galilee a mafam gagamis auyotoat emon , Jerusalem emon , Judea a Jordan tafanam reban emon on engon nan sigibubunuai sinat .
