41001041	Iesu on orot aurin iyababan kwakwan , On iman iyotet igat usin iruyein ato iyafotai iyau , “ Yau agogoi om ungumidar , Egumidar ! ”
41001042	Ra kaita orot usinai gawud komasis on sisawaris ato igumidar .
41001043	Namon Iesu orot aurin dura wawaninai iyawur ato ra kaita iyafarai inai ,
41001044	On iyawur iyau , “ Om untatam , atonio bobo imamatar aurin on men iyafan tani unkasonai . Baise om totor wat unan priest on usim ininateteai ; namon om sirifu God aurin unyagai ato Moses an baifafaro dura iyau nanaba on ; onai sabu engon tutufin sinsagob on om ari ugumidar . ”
41001045	Baise orot inai ato ibosuruf dura iyamai irat tafanam au engon ibonu . Dura bag on dura ikakafun kwakwan fasinai Iesu on men fofonin arimon rerebai mafam gagaminai itgat . Baise On tafanam kifafanai nan ima , ato sabu tafanam au engonai on engon aurin sinat .
41002001	Ra fani sisawar gibunai Iesu on imatabir men inai Capernaum mafam gagaminai nan ato sabu On duran sitatam on inat goai .
41002002	Sabu sigaraba maiau sinat goa amonai sirui siruayo ato efan nan on engon ifafar , mat goa metewan awanai on eb efan ifafar . Iesu on wasagobin sabu auris ibibino ,
41002003	ato sabu bat on orot raguraguin sibo sinat Iesu aurin .
41002004	Sabu kuayo on irat bag on mes osi men fofonin arimon orot sitboai sitar Iesu aurin on . On mes osi sigai goa aiyetun ato Iesu imama tefanai nan uwayob sisafef . Osi uwayob sisafef ato orot nan ireai i’yen auman siyeirai isur .
41002005	Iesu it on sabu asi baitutum irat bag on mes orot raguraguin aurin iyau , “ Yau natu , om am bokomas on ainotbur . ”
41002006	Baifafaro an baibebeotis fani nan simama on tous wat sibinonotis ,
41002007	“ On aibo mes dura nanaba ikakafun i ? Atonio Orot on God ebigigimai ! Men orot tani iyafan arimon on an bokomas innotbur on , ab God ekesin mom ! ”
41002008	Iesu on ra kaita isagob sabu mamaba tous wat sibinonotis on , on mes On iyawures iyau , “ Omi aibo mes atonio osi bobo auris on nanaba wobinonotim i ?
41002009	Bobo menan on sasasan atonio orot raguraguin anawur , ‘ Om am bokomas ainotbur , ’ o anau om ‘ Emisir am ire ebogai , ebib ’ ?
41002010	On mes Yau omi aniyoboem wonsagob Orot Natun on an baibad tafanamai yen omi ami bokomas innotbur . ” On mes On orot raguraguin aurin iyau ,
41002011	“ Yau awurem , emisir am ire ebogai ato enai au go ! ”
41002012	Osi sabu engon tutufin siruruai matasi orot imisir an ire ibogai , ibusur mom inai . Sabu engon tutufin on men sunub siduduran God sifain si’yau , “ Ot atonio bobo nanaba on men matati tait on ! ”
41002013	Iesu imatabir men inai Galilee kamit rewanai nan . Sabu kuayo gagamin on aurin sinat siruayo ato On ibosuruf ibibebeyis .
41002014	On ibib i’nan ato iyeit orot agim takes bo’otin on it , on wabin min Levi , Alphaeus natun , on an bobo goa amonai imair imama . Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Om eigibubunueu . ” Levi imisir ato igibubunuai .
41002015	On gibunai Iesu on Levi an goai bayu i’yam . Sabu agim takes bo’otis sigaraba a sabu “ bokomasotis ” fani osi engon on Iesu sibigibubunuai , ato osi sabu engon min nan Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat kemai siruayo bayu si’yam .
41002016	Baifafaro an baibebeotis fani , osi tous min Pharisee , osi sit on sabu “ bokomasotis ” a agim takes bo’otis on engon Iesu mat bayu si’yam , on mes osi On an baigibubunuotis sitetemis siyau , “ On aibo mes sabu ato osi nanaba on mat bayu sam i ? ”
41002017	Iesu osi asi dura on itatam ato iyafotes iyau , “ Sabu iyabon yawasis on men kwakwair orot segogoiai on , baise osi sabu iyabon sawauis wat . Yau men anat sabu asi yawas totoris on an yores mes on , baise Yau anat sabu bokomasotis on an yores mes . ”
41002018	Wera tani John Bapataito’otin on an baigibubunuotis a Pharisee yangan asi baigibubunuotis on bayu sibikirir sibifofour . Sabu fani sinat Iesu sitetemai siyau , “ Aibo mes John Bapataito’otin an baigibubunuotis a Pharisee yangan asi baigibubunuotis mat on bayu sebikirir sebifofour , ato Om am baigibubunuotis mat on ambin ? ”
41002019	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi wononosin on orot tabin boboun tuturan mat on ato tabin an bobaitab amonai bitanan gigi auman sitama ? Ambin bag ! Orot tabin boboun nan amonai mat on , osi bobo arimon men on nanaba sinafour on .
41002020	Baise an wera innat arimon orot tabin boboun osi bisisi emon sinboai sinan weie osi bayu sinikirir sinifofour .
41002021	“ Men iyafan tani beber boboun turin ibo ato usit an baitakwakwaren atamaninai isagirfotai on , ato on bobo nanaba infofour on beber sasagir boboun min arimon insuruf inkadodon ato usit an baitakwakwaren atamanin min arimon insafef dogu gagamin bag inmatar .
41002022	Mat men iyafan tani kibub atamaninai nan sareu wine boboun irir mes , yabin sareu wine an waniai on arimon kibub atamanin intaseb inkomas , ato sareu wine min arimon indebur . Ambin bag ! Sareu wine boboun on kibub bobounai nan inririn . ”
41002023	Sabat an rai ato Iesu on sawareg masau uwarai nan ibib i’nan . On an baigibubunuotis mat sibib si’nan ato osi sibosuruf sawareg sibimarir .
41002024	On mes Pharisee yangan on Iesu aurin siyau , “ Om eite , ot ati baifafaro iyau on sofafar gagamin ato aibo mes Om am baigibubunuotis on ato bobo nanaba Sabat an ra sefofour ! ”
41002025	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi wosagob tiwag dura ato buk amonai sigayam , on nan ekakasonet mamaba David ifour on an werai on igogoi bag aifan i’tan ? On an sabu mat on bitanan igies kwakwan ,
41002026	on mes on God an goai irui ato rafi sarar nan God aurin sikutetai i’yen on iboen iyam . Atonio bobo imamatar an werai on Abiather on Priest Ainauin imama an rai . Ati Baifafaro iyau on priest wat on fofonin atonio rafi sarar sinam — baise David on rafi sarar iyam ato an sabu ba ites siyam . ”
41002027	Iesu an dura kanfounai iyau , “ Sabat ra on orot an obin aurin siyamai ; men orot sifourai Sabat ra aurin on .
41002028	On mes Orot Natun min Sabat ra an Bada . ”
41003001	Namon Iesu imatabir men inai bayoi goai nan ato orot iman raguraguin auman min nan imama .
41003002	Sabu fani on nan sigogoi Iesu sitiubarai ato bobo komasis itfofour on ; on mes osi sibinakikinai tiwag On mamaba ato orot nan Sabat ra itbiyawasai on .
41003003	Iesu orot raguraguin aurin iyau , “ Om egai nin nawui etawar . ”
41003004	Namon On sabu itetemis iyau , “ Ot ati Baifafaro mamaba iyau ot ato Sabat ra nan bobo tanfofour aurin on ? Orot tanibaisin o orot tanikomasai ? Orot taniyawasai o orot tanirabobai ? ” Baise osi sabu on men abi dura tani siyau on .
41003005	Iesu irutabir osi ites on yan itatab ato baise On osi sabu auris iyababan mat yabin osi nunuas siwani kwakwan a eta mat sisarar . Namon On orot aurin iyau , “ Om imam yotet egat . ” On iman iyotet igat ato iyobin men .
41003006	On mes Pharisee yangan on bayoi goa sikirir sinai ato ra kaita Herod an sabu fani mat nan siruayo ato siyanu Iesu sitasubun mes .
41003007	Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat sinai au Galilee kamitai nan ato sabu kuayo gagamin on On sibigibubunuai . Osi sabu on Galilee tafanam emon , Judea tafanam emon sinat ,
41003008	Jerusalem emon , Idumea tafanam emon , Jordan tafanam reban emon , mafam gagamis bisisi Tyre a Sidon emon sinat . Atonio osi sabuis kuayo gagamin on engon tutufin sinat Iesu aurin yabin osi On duran sitatam on bobo buburis ifofouren .
41003009	Sabu siruruayo on kuayo irat bag on mes Iesu an baigibubunuotis iyawures wa sitboai sitbotitiwag onai On men sabu mat sitikikin mes .
41003010	Iesu on sabu sigaraba maiau iyawasis ato osi sabu iyabon sawauis on sibirukokouen asi eta sibiyamai Iesu aurin sirur usin sitbotobon mes .
41003011	Ato sabu on nan osi iyabon ayu komasis tefasi simama , osi siyeit Iesu si’tai on nan nanai sifefeu ato sibiyoku si’yau , “ Om on God Natun ! ”
41003012	Iesu dura wawaninai nan ayu komasis iyawures osi men sitkason On on Iyafan .
41003013	Namon Iesu inai oyauai igai ato On an gogoi sabu on iyores . Osi On aurin sinat ,
41003014	ato On sabu auyotoat sasagis ruam irubinis , iwabis baiyoyobotis . On iyawures iyau , “ Omi arubinem on Yau au baiyoyobotim mes wonmatar . Mat Yau arimon omi aniyafarem wongat dura wonbino ,
41003015	ato omi arimon ami baibad wonboai dau wonfaitanis singat . ”
41003016	On atonio osi sabu auyotoat sasagis ruam irurubinis on : Simon ( Iesu wabin itai , Peter ) ;
41003017	James tain John rus , ( Iesu wabis ites on , Boanerges , on an yabin min , “ Wanferer sabuis ” ) ;
41003018	Andrew , Philip , Bartholomew , Matthew , Thomas , James , Alphaeus natun , Thaddaeus , Simon , tafanam an rufafar orot ,
41003019	Judas Iscariot , on Iesu ikaseirai .
41003020	Namon Iesu inai au go . Ato sabu kuayo gagamin bag on nan siruayo men ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat on auris wera men fofonin arimon bayu sitam on .
41003021	Iesu taitain on duran sitatam ato sigat sitboai mes yabin sabu on si’yau , “ On ikokok ! ”
41003022	Baifafaro an baibebeotis fani osi Jerusalem emon sinat on si’yau , “ On Orot on Beelzebul tefanai emama ! Dau asi aiwab on faiwar ebitai on mes On dau efafaitanis segat . ”
41003023	On mes Iesu on sabu iyores sinat aurin ato dura kawenai auris ikakafun iyau , “ Mamaba arimon Afaguban on toun turan Afaguban infaitan ingat ?
41003024	Tafanam ato toun wat itkuseseb itiyamai kuayo matas matas sitmatar weie tous wat sitigagam on tafanam min arimon engon ittumai itsawar .
41003025	Ato goa amonai taitais tutuas mat tous wat amosi sitkuseseb kuayo matas matas sitmatar weie tous wat sitigagam , on goa amonai taitais tutuas mat min arimon sittumai itsawar .
41003026	On mes ato Afaguban an baiaiwab itkuseseb kuayo matas matas , on men arimon iten on , ab arimon ittumai itan au kanfoun itsawar .
41003027	“ Men iyafan tani orot wawanin an goa inaseb inar an sawar inbainau , ab on ainau on orot wawanin on inous tatan ; weie on an goa inyakeai .
41003028	Yau awurem dura bag sabu asi bobo komasis sinfofour a asi dura komasis God aurin sinbikakafun on arimon innotbures .
41003029	Baise iyai iyafan dura komasis Ayu Kakafotin aurin inbikakafun on God arimon men innotburai yabin on bokomas ifofour on arimon an yawas amonai on nana inen au wantoan . ”
41003030	( Iesu atonio dura ikakafun yabin sabu fani si’yau , “ On dau tefanai emama . ” )
41003031	Namon Iesu ayon a taitain sinat . Osi goa kounai sitawar ato dura wat siyafar irui aurin sitetem .
41003032	Sabu kuayo on Iesu sikufifinai simair simama ato osi siyawur siyau , “ Eite ayom , taitaim a rorobum on goa kounai setatawar , ato osi segogoi Om sinitem . ”
41003033	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Iyafan on Yau ayou ? Iyabon on Yau taitaiu ? ”
41003034	On iyeit sabu sikufifinai simair simama on ites ato iyau , “ Woit ! Nin on Yau ayou , Yau taitaiu !
41003035	Iyai iyafan God an gogoi nanaba efofour on Yau taitaiu , Yau rorobu , Yau a’you . ”
41004001	Iesu on Galilee kamit rewanai nan baibebe ibosuruf men . Sabu kuayo gagamin nan siruruayo on irat kwakwan on aurin On wayai ikaruge imair . Wa on sibo sigat kamitai nan iyoyot ato sabu engon tutufin on kamit rewanai nan sitawar .
41004002	On dura kawenai wat nan bobo sigaraba auris on sabu ibebeyis , On iyawures iyau :
41004003	“ Omi dura wontatam ! Ra tani orot bofefesotin igat inai masauai nan sawareg itbofefes mes .
41004004	On sawareg fesi masauai nan irebenen , sawareg fani on etai sifeuen ato kiwiu sinat siyam sisawaris .
41004005	Sawareg fani on motob amonai a’gim auman on tefanai sifeuen ato motob nan on kafakakai wat . Fesi on sasasan wat sikubouis sigai yabin on motob on men babadoan bag on mes .
41004006	Namon wera igai ifoforab on fesi bobous siyaraten yabin min fesi aweroros on men sisur tiwag , on mes fesi min men weromin engon simamau .
41004007	Fesi fani on gabarur amosi sifeuen ato gabarur sigai fesi sitoutanis ato sawareg yabis min men siya on .
41004008	Baise fesi fani on motob obinai sifeuen ato fesi sikubobouis sigai yabis siya : Sawareg fani yabis on orot kaitamom auyotoat nanaba siya , fani on orot ton nanaba siya ato fani on orot nim nanaba siya . ”
41004009	Iesu an dura kanfounai iyau , “ Omi sabu er tainam aumas on Yau atonio dura abikakafun on wontatam tiwag ! ”
41004010	Iesu ekesin mom weie , sabu fani iyabon On an dura sitatamai on , an baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam mat sinat aurin sigat ato sitetemai , dura kawen an yabin on itau bubunag sittatam mes .
41004011	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi on God an Baiaiwab an sagob buburin on item nono , baise sabu fani iyabon koun yangan on dura kawenai wat setatam ,
41004012	onai , ‘ Osi arimon matas sineit wat sineit wat , baise men sinitai . Osi dura sintatam wat sintatam wat , baise men sinsagob . Ato osi on bobo sinsasagob mes on osi sinrutabir God aurin ato On innotbures . ’ ”
41004013	Namon Iesu itetemis iyau , “ Omi atonio dura kawen an yabin min wosagob i ? Omi meyan emon weie dura kawen an yabin tani wonsagob .
41004014	Orot bofefesotin on God an dura ebofefes .
41004015	Sabu fani on ato fesi etai sifefeu ba ; osi on dura setatam ato Afaguban enat eboai enan .
41004016	Sabu fani on ato fesi motob amonai a’gim auman on tefanai sifefeu ba ; osi on dura setatam mom , on yasisirai wat seboai .
41004017	Baise baibebe on men seboai nunuasi erur tiwag on , on mes men weromin sebokikin . On mes bobo komasis a baikokosar ato wasagobin fasinai erur eboes on osi ra kaita sebikirir .
41004018	Sabu fani on ato fesi gabarur amosi sifefeu ba . Osi on dura setatam ,
41004019	baise atonio tafanam an yawasai on asi nuabo on sawar an baiaiwab aurin on nan seyeyeinin a asi gogoi ta ta on nunuas ebibonues ato dura min ebotan ato yabis men seyaya .
41004020	Baise sabu fani on ato fesi motob obinai sifefeu ba , osi on dura setatam seboai ato uwas seyaya on , fani orot kaitamom auyotoat nanaba , fani on orot ton nanaba a fani on orot nim nanaba . ”
41004021	Iesu dura ibotein iyau , “ Omi men iyafan tani tafa ibo irui ramo babanai iwan o babar babanai iyein ? Aibo mes on men tafa an tatawarai itrou ?
41004022	Sawar aifan ebibuni yen on arimon ingat au rereb a sawar aifan esasabutan on arimon singaturai .
41004023	Omi sabu er tainam aumas on Yau atonio dura abikakafun on wontatam tiwag ! ”
41004024	Mat On iyawures iyau , “ Omi wonnos tiwag ato dura wotatam on ! Omi baifafaro kaitamomai nan tuturam wobigurubabanis on nanaba God arimon baifafaro kaitamomai nan inigurubabanim - baise On arimon wawaninai bag inigurubabanim .
41004025	Orot iyafan aurin sawar sen on arimon sigaraba bag sinitai ato orot iyafan aurin sawar ambin on arimon sinabaruai basit on aurin kafakakai wat yen min on . ”
41004026	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ God an Baiaiwab on ato nanaba . Orot fesi iboen an masauai irebenen .
41004027	On fom on iyenbubur , ato rai on imimisir ibidadanam an bobo ibobo ato fesi on sikubobouis sigeg gagamis bag simatar . Baise on men isasagob mamaba simamatar .
41004028	Motob toun wat iyamai fesi sigai uwas siya : ainau on nenen iyein namon uwan iyein , weie sawareg yabis simatar .
41004029	Sawareg simari weie orot ibosuruf an nikokai itaren , yabin min mari an wera on inat on mes . ”
41004030	Iesu itetemis iyau , “ God an Baiaiwab aurin on mamaba tanau ? Abi dura kawen onai ot tanau bubunag ?
41004031	Ato nanaba . Orot aigab foun eboai , on foun on ikafakakai bag nin tafanamai ato on motobai etatanum .
41004032	On gibunai , men weromin ato aigab egeg weroromin bag emamatar , men fesi fani ba . On fafamen on gagamis bag eyaya ato kiwiu senat aigab fafamesi nan asi batar seyoyon ! ”
41004033	Iesu an wasagobin on sabu auris ibino , On dura kawenai atonio osi bobo nanaba on sigaraba maiau ikakafunen ; On iyawures titiwag mamaba an dura on sitsagob tiwag aurin on .
41004034	On ra fufur dura kawenai wat on sabu auris ibidudur , baise On ekesin mom weie On an baigibubunuotis wat auris on dura iyau bubunag .
41004035	On wera kaitamomai ibirabirabi ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Ot tanrabon kamit rebanai nan tangat . ”
41004036	On mes osi sabu kuayo gagamin sikirires ato baigibubunuotis on wayai sikaruge , Iesu on ainau wayai ikaruge imama nono ato On sibo mat sirabon . Wa fani min mat nan .
41004037	Ra kaita yabat kuyabobot gagamin isisin ato yawarad ibosuruf wa ibiwan , ato kafakakai mom wa amonai sareu wat itbonu .
41004038	Iesu on wa sifunai nan unin uwanai iyein iyenbubur . Baigibubunuotis on Iesu sibaban imisir ato siyawur siyau , “ Baibebeotim , Om men ebisosoan ot aurit , ot on kafakakai mom tanarab ? ”
41004039	Iesu imisir itawar ato dura wawaninai yabat iyawur iyau , “ Asunub ! ” ato On yawarad ba iyawur , “ Esirimomo ! ” Ato yabat itutu nurob anbabaton iyen .
41004040	Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Omi aibo mes wobeber i ? Omi nana men wobitutum ? ”
41004041	Baise osi on totor siber kwakwan ato tous wat siyau bonen , “ Atonio Orot on Iyafan ? Yabat yawarad min engon On fonan setatam ! ”
41005001	Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat sinat Galilee kamit rebanai , Garasa tafanam amonai .
41005002	Iesu wa emon igat mom on , ra kaita orot tani nan rasi emon igat inefotai . Atonio orot on ayu komasin tefanai igai ,
41005003	ato rasi dogu amosi imama . Orot men iyafan tani fofonin arimon itfatumai on ;
41005004	ra sigaraba maiau on orot on ann iman sifatumen , baise ra fufur on ann iman fafatum auman on engon iyabarutuenen a kiram anai mat iyaseseben . On iwani kwakwan men fofonin arimon orot iyafan tani ititotorai .
41005005	Fom ra on orot fetag fetag nan rasi amosi a oyau tefasi nan ibiyoku ibibib , ato on toun wat agimai nan ibotatarai auman .
41005006	On orot on kafakakai nanenei nan iyeit Iesu it ; ato on iyayai inai nanai nan ifeu sindan irou ,
41005007	ato fonan gagaminai iyoku iyau , “ Iesu , God Natun Aiyetunenei Bag ! Om aifan aurin yau egogoiiu ? God Wabinai abifefeyanim Om men unimakieu mes ! ”
41005008	( On atonio dura nanaba iyau , yabin Iesu min iyau , “ Ayu komasin , om atonio orot on eikirir egat ! ” )
41005009	On mes Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Om wabim mamaba i ? Orot iyafotai iyau , “ Yau wabiu on ‘ Sigaraba ’ wei on ison kwakwan ! ”
41005010	On nana Iesu ibifefeyanai men ayu komasis itiyafares on tafanam emon sitgat mes .
41005011	Foro unis sigaraba on auwatin nan oyau sesebinai bayu si’yam .
41005012	On mes osi ayu komasis on Iesu sifefeyanai siyau , “ Eiyafarei wanan foro tefasi wanag . ”
41005013	On ikirires sinai , ato ayu komasis orot sikirir sigat ato foro tefasi sigai . Foro unis engon 2,000 nanaba on anag rebanai nan siyayai sisur sinai kamitai ato engon siyamtotom .
41005014	Sabu osi iyabon nan foro sikakaifares on atonio bobo imatar sit on siyayai sinai mafam gagamis amosi a masau guwi amosi nan dura sikason . Sabu sigat sinai bobo aifan imatar on sititai mes ,
41005015	ato osi sinat Iesu aurin on , orot ra engon dau sigaraba tefanai simama on nan sit . On orot on unin itotorai ato ara siyotai nan imair imama si’tai on osi engon siber .
41005016	Osi sabu iyabon tous matasi sit bobo aifan imatar a orot tefanai dau simama aurin a foro auris mat on engon sabu sikasones .
41005017	On mes osi Iesu sifefeyanai asi tafanam itikirir itgat mes .
41005018	Iesu wayai ikakaruge mom on , orot tefanai dau sigaraba simama on aurin ifefeyanai iyau , “ Eboeu rut tanan ! ”
41005019	Baise Iesu men ibasit , baise On iyawur iyau , “ Om enai au go am dam warar auris , ato Bada mamaba om aurim ibobo a mat On mamaba an nuabo aurim ifofour on unkasones . ”
41005020	On mes orot inai mafam gagamis auyotoat nanaba amosi nan sabu engon tutufin ikasones mamaba Iesu aurin iboen on . Ato osi engon tutufin on dura sitatam on siduduran kwakwan .
41005021	Iesu on wayai imatabir men irabon kamit rebanai nan . On nan kamit rewanai on sabu kuayo gagamin on nan siruayo sikufifinai .
41005022	Orot wabin Jairus on bayoi goa an orot gagamin on inat ato Iesu it mom on nanai sindan irou ,
41005023	on an faiwar tutufinai nan ifefeyanai iyau , “ Yau natu jeverei on isawau kwakwan . Arie Om utnat imam wat on usin utbotobon ato ityawas itama ! ”
41005024	Namon Iesu orot rus sibosuruf sinai . Sabu sigaraba maiau on Iesu mat sesebin reban reban on sikuayo sikikin mom si’nan .
41005025	Ato jever tani nan imama on usinai abiou wawanin isusur ibikokosarai on kwanda auyotoat sasagis ruam nanaba isawar ,
41005026	on jever on kwakwair sabu sigaraba maiau ites ato sifioai . On an agim gagamin maiau ireben baise osi jever baiyawasin mes sifofour on ra au engon an sawau on irarat bag .
41005027	Jever on Iesu duran itatam , on mes on sabu kuayo gagamin amosi inat Iesu kounai igat ,
41005028	jever toun wat aurin ikakafun iyau , “ Yau asir an beber wat anruyein on arimon anyawas . ”
41005029	Jever on Iesu an beber iruyein ato ra kaita usinai abiou isusur on isawar ; on an nanianai wat itatam on usin amonai an komasin emon on iyawas nono .
41005030	Ra kaita Iesu isagob On an faiwar On emon on igat ato irutabir sabu kuayo gagamin amosi itetemis iyau , “ Iyafan Yau au beber iruyein i ? ”
41005031	On an baigibubunuotis siyafotai siyau , “ Om eit sabu mamaba aurim seruruayo on ; Om aibo mes utetem uyau iyafan iruyeiniu ? ”
41005032	Baise Iesu on nana irutatabir ititai on iyafan on bobo ifour .
41005033	Jever toun isagobai on aurin aifan imatar , ato on iber ann iman sibiror auman inat Iesu annai nan sindan irou ato dura bag wat ikasonai .
41005034	Iesu on jever aurin iyau , “ Natu jeverei , om am baitutum emon on uyawas . Om tufai unan am komasin emon on uyawas . ”
41005035	Iesu on dura nana jever aurin ibikakafun ato sabu dura bobibotis fani Jairus an goa emon sinat ato siyawur siyau , “ Om natum jeverei on irabob . Om baibebeotin men unisababanai mes ! ”
41005036	Iesu on men osi asi dura aifan si’yau on itatam on , ab On Jairus iyawur iyau , “ Om men unaber mes , asir unitutum mom . ”
41005037	Namon On sabu iyoutanis ato On Peter , James a tain John osi wat iboes mat sinai ,
41005038	osi sinat Jairus an goai nan sigat ato Iesu it on sabu sibisiger , On itatamis osi on sitotou si’tararag .
41005039	On goai igai irui ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi aibo mes nin wobisiger ? Omi aibo mes wototou ? Jeverei on men irabob , - on asir yenbubur mom ! ”
41005040	Sabu on sibosuruf Iesu sibikoboai sisererai on mes On sabu engon tutufin ifaitanis sigat au koun ato On jeverei ayon , taman a baigibubunuotis ton , osi wat on iboes goa amonai sirui menan jeverei an efanai i’yen on nan .
41005041	Iesu on jeverei imanai ibo ato iyawur iyau , “ Talitha koum . ” on an yabin min , “ Jeverei kafakakaim , awurem , emisir ! ”
41005042	Jeverei ra kaita imisir ato ibosuruf ibibib . ( On jeverei an kwanda on auyotoat sasagis ruam wat . ) Atonio bobo imatar aurin on sabu engon tutufin on men sunub siduduran on .
41005043	Baise Iesu dura wawaninai sabu iyawures on men iyafan tani sitkasonai mes ato iyau , “ Omi jeverei bayu woitai inam . ”
41006001	Iesu on efan ikirir ato imatabir men inai an goa mafam aurin , On an baigibubunuotis mat On sigibubunuai sinai .
41006002	Sabat an rai On ibosuruf bayoi goai nan sabu ibibebeyes . Sabu sigaraba maiau nan On an dura si’tatam on engon siduduran . Osi sitetem siyau , “ On atonio osi bobo engon on mamaba isagob ? On min abi sagob gigiboan on sitai ? On bobo buburis on mamaba efofour semamatar ?
41006003	On min goa baigoyonotin , On min Mary Natun , a On taitain James , Joseph , Judas a Simon ? Ai On rorobun min nin semama i ? ” On mes osi engon tutufin sisisiweiai .
41006004	Iesu iyawures iyau , “ Aubairuruotin on menan menan enan on engon sekakafai ato Toun an mafam gagaminai bag On an dam warar a Toun an goa amonai on ambin . ”
41006005	On mes On bobo buburis men fofonin nan itfouren on , ab On asir iman wat sabu sawauis fani ibotobonis ato siyayawas .
41006006	Iesu on totor men sunub iduduran yabin sabu asi baitutum on ambin . Namon Iesu inai mafam goa amosi nan sabu ibibebeyes .
41006007	On baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam iyores siruayo ato ruruam ruruam iyafares sigat . On faiwar ites ayu komasis sinfaitanis singat mes ,
41006008	ato On dura wawaninai iyawures iyau , “ Omi men sawar aifan tani wonboai ami bib amonai mes ab siwa wat on wonboai , omi men rafi sarar , men kukufet wonboai , men agim tani ami ara’ai wonikamabinen mes .
41006009	Omi amm kikiman on woniwanim , baise men usim an baitakwakwaren tani wonboai mes . ”
41006010	Mat On iyawures iyau , “ Omi wonan mafam gagaminai nan sabu sinbikakaiwim on nan goa kaitamom amonai wonama weie on mafam gagamin on wonikirir wonan .
41006011	Omi wonnat on efanai nan wongat ato sabu men sinbikakaiwim a ami dura men sintatam on , wonikirires ato ammui fofou wonrutataben sinsur ato wonan . Atonio bobo on iniyoboes osi on sibokomas ! ”
41006012	Ato osi sigat dura sibino sabu auris osi ya baikitabir sitboai mes .
41006013	Osi ayu komasis on sigaraba sifaitanis sigat ato olive an momonai nan sabu sigaraba simutes ato siyawas .
41006014	Aiwab Herod on atonio bobo engon simamatar on duran itatam yabin Iesu an dudur on irat tafanam engon ibonu . Sabu fani on si’yau , “ John Bapataito’otin on iyawas men emama ! On mes on atonio faiwar ibo ato osi bobo buburis efofour . ”
41006015	Baise sabu fani on si’yau , “ On on Elijah . ” Sabu fani on si’yau , “ On aubairuruotin tani , ainau bag aubairuruotis fani simama ba . ”
41006016	Herod on dura itatam on iyau , “ On on John Bapataito’otin ! Yau on anjon asutin itutu baise on iyawas men emama ! ”
41006017	Herod toun dura wawanin iyau John fatumin aurin , ato on ann iman sifatumen fafatum goai sireberuai . Herod atonio bobo on Herodias fasinai on ifour , on toun tain tuan Philip awan on iyabaruai .
41006018	John Bapataito’otin on nana Herod i’yawur , “ Om men ibasit taim tuam awan on utiawan ! ”
41006019	Herodias on igogoi bag John itasubun on mes on ibimagigirai baise Herod emon on mes men fofonin aifan itafour on .
41006020	Herod min John aurin ibeber yabin on isagob John on orot obin a kakafotin , on mes on obinai wat ikakaifarai . John an dura ra engon ibikakafun Herod itatam on ibinonotai kwakwan baise on nana igogoi an dura ittatam .
41006021	On gibunai Herodias an eta igaturai . Herod irarat ra aurin on an forag ibotitiwag on an gawan babadis ainauis auris , wou yangan asi babadis gagamis auris , a Galilee yangan asi babadis gagamis auris .
41006022	Herodias natun jeverei irui isau , Herod an sabu mat iyasisires . On mes aiwab orot jeverei aurin iyau , “ Om aifan egogoi unboai ? Om am gogoi sawar aifan aurin u’nau on arimon anitem . ”
41006023	On an aumatan sigaraba auris on ifaro iyau , “ Yau aumatanim om am gogoi aifan aurin u’nau on arimon engon tutufin anitem , mat fofonin au baiaiwab turin ankuseb anitem ! ”
41006024	Ato jeverei igat ayon itetemai iyau , “ Dad yau abifan aurin on anifefeyanai i ? ” Ayon iyafotai iyau , “ John Bapataito’otin unin . ”
41006025	Ra kaita jeverei sasasan wat imatabir men irui aiwab orot iyawur iyau , “ Yau ari bag agogoi John Bapataito’otin unin nin ramoai uniwan uniteu ! ”
41006026	Atonio dura iyamai aiwab orot on iyababan kwakwan baise on men fofonin jeverei aurin itifonaseir yabin on an baifaro on iyamen nono an sabu matasi .
41006027	On mes aiwab orot on ra kaita goa an kaifarotin iyafarai an dura fofoninai John Bapataito’otin unin itboai itmatabir men . Goa kaifarotin inai au fafatum goa , ato John Bapataito’otin anjon iyasutin itutu ;
41006028	namon on ramoai iwan ibo imatabir men jeverei itai ato jeverei ibo ayon itai .
41006029	John an baigibubunuotis on bobo aifan imamatar on dura sitatam ato sinat John usin sibo sinai sigarob .
41006030	Baiyoyobotis simatabir men Iesu sinefotai ato bobo mamaba sibobo a sabu sibibebeyes on engon tutufin sikasonai .
41006031	Sabu sigaraba maiau on si’nan si’nat ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat on wera men fofonin arimon bayu sitam on . On mes On iyawures iyau , “ Ot ekesit wat tanan efan tani kifafanai nan ato omi kafakakai woniyarir . ”
41006032	On mes osi sibosuruf ekesis mom wa sibo sinai efan kifafanai nan .
41006033	Baise sabu sigaraba maiau on osi sites on ra kaita sisagobis osi on iyabon , on mes osi sabu on mafam gagamis sigaraba emon sigat ababai siyayai mom sinai Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat sigiseires ato osi ainau sinat on efanai nan sigat .
41006034	Iesu wa emon igat mom , On atonio sabu kuayo gagamin ites on , On sabu auris nunuan iyababan yabin osi on foro sheep ba ato asi kaifarotin on ambin . On mes On ibosuruf bobo sigaraba auris on sabu ibebeyes .
41006035	Wera isusur ibosuruf ibirabirabi ato On an baigibubunuotis sinat ato siyau , “ Wera isawar nono , ato nin on efan kifafan wat .
41006036	Sabu eiyafares sinan atonio auwatin nan masau guwiai a mafam gugudis nan osi tous asi bayu sintobonen sinam . ”
41006037	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi toum ami bayu on wonites sinam . ” Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Om egogoi wei wanan agim 200 kina nanaba wanreben rafi sarar wantobonen ato sabu wanibayues ? ”
41006038	Iesu itetemis iyau , “ Omi wonai woit , rafi sarar biyam nanaba aurim sen ? ” Osi sigaturen ato siyawur siyau , “ Rafi sarar on nim nanaba ato iyan on ruam mom . ”
41006039	Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis iyawures iyau , “ Omi sabu wokusesebis matas matas nan wayoai sinmairirin . ”
41006040	Ato sabu on an sanaf an sanaf nanaba simairirin , matas orot nim a matas orot ruam auyotoat nanaba .
41006041	Namon Iesu rafi sarar nim a iyan ruam iboen au safam itage ato God aurin ikakaiu . On rafi sarar iyabaseseben an baigibubunuotis ites ato sabu siraramis . Iyan ruam mat engon siraramis .
41006042	Sabu engon tutufin siyam siyakokor .
41006043	Namon On an baigibubunuotis kaifet siboen sarar a iyan tuturis sibiwanen on kaifet auyotoat sasagis ruam awas sibonuen .
41006044	Ato orot wat kuayo gagamin on 5,000 nanaba on sibayues .
41006045	Ra kaita Iesu an baigibubunuotis iyawures wayai sikaruge ato osi ekesis wat ainau sitan au Bethsaida nan kamit rebanai , weie On sabu kuayo gagamin itiyafares sitan mes .
41006046	On an baigibubunuotis iyau baitotoris si’nan gibunai On igai oyauai nan itbayoi mes .
41006047	Ibirabirabi an werai on baigibubunuotis asi wa on kamit basunai nan ato Iesu on ekesin mom motobai .
41006048	On iyeit an baigibubunuotis ites on wa siboboi wat on men fofonin yabin yabat on nasi emon isisin ato fomenei ra awan nanaba on Iesu kamit tefanai ibib inai auris . On kamit tefanai ibib i’nan itigiseires mes ,
41006049	baise osi siyeit On sit on kamit tefanai ibib inan . Osi sinos on “ Dau orot ! ” On mes osi siyoku .
41006050	Osi On sit on siber kwakwan . Ra kaita Iesu osi auris ikakafun iyau , “ Omi nunuam sinwani ! Nin on Yau , omi men wonaber mes ! ”
41006051	Namon On wayai ikaruge auris , ato yabat itutu . Baigibubunuotis on totor siduduran kwakwan ,
41006052	yabin sabu 5,000 sibibayues an yabin bag on osi men sisagob a mat osi asi not on engon ifot .
41006053	Osi kamit sirabon sinai au Gennesaret nan , ato asi wa siyous iyoyot .
41006054	Osi asi wa sibikirir mom on ra kaita sabu on Iesu sit sisagob .
41006055	On mes osi sabu on tafanam engon amonai siyayai sinai ato dura sitatam Iesu menan menan i’nan on osi sabu sawauis ireai si’yen auman siboes sinat aurin .
41006056	Ato Iesu efan menan nan i’nan au mafam goa , au mafam gagamis a masau guwiai nan sabu sawauotis siboes si’nan baitotobon efanai nan sibifefeyanai itibasites an beber rewan wat sitruyein . Ato osi Iesu an beber wat siruruyein on engon siyayawas .
41007001	Pharisee yangan a Baifafaro an baibebeotis fani on Jerusalem emon sinat ato siruayo Iesu sikufifinai .
41007002	Osi sisagob Iesu an baigibubunuotis fani on men imas sisosouen weie bayu si’yam on - Pharisee yangan sau on sabu on imas men an etai bag sesosouen weie bayu sam on .
41007003	( Osi Pharisee yangan tous a Jew yangan fani mat on wawas a agiris asi baibebe sibites on sebigibubunuai : osi on imas an etai bag sesosouen tiwag weie bayu sam ;
41007004	on eb baitotobon an efan emon bayu sebobo senat on ainau sesosouen weie gibui sam . Osi on baifafaro sigaraba sibites on nanaba sebigibubunuen , ato an etai bag nan viga , naukwat , ramo a babar on engon sesosouen . )
41007005	On mes Pharisee yangan a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on Iesu sitetemai siyau , “ Om aibo mes am baigibubunuotis on men atonio wawat agirit asi baibebe sibitet on sebigibubunuai on , baise osi on imas duma aumas bayu sam ? ”
41007006	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Isaiah on dura bag omi aurim on ikakafun ! ‘ Omi on baisigogo’otim , on nanaba igayam : God iyau , ‘ Atonio osi sabuis on duraiai wat on Yau sekakafeu baise osi nunuas Yau auriu on totor nanenei bag sen .
41007007	Osi on men dura bag Yau sekwakwafireu on , yabin osi on orot jever baifafaro sifofour on sebibebeyes , on sitau osi on God an baifafaro bait ! ’
41007008	“ Omi on God an baifafaro dura wobisisiwei ato orot jever asi baibebe on auris wobifonabo . ”
41007009	Ato Iesu dura ibotein iyau , “ Omi on eta wosagob tiwag maiau God an baifafaro dura on wobisisiweiai ato omi toum ami baibebe on woboai .
41007010	Yabin Moses an baifafaro iyau , ‘ Ayom tamam wonkakafes , ’ ato ‘ Iyai iyafan dura komasis ayon , taman auris inbikakafun on sinirabobai . ’
41007011	Baise omi on orot o jever wobibebeyis on aifan sawar eboai on ayon taman inibaisis mes , ab on yau , ‘ Nin in men omi anibaisim , Nin on Corban ’ ( an yabin min on God noan . )
41007012	On bobo nanaba wobibebeyes ato ayos tamas on arimon men sinibaisis on .
41007013	Atonio etaiai on omi ato baibebe sabu fani wobites ato God an dura on sebikirir efefeu . Ato omi min bobo fani atonio nanaba komasis on sigaraba maiau wofofour . ”
41007014	Namon Iesu sabu kuayo iyores men sinat aurin ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi sabu engon wontatamiu ato wonsagob tiwag .
41007015	Men sawar aifan tani orot jever koun emon inar usin amonai iniyamai inadum on , ab sawar aifan orot jever nunuan amon emon egat on ebiyamai edudum . ”
41007017	Iesu sabu kuayo ikirires ato irui goa amonai , On an baigibubunuotis on sitetemai atonio dura ibikakafun on itau bubunag sittatam mes .
41007018	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi sabu on men tani sagobotin ato sabu fani ba . Omi on men wosagob i ? Men sawar aifan tani orot jever usin koun emon inar iniyamai inadum on ,
41007019	an yabin on sawar on men nunuan amonai erur , baise sawar on erur yan amonai ato enan usin turinai emamaseir egat . ” ( Atonio dura Iesu ikurereb on ibasit ato bayu engon on fofonin tanama . )
41007020	Atonio dura on nana ibikakafun i’yau , “ Sawar aifan orot nunuan emon egat on ebiyamai edudum .
41007021	Ato orot yan emon , nunuan emon on bainonot komasis segat on ebinetewarai bobo komasis efofour , ebabainau , sabu ebirabobis ,
41007022	ebireg nan , ebiafeyan , bobo komasis ta ta efofour ; baisigogo dura ebiyamen , bobo komasis , ebiboboar , ebisigogo , etaseseir , kokok ba - osi komasis engon on orot nunuan emon ebiyamai edudum . ”
41007023	
41007024	Namon Iesu on efan ikirir inai tafanam nan Tyre mafam gagamin bisinai nan . On goa amonai irui ato men igogoi iyafan tani itsagob on nan goa amonai , baise On men fofonin arimon itob itama on .
41007025	Jever tani natun jeverei on ayu komasin tefanai imama on Iesu duran itatam on ra kaita inat aurin ato annai nan ifeu sindan irou .
41007026	On jever toumanin on Phoenicia emon inat Syria tafanam amonai on nan irat . On jever on Iesu ifefeyanai natun jeverei tefanai dau imama on itfaitan itgat mes .
41007027	Baise Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Ainau on ot fifirig gugudis tanitues : Men ibasit fifirig gugudis asi bayu on tanboai tanrebenen kuke auris . ”
41007028	Jever iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , kuke kema babanai semama on eb bayu moso sefefeu on sam ! ”
41007029	On mes Iesu on jever aurin iyau , “ Om am baiyafot obin aurin on , unmatabir men am goa aurin , nan arimon natum jeverei ungaturai dau ikirir igat ! ”
41007030	Jever imatabir inai au go ato natun jeverei it nan ireai i’yen ; ato dura bag dau on jeverei ikirir igat .
41007031	Namon Iesu on tafanam Tyre ikirir ato inai Sidon tafanam amonai mafam engon auyotoat nanaba on asi etaiai ibib inai Galilee kamitai nan .
41007032	Sabu fani orot tainan fotin awan kokin on sibo sinat , ato osi Iesu sifefeyanai iman on orot tefanai ityagai mes .
41007033	On mes Iesu ekesin mom orot ibo sabu kuayo sikirires ato sinat mabisi nan ato On iman on orot tainan doguai iwan , ikatutur ato orot fafen ibotobon .
41007034	Namon Iesu itage au safam ato aumiet iyaratein ato orot iyawur iyau , “ Ephphatha ” an yabin min , “ Eruseren ! ”
41007035	Ra kaita orot tainan itambou ato fafen ibit i’yen on awan iruseren ato ibosuruf dura ikakafun tiwag .
41007036	Namon Iesu dura wawaninai sabu iyawures iyau , “ Omi men iyafan tani wonkasonai mes . ” Ab On osi auris aumiet isosoan dura men sabu sitkasones baise osi on aumiet bag sikakason .
41007037	Ato osi sabu engon dura sitatam on siduduran kwakwan . Osi siyau , “ On mamaba ato osi bobo obis engon efofour ! Mat On ebiyames sabu tainas fotis on dura setatam a awas kokis on dura sebikakafun ! ”
41008001	Men weromin gibunai sabu kuayo gagamin tani ba sinat siruayo . Sabu auris on men bayu aifan tani i’yen arimon sitam ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis iyores sinat aurin ato iyawures iyau ,
41008002	“ Yau atonio osi sabu auris abiyababan yabin osi on Yau mat nin wamama inai on ra ton isawar ato osi auris on men bayu aifan tani yen arimon sinam on .
41008003	Ato Yau osi sabu men anibayues ato asi au go aniyafares sinnanan on , osi arimon eta nenenai bayu mes usis sinririm yabin osi sabu fani on eta weromin maiau sinat . ”
41008004	On an baigibubunuotis sitetemai siyau , “ Atonio nin efan koiteterinai on men orot tani fofonin arimon bayu ingaturai atonio sabu inibayues on ? ”
41008005	Iesu itetemis iyau , “ Omi aurim on rafi sarar biyam sen i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Rafi sarar engon nimtereban ruam sen . ”
41008006	On dura wawaninai sabu kuayo gagamin iyawures motobai simairirin . Namon On rafi sarar nimtereban ruam iboen . God aurin ikakaiu , namon iyabaseseben ato an baigibubunuotis ites sabu kuayo gagamin sitraramis ; ato baigibubunuotis on bobo nanaba sifour .
41008007	Osi iyan gugudis fani mat siboen . Iesu ato osi iyan gugudis auris mat ikakaiu ato an baigibubunuotis iyawures osi iyan mat sabu siraramis .
41008008	Sabu engon tutufin bayu siyam siyakokor ato osi sabu min 4,000 nanaba . Namon baigibubunuotis kaifet nimtereban ruam nanaba siboen bayu tuturis siwanen awas sibonu . Iesu sabu iyafares sinai ,
41008009	
41008010	ato ra kaita On an baigibubunuotis mat wayai sikaruge ato sinai au Dalmanutha tafanamai nan .
41008011	Pharisee yangan fani sinat Iesu aurin ato sibosuruf mat sigagamo . Osi sigogoi On nan sitrutobonai , on mes osi sifefeyanai bobo buburin tani itafour itiyoboes God On aurin on ibasitai .
41008012	Baise Iesu on aumiet bag iyaratein ato iyau , “ Omi aibo mes sabu ari ra on bobo buburin aurin sebifefeyan i ? Awurem , ambin bag ! Yau men arimon atonio osi sabu auris bobo buburin anafour on ! ”
41008013	On osi ikirires , wayai ikaruge ato ibosuruf irabon inai au kamit reban .
41008014	Baigibubunuotis on nousis ifot men rafi sarar siboen sinat ato kaitamom wat on sibo auman wa tefanai sikaruge .
41008015	Iesu osi tainas iyein iyau , “ Omi wonkaifarem tiwag , matam woneit ato Pharisee yangan a Herod mat asi fio yist aurin . ”
41008016	Osi baigibubunuotis on sibosuruf tous wat sanasi sibidudurai si’yau , “ On atonio dura ikakafun yabin ot aurit on rafi sarar ambin on mes . ”
41008017	Iesu on isagob osi dura mamaba sibikakafun , on mes On itetemis iyau , “ Omi aibo mes rafi sarar men woboen aurin on wobidudurai i ? Omi men wosagob o on dura an yabin aurim on men irubunag tiwag i ? Omi ami not on irufot bag i ?
41008018	Omi er matam , baise omi sawar men woiten ? Omi er tainam baise omi dura men wotatam ? Omi wononosin Yau
41008019	rafi sarar nim abaseseben sabu 5,000 auris ? Ato omi rafi sarar tuturis on kaifet biyam nanaba awas woibonuen i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Kaifet auyotoat sasagis ruam . ”
41008020	Iesu itetemis iyau , “ Ato Yau rafi sarar nimtereban ruam abaseseben sabu 4,000 auris , ato rafi sarar tuturis on kaifet biyam nanaba awas woibonuen i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Kaifet nimtereban ruam . ”
41008021	On itetemis iyau , “ Ato omi nana men wosagob ? ”
41008022	Osi sinat efan Bethsaida nan ato sabu fani orot matan fotin sibo sinat Iesu aurin ato sifefeyanai usin itbotobon mes .
41008023	Iesu on orot matan fotin imanai ibo ato mafam goa emon ibonanawai igat . On orot matanai ikatutur , gibunai on iman orot matanai iyein ato itetemai iyau , “ Om sawar aifan wat eitai ? ”
41008024	Orot matan iyeit ato iyau , “ Dura bag yau sabu aites ato osi asi itis on wengar ba sebibib . ”
41008025	Iesu iman orot matanai iyein men . Ato arimon weie orot matan ikurarau tiwag , on matan irubunag men , ato on iyeit sawar abiabi engon tutufin iten tiwag .
41008026	Namon Iesu dura wawaninai iyafarai inai au go , ato iyawur iyau , “ Om men unmatabir men unan am mafam goai unar mes . ”
41008027	Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat sinai au mafam goa Caesarea , Philippi mafam gagamin bisinai . Osi eta sibib si’nan nenenai nan ato On itetemis iyau , “ Omi wonkasoneu , sabu Yau auriu on mamaba sau ? ”
41008028	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Sabu fani sau Om on John Bapataito’otin , sabu fani sau , Om on Elijah , ato sabu fani sau , Om on aubairuruotin tani . ”
41008029	On itetemis iyau , “ Ato omi on mamaba ? Yau auriu on mamaba wonau ? ” Peter iyafotai iyau , “ Om on Keriso . ”
41008030	Namon Iesu dura wawaninai iyawures iyau , “ Yau auriu on men iyafan tani wonkasonai mes . ”
41008031	Namon Iesu ibosuruf an baigibubunuotis ibibebeyes : On iyau , “ Orot Natun on arimon inikokosarai kwakwan ato sabu kawian , priest aiwabis a Baifafaro an baibebeotis osi arimon sinisisiweiai . On arimon sabu sinirabobai , baise ra baitoninai On arimon rabob emon inmisir inyawas men . ”
41008032	On atonio dura ikakafun ato iyamai osi auris on irubunag tiwag . On mes Peter on Iesu ibo inai mabisi nan ato ibosuruf dura wawaninai igam i’yawur .
41008033	Baise Iesu irutabir an baigibubunuotis ites ato Peter dura wawaninai iyawur iyau , “ Afaguban eikirireu egat . Om am bainonot on men God emon , baise orot jever emon ! ”
41008034	Namon Iesu on sabu kuayo gagamin iyores an baigibubunuotis mat sinat aurin . On iyawures iyau , “ Iyai iyafan egogoi Yau inigibubunueu on toun an yawas on ininosfotai , an nab inabar ato Yau inigibubunueu .
41008035	Ato iyai iyafan egogoi toun an yawas iniyawasai on arimon an yawas inisiwanai ; ab iyai iyafan an yawas Yau auriu ebisiwanai a wasagobin aurin on , an yawas arimon iniyawasai .
41008036	Orot tani tafanam tutufin inisowarai ato an yawas on inisiwanai , on min arimon abifan obin inboai i ? Ambin bag !
41008037	On men arimon sawar aifan tani inyein ato an yawas inboai inigaraminai men on .
41008038	Ari ra on sabu men sebitutum a bobo komasis sefofour on amonai orot o jever Yau auriu a au baibebe aurin ebomamai on , Orot Natun arimon on aurin inbomamai , on an rai On Taman an faiwarai an anea kakafotis mat sinnanat on nan . ”
41009001	Namon Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag sabu fani nin setatawar on God an Baiaiwab an faiwar auman enat sinitai weie sinarab . ”
41009002	Ra nimtereban kaita isawar gibunai Iesu on Peter , James ‘ R ’ a John iboes ato ibonanawaiis mat sigai oyau aiyetunai nan ekesis mom mabisi . Osi siruruai matasi nan on Iesu an itin iyabatabir ,
41009003	ato On an beber on kakakaiin bag imatar - ikakai kwakwan men iyafan tani nin tafanamai esosouen sekakai ba .
41009004	Namon baigibubunuotis ton siyeit Elijah a Moses rus sites Iesu mat sibikakafun .
41009005	Peter on Iesu aurin ikakafun iyau , “ Baibebeotim , iyobin bag ot engon on nin ! Wei guwi gugudis engon ton wanayon , tani Om aurim , tani on Moses aurin a tani on Elijah aurin . ”
41009006	Peter tuturan mat on siber kwakwan on men sisagob abi dura itikakafun .
41009007	Namon kasakasau irobotet ato an gugubai nan ikimanis ato fonan kasakasau amon emon inat iyau , “ Atonio on Yau Tou Natu au nuabo - On fonan wontatam ! ”
41009008	Osi sasasan wat sirutatabir baise osi men iyafan tani sit on ; ab Iesu ekesin wat on osi mat nan .
41009009	Osi oyau emon sisur mom ato Iesu dura wawaninai iyawures iyau , “ Omi bobo aifan atonio toum matamui woitai on men iyafan tani wonkasonai mes , on an ra Orot Natun rabob emon inmisir men weie . ”
41009010	Osi Iesu an dura aurin on sifonabo , baise osi tous sanasi on sibosuruf sibidudurai si’yau , “ Rabob emon inmisir ’ on an yabin on aifan ? ”
41009011	Ato osi Iesu sitetemai siyau , “ Aibo mes Baifafaro an baibebeotis on sau , Elijah on ainau innat ? ”
41009012	Iesu an baiyafot on iyau , “ Dura bag Elijah on ainau inat bobo engon tutufin inbotitiwagen . Baise aibo mes God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , Orot Natun on gagamin bag inikokosarai mat On sinisisiweiai ?
41009013	Baise awurem , Elijah on inat nono ato sabu asi gogoiai nanaba on engon aurin sifour , on aurin on God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau bobo arimon inmatar aurin . ”
41009014	Osi sinat baigibubunuotis tuturas fani mat sikaita ato osi sit on sabu kuayo gagamin bag sikufifines ato Baifafaro an baibebeotis fani on baigibubunuotis mat sigagam .
41009015	Osi sabu Iesu sit mom on men sunub siror ato siyayai sinai sikakaiwai .
41009016	Iesu an baigibubunuotis itetemis iyau , “ Omi aifan aurin on osi mat wogagam i ? ”
41009017	Orot tani nan kuayo gagamin emon iyafotai iyau , “ Baibebeotim , yau natu on Om aurim abo anat , yabin on ayu komasin tefanai emama ato on men fofonin dura inikakafun on .
41009018	On an ra ayu komasin tefanai egeg erarabin on eboai motobai nan eribirirai wafufusin egat , toun wan ebitafoforen ato ewawafatat . Yau Om am baigibubunuotis aifefeyanis ayu komasin sitfaitan itgat mes , baise osi men fofonin sitiyamai on . ”
41009019	Iesu iyawures iyau , “ Omi sabu on ami baitutum ambin ! Omi ra biyam Yau mat tanama ? Omi ra biyam Yau nana yaterabobai omi mat tanama weie wonsagob ? Fifi wobo wonat auriu ! ”
41009020	Ato osi fifi sibo sinat Iesu aurin . Ayu komasin Iesu i’tai on ra kaita fifi ibosafurai ato fifi on motobai ifeu iyen ififirur wafufusin si’gat .
41009021	Iesu on fifi taman itetemai iyau , “ Meyan nenei on fifi nanaba ifofour ? ” Orot iyafotai iyau , “ On fifi kafakakai an werai .
41009022	Ra sigaraba maiau ayu komasin igogoi fifi itasubun mes on ibiyamai , on irereben wairafai igegeg a sareuai nan ifefeu . Om fofonin arimon utkaberai utibaisi ! ”
41009023	Iesu iyau , “ Basit , om fofonim on efour tait ! Bobo engon on fofonin wat ato orot iyafan aurin baitutum yen on . ”
41009024	Ra kaita fifi taman fonan gagaminai ifefeyan iyau , “ Yau au baitutum yen baise men gagamin . Eibaisiu au baitutum inarat gagamin bag ! ”
41009025	Iesu isagob on sabu kuayo gagamin on On aurin sikufoforen , on mes On dura wawaninai ayu komasin iyawur iyau , “ Om awam kokin a taina fot an ayu , awurem , ari fifi usin emon eikirir egat ato men meyan unmatabir usinai unar men ! ”
41009026	Ayu komasin iyoku ato fifi komasinai bag ibosafurai wafufusin si’gat weie ikirir igat . Fifi an itin on irabob ba , on mes sabu engon siyau , “ Fifi irabob ! ”
41009027	Baise Iesu fifi imanai ibo ibaisin ibogaiai ato on imisir itawar .
41009028	Iesu inai go amonai irui ato an baigibubunuotis ekesis mom bubuniai sitetemai siyau , “ Aibo mes wei on men fofoni ayu komasin wanfaitan ingat ? ”
41009029	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Eta kaitamom wat atonio ayu komasin wonfaitan ingat , on omi God aurin wonbayoi . ”
41009030	Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat on efan sikirir ato Galilee tafanam amonai sibib sinai . Iesu men igogoi iyafan tani itsagob On menan nan ,
41009031	yabin On an baigibubunuotis ibibebeyes on mes : On iyau , “ Orot Natun on arimon sinboai sabu imasi sinyagai sinfatumai ato sinasubun . Baise ra baitonin gibunai On arimon inmisir inyawas men . ”
41009032	Baise osi men sisagob atonio baibebe an yabin on abifan , ato osi siber men sitetemai on .
41009033	Osi sinat au Capernaum mafam gagaminai nan ato sinai goa amonai sirui weie Iesu an baigibubunuotis itetemis iyau , “ Omi aifan aurin on nan etai wogagam wobibas ? ”
41009034	Baise osi men fofonin sitiyafotai yabin osi etai nan si’nat on tous wat sanasi on sigagam sibibas iyafan on gagamin bag osi sanasi .
41009035	Iesu imair ato an baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam iyores sinat ato iyawures iyau , “ Iyai iyafan egogoi ininau on toun inboai inigib ato on min sabu engon tutufin iniagires . ”
41009036	Namon Iesu on fifi kafakakai ibo nasi itawarai . On fifi kafakakai irous ato iyawures iyau ,
41009037	“ Iyai iyafan atonio fifi kafakakai nanaba Yau Wabiui ebikakaiwai , on min Yau ebikakaiwiu : ato iyai iyafan Yau ebikakaiwiu , on men Yau ekesiu wat ebikakaiwiu ab On Iyafan Yau Ibiyafareu on mat ebikakaiwai . ”
41009038	John on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Baibebeotim , wei orot tani wait on Om Wabimui dau ifafaitanis ato on wawur itikirir mes yabin on orot on men ot mat ati kuayo kaita on . ”
41009039	Iesu iyawures iyau , “ Omi men wonawur inikirir mes yabin iyafan Yau Wabiui bobo buburis efofour on men arimon gibui Yau auriu dura komasis inikakafun on .
41009040	Yabin iyai iyafan men ot aurit ebiragit on ot turat .
41009041	Yau awurem dura bag , iyai iyafan sareu inbibitomanim yabin om Keriso ebinoanai on mes , on dura bag arimon an baiyan inboai . ”
41009042	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ On iyafan fifirig gugudis iniyames asi baitutum Yau auriu infefeu on iyobin on orot anjon agim sinous ato kamitai sinreberirai insur inamtotom inarab .
41009043	On mes om imam tani iniyamem am baitutum infefeu on , imam unasutin intutu ! Iyobin bag om imam kaitamom wat on yawas obin unboai , ato men ibasit imam ruam mat engon unan wairaf an efan komasinai unar ato on wairaf on wantoan eyoyour .
41009045	Ato om amm inbiyamem am baitutum infefeu on , amm tani unasutin intutu ! Iyobin om amm kaitamom wat yawas obin unboai , men basit amm ruam engon unan wairaf an efan komasinai sinreberuem .
41009047	Ato om matam iniyamem am baitutum infefeu on , om matam tani unboseir ! Iyobin bag om matam kaitamom wat God an Baiaiwab amonai unar , men matam ruam auman unbotanen ato wairaf an efan komasinai sinreberuem .
41009048	On efanai nan on , ‘ momot gugudis sinanim ato osi momot on men sinarab , ato wairaf nan yarasis on men fofonin sinsibunin . ’
41009049	“ Sabu engon tutufin on arimon wairaf iniyames singumidar ato kamit ebiyamai sirifu egugumidar ba . ”
41009050	“ Kamit on obin ; baise on kamit an nanian insasawar on , om mamaba arimon unafour ato kamit an nanian uniyamai inmatar men ? Kamit on wobo amomui woyein ato tuturam mat tufai nuaboai wonama . ”
41010001	Namon Iesu on efan ikirir inai Judea tafanamai , ato irabon Jordan Sareu rebanai nan . Sabu kuayo gagamin sinat siruayo men ato On sabu ibibebeyes , On an bobo ra fufur efofour nanaba on .
41010002	Pharisee fani on sinat Iesu aurin ato sifourtobon sitrutobonai mes . Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Om ekasonei , ot min ati Baifafaro dura ebibasit fofonin arimon orot awan inikirir i ? ”
41010003	Iesu iyafotes ato itetemis iyau , “ Ato omi on Moses abi baifafaro dura on item i ? ”
41010004	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Moses ibasit orot aurin fofonin arimon fef ingayam jever baikiririn aurin weie on awan jever iniyafarai inan . ”
41010005	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Moses atonio baifafaro dura on omi aurim igayam yabin omi baibebeyim aurin on iwani kwakwan .
41010006	Baise ainau anai bag God tafanam ifofourai nan ‘ God on orot jever ifouris ’ , dura buk amonai min on nanaba sigayam .
41010007	‘ Ato on yabinai orot arimon ayon taman inikirires ato innat awan jever rus sinikaita , ’
41010008	ato osi rus min sinnat kaitamom sinmatar . On mes osi on men sabu ruam on , ab osi on kaitamom wat .
41010009	God osi orot jever iboes sikaita nono on men iyafan tani inkugeyes . ”
41010010	Osi simatabir men sirui goa amonai ato On an baigibubunuotis on atonio bobo aurin on Iesu sitetemai .
41010011	On osi auris iyau , “ Orot iyafan awan ebikirir ato jever tani ebiawan on min awan jever aurin on ebireg nan .
41010012	On eta kaitamomai jever iyafan awan orot ebikirir ato orot tani ebiawan on , on min awan orot aurin ebireg nan . ”
41010013	Sabu fani fifirig gugudis siboes sinat Iesu aurin On iman tefasi ityagagaien mes , baise baigibubunuotis on osi sabu sigam siyawures .
41010014	Iesu on bobo it isagob on yan itatab ato an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Omi fifirig gugudis woikirires sinnat auriu , omi men wonsofafaris mes , yabin God an Baiaiwab on sabu ato fifirig gugudis asi yawas ba sefofour on osi ebinoanis .
41010015	Yau awurem dura bag , iyai iyafan God an Baiaiwab men ibo atonio fifi kafakakai ba , on men meyan arimon inar . ”
41010016	Namon On fifirig gugudis irousis ato iman ibo fifirig kakaita kakaita tefasi iyagagaien ato imomogines .
41010017	Iesu on ibosuruf men etai ibib i’nan ato orot tani iyayai inat On nanai sindan irou ato itetemai iyau , “ Baibebeotim obim , yau mamaba anafour yawas mama wantoanin anboai ? ”
41010018	Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Om aibo mes uyoreu uyau obim ? Men iyafan tani on obin ab God ekesin mom on obin .
41010019	Om baifafaro dura usagob : Turam men unirabobai ; men unireg nan ; men unbainau ; turam men unkababainauai ; ayom tamam unkakafes . ”
41010020	Orot iyau , “ Baibebeotim , yau fifi kafakakaiu bag on ato baifafaro dura auris on engon aifonabo . ”
41010021	Iesu nuaboai nan totor orot aurin iyeit ato iyau , “ Om bobo kaitamom wat egogoi . Om unan ato aurim sawar aifan sen on engon sabu auris unitotobon ato on agim unboai sabu kokoianis unites , namon om unnat unigibubunueu ato om arimon safamai nan unisawarotim . ”
41010022	Orot atonio dura itatam on magin ifeu ato yababanai inai au go , yabin on orot on sawarotin .
41010023	Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris irutabir inateteis ato auris iyau , “ Sabu sawarotis auris on iwani kwakwan men fofonin arimon God an Baiaiwab amonai sinar on . ”
41010024	Baigibubunuotis atonio dura aurin on siduduran baise Iesu dura nana ibotein iyau , “ Yau nanatu , God an Baiaiwab amonai rui aurin on iwani kwakwan !
41010025	Foro camel on sasasan wat arimon sainuk matan an doguai inar , baise orot sawarotin aurin on iwani kwakwan men fofonin arimon God an Baiaiwab amonai inar on . ”
41010026	Atonio duraiai on baigibubunuotis on men sunub siduduran on ato tous wat si’yau bonen , “ Ato iyafan on arimon yawas mama wantoanin inboai ? ”
41010027	Iesu totor auris iyeit ato iyafotes iyau , “ Atonio bobo on orot aurin iwani kwakwan , baise God aurin on men wawanin on , bobo engon tutufin God aurin on fofonin wat . ”
41010028	Namon Peter ikakafun iyau , “ Eite , wei ai bobo engon waikiriren ato Om wabigibubunuem . ”
41010029	Iesu auris iyau , “ Dura bag , ato awurem omi engon iyabon Yau auriu a au wasagobin aurin wobigibubunueu ato ami goa , taitaim tutuam , rorobum , a’yom tatamam , a ami masau wobikiriren on ,
41010030	ari ra on omi arimon gagamin bag wonboai . On arimon orot nim tefanai nanaba , on an goa , taitain tutuan , rorobun , a’yon tataman , fifirig gugudis , masau on inboen a osi bobo emon on an baitutum auman fasinai baikokosar mat inboai ; ato an wera gibui innanat on arimon yawas mama wantoanin inboai .
41010031	Baise sabu sigaraba ari ainau senan on arimon sinnat sinigib ato sabu sigaraba iyabon gibui senat on arimon sinnat sininau . ”
41010032	Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat on etai sibib sigeg au Jerusalem . Iesu on ainau an baigibubunuotis nasi i’nan ato baigibubunuotis Iesu sibigibubunuai on engon siduduran ; ato sabu osi gibui sibigibubunues si’nat on siber . Iesu an baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam iboes men mabisi sinai ato bobo aifan On aurin sinmamatar on auris ikakafunen .
41010033	On iyawures iyau , “ Omi wontatam , ot on tageg au Jerusalem nan Orot Natun arimon priest aiwabis a Baifafaro an baibebeotis osi imasi sinyagai . Osi arimon sinimakiai inarab namon sinboai sabu men Jew yangan on imasi sinyagai .
41010034	Osi arimon sinikoboai , sinakan tuturai , sinaswabirai ato sinasubun inarab ; baise ra baitoninai On arimon inmisir inyawas men . ”
41010035	Namon James a John rus osi on Zebedee nanatun on sinat Iesu aurin . Osi siyau , “ Baibebeotim , wei wagogoi bobo tani uniyamai weinei . ”
41010036	Iesu itetemis iyau , “ Omi abi bobo on wogogoi anafour weinem ? ”
41010037	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Om am mamageai unamair unbiAiwab on , wei wagogoi unibasitei bisimui wanama , tani on am asumaiauai ato tani on am asugagafai . ”
41010038	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi men wosagob aifan aurin wobifefeyan . Omi wobibasit fofonin arimon au baikokosar an viga antotoman on nanaba wontoman ? Fofonin arimon anbibapataito on nanaba wonibapataito ? ”
41010039	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei fofoni wanafour . ” Iesu iyawures iyau , “ Omi on dura bag arimon au baikokosar an viga antotoman on wontoman a anbibapataito on nanaba wonibapataito .
41010040	Baise Yau auriu on baibad men yen arimon an rubinem iyafan on au asumaiauai inamair a iyafan on au asugagafai inamair . Atonio on God , On arimon efan inites ato osi iyabon auris ibotitiwag yen on . ”
41010041	Baigibubunuotis auyotoat on dura si’tatam on osi yas sitatab James a John rus auris .
41010042	On mes Iesu an baigibubunuotis iyores aurin sinat siruayo ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi wosagob eteni sabu asi bainetewarotis on asi faiwar yen asi sabu auris ato osi babadis on asi faiwar tutufinai on asi sabu sininetewaris .
41010043	Baise omi sanamui on bobo men on nanaba on . Om iyafan tani egogoi inigagamin on min sabu engon tutufin auris iniagir ,
41010044	ato om iyafan tani egogoi ininau on , on sabu engon tutufin auris iniagir .
41010045	Yabin Orot Natun mat on eb men inat sabu sinmisir On siniagirai mes on , baise On inat sabu iniagires a an yawas inkutetai sabu sigaraba intobonis men mes . ”
41010046	Osi sinat au Jericho ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat a sabu kuayo gagamin mat si’nan ato orot matan fotin wabin Bartimaeus on min Timaeus natun , on etai imair imama ikafefeyan .
41010047	On dura itatam Iesu Nazareth emon on i’nat ato on ibosuruf iyoku , “ Iesu ! David Natun ! Ekabereu ! ”
41010048	Sabu sigaraba maiau on orot sigam siyawur awan itafot mes . Baise on aumiet bag iyoku iyau , “ David Natun ekabereu ! ”
41010049	Iesu itawar ato iyau , “ Omi orot aurin woyor . ” On mes osi orot matan fotin aurin siyor siyau , “ Om eiyasisir ! Emisir , On om aurim eyoyor ! ”
41010050	Bartimeaus an beber irebenen ato imisir itawar inat Iesu aurin .
41010051	Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Om am gogoi aifan aniyamai weinem i ? ” Orot matan fotin iyafotai iyau , “ Baibebeotim , yau agogoi matau ineit . ”
41010052	Iesu iyawur iyau , “ Om enai , am baitutum emon uyawas . ” Ra kaita on matan iyeit tiwag ato Iesu igibubunuai etai sibib sinai .
41011001	Osi sinat Jerusalem aurin sibiufin nan mafam gagamis Bethage a Bethany bisisi ato sinat Olive Oyauai nan . Iesu an baigibubunuotis ruam ainau iyafares sinai .
41011002	On iyaubaiyates iyau : “ Omi wonan nan mafam tani namui yen . Omi wonan nan wongat mom on arimon foro donkey kafakakai nan wengarai siyous etatawar on wongaturai ato on foro min men tefanai sigai simair sibonanaboai on . On foro uram wonrufan ato nin wonboai wonnat .
41011003	Ato orot tani nan initetemim inau , omi aibo mes on bobo nanaba wofofour , ato omi wonawur wonau , Bada egogoi ato arimon ra kaita iniyafarai inmatabir men . ”
41011004	On mes osi sinai ato foro donkey kafakakai etai nan sigaturai , goa metewan awanai nan uramai siyous itatawar . Osi uram sirurufan ato ,
41011005	sabu fani nan sitatawar on sitetemis siyau , “ Omi aifan wobiyamai ato foro donkey kafakakai worurufan ? ”
41011006	Osi on Iesu dura mamaba i’yawures on nanaba siyafotes ato sabu sikirires sinai .
41011007	Osi foro donkey kafakakain boboun sibo sinat Iesu aurin , asi beber on bobaitu kounai sirebegagaien ato Iesu igai foro tefanai imair .
41011008	Sabu sigaraba asi beber siboen etai nan siyabaren , sabu fani wengar rorous regai nan siyasutuenen ato etai siyabaren .
41011009	Sabu fani ainau Iesu nanai si’nan a sabu fani gibunai si’nat on sibosuruf sibiyoku si’yau , “ God tanifain ! God imomoginai on Bada Wabinai enat !
41011010	Ot tamat aiwab David an baiaiwab enat on God imomoginai ! God tanifain ! ”
41011011	Iesu au Jerusalem irui , On inai tafaror goa amonai sawar engon tutufin inateteyen , baise awa ifofom on mes Iesu an baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam mat sigat sinai au Bethany .
41011012	Ra itom Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat Bethany emon simatabir si’nat ato Iesu bitanan igi .
41011013	On nanenei nan iyeit bubudau roroun auman it itatawar , on mes On inai auwatin ititai on wengar on er uwan auman ai ambin . On inat aurin aurin ato roroun wat it , yabin uwan an wera on men ibo on .
41011014	Iesu on bubudau aurin iyau , “ Men iyafan tani arimon om wengar emon uwam inboai inan men . ” Ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis min sitatam .
41011015	Osi sinat au Jerusalem weie Iesu inai au tafaror goa ato osi sabu fani nan sibitotobon on ibosuruf ifaitanis sigat . Sabu tafanam touman asi agim sebigagaram bonen yangan on asi kema ikitabiren a sabu fani kiwiu kumag sibitotobon on asi sifumama ikitabiren ,
41011016	mat On sabu isofafaris men sawar sitabaren goa amonai sitar sitrabon rebanai nan sitgat .
41011017	Namon On sabu ibebeyes iyau : “ God an dura buk amonai sigayam , God iyau , ‘ Yau au tafaror goa on arimon sinyorai bayoi an goa nin tafanamai sabu engon tutufin auris . ’ Baise omi wobo woikitabirai on sabu bainauotis asi ob efan mes imatar ! ”
41011018	Priest aiwabis a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on ato dura Iesu ibikakafun sitatam , on mes osi sibosuruf eta fani sinunuen sitasubun mes . Osi Iesu aurin siber yabin sabu kuayo gagamin engon On an baibebe aurin on siduduran .
41011019	Ibirabirabi ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat mafam gagamin sikirir sinai .
41011020	Ra itom fomenei osi etai sibib si’nan ato siyeit bubudau sit . Wengar min imau isur aweroron mat ibo .
41011021	Peter inos bobo aifan imamatar on , ato on Iesu iyawur iyau , “ Baibebeotim eite , Om bubudau uyaudabai min ato irabob ! ”
41011022	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi God wonitutumai .
41011023	Yau awurem dura bag , iyai iyafan atonio oyau inawur inau , ‘ Emisir toum eboem kamitai eitawarim . ’ Om nunuamui on men fetag fetag uninonot mes , baise om unitutum on ato dura aifan u’yau on arimon inmatar , arimon aurim sinafour .
41011024	On yabinai awurem : Omi wonbayoi On aurin wonifefeyan , On wonitutumai on arimon wonboai ato ami gogoi aifan aurin wonbifefeyan on arimon initem .
41011025	Ato wonmisir wonbabayoi on , omi ami komasin turam aurin woiyamai yen on wonnotburai ato Tamam safamai on arimon omi ami bokomas wofofour on innotburem . ”
41011027	Osi simatabir sinat men au Jerusalem . Iesu tafaror goa amonai ibibib ato priest aiwabis , Baifafaro an baibebeotis , a sabu kawian on sinat aurin ,
41011028	ato sitetemai siyau , “ Om baibad on iyafan item atonio osi bobo efofour i ? ”
41011029	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau au baitetem kaitamom wat on anitetemim , ato omi wonbiyafoteu on Yau arimon ankasonem au baibad mamaba abo atonio osi bobo afofour .
41011030	Omi wonkasoneu , John Bapataito’otin an baibad on men emon ibo sabu ibibapataitois : On God emon ibo o orot emon ibo ? ”
41011031	Osi sibosuruf tous wat sanasi sigagamois si’yau , “ Ot mamaba tanau ? Ot ari taniyafotai tanau , ‘ On God emon ibo ’ ato On arimon inau , ‘ Ato omi aibo mes men John Bapataito’otin woitutumai on ? ’
41011032	Baise ot ari tanau , ‘ On orot emon . . . ’ ” ( Osi sabu auris siber , yabin sabu engon tutufin situtum John Bapataito’otin on aubairuruotin . )
41011033	On mes osi Iesu siyafotai siyau , “ Wei men wasagob . ” Iesu iyawures iyau , “ Yau mat men ankasonem iyafan baibad iteu on atonio osi bobo afofour . ”
41012001	Namon Iesu dura kawenai auris ikakafun iyau : “ Ra tani orot an masauai wine itanumen , on gara iyous ikufifinai , on dogu isar ramo iyein nan wine itbibiro kerin itsusur aurin a kema aiyetun iyon orot kaifarotin nan kiwiu auris itkakaifar aurin . Namon on sabu bobo ites an wine masau sitbobo agim sitbiyamai wain ato on goa ikirir igat inai bainanawan mes .
41012002	Namon an wera inat wine uwas bairut mes on an agirotin iyafarai inai sabu bobo ites wine sibobo auris nan an agim turin itboai mes .
41012003	Sabu wine bobo’otis on simisir agirotin sibo siborarab ; ato eriman siyafarai men imatabir .
41012004	Namon masau matuanin on an agirotin tani ba iyafarai inai ; ato sabu wine bobo’otis on simisir uninai sirab ato simamaiai .
41012005	Masau matuanin on an agirotin baitonin ba iyafarai inai ato osi sibo siyasubun ; ato on eta kaitamomai wat on agirotis sigaraba auris on bobo nanaba sifouris , osi agirotis fani sirou a agirotis fani on siyasububunues .
41012006	Orot kaitamom wat baiyafarin aurin on masau matuanin toun natun an nuabo bag . Kanfounai bag on toun natun iyafarai inai sabu wine bobo’otis auris . Masau matuanin iyau , ‘ Yau asagob osi on arimon natu sinkakafai . ’
41012007	Baise osi sabu wine bobo’otis on tous wat auris siyau bonen , ‘ Atonio fifi on masau matuanin toun natun . Ot tanasubun ato on an wine masau on ot tanboai ininoanit ! ’
41012008	On mes osi on natun orot sibo siyasubun ato usin on wine masau kounai nan sirebetet igat .
41012009	Iesu itetemis iyau , “ Wine masau matuanin on arimon mamaba inafour i ? On arimon innat ato osi sabuis on engon inasububunues ato wine masau on inboai sabu bobo’otis fani inites sinabo .
41012010	Dura bag omi atonio God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on woiyab i ? “ Arir ato goa baigoyonotis matan ainau sit on men obin on mes sisisiweiai ato gibui sisagob on arir on iyobin bag mat gagamin bag arir engon tefasi .
41012011	Atonio bobo on Bada ifour ; ato ot taitai on iyobin bag ! ’ ”
41012012	Jew asi bainetewarotis on sifourtobon Iesu sitfatumai mes yabin osi sisagob atonio dura kawen on osi auris ikakafun . Baise osi sabu kuayo gagamin auris siber , on mes sikirir inai .
41012013	Pharisee fani a Herod an sabu fani siyafares sinai Iesu aurin sititetemai nan duraiai sitrutobonai mes .
41012014	Osi sinat On aurin ato siyau , “ Baibebeotim , wei wasagob Om on dura bag wat ebikakafun a sabu aifan senonosin on men on ebinonotai on . Sabu asi baibad mamaba on men etatamis baise Om dura bag wat God an dura an gogoiai nanaba on sabu auris ebibebe . Om ekasonei , ot ati baifafaro min iyau fofonin arimon agim takes Caesar aurin tanyein i ? Tanibaiyan o ambin ? ”
41012015	Baise Iesu on osi asi baisigogo on it isagob ato iyafotes iyau , “ Omi aibo mes wofofourtobon Yau wonrutoboniu mes i ? Omi agim wobo wonat anitai . ”
41012016	Osi agim sibo sinat ato itetemis iyau , “ Atonio agim on iyafan magin a wabin i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Caesar . ”
41012017	On mes Iesu iyau , “ Sawar aifan Caesar noan on Caesar wonitai , sawar aifan God noan on God wonitai . ” Ato osi engon tutufin Iesu aurin siduduran .
41012018	Sadducee fani on sinat Iesu aurin . ( Osi sebikakafun sau on sabu rabobis on men arimon rabob emon sinmisiririn men . )
41012019	Osi siyau , “ Baibebeotim , Moses atonio baifafaro dura on ot aurit igayam : ‘ Orot inarab awan inikirir ato nanatun ambin on orot tain on arimon on kena iniawan fifirig sinbibitu on fifirig min arimon tuan rabobin nanatun mes . ’
41012020	Ra tani ainauan gigiawan engon nimtereban ruam nanaba simama ; ato ainau orot itabin , ato nanatun ambin irabob .
41012021	Namon giya orot bairuin ba on jever iawan ato on mat nanatun ambin irabob . On bobo kaitamom nanaba on giya orot baitonin ba aurin imatar ,
41012022	ato on min bobo kaitamom nanaba gigiawan fani auris imatar : ainauan gigiawan nimtereban ruam engon on jever kaitamom siawan ato osi engon tutufin nanatus ambin sirabob sinai . Au kanfoun on jever irabob .
41012023	Basit osi engon tutufin ra kanfounai rabob emon sinmisiririn on arimon orot iyafan on awan ? Ato osi ainauan gigiawan nimtereban ruam on jever sibiawan on . ”
41012024	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi on totor bag eta woisarar ! Ato omi wosagob aibo mes ? Yabin omi God an dura buk amonai sigayam a God an faiwar mat on omi an yabin men wosagob .
41012025	Ato sabu rabobis sinmisiririn men on , osi arimon anea ba sinmatar safamai nan ato orot jever on arimon men sintabin .
41012026	Ato sabu rabobis ato rabob emon sinmisiririn on : Omi Moses an buk on men woiyab , dura buk amonai ikakafun ato rega amonai wairaf iyoyour aurin on ? Dura buk amonai nan sigayam God on Moses aurin iyau , ‘ Yau on Abraham an God , Isaac an God a Jacob an God . ’
41012027	On an yabin min On on sabu yayawasis asi God , men sabu rabobis asi God . Omi on totor bag eta woisarar ! ”
41012028	Baifafaro an baibebeotin min nan ato dura sibikakafunai on itatam . On it Iesu an dura on obin maiau sadducee yangan iyafotes , on mes on inat Iesu aurin ato itetemai iyau , “ Baifafaro dura menan on gagamin bag baifafaro dura engon tefasi ? ”
41012029	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Baifafaro dura engon tefasi on atonio : ‘ Israel yangan wontatam tiwag ! Bada ati God , On ekesin mom ati Bada .
41012030	Bada am God on nunuam tutufinai , ayubim tutufinai , am not tutufinai a am faiwar tutufinai uninuaboai . ’
41012031	Baifafaro dura gagamin bairuin on atonio : ‘ Om turam uninuaboai ato toum ebinuaboai ba . ’ Baifafaro dura men tani gagamin bag atonio osi baifafaro dura ruam ba . ”
41012032	Baifafaro an baibebeotin on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Baibebeotim , Om dura obinai wat ukakafun ! Om ato dura ubikakafun on dura bag wat , Bada ekesin on God , men God iyafan tani ab On ekesin mom God .
41012033	Orot on God nunuan tutufinai a an not tutufinai , a an faiwar tutufinai ininuaboai ; ato on turan ininuaboai ato on toun ebinuaboai ba . Atonio osi baifafaro dura ruam on gagamis bag osi auris tanifonabo , men ato bobaitu takuteten a ati sirifu God aurin takuteten ba on . ”
41012034	Iesu it on orot an not gigiboanai iyafotai , on mes On orot iyawur iyau , “ Om on God an Baiaiwab aurin uiufin nono . ” On gibunai osi sabu on siber men iyafan tani arimon fofonin Iesu ititetemai on .
41012035	Iesu tafaror goa amonai sabu ibibebeyes ato itetemis iyau , “ Mamaba mes baifafaro an baibebeotis sebikakafun sau Iesu on David an warar emon ?
41012036	Ayu Kakafotin on David ibonuai ato dura ikakafun iyau : ‘ Bada , on yau au Bada aurin iyau , Om nin au asumaiauai emair ato Yau am ragit anboes sinsur om am baibad babanai sinama . ’
41012037	David toun On aurin iyor iyau , ‘ Bada ’ on mes mamaba Keriso on David an warar emon ? ” Sabu kuayo gagamin on yasisirai nan Iesu an dura sitatam .
41012038	On sabu ibebeyes on iyau , “ Omi matam woneit tiwag Baifafaro an baibebeotis auris , osi asi gogoi on beber weroromis soten baitotobon an efanai sebibib ato sabu nan sebitotobon on osi kakafai wat nan sinbikakaiwis .
41012039	Osi on bayoi goa amonai nan asi sifumama kakafaiis wat on serurubinen a efan kakafaiis wat on bobaitab asi efanai nan serurubinen .
41012040	Osi on kekena sebisigoes ato asi goai sawar sen on engon osi seyayakeis ato tous wat sebogaiis asi bayoi weromis maiau sebabayoi . Osi asi baimaki on arimon komasin bag sinboai ! ”
41012041	Iesu on tafaror goa an agim an didiwag bisinai imair ato sabu ibimateteis asi agim siyeyeinin . Sabu sawarotis sigaraba on asi agim gagamin siyeyeinin ;
41012042	namon kena jever kokoianin inat agim gugudis ruam mom iyein , on agim on kafakakai kaitamom an fofonin on .
41012043	Iesu an baigibubunuotis iyores siruayo ato auris iyau , “ Yau awurem atonio kena jever kokoianin an agim siwar an didiwagai iyeyeinin on irat kwakwan men ato osi sabu fani asi agim siyeyeinin ba .
41012044	Sabu fani siyeyeinin on asi agim irat bag ato kafakakai wat on siyein ; baise on jever kokoianin bag , aifan aurin i’yen on engon tutufin iyein isawar , men an agim tani yen an bayu intobon on . ”
41013001	Iesu tafaror goa ibikirir ato an baigibubunuotin tani on iyau , “ Baibebeotim eite , agim gagamis obis maiau a goa obis obis maiau siyonen ! ”
41013002	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om atonio osi goa gagamis eiten ? Men agim tani arimon nin an efanai inen on , arimon engon tutufin sinifufusas sinsawaris . ”
41013003	Iesu on Olive Oyau on tefanai nan imair imama , tafaror goa reban emon , ato Peter , James , John a Andrew on bubuniai sinai aurin .
41013004	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Om ekasonei atonio osi bobo on arimon meyan sinmatar a ekasonei bobo aifan arimon inmatar onai iniyoboei wansagob on wera inat atonio osi bobo engon tutufin sinmatar . ”
41013005	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi matam woneit , men woniyamai iyafan tani inisigoem mes .
41013006	Sabu sigaraba arimon sinnat Yau Wabiui sinau sinikakafun , arimon sinnat sinau , ‘ Yau on orot atonio ! ’ ato osi arimon sabu sinisigoes .
41013007	Ato sabu sinbigagam fonas auwatin wontatam a tafanam nanenei sinbigagam duras wat wontatam on men woniyababan mes . Atonio osi bobo nanaba on arimon sinmatar , baise osi bobo on men sebiyamai ra kanfoun inat igat on .
41013008	Tafanam arimon tous wat sinigagam bonen ; baiaiwab arimon tous wat sinigagam bonen , uruyoi arimon tafanam au engon inboai , a gomar an ra innat . Atonio osi bobo engon tutufin on jever koun ebosuruf egigiai usibaban eboai toub aurin mes ba .
41013009	Iesu iyau , “ Omi toum mat on matam woneit . Omi arimon sinfatumem ato sinboem wonan sinigrubabanim . Omi arimon bayoi goai nan sinborarabim ; omi arimon Yau fasiui on bainetewarotis a aiwabis nasi wontawar Yau Wabiui au Wasagobin on osi sabu auris wonkurereb .
41013010	Omi on arimon wasagobin wonkurereb sabu engon tutufin auris weie ra kanfoun innat ingat .
41013011	Ato omi sinfatumem sinboem wonan baigurubabanotin aurin on , men woniyababan dura mamaba wonbikakafun aurin on , ato wera innat on dura aifan God inbibitetem on asir wonau mom . Yabin dura ato wonbikakafun on men omi ami dura on ; ato osi dura on arimon Ayu Kakafotin emon sinnat .
41013012	Sabu arimon tous taitais tutuas on sabu imasi sinyagaiis ato sinasububunues a fifirig tatamas on arimon on eta kaitamomai nanaba nanatus auris sinafour . Fifirig arimon tatamas auris siniragites ato sabu fani sinawures sinasububunues .
41013013	Yau fasiui on sabu engon tutufin arimon sinisisiweiim . Baise iyai iyafan nana infaskikin inan au kanfoun ingat on arimon inyawas . ”
41013014	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi arimon sawar ‘ Beruber Komasin ’ ato yawas engon ebikomasen on tafaror goa amonai intatawar wonitai ! ” ( Om baiyabotim : atonio dura ebiyab on an yabin unsagob ! ) Namon osi sabu iyabon Judea tafanam amonai semama on au oyau siniyai sinan .
41013015	Orot iyafan an goa uwayob tefanai on men an wera inisawarai insur goa amonai an sawar aifan nan sen on inboen inan mes .
41013016	Orot iyafan masauai ebobo on men inmatabir inan an goai nan an beber inboai mes .
41013017	On an rai jever yas sisag aumas a jever nanatus susus aumas , osi auris on komasin bag !
41013018	God aurin wonbayoi atonio bobo on men arimon yabat yawarad an rai nan sinmatar mes !
41013019	Yabin on an rai yawas wawanis on arimon sinkomas kwakwan , men ato tafanamai bobo simamatar ba , ainau anai bag God tafanam ifofourai inat ari i’gat nan . Ato gibui yawas wawanis on arimon men nanaba sinmatar men .
41013020	Baise Bada on ra idibonai nono ; On bobo men on nanaba itfofour on , men iyafan tani nana yawasin itama on . Yabin On an sabu rurubinis auris on mes On ra idibonai .
41013021	“ Namon iyai iyafan inawurem inau , ‘ Eite Keriso atonio ! ’ o ‘ Eite on min ato ! ’ — omi men wonitutumai mes .
41013022	Yabin baisigogo Keriso a baisigogo aubairuruotis fani on arimon sinrobotet . Osi arimon bobo buburis a bobo baiduduranis sinfouren God an sabu rurubinis sinisigoes .
41013023	Omi matam woneit ! Yau atonio dura engon tutufin ainau awurem weie bobo sinmatar . ”
41013024	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ On an rai yawas wawanis insawar gibunai wera arimon inwoman , roke arimon men intagawai men ,
41013025	siribod arimon kasakasau emon sinafeu , safamai sawar faiwaris sen on arimon asi efan sinisararen .
41013026	Namon Orot Natun kasakasauai inrobotet , an faiwar gagamin a an kudidirin gagaminai innat .
41013027	On arimon anea iniyafares singat tafanam au engonai nan God an sabu rurubinis semama on sinruayois . ”
41013028	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Bubudau wengar on inibebeyim . On an rai fafamen ebiyamai enat rifuis a nunubas semamatar on , rorous sibosuruf seyaya on wonsagob kwanda an ra on inat ebiufin .
41013029	On eta kaitamomai omi atonio osi bobo woniten sinmamatar on wonsagob an wera inat ebiufin , ebotitiwag inbosuruf mes .
41013030	Omi wononosin , atonio osi bobo engon tutufin sinmatar weie sabu ari nin semama on engon sinarab .
41013031	Safam tafanam on arimon sintumai baise Yau au dura on arimon men meyan intumai on . ”
41013032	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Baise men iyafan tani isagob meyan ato ra o wera innat - anea safamai semama on men sisagob a Natun mat men isagob ; God Taman ekesin mom isagob .
41013033	Omi matam woneit , usim sinisas yabin On an wera meyan innat on omi men wosagob .
41013034	On arimon ato orot ba , an goa ebikirir ebinanawan ato an agirotis ebikirires an goa sekakaifarai , on kakaita kakaita asi bobo ebites ato gibui metewan awan kaifarotin yawur nana inkakaifar .
41013035	On mes omi wonkaifar yabin omi men wosagob meyan goa matuanin enat - arimon rabirabi , o fom nub basun o fomenei o ra an womanai o wera egeg nan .
41013036	On ingat safurem ato men ibasit omi ingaturem on woenbubur .
41013037	Yau mamaba awurem on min nanaba sabu engon tutufin aurim abikakafun . Omi wonkaifar ! ”
41014001	Ra ruam nanaba si’yen weie Forag wabin Baisobon a Rafi Sarar Men Fio Yist Auman on an Ra gagamin itgat . Priest aiwabis a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on eta sinunuen mamaba Iesu bubuniai nan sitfatumai ato sitasubun mes .
41014002	Osi siyau , “ Ot men forag an rai on bobo tanafour mes , sabu arimon fetag sinitai siniyatatab ato sinigagam . ”
41014003	Iesu on Bethany nan Simon an goai , on orot on usin gawud komasin bag on ibo . Iesu on bayu i’yam ato jever kibub agimai sibiyamai on amonai on fio yanden ninibin awan bonuin auman ibo irui goa amonai , on fio wawanin ninibin an baiyan on gagamin bag . Jever kibub matan iturutob ato fio Iesu tefanai idebur .
41014004	Sabu fani nan simama on yas sitatab ato tous wat siyau bonen , “ Abi yabin aurin on fio yanden ninibin on fetagai idebur ?
41014005	On fio on sabu fani auris ititotobon on arimon agim 300.00 kina on tefanai nanaba itboai ato on agim on itboai sabu kokoianis itites ! ” Ato osi on yatatabai nan jever sigam siyawur .
41014006	Baise Iesu iyau , “ Omi on jever on asir woikirir mom ! Omi aibo mes wobisababanai i ? On bobo on obin fafa bag auriu ifour .
41014007	Omi arimon ra fufur sabu kokoianis on mat wonama ato wera tani wongogoi mes on wonibaisis . Baise Yau on arimon men ra fufur mat wantoan tanama on .
41014008	On aifan an gogoi on ifour ; on fio yanden ninibin usiui idebur on ainau ebotitiwag Yau singarobiu mes .
41014009	Yau awurem dura bag menan nan tafanam au engonai wasagobin sinbibino on , jever bobo aifan auriu ifofour on arimon on aurin sinnos sinidudurai . ”
41014010	Namon Judas Iscariot , baigibubunuotin tani , on inai priest aiwabis auris mamaba itafour Iesu osi auris itkaseirai mes .
41014011	Judas dura aifan iyawures on siyasisir ato siyaumatanai agim sititai mes . On mes Judas ibosuruf eta inunuen menan wera obin itgaturai nan Iesu osi auris itkaseirai mes .
41014012	Rafi Sarar Men Fio Yist Auman an Forag Ra ainauin , on ra nan on foro sheep bobous siyasububunuen Baisobon an bayu am aurin ato baigibubunuotis on Iesu sitetemai siyau , “ Om menan nan egogoi wanan Baisobon an bayu aurim wanbotitiwag ? ”
41014013	Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis ruam iyafares sinai , On dura ato nanaba iyawures iyau , “ Omi wonan Jerusalem mafam gagamin amonai wonar , ato orot sareu kibub iyabar enat on arimon mat woninofoten . Ato omi on orot wonigibubunuai wonan
41014014	ato on inan goa amonai inrurur ato omi goa matuanin on wonawur wonau : ‘ Baibebeotin iyau , goa amonai efan menan nan au baigibubunuotis mat Baisobon an bayu wanam i ? ’
41014015	Namon on arimon goa gagamin ann weromin nan efan sirereb sibotitiwag yen on iniyoboem , ato omi on efanai nan arimon aifan engon aurit on wonbotitiwag . ”
41014016	Baigibubunuotis sigat sinai mafam gagamin amonai sirui ato Iesu dura mamaba i’yawures on engon tutufin sigaturen ; ato osi Baisobon an bayu on sibotitiwag .
41014017	Ibirabirabi ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam on mat sinat .
41014018	Osi kemai simairirin bayu si’yam ato Iesu iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag omi orot tani on arimon Yau inkaseiriu — omi orot tani Yau mat bayu tam on . ”
