41014019	Baigibubunuotis on siyababan ato sibosuruf kakaita kakaita On sibitetemai si’yau , “ Om dura bag men yau auriu ebikakafun i ? ”
41014020	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Arimon omi baigibubunuotim auyotoat sasagis ruam sanamui , on orot iyafan an rafi sarar Yau rui ramo amonai wanbibiwan on .
41014021	God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , Orot Natun min arimon inarab ; baise orot iyafan Orot Natun inkakaseirai on , on aurin on komasin bag ! Iyobin on orot on men itarat mes ! ”
41014022	Osi bayu si’yam Iesu rafi sarar turin ibo , God aurin bayoi ikakaiu , iyabaseseb ato an baigibubunuotis ites . On iyawures iyau , “ Atonio rafi sarar wobo wam , nin on Yau usiu . ”
41014023	Namon On viga ibo God aurin ikakaiu , ato an baigibubunuotis ites ato osi engon tutufin on viga emon sitoman .
41014024	Iesu iyau , “ Atonio on Yau au tara on indebur sabu engon tutufin auris , Yau au tara on God an dura bobaibasit boboun .
41014025	Yau awurem dura bag , Yau men arimon atonio sareu wine antoman men , ab Yau God an Baiaiwab amonai anar weie Yau sareu wine boboun antoman . ”
41014026	Namon osi kwarer tani sikwarer ato sigat sinai Olive Oyau aurin .
41014027	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi engon tutufin arimon wonayai kirireu , yabin God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ God arimon foro sheep kaifarotin inasubun ato foro sheep on arimon engon fetag fetag sintagege . ’
41014028	Baise on gibunai God rabob emon inbobaimisireu an yayawas on Yau ainau namui anan au Galilee . ”
41014029	Peter iyafotai iyau , “ Yau men meyan arimon anikirirem on , basit osi fani on arimon sinayai ! ”
41014030	Iesu on Peter aurin iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag om arimon wera ton nanaba unau yau on Orot on men asagobai weie kokorerek bairuin ari fom inatou . ”
41014031	Peter dura wawaninai iyafotai men iyau , “ Yau arimon men meyan dura nanaba anau yau men asagobim mat on eb yau on arimon rut tanarab ! ” Ato baigibubunuotis fani engon min on dura kaitamom sikakafun .
41014032	Osi sinat efan wabin Gethsemene nan ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Omi nin womair wonmama ato Yau anan nan an bayoi . ”
41014033	Iesu on Peter , James a John on iboes mat sinai . On nunuan on ikomas ibit kwakwan ,
41014034	ato On osi auris iyau , “ Yau nunuaui yababan on irat kwakwan kafakakai mom nunuau intaseb . Omi nin wonama ato matam woneit . ”
41014035	On kafakakai wat inai mabinai , ato magin ainau motobai ifeu ato ibayoi iyau on fofonin men arimon baikokosar an wera amonai itar .
41014036	On ibayoi iyau , “ Tamau , Yau Tamau ! Bobo engon tutufin aurim on fofonim wat . Atonio baikokosar an viga Yau emon ebo enai . Men Yau au gogoiai baise Om am gogoiai anafour . ”
41014037	Namon On imatabir men inai ato an baigibubunuotis ton igatures siyenbubur . On Peter aurin iyau , “ Simon , om yenbubur ? Om men fofonin wera kaitamom wat matam uteit utama ? ”
41014038	Ato osi auris ikakafun iyau , “ Omi matam nana wo’neit ato wonbayoi arimon men rutobon wonboai on . Omi nunuam on egogoi bobo obin inafour baise usim on sesasam . ”
41014039	On imatabir men inai ibayoi , dura kaitamom min on iyau men .
41014040	Namon On imatabir men inat an baigibubunuotis auris ato igatures siyenbubur : Osi men fofonin matas siteit sitama on . Ato osi men sisagob arimon abi dura aurin sitikakafun .
41014041	On wera baitonin ba imatabir men inat ato auris iyau , “ Omi on nana wobiyarir a woienbubur ? Fofonin ! Wera inat nono ! Woit , Orot Natun on ari sabu bokomasotis imasi seyayagai .
41014042	Omi womisir tanan . Woit , orot atonio on Yau ekakaseiriu ! ”
41014043	Iesu on dura nana ibikakafun ato Judas , baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam tani on inat . On sabu kuayo mat sinat , osi imasi on seri a sambeyan aumas siboen sinat , ato osi on priest aiwabis , Baifafaro an baibebeotis a sabu kawian on sabu siyafares sinai .
41014044	Orot kaseirotin on sabu kuayo gagamin asi baiyoboen ites : On iyau , “ Orot ato rereban ayayanin on wogogoiai . Omi wonfatumai ato wonboai wonan , wonkaifarai tiwag . ”
41014045	Judas inat mom , on inai Iesu aurin ato iyau , “ Baibebeotim , ato on rereban iyan .
41014046	Ato osi Iesu sifatumai aumiet bag sibotan .
41014047	Baise osi sabu fani nan sitatawar sanasi orot tani on an seri ibo ato Priest Ainauin an agirotin tainan iyasutin itutu .
41014048	Namon Iesu ikakafun ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi aibo mes seri a sambeyan aumas woboen wonat Yau wonfatumeu mes , Yau on yakeotiu bait ?
41014049	Yau ra fufur omi mat tafaror goai nan sabu abibebeyes ato omi men nan wotfatumeu . Baise God an dura buk amonai sigayam on inat ebidur bag . ”
41014050	Namon baigibubunuotis engon tutufin Iesu sikirir siyayai sinai .
41014051	Jorei tani on beber neneyan kakakaiin iyot ato Iesu ibigibubunuai . Osi sifourtobon on jorei sitrous sitfatumai mes ,
41014052	baise osi imas siyof on an beber wat on sibokikin sibotan ato on jorei on kereremotin iyayai inai .
41014053	Namon Iesu sibo sinai Jew asi Priest Ainauin an goai . priest aiwabis , sabu kawian a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on engon nan siruayo .
41014054	Peter on nanenei nan igibubunues inai Priest Ainauin an goa furi on amonai irui . On nan imair sabu kaifarotis mat wairaf iraranis .
41014055	Priest aiwabis a Jew Babadis Rurubinis engon tutufin sifourtobon Iesu aurin dura sitsagob tiwag onai sitirabobai ; baise osi on men dura yabin tani sigaturai on .
41014056	Sabu sigaraba asi dura baisigogo Iesu aurin sikakafun , baise asi dudur on men siyamai kaitamom imatar on .
41014057	Namon sabu fani simisir Iesu aurin ato baisigogo dura siyau ,
41014058	“ Wei watatamai On iyau , ‘ Yau arimon atonio tafaror goa sabu imasi siyoyonin on agoros , namon ra ton insawar gibunai Yau goa tani boboun anyon , on goa on men sabu imasi siyoyonin ba on . ’ ”
41014059	Baise osi asi dudur on men meyan siyamai kaitamom imatar on .
41014060	Priest Ainauin imisir sabu engon tutufin nasi itawar Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Om am baiyafot mamaba unau atonio osi sabu asi dudur aurim sibikakafun on ? ”
41014061	Baise Iesu awan ifot men dura tani ikakafun on . Priest Ainauin Iesu itetemai men iyau , “ Om min Keriso , God Baimomogin on Natun ? ”
41014062	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Yau are , ato omi sabu engon tutufin arimon Orot Natun wonitai God Faiwarin maiau an asumaiauai inamair safam an kasakasauai innanat ! ”
41014063	Priest Ainauin an beber amonai iyote on isafef yabin on Iesu an dura ikakafun on inos wat ato iyau , “ Yau men agogoi sabu dura fani ba sinkasoneu men !
41014064	Omi baigigim dura God aurin ibikakafun on ato wotatam . Ato omi ami bainonot on mamaba ? ” Osi engon tutufin Iesu aurin siyau , “ On bobo komasin ifour on mes inarab . ”
41014065	Sabu fani sibosuruf Iesu sikakan tuturai , ato osi beber sibo Iesu matan siyous ato sirarabin si’yau , “ Om yawurei tait iyafan irabim ! ” Ato sabu tafanam an baifafaro kaifarotis on Iesu sibo siyasfarai .
41014066	Peter on nana nan furi amonai goa gosfunai imama ato Priest Ainauin an agirotin jeverei tani on inat .
41014067	Jeverei iyeit Peter it wairaf iraranai , ato on totor wat aurin iyau , “ Om mat on Iesu Nazareth emon an baigibubunuotin tani . ”
41014068	Baise Peter isosouf iyau , “ Yau men asagob . . . Yau men asagob om aifan aurin ebikakafun , ” ato on goa emon ibib igat inai furi awanai namon kokorerek itou .
41014069	Jeverei agirotin on Peter nan it ato ibosuruf dura kaitamom min on sabu nan sitatawar auris iyau men , “ On Iesu an baigibubunuotin tani ! ”
41014070	Baise Peter isosouf men . Men weromin sabu nan sitatawar on Peter siyawur men siyau , “ Om men unisosouf mes , om on osi asi orot tani , yabin om mat on Galilee emon . ”
41014071	Namon Peter iyau , “ Yau aurim abifaro , dura bag wat abikakafun ! Yau anbibisigo mes on God yau inimakieu , on Orot aurin wobikakafun on yau men asagobai on ! ”
41014072	Men weromin kokorerek ra bairuin itou ato Peter inos mamaba Iesu aurin i’yau on , On iyau , “ Om arimon auriu ra ton unisosoufiu unau , yau On Orot on men asagobai weie kokorerek bairuin inatou . ” Ato Peter men sunub itou on .
41015001	Fomenei fomenei priest aiwabis , sabu kawian , Baifafaro an baibebeotis , a Jew Babadis Rurubinis on engon tutufin baiyagiginai nan siruayo asi bainonot on sidudurai . Osi Iesu iman sifatumen ato sibonanawai sinai Pilate imanai siyagai .
41015002	Pilate on Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Om min Jew yangan asi Aiwab i ? ” Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om dura ato u’yau on nanaba . ”
41015003	Priest aiwabis on bobo sigaraba auris on Iesu siubarai ,
41015004	on mes Pilate on itetemai men iyau , “ Om min arimon dura uniyafoteu i ? Osi Om sebiubarem an dura min etatam ! ”
41015005	Iesu men igogoi dura tani itau men ato on aurin on Pilate iduduran wat .
41015006	Kwanda fufur Baisobon an Forag an ra Pilate on bobo nanaba ifofour sabu on aurin sibifefeyan ato orot tani fafatum goai imama on iboseirai i’gat .
41015007	On an werai sabu fonaseirotis fani on gawan aurin on fetag fetag sigagam orot siyasubun , on mes osi on fafatum goai siwanis simama , on orot tani min Barabbas .
41015008	Sabu kuayo gagamin siruayo mom ato sibosuruf Pilate sibifefeyanai an bobo mamaba ainau ifofour on nanaba asi gogoi on itafour weines mes ,
41015009	on itetemis iyau , “ Omi wogogoi yau Jew yangan asi Aiwab an yatetai ingat weinem ? ”
41015010	Pilate isagob tiwag priest aiwabis on Iesu siboboarai on mes osi Iesu sibo on imanai siyagai .
41015011	Baise priest aiwabis on sabu kuayo gagamin auris on dura sikitabirai yas sibogagaien ato sifefeyan Pilate aurin on Barabbas ityatetai itgat weines .
41015012	Pilate on sabu kuayo auris dura ikakafun men iyau , “ Omi ami gogoi aifan aurim anafour atonio orot woyoyorai Jew yangan asi Aiwab i ? ”
41015013	Osi engon tutufin siyoku men siyau , “ Nabai ekubarai ! ”
41015014	Pilate itetemis iyau , “ Baise On Orot on abi bobo komasin ifour ? ” Osi engon tutufin aumiet bag siyoku siyau , “ Nabai ekubarai ! ”
41015015	Pilate igogoi sabu itiyasisires , on mes Barabbas iyatetai igat weines . Namon Pilate on wou yangan iyawures Iesu siyaswabirai weie osi imasi iyagai nabai sitkubarai mes .
41015016	Wou yangan Iesu sibo sirui Rome orot gagamin an goa amonai ato wou yangan fani ba siyores nan siruayo .
41015017	Osi beber mururin sibo Iesu siyotai ato wengar aisikis fafames mat siboen nigir siyamai uninai siyein .
41015018	Namon osi sibosuruf Iesu sibikakaiwai si’yau , “ Jew yangan asi Aiwab , wera roke mama wantoanin ! ”
41015019	Osi siwa sibo Iesu uninai sirab , sikantuturai , osi On aurin sindas sirorouin , ato sikwakwafirai .
41015020	Osi sikoboai isawar weie beber mururin siboseir men ato Toun an beber on siyotai men . Namon osi Iesu sibonanawai sigat nabai sitkubarai mes .
41015021	Osi si’nan eta nenenai ato orot wabin Simon on mat sinofoten , on tafanam tani emon i’nat au mafam gagamin , ato wou yangan on orot sibo sirukokouai siyawur Iesu an nab iyabar . ( Simon on Cyrene mafam gagamin emon ato on min Alexander a Rufus rus tamas . )
41015022	Osi Iesu sibonanawai sinai tafanam wabin seyoyorai Golgotha on nan sigat , on tafanam an yabin min , “ Tekwakwan an efan . ”
41015023	Osi nan sifourtobon sareu wine on fio riribin bag on mat sisutatabir sititai ittoman mes , baise Iesu on men fofonin ittoman .
41015024	Namon osi Iesu nabai sikubarai ato an beber sibo tous sanasi siraram , ato osi asi barom siyo nan sitsagob wou orot menan on beber itboai .
41015025	Fomenei wera auyotoat sasagis baibatin nanaba on osi Iesu nabai sikubarai .
41015026	On an ubar dura on wengar sibo nan sigayam unin tefanai nan wengarai sidudun siyau , “ Jew yangan asi Aiwab . ”
41015027	Mat osi orot yakeotis ruam siboes Iesu mat nabai sikubares , orot tani on an asumaiauai a orot tani on an asugagafai .
41015028	( On etaiai on God an dura sigagayam on inat idura bag , God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , “ On sabu yakeotis mat simakiai . ’ )
41015029	Sabu nan si’nan si’nat on unis siyuyuwe ato Iesu sibikoboai : Osi si’yau , “ Aha ! Om uyau tafaror goa utgoros ato ra baitonin amonai utyon men ! ”
41015030	Osi si’yau , “ Om ari nab emon esur ato Toum eiyawasim tait . ”
41015031	On eta kaitamomai priest aiwabis a Baifafaro an baibebeotis osi mat Iesu sikoboai , ato tous wat auris siyau bonen , “ On tuturan fani ibiyawasis , baise On Toun on men fofonin iniyawasai on !
41015032	Ot Keriso tanitai , Israel yangan asi Aiwab , On ari bag nab emon esur ato ot On tanitutumai ! ” Ato orot ruam Iesu mat nabai sikukubares on osi mat simisir Iesu sigigimai .
41015033	Wera aiyet nanaba on tafanam engon tutufin iwouman , inai wera ton nanaba isawar .
41015034	Ibirabirabi wera ton nanaba Iesu on aumiet bag iyor iyau , “ Eloi , Eloi , lema Sabachthani ? ” on an yabin min , “ Au God , au God , Om aibo mes uikirireu ? ”
41015035	Sabu fani nan sitatawar on sitatamai ato siyau , “ Wotatam , On Elijah aurin eyoyor ! ”
41015036	Orot tani beber samisamin ibo ramo amonai sareu wine riribin ikutub ato siwa kanfounai iyein . Namon on siwa iyotogai Iesu giburunai iyein ato iyau , “ Womousin ! Tanitai Elijah on enat Iesu nab emon inboai inyeirai ! ”
41015037	Iesu aumiet iwaf namon irabob .
41015038	Beber nan tafaror goa amonai iroror on isafef ruam simatar tefanai isur inai babanai igat .
41015039	Wou yangan asi bainetewar orot nan nab nanai itatawar on Iesu it mamaba irabob . On iyau , “ Atonio Orot on dura bag God Natun ! ”
41015040	Jever fani on nan , nanenei sitawar siruruai . Osi sanasi on Mary Magdalene , Mary , James kafakakai a Joseph rus ayos a Salome .
41015041	Osi on nan Galilee emon Iesu sigibubunuai sinat ato Iesu an gogoi on sibaisin . Jever fani sigaraba on nan , osi on Iesu mat sinat au Jerusalem .
41015042	Ibirabirabi ato Joseph on an mafam gagamin on Arimathea , on emon inat . On orot on Jew Babadis Rurubinis an kuayo orot tani ato on orot on God an Baiaiwab enat aurin on imomousin . Botitiwag an ra ( on ra itatom on Sabat ) , on mes Joseph on totor wat irui Pilate nanai itawar ato Iesu usin boin aurin on ifefeyanai ,
41015043	
41015044	Iesu irabob nono duran Pilate itatam on men sunub iduduran on . On mes wou yangan asi bainetewar orot iyor ato itetemai dura bag Iesu on men ari irabob nono .
41015045	Wou yangan asi bainetewar orot an dudur on Pilate itatam isawar ato on Joseph ibasitai Iesu usin itboai mes .
41015046	Joseph beber neneyan kakakaiin obin itobon ato usin ibo iyeirai , beberai ikiman ato rasi dogu amonai iwan . Ato rasi agim wawanin on ainau isar ibotitiwag i’yen nono . Namon on agim gagamin ifiruruai dogu awan iyafotai .
41015047	Mary Magdalene a Mary , Joseph ayon osi matasi sit Iesu usin nan siyein .
41016001	Sabat ra isawar gibunai , Mary Magdalene a Mary , James ayon , Salome mat on fio yanden ninibin on sitobon sitboai sitan Iesu usin sitimutai mes .
41016002	Sunday fomenei fomenei wera igegeg mom , osi sinai au rasi doguai nan .
41016003	Osi si’nan eta nenenai ato tous wat siyau bonen , “ Iyafan arimon rasi dogu awanai agim inifiruruai weinet ? ” ( On agim on gagamin bag . ) Namon osi usos sitagai si’yeit on agim sit on ainau sifiruruai imatabir nono i’yen .
41016004	
41016005	On mes osi rasi dogu amonai sirui , ato nan orot boboun sit beber kakakaiin wat iyot asumaiauai imair imama — ato osi on sit on engon siror .
41016006	On iyawures iyau , “ Omi men woniror mes . ” Yau asagob omi Iesu Nazareth emon nabai sikukubarai on wonunuen . On men nin - On rabob emon imisir men ! Woit , On efan atonio nin siyein i’yen .
41016007	Omi ari atonio dura wonboai wonan On an baigibubunuotis wonkasones a Peter mat wonkasonai . ‘ On ainau namui enan au Galilee ; On arimon nan wonitai , On ato iyawurem on nanaba . ’ ”
41016008	On mes osi rasi dogu emon sigat ato siber kwakwan nunuas yababan ibonues auman siyayai sinai . Osi men iyafan tani aurin sikakafun yabin osi siber kwakwan .
41016009	[ Sunday fomenei Iesu rabob emon imisir ato On ainau Mary Magdalene aurin irobotet , on jever min ainau Iesu dau engon nimtereban ruam on tefan emon ifaitanis sigat .
41016010	On inai baigibubunuotis ikasones . Osi siyababan sitotou ;
41016011	ato osi Mary sitatam ikakafun i’yau on Iesu matanai bag it , On imisir men , ato osi men situtumai .
41016012	On gibunai Iesu an baigibubunuotis ruam sibib si’nan au tafanam tani nan ato Iesu an Itin taniai nan auris irobotet .
41016013	Osi simatabir men ato sabu fani sikasones baise osi men situtum on .
41016014	Gibui bag on Iesu an baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagin kaita bayu si’yam nan auris irobotet . On igam iyawures yabin osi asi baitutum ambin mat osi nunuas wawanis on mes sabu fani Iesu yawasin sit siyawures on men situtumes .
41016015	On iyawures iyau , “ Omi wonan au tafanam engonai ato wasagobin wonbino sabu engon tutufin auris .
41016016	Iyai iyafan ebitutum ato inbibapataito on arimon inyawas ; iyai iyafan men initutum on arimon baimaki inboai .
41016017	Baitutumotis on arimon faiwar sinboai bobo buburis sinfouren : Osi Yau Wabiui arimon dau sinfaitanis singat ; Osi arimon fafes sinikitabiren sabu touman fonasi sinikakafun ;
41016018	Osi mota komasin sinboai a sareu sinbokatet auman sitoman on osi arimon men sinarab ; osi imas sabu sawauis usisi sinyein on osi engon arimon sinyawas . ”
41016019	Bada Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat sikakafun isawar weie On au safam igai ato God an asumaiauai imair .
41016020	Baigibubunuotis sigat tafanam au engonai dura sibino , ato Bada an baibais mat siboen asi bino ikufaiwaren ato bobo buburis sifouren onai auris idura bag ato sabu engon situtum . ]
42001001	Arie Theophilus : Sabu sigaraba sifourtobon bobo aifan wei sanayi God ifouren simamatar on sigayam .
42001002	Osi dura sigayam mamaba bobo anai bag imamatar tous matasi si’tai on a osi min on dura sikurereb , osi sabu on dura wei auri sidudur .
42001003	On mes Orot Gagamim , yau tou on atonio osi bobo engon tutufin anai bag simamatar on aimatit tiwag , yau ainonot on iyobin dura totorinai wat atgayam weinem .
42001004	Yau dura atonio agagayam aurim , onai om unsagob dura aifan engon tutufin sibibebeyem on dura bag .
42001005	Judea an aiwab orot wabin Herod imama an werai , priest wabin Zechariah , on min Abijah priest an dam emon . On awan wabin min Elizabeth , on jever mat on eb priest an dam warar emon .
42001006	Osi rus God matanai on asi yawas totorinai wat simama a Bada an baifafaro dura a an eta aurin on sifonabo tiwag .
42001007	Osi nanatus ambin yabin Elizabeth on arin , ato on awan Zechariah rus on siorokwar sijenikwar isawar .
42001008	Ra tani Zechariah on priest an bobo tafaror goa amonai God nanai ibobo , on an bobo an wera inat on ibobo .
42001009	Osi priest asi kik on nanaba sibigibubunuai , osi asi barom siyo on nan sirubinai sirifu kemai nan fifiu itterai mes . On mes on inai Bada an tafaror goa amonai irui ,
42001010	ato sabu kuayo gagamin tafaror goa kounai on fifiu i’yaras an werai on sibabayoi .
42001011	Bada an anea on Zechariah aurin irobotet , sirifu kema an asumaiauai nan itawar , fifiu iyaras nan .
42001012	Zechariah iyeit anea it mom on iror ato iber .
42001013	Baise anea on aurin iyau , “ Zechariah om men unaber mes ! God on om am bayoi itatam , ato awam Elizabeth on arimon natum fifi orot inituai , om wabin unyorai John .
42001014	Om arimon men sunub uniyasisir , ato on fifi inrarat on sabu fani sigaraba mat arimon siniyasisir !
42001015	On God matanai on arimon orot gagamin bag . On sareu wawanis a sareu wine mat on men inatom mes . On inrarat mom on arimon Ayu Kakafotin inibonuai .
42001016	On arimon Israel sabu sigaraba maiau on inboes sinmatabir men asi Bada asi God aurin .
42001017	On arimon ainau Bada nanai inan , wawanin a faiwarin aubairuruotin Elijah ba . On arimon tatamas a nanatus inboes sinnat sinikaita men ; on arimon sabu fonaseirotis inboes iniyames sinmatabir men asi bainonot on yawas totorinai sininonot : on arimon Bada an sabu inboes inbotitiwagis On aurin sinmousin . ”
42001018	Zechariah on anea aurin iyau , “ Yau arimon mamaba ansagob on dura ebikakafun on dura bag ? Yau on orokwar wat , a awau on eb jenikwar wat . ”
42001019	Anea iyafotai iyau , “ Yau on Gabriel , yau on God nanai atatawar , yau on On iyafareu anat aurim anikakafun a atonio dura aurin on anawurem mes .
42001020	Baise om au dura aurin on men ututum , ato an werai bag weie bobo arimon inmatar . Om men ututum on mes om arimon awam inakok : om arimon dura men unikakafun inan on an rai yau aumatanim on innat inidura bag . ”
42001021	Sabu on Zechariah simomousin ato sibinonotis on aibo mes wera weromin maiau nan tafaror goa amonai emama .
42001022	On tafaror goa emon igat mom , on men fofonin dura sabu auris itikakafun on , on asir imanai wat auris nan ibikakafun , on mes osi sisagob on Bada o anea on nan tafaror goa amonai aurin irobotet .
42001023	Tafaror kaitamom amonai Zechariah an bobo tafaror goa amonai ibobo on isawar ato on imatabir men inai au go .
42001024	Men weromin on awan Elizabeth on inafot ato roke nim nanaba on an goa amonai wat ima .
42001025	Elizabeth iyau , “ Ari weie Bada on etaiai on ibaisiu . On atonio bobo iyamai imatar onai sabu matasi gibui men anbomamai mes . ”
42001026	Elizabeth inafot an roke nimtereban kaita nanaba on nan God an anea Gabriel iyafarai inai Galilee amonai mafam gagamin tani wabin Nazareth on nan .
42001027	On dura ibo inat jeverei aurin , on jeverei min siyaumatanai orot wabin Joseph rus sittabin mes , Joseph min aiwab David an dam warar emon . Jeverei wabin min Mary .
42001028	Anea on aurin inat ato iyau , “ Tuf aurim inama ! Bada on om bisimui emama ato On an baimomogin on gagaminai bag imomoginem ! ”
42001029	Anea an dura ibikakafun on Mary iror , ato ibinonotai atonio dura an yabin on aifan .
42001030	Anea on aurin iyau , “ Mary om men unaber mes ; yabin God om ekakaberem .
42001031	Om arimon uninafot ato fifi orot unituai ; ato wabin unyorai Iesu .
42001032	On arimon gagamin bag inmatar ato arimon sinyorai God Natun Aiyetunenei Bag . Bada God on arimon iniyamai iniAiwab , On wawan agirin David ba ,
42001033	ato On arimon Jacob an dam warar auris iniAiwab au wantoan ; an Baiaiwab on an kanfoun ambin ! ”
42001034	Mary on anea aurin iyau , “ Yau on matafiu wat . Atonio bobo on arimon mamaba inmatar ? ”
42001035	Anea iyafotai iyau , “ Ayu Kakafotin arimon amomui inar , ato God an faiwar on arimon om intaragabuem . On yabinai fifi Kakafotin min arimon sinyorai God Natun .
42001036	Enos om tuam Elizabeth . Sabu siyau on arimon men fifi inituai on , baise on toun on ari inafot an roke nimtereban kaita , basit on ijenikwar min on .
42001037	Bobo engon tutufin God aurin on fofonin wat . ”
42001038	Mary iyau , “ Yau on God an agirotiu , dura aifan ubikakafun on auriu inmatar . ” Ato anea ikirir inai .
42001039	Men weromin gibunai Mary ibotitiwag ato yagiginai inai oyau oyau tafanamai Judea mafam gagamin tani amonai nan .
42001040	On inai Zechariah an goai ato Elizabeth ikakaiwai .
42001041	Elizabeth on Mary anbaikakaiu i’tatam on fifi yan amonai iyayob . Ayu Kakafotin Elizabeth ibonuai ,
42001042	ato on fonan aumiet bag ikakafun iyau , “ Om God an baimomogin on gagamin bag item jever engon tutufin amosi , a fifi unbibituai mat on God imomoginai !
42001043	Yau men anonosin atonio bobo gagamin bag auriu itmatar on , ato yau au Bada ayon on itnat yau itfasiueu mes ?
42001044	Om am baikakaiu dura atatam mom on , fifi yau amonai on yasisirai iroboge .
42001045	Om On ututumai on yasisir gagamin bag , yabin Bada an aumatan om aurim ibikakafun on arimon innat inidura bag ! ”
42001046	Mary iyau , “ Yau nunuaui Bada abifain ;
42001047	yau ayubiui on abiyasisir yabin God on yau au Baiyawasotin ,
42001048	Yabin On yau inosiu , yau on an agir jever wat ! Ra ari a ra gibui on sabu engon tutufin sinyoreu sinau God imomoginem .
42001049	yabin bobo gagamis bag on God Faiwarin auriu ifouren . On Wabin on Kakafotin ;
42001050	God sabu ekakaberes osi iyabon On sebeberuai on , sabu ari ra semama auris a sabu ra gibui sinmama auris .
42001051	On iman faiwarin iyotet igat sabu ato osi iyabon taseseiris on engon ikugeyes sitagege .
42001052	On aiwab faiwaris asi mamageai simama emon on iyeires sisur , ato sabu kitumis on ibogaiis sigai .
42001053	On sabu kokoianis auris on asi sawar obis ibonues weines , ato sabu sawarotis on imas waganis wat iyafares sinai .
42001054	On an aumatan wawat agirit auris ibiyamai on ebokikin ; ato On inat an agirotis Israel yangan inibaisis mes .
42001055	On an aumatan Abraham a On an dam warar engon auris ibiyamai on inos , on inkaberes au wantoan ! ”
42001056	Mary on nan Elizabeth bisinai ima roke ton isawar weie imatabir men inai an au go .
42001057	Elizabeth an wera inat fifi itituai mes , ato fifi orot ituai .
42001058	On an sabu a an dam warar duran sitatam mamaba Bada ikakaberai on , osi mat engon on aurin on men sunub siyasisir on .
42001059	Fifi irat tafaror kaitamom nanaba isawar ato osi sinat fifi sitiaskibubuai mes , ato sigogoi taman Zechariah wabinai sitiwabseirai mes .
42001060	Baise fifi ayon iyau , “ Ambin ! On wabin on John tanyorai . ”
42001061	Osi on Elizabeth aurin siyau , “ Baise omi ami dam warar amonai on men iyafan tani atonio wab ibo on ! ”
42001062	Namon osi imasi wat fifi taman siyawur , an gogoi wab menan on fifi sityorai .
42001063	Zechariah on fef mes ifefeyan ato fifi wabin igayam iyau , “ On wabin on John . ” Osi engon tutufin nan on men sunub siduduran on !
42001064	Men weromin Zechariah awan iruseren dura ikakafun men , ato on ibosuruf God ifain .
42001065	Sabu engon tutufin on siber kwakwan , ato atonio osi bobo simamatar an dura on irat inai Judea oyau oyau tafanam engon ibonu .
42001066	Sabu engon tutufin on dura sitatam on sibinonotis ato sibitetem si’yau , “ Atonio fifi inrarat gagamin on arimon mamaba inmatar ? ” Osi rerebai sit sisagob Bada iman an faiwar on fifi bisinai yen .
42001067	John taman Zechariah on Ayu Kakafotin ibonuai ato God an dura ikakafun iyau :
42001068	“ Ot engon tutufin Bada tanifain , Israel yangan asi God ! On inat an sabu inibaisis a iniyawasis mes .
42001069	God on ati Baiyawasotin Faiwarin itet , an agirotin David an dam warar emon .
42001070	God ainau bag an aubairuruotis kakafotis awasi iyaumatanit .
42001071	On iyaumatanit arimon ati ragit sabu emon a osi sabu iyabon asi faiwar engonai sebiragitet on emon iniyawasit .
42001072	On iyau on arimon wawat agirit inkaberes a an dura bobaibasit kakafotin ibiyamai on innos .
42001073	On an aumatan tutufinai wawat agirit Abraham aurin iyamai ato ifaro iyau on arimon ati ragit sabu asi faiwar emon iniyawasit onai ot On tanbiagirai on men tanaber mes ,
42001074	
42001075	ot on kakafotit ati yawas totorinai wat On nanai tantawar ra au engon ati yawas tutufinai .
42001076	“ Om Yau natu , on arimon sinyorem God Aiyetunenei Bag an aubairuruotim . Om arimon ainau Bada nanai unan an eta unbotitiwag wain .
42001077	Om On an sabu unibebeyes sinsagob God osi asi bokomas innotbur on arimon sinyawas .
42001078	Ot ati God on kaberotin a mamanauin . On arimon yawas on fomenei ra awan an kudidirin ba iniyamai inar ot aurit intagawai ,
42001079	a safam emon ratafin intagawai osi sabu iyabon rabob an wouman didibar amonai semama auris , ot etai tanbibib on arimon tuf an etaiai inbonanawaiit tanabib . ”
42001080	Fifi irat gagamin imatar a ayuai on eb irat an faiwar gagamin ibo . On efan koiteterinai nan ima ato an wera inat on wasai irobotet Israel sabu auris irerebai .
42002001	On an werai Caesar Augustus an baifafaro dura iyein on sabu engon tutufin Rome tafanam amonai semama on engon wabis sinabo .
42002002	Quirinius on Syria tafanam ibigawan an rai on atonio bobo sabu wabis bo min on an werai nan sibosuruf .
42002003	Sabu engon tutufin sinai tous asi mafamai nan gawan wabis ibiwanen .
42002004	Joseph on Galilee amonai mafam gagamin wabin Nazareth on emon inai au mafam Bethlehem gagamin , Judea tafanam amonai nan , menan aiwab David irarat an efanai nan . Joseph on nan inai yabin on min David an dam warar emon .
42002005	Joseph on Mary rus sinai wabis sitiwan mes , on jeverei on siyaumatanai Joseph rus sittabin mes . Mary on yan auman
42002006	ato osi rus on Bethlehem nan , ato jever an wera inat fifi itituai mes .
42002007	Ato Mary natun fifi ainau orot ituai , beberai ikikimanai ato foro sheep asi bayu am an didiwagai nan iyenuai i’yenbubur — yabin nanawan goa amonai on efan ambin menan nan arimon sitama .
42002008	Foro sheep asi kaifarotis fani on tafanam turinai nan simama ato fom on sigat asi foro sheep sikakaifares .
42002009	Bada an anea on nan auris irobotet , ato Bada an kudidirin on usisi nan itagawai . Osi siber kwakwan ,
42002010	baise anea on osi auris iyau , “ Omi men wonaber mes ! Yau on wasagobin omi aurim abo anat , yasisir gagamin bag sabu engon tutufin auris .
42002011	Ato ari ra David an mafamai nan on omi ami Baiyawasotin irat — Bada Keriso !
42002012	Omi atonio nanaba wonitai wonsagob : Omi arimon fifi wongaturai beberai sikikimanai foro sheep asi bayu am an didiwagai nan siyenuai yen . ”
42002013	Ra kaita anea asi kuayo gagamin bag safam an wou yangan on sirobotet anea ainauin mat sikwarer God sibifain si’yau :
42002014	“ God safam aiyetunenei bag emama aurin tanifain taniduranai ato tafanamai tuf on an sabu auris osi iyabon On auris ebiyasisir on ! ”
42002015	Anea simatabir men sigai au safam ato , foro sheep kaifarotis on tous wat auris siyau bonen , “ Ot tanan au Bethlehem atonio bobo imamatar on tanitai , mamaba Bada i’yawuret on . ”
42002016	On mes osi gagariwat sinai ato Mary a Joseph rus sigatures , fifi orot mat foro sheep asi bayu am an didiwagai nan i’yen sit .
42002017	Foro sheep kaifarotis on fifi sit isawar weie , osi mamaba anea fifi aurin i’yawures on sikasones .
42002018	Osi sabu iyabon foro sheep kaifarotis asi dura sibikakafun si’tatam on siduduran .
42002019	Mary atonio osi bobo engon tutufin auris on nunuan amonai ikutatan ato an not tutufinai nan ibinonoten .
42002020	Foro sheep kaifarotis simatabir men sinai aifan matasi si’tai a dura si’tatam on engon God sifain siduduranai ; anea i’yawures on bobo nanaba imatar .
42002021	Tafaror kaitamom isawar ato fifi orot an wera inat sitiaskibubuai mes , ato osi wabin siyor Iesu , anea atonio wab on Mary itai weie on gibui inafot .
42002022	Moses an baifafaro iyau nanaba on an wera inat ato Joseph on Mary rus asi yawas sibobounen . On mes osi fifi orot sibo sinai au Jerusalem Bada aurin sikutetai ,
42002023	Bada an baifafaro dura buk amonai sigayam siyau : “ Fifirig orot abou sinrarat on Bada aurin wonkutetai . ”
42002024	On mes osi mat sinai kiwiu kumag ruam siboen asi sirifu sikuteten , Bada an baifafaro iyau nanaba .
42002025	On an werai orot wabin Simeon on Jerusalem nan imama . On orot on an yawas totorin wat , God ibeberuai ato on orot on imomousin God Israel yangan itiyawasis aurin . Ayu Kakafotin on on orot bisinai imama
42002026	ato Ayu Kakafotin on orot iyawur on Bada an aumatan Keriso inrarat matanai initai weie on inarab .
42002027	Ayu Kakafotin on Simeon ibonanawai inai au tafaror goai . On an rai fifi ayon taman on fifi Iesu sibo sirui tafaror goa amonai asi baifafaro iyau nanaba on sitafour .
42002028	Simeon fifi imanai irous ato God aurin ikakaiwai :
42002029	“ Bada Om am aumatan nana ubokikin ato ari weie am agirotin unikirir tufai inan .
42002030	Yau tou mataui bag Om am Baiyawasotin ait .
42002031	Om ubotitiwagai sabu engon tutufin matasi :
42002032	On an ratafin on sabu men Jew yangan auris ingat intagawai , Om Wabim duran gagamin on am sabu Israel yangan auris inboai innat . ”
42002033	Fifi ayon taman on siduduran ato Simeon fifi orot aurin ibikakafun on .
42002034	Simeon imomogines ato Mary , fifi ayon aurin iyau , “ God atonio fifi irubinai on fasinai Israel sabu sigaraba fani arimon sinafeu a fani arimon sinmisir men . On min God an baiyoboen , sabu sigaraba arimon on an dura aurin on siniragitai ,
42002035	ato sabu fani asi bainonot buburis on arimon inboai ingat sinsagob . Ato yababan on arimon seri wan mamatan ba on toum nunuam inyoai . ”
42002036	Aubairuruotin jenikwar tani wabin Anna kena jever on min Phanuel natun jeverei , osi min Asher an dam warar emon . On jenikwar min itabin kwanda nimtereban ruam nanaba isawar ato on kena jever wat imama on ari an kwanda on orot baibatin sasagis baibatin nanaba isawar . On jenikwar on men meyan tafaror goa an farat ikirir igat inai mabinai mes , on fom ra on God ikwakwafirai , bayu aurin ibifofour a ibabayoi .
42002037	
42002038	On wera kaitamom amonai jenikwar on inat God ikakaiwai ato fifi aurin on ikakafun ato osi sabu engon tutufin iyabon God simomousin Jerusalem amonai itrufanis aurin on .
42002039	Joseph a Mary rus on Bada an baifafaro dura iyau nanaba on an bobo siyamai isawar weie , osi simatabir men asi mafam gagamin Nazareth aurin , Galilee tafanam amonai .
42002040	Fifi irat gagamin faiwarin imatar ; on an not gigiboan irat kwakwan , ato God an baimomogin on On bisinai i’yen .
42002041	Kwanda fufur Iesu ayon taman au Jerusalem si’nan Baisobon an Forag ra aurin .
42002042	Iesu an kwanda auyotoat sasagis ruam ibo , ato osi sinai forag aurin , osi ra fufur on bobo nanaba sifofour .
42002043	Forag an ra isawar ato osi simatabir men si’nan au go , baise fifi Iesu on nan Jerusalem ima . On ayon taman on men sisagob On nan ima ;
42002044	osi sinos Iesu on sabu kuayo sanasi mat sibib senan , on mes osi wera tutufin amonai on sibib si’nan mom inai ibirabirabi ato osi sibosuruf fifi sinunuen asi dam warar a tuturas amosi .
42002045	osi fifi on men sigaturai , on mes simatabir men sinai au Jerusalem nan fifi sinunuen .
42002046	Ra baitoninai on osi fifi tafaror goa amonai sigaturai , On Jew yangan asi baibebeotis mat simama asi dura i’tatam ato ibitetemis .
42002047	On an sagob a an not gigiboanai nan asi dura ibiyafotes ato sabu iyabon On an dura sitatam on engon siduduranai .
42002048	Ayon taman on fifi sitai on men sunub siduduran ato ayon on fifi aurin iyau , “ Natu , Om aibo mes atonio bobo nanaba auri ufour ? Tamam rui on yababanai wafourtobon om wanunuenim . ”
42002049	On iyafotes iyau , “ Omi aibo mes Yau wonunueniu i ? Omi men wosagob Yau on Tamau an goai amama ? ”
42002050	Baise On an dura aifan ibiyafotes on osi men sisagob .
42002051	On mes Iesu imatabir men mat sinai au Nazareth , On nan asi gogoi on auris ifonabo bobo iboen . On ayon on bobo aifan simamatar on engon tutufin nunuanai iyeyeinin .
42002052	Iesu irarat gagamin ato an not gigiboan auman irarat , ato God a sabu mat on sigogoiai .
42003001	Caesar Tiberius on Rome yangan auris ibiaiwab on kwanda auyotoat sasagis nim nanaba ; ato Pontius Pilate on Judea tafanam asi gawan gagamin imama , Herod on Galilee tafanam on ibinetewarai , ato on tain tuan Philip on Iturea a Trachonitis tafanam on ibinetewarai ; Lysanias on Abilene tafanam ibinetewarai ,
42003002	ato Anna a Caiaphas osi on priest ainauis simama . On an werai nan John , Zechariah natun on efan koiteterinai nan imama ato God an dura on inat bisinai igat .
42003003	On mes John inai Jordan Sareu tafanam engon tutufin amonai dura ibibino i’yau , “ Omi ya baikitabir wonboai ato wonibapataito , ato God arimon ami bokomas innotbur . ”
42003004	On nanaba aubairuruotin Isaiah dura buk amonai igayam iyau , “ Orot tani efan koiteterinai eyoyor : ‘ Eta wonbotitiwag Bada aurin ; On an eta on totorin wat woniyamai on nan inabib !
42003005	Anag engon wontounen sinag , oyau gugudis a oyau gagamis engon wonatar sinsur wonrumomoyen . Eta bibiris engon wonitotoren , ato eta baga baga engon wonruyawaren .
42003006	Ato sabu engon on arimon God an baiyawas on sinitai ! ’ ”
42003007	Sabu kuayo gagamin on sigat John aurin itibapataitois mes . John osi auris iyau , “ Omi on mota nanatun ; Iyafan ikasonem ato God an baimaki iniyafarai mes on wan emon wonayai kirir i ?
42003008	Omi ato osi bobo ami yawasai wonafour on nan iniyoboet tansagob on omi ya baikitabir wobo . Ato omi toum sanamui on men wonbosuruf wonikakafun wonau , Abraham on wei wawai agiri . Yau awurem , God fofonin arimon atonio agim inboen infouren Abraham wawan agirin mes infouren !
42003009	God on kariwak ibotitiwag wengar awerorosi bag inasutuenen sinsur ; wengar engon men uwas obis si’nou on arimon inasutuenen sinsur ato wairafai inrebegagaien sinaraten . ”
42003010	Sabu sitetemai siyau , “ Ato wei on mamaba wanafour i ? ”
42003011	On iyafotes iyau , “ Iyai iyafan usin anbaitakwakwaren aurin ruam sen on inboai orot tani aurin ambin on initai , a iyai iyafan aurin bayu fofonin on infasararam . ”
42003012	Sabu agim takes bo’otis fani sinat bapataito aurin , ato osi on sitetemai siyau , “ Baibebeotim , wei on arimon mamaba wanafour i ? ”
42003013	On iyawures iyau , “ Omi sabu auris agim takes wonbobo on men wonawures tefanai ba sinyein sinitem mes . ”
42003014	Wou yangan fani mat on sitetemai siyau , “ Ato wei mat on mamaba i ? Wei arimon mamaba wanafour i ? ” On osi auris iyau , “ Omi on men sabu wonau gaganis wonibeberues osi bisisi agim wonabo mes a omi men sabu wonisigoes on nan asi agim wonabo mes . Omi ami baiyan mamaba woboai on ifofonim omi aurim . ”
42003015	Sabu on Keriso simomousin itnat mes ato John on bobo ifofour matasi si’tai on sibosuruf sibinonotis , osi sinonosin on min on Keriso bait ?
42003016	On mes John on osi sabu engon tutufin auris iyau , “ Yau on sareuai abibapataitoim , baise Orot Iyafan gagamin bag men yau ba on enat . Yau men orot obiu on fofonin arimon ann kikiman wat on anrufanen . On arimon Ayu kakafotinai a wairafai nan inibapataitoim .
42003017	On imanai on sif ibo ebotan , nan sawareg engon tutufin inarou sinafeu ato sawareg wat on inruayoen bayu an goai intubabaren ; baise On arimon sawareg fefemis on inabo wairafai interen sinarat ato on wairaf min arimon men inarab on . ”
42003018	John on Wasagobin ibino sabu auris , on dura fani faniai nan ikakafunen sabu iyawures asi yawas sinitotoren aurin on .
42003019	Baise John on wasai nan Galilee an gawan Herod on igam iyawur , yabin on tain tuan Philip awan iyabaruai iawan on mes a mat on bobo komasis sigaraba maiau ifouren .
42003020	Namon Herod min on bobo komasin bag ifour John ibo fafatum goai ireberuai .
42003021	John sabu engon tutufin ibapataitois isawar weie , Iesu mat ibapataitoai . On ibabayoi an ra on , safam iruseren ,
42003022	ato Ayu Kakafotin on kiwiu kumag ba imatar isur ato On tefanai itog . Ato fonan safam emon inat iyau , “ Om on Yau Natu au nuabo bag . Yau Om aurim abiyasisir . ”
42003023	Iesu an kwanda orot kaitamom auyotoat nanaba on an bobo wasai ibosuruf ; Sabu sinos Iesu on Joseph natun ; ato Joseph on Heli natun ;
42003024	Heli on Matthat natun ; Matthat on Levi natun ; Levi on Melchi natun ; Melchi on Jannai natun ; Jannai on Joseph natun ;
42003025	Joseph on Mattathias natun ; Mattathias on Amos natun ; Amos on Nahum natun ; Nahum on Esli natun ; Esli on Naggai natun ;
42003026	Naggai on Maath natun ; Maath on Mattathias natun ; Mattathias on Semein natun ; Semein on Josech natun ; Josech on Joda natun ;
42003027	Joda on Joanan natun ; Joanan on Rhesa natun ; Rhesa on Zerubbabel natun ; Zerubbabel on Shealtiel natun ; Shealtiel on Neri natun ;
42003028	Neri on Melchi natun ; Melchi on Addi natun ; Addi on Cosam natun ; Cosam on Elmadam natun ; Elmadam on Er natun ;
42003029	Er on Joshua natun ; Joshua on Eliezer natun ; Eliezer on Jorim natun ; Jorim on Matthat natun ; Matthat on Levi natun ;
42003030	Levi on Simeon natun ; Simeon on Judah natun ; Judah on Joseph natun ; Joseph on Jonam natun ; Jonam on Eliakim natun ;
42003031	Eliakim on Melea natun ; Melea on Menna natun ; Menna on Mattatha natun ; Mattatha on Nathan natun ; Nathan on David natun ;
42003032	David on Jesse natun ; Jesse on Obed natun ; Obed on Boaz natun ; Boaz on salmon natun ; Salmon on Nahshon natun ;
42003033	Nahshon on Amminadab natun ; Amminadab on Admin natun ; Admin on Arni natun ; Arni on Hezron natun ; Hezron on Perez natun ; Perez on Judah natun ;
42003034	Judah on Jacob natun ; Jacob on Isaac natun ; Isaac on Abraham natun ; Abraham on Terah natun ; Terah on Nahor natun ;
42003035	Nahor on Serug natun ; Serug on Reu natun ; Reu on Peleg natun ; Peleg on Eber natun ; Eber on shelah natun ;
42003036	shelah on Cainan natun ; Cainan on Arphaxad natun ; Arphaxad on Shem natun ; Shem on Noah natun ; Noah on Lamech natun ;
42003037	Lamech on Methuselah natun ; Methuselah on Enoch natun ; Enoch on Jared natun ; Jared on Mahalaleel natun ; Mahalaleel on Kenan natun ;
42003038	Kenan on Enosh natun ; Enosh on seth natun ; Seth on Adam natun ; Adam on God natun .
42004001	Ayu Kakafotin on Iesu ibonuai auman ato On Jordan Sareu emon imatabir men inat ato Ayu ibonanawai igat inai efan koiteterinai nan .
42004002	On nan ra orot ruam a fom ruam ima Afaguban irutobonai . On ra amonai on Iesu men bayu aifan tani iyan mes , ato on ra inat au kanfoun i’gat on , On bitanan igi .
42004003	Afaguban on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Om God Natun mes on , atonio agim yawur inikitabirai rafi sarar inmatar . ”
42004004	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ Orot jever on men fofonin bayu wat inam yawasin inama on ! ’ ”
42004005	Namon Afaguban on Iesu ibo wera dibon wat amonai on tafanam engon tutufin asi baiaiwab faiwaris on engon iyoboai .
42004006	Afaguban on iyawur iyau , “ Yau arimon atonio faiwar engon a baiaiwab engon tutufin anitem . Atonio osi engon tutufin on yau siteu , ato yau orot iyafan an rurubinai on arimon on anitai .
42004007	Om sindam unrou yau unkwafireu on , atonio osi engon tutufin on arimon Om ininoanim . ”
42004008	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ Bada am God On ekesin unkwafirai a On ekesin uniagirai ! ’ ”
42004009	Namon Afaguban Iesu ibo rus sinai au Jerusalem tafaror goa aiyetunai bag itawarai , ato iyawur iyau , “ Om God Natun mes on , nin emon ne esobit .
42004010	God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ God arimon an anea inawures Om sinfafarem tiwag . ’
42004011	Mat God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ Osi arimon imasi nan sinbogaiim ato Om amm men agimai unkuwotob on . ’ ”
42004012	Baise Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ Bada am God on men unrutobonai mes . ’ ”
42004013	Afaguban on eta au engonai Iesu aurin rutobon engon isawaren weie , ra dibon wat ikirir .
42004014	Namon Iesu on Ayu Kakafotin an faiwar ibonuai mat imatabir men inai Galilee tafanamai nan . On duran wat on irat inai tafanam au engon ibonu .
42004015	On bayoi goa amosi nan sabu ibibebeyes on sabu engon tutufin siduduranai .
42004016	Namon Iesu inai au Nazareth , menan On an mafamai irarat nan , ato ra fufur Sabat an ra on i’nan bayoi goai nan . On imisir itawar God an dura itiyab mes ,
42004017	ato orot God an dura an kaifarotin on aubairuruotin Isaiah an buk igagayam on ibo inat itai , On buk iruseren ato dura menan sigagayam on igaturai , dura ato nanaba iyau ,
42004018	“ Bada an Ayu Kakafotin on Yau bisiwui emama , yabin On irubineu Wasagobin anbino sabu kokoianis auris . On iyafareu sabu bokomas an fafatum amonai semama on anawures , omi arufanim wongat a sabu matas fotis on anawures omi matam woneit men , sabu yababanai semama yabin sabu fani sebisusuneis on mes , on anawures omi arufanim ,
42004019	ato dura ankurereb anau , “ Bada an kwanda inat nono an sabu iniyawasis . ”
42004020	Iesu buk ifunu igai irufot ato orot buk ekakaifarai on itai ato On imair . Sabu engon tutufin bayoi goa amonai on matas engon on Iesu wat siruruaiai ,
42004021	On ibosuruf auris dura ibikakafun i’yau , “ Atonio God an dura sigayam abiyab wo’tatam on ari inat idura bag . ”
42004022	Osi sabu engon tutufin nan on men sunub sifain a On an dura obis wat ibikakafun on aurin siduduran ato si’yau , “ On min Joseph natun i ? ”
42004023	On osi auris iyau , “ Yau asagob omi arimon atonio dura gigiboan sabu ra engon auriu sebikakafun sau on nanaba wonau , ‘ Kwakwairotim , toum eiyawasim . ’ Mat omi arimon auriu wonau Om bobo buburis nan Capernaum ufouren duram watatam on nanaba ari nin am mafam gagaminai bobo buburis unfouren . ’ ”
42004024	Iesu an dura ibotein iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag , aubairuruotin an mafam gagaminai on men segogoiai on .
42004025	“ Omi au dura wontatam : Yau awurem dura bag ainau Elijah imama an rai on kekena jever on sigaraba maiau Israel amonai simama , on an rai usan men iyayar kwanda ton , roke nimtereban kaita nanaba isawar a mat gomar auman irat tafanam au engon ibonu .
42004026	Baise God on men Elijah iyafarai inai kena jever tani nan Israel amonai imama aurin on , baise On iyafarai inai kena jever Zarephath mafam gagaminai nan imama aurin , Sidon mafam gagamin amonai nan .
42004027	Ato sabu usis gawu gawudis auman on sigaraba maiau nan Israel amonai simama , on an rai Elisha on aubairuruotin imama ; baise men iyafan tani usin ikubunagai on , baise Naaman Syria orot ekesin mom usin ikubunag . ”
42004028	Sabu nan bayoi goa amonai on dura si’tatam on , osi engon siyatatab .
42004029	Osi simisir Iesu imanai sibo sitein mafam gagamin emon sigat ato sibo sigai oyau aiyetunai menan ari mafam gagamin siyoyonin nan , osi sigogoi Iesu on oyau emon sitreberirai itsur ,
42004030	baise On sabu kuayo amosi an etai nan ibib inai isawar .
42004031	Namon Iesu inai au Capernaum mafam gagaminai nan , Galilee tafanam amonai , Sabat an ra nan On sabu ibibebeyes .
42004032	On an baibebe aurin on sabu engon tutufin siduduran , yabin On an dura on faiwar auman ibikakafun .
42004033	Bayoi goa amonai nan on orot tani ayu komasin tefanai igai ; orot on fonan aumiet bag iyoku iyau ,
42004034	“ Ah Iesu Nazareth emon , Om on aifan aurin wei egogoii ? Om unat wei unikomasi mes i ? Yau asagob Om on Iyafan : Om on God Kakafotin an dura bobibotim ! ”
42004035	Iesu dura wawaninai ayu komasin iyawur iyau , “ Om asunub ato orot eikirir egat ! ” Ayu komasin orot irukou sabu nasi ifeu ato ikirir igat inai , men aifan komasin tani aurin iyamai .
42004036	sabu engon tutufin nan on men sunub siduduranai ato tuturas mat siyau bonen , “ Atonio dura on aifan i ? Atonio Orot on an faiwar a an baibad auman duraiai wat ayu komasis yawures ato segat senan ! ”
42004037	Ato Iesu an dudur min irat on tafanam amonai engon ibonu .
42004038	Iesu bayoi goa ikirir ato inai Simon an goai nan . Simon rawan jever on isawau usin iforab kwakwan , ato jever isasawau an dura on Iesu sikasonai .
42004039	On inat jever i’yen nan itawar ato dura wawaninai sawau iyawur itikirir itgat mes . Jever usinai sawau isawar ato on ra kaita imisir osi asi bayu ibotitiwag weines .
42004040	Ibirabirabi wera isofafir kounai sabu iyabon tuturas sawau magis magis siboen simama on engon tutufin siboes sinat Iesu aurin ; On iman wat sabu engon tefasi iyayagaien on engon siyawasis .
42004041	Sabu sigaraba tefasi ayu komasis simama on usis emon si’gat sibiyoku siyau , “ Om on God Natun ! ” Iesu on dura wawaninai ayu komasis iyawures men sitikakafun mes , yabin osi sisagob On on Keriso .
42004042	Fomenei ra an woumanai Iesu mafam gagamin ikrir igat inai efan kifafanai nan . Sabu sibosuruf On sinunuen , ato sabu sinai On si’gaturai on , osi sifourtobon sitbotan men sitikirir itan mes .
42004043	Baise On iyawures iyau , “ Yau on mafam gagamis faniai mat nan God an Baiaiwab an Wasagobin anbino , yabin on fasinai on mes God Yau iyafareu anat On an bobo anabo mes . ”
42004044	On mes On tafanam au engon ibib bayoi goa amosi nan dura ibino .
42005001	Wera tani Iesu on Gannesaret kamit rewanai nan itatawar ato sabu sigaraba sinai aurin God an dura sittatam mes .
42005002	Iesu on iyeit wa ruam toreai siteinen sigai si’yen on iten ; sabu bosagotis on asi wa sikiriren ato asi uwat kamitai sikusosouen .
42005003	Iesu on wa tefanai ikaruge — on wa min Simon an wa — Iesu on Simon iyawur an wa ittein kafakakai nawat sitgat au borit . Iesu nan wa tefanai imair ato sabu kuayo ibebeyes .
42005004	Iesu dura ikakafun isawar ato Simon iyawur iyau , “ Wa eboi kafakakai nawat egat boritai , ato om tuturam mat ami uwat wonreberiren sinsur iyan woniyonen . ”
42005005	Simon iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , wei fom weromin wabosag wat men iyan tani waiyonai on . Baise Om uyau on mes yau uwat an reberiren sinsur . ”
42005006	Osi uwat sireberiren sisur ato iyan sigaraba anbabaton si’yonen kafakakai mom uwat sitsafefis .
42005007	On mes osi imas sirutab tuturas fani nan wa taniai on sitnat sitibaisis mes . Osi sinat ato wa ruam engon iyan wat sibonuen kafakakai mom asi wa sitdarir .
42005008	Simon Peter on bobo imatar it ato on Iesu nanai sindan irou ato iyau , “ Bada , eikirireu enai , yau bokomasotiu ! ”
42005009	Simon Peter a sabu fani mat nan on men sunub siduduran yabin osi iyan sigaraba sibiyonen aurin on .
42005010	Atonio boboai on Simon tuturan James a John osi min Zebedee nanatun mat siduduran . Iesu on Simon aurin iyau , “ Om men unaber mes ; ari ra on om sabu unboes sinnat Yau au baigibubunuotis mes sinmatar . ”
42005011	Osi tore nan asi wa siteinen sigai , sawar engon nan sikiriren ato Iesu sigibubunuai .
42005012	Ra tani Iesu on mafam gagamin taniai menan orot tani usin gawugawudin auman imama nan . On orot Iesu it mom on nanai ifeu sindan irou ato ifefeyanai iyau , “ Bada Om ungogoi mes on eigumidariu ! ”
42005013	Iesu orot aurin inai , ato iman iyof usin ibotobon ato iyau , “ Yau agogoi om ungumidar , ‘ Egumidar ! ” Ra kaita gawud komasin orot usinai on ikirir .
42005014	Iesu orot dura wawaninai iyawur iyau , “ Om men iyafan tani unkasonai mes , ab om totor wat unan priest aurin ato on usim ininateteim ; ato sirifu unyagai God unikakaiwai Moses an dura iyau nanaba , namon sabu engon sinsagob om on ugumidar . ”
42005015	Baise Iesu duran on irat kwakwan , ato sabu kuayo gagamin bag sinat Iesu an dura sittatam a sabu sawauotis on itiyawasis mes .
42005016	Baise On imamatabir men i’nan tafanam kifafanai nan ibabayoi .
42005017	Ra tani Iesu sabu ibibebeyes ato Pharisee yangan a Baifafaro an baibebeotis fani on sinat nan simair simama , osi on Galilee a Judea amosi mafam gagamis engon a Jerusalem emon sinat . Bada an faiwar on Iesu ibitai sabu sawauotis ibiyawasis .
42005018	Sabu fani orot raguraguin ireai i’yen auman siyabar sinat , ato osi sifourtobon sitabar sitar goa amonai Iesu nanai sityein mes .
42005019	Baise sabu kuayo on gagamin bag on mes osi men fofonin orot sitboai sitar au goa amon on . On mes osi orot siyabar sigai goa aiyetunai nan , ato osi uwayob sisafef nan orot ireai i’yen auman siyeirai isur sabu sigaraba simama sanasi isur Iesu nanai nan .
42005020	Iesu it on osi sabu asi baitutum on irat kwakwan , on mes On orot aurin iyau , “ Yau turau , om am bokomas ainotbur .
42005021	Baifafaro an baibebeotis a Pharisee yangan osi sibosuruf tous sanasi wat sigagamois si’yau , “ Atonio orot on iyafan atonio etaiai on baigigim dura God aurin ebikakafun ? Men iyafan tani arimon bokomas innotbur ; God ekesin mom on bokomas innotbur ! ”
42005022	Iesu on osi asi bainonot isagob ato auris iyau , “ Omi aibo mes on nanaba wobinonotim i ?
42005023	Menan on sasasan , Yau anau , ‘ Om am bokomas ainotbur o anau , ‘ Emisir ebib ? ’
42005024	On mes Yau aniyoboem wonsagob on Orot Natun an baibad auman nin tafanamai yen sabu asi bokomas innotbur . ” On mes On orot raguraguin aurin iyau , “ Yau awurem , emisir am ire ebo ato enai au go ! ”
42005025	Ra kaita orot sabu nasi imisir , an ire nan tefanai i’yen on ibogai ato inai au go God ibikakaiwai .
42005026	Osi sabu engon tutufin on men sunub siduduran ! Osi siber auman God sifain si’yau , “ Ari ra on bobo buburis matati taiten ! ”
42005027	On gibunai , Iesu igat inai agim takes bo’otin wabin Levi on it , on an bobo efanai imair imama . Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Eigibubunueu . ”
42005028	Levi imisir , an sawar engon nan ikiriren , ato Iesu igibubunuai .
42005029	Namon Levi an goai nan bo baitab gagamin Iesu aurin iyamai , ato agim takes bo’otis kuayo gagamin a sabu fani mat engon on nan kemai siruayo .
42005030	Pharisee yangan fani a Baifafaro an baibebeotis mat osi tous asi kuayo amonai on Iesu an baigibubunuotis sigam siyawures . Osi sitetemis siyau , “ Omi aibo mes agim takes bo’otis a sabu fonaseirotis on mat bayu wam i ? ”
42005031	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Sabu iyabon yawasis on men kwakwair orot segogoiai on baise osi sabu iyabon sawauotis wat .
42005032	Yau men anat sabu asi yawas totoris anyores on , baise Yau anat sabu fonaseirotis anyores ya baikitabir sinboai mes . ”
42005033	Sabu fani Iesu aurin siyau , “ John an baigibubunuotis on ra fufur bayu sebikirir sebifofour a sebabayoi a mat Pharisee asi baigibubunuotis on eb bobo kaitamom nanaba sefofour ; baise Om am baigibubunuotis on bayu sam setotom . ”
42005034	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi wononosin orot tabin boboun an bo baitab amonai tuturan mat semama on woniyames bitanan gigi auman sinama i ? Ambin bag !
42005035	Baise an wera innat arimon orot tabin boboun osi bisisi emon sinboai sinan weie on ra nan osi bayu sinikirir sinifofour . ”
42005036	Mat Iesu atonio dura kawenai nan auris idudur iyau , “ Men iyafan tani usit an baitakwakwaren boboun turin insafef ato usit an baitakwakwaren atamaninai safefin on isagirfotai mes . Ato on bobo nanaba infofour on usit an baitakwakwaren boboun inikomasai , ato beber boboun turin on arimon men beber atamanin mat inifofonin on .
42005037	O iyai iyafan on sareu wine boboun ibo kibub atamaninai irir , on bobo ato nanaba on arimon sareu wine boboun an forabinai on kibub atamanin intaseb sareu wine indebur , ato kibub min inkomas .
42005038	Ambin bag ! Ab sareu wine boboun on kibub bobounai unririn !
42005039	Ato men iyafan tani sareu wine atamanin etotoman ato gibui boboun ba aurin ingogoi mes , yabin on yau , ‘ Sareu wine atamanin on nanian obin bag . ’ ”
42006001	Sabat an rai nan Iesu on sawareg masau uwarai nan ibi i’nan . On an baigibubunuotis sibosuruf sawareg sibimarir , osi imasi nan uwas fefemis siboseseiren ato si’yam .
42006002	Pharisee yangan fani siyau , “ Ot ati Baifafaro iyau Sabat an ra on sofafar gagamin men bobo tanabo mes , ato omi aibo mes on bobo nanaba wofofour i ? ”
42006003	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi on dura bag God an dura woiyab wosagob , David an sabu mat bitanan igigies on bobo nanaba sifour .
42006004	David on God an goai irui rafi sarar kakafaiin sikutetai i’yen on ibo iyan ato turin on an sabu mat ites siyam . Baise ot ati Baifafaro iyau on priest ekesis mom on rafi sarar sinam ato sabu maiauit on ambin . ”
42006005	Ato Iesu an dura kanfounai iyau , “ Orot Natun on Sabat ra an Bada . ”
42006006	Sabat ra taniai nan Iesu inai bayoi goa amonai irui ato sabu ibibebeyes . Orot iman asumaiauai on raguraguin auman nan imama .
42006007	Baifafaro an baibebeotis fani a Pharisee yangan fani on Iesu an komasin sinunuen , On mamaba Moses an Baifafaro itastob aurin on , on mes osi sibimateteai tiwag mamaba Sabat an rai nan sabu itbiyawasis mes .
42006008	Baise Iesu on osi asi bainonot isagob ato On orot iman raguraguin aurin iyau , “ Om emisir enat nin nawui etawar . ” Orot imisir inai nasi itawar .
42006009	Namon Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Yau abitetemim : Ot ati Baifafaro mamaba wat iyau Sabat an ra tanafour mes i ? Orot tanibaisin o tanikomasai ? Orot an yawas taniyobinai o orot an yawas tanikomasai i ? ”
42006010	On matan iyeit inai sabu engon tutufin inateteis isawar namon On orot aurin iyau , “ Om imam yotet egat . ” Orot on bobo nanaba ifour ato iman iyobin men .
42006011	Baise osi on yas sitatab kwakwan ato sibosuruf tous sanasi sibikakafun bonen bobo mamaba Iesu aurin sitafour mes .
42006012	On an werai Iesu igai oyauai nan itbayoi mes ato On fom tutufin on nan ima God aurin ibabayoi .
42006013	Ra itom ato On an baigibubunuotis iyores sinat aurin ato On baiyoyobotis auyotoat sasagis ruam irubinis wabis ites :
42006014	Simon ( On wabin tani mat iyor , Peter ) a on tain Andrew ; James a John , Philip a Bartholomew ,
42006015	Matthew a Thomas , James , Alphaeus natun , a Simon ( On orot seyoyorai tafanam an rufafar orot ) ,
42006016	Judas , James natun , a Judas Iscariot , on gibunai on Iesu ikaseirai .
42006017	Iesu an baiyoyobotis mat oyau emon sisur ato , On oyau anai efan tetefinai nan an baigibubunuotis kuayo gagamin mat sitawar . Sabu kuayo gagamin bag on Judea tafanam emon a Jerusalem emon sinat a Tyre a Sidon asi tore mafam gagamis on emon sinat ;
42006018	Osi sinat On an dura sittatam a sabu sawauotis on itiyawasis mes . Osi sabu iyabon ayu komasis tefasi simama on osi mat siyawas .
42006019	Sabu engon tutufin sifourtobon Iesu usin sitruyein mes , yabin On an faiwar On emon i’gat on sabu engon siyayawas .
42006020	Iesu iyeit an baigibubunuotis inateteis ato iyau , “ Omi sabu iyabon toum wosagobim nono ayubit an yawasai on men faiwarim , omi aurim on yasisir gagamin bag , God an Baiaiwab on omi ebinoanim !
42006021	“ Omi sabu iyabon ari bitanan segigiem , omi aurim on yasisir gagamin bag , omi gibui arimon bayu wonam inifofonim ! “ Omi sabu iyabon ari wototou , omi aurim on yasisir gagamin bag ; omi arimon wonserer !
42006022	“ Sabu omi men segogoiim , sebisisiweiim , osi dura komasis sawurem a seyoyorem omi on dau yangan yabin Orot Natun wobigibubunuai on fasinai , omi aurim on yasisir gagamin bag !
42006023	Atonio bobo inmamatar on woniyasisir wonisau yabin baiyan gagamin on omi aurim safamai sebotan . Yabin osi wawas agiris on bobo kaitamomai on nanaba aubairuruotis auris sifour .
42006024	“ Baise omi sabu iyabon ari sawarotim womama on , omi aurim on komasin bag ; Omi ami yawas obin on wobo nono !
42006025	“ Omi sabu iyabon ari bayu wam ebifofonim , omi aurim on komasin bag ; Omi arimon bitanan singiem ! “ Omi sabu iyabon ari woseserer , omi aurim on komasin bag ; omi arimon woniyababan wonatou !
42006026	“ Omi sabu iyabon sebifaim , omi aurim on komasin bag ; yabin osi wawas agiris on osi dura kaitamomai on baisigogo aubairuruotis auris sikakafun . ”
42006027	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Baise omi sabu iyabon au dura wotatam on awurem : Omi ami ragit woninuabois , osi sabu iyabon men segogoiim on osi auris on bobo obis wonafour ,
42006028	osi sabu iyabon omi saudabim on angaramin omi on God wonawur osi inimomogines , ato osi sabu iyabon aurim yawas komasis sefofour on auris wonbayoi .
42006029	Iyai iyafan om rerebam taniai inbiyasfarai on , rerebam reban ba unitai iniyasfarem , iyafan om usim an baitakwakwaren tani eboai on unikirir tani ba inboai .
42006030	Sabu engon om aurim sawar mes sebifefeyan on unites , ato iyafan om am sawar ibo on , men on sawar aurin unawur initem men .
42006031	Om mamaba egogoi sabu aurim bobo sinabo on nanaba min om mat osi sabu auris bobo unabo .
42006032	“ Ato om sabu iyabon sebinuaboim osi wat auris unbinuabois on , om aibo mes baimomogin unboai i ? Ato sabu sebinuaboes min sabu bokomasotis mat osi sabu sebinuabois !
42006033	Ato sabu iyabon om aurim semamanau sekakaber ato om osi wat auris unmanau unkakaber on , om aibo mes baimomogin unboai i ? Sabu bokomasotis min on bobo mat sefofour !
42006034	Ato om am sawar aifan turam aurim eboai ato om turam aurin enonosin on fofonin nanaba inigaraminem men on , om aibo mes baimomogin unboai i ? Sabu bokomasotis mat tuturas auris sawar seboai ato fofonin nanaba sebigaramines men !
42006035	Ambin bag ! Omi ami ragit woninuabois a bobo obis wat auris wonafour ; osi omi aurim sawar sinboboai on omi men woninonotai osi angaramin sinitem aurin on . Omi arimon baiyan gagamin wonboai , ato omi arimon God Aiyetunenei Bag nanatun mes wonmatar . Yabin On an yawas on iyobin bag osi sabu auris osi iyabon men On sebikakaiwai yangan auris a sabu komasis auris .
42006036	Omi wonkaber , ato Tamam ekakaber ba . ”
42006037	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi sabu men wonigurubabanis mes ato God arimon men omi inigurubabanim on ; omi sabu men wonimakies mes ato God arimon men omi inimakiem on ; omi sabu woninotbures , ato God arimon omi innotburem .
42006038	Omi ami sawar on sabu wonites , ato God arimon ami sawar initem . Dura bag omi arimon gagamin bag wonboai , omi ami yawas tutufinai sabu wobibaisis on arimon gagamin bag sinitem inarat imamui inkadedebur mom - omi engon arimon on wat wonboai . Omi ami sawar mamaba gagamin bag o kafakakai bag sabu wobites on nanaba God arimon initem . ”
42006039	Ato Iesu atonio dura kawenai sabu auris idudur iyau : “ Orot matan fotin tani on men fofonin orot matan fotin turan ininetewarai rus etai sinabib on ; on bobo nanaba infofour on arimon rus doguai sinafeu .
42006040	Gayam fifi on men isagob kwakwan an baibebeotin ba ; baise gayam fifi ingayam tiwag an gayam inbisawarai on , arimon insagob innat an baibebeotin ba inmatar .
42006041	“ Om aibo mes uyeit taim tuam matanai sasir yen on eitai baise om men esasagob om toum matamui on aiduf yen i ?
42006042	Om mamaba taim tuam aurin unau , “ Arie yau taiu tuau , yau agogoi sasir matamui yen on an boseir weinem ; baise om toum mat matamui aiduf yen on men eitai i ? Om baisigogo’otim ! Om ainau on toum matamui aiduf yen on eboseir , weie ato om matam uneit tiwag taim tuam matan emon sasir unboseir . ”
42006043	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Wengar obin wat egeg on men uwan komasis eyaya on , on nanaba min wengar komasin egeg on uwan men obis eyaya on .
42006044	Wengar engon uwas seyaya on nan uniten unsagob ; bubudau uwas on men gabarur uwas emon ebobo on , o wine uwas on men regai nan ebobo on .
42006045	Orot obin on nunuanai not obis wat itubabaren sen on iboen egat ; orot komasin on nunuanai not komasis wat itubabaren sen on iboen egat . Orot awanai dura ebikakafun on nunuan amonai yawas mamaba ibonu yen on nanaba on ebikakafun . ”
42006046	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi aibo mes woyoyoreu , ‘ Bada , Bada , ’ baise Yau dura aifan awurem on bobo men on nanaba wofofour on ?
42006047	Iyai iyafan auriu enat au dura etatam a osi auris ebifonabo — on Yau arimon on an yawas mamaba on aniyoboai insagob .
42006048	On on ato orot ba , an goa eyoyonin : on dogu isar isur inai babanai bag ato arir ann on agim tefanai irou . Sareu gagamin igat goa irab baise goa on men fofonin itiyuyun yabin on goa wawanin wat iyon on mes .
42006049	Baise iyai iyafan Yau au dura etatam ato men aurin ebifonabo on atonio orot ba , on an goa iyon ato an arir ann on men agim tefanai irou on ; ato sareu igat goa irab mom on ra kaita ifeu — ato goa on asir itagogoros isawar ! ”
42007001	Iesu atonio osi bobo engon auris on sabu auris dura ikakafun isawar ato On inai au Capernaum .
42007002	Rome yangan asi wou an orot gagamin nan on an agirotin on inuaboai kwakwan , on orot on isawau ato kafakakai mom itarab .
42007003	Wou yangan asi orot gagamin on Iesu duran itatam ato on Jew yangan asi orot kawian iyafares sinai Iesu sifefeyanai itnat an agirotin itiyawasai mes .
42007004	Osi sinat Iesu aurin ato wawaninai bag sifefeyani siyau , “ Atonio orot egogoi bag unibaisin .
42007005	Atonio orot on wai sabu inuabois kwakwan a on ekesin wat on wai bayoi goa iyon weinei . ”
42007006	On mes Iesu on osi mat sinai . Iesu inat orot an goa aurin ibiufin ato Rome yangan asi wou orot gagamin on tuturan iyafares sinai sitawur mes , osi siyau , “ Bada , Om men toum unisababanim mes . Yau men fofoniu on om unnat au goai unar ,
42007007	mat yau men anonosin obiu on arimon fofonin tou atnat aurim atifefeyanim . Om asir dura wat unau mom , ato au agirotin on inyawas .
42007008	Yau tou mat on Rome asi wou yangan asi babadis gagamis osi asi baibad babanai abobo , ato wou yangan on yau babawui sebobo . Yau wou orot atonio on awur , ‘ Enai ! ato on enan ; yau wou orot tani ba awur , ‘ Enat ! ’ ato on enat ; yau au agirotin awur , ‘ Bobo atonio eiyamai ato on bobo ebiyamai . ”
42007009	Iesu atonio dura itatam on iduduran , ato irutabir sabu kuayo On sibigibubunuai on auris iyau , “ Awurem , Yau men meyan orot baitutumotin nanaba agaturai mes , Israel yangan amosi mat men nanaba agaturai on . ”
42007010	Sabu dura bobibotis simatabir men sinai Rome yangan asi wou an orot gagamin an goai ato agirotin on nan sigaturai iyawas nono .
42007011	Men weromin gibunai Iesu inai au mafam gagamin wabin Nain on nan , On an baigibubunuotis a sabu kuayo gagamin on Iesu mat sinai .
42007012	Iesu inai mafam gagamin an furi awanai i’gat mom ato sabu nan on orot rabobin siyabar sibib si’gat . Orot rabobin min kena jever natun orot kaikas wat , ato sabu kuayo gagamin bag on mafam gagamin emon sinat on engon kena mat nan .
42007013	Bada on jever it mom on , nunuan iyababan kwakwan ato On kena jever aurin iyau , “ Om men unatou mes ! ”
42007014	Namon Iesu ibib inai ato ire goru iruyein ato sabu orot rabobin siyabar si’nan on sitawar . Iesu iyau , “ Jorei ! Awurem , Emisir ! ”
42007015	Orot rabobin imisir ato ibosuruf dura ibikakafun ato Iesu orot ibo ayon itai men .
42007016	Sabu engon tutufin on siber kwakwan ato osi God sifain si’yau , “ Aubairuruotin gagamin bag on sanati irobotet a God On inat an sabu iniyawasis mes ! ”
42007017	Atonio Iesu an dudur on irat kwakwan tafanam amonai engon ibonu a tafanam koun koun mat duran engon ibonu .
42007018	John an baigibubunuotis ato osi bobo engon tutufin auris on sikasonai isawar ato , on an baigibubunuotis ruam iyores sinat
42007019	ato iyafares sinai Bada aurin sitetemai mes , “ Om aurim on John iyau , Om arimon enat o wei orot tani on wanmousin i ? ”
42007020	Osi sinat Iesu aurin ato siyau , “ John Bapataito’otin iyafarei wanat Om wanitetemim mes , ‘ Orot min Om aurim on John iyau , Om arimon enat o wei orot tani wanmousin i ? ’ ”
42007021	On an werai Iesu on sabu sawasawauis , fesafesaris sigaraba , a sabu ayu komasis tefasi simama engon tutufin iyawasis , a sabu matas fotis engon on matas siyeit men .
42007022	Iesu on John an dura bobibotis iyafotes iyau , “ Omi wonmatabir men wonan John wonawur bobo aifan toum matamui woitai a dura wotatam on : Sabu matas fotis on matas siyeit men , sabu ass raguraguis on sebibib men , sabu usis gawugawudis on usis sigumidaris men , sabu tainas fotis on dura setatam men , sabu rabobis on rabob emon sibobaimisires siyawas men a Wasagobin on sabu ayuai sebikokoianis on auris sebibino .
42007023	On iyafan Yau auriu an not men ekuseseb , on aurin on yasisir gagamin bag ! ”
42007024	John an dura bobibotis sinai gibunai Iesu on ibosuruf John aurin on sabu kuayo gagamin auris ikakafun iyau : “ Omi wogat wonai John aurin efan koiteterinai nan on , omi wononosin aifan wotitai mes i ? Wayo ato yabat isisin sigegeris on woteit mes i ?
42007025	Omi wogat wonai nan on aifan wotitai mes i ? Orot beber obis wat imonag on wotitai mes i ? Dura bag sabu ato osi sawar nanaba semomonag a sawar auris sebiaiwab on aiwab asi goai nan semama !
42007026	Wokasoneu , omi wogat wonai on wononosin aifan wotitai mes i ? Aubairuruotin i ? Yau awurem dura bag — omi on orot woitai on gagamin bag men aubairuruotin ba .
42007027	John min on aurin on dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ God iyau ; Yau arimon au dura bobibotin omi namui aniyafarai ami eta inbotitiwag weinem . ”
42007028	Iesu an dura ibotein iyau , “ Awurem , John on gagamin bag men iyafan tani nin emama ba . Baise iyai iyafan inikafakakaiai ato God an Baiaiwab amonai inrurur on arimon gagamin men John ba . ”
42007029	Sabu engon tutufin a agim takes bo’otis on atonio dura sitatam ato osi min God an yawas totorin aurin on sifonabo ato John ibapataitois .
42007030	Baise Pharisee yangan a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on men sigogoi God an gogoi aifan osi auris on itafour , on mes osi men sigogoi John itibapataitois .
42007031	Iesu dura ibotein iyau , “ Sabu ari semama auris on mamaba anifofon anau ? Osi on mamaba ?
42007032	Osi on fifirig gugudis ba baitotobon an efanai nan simairirin semama . Kuayo tani on kuayo tani aurin eyoyor yau , ‘ Wei tabin an kwarer on omi aurim wakwarer , baise omi men woisau on ! Wei rabob an kwarer on omi aurim wakwarer baise omi men wotou on ! ’
42007033	John Bapataito’otin inat , ato on bayu ikirir i’fofour a sareu wine men itotoman on ato omi wawur wau , ‘ On dau tefanai emama ! ’
42007034	Orot Natun inat on bayu iyam itom ato omi wau , ‘ Orot atonio woit ! On bayu yam kwakwan a sareu wine etotoman kwakwan a On tuturan on agim takes bo’otis a sabu bokomasotis ! ’
42007035	Baise sabu engon tutufin God an gigiboan si’boai on osi siyoboet on dura bag . ”
42007036	Pharisee orot on Iesu ibebegai inat rus bayu sitam mes . Iesu inai an goai irui imair rus bayu sitam mes .
42007037	On mafam gagamin amonai on jever bokomasotin on an yawas tutufinai nanaba imama . On jever on Iesu duran itatam on Pharisee orot an goai nan bayu i’yam , on mes on fio yanden ninibin on kibub awan bonuin auman ibo inat
42007038	ato Iesu kounai itawar On ann bisinai nan itawar itotou ato maturun on sisusur Iesu ann sisusuruf . Namon jever toun tefanai nan Iesu ann isafanen , ann iyanen ato fio yanden ninibin ibo ann imuten .
42007039	Pharisee orot on Iesu ibebegai inat on bobo it mom , on toun wat aurin iyau , “ Atonio orot on dura bag aubairuruotin mes on itsagob atonio jever on iyafan eruruyeinai ; On arimon itsagob on jever on bokomasotin bag ! ”
42007040	Iesu orot aurin ikakafun iyau , “ Simon , Yau agogoi dura tani anawurem . ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Basit , baibebeotim ekasoneu . ”
42007041	Iesu dura ibosuruf ikakafun iyau , “ Orot ruam sinai orot agim kaifarotin aurin sifefeyanai ato on agim ibo ites , orot tani aurin on agim 500.00 kina nanaba ibo ato orot tani aurin on agim orot ruam auyotoat nanaba ibo .
42007042	Osi rus on men fofonin arimon on orot agim kaifarotin aurin sitigaraminai men on , on mes agim kaifarotin osi orot ruam wabis isafanen . Ato orot menan on arimon orot agim kaifarotin ininuaboai kwakwan i ? ”
42007043	Simon iyafotai iyau , “ Yau anonosin ato orot iyafan aurin agim gagamin bag i’boai on gagamin bag ininotburai . ” Iesu iyau , “ Om on dura bag wat uyafot . ”
42007044	Namon Iesu on jever aurin irutabir ato simon aurin iyau , “ Om jever atonio eit ? Yau anat om am goai on om men sareu uteu auu asouen on , baise on jever on maturunai nan Yau auu isouen a on toun tefanai nan auu isafanen .
42007045	Om men ukakaiwiu rerebau uyan on , baise Yau anat nenei jever on Yau auu on nana iyayanin .
42007046	Om men olive momonai nan tefaui udebur on , baise on fio yanden ninibinai nan auu imuten .
42007047	Awurem , on an nuabo tutufin iyoboet on mes ebi dura bag on an bokomas sigaraba emon on sinotbur nono . Baise iyai iyafan kafakakai wat God ebinotburai on ebiyoboet on an nuabo on kafakakai wat . ”
42007048	Namon Iesu on jever aurin iyau , “ Om am bokomas ainotbur . ”
42007049	Sabu fani nan kemai simair simama on sibosuruf tous amosi si’yau bonen , “ On Orot on iyafan , On min sabu asi bokomas ebinotbur i ? ”
42007050	Baise Iesu on jever aurin iyau , “ Om am baitutum emon uyawas ; tufai enai . ”
42008001	Ra fani isawar gibunai Iesu mafam gagamis a mafam gugudis amosi nan ibib God an Baiaiwab aurin on Wasagobin ibibino . Baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam on mat sinai ,
42008002	a jever fani mat osi on sawau usisi si’yen a ayu komasis tefasi simama on osi engon ainau iyawasis nono : osi wabis min , Mary ( On wabin seyoyorai Magdalene ) , on tefan emon on dau engon nimtereban ruam nanaba ifaitanis sigat ;
42008003	Joanna on awan wabin Chusa on min Herod an wou an orot gagamin ato on bobo tani ikakaifarai ; a jever wabin Susanna , a jever fani engon mat osi asi agimai a asi bayuai nan on Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat sikakaifares .
42008004	Sabu nana Iesu aurin sinat mafam gagamis ta ta emon , ato sabu kuayo gagamin bag siruayo ato Iesu dura kawenai idudur iyau :
42008005	“ Ra tani orot igat inai masauai nan sawareg itbofefes mes . On sawareg fesi masauai nan irebenen on , sawareg fesi fani on etai sifeuen , ato sabu nan sibibib si’nan si’nat on sifaitatanen , ato kiwiu siyam isawar .
42008006	Sawareg fesi fani on motob amonai a’gim auman on tefanai sifeuen ato fesi sikubobouis sigai mom on , sirabob yabin motob babanai on rararanin wat on mes .
42008007	Sawareg fesi fani on gabarur amosi sifeuen , ato fesi sikubobouis sigai on gabarur sitoutanis on mes uwas men siya .
42008008	Ato sawareg fesi on motob obinai sifeuen ; sikubobouis sigai ato uwas siya , sawareg wengar kakaita kakaita on uwas engon orot nim , orot nim , on nanaba siya . ” Ato Iesu an dura kanfounai iyau , “ Omi sabu er tainam aumas on Yau atonio dura abikakafun on wontatam tiwag ! ”
42008009	Iesu an baigibubunuotis sitetemai atonio dura kawen an yabin on mamaba !
42008010	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ God an Baiaiwab an Sagob buburin on item nono , baise sabu fani auris dura kawenai wat on mes osi min arimon matas sineit wat baise men sinitai , a dura sintatam wat baise men sinsagob . ”
42008011	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Atonio dura kawen an yabin on ato nanaba : Fesi on God an dura .
42008012	Fesi ato etai sifefeu an yabin on , osi sabu dura setatam ; baise Afaguban enat ato wasagobin nunuasi emon eboai enan ato osi min men sebitutum a yawas on men seboai on .
42008013	Fesi ato motob a’gim tefanai sifefeu an yabin on , osi wasagobin setatam ato yasisirai wat seboai . Baise on dura on men nunuas amonai erur tiwag mes ; osi matan dibon wat sebitutum ato asi rutobon an wera enat on osi sefefeu .
42008014	Fesi ato gabarur amosi sifefeu an yabin on , osi sabu dura setatam ; ato atonio tafanam an yawasai on ebiyames sebiyababan , agim sawar auris , a tous senonosis sebiyasisires on yawas wat ebibonues ato etoutan on mes osi uwas on men semamari on .
42008015	Fesi ato motob obinai sifefeu an yabin on sabu osi wasagobin setatam ato obinai wat seboai dura aurin sebifonabo nunuasi seyeyeinin , ato nana sebokikin enan asir uwas soubibiro . ”
42008016	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Men iyafan tani tafa itutu iyein ato ramo ibogai itarub o on babar babanai iyein . Baise on inboai tafa an tatawarai bag nan inyein , onai sabu min ratafin sinitai ato sinar .
42008017	“ Sawar aifan ebibuni on arimon sinboai singat au rereb , a sawar aifan esasabutan on arimon singaturai ato sinboai singat au ratafin .
42008018	“ Omi wonkaifarem tiwag , dura mamaba wotatam on , yabin iyai iyafan aurin sawar yen on God arimon gagamin bag initai , baise iyai iyafan aurin ambin on God arimon inabaruai inan , basit on enonosin aurin kafakakai wat yen min on . ”
42008019	Iesu ayon a taitain sinat aurin , baise sabu kuayo gagamin bag on mes osi men fofonin sitar mat sitikaita on .
42008020	Orot tani nan on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Om ayom a taitaim on kounai setatawar osi segogoi sinitem . ”
42008021	Iesu on sabu engon tutufin auris iyau , “ Yau ayou , a taitaiu on osi iyabon God an dura setatam a aurin sebifonabo on . ”
42008022	Ra tani Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat wayai sikaruge ato iyawures iyau , “ Ot tanrabon kamit rebanai nan . ” On mes osi sibosuruf sigat sinai .
42008023	Osi wa siboi si’nan ato Iesu on iyeinir iyenbubur . Ra kaita yabat kuyabobot gagamin kamitai nan isisin isur , ato yawarad ibosuruf wa ibiwan , ato osi engon on beruber komasin gagamin amonai sirui .
42008024	Baigibubunuotis sinai Iesu aurin ato sibabanai siyau , “ Bada , Bada ! Ot kafakakai mom tanarab ! ” Iesu imisir dura wawaninai yabat a yawarad iyawures ato yabat a yawarad sisirimomo , ato nurob obin bag imatar .
42008025	Namon On an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Omi ami baitutum on menan nan yen i ? ” Baise osi on siduduran a siber , ato tous wat siyau bonen , “ Atonio orot on iyafan i ? On asir dura wawaninai wat yabat a yawarad yawures on osi On aurin sebifonabo ! ”
42008026	Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat wa siboi sinai Gerasa tafanamai nan , on tafanam min Galilee kamit reban emon .
42008027	Iesu wa emon isur gasai itawar mom , ato orot dau sigaraba tefanai simama on mafam gagamin emon igat inat inefotai . Wera weromin maiau atonio orot on kereremotin imama ato on men goai imamair imama on , baise on an wera tutufin engon on rasi doguai wat imama .
42008028	On orot Iesu it mom , on aumiet bag iyoku , ato Iesu nanai sindan irou ato fonan gagaminai bag iyoku iyau , “ Iesu , God Natun Aiyetunenei Bag ! Om aifan aurin yau egogoiiu ? Yau abifefeyanim Om men unimakieu mes ! ”
42008029	On atonio dura ikakafun yabin Iesu on dura wawaninai ayu komasin iyawur orot itikirir itgat mes . Ra sigaraba maiau ayu komasin on orot i’boai iyuyuweai , basit on mafam sabu on sifatumai imama min on , on ann iman fafatumai nan siyouten tiwag , baise on fafatum iyabarutuenen ato dau si’bonanawai i’gat i’nan efan koiteterinai nan .
42008030	Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Om wabim mamaba i ? ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Yau wabiu on ‘ Sigaraba ’ ” Yabin dau sigaraba on tefanai simama .
42008031	Dau on Iesu sifefeyanai men itiyafares sitan dogu weromin isur inai an kanfoun ambin on nan sitsur mes .
42008032	Foro unis sigaraba on auwatin nan oyau sesebinai bayu siyam . On mes dau on Iesu sifefeyanai itikirires sitan foro tefasi sitag mes , on mes On ikirires sinai .
42008033	Dau on orot sikirir sigat ato sinai foro tefasi sigai . Foro unis sigaraba on anag rebanai siyayai sisur sinai kamitai ato siyamtotom .
42008034	Sabu nan foro sikakaifares on sit bobo aifan imatar , on mes osi engon siyayai sinai mafam gagamis amosi a masau guwi goa amosi nan sabu sikasones .
42008035	Sabu sigat sinai bobo aifan imamatar on sititai mes . Osi sinat Iesu aurin ato orot tefan emon dau sigaraba si’gat on nan ara iyot , unin itotorai Iesu annai imair imama sigaturai on ; sabu engon tutufin siber kwakwan .
42008036	Osi sabu iyabon on bobo imatar tous matasi si’tai on sabu sikasones mamaba orot iyayawas aurin on .
42008037	Namon sabu engon tutufin Gerasa tafanamai on Iesu sifefeyanai itan mes , yabin osi totor siber kwakwan . On mes Iesu wayai ikaruge ato sinai .
42008038	Orot on tefan emon dau si’gat on Iesu ifefeyanai iyau , “ Yau agogoi rut tanan . ” Baise Iesu iyafarai inai , On iyawur iyau ,
42008039	“ Om ematabir men unan au go ato God bobo mamaba aurim ifofour on sabu unkasones . ” Orot inai mafam gagaminai irui , sabu ikasones mamaba Iesu on aurin bobo ifofour on .
42008040	Iesu imatabir men kamit rebanai nan ato sabu kuayo On sikakaiwai , yabin osi engon tutufin On simomousin .
42008041	Namon orot wabin Jairus on inat ; on orot on bayoi goa an orot gagamin . On Iesu annai sindan irou ato ifefeyanai On itan an goai mes ,
42008042	on atonio bobo ifour , yabin on natun jeverei on kaikas wat , on an kwanda on auyotoat sasagis ruam nanaba ato jeverei min irarabob . Iesu ibib i’nan ato sabu on sesebin reban reban engon aurin sikukuayo .
42008043	Jever tani on nan imama on usinai abiou wawanin isusur ibikokosarai on kwanda auyotoat sasagis ruam nanaba isawar ; on an agim engon kwakwair sabu auris ireben isawar , baise men iyafan tani fofonin arimon jever itiyawasai on .
42008044	On jever on sabu kuayo sanasi inat Iesu kounai igat ato an beber rewan iruyein , ato ra kaita on usinai abiou isusur on isawar .
42008045	Iesu itetemis iyau , “ Iyafan Yau iruyeiniu i ? ” Sabu engon tutufin siyau on men iyafan tani iruyeinai on ato Peter iyau , “ Bada , sabu engon tutufin sikufifinem ato aurim sikuayo serur . ”
42008046	Baise Iesu iyau , “ Orot jever tani iruyeiniu , Yau atatamiu faiwar on Yau emon igat on asagob on iyafan iruyeiniu . ”
42008047	Jever isagob on sigaturai nono , on mes on inat ann iman sibiror auman Iesu nanai sindan irou . On nan sabu engon tutufin nasi Iesu ikasonai yabin aibo mes an beber iruyein a on mamaba ra kaita iyayawas aurin on .
42008048	Iesu jever aurin iyau , “ Yau natu , om am baitutum emon on uyawas , tufai unan . ”
42008049	Iesu an dura nana ibikakafun ato orot dura bobibotin bayoi goa an orot gagamin an goai emon inat . On Jairus iyawur iyau , “ Om natum Jeverei on irabob nono on mes om men baibebeotin unisababanai mes . ”
42008050	Baise Iesu dura itatam ato Jairus aurin iyau , “ Om men unaber mes , asir unitutum mom ato on arimon inyawas . ”
42008051	Iesu inai goai igat mom on men igogoi iyafan tani On gibunai itar au goa amon , ab On Peter a James a jeverei ayon taman osi wat iboes mat goa amonai sirui .
42008052	Sabu nan on jeverei aurin sitotou a sibiyababan . Iesu iyau , “ Omi men wonatou mes ; jeverei on men irabob - on asir yenbubur mom ! ”
42008053	Sabu engon tutufin nan on Iesu sikoboai sisererai yabin osi sisagob jeverei on irabob isawar .
42008054	Baise Iesu on jeverei imanai ibo ato iyor iyau , “ Jeverei , emisir ! ”
42008055	Jeverei an yayawas imatabir men ato ra kaita imisir , ato Iesu iyawures bayu sititai itam mes .
42008056	Jeverei ayon taman on siduduran kwakwan baise Iesu dura wawaninai iyawures on bobo ato aifan imamatar aurin on sabu men sinkasones mes .
