42009001	Iesu an baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam iyores siruayo ato faiwar a baibad ites dau engon sinfaitanis singat a sabu sawauotis on siniyawasis mes .
42009002	Namon On iyafares sigat God an Baiaiwab aurin on dura sinbino a sabu sawauotis on siniyawasis mes .
42009003	On iyawures iyau , “ Omi men sawar tani wonboai mat wonabib mes ; omi men siwa , men kekes , men bayu , men agim , mat men usim anbaitakwakwaren tani wonboai mes .
42009004	Omi wonan mafam gagaminai wongat ato sabu sinbikakaiwim on omi nan goa kaitamomai wonama weie on mafam gagamin wonikirir wonan ;
42009005	omi wonan menan nan sabu men sinbikakaiwim on mafam gagamin on wonikirir wonan ato ammui fofou on wonrutataben sinsur onai iniyoboes osi on sibokomas . ”
42009006	Baigibubunuotis sinai ato mafam mafam sibib Wasagobin sibibino a tafanam au engonai on sabu sibiyawasis .
42009007	Herod on Galilee tafanam an bainetewar orot gagamin on , ato osi bobo simamatar auris on dura itatam , on an not on fetag fetag ibinonot , yabin sabu fani on si’yau , “ John Bapataito’otin on rabob emon imisir iyawas men ! ”
42009008	Sabu fani on si’yau Elijah on irobotet , ato sabu fani on nana si’yau ainau aubairuruotis on tani rabob emon imisir iyawas men .
42009009	Herod iyau , “ Yau awures osi John unin siyasutin itutu ; baise atonio orot on iyafan an dura magis magis on atatam i ? ” Ato on nana ifofourtobon Iesu magin ititai mes .
42009010	Baigibubunuotis simatabir men , ato osi bobo aifan sifofour on engon tutufin Iesu sikasonai . On baigibubunuotis iboes mat sinai , ato osi wat sinai mafam gagamin tani wabin Bethsaida nan .
42009011	Sabu kuayo on dura sitatam on , osi On sigibubunuai sinai . Iesu on sabu ikakaiwis , ato God an Baiaiwab aurin on osi auris ikakafun , ato sabu sawauotis iyabon baibais sigogoi on iyawasis .
42009012	Wera inai isosofafir ato baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam on sinat Iesu aurin siyau , “ Om sabu eiyafares sinan atonio nin mafam gugudisi a masau guwiai nan bayu sinnuen sinam a enbubur an efan sinnuen nan sinembubur , yabin atonio nin on efan kifafan wat . ”
42009013	Baise Iesu on osi auris iyau , “ Omi toum ami bayu on woites sinam . ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei auri on rafi sarar engon nim a iyan ruam wat sen . Ato Om egogoi wei wanan bayu wantobonen atonio sabu kuayo gagamin auris i ? ”
42009014	( Sabu nan on 5,000 nanaba , engon orot wat . ) Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Omi on sabu orot ruam , auyotoat on nanaba wonboes kuayo kakaita kakaita nanaba wonruayois sinmairirin . ”
42009015	Baigibubunuotis atonio bobo on sifour sabu engon tutufin simairis isawar ,
42009016	ato Iesu rafi sarar nim a iyan ruam iboen , matan au safam itage ato God aurin ikakaiu , iyabaseseben ato an baigibubunuotis ites sabu siraramis .
42009017	Osi engon tutufin siyam siyakokor ato baigibubunuotis bayu tuturis siboen kaifetai sibiwanen on kaifet engon auyotoat sasagis ruam nanaba awas sibonuen .
42009018	Wera tani Iesu ekesin mabinai ibabayoi ato an baigibubunuotis sinat aurin . On itetemis iyau , “ Sabu kuayo Yau auriu on mamaba sau ? ”
42009019	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Sabu fani sau , Om on John Bapataito’otin , sabu fani sau , Om on Elijah , ato sabu fani on sau Om ainau aubairuruotim tani on rabob emon umisir uyawas men . ”
42009020	On itetemis iyau , “ Ato omi on mamaba , Yau auriu on mamaba wonau ? ” Peter iyafotai iyau , “ Om on God an Keriso . ”
42009021	Namon Iesu dura wawaninai iyawures atonio dura aurin on men iyafan tani sinkasonai mes .
42009022	ato On an dura nana ibotein iyau , “ Orot Natun on arimon inikokosarai kwakwan a sabu kawian , priest aiwabis , a Baifafaro an baibebeotis osi arimon sinisisiweiai . On arimon sinirabobai , baise ra baitoninai on God arimon rabob emon inbobaimisirai inmisir inyawas men . ”
42009023	Ato On sabu engon auris iyau , “ Iyai iyafan Yau inituraniu on toun ininosfotai , ra fufur an nab inabar , ato inigibubunueu .
42009024	Ato iyai iyafan egogoi toun an yawas iniyawasai on arimon inisiwanai , baise iyai iyafan Yau inigibubunueu aurin an yawas inbisiwanai on arimon yawas mama wantoanin inboai .
42009025	Orot tafanam engon tutufin inbisowarai on abi obin arimon inboai , baise on toun on insiwan o inkomas ? Ambin bag !
42009026	Iyai iyafan Yau auriu a au baibebe aurin inbomamai on , Orot Natun min arimon on aurin inbomamai On an rai On an kudidirinai a Taman an faiwarai a anea kakafotis mat sinnanat on nan .
42009027	Yau awurem dura bag sabu fani nin setatawar on osi arimon God an Baiaiwab sinitai weie sinarab . ”
42009028	Tafaror kaitamom gibunai Iesu on atonio osi bobo auris on ikakafunen , ato On Peter , John a James osi iboes mat sigai oyau aiyetunai nan bayoi mes .
42009029	Iesu ibabayoi an werai , On magin an itin iyabatabir ato an beber on kakakaiin bag imatar .
42009030	Ra kaita sabu ruam on nan Iesu mat sibikakafun . Osi min Moses a Elijah rus ,
42009031	osi safam an kudidirinai sirobotet Iesu mat sibikakafun eta mamaba arimon God an gogoi nanaba on itnat ititutufin mes , On nan Jerusalem itarab aurin on .
42009032	Peter tuturan mat on nousis ifot siyenbubur , baise osi simisir on Iesu sit an kudidir auman orot ruam mat sitatawar .
42009033	Osi orot ruam Iesu sibikirir ato Peter on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Bada , iyobin bag ot engon nin ! Wei guwi engon ton wanayon , tani Om aurim , tani on Moses aurin , tani on Elijah aurin . ” ( On toun on men meyan isagob dura mamaba ibikakafun . )
42009034	Peter on dura nana ibikakafun ato kasakasau igat osi engon ikimanis ; ato kasakasau inat ibikimanis on baigibubunuotis siber .
42009035	Fonan kasakasau amon emon inat iyau , “ Atonio on Yau Tou Natu Bag , Yau On arubinai - omi on fonan wontatam ! ”
42009036	Fonan ibikakafun on isawar , ato Iesu on ekesin mom nan itatawar . Atonio osi bobo engon tutufin auris on baigibubunuotis on men dura tani sikakafun a on bobo aifan tous matasi sitai an werai on men iyafan tani sikasonai on .
42009037	Ra itom Iesu an baigibubunuotis ton mat oyau emon sisur , ato sabu kuayo gagamin on Iesu sinefotai .
42009038	Sabu kuayo gagamin amosi nan orot iyoku iyau , “ Baibebeotim ! Abifefeyanim , enat natu eit - yau natu on kaikas wat !
42009039	Ayu komasin erarabin on ra kaita ebiyoku ato eboai motobai ereberirai egugusuai matan sebikitatabir , ato awanai wafufusin segat ; ato on fifi men ebikirir mes on nana ebiyamai usibaban eboai !
42009040	Yau am baigibubunuotis aifefeyanis dau sitfaitan itgat mes , baise osi men fofonin on bobo sitiyamai on . ”
42009041	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Omi sabu on ami baitutum ambin a omi on totor eta woisarar ! Yau arimon men weromin omi mat tanama on ! Ra biyam Yau omi mat tanama ! Yau ra biyam nana yaterabobai omi mat tanama weie omi wonsagob ? ” Namon On orot aurin iyau , “ Om natum nin ebo enat . ”
42009042	Fifi ibib i’nat ato , ayu komasin imisir irab motobai ifeu ato matan ikitabir igugusuai . Iesu dura wawaninai ayu komasin iyawur , ato fifi iyawasai , On fifi ibo taman imanai iyagai men .
42009043	Sabu engon tutufin nan on siduduran God an faiwar gagamin aurin . Iesu bobo engon tutufin ifofour auris on sabu nana sibiduduranai , ato On an baigibubunuotis auris iyau ,
42009044	“ Dura aifan anawurem on men woninosfotai mes ! Orot Natun on arimon sinboai ato sabu bokomasotis imasi sinyagai . ”
42009045	Baise baigibubunuotis on men sisagob atonio dura on an yabin aifan , On dura aurin on sibunies men fofonin arimon sitsagob , ato on dura aurin on osi siber men fofonin sititetemai .
42009046	Baigibubunuotis sanasi nan on sigagamois orot iyafan osi sanasi on gagamin bag .
42009047	Iesu isagob osi on mamaba sibinonotis , on mes On fifi kafakakai ibo bisinai itawarai ,
42009048	ato auris iyau , “ Iyai iyafan Yau Wabiui atonio fifi ebikakaiwai on min Yau ebikakaiwiu , ato iyai iyafan Yau ebikakaiwiu on min Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on mat ebikakaiwai . Iyai iyafan omi engon tutufin sanamui toun eyeyeirai on gagamin bag . ”
42009049	John ikakafun iyau , “ Bada , wei orot wait Om wabimui on dau ifafaitanis ato wei wawur itikirir mes , yabin on men ot ati kuayo amonai emama on . ”
42009050	Iesu on John aurin a baigibubunuotis fani auris iyau , “ Omi men on wonawur inikirir mes yabin iyai iyafan men omi ebiragitem on omi turam . ”
42009051	Wera inat ibiufin ato God on Iesu itboai itag au safam mes , On inonotai ato au Jerusalem ibib inai .
42009052	On sabu dura bobibotis on ainau iyafares , osi sinai mafam tani Samaria amonai nan aifan an gogoi on engon aurin sitbotitiwag mes .
42009053	Baise sabu nan on men sigogoi sitboai yabin osi sisagob Iesu on au Jerusalem i’nan .
42009054	Baigibubunuotis James a John on bobo sit ato siyau , “ Bada , Om egogoi wei wanayor wairaf safamai insur atonio sabu inarasis ? ”
42009055	Iesu irutabir an baigibubunuotis igam iyawures .
42009056	Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat sinai mafam tani ba aurin .
42009057	Osi etai sibib si’nan eta nenenai , ato orot tani on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Om menan menan unnanan on yau arimon Om anigibubunuem . ”
42009058	Iesu on orot aurin iyau , “ Kuke Fox tutuenis on asi dogu aumas a kiwiu on asi batarai nan senbubur , baise Orot Natun on an efan ambin menan nan inenir inen a iniyarir . ”
42009059	Iesu on orot tani ba aurin iyau , “ Om eigibubunueu . ” Baise on orot iyau , “ Bada , ainau on anmatabir anan tamau irabob on an garobai . ”
42009060	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Osi sabu iyabon ayubisi sirabob osi tous asi bobo on sabu singarobis . Om enai God an Baiaiwab aurin on an dura ebino . ”
42009061	Orot tani iyau , “ Bada yau Om anigibubunuem , baise ainau on yau anan taiu tuau auris anau baitotoris . ”
42009062	Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Iyai iyafan ibosuruf motob ekukuwain ato on nana au gib erutatabir men on God an Baiaiwab an bobo aurin on men fofonin inabo on . ”
42010001	On gibunai Bada baigibubunuotis engon orot ton auyotoat sasagis ruam ba irubinis ato ruruam ruruam iyafares sigat , osi ainau On nanai sitan au mafam gagamis a efan engon auris menan osi mafam auris itabib itan mes on .
42010002	On osi auris iyau , “ Masau gagamin on wasi imari nono , baise wasi kuwain an sabu on men sigaraba on . Omi wonbayoi masau matuanin aurin ato On arimon sabu wasi kuwain yangan iniyafares sinnat wasi sinkuwain .
42010003	Omi wonan ! Omi on foro sheep boboum mamanam ba kuke tutuenis amosi abiyafarem .
42010004	Omi men agim an kukufet , a bib an kekes , a amm kikiman wonabo mes : Omi wonnanan on men etai wontawar sabu mat wonikakafun mes .
42010005	Omi wonan goa amonai wonrurur on ainau wonau , ‘ Tuf omi engon aurim inama . ’
42010006	Tuf orot nuabo’otin nan inmama mes on ami baikakaiu on aurin wonikirir ; ato ambin on , tuf anbaikakaiu on wonboai men .
42010007	Omi on nan goa kaitamomai wonama ato bayu aifan sinbibitem on wonam wonatom , ato orot bobo’otin an baiyan sebitai ba . Omi men goa goa wonar wongat mes .
42010008	Omi wonan nan mafam gagaminai wongat sinbikakaiwim a bayu aifan sinbibitem on wonam ,
42010009	on mafam gagaminai sabu sawauotis on woniyawasis a sabu nan on wonawures , ‘ God an Baiaiwab on inat aurim ebiufin . ’
42010010	Baise omi wonan mafam gagaminai wonrurur ato sabu nan men sinbikakaiwim on , wongat etai nan ato wonau ,
42010011	‘ Omi ami mafamai fofou ato ayi sirababaren si’yen on ato aurim wasasafanen men sinsur onai iniyoboem omi on bobo komasis wofofour . Baise omi wonnos tiwag God an Baiaiwab on inat aurim ebiufin nono ! ’
42010012	Yau awurem dura bag Baigurubaban an Ra on God arimon Sodom mafam gagamin on inkaberai , men ato mafam gagamin ba ! ”
42010013	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi Chorazin mafam gagamin aurim on arimon komasin bag ! Omi Bethsaida mafam gagamin mat , omi aurim on arimon komasin bag ! Ato bobo buburis omi aurim afofour on , nanaba min Yau bobo buburis nan Tyre a Sidon mafam gagamis auris atfofour on , sabu nan on men ari sitamair asi ara beber gadur sitout a isar on sitboai tous tefasi sitikout , on itiyoboes on osi ya baikitabir sibo !
42010014	Baigurubaban an Ra on God arimon an kaber gagamin on Tyre a Sidon mafam gagamis auris inyein men omi ba .
42010015	Ato omi Capernaum mafam gagamin ! Omi wogogoi on toum wonbogaiim wonag au safam i ? Omi arimon God inboem inreberirem wonsur wonan wairaf an efan komasinai wonar ! ”
42010016	Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Iyai iyafan omi ami dura etatam on Yau etatamiu ; iyai iyafan omi ebisisiweiim on Yau ebisisiweiiu ; ato Yau ebisisiweiiu min Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on mat ebisisiweiai . ”
42010017	Baigibubunuotis orot ton auyotoat sasagis ruam on yasisirai simatabir men . Osi siyau , “ Bada , wei Om Wabimui dura wawanis dau wawures on auri sifonabo ! ”
42010018	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau Afaguban orot ait on nanamar ba safam emon ifefeu .
42010019	Omi wontatam ! Yau on baibad aitem , onai omi mota a roum was tefasi a ami Ragit asi faiwar engon arimon tefasi wonkayam , ato arimon men aifan tani inikomasim on .
42010020	Baise omi men woniyasisir yabin ayu komasis omi aurim sibifonabo aurin on , baise omi woniyasisir yabin omi wabim on safamai God igayamen sen . ”
42010021	On an werai Ayu Kakafotin on Iesu ibonuai iyasisir ato iyau , “ Tamau , safam tafanam an Bada ! Yau abikakaiwim yabin Om am dura maiauin sabu gigiboanotis auris ubuni i’yen on ari sabu ojis auris on uyoboes . Dura bag , Tamau , atonio bobo on Om am gogoi urubin ufour imatar .
42010022	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Yau Tamau on bobo engon tutufin iteu . Men iyafan tani isagob Iyafan on Natun ab Taman ekesin isagob , a men iyafan tani isagob Iyafan on Tamau , ab Natun ekesin a osi sabu iyabon On irubinis auris ibiyoboes on . ”
42010023	Namon Iesu irutabir an baigibubunuotis auris ato dura bubuniai nan auris ikakafun iyau , “ Omi aurim on yasisir gagamin maiau atonio osi bobo matamui woiten on !
42010024	Awurem aubairuruotis a aiwabis sigaraba on sigogoi ato bobo aifan woiten on sititen mes baise osi men fofonin sititen , ato dura aifan wotatam on sigogoi sittatam mes baise osi dura men fofonin sittatam on . ”
42010025	Baifafaro an baibebeotin tani on imisir itawar ato igogoi Iesu itrutobonai mes . On itetemai iyau , “ Baibebeotim , yau mamaba anafour ato yawas mama wantoanin anboai i ? ”
42010026	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ God an dura buk amonai baifafaro dura aurin on mamaba sigayam siyau ? Om mamaba uniyab i ? ”
42010027	Orot iyafotai iyau , ‘ Bada am God on nunuam tutufinai , ayubim tutufinai , am faiwar tutufinai , am not tutufinai uninuaboai ’ ; a ‘ Om turam uninuaboai ato toum ebinuaboim ba . ’ ”
42010028	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om on dura bag wat uyafot , om atonio osi bobo uniyamen ato om au wantoan unama . ”
42010029	Baise Baifafaro an baibebeotin on igogoi itiyoboes on an dura on totorin wat , on mes on Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Iyabon on yau tuturau i ? ”
42010030	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Ra tani orot tani Jerusalem emon ibib isusur au Jericho ato sabu yakeotis sigat orot sibo siborarab , an sawar engon siboen ato on nan irabob yoen i’yen .
42010031	Namon priest on ato eta kaitamomai ibib isusur ; baise on orot i’tai mom on irabon eta rebanai ibi inai .
42010032	On eta kaitamomai priest asi dam wabis Levi on mat on etai nan ibib i’nat , ato on isirir orot it , namon on ikirir ato eta rebanai ibib inai .
42010033	Baise Samaria ragit orot tani on , on eta kaitamomai ibib inat orot aurin igat , ato on iyeit orot i’tai mom on , on nunuan men sunub iyababan .
42010034	On orot aurin ibib inai , fio momon a sareu wine iboen usin gawudai nan ideburen ifioai ato usin gawud on imetanen , namon on orot ibo foro bobaitu tefanai iyagai ato ibo inai nanawanotis asi goai ato nan ikaifarai .
42010035	Ra itom ato an agim ruam nanaba on an kekes emon iboseir , ato goa matuanin itai . On goa matuanin iyawur iyau , ‘ Om on orot unkaifarai tiwag , ato yau arimon nin anmatabir men annat weie ato am agim am bayu aifan on orot aurin unrereben on arimon nanaba anigaraminem men . ’ ”
42010036	Ato Iesu an dura kanfounai iyau , “ Om am bainonotai atonio orot ton amosi on menan on tuturan baibaisis an eta ifour ato sabu yakeotis orot sirarabin on i ? ”
42010037	Baifafaro an baibebeotin iyafotai iyau , “ Orot iyafan turan ikakaifarai on . ” Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om unan ato on bobo nanaba unafour . ”
42010038	Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat sibib si’nan ato sinat mafam taniai nan sigat ato jever wabin Martha on ikakaiwis ato Iesu ibo irui an goa amonai .
42010039	On tain giya jeverei wabin Mary on Bada sesebinai imair ato On ibibebe on itatam .
42010040	Martha on an bobo irat kwakwan , on mes on yan ikomas ato inat Bada aurin iyau , “ Bada , Om enonosin yau taiu on bobo obin ifour , on yau ikirireu ato atonio bobo tutufin engon on yau ekesiu wat abobo ? Om yawur innat inibaisiu ! ”
42010041	Bada on jever iyafotai iyau , “ Martha , Martha ! Om atonio osi bobo engon tutufin auris on men sunub ebiyababanim on ,
42010042	baise om on bobo kaitamom wat on egogoi , Mary on bobo obin irubin , ato arimon men fofonin on emon sinboai sinan on . ”
42011001	Ra tani Iesu efan taniai ibabayoi . On bayoi isawarai mom , ato On an baigibubunuotin tani On aurin iyau , “ Bada , wei eibebeyei nanaba wanbayoi , ato John an baigibubunuotis ibibebeyes ba . ”
42011002	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi wonbabayoi on , atonio nanaba wonau : ‘ Tamai : wei wababayoi Om Wabim Kakafotin on wankakafai ; Om am Baiaiwab enat .
42011003	Ari ra ra ai gogoi bayu on eitei .
42011004	Wei ai bokomas wafofour on einotburei , yabin wei mat sabu engon auri bobo komasis sifofour on waninotbures . A mat Om men unbonanawaii wanan rutobon wawanin wanboai mes . ’ ”
42011005	Ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Omi orot tani fom nub basun itan turan aurin itau , ‘ Turau , fofonin arimon rafi sarar ton nanaba utibaisiu utiteu .
42011006	Yau turau ibinanawan on ato arimon inat au goai , ato yau auriu on bayu ambin abifan anitai i’nan ! ’
42011007	Ato turam goa amon emon itiyafotem itau , ‘ Om men unisababaniu mes ! Yau au goa metewan on arufot akuwabin nono , ato yau nanatu mat on waienbubur . Yau men fofonin arimon anmisir osi sawar anitem . ’
42011008	Ato omi wononosin on arimon mamaba inafour ? Yau awurem , basit on arimon men inmisir rafi sarar inboai initem yabin on orot on om turam on mes , baise on inmisir am gogoi bayu aurin on engon tutufin initem , yabin om ato ufefeyan aurin on men mamai iboem on .
42011009	On mes awurem : Unfefeyan ato unboai ; unnuen , ato ungaturai ; unrugegedan ato om aurim metewan sinruseren .
42011010	Iyai iyafan ebifefeyan on arimon inboai , a iyai iyafan enunuen on arimon ingaturai , ato iyai iyafan erugegedan on metewan on aurin inruseren wein .
42011011	Ato omi fifirig tatamas on mamaba wonafour , natum iyan mes itifefeyan ato omi mota on wotboai wotitai i ?
42011012	O natum kiwiu fofous mes itifefeyan ato omi towa on wotboai wotitai i ?
42011013	Basit omi on komasim , ato omi wosagob mamaba sawar obis nanatum wonites . On mes dura bag omi Tamam safamai on isagob mamaba Ayu Kakafotin initem , ato osi sabu iyabon On aurin sebifefeyan on ! ”
42011014	Iesu on orot tefanai dau imama on ifafaitan itgat mes , on orot on awan ikok dura men fofonin itikakafun on ; ato dau on orot tefan emon igat weie orot ibosuruf dura ikakafun . Sabu kuayo gagamin on siduduran kwakwan ,
42011015	baise sabu fani on siyau , “ Nan on Beelzebul , dau asi aiwab on faiwar ebitai ato On dau efafaitanis segat . ”
42011016	Sabu fani on sigogoi Iesu sitrutobonai , on mes osi sifefeyanai bobo buburin itafour ato itiyoboes on God On aurin on faiwar itai bobo inabo .
42011017	Baise Iesu isagob osi mamaba sibinonotis , ato On osi auris iyau , “ Tafanam tani toun wat itkuseseb kuayo ta ta sitmatar weie tous wat sitigagam bonen on , on tafanam on arimon ittumai itsawar , a sabu taitais tutuas mat sitkuseseb ato tous wat sitigagam bonen on , osi arimon engon sitsawar .
42011018	On mes ato Afaguban an baiaiwab itkuseseb kuayo ta ta sitmatar weie tous wat sitigagam bonen , on min arimon mamaba iten ? Omi woikakafun wau , Yau afaguban afafaitanis yabin Beelzebul on faiwar ebiteu on nan bobo afofour .
42011019	Ato Yau Beelzebul an faiwarai dau afafaitanis segat on , ato omi ami baigibubunuotis on abi faiwarai on nan dau sefafaitanis segat i ? On mes omi toum ami baigibubunuotis sisagob omi on eta woisarar !
42011020	Ambin , Yau on God an faiwarai on dau afafaitanis segat , on aurin atonio bobo ebi dura bag on God an Baiaiwab on omi aurim inat nono .
42011021	“ Orot wawanin an iyo sigaraba ibotitiwagen an goa ekakaifarai on , an sawar engon tutufin on matafis wat sen .
42011022	Baise orot wawanin bag aurin innat rus sinbigagam ato inbisowarai on , orot wawanin bag on arimon orot matuanin an iyo sigaraba on tefanai ibitutumen an goa ikakaifarai on engon inboen inan . Namon orot wawanin bag on an gogoi nanaba inafour orot turan an sawar ibabainauen on inkuseseb .
42011023	“ Iyai iyafan men Yau auriu etatawar on , Yau ebiragiteu ; iyai iyafan men Yau ebibaisiu au bobo ebobo sabu eboes on , on orot toun on au sabu efafaitanis fetag fetag senan . ”
42011024	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Ayu komasin orot jever usin ebikirir egat on , on ibib enan tafanam koiteterinai nan efan enunuen nan iniyarir mes . On efan men egaturai on toun aurin ebikakafun yau , ‘ Yau anmatabir men au goa abikirir aurin . ’
42011025	On mes on ayu komasin emamatabir men orot aurin on egaturai obin wat a sibotitiwagai nono .
42011026	Namon on egat enan ayu komasis nimtereban ruam ba iboes enat , ato osi on sikomas kwakwan men on ato ayu kaitamom ekesin ba on , ato osi senat nan semama . Namon ayu komasis engon on serur orot usinai semama on , ato orot jever on komasin gagamin bag egaturai men ainau imama ba . ”
42011027	Iesu atonio dura iyau isawar gibunai , jever on sabu kuayo sanasi nan imisir ato Iesu aurin iyau , “ Yasisir gagamin maiau ayom aurin , yabin on ituem ato ikaifarem urat ! ”
42011028	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Baise yasisir gagamin osi sabu auris , iyabon God an dura setatam ato aurin sebifonabo on ! ”
42011029	Sabu sibosuruf siruruayo Iesu sibikufifinai ato On ikakafun iyau , “ Sabu ari nin semama on sabu komasis ! Osi bobo buburin fourin aurin on sebifefeyan baise osi men arimon bobo buburin tani sinboai on , ab Jonah an bobo buburin wat .
42011030	On eta kaitamomai aubairuruotin Jonah on baiyoboen ba osi sabu Nineveh yangan auris , on mes Orot Natun on arimon baiyoboen ba sabu ari nin semama auris .
42011031	Baigurubaban an Ra Aiwab jever an tafanam Sheba emon on , arimon inmisir ato sabu ari ra nin semama on iniubares yabin on Aiwab jever on eta weromin maiau tafanam taigai bag on emon ibib inat aiwab orot Solomon aurin on an gigiboan baibebe ittatam mes ; ato Yau awurem orot tani nin on gagamin bag men aiwab Solomon ba .
42011032	Baigurubaban an Ra Nineveh sabu on arimon sinmisir sabu ari ra nin semama on siniubares yabin Jonah osi sabu auris dura ikurereb on osi engon tutufin ya baikitabir sibo , ato awurem orot tani nin on gagamin bag men Jonah ba ! ”
42011033	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Men iyafan tani tafa initutu ato inibuni o inboai ramo amonai iniwan ; ab on inboai tafa an tatawarai nan inyein , onai sabu sinrurur min on tafa sinitai sinar .
42011034	Om matam on tafa ba usim aurin . Om matam obin rubunagin on , om usim engon tutufin on tagawaiin wat ; baise om matam inkomas on , om usim engon tutufin on arimon wouman wat inbonu .
42011035	On mes unkaifarem tiwag , men uniyamai tafa ato usimui yen on innat wouman inmatar .
42011036	Ato om usim tutufin engon ratafin wat ibonu ato men wouman tani on , arimon usim engon intagawai ato tafa an ratafin usimui etatagawai ba ! ”
42011037	Iesu dura ikakafun isawar ato , Pharisee orot on Iesu ibebegai inat an goai rus bayu sitam mes ; on mes On inai imair bayu itam mes .
42011038	Pharisee orot on iror yabin on isagob on osi asi kik iyau nanaba on Iesu iman men isouen weie bayu itam mes .
42011039	On mes Bada on orot aurin iyau , “ Omi Pharisee yangan on ami viga a ramo kous wat on wososouen , baise omi amomui on afeyan a yawas komasis wat on sibonu sen .
42011040	Omi sabu on ojim bag ! God ato bobo kounai ifofour on nanaba min amon emon on eb nanaba ifouren .
42011041	Baise sawar aifan ami vigai o ami ramoai sen on sabu kokoianis wonites , on ato bobo engon tutufin omi aurim on arimon gumidaris sinmatar .
42011042	“ Baise omi Pharisee yangan aurim on komasin bag ! Omi ami masauai bayu turin woboai , ami masauai wengar rorous fani nan on engon woboai auyotoat on God wobitai , baise omi sabu auris wobinosfotes , omi men wobiyamai mat fofonin womama on a mat omi God on men wobinuaboai on . Omi atonio osi bobo on wotafourtobon wotiyamai tiwag , ato omi bobo nana obis wotfofour bobo fani mat auris .
42011043	“ Omi Pharisee yangan aurim on komasin bag ! Omi bayoi goa amosi nan sifumama obis sen on omi wobinuaboen a omi ami nuabo on ato sabu baitotobon an efanai sebitotobon ato omi wobiyames aurim sekakafem a sekwakwafirem .
42011044	Omi aurim on komasim bag ! Omi on ato rasi an efan ba sabu men sisagob on orot jever nan sigarobis sen , ato sabu nan rasi dogu tefanai sebibib senan senat . ”
42011045	Baifafaro an baibebeotin tani on Iesu iyawur , “ Baibebeotim , om atonio dura ebikakafun min wei mat dura komasis yawurei ! ”
42011046	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Omi Baifafaro an baibebeotim mat aurim on komasin bag ! Omi on bit sabu kousi woyagagaien ato sibit kwakwan men fofonin sinabaren on , baise omi toum on men fofonin imam wat wonotet ingat atonio osi bit wonibaisis wonabar on .
42011047	Omi aurim on komasin bag ! Omi on aubairuruotis asi rasi on obis maiau woyoyonen — atonio osi aubairuruotis min ainau omi wawam agirim siyasububunues .
42011048	Omi toum on wosagob aifan imatar , ato omi toum woidura bag mamaba wawam agirim sifofour on ; osi aubairuruotis siyasububunues ato omi on ato asi rasi on woyoyonen .
42011049	On yabinai God On an Gigiboan iyau , ‘ Yau osi aubairuruotis a sabu dura bobibotis aniyafares ; ato osi fani arimon sinasububunues a fani on arimon baikokosar sinites . ’
42011050	On mes omi sabu ari wera nin womama on baimaki wonboai yabin osi aubairuruotis engon siyasububunues , ato tafanam sifofourai nan ,
42011051	osi Abel siyasubun an faratai inat Zechariah siyasubun an faratai igat , Zechariah on tafaror goa amonai sirifu kema yen a Efan Kakafotin yen on basunai nan siyasubun . Atonio osi bobo sifofour angaramin on awurem dura bag , osi sabu ari wera nin semama on arimon engon tutufin baimaki sinboai !
42011052	Omi Baifafaro an baibebeotim , omi aurim on komasin bag ! Omi on God sagobin aurin an metewan ruruseren on wobo woibuni ; omi toum mat mamaba wonsagobai ato sabu fani sefofourtobon God sinsagobai mes on omi worufofotes ! ”
42011053	Iesu On efan ikirir mom , ato Baifafaro an baibebeotis a Pharisee yangan on sibosuruf dura komasis on yatatabai nan sigam si’yawur ato bobo sigaraba auris on sibitetemai ,
42011054	osi sifourtobon an konat siya nan sitkonatai mes a On an dura komasis i’tau mes on nan sitkamosai .
42012001	Sabu siruruayo on kuayo irat kwakwan 1,000 nanaba , ato sabu on sibikikin mom , ato Iesu on ainau dura an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Omi matam woneit tiwag ato Pharisee yangan asi fio yist aurin — Yau abikakafun on osi asi yawas on engon baisigogo wat .
42012002	Sawar aifan sitoun sisabutan yen on arimon au rereb ingat , a bobo buburis engon on arimon sinsagob .
42012003	On mes om dura aifan nan woumanai ukakafun on , arimon ra aiyet basun nan sintatam , ato om dura mamaba kafakakai wat am goa metewan urufot amonai nan udurusof mom on arimon goa uwayobai nan siniyoku sinikakafun . ”
42012004	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Yau tuturau awurem , omi men wonaber ato osi sabu auris ato usim wat sinasubun aurin on , baise osi gibui on men arimon aifan bobo komasin tani siniyamai on .
42012005	Yau aniyoboem Orot Iyafan on wonberuai : God wonberuai , On arimon inasubunuem a On an baibad yen inboem wairaf an efan komasinai inyeinim . Dura bag , omi On Orot ekesin mom wonberuai !
42012006	“ Sabu on kiwiu gugudis engon nim nanaba on agim gugudis ruam wat on nan setotobon . Ato God osi auris on men arimon tani ininosfotai on .
42012007	Mat God on tefam iyab isagob biyam nanaba on unimui sen . On mes om men unaber mes ; om on gagamim bag men ato kiwiu gugudis ba on ! ”
42012008	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag iyai iyafan wasai nan auriu dura ekurereb on Yau ebinoaniu , on eta kaitamomai Orot Natun arimon God an anea matasi nan bobo nanaba aurin inafour .
42012009	Baise iyai iyafan wasai nan dura ekurereb on Yau men egogoiiu , on Orot Natun mat arimon God an anea matasi nan nanaba inisisiweiai .
42012010	“ Iyai iyafan Orot Natun aurin dura komasis inbikakafun on God arimon innotburai , baise iyai iyafan dura komasis Ayu Kakafotin aurin inbikakafun on God arimon men innotburai .
42012011	“ Omi sabu sinboem wonar bayoi goa amonai , o gawan nasi o sabu bainetewarotis nasi wontatawar on , omi men woniyababan mamaba toum wonrufafarem aurin on o dura wonbikakafun aurin on .
42012012	Yabin on an werai on Ayu Kakafotin arimon inibebeyim dura mamaba wonikakafun . ”
42012013	Orot tani sabu kuayo sanasi imisir Iesu aurin iyau , “ Baibebeotim , tuau orot yawur ato tamai an sawar ikiriren weinei on rui wanraram . ”
42012014	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Orot iyafan on Yau baibad iteu omi anigurubabanim o omi rum ami sawar an raram weinem i ? ”
42012015	Namon Iesu on an dura ibotein sabu engon tutufin auris iyau , “ Omi matam woneit a wonkaifarem tiwag , tafanam an sawar magis magis auris ; yabin orot an yawas bag on men ato sawar aifan ebinoanai ba on , basit on sawarotin min on . ”
42012016	Namon Iesu atonio dura kawen on auris idudur : “ Ra tani orot sawarotin an motobai on fesi obis wat ibofefes ato bayu min yabis gagamis simatar .
42012017	On ibosuruf toun ibinonotai , ‘ Yau au goa efan on ambin menan nan au bayu engon nan antubabaren . Yau mamaba anafour ? ’
42012018	Orot ibosuruf toun ibinonotai i’yau , ‘ Yau bobo atonio nanaba anafour ; yau au bayu goa on angoros insur ato gagamin bag anyon , on nan au sawareg a bayu fani antubabaren sinen .
42012019	Namon yau tou auriu anau , yau on asowar nono ! Yau au gogoi bayu on obis a fofonis wat ato atubabaren sinen kwanda kwanda . Yawas sasasan agaturai bayu anam anatom , a tou aniyasisireu ! ’
42012020	Baise God aurin iyau , ‘ Om ojim ! Ari fom on unarab ; ato sawar ato ekakaifaren on iyafan inabo i ? ’ ”
42012021	Iesu an dura kanfounai iyau , “ Atonio bobo on arimon nanaba inmatar ato osi sabu iyabon sawarotis tous asi sawar sebisosoi mom on , baise God matanai on om men sawarotim on . ”
42012022	Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ On mes awurem au , omi men bayu auris woniyababan ato wonam yawasim wonama aurin on a mat men ara beber auris woniyababan ato usim baitakwakwaren aurin on .
42012023	Yawas on gagamin bag men bayu ba , a usim on gagamin bag men ara beber ba .
42012024	Omi kiwiu ato woites : Osi on men fesi sebofefes a osi on men bayu sekukuwain on ; osi on men goa siyonen nan bayu setubabaren on ; osi on God bayu ebitues ! Omi orot jever on gagamim bag men ato kiwiu ba !
42012025	Omi men iyafan tani nanaba inama an wera tutufinai ato sawar auris inbiyababan on .
42012026	Omi bobo gugudis bag on men fofonin woniyamen on , aibo mes wobiyababan bobo gagamis auris i ?
42012027	Omi beran ato segeg on woniten : Osi men bobo sebobo a osi men tous auris ara beber sebiyamen on . Baise anawurem , aiwab orot Solomon an baiaiwab a an ara beber on men tani iyobin bag atonio beran ba .
42012028	God on ara beber wayo ebiyotes — wayo on ari wat inen ato raso on sinikomasai wairafai inaras . On mes wonsagob God on omi ami ara beber on gagaminai bag iniyotem . Omi ami baitutum on men inikafakakai mes !
42012029	“ On mes omi men ra fufur wonnos kwakwan ato bayu aifan wonam a wontoman aurin on .
42012030	( Sabu bokomasotis nin tafanamai on ra fufur atonio osi bobo auris on sebinonotis kwakwan . ) Ato osi sawar auris wogogoi on omi Tamam min isagob .
42012031	Baise omi bobo aifan wonbiyamai on God an Baiaiwab aurin wat on wonnuen , namon sawar fani auris wogogoi min arimon initem . ”
42012032	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi foro sheep ruamom on men wonaber mes , omi Tamam on inonot nono arimon Baiaiwab initem .
42012033	Omi ami sawar sen on engon wonitotobon ato agim wonboai sabu kokoianis wonites . Omi agim asi kukufet on wonabo ato on agim kukufet on arimon wantoan inen , omi ami baiaiwab safamai aurin on wonbotitiwag , on baiaiwab arimon men meyan insawar , yabin orot bainauotin on men fofonin arimon safamai inbainauim on a men arimon nonot sinikomasen on .
42012034	Omi ami bainonot on ra fufur nan ami obin safamai wonbiaiwab aurin wat on wonyein . ”
42012035	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi wonbotitiwagim bobo aifan inmamatar aurin on , omi ami ara beber on wonboai nan wongigin tiwag a ami ramef wonitutu auman wonbotitiwagim bobo aurin ,
42012036	omi woniyamai ato sabu agirotis ba asi bada semomousin on tabin an bobaitab emon inmatabir men . On innat metewan inrugegedan on , osi ra kaita metewan sinruseren wain inar .
42012037	Yasisir gagamin bag ato osi agirotis auris , on an ra asi bada inmamatabir men ingagatures on , osi on sibotitiwagis isawar matas siyeit semama ! Yau awurem dura bag , on arimon kaid inboai nenen ingigin ato inawures kemai sinamair ato on toun asi bayu inbotitiwagen weines .
42012038	Yasisir gagamin bag osi agirotis auris , asi bada fom nub basun innat o wera gibui weie innat , ato On innat on ingatures osi sibotitiwag nono semama !
42012039	Atonio wonsagob , ato orot goa matuanin wera itsagob meyan orot bainauotin enat on arimon men itikirir itar an goa itaseb on .
42012040	Ato omi mat on wonbotitiwagim yabin omi wera on men wosagob a omi men wonbinonotim an werai on Orot Natun innat . ”
42012041	Peter iyau , “ Bada , atonio dura kawen on wei auri ebikakafun o sabu engon auris mat ebikakafun i ? ”
42012042	Bada iyafotai iyau , “ Iyafan agirotin on baitutumin a gigiboanotin ? On orot on an bada baibad initai goa inkaifarai a agirotis fani asi bayu on wera fofoninai bag nan inbibites .
42012043	Yasisir gagamin bag on agirotin aurin , ato an bada innat au go ingaturai on an bobo inbobo on !
42012044	Yau awurem dura bag , on an bada on arimon baibad engon agirotin initai on bobo engon tutufin inkaifaren wain .
42012045	Baise on agirotin on toun aurin inau , yau au bada on wera weromin maiau nan emama ato on men arimon gariwat innat on . On mes on inbosuruf agirotis fani jever orot inarou a on bayu inam a sareu wawanis inatom kwakwan inbikokok ,
42012046	namon ra tani an bada inmatabir men ato on agirotin on men on inbinonotai a on an wera mat on men insagob . On an bada innat on agirotin baimaki komasin bag initai , ato on inboai an efan on sabu fonaseirotis mat nan inyeinis .
42012047	“ Agirotin isagob on an bada an gogoi bobo abifan on iniyamai , baise on toun men ebotitiwagai ato an bada an gogoi men ebobo on arimon an baimaki on wawaninai bag urouwawanai nan sinaswabirai ;
42012048	baise agirotin on men isagob on an bada an gogoi aifan on bobo inabo , ab on toun an gogoi bobo fani on ebobo , ato asir urouwawanai saswabirai mom on , on arimon an baimaki on sasasanai urouwawanai sinaswabirai . Orot iyafan sawar fofoninai sibitai on an garamin on nanaba an fofoninai inites men ; ato orot iyafan imanai sawar sigaraba sibitai on , osi sinifefeyan on angaramin nanaba sawar sigaraba bag inites men . ”
42012049	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Yau anat wairaf tafanamai an yein inaras mes , Yau anonosin au gogoi on wairaf on i’taras nono !
42012050	Yau on bapataito magin tani baikokosar an bapataito on anboai , Yau nunuau on yababan ibonueu ato agogoi yababan on anisawarai !
42012051	Omi wononosin Yau anat tafanamai tuf an yein mes i ? Ambin , Yau men tuf anyein on , baise awurem , Yau anat tafanam an kuseseb mes .
42012052	Ari ra on arimon goa amonai taitais tutuas engon nim nanaba sinkuseseb tais tuas ton on mabisi ato osi siniragit tais tuas ruam auris , a tais tuas ruam on eb tais tuas ton auris siniragit .
42012053	Fifirig tatamas on arimon nanatus auris siniragites ato fifirig on eb arimon tatamas auris siniragites ; jeverig ayos on arimon nanatus jeverig auris siniragites ato jeverig on eb arimon a’yos auris siniragites ; jever arimon rarawas jeverig auris siniragites ; ato urataman jeverig on eb arimon rarawas jever auris siniragites . ”
42012054	Mat Iesu on sabu auris iyau , “ Omi wontage kasakasau gugugurin wonitai wera sifun emon innanat on ra kaita wonau , usan arimon inayar — ato usan min eyayar .
42012055	Ato yabat rega emon esisin ato naniam wat wontatam wonsagob ato wonau tafanam arimon inforab — ato efoforab .
42012056	Omi on baisigogo’otim ! Omi on kasakasau a tafanam woniten on wonsagob ra mamaba ekokomas o obin yen , ato omi aibo mes ari ra ato bobo semamatar on men wosagob ? ”
42012057	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi aibo mes toum on men woninonotim tiwag ato bobo obis wat wonafour ?
42012058	Orot tani iboem egeg baigurubaban orot nanai nan dura wonikakafun mes on , om unafourtobon rum ami komasis on eta nenenai nan wonitotorai onai om men inboem wonag baigurubaban orot nanai wontawar , ato on bobo men nanaba unfofour on , orot inboem wonag baigurubaban orot nanai wontawar ato on inboem tafanam an baifafaro kaifarotis imasi inyagai ato osi sinboem fafatum goai sinreberuem .
42012059	Yau awurem , om arimon nan unama ato om fafatum goa emon boseirim gat mes unfofour on am agim baiyan engon tutufin unyein weie ungat . ”
42013001	On an werai sabu fani nan on Iesu sikasonai , mamaba Galilee sabu fani auris bobo imamatar on . Galilee sabu fani on God sikwakwafirai asi bobaitu on sirifu mes sikuteten ato Pilate an sabu iyawures siyasububunues . Osi sabu asi tara on bobaitu asi tara mat sikaita .
42013002	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yabin omi wononosin sabu atonio nanaba siyasububunues on omi wobidura bag osi on bokomasotis bag men Galilee sabu engon tutufin ba ?
42013003	Ambin bag ! Yau awurem , ‘ Omi men ya baikitabir wonboai on , arimon osi sabu sirarabob ba engon wonarab . ’
42013004	Ato sabu auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baitonin nanaba Siloam nan goa ann weromin on osi tefasi ifeu iyasububunues on mamaba i ? Omi wononosin woi dura bag osi sabu bokomasotis bag men ato sabu fani engon nan Jerusalem semama ba i ?
42013005	Ambin bag ! Ato Yau awurem omi men ya baikitabir wonboai on , omi arimon osi sirarabob ba engon wonarab . ”
42013006	Namon Iesu on atonio dura kawenai auris idudur : “ Ra tani orot an wine masau amonai nan bubudau wengar igai itatawar . On ra ra nanaba ifofour ibibib i’nan an masauai bubudau wengar uwas ibinateteyen baise bubudau uwan on men tani i’gaturai on .
42013007	On mes on imisir an masau bo’otin aurin iyau , ‘ Eite , kwanda ton nanaba on yau ra ra a’nat bubudau uwas mes abinateteyen , baise men uwan tani agaturai mes . Etar efeu ! Aibo mes on wengar uwan on men tani eyeyeinin ato fetag au motobai etatawar ? ’
42013008	Baise orot masau bo’otin on iyafotai iyau , ‘ Bada , wengar asi eikirir mom , ato kwanda kaitamom ba tanimateteai ; yau arimon wengar ann totoun anabar a anbotitiwagai anitai .
42013009	Namon kwanda tani inboai nan uwan inou on , basit iyobin bag ; ato ambin on , wengar untarai inafeu . ’ ”
42013010	Sabat ra taniai nan Iesu bayoi goa amonai sabu ibibebeyes .
42013011	On Jever tani nan on tefanai ayu komasin imama ato on ibiyamai isasawau on kwanda auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baitonin nanaba isawar ; on jever on koun ikwatut ato men fofonin koun ititotorai men .
42013012	Iesu on jever it mom ato aurin iyor iyau , “ Jever om am sawau on ari arufanim ! ”
42013013	On iman jever usinai iyagai , ato ra kaita on jever koun itotorai , ato on imisir God ifain ibogagaiai .
42013014	Iesu Sabat an ra nan jever ibiyawasai aurin on bayoi goa an bainetewarotin on yan itatab , ato imisir sabu auris ikakafun iyau , “ Wera nimtereban kaita on bobo tanabo ; on mes osi wera amosi on nan wonnat sabu woniyawasis , baise men Sabat an ra mes ! ”
42013015	Bada on iyafotai ikakafun iyau , “ Omi baisigogo’otim ! Omi engon ami foro ox o donkey asi goa emon uram worurufanen ato ra fufur woboes wonan sareu setotoman — ato Sabat an ra min bobo nanaba wofofour .
42013016	Atonio jever on Abraham wawan agirin , on Afaguban ifatumai imama on kwanda auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baitonin isawar , ato Sabat an ra abiyawasai on men bobo komasin tani mes . ”
42013017	Iesu atonio dura ibiyafot on , sabu iyabon On siragitai dura sibikakafun on tous wat mamai iboes , ato sabu fani nan On bobo obis engon ifouren simamatar auris on siyasisir .
42013018	Iesu itetem iyau , “ God an Baiaiwab on mamaba ? Abifan sawarai nan anifofon ?
42013019	Ato nanaba . Orot aigab fesi eboai ato an masauai etatanum . Ato on foun on ekukubou egeg ato wengar emamatar , kiwiu senat on wengar fafamenai asi batar seyoyonen . ”
42013020	Iesu itetem men iyau , “ God an Baiaiwab aurin on abifan sawarai anifofon ?
42013021	Ato nanaba . Jever fio yist on eboai rafi auman egagamatabir , ato rafi ekakadid egeg ebitutufin . ”
42013022	Iesu on etai ibib igeg au Jerusalem , ato eta nenenai nan mafam gagamis a mafam gugudis amosi on sabu ibibebeyes .
42013023	Orot tani nan Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Bada , sabu arimon ruamom wat on yawas sinboai ? ” Iesu iyafotes iyau ,
42013024	“ Omi wonafourtobon metewan awan viririnai wonar wonan ; yabin sabu sigaraba on dura bag sinafourtobon sinar , baise arimon men fofonin on .
42013025	Wera innat on , goa an bada arimon inmisir metewan inrufot . Namon omi goa kounai wontawar , wonbosuruf metewan wonrugegedan wonau , ‘ Bada , metewan eruseren weineu , ’ ato On arimon iniyafotem inau , ‘ Yau men asagobim on , omi men emon wonat ! ’
42013026	Namon omi arimon woniyafotai wonau , ‘ wei on om mat bayu tam tatom ; om on wei ai mafam gagaminai nan ubibebeyei ! ’
42013027	Baise On inawurem men inau , ‘ Yau men asagobim omi men emon wonat . Omi woikirireu wonai , omi sabu komasim bag ! ’
42013028	Omi arimon Abraham , Isaac , Jacob a aubairuruotis engon on nan God an Baiaiwabai sinmama wonites . Baise omi on sinrebenim au koun wongat namon omi nan wonatou wam wonitafoforen !
42013029	Sabu sigaraba arimon tafanam au engon tutufin sinnat ato nan God an Baiaiwab amonai sinar kemai sinamair bayu sinam .
42013030	Namon sabu iyabon ari asi efan babanai semama on sinag efan aiyetunai sinama , ato sabu iyabon ari asi efan aiyetunai semama on sinsur efan babanai sinama . ”
42013031	On wera kaitamomai Pharisee yangan fani sinat Iesu aurin ato siyau , “ Om on ari bag atonio efan unikirir ungat unan tafanam taniai , yabin Herod egogoi inasubunuem . ”
42013032	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi wonan on orot kuke fox komasin wonawur : ‘ Ari a raso on au bobo abobo dau sabu tefasi semama on afafaitanis segat , ato wera baitoninai on au bobo anisawarai . ’
42013033	Baise Yau on ari , raso a ra baitoninai on etai anabib . Men kafakakai obin mes ato aubairuruotis on men tafanam faniai nan sasbubunues on , baise Jerusalem amonai wat .
42013034	“ Jerusalem , Jerusalem , om aubairuruotis uyasububunues , God an dura bobibotis om aurim sibiyafares on agimai uyasububunues ! Ra sigaraba maiau agogoi om am sabu engon tutufin atruayois ato kokorerek jever efofour ba nanatun eruruayois ato fafenai efafaris . Baise omi sabu on men wogogoi Yau on bobo nanaba anafour on !
42013035	Omi ami tafaror goa on arimon wagan wat inen . Yau awurem dura bag , omi arimon men woniteu , on an rai an wera innat weie omi wonau , ‘ God imomoginai On Bada Wabinai enat . ’ ”
42014001	Sabat ra taniai Iesu inai Pharisee yangan asi bainetewarotin an goai nan bayu itam mes ; ato sabu on Iesu sibimateteai tiwag .
42014002	Orot sawau tani ibo ann iman sidadau , on inat Iesu aurin ,
42014003	ato Iesu on Pharisee yangan a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on itetemis iyau , “ Ot ati Baifafaro iyau on fofonin arimon sabu Sabat ra nan sabu taniyawasis o ambin i ? ”
42014004	Baise osi men fofonin abi dura tani sitau . Iesu orot ibo , iyawasai ato iyafarai inai .
42014005	Namon On osi auris iyau , “ Omi natum o ami foro ox tani on Sabat ra nan sareu an doguai itafeu , ato omi mamaba wotafour i ? Omi ra kaita wotan wottein itag , basit Sabat ra min on . ”
42014006	Baise atonio dura aurin on osi men fofonin arimon sitiyafotai on .
42014007	Iesu isagob mamaba sabu fani siyoyores si’nat bayu am aurin on , osi asi efan on obis wat sinunuenen on nan simamair , on mes atonio bobo aurin on sabu engon auris dura kawenai nan idudur :
42014008	“ Orot tani inibebegim unnat tabin an forag aurin on , om men efan aiyetunai unamair mes . Om men usagob goa matuanin on orot tani gagamin bag men om ba , on ibebegai enat tabin an forag aurin ,
42014009	ato goa matuanin , omi rum engon ibibebegim wo’nat on innat aurim inau , ‘ Om atonio efan emama on unikirir ato orot atonio on nin efanai inamair . ’ Namon om arimon mamai inboem ato efan babanai bag on nan unamair .
42014010	Baise om , goa matuanin inbibebegim on , unan efan babanai unamair , ato goa matuanin on toun ibibebegim on aurim innat ato inau , ‘ Turau , enat efan obinai unamair . ’ Namon sabu fani sibebegis sinat nan semama on arimon engon om sinkakafem .
42014011	Iyai iyafan toun ebigagaminai on arimon sinyeirai insur , ato iyai iyafan toun eyeyeirai on arimon siniyamai gagamin inmatar . ”
42014012	Namon Iesu on dura ato orot goa matuanin on iyor inat on aurin iyau , “ Om aiyet an bayu o rabirabi an bayu unbotitiwag on men om turam o taitaim tutuam , o om am dam warar o sabu fani sawarotis — osi unibebegis mes , osi on arimon angaramin sinibebegim men , on etaiai ato aifan bobo ufofour aurin on arimon sinigaraminem men .
42014013	Om am forag unbiyamai on , sabu kokoianis , ass imas raguraguis , ass komasis , a matas fotis on unibebegis ;
42014014	onai om on arimon baimomogin unboai yabin osi sabu on men angaramin sinigaraminem men . Baise sabu obis ato rabob emon sinmisiririn an rai on nan God inigaraminem men . ”
42014015	Sabu kemai nan simama , ato orot tani atonio dura itatam ato on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Yasisir gagamin bag ato osi sabu auris iyabon God an Baiaiwabai sinamair bayu si’nam on ! ”
42014016	Iesu on orot aurin iyau , “ Ra tani orot forag gagamin iyamai ato sabu sigaraba maiau ibebegis .
42014017	Bayu am an wera inat , ato on orot on an agirotin iyafarai inai ato sabu ibibebegis on itawures ‘ Omi wonat , wei bayu engon wabotitiwag nono ! ’
42014018	Baise osi sabu on engon sibosuruf , kakaita kakaita asi dura ta ta on siboen sigat . Orot ainauin on agirotin iyawur iyau , ‘ Yau au motob atobon on mes anan anitai ; ato am bada unawur , arie yau on aurin abiyababan yabin yau men anat on . ’
42014019	Orot tani ba iyau , ‘ Yau au foro ox engon auyotoat atobonen ato yau a’nan au masauai nan foro anites ansagob osi on fofonis bobo sinabo o ambin ; ato am bada unawur , arie yau on aurin abiyababan yabin yau men anat on . ’
42014020	Orot tani iyau , ‘ Yau ato arimon atabin , on fasinai yau men anat on . ’
42014021	Agirotin imatabir men atonio bobo aurin on an bada iyawur . On goa an bada on yan men sunub itatab ato an agirotin aurin iyau , ‘ Om gariwat egat enai mafam gagamis amosi unar goa sanasi nan unar ungat sabu kokoianis , ass imas raguraguis , matas fotis a ass komasis on unboes unnat . ’
42014022	Men weromin agirotin iyau , ‘ Bada , dura mamaba uyawureu on nanaba afour , baise efan on gagamin yen . ’
42014023	On mes bada on agirotin aurin iyau , ‘ Egat enai rega etai nan a rega uwar sanasi nan sabu eboes senat , ato au goa awan inbonu .
42014024	Yau awurem , sabu ainau abibebegis on men iyai tani arimon yau mat bayu wanam on ! ’ ”
42014025	Sabu kuayo gagamin on Iesu mat sibib si’nan , ato On irutabir sabu auris iyau ,
42014026	“ Iyai iyafan Yau auriu enat on men fofonin au baigibubunuotin inmatar on , ab on Yau ininuaboiu tiwag weie , on men on toun taman , ayon , a’wan , nanatun , taitain tutuan , rorobun a on toun ibinuabois ba on .
42014027	Iyai iyafan men fofonin toun an nab inabar ato inigibubunueu , on min men Yau au baigibubunuotin on .
42014028	“ Iyai iyafan ebinonot goa ann weromin inyon on , ainau inamair ato goa inyoyonin an baiyan on engon inkuseb initai , on an agim on fofonin arimon an bobo inisawarai .
42014029	Ato on bobo men inbiyamai on arimon goa ann wat inrou ato men fofonin inyon insawar , ato sabu sinitai ato bobo mamaba imamatar on , arimon sinikoboai sinsererai .
42014030	Osi arimon sinau , ‘ Atonio orot ibosuruf goa ann weromin iyoyonin ato men fofonin inisawarai on ! ’
42014031	“ Aiwab orot an sabu 10,000 nanaba iboes egat , ato aiwab orot tani on sabu 20,000 nanaba on mat baigagam mes . Ato orot on ainau inamair ininonot on an faiwar fofonin arimon aiwab orot tani rus sinigagam ai ambin .
42014032	On orot men fofonin arimon aiwab orot tani inisowarai on , an sabu dura bobibotis iniyafares sinan aiwab orot sinnefotai sinifefeyanai tuf baiyamin aurin , on an ra on orot on eta nanenei emama nan .
42014033	Iesu an dura kanfounai iyau , “ On eta kaitamomai , iyai iyafan egogoi Yau au baigibubunuotin inmatar on , ato bobo aifan ato ebobo on engon inikiriren . ”
42014034	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Kamit on obin , ato on kamit an nanian insasawar on , men eta yen arimon taniyamai an nanian inboai men .
42014035	Motob aurin on men obin a kuke foro asi ain mat aurin men obin ; osi asir tanrebenen mom . Omi sabu er tainam aumas on Yau atonio dura abikakafun on wontatam tiwag ! ”
42015001	Ra tani sabu agim takes bo’otis sigaraba a sabu bokomasotis sigaraba on sinat Iesu an dura sittatam mes ,
42015002	ato Pharisee yangan a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on sibosuruf sigagamois si’yau , “ Atonio orot on sabu bokomasotis ebikakaiwis a on eb On mat bayu sam ! ”
42015003	On mes Iesu atonio dura kawen on auris idudur :
42015004	“ Omi orot tani aurin foro sheep orot nim nanaba ato foro sheep kaitamom wat itsisiwan on arimon - mamaba itafour i ? On an foro sheep orot bat auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baibatin on nan itikirires wayo si’tam ato on itgat itan foro sheep kaitamom isisiwan on itnuen itgaturai .
42015005	On foro sheep itgaturai on , itiyasisir kwakwan ato itboai abaranai ityagai ,
42015006	ato itabar itnat au go . Namon on tuturan a sabu fani ityores sitruayo ato itawures , ‘ Yau abiyasisir kwakwan ato au foro sheep isiwan on agaturai men . Omi wonat engon taniyasisir ! ’
42015007	On eta kaitamomai on awurem , orot bokomasotin kaitamom ya baikitabir inboai on , safamai on arimon yasisir gagamin inmatar , ato sabu orot bat auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baibatin auris on osi tous sebinonotis on obis wat on fasinai osi men ya baikitabir segogoi on . ”
42015008	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Jever aurin agim gugudis engon auyotoat nanaba ato agim kafakakai kaitamom wat itbisiwanai on - jever arimon mamaba itafour i ? On ramef ititutu ato an goa itrereb , ato efan engon itnuen tiwag itgaturai .
42015009	On agim itgaturai on . Jever tuturan a sabu fani ityores ato itawures itau , ‘ Yau au agim agaturai on mes abiyasisir kwakwan . Omi wonat engon taniyasisir ! ’
42015010	On eta kaitamomai awurem , God an anea on arimon men sunub siniyasisir ato orot bokomasotin kaitamom ya baikitabir inboboai on . ”
42015011	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Ra tani orot nanatun ruam mat simama .
42015012	Fifi giya on taman aurin iyau , ‘ Bab , yau au buder ato uyein yen on agogoi ari bag uniteu . ’ On mes orot an buder ikuseb nanatun ainau giya auris .
42015013	Ra fani sisawar gibunai fifi giya on an sawar sabu fani auris itotobon agim ibo ato on an goa ikirir igat inai . On igat inai tafanam nanenei nan an ma komasinai imama an agim on engon ireben isawar .
42015014	On an agim engon ireben isawar . Namon on efanai on gomar gagamin bag imatar tafanam au engon ibo , ato on an bayu ambin bag .
42015015	On mes on inai , ato on tafanam an orot tani aurin on nan bobo ibo , ato on orot iyafarai igat an foro itkaifares mes .
42015016	Fifi on bitanan igi kwakwan ato igogoi bag on foro asi bayu si’yam on itboen itam mes . Yabin men iyafan tani bayu itai iyam on .
42015017	Au kanfoun on fifi an not itotorai ato toun aurin iyau , ‘ Tamau an bobo sabu sigaraba nan semama auris on bayu fofonis wat baise yau nin on bayu mes ararabob !
42015018	Yau an misir anan tamau aurin ato anau , “ Bab , yau on God aurin abokomas a om mat aurim bobo komasin afour .
42015019	Yau men obiu on unyoreu natum ; ab om uniyameu yau om am bobo’otin tani ba . ’
42015020	On mes fifi imisir ato imatabir men inai taman aurin . “ Fifi on eta nanenei bag arimon i’nat au go ato taman iyeit inai natun it ; ato iyababan kwakwan , on iyayai inai natun irous ato iboyayanin .
42015021	Fifi iyau , ‘ Tamau , yau God aurin abokomas a om mat aurim bobo komasin afour . Yau on men obiu on unyoreu natum . ’
42015022	Baise fifi taman on an agirotis auris iyor iyau , ‘ Gariwat beber obin wobo wonat woitakwakwarai . Imanai kwasi woiwan , a kamak wobo ann woiwanen .
42015023	Namon omi wonai foro boboun momon wat worab , ato forag gagamin taniyamai bayu tanam taniyasisir !
42015024	Yabin yau natu on irabob , baise on iyawas men ; on isiwan ato agaturai men . ’ On mes osi sibosuruf forag gagamin siyamai .
42015025	“ On an werai ato ainau orot on igat inai masau ibobo . Namon on imatabir i’nat , on inat goa aurin ibiufin ato osi on tataf sirarabin a sibisau on wafararabis itatam .
42015026	On mes on agirotin tani iyor inat ato itetemai iyau , ‘ Nan bobo aifan emamatar i ? ’
42015027	Agirotin iyafotai iyau , ‘ Taim inat men au go , ato tamam on foro boboun momon irab yabin taim on yawasin imatabir men . ’
42015028	Ainau orot on yan itatab kwakwan on men igogoi goa amonai itar ; on mes taman on nana natun ibifefeyanai itar goa amonai mes .
42015029	Baise fifi ainau orot on taman iyafotai men iyau , ‘ Eite , kwanda sigaraba maiau yau on agirotiu ba aurim aboen , ato yau men meyan om fonam aseir mes . Ato aifan uteu i ? Ambin bag , om men foro goat kafakakai urab uteu yau tuturau mat wam waiyasisir mes !
42015030	Baise atonio natum on am buder engon ibo inai nan eta eta asi jeverig auris on engon ireben isawar , ato on imatabir inat men on om on aurin foro tona boboun momon urab ! ’
42015031	Taman iyafotai iyau , ‘ Natu om on ra fufur nin bisiwui emama ato au sawar aifan engon nin sen on om noam .
42015032	Baise ot forag tabiyamai tabiyasisir on taim on irabob baise ari on yawasin ; on isiwan baise ari agaturai men . ’ ”
42016001	Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Ra tani orot sawarotin on an agirotin on baibad itai an sawar engon ikakaifaren . Gibui sabu fani orot sawarotin sikasonai on an agirotin ato baibad itai an sawar ikakaifaren on , an agim turin on fetag fetag ebiraram ,
42016002	on mes orot sawarotin an agirotin iyor irui ato iyawur iyau , ‘ Om bobo komasis efofour on duram nanaba atatam i ? Om fef unboai ato au agim asi eta mamaba sibobo on engon ungayam unkasoneu ansagob , yabin om men gibui arimon baibad unboai au sawar unkaifaren mes . ’
42016003	Agirotin on toun aurin iyau , ‘ Yau au bada on arimon au bobo emon inboseiriu angat . Yau mamaba anafour ? Yau on men wawaniu arimon dogu anasar on , ato bobo nuenin aurin fefeyan on mamai eboeu .
42016004	Yau ari asagob , arimon mamaba anafour ? Au bada ato au bobo emon inboseiriu angagat on , arimon tuturau asi goai nan siniwaniu mat wanama . ’
42016005	On mes bobo an bada on sabu osi iyabon asi bada sawarotin bisinai sawar siboen ato gibui sitigaraminai mes , osi sabu on engon iyores sirui aurin . On orot ainauin itetemai iyau , ‘ Om au bada aurin sawar biyam nanaba on uboen bisimui sen i ? ’
42016006	On iyafotai iyau , ‘ Olive momon naukwat awas bonuis aumas on engon orot nim nanaba on anitai men . ’ Bobo an bada iyau , ‘ Om momon uboai an fef min atonio yen . Gariwat emair ato eyeirai esur orot bat auyotoat nanaba egayam . ’
42016007	Namon on orot tani ba aurin iyau , ‘ Om sawar biyam nanaba uboen bisimui sen i ? ’ On iyafotai iyau , ‘ Sawareg kwakwar auman an bit on 1,000 nanaba abo . ’ Bobo an bada on iyau , ‘ Om am sawareg kwakwar uboai an fef min atonio . Eyeirai esur 800 nanaba egayam . ’
42016008	“ On yabinai orot sawarotin an agirotin komasin ato bobo auris ibi bada on ifain , yabin sabu ato ari nin tafanam an yawasai semama on sisagob tiwag mamaba eta faniai nanaba sinafour tuturas auris , men ato sabu Bada an yawasai semama ba on . ”
42016009	Ato Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Yau awurem : Atonio tafanam an sawar obis aurim sen , on nan uniyamai tuturam mat wonam bonen wonama tiwag . Namon on sawar sinsasawaris on , God arimon safamai nan inikakaiwim inboem unar .
42016010	Iyai iyafan bobo gugudis ekakaifaren tiwag on , on min arimon bobo gagamis auris mat inkaifaren tiwag ; iyai iyafan bobo gugudis men inkaifaren tiwag , on min men arimon bobo gagamis inkaifaren on .
42016011	Om atonio tafanam an yawasai agim sawar men ukaifarai tiwag on , ato safam an sawar maiauin kaifarin aurin mat min mamaba sinitutumem ?
42016012	Om sabu fani asi sawar on men ukaifarai tiwag on , ato om toum am sawar on mamaba arimon sinitem .
42016013	“ Agirotin men iyafan tani on an bada ruam auris iniagir mes ; on arimon tani on inisisiweiai ato tani on ininuaboai ; on arimon tani on inbokikin ato tani on inisisiweiai . Om men fofonin arimon God a agim rus ra kaita uniagires on . ”
42016014	Pharisee yangan atonio dura engon sitatam on osi Iesu sikoboai sisererai yabin osi on agim sinuaboai kwakwan on mes .
42016015	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi toum wobiyamem sabu engon matasi seitem on obim wat , baise God isagob omi nunuam on mamaba . Sawar ato sabu senonosin osi auris on gagamis bag , ato God matanai on sawar yabis ambin .
42016016	“ Moses an Baifafaro a aubairuruotis asi dura sigagayam on nan sabu sibigibubunuai . Ato John Bapataito’otin inat an rai on Wasagobin God an Baiaiwab aurin ikurereb , ato sabu engon on sefofourtobon God an Baiaiwab amonai sinar mes .
42016017	Safam tafanam on arimon gariwat sasasan sintumai , baise Baifafaro amonai gayam kaitamom kafakakai wat on arimon men fofonin insiwan .
42016018	“ Orot iyafan awan jever ebikirir ato on jever tani ibo ebiawan men on min ebireg nan ; a orot tani iyafan ato jever sibikirir on ibo ebiawan men , on min ebireg nan . ”
42016019	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Ra tani orot sawarotin imama ato an ara beber on obis obis wat i’yoten ato ra fufur on forag ibiyamai bayu obis wat i’yam .
42016020	Orot tani mat wabin Lazarus on orot on kokoianin imama , on usin engon on gawud wat , ato on ra fufur si’boai si’nan orot sawarotin an goa metewan awanai sibimairai imama .
42016021	On igogoi on ato orot sawarotin an kemai bayu i’yam tuturis sifefeu on itabo itam mes . Ato kuke mat si’nat an gawud on sireremosen .
42016022	“ Gibui , on orot kokoianin irabob ato anea on ayubin sibo sinai Abraham aurin safamai nan . Orot sawarotin ba irabob ato sigarobai ,
42016023	baise on siyafarai inai efan menan sabu komasis serarabob senan semama on nan usibaban gagamin iboai . On itage ato Abraham nanenei nan it Lazarus rus simama .
42016024	On mes on iyor iyau , ‘ Tamau Abraham ! Ekabereu , ato Lazarus eiyafarai iman arakokoanai wat sareu itikutub ato fafeu itinubai , yabin yau on atonio wairafai nan baikokosar gagamin aboai ! ’
42016025	“ Baise Abraham iyau , ‘ Natu , asir enos mom , om am yawas tutufin amonai umama am sawar engon aurim on basit fofonim wat , baise Lazarus an yawas amonai on komasin wat imama . Baise ari Lazarus nin on ebiyasisir ato om on usibaban eboai .
42016026	Mat , ot basuti on tarabab gagamin yen ; men fofonin arimon iyafan tani inrabon om inibaisim a mat men iyafan tani on efanai emama on inrabon atonio efanai . ’
42016027	Orot sawarotin iyau , ‘ Tamau Abraham , abifefeyanim Lazarus utiyafarai itan tafanamai nan tamau an goai ,
42016028	ato taitaiu tutuau engon nim nan semama , on itan osi tainas ityein on men atonio baikokosar an efanai sinnat mes . ’
42016029	“ Abraham iyau , ‘ Om taitaim tutuam on Moses an baifafaro a aubairuruotis dura sigagayam on sibo siniyab ato tous sinsagob . ’
42016030	Orot sawarotin iyafotai iyau , ‘ Tamau Abraham ! On men fofonin on . Orot tani rabob emon inmisir ato inan osi auris on sinitutum ato osi min ya baikitabir sinboai . ’
42016031	Baise Abraham iyau , ‘ Om taitaim tutuam on Moses an baifafaro a aubairuruotis asi dura sigagayam on men aurin sibifonabo on , ato orot iyafan rabob emon inmisir inan auris , on arimon men an dura sintatam on . ’ ”
42017001	Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Bobo arimon dura bag sinmatar iniyamai sabu sinbokomas ; baise komasin bag orot iyafan on bobo iniyamen sinmamatar on !
42017002	Iyai iyafan on bobo komasin iniyamai fifi kafakakai inbobokomas on , iyobin on orot jever on anjonai agim gagamin sinous ato kamit borit badamai sinreberirai insur inamtotom inarab .
42017003	On mes omi wonkaifarem tiwag bobo aifan wofofour on ! “ Om taim tuam inbobokomas on matanai unawur , om eta usarar ato on ya baikitabir inboai on , om uninotburai .
42017004	Om taim tuam ato ra kaitamom amonai on wera nimtereban ruam nanaba aurim inbobokomas ato on wera kakaita kakaita nanaba on innanat aurim i’nau , ‘ Yau ya baikitabir abo ’ basit om on uninotburai . ”
42017005	Baiyoyobotis on Bada aurin siyau , “ Wei ai baitutum eiyamai inarat . ”
42017006	Bada iyafotes iyau , “ Omi ami baitutum an rat on ato aigab foun ba on , wengar wabin mulberry on unawur , ‘ Toum awerorom engon auman yabarainim ato eboem esur kamitai nan etanumem ! ’ Ato arimon aurim inifonabo . ”
42017007	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi ami agirotin tani motob itkukuwain o foro sheep itkakaifares . On masau emon itnat mom on , ra kaita utawur utau , om gagariwat enat am bayu yam ?
42017008	Ambin bag ! Baise om arimon utawur utau , ‘ Yau au bayu ebotitiwag , bayu am an beber eiwanim ato ebotitiwagim au bayu unbotitiwag , yau bayu anam anatom weie ; om gibui am bayu unam . ’
42017009	Agirotin ebifonabo bobo ebobo aurin on an bada men ebifain on ?
42017010	On eta kaitamom omi aurim on eb on nanaba ; omi bobo aifan aurin sawurem on asir wonabo mom ato wonau , ‘ Wei on asir agiroti maiaui wat ; wei asir ai bobo wat wabobo . ’ ”
42017011	Iesu au Jerusalem igeg ato On inai tafanam ruam Samaria a Galilee asi sanaf on basunai nan igat .
42017012	On inai mafamai nan irur ato sabu auyotoat usis gawu gawudis on sinat sinefotai . Osi nanenei nan sitawar ,
42017013	ato siyoku siyau , “ Iesu ! Bada ekaberei ! ”
42017014	Iesu osi ites ato auris iyau , “ Omi wonai priest auris ato osi sininateteim . ” Osi si’nan eta nenenai on engon siyawasis .
42017015	Osi sabu amosi orot kaitamom on toun inateteai on iyawas , ato on imatabir men fonan gagaminai God ifain .
42017016	On Iesu nanai ifeu sindan irou ato ikakaiwai . On orot on Samaria emon inat .
42017017	Iesu ikakafun iyau , “ Sabu on auyotoat nanaba siyawas ; ato sabu nimtereban baibatin on menan nan i ?
42017018	Aibo mes orot touman on ekesin mom inat God inikakaiwai mes i ? ”
42017019	Ato Iesu on orot aurin iyau , “ Om emisir enai ; am baitutum emon uyawas . ”
42017020	Pharisee yangan fani Iesu sitetemai on meyan arimon God an Baiaiwab innat . On an baiyafot on iyau , “ God an Baiaiwab on men eta taniai nan innat unitai on .
42017021	Ato men iyafan tani arimon inau , ‘ Eite , atonio ’ o ‘ Ato nan ! ’ yabin God an Baiaiwab on omi amomui yen . ”
42017022	Namon On baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Wera innat arimon ra tani wongogoi Orot Natun wonitai baise arimon men wonitai on .
42017023	Ato osi sabu arimon sinawurem , ‘ Eite , ato nan ! ’ o ‘ Eite , atonio nin ! ’ Baise omi men wongat wonnuen mes .
42017024	Orot Natun innanat men an ratafin on arimon nanamar ba inboai kasakasauai inbokiai ato tafanam engon intagawai .
42017025	Baise On ainau on arimon inikokosarai bag a ari ra on sabu arimon sinisisiweiai .
42017026	Orot Natun innanat men an werai on ato Noah imama an rai ba .
42017027	Noah imama an werai on sabu bayu si’yam sitotom a orot jever on sitatabin ato on an rai Noah inai wa amonai irur mom on sareu igat sabu engon tutufin iyasububunues .
42017028	On eta kaitamomai ato Lot an werai imamatar ba , on nanaba arimon inmatar . Sabu engon on bayu si’yam sitotom , sawar sibitotobon , masau sibobo a goa siyoyon .
42017029	On an rai Lot Sodom ibikirir mom on wairaf wamemeran er yanden auman on yabat ba , safam emon isur ato sabu engon tutufin iyasububunues .
42017030	On bobo nanaba on arimon Orot Natun an kudidirin auman inrobotet .
42017031	“ On an rai orot iyafan an goa uwayob aiyetunai nan on , men insur an goa amonai an sawar inabo ; on eta kaitamomai orot masauai nan on men inmatabir men inan au go .
42017032	Omi woninonotim , ato bobo mamaba Lot awan aurin imatar on !
42017033	Iyai iyafan efofourtobon toun an yawas ebokikin on , arimon yawas obin on inisiwanai ato iyai iyafan toun an yawas ebisisiweiai on , arimon yawas obin inboai .
42017034	Yau awurem , on fom amonai on sabu ruam arimon babar kaitamomai sinembubur : orot tani on arimon sinboai sinan ato orot tani on sinikirir .
42017035	Jever ruam on arimon rus rafi singagamatabir : jever tani on sinboai sinan , ato tani on sinikirir .
42017036	( Orot ruam arimon masau sinbobo : Orot tani on arimon sinboai sinan ato orot tani on sinikirir ) . ”
42017037	Baigibubunuotis sitetemai siyau , “ Bada , atonio bobo min menan nan i ? ” Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Orot usin rabobin menan nan yen on , arimon kiwiu kikim on nan sinnat sinruayo . ”
42018001	Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris atonio dura kawenai idudur itibebeyes , on osi ra fufur sinbayoi men sinisuweigan mes .
42018002	“ Mafam gagamin tani amonai orot baigurubabanotin imama , on orot on men God ibeberuai a sabu men ikakafes on .
42018003	Ato kena jever on eb on mafam gagaminai imama , on ra fufur i’nat baigurubabanotin aurin ibifefeyanai i’yawur , ‘ Yau agogoi unibaisiu ato au ragit au sawar ibo bisinai yen on anboai men ! ’
42018004	Wera weromin maiau orot baigurubabanotin on men igogoi on bobo itiyamai , baise au kanfoun on toun aurin ikakafun iyau , ‘ Basit yau on men God abeberuai a sabu men akakafes ,
42018005	baise atonio kena jever on nana yau ebisababaniu kwakwan , on mes atonio bobo aniyamai an gogoi on anibaisin . Ato yau atonio bobo men anbiyamai on kena jever arimon nana auriu innanat inbiyameu arimon anisuweigan kwakwan ! ’ ”
42018006	Ato Bada an dura nana ibotein iyau , “ Omi wontatam mamaba ato orot baigurubabanotin komasin an dura ibikakafun on .
42018007	God an sabu fom ra On aurin setotou on arimon fofonin obin wat on inites , On arimon sasasan wat iniyafotes .
42018008	Yau awurem , God arimon sasasan wat an sabu inibaisis ! Baise Orot Natun inmatabir men innanat au tafanam on sabu arimon ingatures On aurin on sebitutum o ambin ? ”
42018009	Mat Iesu on atonio dura kawenai sabu auris idudur , osi sabu fani sinonosin osi on obis wat ato sabu fani on komasis .
42018010	“ Ra tani sabu ruam sigai tafaror goai bayoi mes : Orot tani on Pharisee , a orot tani on agim takes bo’otin .
42018011	Pharisee orot on ekesin mom mabinai itawar ato ibayoi , ‘ God yau abikakaiwim kwakwan bag , yau on men afeyaniu , baifafaro men astoben on a men abi reg nan on , yau men ato osi sabu engon sefofour ba . Yau abikakaiwim kwakwan bag yau on men ato orot agim takes bo’otin ba .
42018012	Yau tafaror kaitamom amonai on wera ruam nanaba on bayu abikirir abifofour a au agim aboai on ra fufur auyotoat turin on abitem . ’
42018013	“ Baise agim takes bo’otin on nanenei nan itawar ato men fofonin magin au safam ittage on , ab on dogaran irab ato iyau , ‘ God , ekabereu , yau on bokomasotiu ! ’
42018014	Iesu iyau , “ Yau awurem , atonio orot agim takes bo’otin on God an bokomas innotbur ato inai au go , men ato Pharisee orot on . Yabin osi sabu iyabon tous sebogaiis on sinyeires sinsur ato osi sabu iyabon tous seyeyeires on arimon sinbogaiis sinag . ”
42018015	Sabu fani nanatus gugudis siboen sinat Iesu aurin iman tefasi ityagai itimomogines mes . Baigibubunuotis osi sites ato bobo sifofour aurin on simisir sabu sigam siyawures .
42018016	Baise Iesu fifirig gugudis iyores sinat ato iyau , “ Omi fifirig gugudis wonikirires sinnat auriu , men wonsofafaris mes , yabin God an Baiaiwab on ato sabu iyabon asi yawas fifirig gugudis ba sefofour on osi ebinoanis .
42018017	Yau awurem dura bag ! Iyai iyafan an yawas men ato fifi kafakakai ba infofour God an Baiaiwab inboboai on , on arimon men fofonin inar on . ”
42018018	Jew asi bainetewarotin on Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Baibebeotim obim , yau mamaba anafour yawas mama wantoanin anboai i ? ”
42018019	Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Om aibo mes uyoreu Yau Orot obiu ? Men iyafan tani on obin ab God ekesin mom on obin .
42018020	Om min baifafaro dura usagob : ‘ Om men unireg nan ; turam men unirabobai ; om men unbainau ; turam men unisigoai ; ayom tamam unkakafes . ’ ”
42018021	Orot iyafotai iyau , “ Yau fifi kafakakaiu bag on atonio osi baifafaro dura engon auris on aifonabo . ”
42018022	Iesu atonio dura itatam ato orot aurin iyau , “ Om bobo kaitamom wat on nana arimon uniyamai . Om am sawar engon tutufin sabu auris unitotobon ato agim unboai on sabu kokoianis unites , ato om arimon safamai nan unisawarotim ; namon om unnat unigibubunueu . ”
42018023	Baise orot atonio dura itatam on , men sunub iyababan yabin on orot on sawarotin bag .
42018024	Iesu it orot on iyababan ato iyau , “ Sabu sawarotis auris on iwani kwakwan God an Baiaiwab amonai sinar !
42018025	Foro camel on sasasan wat arimon sainuk matan an doguai inar , baise orot sawarotin aurin on iwani kwakwan men fofonin arimon God an Baiaiwab amonai inar on . ”
42018026	Sabu on dura sitatam ato sitetemai siyau , “ Iyafan on arimon yawas mama wantoanin inboai i ? ”
42018027	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Bobo aifan sabu auris on iwani kwakwan , baise God aurin bobo engon tutufin on fofonin wat . ”
42018028	Namon Peter iyau , “ Eite ! Wei on ai goa waikiriren ato Om wabigibubunuem . ”
42018029	Iesu auris iyau , “ Dura bag , ato Yau awurem , sabu iyabon God an Baiaiwab aurin on asi goa o awawas jever o taitais tutuas o a’yos tatamas o nanatus sibikirires on ,
42018030	arimon gagamin bag God inites men ato ari semama ba , a gibui sinrarabob on arimon yawas mama wantoanin sinboai . ”
42018031	Iesu baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam on iboes mabisi sinai nan ato auris iyau , “ Omi wontatam ! Ot on tanan au Jerusalem on nan ato aubairuruotis dura aifan engon Orot Natun aurin dura buk amonai sigagayam on innat inidura bag .
42018032	On arimon sabu men Jew yangan on imasi sinyagai , osi arimon On sinikoboai , On dura komasis sinawur a sinakan tuturai .
42018033	On arimon sinaswabirai ato sinasubun baise ra baitoninai on arimon inmisir inyawas men . ”
42018034	Baise baigibubunuotis atonio dura aurin on men tani sisagob ; atonio dura an yabin on auris sibuni ato Iesu dura aifan ibikakafun on osi men sisagob .
42018035	Iesu inat Jericho mafam gagamin aurin ibiufin ato orot matan fotin tani on etai nan imair agim mes ikafefeyan .
42018036	Sabu kuayo sinat sineseirai si’nan on itatamis ato on sabu itetemis iyau , “ Nin on aifan emamatar i ? ”
42018037	Osi siyawur siyau , “ Iesu Nazareth emon on inat ineseirim enan . ”
42018038	On iyoku iyau , “ Iesu ! David Natun ! Ekabereu ! ”
42018039	Sabu ato ainau si’nan on orot sigam siyawur ato osi siyawur awan itafot mes . Baise on aumiet bag iyoku iyau , “ David Natun ! Ekabereu ! ”
42018040	On mes Iesu itawar ato sabu iyawures orot matan fotin on sitboai aurin sitnat . Orot inat Iesu aurin iufin ato Iesu itetemai iyau ,
42018041	“ Om aifan egogoi aurim anafour i ? ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , yau agogoi matau aneit men . ”
42018042	Iesu orot aurin iyau , “ Matam yeit men ! Om am baitutum emon uyawas . ”
42018043	Ra kaita on matan fotin iyeit men , ato on Iesu igibubunuai God ibikakaiwai . Sabu kuayo on bobo si’tai on engon tutufin God sifain siduduranai .
42019001	Iesu inai Jericho mafam gagaminai irui , ato nana ibib i’nan .
42019002	Orot wabin Zacchaeus , on orot on agim takes bo’otis asi orot gagamin tani a on eb on sawarotin on nan imama .
42019003	On ifofourtobon ititai iyafan on Iesu , baise on orot on dibokakain on mes on men fofonin Iesu ititai on , yabin sabu kuayo on gagamin bag .
42019004	On mes on sabu kuayo nasi ainau iyayai inai wengar wabin sycamore , on nan igai Iesu on etai nan ibib i’nat on ititai mes .
42019005	Iesu ibib inat on efanai igat ato itage Zacchaeus aurin iyau , “ Zacchaeus , gariwat esur , Yau on ari om am goai nan anama . ”
42019006	Zacchaeus on sasasan wat wengar emon isur ato yasisirai nan Iesu ikakaiwai ato ibo inai an goai nan .
42019007	Sabu engon tutufin on bobo si’tai on sibosuruf sibidurusof sigagam si’yau , “ Atonio orot on inai bokomasotin an goai emama ! ”
42019008	Zacchaeus imisir itawar ato Bada aurin iyau , “ Bada untatam ! Yau au sawar turin on an kuseb sabu kokoianis anites , ato iyai iyafan ankakabainauai mes on , arimon wera bat nanaba on tefanai anigaraminai men . ”
42019009	Iesu aurin iyau , “ Yawas on ari atonio goa amonai irui , orot mat on Abraham wawan agirin .
42019010	Yabin Orot Natun on inat sabu sisiwan semama on innuenis iniyawasis mes . ”
42019011	Sabu atonio dura si’tatam ato Iesu on dura kawenai ibotein men sabu auris idudur . Iesu ibib inai Jerusalem aurin ibiufin ato sabu fani sinos on God an Baiaiwab on kafakakai mom inrobotet .
42019012	On mes On iyau , “ Ra tani orot gagamin aiwab an dam warar emon on inai tafanam tani nanenei nan on sitiyamai itiaiwab ato on gibunai on itmatabir men itnat an au go .
42019013	Weie on an goa itikirir itgat , on an agirotis engon auyotoat iyores sirui ato agim gold on kakaita kakaita iraramis ato iyawures iyau , ‘ Atonio agimai on nan bobo wonabo agim turin ba woniyamai , yau anan ato anmatabir men annat . ’
42019014	Baise on orot an mafam sabu on men sigogoiai , on mes sabu dura bobibotis on siyafares orot gibunai sinai ato orot bainetewarotin siyawur , ‘ Wei men wagogoi atonio orot on wei ai aiwab orot mes inmatar . ’
42019015	“ Baise orot on kututu sitai aiwab imatar ato imatabir men inat au go . On ra kaita an agirotis iyawures sinat nanai sitawar , ato itsagob agim ibites on biyam nanaba siyamai .
42019016	Agirotin ainau on inat iyau , ‘ Bada , agim gold kaitamom wat uteu , ato on amonai abobo on agim gold engon auyotoat nanaba abo . ’
42019017	On iyau , ‘ Om bobo obin bag ufour , om on agirotim obim ! Bobo gugudis on ukaifaren tiwag , on mes anboem mafam gagamis engon auyotoat nanaba on om unkaifaren . ’
42019018	Agirotin bairuin ba irui ato iyau , ‘ Bada , om agim gold kaitamom wat uteu , ato on amonai aboen on agim gold engon nim nanaba abo . ’
42019019	Atonio agirotin aurin iyau , ‘ Om arimon mafam gagamis engon nim on unkaifaren . ’
42019020	Agirotin tani on inat ato iyau , ‘ Bada , om am agim gold ato , yau beberai aikiman aibuni i’yen .
42019021	Yau om aberuem yabin om on orot wawanim on mes . Agim men om noam baise om ubo a masau men om uba baise wasi on ukuwain . ’
42019022	On orot aurin iyau , ‘ Om agirotim komasim ! Om toum am dura ubikakafun on nan antawar animakiem ! Om usagob on yau orot wawaniu , om uyau agim men yau noau baise abo a masau men aba baise bayu on akuwain .
42019023	On nanaba dura bag on ato , om au agim on utboai agim an goai bag utiwan . Namon au agim on kafakakai itabo turin itiyamai ato atnat men on au agim atboai . ’
42019024	“ Namon on sabu nan sitatawar auris iyau , ‘ Agim gold on imanai wabaruai ato agirotin agim auyotoat ibiyamai on wonitai . ’
42019025	Baise osi on aurin siyau , ‘ Bada , on agim auyotoat iboen nono ! ’
42019026	On iyafotes iyau , ‘ Yau awurem , iyai iyafan aurin sawar sigaraba si’nen on arimon sinitai , baise iyai iyafan aurin sawar ambin , basit kafakakai wat yen min on arimon imanai sinabaruai .
42019027	Ato yau au ragit osi men sigogoi yau osi asi aiwab orot mes atmatar on woboes wonat nin ato yau nawui nan wonasububunues ! ’ ”
42019028	Iesu ato dura ikakafun ato sabu nasi On ainau ekesin inai au Jerusalem .
42019029	On inat mafam bethage a bethany auris iufin , Olive Oyau bisinai nan , ato On an baigibubunuotis ruam ainau iyafares sinai ,
42019030	On dura iyaubaiyates iyau , “ Omi wonan nan mafam tani namui yen ; on nan wonar mom , on foro donkey kafakakai nan wengarai siyous etatawar on wongaturai ato on foro min men tefanai sigai simair sibonanaboai on , on uram wonrufan ato nin wonboai wonnat .
42019031	Ato iyai iyafan nan initetemim inau , omi aibo mes worurufan ato wonawur , wei ai Bada egogoi . ”
42019032	Osi sinai ato Iesu dura aifan i’yawures on engon sigaturen .
42019033	Osi foro donkey kafakakai an uram sirurufan ato foro matuanis on osi auris siyau , “ Omi aibo mes foro an uram worurufan i ? ”
42019034	Osi siyafotes siyau , “ Wei ai Bada egogoi , ”
42019035	ato osi foro donkey kafakakai sibo sinai Iesu aurin . Namon osi asi beber on foro donkey tefanai sirebegagaien ato Iesu sibaisin igai foro tefanai imair .
42019036	On foro tefanai imair i’nat on sabu asi beber etai nan siyabaren .
42019037	On inat Jerusalem aurin ibiufin ato on efanai on eta isur inai Olive Oyauai igat , On an baigibubunuotis kuayo gagamin on sibosuruf fonas gagaminai God sibikakaiwai a sibifain , On mamaba bobo buburis ifofour matasi si’tai aurin on . Osi si’yau ,
42019038	“ God aiwab imomoginai Bada Wabinai enat ! Tuf on safamai yen a God Aiyetunenei Wabin duran tanbogagaiai ! ”
42019039	Namon Pharisee fani nan sabu kuayo amosi on Iesu aurin sikakafun siyau , “ Baibebeotim , om am baigibubunuotis dura wawaninai yawures awas sinafot ! ”
42019040	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau awurem osi awas sinafot on , agim arimon tous wat sinbosuruf siniyoku . ”
42019041	On inat mafam gagamin aurin ibiufin ato On iyeit mafam gagamin it’tai on ibosuruf itou ,
42019042	On Jerusalem aurin ikakafun iyau , “ Om iyobin ari bag on tuf an eta utsagob ! Baise ari on men usagob on , yabin om on sibuniem !
42019043	An wera innat arimon om am ragit on sinikufifinem am mafam gagamin an eta erur e’gat on nan sinyafoten , ato arimon autab wat reban reban engon aurim sinigagam .
42019044	Osi arimon am sabu mat engon sinikomasim ; men arimon agim tani an efanai sinikirir inen mes , yabin omi men wogogoi wera wotsagob aifanai God inat itiyawasim mes ! ”
42019045	Namon Iesu inai tafaror goai irui ato ibosuruf sabu baitotobonotis ifaitanis sigat ,
42019046	On iyawures iyau , “ God an dura buk amonai sigayam , God iyau , ‘ Yau au tafaror goa on sinyorai bayoi an goa . ’ Baise omi wobo woikitabirai bainauotis asi ob efan mes imatar ! ”
42019047	Iesu ra fufur tafaror goai nan sabu ibibebeyes . Priest aiwabis , Baifafaro an baibebeotis , a sabu asi bainetewarotis on sigogoi sitasubun ,
42019048	baise osi men fofonin eta sitgaturai on bobo sitafour , yabin sabu engon tutufin on nana On an dura sitatam , men sigogoi dura tani kaitamom wat sitisarar mes .
42020001	Ra tani Iesu tafaror goai nan sabu ibibebeyes a Wasagobin ibibino , ato priest aiwabis , Baifafaro an baibebeotis , a sabu kawian osi sinat
42020002	ato On aurin siyau , “ Om ekasonei , abi baibad ubo atonio osi bobo efofour i ? Atonio baibad on iyafan item osi bobo efofour ? ”
42020003	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau ba anitetemim , omi wonkasoneu ,
42020004	John an baibad on men emon ne ibo sabu ibibapataitois , on God emon ibo o sabu emon ibo ? ”
42020005	Osi sibosuruf tous wat amosi sigagamois bonen , “ Ot dura mamaba tanau i ? Ot ari tanau , ‘ God emon ibo ’ ato On inau , ‘ Ato omi aibo mes men John woitutumai i ? ’
42020006	Baise ot ari tanau , ‘ Sabu emon ibo , ’ ato sabu kuayo gagamin on ari agimai sinborarabit yabin osi engon sebitutum John on aubairuruotin . ”
42020007	On mes osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei men wasagob iyafan on John baibad itai sabu ibibapataitois . ”
42020008	Ato Iesu auris iyau , “ Yau mat men ankasonem iyafan baibad iteu atonio osi bobo afofour . ”
42020009	Namon Iesu atonio dura kawenai on sabu auris idudur : “ Orot an masauai wine itanumen ato on sabu iboes wine masau sitbobo agim sitbiyamai ato on goa ikirir inai tafanam nanenei bag .
42020010	Namon wera inat wine uwan bairut mes ato on an agirotin tani iyafarai inai sabu wine bobo’otis auris nan on an agim turin itboai mes . Baise sabu wine bobo’otis on simisir agirotin siborarab ato eriman siyafarai men imatabir .
