42020011	On mes on agirotin tani ba iyafarai inai ; baise sabu wine bobo’otis on simisir agirotin tani ba sibo siborarab , simamaiai ato eriman siyafarai men imatabir .
42020012	Namon on agirotin baitonin ba iyafarai inai ; sabu wine bobo’otis on simisir siborarab kiyam sitai ato sibo au koun sirebetet igat .
42020013	Namon wine matuanin on iyau , ‘ Yau mamaba anafour i ? Yau tou natu au nuabo bag on aniyafarai ; asagob osi arimon on sinkakafai ! ’
42020014	Baise sabu wine bobo’otis on fifi sit ato osi tous wat siyau bonen , ‘ Atonio fifi on matuanin toun natun . Tanasubun ato atonio wine masau on ot tanboai ininoanit ! ’
42020015	On mes osi fifi sibo wine masau emon sirebetet igat au koun ato siyasubun . Iesu itetemis iyau , “ Wine masau matuanin on arimon mamaba inafour ato osi wine bobo’otis auris ?
42020016	On arimon innat ato osi sabu inasububunues ato wine masau on inboai wine bobo’otis fani inites . ” Sabu atonio dudur sitatam on siyau , “ Ambin , bobo men nanaba inmatar mes . ”
42020017	Iesu on osi magis matas iten ato itetemis iyau , “ Atonio God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on an yabin min mamaba i ? ‘ Arir ato goa baigoyonotis matan ainau sit on men obin on mes sisisiweiai ato gibui sisagob on arir on iyobin bag mat gagamin arir engon tefasi . ’
42020018	Iyai iyafan on arir tefanai infefeu on arimon usin intamomos insawar ato on arir iyai iyafan tefanai infefeu inrarabin on arimon aunan aunan inasubun fofou inmatar . ”
42020019	Baifafaro an baibebeotis a priest aiwabis sigogoi bag Iesu on ari wat sitfatumai yabin osi sisagob atonio dura kawen ibidudur on osi auris iragites ; baise osi on sabu auris siber .
42020020	On mes osi sibosuruf eta sinunuen . Osi sabu fani bubuniai nan siyafares sinai ato sitisigo osi on sabu obis ato Iesu sititetemai On dura mamaba itbikakafun on sitkamosai , ato Rome asi gawan imanai sityagai mes .
42020021	Atonio sabu bubuniai sibiyafares on sinat Iesu aurin siyau , “ Baibebeotim , wei wasagob Om dura aifan ebikakafun a sabu ebibebeyes on dura bag wat . Wei wasagob Om sabu asi baibad mamaba auris on men etatamis baise Om dura maiauinai God an gogoi wat on sabu auris ebibebe .
42020022	Om ekasonei , ot ati baifafaro min iyau fofonin arimon agim takes on Caesar aurin tanibaiyan o ambin ? ”
42020023	Baise Iesu on osi asi baisigogo on it isagob ato auris iyau ,
42020024	“ Omi ami agim woiyoboeu anitai . Nin on iyafan magin a wabin on atonio yen ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Caesar . ”
42020025	On mes Iesu iyau , “ Sawar aifan Caesar noan on Caesar wonitai a sawar aifan God noan on God wonitai . ”
42020026	Osi nan sabu nasi on men fofonin sitkamosai on , on mes osi awas sifot ato Iesu an baiyafot aurin on men sunub siduduran on .
42020027	Namon Sadducee fani sinat Iesu aurin . Osi sabu sau on sabu rabob emon on men arimon sinmisiririn men . Osi Iesu sitetemai siyau ,
42020028	“ Baibebeotim , Moses atonio baifafaro dura on ot aurit igayam : ‘ Orot inarab awan inikirir nanatun ambin on orot tain on kena jever iniawan ato on fifirig inbibitu on arimon orot rabobin nanatun mes . ’
42020029	Ra tani ainauan gigiawan engon nimtereban ruam nanaba simama : Ainau orot itabin ato nanatun ambin irabob .
42020030	Namon giya orot bairuin ba on kena jever iawan ,
42020031	namon giya orot baitonin ba on kena jever iawan . Atonio bobo kaitamomai on ainauan gigiawan nimtereban bairuin engon auris on bobo imatar — osi nanatus ambin sirabob .
42020032	Au kanfoun on , jever irabob .
42020033	Weie , osi ainauan gigiawan nimtereban bairuin engon ato jever sibiawan on arimon kanfounai rabob emon sinmisiririn men on , arimon iyafan on awan i ? ”
42020034	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Orot jever tafanamai semama on setatabin ,
42020035	baise orot jever ato obis wat God rabob emon ebobaimisires men ato ra gibui sinmama men on arimon men sintabin .
42020036	Osi on arimon anea ba sinama ato men sinarab . Osi arimon God nanatun mes sinmatar yabin osi on God rabob emon ibobaimisires on mes .
42020037	Moses ato rerebai iyoboet , rabobis on arimon God inbobaimisires men . God an dura buk amonai sigayam ato wairaf regai iyoyour aurin on nan Bada ikakafun iyau , ‘ On Abraham an God , Isaac an God , a Jacob an God . ’
42020038	On an yabin min On on sabu yawasis asi God , On men sabu rabobis auris . yabin God aurin on sabu engon tutufin on yawasis wat . ”
42020039	Baifafaro an baibebeotis fani sikakafun siyau , “ Baibebeotim , Om am baiyafot obin ! ”
42020040	Osi men iyafan tani fofonin arimon ititetemai men .
42020041	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Mamaba mes osi sebikakafun sau Keriso on David an warar emon i ?
42020042	David toun on buk Psalm amonai iyau , ‘ Bada on yau au Bada , On aurin iyau : Om nin au asumaiauai emair ,
42020043	ato Yau am ragit anboes sinsur om am baibad babanai sinama . ’
42020044	David On aurin iyor iyau , ‘ Bada ; ’ Ato mamaba mes Keriso on David an dam warar emon i ? ”
42020045	Sabu engon Iesu sitatamai ato On an baigibubunuotis auris iyau ,
42020046	“ Omi matam woneit ato osi Baifafaro an baibebeotis auris , osi asi gogoi on beber weromis soten aumas ato baitotobon an efanai nan sebibib a mat osi asi nuabo on sabu nan sebitotobon on kakafai wat nan sinbikakaiwis ; osi on bayoi goa amonai asi sifumama on kakafaiis wat on serurubinen a asi efan obis wat on forag asi efanai nan serurubinen ;
42020047	Osi kekena sebisigogoes ato asi goai sawar sen on engon osi seyayakeis ato tous wat sebogaiis asi bayoi weromin sebabayoi ! Osi asi baimaki on arimon komasin bag sinboai ! ”
42021001	Iesu on sabu sawarotis inateteis tiwag asi siwar on tafaror goa an didiwag amonai siyeyeinin ,
42021002	a mat On it kena jever kokoianin bag on inat an agim gugudis ruam mom iyein .
42021003	On iyau , “ Yau awurem atonio kena jever kokoianin siwar iyeyeinin on irat kwakwan men ato osi sabu engon siyeyeinin ba .
42021004	sabu fani ato asi siwar siyeyeinin on asi agim irat kwakwan on ato kafakakai wat siyein ; baise on jever on kokoianin , aifan aurin i’yen on engon tutufin ato iyein isawar men agim yen arimon an bayu intobon on . ”
42021005	Baigibubunuotis fani on tafaror goa aurin sibikakafun , on tafaror goa an itin obin agim obis on nan siyon a siwar God aurin sikuteten . Iesu iyau ,
42021006	“ Ato osi engon woiten - on an wera innat on men arimon agim kaitamom tani nin an efanai sinikirir inen mes ; agim engon tutufin arimon sinboen sinribiriren sinsur . ”
42021007	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Baibebeotim , atonio bobo on arimon meyan inmatar i ? Bobo aifan inmatar onai wei iniyoboei wansagob on wera inat atonio osi bobo sinmatar ? ”
42021008	Iesu iyau , “ Omi matam woneit , sabu fani asi dura on men wontatam mes . Sabu sigaraba arimon Yau Wabiui sinnat sinikakafun sinau , ‘ Yau orot min atonio ! ’ ato ‘ Wera inat nono ! ’ Baise omi men osi wonigibubunues mes .
42021009	Omi men wonaber ato baigagam a baikokosar inmamatar on ; osi bobo on arimon ainau sinmatar baise osi on men dura bag tafanam au kanfoun iufin nono on . ”
42021010	On an dura nana ibotein iyau , “ Tafanam arimon tous wat sinigagam bonen ; baiaiwab arimon tous wat sinigagam bonen .
42021011	Uruyoi arimon gagamis bag sinmatar , gomar an ra inmatar a sawau komasis arimon tafanam au engon inboai ; a sawar beruber komasis a bobo baiduduranis gagamis arimon safam aiyetun emon sinnat .
42021012	Baise weie osi bobo engon tutufin sinmatar , omi arimon sinfatumem ato baikokosar sinitem ; omi arimon sinboem bayoi goa amosi nan sinigurubabanim a sinboem fafatum goai sinreberuem . Yau fasiui on omi arimon sinboem sabu aiwabis a bainetewarotis nasi wontawar .
42021013	Atonio on omi ami wera bag on nan Yau au Wasagobin on sabu auris wonkurereb .
42021014	Omi ainau ami not on woniyamai wonsagobim ato sinboem babadis nasi wontatawar on , men woniyababan dura mamaba wonbikakafun aurin on ,
42021015	yabin Yau on arimon sagob a dura gigiboan aniyoboem on nan wonikakafun , ato omi ami ragit on men iyafan tani arimon ami dura inrab on , osi ami dura sintatam on dura bag wat wobikakafun .
42021016	Omi arimon toum ayom tamam , taitaim tutuam , ami dam warar a tuturam on omi sinboem babadis imasi sinyagai ato omi fani on arimon sinasubunuem .
42021017	Yau fasiui on sabu engon tutufin sinisisiweiim .
42021018	Baise omi on arimon engon obim yawasim wat , unimui tefam sen engon mat men tani arimon intarir insiwan on .
42021019	Omi atonio osi bobo emon nana wonfaskikin on arimon toum woniyawasim . ”
42021020	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi wonitai wou yangan Jerusalem sebikufifinai on , wonsagob on mafam gagamin on kafakakai mom sinikomasai .
42021021	Namon osi sabu iyabon Judea tafanamai semama on au oyau sinayai sinan ; osi sabu iyabon mafam gagaminai semama on mafam sinikirir singat , osi sabu iyabon Jerusalem bisinai semama on men mafam gagamin amonai sinar mes .
42021022	Yabin ari ra on ‘ Baimaki Ra , ’ ato God an dura engon tutufin buk amonai sigagayamen on innat inidura bag .
42021023	On an rai on arimon komasin bag ato osi jever iyabon yas sisag aumas a jever iyabon nanatus sebisus auman on ! Yawas wawanis bag on arimon atonio tafanamai sinmatar ato God on arimon atonio osi sabu auris iniyatatab .
42021024	Sabu fani arimon seriai sinasububunues a sabu fani on arimon sinfatumes ato sinboes tafanam au engon sinabib sinan ; a eteni sabu on arimon osi Jerusalem sinboai sinfasfifinim sinikomasai inan asi wera fofonin on nan insawar . ”
42021025	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Bobo magis magis arimon wera , roke , siribod auris sinmatar . Tafanamai sabu sigaraba arimon sinaber kwakwan ato kamit yawarad wan inrukikiai an rarabin gagamin a tuwabut gagamin auman innanat on .
42021026	Sabu arimon sinbeber on matas sinbubu ato bobo aifan enat tafanam au engon inmamatar aurin sinonosin on , sawar faiwaris engon tutufin safamai sen on arimon asi efan sinisararen .
42021027	Namon sabu arimon Orot Natun sinitai kasakasauai inrobotet an faiwar gagaminai an kudidirin auman innat on .
42021028	Atonio osi bobo sinbosuruf sinmamatar on omi , wonmisir usom wontagai yabin God on kafakakai mom iniyawasim . ”
42021029	Namon Iesu on atonio dura kawenai auris idudur : “ Omi wengar bubudau a wengar engon on woniten .
42021030	Omi wonitai ato wengar rorous sinkutet singagat on wonsagob on kwanda an wera on inat iufin nono .
42021031	On eta kaitamomai , omi atonio osi bobo woniten sinmamatar on wonsagob God an Baiaiwab on kafakakai mom inat .
42021032	“ Yau awurem dura bag , atonio osi bobo engon tutufin sinmatar weie sabu ari semama on sinarab .
42021033	Safam a tafanam on arimon intumai baise Yau au dura on arimon men meyan intumai . ”
42021034	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi matam woneit ! Omi men ami not engon on forag aurin a sareu wawanis wonatom wonbikokok aurin a atonio tafanam an yawas aurin wonyein kwakwan mes , o on Ra on arimon innat inbisafurem on omi men wobotitiwagim on .
42021035	Yabin on ra on arimon baisafur egiraf ba innat sabu engon tutufin nin tafanamai auris .
42021036	Omi ra fufur wonbotitiwagim a wonbabayoi ami faiwar wonboboai ato bobo aifan engon tutufin sinmamatar on , omi obinai wat wonan Orot Natun nanai wontawar . ”
42021037	Osi ra nan on Iesu tafaror goai sabu ibibebeyes ato ibirabirabi on i’gat i’nan Olive Oyauai nan i’yenbubur .
42021038	Ra ra fomenei fufur on sabu engon si’nan tafaror goai an dura sittatam mes .
42022001	Forag wabin Rafi Sarar Men Fio Yist Auman on seyoyorai Baisobon , on an wera inat iufin .
42022002	Priest aiwabis a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on sabu auris siber on mes osi sifofourtobon eta sinunuen Iesu bubuniai nan sitasubun mes .
42022003	Namon Afaguban on baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis bairuin tani wabin Judas on seyoyorai Iscariot , on nunuanai irui .
42022004	On mes Judas on inai priest aiwabis a tafaror goa kaifarotis asi babadis auris , osi mat sitikakafun mamaba Iesu osi auris itkaseirai mes .
42022005	Osi on siyasisir ato siyaumatanai agim sitibaiyanai mes .
42022006	Judas on bobo aurin ibasitai ato ibosuruf eta inunuen menan wera obin itgaturai nan bubuniai Iesu osi auris itkaseirai mes .
42022007	Ra inat Forag wabin Rafi Sarar Men Fio Yist Auman aurin ato on ra nan min foro sheep bobous on sitasububunuen Baisobon an bayu sitam mes .
42022008	Iesu on Peter a John rus atonio duraiai iyaubaiyates ato iyafares iyau , “ Omi wonan Baisobon an Bayu on ot aurit wonbotitiwag tanam . ”
42022009	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Om menan nan egogoi bayu wanbotitiwag mes i ? ”
42022010	On iyafotes iyau , “ Omi wonan mafam gagaminai wonar mom ato orot sareu kibub iyabar e’nat on arimon mat woninofoten . Omi on orot wonigibubunuai wonan ato on goa amonai inrurur
42022011	ato omi goa matuanin on wonawur wonau : ‘ Baibebeotin on om aurim iyau , goa amonai efan menan nan on au baigibubunuotis mat Baisobon an bayu wanam i ? ’
42022012	On arimon goa ann weromin aiyetun nan efan gagamin sirereb sibotitiwag yen on iniyoboem ato omi bayu engon nan aurit wonbotitiwag . ”
42022013	Osi sinai ato Iesu dura aifan i’yawures on engon sigaturen ato nan Baisobon an bayu sibotitiwag .
42022014	Wera inat ato Iesu an baiyoyobotis mat on kemai simair .
42022015	On osi auris iyau , “ Yau agogoi kwakwan atonio Baisobon an bayu on mat tanam weie yau anikokosariu !
42022016	Yau awurem , Yau men arimon Baisobon an bayu tani ba anan men , on an ra God an Baiaiwab amonai on innat inidura bag . ”
42022017	Namon Iesu viga ibo God aurin ikakaiu ato iyau , “ Atonio viga wobo ato omi toum sanamui wonfasararam .
42022018	Awurem Yau men arimon atonio sareu wine antoman men , on an ra God an Baiaiwab innat weie Yau antoman men . ”
42022019	Namon On rafi sarar ibo God aurin ikakaiu ato iyabaseseb ites iyau , “ Nin on Yau usiu on omi aurim abitem , omi atonio bobo nanaba wonafour Yau wonnosiu . ”
42022020	On eta kaitamomai bayu siyam isawar weie On viga ibo ites iyau , “ Atonio viga on God an dura bobaibasit boboun on Yau au tarai nan inbosuruf , on omi engon tutufin aurim idebur .
42022021	“ Baise woit ! Orot iyafan Yau ekakaseiriu on mat nin kemai tamama !
42022022	Yabin God ibotitiwag nono Orot Natun arimon inarab baise komasin bag on orot aurin iyafan Yau ekakaseiriu on ! ”
42022023	Namon osi sibosuruf tous amosi sibitetem bonen orot iyafan osi sanasi on atonio bobo inafour .
42022024	Baigibubunuotis sanasi wat on gamo imatar osi sinonosin iyafan on gagamin bag osi engon amosi .
42022025	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Sabu men Jew yangan asi aiwabis on asi faiwar yen asi sabu auris , a sabu bainetewarotis on seyoyores , ‘ Sabu tuturas . ’
42022026	Baise omi aurim on eta men on nanaba on , ab omi sanamui iyafan gagamin on inikafakakai men ato bainetewarotin on iniyamai tuturan iniagires .
42022027	Orot iyafan on gagamin ; orot emama mom bayu yam on o orot ato ebiagirai on i ? Dura bag orot ato kemai imair emama on . Baise Yau omi sanamui on omi abiagirem .
42022028	“ Yau auriu yawas wawanis simamatar on omi engon bisiwui woma ;
42022029	Yau Tamau on baibad iteu aninetewar mes , on mes Yau au dura bobaibasit kaitamom on arimon omi aurim aniyamai .
42022030	Omi arimon au Baiaiwab amonai au kemai wonamair bayu wonam wonatom , a omi arimon mamageai wonamair Israel an dam engon auyotoat sasagis ruam on woninetewaris . ”
42022031	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Simon , Simon ! Om untatam ! Afaguban on God ifefeyanai ibasit ato omi engon tutufin inrutobonim mes , omi on arimon ato masau bo’otin ba on sawareg ebobo ekukuseb sawareg wat on mabisi eyaya ato fefemis on mabisi eyaya .
42022032	Baise Simon , Yau aurim ababayoi am baitutum on men inafeu mes . Ato om Yau auriu unrutabir unnat men , ato taitaim unkufaiwaris asi baitutumai on sinfaskikin . ”
42022033	Peter iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , yau on abotitiwagiu isawar rut tanan fafatum goai tanar a yau arimon rut tanarab ! ”
42022034	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Peter , Yau awurem om arimon ari wera ton nanaba unisosoufiu unau , yau on Orot on men asagobai , weie kokorerek inatou . ”
42022035	Namon Iesu an baigibubunuotis itetemis iyau , “ On an werai Yau aiyafarem wo’gat on men agim an kukufet , kekes a amm kikiman wonboen mat wonan mes , ato omi sawar aifan wat auris on wogogoien i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Ambin . ”
42022036	Iesu iyau , “ Baise ari on , iyai iyafan aurin agim an kukufet o kwakwar aurin i’nen on inboai mat inan ; iyai iyafan aurin seri ambin on usin an baitakwakwaren on inboai sabu fani auris intotobon ato agim inboai an seri intobon .
42022037	Yau awurem dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ On bainauotis sibimakies on mat simakiai , Yau auriu on arimon innat inidura bag yabin dura aifan Yau auriu sigagayam on inat ebidura bag . ”
42022038	Baigibubunuotis siyau , “ Bada ! Eite ! Seri ruam atonio ! ” On iyafotes iyau , “ Basit on fofonin ! ”
42022039	Iesu mafam gagamin ikirir inai , On ra fufur nanaba ifofour i’nan i’nat , ato On an baigibubunuotis mat sinai Olive Oyauai nan .
42022040	On inat on efanai igat ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi wonbayoi on men arimon rutobon wonboai mes . ”
42022041	Namon On ikirires kafakakai inai mabinai ato orot agim erereben enan an fofon ba ato nan sindan irou ibayoi .
42022042	On iyau , “ Tamau , atonio bobo on Om am gogoiai on , men uniyameu atonio viga an baikokosar anboai mes . Baise men Yau au gogoiai , ab Om am gogoiai on inmatar . ”
42022043	Anea safam emon irobotet isur aurin ato ikufaiwarai .
42022044	Iesu an usi baban on irat kwakwan ato wawaninai bag ibayoi , On magin usin abar i’gat on tara ba sifefeu igagaror isusur motobai .
42022045	On ibayoi isawar ato imisir men inai an baigibubunuotis igatures , osi asi yababan emon iyames sisuweigan siyenbubur .
42022046	On osi auris iyau , “ Omi aibo mes woienbubur ? Omi womisir wonbayoi on men arimon rutobon wonboai on . ”
42022047	Iesu on dura nana ibikakafun ato Judas baigibubunuotin auyotoat sasagis ruam on tani on sabu kuayo ibonanawaiis sinat , on inat Iesu aurin ato rereban iyan .
42022048	Baise Iesu iyau , “ Judas om ato rerebau eyayanin on ebiyamai Orot Natun on ubo On an ragit imasi eyayagai ? ”
42022049	Baigibubunuotis osi nan Iesu mat sitatawar on sit atonio bobo on inmatar , on mes sitetemai siyau , “ Bada , wei seri wanboai mat wanigagam i ? ”
42022050	Ato osi sanasi orot tani on an seri ibo ato Priest Ainauin an agirotin tainan asumaiauai on iyasutin itutu .
42022051	Baise Iesu iyau , “ Atonio bobo on eikirir ! ” On orot tainan ibotobon ato iyawasai .
42022052	Sabu iyabon sinat Iesu sitfatumai mes on priest aiwabis a tafaror goa kaifarotis asi babadis a sabu kawian on sinat Iesu sitfatumai mes , On imisir iyawures iyau , “ Omi ami seri a ami sambeyan woboen wonat on sitau Yau on bainauotiu bait ?
42022053	Yau on ra fufur omi mat nan tafaror goai ato omi men wogogoi nan wotfatumeu . Baise ari on omi ami wera inat ami gogoi aifan on wonafour , ato Afaguban ebinetewarim nan . ”
42022054	Osi Iesu sifatumai ato sibo sinai Priest Ainauin an goai nan ; ato Peter on nanenei nan osi ibigibubunues .
42022055	Wou yangan on nan furi amonai efan basunai bag nan wairaf siyasir ato Peter inai nan sabu mat simair wairaf iraranis .
42022056	Jeverei agirotin tani on Peter it nan wairaf iraranai , on totor aurin iyeit it ato iyau , “ Atonio orot mat on Iesu an baigibubunuotin tani ! ”
42022057	Baise Peter isosouf iyau , “ Jever , yau on orot on men meyan asagobai on ! ”
42022058	Wera men weromin ato orot tani Peter it isagobai ato iyau , “ Om mat On an baigibubunuotin tani ! ” Baise Peter iyafotai iyau , “ Orot , yau on ambin ! ”
42022059	Ato wera kaitamom nanaba isawar gibunai orot tani on dura nana ibikakafun i’yau , “ Ot men taniyoi on , atonio orot on Iesu an baigibubunuotin tani , yabin on orot mat on Galilee emon ! ”
42022060	Baise Peter iyafotai iyau , “ Orot , yau men asagob om aifan aurin on ebikakafun ! ” Peter on dura nana ibikakafun ato ra kaita kokorerek itou .
42022061	Bada irutabir totor wat iyeit Peter it , ato Peter inonot Bada an dura mamaba i’yau on , “ Om arimon fom wera baitonin nanaba unisosoufiu unau , yau on orot on men asagobai weie kokorerek inatou . ”
42022062	Peter igat au koun ato men sunub itou on .
42022063	Sabu iyabon Iesu sikakaifarai on sikoboai a siborarab .
42022064	Osi beber sibo Iesu matan siyous , ato sitetemai siyau , “ Om yawurei tait ! Iyafan irabim i ? ”
42022065	Ato osi dura komasis sigaraba maiau on aurin sikakafun .
42022066	Ra itom , Jew yangan asi sabu kawian , priest ainauis a baifafaro an baibebeotis on nan engon tutufin siruayo ato Iesu on sibo sigat osi Jew babadis Rurubinis on nasi itawar .
42022067	Osi siyau , “ Om yawurei tait , Om min Keriso i ? ” On iyafotes iyau , “ Yau ari dura ankakasonem on omi arimon men wonitutumeu on ;
42022068	ato Yau omi anbitetemim on omi arimon men woniyafoteu on .
42022069	Baise ari ra on Orot Natun arimon God Faiwarin maiau an asumaiauai inamair . ”
42022070	Osi engon tutufin siyau , “ Om min God Natun i ? ” On iyafotes iyau , “ Dura aifan ato wau on Yau nanaba . ”
42022071	Ato osi siyau , “ Ot men tagogoi sabu dura fani ba sinkasonet men ! On dura aifan ibikakafun on Toun awan fonan ato tatam nono . ”
42023001	Jew babadis kuayo engon tutufin simisir ato Iesu sibo sinat Pilate nanai itawar ,
42023002	ato osi nan sibosuruf sibiubarai si’yau , “ Orot atonio on dura fetag fetag ibikakafun wei ai sabu asi not engon ibikokomasen on ato wabo , On sabu iyawures men agim takes sinyein Caesar aurin a On Toun eyoyorai Keriso a Aiwab . ”
42023003	Pilate On itetemai iyau , “ Om min Jew yangan asi Aiwab i ? ” Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om dura ato u’yau on nanaba . ”
42023004	Namon Pilate on priest aiwabis a sabu kuayo auris iyau , “ Atonio orot an komasin on men agaturai on animakiai . ”
42023005	Baise osi on nana dura wawaninai sibikakafun si’yau , “ On an baibebe ibiyamai on sabu Judea tafanam amonai on engon tutufin yas ibogagaien . Atonio bobo on Galilee nan ibosuruf ato ari atonio nin ba . ”
42023006	Pilate atonio dura itatam ato On itetemis iyau , “ Atonio Orot min Galilee emon i ? ”
42023007	Pilate gibui isagob Iesu on Galilee emon , ato Herod min on tafanam ibinetewarai , on mes on iyafarai inai Herod aurin , on an werai Herod min mat nan Jerusalem imama .
42023008	Herod on iyasisir kwakwan ato Iesu i’tai on yabin on duran itatam ato men ari igogoi magin ititai mes . Herod on igogoi Iesu bobo buburis fani itafour on ititai mes .
42023009	On mes Herod on Iesu aurin ra sigaraba maiau itetemai baise Iesu on men dura tani iyafotai on .
42023010	Priest aiwabis a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on sitawar dura riribis komasis on Iesu aurin sikakafun siubarai .
42023011	Herod an wou yangan mat on Iesu sikoboai ato sigigimai ; namon osi beber obin sibo Iesu siyotai ato siyafarai men imatabir inai Pilate aurin .
42023012	On wera kaitamomai on Herod a Pilate rus on ra kaita sinat situran ; ainau osi rus on sibiragit bonen .
42023013	Pilate on priest aiwabis , bainetewarotis , a sabu osi iyores siruayo
42023014	ato iyawures iyau , “ Omi atonio Orot auriu wobo wonat ato omi wau On bobo fetag efofour sabu asi not ebikokomasen . Ari omi namui abitetemai ato omi ubar wobitai aurin on , ato On an komasin on men agaturai on .
42023015	Herod mat On an komasin men igaturai , on aurin ato ot aurit iyafarai men imatabir . Atonio Orot on men abi bobo komasin ifour on tani rabobai .
42023016	On mes wou yangan on anawures sinrab sinaswabirai mom ato an yatetai ingat . ( Ra fufur Baisobon an Forag an werai Pilate on orot tani fafatum goai imama on i’yatetai i’gat weines . )
42023018	Sabu kuayo gagamin on siyoku siyau , “ Yasubun ! Barabbas on eyatetai egat weinei ! ”
42023019	( Barabbas on sibo fafatum goai siwan imama yabin sabu mafam gagamin amonai baiyonen sibimatarai on amosi irui mat on bobo amonai on orot siyasubun . )
42023020	Pilate on igogoi Iesu ityatetai itgat , on mes on sabu kuayo auris iyau men .
42023021	Baise osi siyoku men siyau , “ Nabai ekubarai ! Nabai ekubarai ! ”
42023022	Pilate wera baitonin ba auris iyau men , “ Baise atonio Orot on abi bobo komasin ifour i ? ” On an komasin on men tani agaturai on , ato On abi bobo komasin ifour on fasinai inarab ! Yau on wou yangan anawures sinaswabirai mom ato sinyatetai ingat . ”
42023023	Baise osi nana fonas aumiet bag siyoku si’yau on Iesu nabai itkubarai mes , ato au kanfoun on , asi gogoi aifan aurin si’yau on siyamai imatar .
42023024	On mes osi asi gogoi aifan Pilate aurin sibifefeyanai on ibasitai .
42023025	Osi asi gogoi orot aurin si’yau on iyatetai igat weines , ato sibiyonen orot siyasubun aurin on fafatum goai siwan imama , osi asi gogoi nanaba on mes on Iesu ibo osi imasi iyagai .
42023026	Wou yangan Iesu sibonanawai sinai , osi etai si’nan ato orot wabin Simon , an tafanam on Cyrene , on orot on tafanam tani emon i’nat au mafam gagamin igeg on mat sinofoten . Osi on orot sifatumai ato nab sibo abaranai siyagai ato Iesu ibaisin nab iyabar kounai itawar .
42023027	Sabu kuayo gagamin on , On sibigibubunuai ; osi sabu sanasi on jever fani Iesu aurin on sitotou sitararag .
42023028	Iesu osi auris irutabir ato iyau , “ Jerusalem jever ! Omi men Yau auriu wonatou mes , baise omi toum aurim a nanatum auris wonatou .
42023029	Yabin ra enat nono sabu arimon sinau , ‘ Yasisir gagamin maiau osi jever auris osi iyabon a’ris on , osi men fifirig sebitu on a osi iyabon fifirig men sebisus on ! ’
42023030	On an werai sabu arimon oyau auris sinau , ‘ Wei tefaii wonafeu ! ’ Ato oyau gugudis auris sinau , ‘ Wofeu woyatatani ! ’
42023031	“ Wengar ato matain yen nan on sabu atonio osi bobo sefofour ; ato wengar inkikimeu on arimon bobo aifan inmatar . ”
42023032	Osi orot ruam mat siboes , osi rus on yakeotis , osi mat siboes sigat Iesu mat sitirabobis mes .
42023033	Osi sinat efan wabin seyoyorai , “ Tekwakwan An Efan , ” on nan Iesu nabai sikubarai , ato sabu yakeotis ruam min mat nan sikubares , orot tani on Iesu an asumaiauai a orot tani on an asugagafai .
42023034	Iesu iyau , “ Tamau osi sabu einotbures ! Osi on men sisagob atonio bobo aifan sefofour on . ” Osi asi kik iyau nanaba on asi barom siyo nan sitsagob orot iyafan on Iesu an beber itboai .
42023035	Sabu on nan sitawar siruruai ato Jew yangan asi bainetewarotis on Iesu sikoboai siyau : “ On sabu fani ibiyawasis ; ato On Keriso God an Rurubinin mes on Toun eiyawasai tait ! ”
42023036	Wou yangan mat on Iesu sikoboai : Osi On aurin sinat ato sareu wine riribin sitai ittoman mes ,
42023037	ato siyau , “ Om Jew yangan asi Aiwab mes on , Toum eiyawasim tait ! ”
42023038	On unin tefanai nan wengar sibo sigayam siyau , “ Atonio Orot on Jew yangan asi Aiwab . ”
42023039	Orot yakeotin tani on nabai iroror on dura komasis Iesu aurin iyau : “ Om min Keriso i ? Om Toum eiyawasim ato wei mat uniyawasi ! ”
42023040	Orot yakeotin tani on baise turan on igam iyawur iyau , “ Om God men ebeberuai ? Om ato baimaki kaitamom uboai on nanaba ibo .
42023041	Baise ot aurit on basit taboai yabin ot bobo komasis tafour on fasinai ; baise on Orot on men bobo komasin tani ifour on . ”
42023042	Ato on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Iesu , Om unnat unbiAiwab an rai on yau unnosiu ! ”
42023043	Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag , om on ari Yau rut safamai tanar . ”
42023044	Wera aiyet nanaba ato wera matan min igurube ato tafanam engon tutufin iwouman inai wera baitonin nanaba isawar ;
42023045	ato beber nan tafaror goa amonai iroror on isafef ruam simatar tefanai isur inai babanai igat .
42023046	Iesu fonan aumiet bag iyor iyau , “ Tamau , Yau ayubiu on Om imamui ayeyeinin ! ” On atonio dura iyau ato irabob .
42023047	Wou yangan asi orot gagamin on matanai bobo it aifan imatar ato on God ifain iyau , “ Dura bag On Orot obin ! ”
42023048	Sabu nan siruayo bobo aifan nan imamatar on siruruai , osi on bobo imatar matasi si’tai on siyababan kwakwan dogaras sirou auman sinai asi au go .
42023049	Sabu osi iyabon Iesu sisasagobai tiwag a jever fani mat on Galilee emon nan sigibubunuai sinat on nanenei nan sitawar bobo engon tutufin simamatar on siruruai .
42023050	Orot tani imama on wabin min Joseph , on orot on Jew yangan asi mafam gagamin wabin Arimathea emon , Judea tafanamai nan . On orot obin a on baifafaro dura engon auris ibifonabo tiwag , on orot on God an Baiaiwab enat aurin on imomousin . On orot on Jew asi babadis Rurubinin on tani , baise osi asi bainonot aifan sibiyamai Iesu asubunin aurin on men ibasitai on .
42023051	
42023052	On orot inai Pilate nanai itawar ato Iesu usin boin aurin on ifefeyanai .
42023053	Namon on Iesu usin ibo iyeirai ato beber kakakaiinai ikikiman ato rasi dogu on agim wawanin on ainau isar i’yen ato men orot jever tani nan siyeirai on .
42023054	On ra min friday ato Sabat ra on kafakakai mom itbosuruf .
42023055	Jever osi Galilee emon Iesu sigibubunuai sinat on Joseph mat sinai ato sit mamaba Iesu usin iyein .
42023056	Namon osi sinai au go ato fio yanden ninibin a rura momon on sibotitiwag usin aurin . Baifafaro iyau nanaba , Sabat an ra on mes siyarir .
42024001	Sunday fomenei ra gugubanai nan jever asi fio yanden ninibin on sibotitiwag ato auman sibo sinai au rasi .
42024002	Osi agim sit rasi awan emon on sifiruruai inai mabinai i’yen ,
42024003	on mes osi rasi dogu amonai sirui ; baise osi Bada Iesu usin on men sigaturai on .
42024004	Osi nan sitawar sibinonotis on aifan imatar , ato ra kaita orot ruam asi beber kudidiris auman nan bisisi sitawar .
42024005	Jever on siber kwakwan ato osi sikwafir sisur motobai ato orot ruam on jever auris siyau , “ Omi aibo mes Orot yawasin aurin on wonat nin sabu rabobis asi efanai wonunuen i ?
42024006	On men nin ; On God rabob emon ibobaimisirai men . Wononosin , omi Galilee nan ato On mamaba iyawurem :
42024007	‘ Orot Natun on arimon sabu bokomasotis imasi sinyagai nabai sinkubarai , ato ra baitoninai on arimon inmisir men . ’ ”
42024008	Namon jever On an dura on sinos ,
42024009	ato osi rasi dogu emon sinai au go , ato atonio osi bobo auris on baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagin kaita a sabu fani engon mat nan on sikasones .
42024010	Osi jever on Mary Magdalene , Joanna , a Mary James ayon ; osi on jever fani mat on atonio osi bobo auris on Iesu an baiyoyobotis on sikasones .
42024011	Baise Iesu an baiyoyobotis on sinos osi jever asi dura sibikakafun on yabis ambin , ato osi men situtumes on .
42024012	Baise Peter imisir ato iyayai inai au rasi doguai nan ; on ikwafir ato Iesu sibikikimanai , On an beber wat si’yen iten , ab on men aifan tani it on . Namon on imatabir men inai au go ato bobo aifan imamatar aurin on iduduran .
42024013	On wera kaitamomai Iesu an baigibubunuotis ruam on mafam wabin Emmaus on aurin on Jerusalem emon simisir sibib si’nan , on eta an weromin on kilomita auyotoat sasagin kaita nanaba ,
42024014	ato osi tous wat on ato bobo aifan imamatar aurin on sikakafun bonen si’nan .
42024015	Osi atonio bobo aurin on sikakafunai si’nan ato Iesu Toun on osi kousi emon auris itawadudun ato mat sibib si’nan ;
42024016	osi On sit , baise osi sit on men sinabunagai on Iesu .
42024017	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi aifan aurin on rum woidudur bonen wobib wonan i ? ” Osi magis on yababan auman ato nanaba sitawar .
42024018	Orot tani wabin Cleopas on itetemai iyau , “ Om nanawan orot ekesim mom Jerusalem amonai on ato ra ruamom amonai bobo aifan simamatar on men usagob i ? ”
42024019	On itetemis iyau , “ On min abi bobo on i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Bobo ato Iesu Nazareth emon aurin imamatar on . Atonio Orot on aubairuruotin ato On bobo faiwaris ifofour a dura faiwaris ibikakafun on iyoboei God On aurin on idura bag , mat sabu engon tutufin On aurin on sidura bag .
42024020	Wei ai priest aiwabis a bainetewarotis on sibo Rome gawan imanai siyagai , igurubabanai ato sikubarai .
42024021	Ato wei waitutumai On arimon Israel yangan itrufanis mes ! Ato dura tani on , atonio bobo imamatar on ari ra ton nanaba isawar .
42024022	Wei ai kuayo amonai jever fani siyamei on waiduduran kwakwan ; osi fomenei ra gugubanai nan sinai au rasi doguai nan ,
42024023	baise On usin on men sigaturai . Osi simatabir men siyau , osi anea sites ato osi siyawures On on yawasin .
42024024	Sabu fani wei ai kuayo emon on sinai au rasi doguai nan , ato sigaturai jever dura aifan si’yau on dura bag , baise On men sit . ”
42024025	Namon Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi ojim bag , omi men wobitutum ato bobo engon tutufin auris mamaba aubairuruotis sibikakafun on !
42024026	Keriso on arimon atonio osi bobo auris inikokosarai weie an faiwar amonai inar . ”
42024027	Ato Iesu on osi auris idudur mamaba buk amonai engon On Toun aurin sigagayam on , On ainau Moses an buk amonai sigayam on nan ibosuruf ato inat aubairuruotis engon sigagayam on auris igat .
42024028	Osi sinat on mafam aurin sibiufin ato Iesu iyamai on sitau On totor wat enan bait ;
42024029	baise osi sifefeyanai siyau , “ Om nin mat tanama ; wera inai esosofafir ato awa efofom . ” On mes On inai mat nan sima .
42024030	On kemai imair osi mat bayu am mes ato On rafi sarar ibo ato imomoginai ; namon On rafi sarar iyabaseb ato ites .
42024031	Namon osi matas siruseren ato sit sinabunagai , baise osi matasi emon isiwan .
42024032	Osi tous wat auris siyau bonen , “ Iesu etai nan aurit dura ibikakafun an tatamin on wairaf ba nunuati i’yaras , On mamaba ato buk amonai sigayam an yabin bag ikakason an tatamin on iyobin bag . ”
42024033	Osi ra kaita simisir ato simatabir men sinai au Jerusalem , osi nan baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagin kaita sigatures , sabu fani mat nan kaita siruayo simama ,
42024034	ato osi orot ruam auris si’yau , “ Dura bag Bada imisir men ! On Simon aurin irobotet ! ”
42024035	Orot ruam bobo aifan auris etai nan imamatar on auris sidudur , a mamaba rafi sarar iyabaseb weie osi nan Bada sit sinabunagai on engon sikasones .
42024036	Osi orot ruam on nana dura sikakasones ato ra kaita Bada Toun on osi sanasi itawar ato auris iyau , “ Tuf aurim inama . ”
42024037	Osi on siber kwakwan , sinos on dau sit bait .
42024038	Baise On osi auris iyau , “ Omi aibo mes wober i ? Omi bobo aifan toum matamui woitai on mamaba mes wobiyoi ! ”
42024039	Omi imau a auu woiten ato Yau woiteu , Yau Tou on dura bag Orot maiau . Omi wobotoboniu ato wonsagob , Yau on er biou a au rarik auman ato dau on men er bion a an rarik auman on . ”
42024040	On atonio dura iyau ato iman a ann iyoboes sit .
42024041	Osi on nana men sibitutum , osi on sibiyasisir kwakwan a sibiduduran ; on mes On itetemis iyau , “ Omi aurim bayu aifan wat yen on tanam i ? ”
42024042	Osi iyan tatab turin wat on sibo sitai ,
42024043	On osi matasi nan iyan ibo iyan .
42024044	Namon On auris iyau , “ Atonio osi bobo auris on Yau ainau bisimui amama on nan on awurem nono : Ato aifan engon tutufin ainau auriu Moses an Baifafaro dura an buk amonai sigagayam , aubairuruotis asi buk amonai sigagayam a buk Psalm amonai sigagayamen on inat idura bag . ”
42024045	Namon On iyamai ato osi nunuas iruserenen ato dura buk amonai aifan sigagayam on an yabin sitsagob ,
42024046	ato On osi auris iyau , “ God an dura buk amonai atonio nanaba sigayam siyau : Keriso on arimon inarab ato ra baitoninai on inmisir men ,
42024047	ato On Wabinai wongat sabu engon tutufin auris ya baikitabir a God asi bokomas inbinotbur an dura on auris wonbino , ato omi ainau on Jerusalem nan wonbosuruf .
42024048	Omi atonio osi bobo matamui woiten auris on sabu engon wonkasones .
42024049	Ato Yau Tou on Tamau an aumatan Ayu Kakafotin on arimon aurim aniyafarai insur inibonuem . Baise omi on mafam gagaminai nan nana wonama weie faiwar aiyetun emon insur initaragabuem . ”
42024050	Namon On mafam gagamin emon ibonanawaiis sigat sinai Bethany mafam an farat on nan iman ibogai ato imomogines .
42024051	On osi ibimomogines ato On osi sanasi emon on ikirires ato sibo sigai au safam .
42024052	Osi On sikwafirai ato yasisir ibonues auman simatabir men sinai au Jerusalem ,
42024053	ato asi wera tutufin on tafaror goai nan siyein ra fufur God sibikakaiwai .
43001001	Ainau anai bag Dura on i’yen nono weie tafanam sifourai ; Dura on God mat a Dura Toun min God .
43001002	Ainau anai bag Dura on God mat .
43001003	Dura emon on God sawar engon tutufin ifouren ; On men sawar aifan tani asir fetag ifourai on , ab On Dura emon wat on sawar engon tutufin ifouren .
43001004	Dura on yawas ann bokwakwarin , ato atonio yawas on ratafin ibo inat sabu auris .
43001005	Ratafin on woumanai itagawai , ato wouman on men meyan ibomerubai on .
43001006	God an dura bobibotin iyafarai , on orot wabin min John ,
43001007	on inat ratafin aurin on sabu ikasones . On inat osi ikasones onai osi engon tutufin dura sittatam ato sititutum .
43001008	On toun on men ratafin on ; ab on inat ratafin aurin on sabu ikasones . [ On ratafin min Keriso ]
43001009	Atonio on ratafin maiauin , ratafin ato inat au tafanam ato sabu engon tutufin auris ittagawai mes .
43001010	Dura on sabu sanasi i’yen ato On emon on God sabu ifouris , baise sabu on men sisagobai on God Natun .
43001011	On inat Toun an tafanamai , baise On Toun an sabu on men sibo on .
43001012	Baise sabu fani on sibo a On situtumai ; on mes On baibad ites sinat God nanatun mes simatar .
43001013	Osi men orot jever maiauis asi gogoi sitabin fifirig sibobo on nan sinat God nanatun mes simatar on ; ambin , God Toun on osi ifouris sinat On nanatun mes simatar .
43001014	Dura on inat Orot imatar ato sanayi ima . Wei on On an bobo gagamis ifofouren on mataii waiten , On an kaber awan bonuin a an dura maiauin On emon ebiyoboet on God Natun . Atonio bobo nanaba on Taman ifour Natun kaikas iyamai inat On Toun Taman An Itin ba imatar .
43001015	On aurin on John ikakafun . On iyor iyau , “ Atonio Orot aurin on abikakafun ato au , ‘ On yau gibuwui enat , baise On gagamin bag men yau ba yabin On imama weie yau arat . ’ ”
43001016	On an kaber gagamin ekadedebur emon on ot engon tutufin baimomogin itet , baimomogin on matan fufur eyoyoai mom .
43001017	God an Baifafaro dura Moses itai ; baise kaber a dura maiauin on Iesu Keriso emon inat .
43001018	Men meyan iyafan tani toun matanai God it tobon . Natun kaikas on God rus fofonin wat ato On Taman sesebinai etatawar , On rerebai ikurereb sabu sinitai God on Iyafan .
43001019	Jew babadis Jerusalem amonai nan on priest sabuis fani a Levi sabuis on siyafares sinai John sititetemai mes , “ Om on iyafan ? ”
43001020	John on dura totor wat iyafotes , on dura rerebai a rubunaginai ikakafun mom . On atonio nanaba iyau , “ Yau on men Keriso Baiyawasotin God ibiyafarai on . ”
43001021	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Ato om on iyafan i ? Omi min Elijah i ? ” John iyafotes iyau , “ Ambin , yau men on . ” Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Om min aubairuruotin i ? ” On iyafotes iyau , “ Ambin . ”
43001022	Osi siyau , “ Om ekasonei , om on iyafan i ? Wei on om am dura unbiyafot on wanboai wanmatabir men wanan osi sabu iyabon wei sibiyafarei auris . Om toum aurim on dura mamaba unau i ? ”
43001023	John on aubairuruotin an duraiai on nan iyafotes iyau : ‘ Yau on fonan , on efan koiteterinai eyoyor : Eta totorin wat woniyamai nan Bada inabib ! ’ ” ( Atonio dura on aubairuruotin Isaiah on nanaba ikakafun . )
43001024	Pharisee yangan on dura bobibotis siyafares sinai .
43001025	Osi John sitetemai siyau , “ Om on men Keriso o Elijah o aubairuruotin ato om aibo mes sabu ebibapataitois i ? ”
43001026	John iyafotes iyau , “ Yau on sareuai sabu abibapataitois ; baise Orot tani omi sanamui etatawar on men wosagobai on .
43001027	On yau gibuwui enat , baise yau on men orot obiu on ann kikiman anrufan . ”
43001028	Atonio osi bobo engon tutufin on Bethany mafam nan Jordan Sareu rewanai au wera matan emon on nan imatar , John on nan sabu ibibapataitois .
43001029	Ra itom John on Iesu it aurin i’nat ato iyau , “ Woit , atonio Orot on God an Foro Sheep Boboun , On arimon tafanam an bokomas inboai inan !
43001030	Atonio Orot aurin on abikakafun , ato au , ‘ Orot On Yau gibuwui enat , baise On on gagamin bag men yau ba ; yabin On imama weie yau arat . ’
43001031	Yau men asagob on Orot on Iyafan baise yau on anat sareuai nan sabu abibapataitois onai atiyamai Israel sabu On sitsagobai mes . ”
43001032	Atonio dura on John mamaba matanai i’tai isasagob on iyau : “ Yau Ayu ait kiwiu kumag ba safam emon isur ato On tefanai itog .
43001033	Yau on nana men asagobai on , baise God On iyafareu anat sareuai sabu abibapataitois , On yau auriu iyau , ‘ Om arimon Ayu unitai insur Orot tefanai inatog ; on Orot arimon Ayuai nan sabu inibapataitois . ’
43001034	John iyau , “ Yau tou mataui ait atonio bobo imatar , ato aurim akurereb On on God Natun . ”
43001035	Ra itom on efanai nan John an baigibubunuotis ruam mat sitatawar men ,
43001036	on it Iesu ibib i’nan mom on iyau , “ Atonio Orot on God an Foro Sheep Boboun ! ”
43001037	Baigibubunuotis ruam on John sitatamai atonio dura ikakafun ato osi Iesu sigibubunuai sinai .
43001038	Iesu irutabir osi sabu ites On sibigibubunuai ato itetemis iyau , “ Omi aifan wonunuen i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Rabbi , Om menan nan emama i ? ” ( Atonio dura rabbi an yabin min , “ Baibebeotin . ” )
43001039	On iyafotes iyau , “ Wonat wonitai . On mes osi On mat sinai ato On an efan menan imama on sit ato on ra on osi On mat nan sima . ( On ra min rabirabi wera bat nanaba . )
43001040	Osi sabu ruam amosi orot tani on John itatamai dura ikakafun ato Iesu rus sinai , on orot min wabin Andrew , Simon Peter tain .
43001041	Ra kaita Andrew tuan Simon Peter igaturai ato iyawur iyau , “ Wei Orot Rurubinin wagaturai . ” ( On an yabin min Keriso . )
43001042	Namon on Simon ibo inai Iesu aurin . Iesu on orot inateteai ato iyau , “ Om on Simon , John natun . Om wabim arimon sinyorai , Chepas . ” ( Atonio wab kaitamom min on Peter , ato on an yabin min , “ Agim . ” )
43001043	Ra itom Iesu inonotai itan au Galilee mes . On Philip igaturai ato aurin iyau , “ Eigibubunueu ! ”
43001044	( Philip on Bethsaida mafam gagamin emon , mafam gagamin menan Andrew a Peter rus simama nan . )
43001045	Philip on Nathanael igaturai ato iyawur iyau , “ Wei Orot wagaturai ainau Moses an baifafaro dura an buk amonai On Orot aurin igagayam on , a aubairuruotis mat On aurin sigagayam on . On min Iesu , Joseph natun , On Nazareth mafam gagamin emon . ”
43001046	Nathanael itetemai iyau , “ Abi bobo obin tani Nazareth mafam emon inat i ? ” Philip iyafotai iyau , “ Om enat ato unitai . ”
43001047	Iesu on Nathanael it aurin i’nat ato On aurin ikakafun iyau , “ Atonio orot on Israel matuanin bag ; On aurin on men baisigogo yawas tani yen on ! ”
43001048	Nathanael itetemai iyau , “ Om mamaba usagobiu i ? ” Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om bubudau wengar babanai utatawar nan aitem weie Philip iyorem . ”
43001049	Nathanael iyafotai iyau , “ Baibebeotim , Om on God Natun ! Om on Israel yangan asi Aiwab ! ”
43001050	Iesu iyau , “ Om ebitutum yabin Yau awurem on om bubudau wengar babanai utatawar aitem i ? Om arimon bobo gagamis bag uneit , men atonio bobo ba ! ”
43001051	Ato On auris iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : Omi arimon safam inruseren ato God an anea on Orot Natun tefanai singegeg sinsusur woniten . ”
43002001	Ra ruam isawar gibunai ato tabin an forag on nan Cana mafam gagamin , Galilee amonai siyamai . Iesu ayon min nan ,
43002002	ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat on eb sibebegis sinat nan tabin an forag aurin .
43002003	Sabu sareu wine on sitoman isawar mom ato Iesu ayon on On aurin iyau , “ Osi auris sareu wine isawar . ”
43002004	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Jever , om men unawureu Yau bobo nanaba aniyamai mes , Yau au wera on men inat on . ”
43002005	Namon Iesu ayon on agirotis iyawures iyau , “ On dura mamaba yawurem , on asir wonafour mom . ”
43002006	Jew yangan on asi eta mamaba God sekwakwafirai on sigaraba maiau , osi asi baifafaro sigaraba siyamen mamaba tous sinbigumidaris aurin on , ato on yabinai simom engon nimtereban kaita agimai sibiyamen sareu sunin aurin on nan si’yen , osi simom kakaita kakaita on gagamis fofonin sareu lita orot kaitamom o orot kaitamom auyotoat nanaba on sareu sinibonuen .
43002007	Iesu agirotis auris iyau , “ Atonio osi simom on sareu wonibonuen . ” Osi sareu sibonuen sigai awas sibonuis ,
43002008	namon On iyawures iyau , “ Sareu wotafurub ato wobo wonai orot tabin an forag ekakaifarai on wonitai . ” Osi sareu sibo sinai on aurin ,
43002009	On sareu iyabatabir wine imatar on igitobon . On men isagob atonio sareu wine on men emon ne inat , ( baise agirotis osi iyabon sareu sitatafurub on sisagob ) ; on mes on orot tabin boboun aurin iyor ,
43002010	ato iyau , “ Sabu engon on ainau sareu wine obin on sebites setotoman ato gibui sabu setotoman kwakwan ebifofonis on , osi sareu wine riribin on sebites setotoman . Baise om sareu wine obin on ubotan inat ato ari bag weie ubotet igat ! ”
43002011	Iesu atonio bobo buburin ainauin on Cana mafam gagamin , Galilee tafanamai nan ifour ; on nan on faiwar iyoboes on God emon inat , ato On an baigibubunuotis on situtumai .
43002012	Atonio bobo isawar gibunai , Iesu a ayon , taitain a an baigibubunuotis on sinai au Capernaum mafam gagaminai ato nan ra fani sima .
43002013	Jew yangan asi Forag wabin Baisobon on an wera inat ibiufin , on mes Iesu inai au Jerusalem .
43002014	On sabu tafaror goa amonai igatures foro cow , foro sheep , a kiwiu kumag on sibitotobon a mat sabu tafanam touman an agim sibigagaram bonen yangan on nan asi kemai simair simama .
43002015	On uram an fafumai nan bobaitu foro cow a foro sheep engon ifaitanis tafaror goai emon sigat , On sabu tafanam touman an agim sebigagaram bonen yangan on asi kema ikitabiren ato asi agim on fetag fetag sitagege ;
43002016	ato On dura wawaninai nan sabu ato kiwiu kumag sibitotobon on iyawures iyau , “ Osi sawar woboen wogat ! Omi men Tamau an goa woniyamai baitotobon goa inmatar mes ! ”
43002017	On an baigibubunuotis on atonio God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on sinos , dura sigayam siyau , “ God Om am goa aurin on Yau nunuau tutufinai agogoi kwakwan on wairaf ba yarasiu . ”
43002018	Jew babadis simatabir men sinat aurin ato sitetemai siyau , “ Om abi bobo buburin unafour iniyoboei wanitai on Om am baibad auman atonio osi bobo unafour i ? ”
43002019	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi atonio God an goa wongoros insur ato ra ton nanaba on Yau arimon an yon men inag . ”
43002020	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Om ra ton nan goa unyon men i ? Sabu atonio tafaror goa siyoyonin on kwanda orot ruam sasagis nimtereban kaita isawar ! ”
43002021	Baise Iesu ato tafaror goa aurin ibikakafun on Toun usin aurin on iyau .
43002022	On mes God On rabob emon ibobaimisirai men on an baigibubunuotis on atonio dura ibikakafun on sinos ; mamaba God an dura buk amonai sigagayam aurin on a Iesu dura mamaba ibikakafun aurin on situtum .
43002023	Baisobon an Forag amonai on Iesu nan nana Jerusalem ima , ato sabu sit On bobo buburis ifofour aurin on situtumai .
43002024	Baise Iesu Toun on sabu men itutumes yabin On sabu engon tutufin isagobis tiwag .
43002025	Iesu on sabu nunuasi asi bainonot on isagob nono , on mes men iyafan tani on sabu auris itkasonai on .
43003001	Orot tani wabin Nicodemus on Jew yangan asi bainetewarotin tani , ato on Pharisee yangan asi kuayo emon .
43003002	Fom tani on inai Iesu aurin ato aurin iyau , “ Rabbi , wei wasagob Om on baibebeotim God iyafarem . Iyai iyafan God bisinai inmama on ato bobo buburis Om efofour ba on nanaba on fofonin arimon inafour . ”
43003003	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : Iyai iyafan inarat birei men on arimon God an Baiaiwab initai . ”
43003004	Nicodemus itetemai iyau , “ Orot irat nono on mamaba arimon inarat birei men ? On men fofonin ayon yan amonai inar ato wera bairuin ba inarat men ! ”
43003005	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag , iyai iyafan sareuai a Ayuai inarat birei men on God an Baiaiwab amonai inar .
43003006	Orot jever ayon taman emon on usin maiauin erarat baise Ayuai on God ayubin ebitai erarat .
43003007	Om men uniror mes yabin Yau awurem on omi engon tutufin arimon wonarat birei men . ’
43003008	Yabat angogoi nanaba esisin ; ato om yabat rarabin etatam , baise om men usagob yabat men emon ne enat a on menan nan enan . On eta kaitamom nanaba on omi engon tutufin aurim ato iyafan Ayuai inrarat birei men on . ”
43003009	Nicodemus itetemai iyau , “ Atonio bobo on arimon mamaba i ? ”
43003010	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om on baibebeotim gagamim bag Israel amonai ato atonio bobo on men usagob i ?
43003011	Yau awurem dura bag : Wei aifan wasagob on wabikakafun a aifan mataii waitai on wakakasonem baise omi men iyafan tani egogoi ai dura inboai on .
43003012	Atonio bobo tafanamai semamatar auris akakasonem on men ebitutumeu ; ato om arimon mamaba unitutumeu ato bobo safamai sen auris ankakasonem on ?
43003013	On mes men iyafan tani igai au safam on , ab Orot Natun ekesin mom , On safam emon isur . ”
43003014	Moses efan koiteterinai nan agim bronze on nan mota iyamai ato siwayai ibogai igai , on eta kaitamomai Orot Natun on arimon sinbogaiai inag ,
43003015	onai sabu engon tutufin On sinbitutumai on yawas mama wantoanin sinboai .
43003016	Yabin God on sabu engon tutufin inuabois kwakwan , on fasinai On Natun kaikas ikutetai onai sabu engon tutufin On sinbitutumai on men sinarab ab yawas mama wantoanin sinboai .
43003017	Yabin God on men Natun iyafarai inat au tafanam sabu inigurubabanis mes , baise On inat sabu baiyawasis mes .
43003018	Iyai iyafan Natun ebitutumai on men sinigurubabanai on ; baise iyai iyafan men On ebitutumai on sigurubabanai nono , yabin on men God Natun kaikas itutumai on .
43003019	Baigurubaban min atonio nanaba ebobo ; Iesu on ratafin , On inat tafanamai baise sabu on kous On aurin siyein yabin osi wouman sinuaboai , men ratafin ba , osi asi bobo on komasis wat sefofour .
43003020	Iyai iyafan bobo komasis efofour on ratafin ebisisiweiai ato on men arimon innat au ratafin on yabin on men egogoi an bobo komasis efofour on sinboai ingat au rereb .
43003021	Baise iyai iyafan bobo dura maiauinai wat efofour on toun ibo igat au ratafin onai ratafin on iniyoboai on ato bobo aifan efofour on God aurin ebifonabo .
43003022	On gibunai , Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat sinai au Judea tafanamai nan , On nan mat ra fani sima ato sabu ibapataitois .
43003023	John mat on efan Aenon on nan sabu ibibapataitois , on efan on men weromin Salim efan bisinai nan , yabin on efanai on sareu gagamin nan i’yen . Sabu on aurin si’nan ato ibibapataitois .
43003024	( Atonio bobo on ainau imatar weie John fafatum goai sireberuai . )
43003025	John an baigibubunuotis fani on Jew yangan mat sibosuruf osi Jew yangan asi kik mamaba usis sebigumidar aurin on sigagamois .
43003026	On mes osi sinai John aurin ato sikasonai siyau , “ Baibebeotim , om enonosin orot tani rum Jordan sareuai au wera matan emon nan wotatawar , ato Orot aurin ubikakafun ? On orot ari ibosuruf sabu ebibapataitois ato sabu engon tutufin On aurin senan ! ”
43003027	John iyafotes iyau , “ God safamai on atonio bobo orot initai ato on min inboai .
43003028	Omi toum on yau wotatamiu , yau dura aikakafun au , ‘ Yau on men Keriso , baise yau on ainau On nanai siyafareu anat . ’
43003029	Orot tabin boboun on jeverei tabin boboun ebiawan on on orot ebinoanai ; baise orot tabin boboun turan orot ibibaisin , nan itawar etatam ato orot tabin boboun dura ebikakafun on ebiyasisir . On bobo nanaba on yau tou au yasisir on irat bag itutufin .
43003030	On on inarat gagamin bag inmatar , ato yau on ansur anikafakakaiu bag . ”
43003031	Orot ato safam emon i’nat on gagamin bag sabu engon tefasi ; on iyafan tafanam emon i’nat on tafanam ebinoanai a on tafanam an yawas aurin wat on dura ebikakafun , baise On Iyafan safam emon i’nat on sabu engon tefasi ato yawas aifan safamai sen on auris dura ebikakafun .
43003032	On safamai nan yawas aifan Toun matanai i’tai a dura i’tatam on ikasones , baise men iyafan tani On an dura itutumai on .
43003033	Baise iyai iyafan On an dura eboai on , ebiyoboet God dura aifan ebikakafun on dura maiauin .
43003034	On Iyafan God Ibiyafarai on God an dura ebikakafun yabin God an Ayu on tutufin ebitai .
43003035	Taman on Natun inuaboai ato bobo engon tutufin on On an faiwar babanai iyein .
43003036	Iyai iyafan Natun ebitutumai on yawas mama wantoanin inboai ; iyai iyafan Natun aurin ebifonaseir on men yawas inboai , baise God an yatatab on arimon bisinai inen au wantoan .
43004001	Pharisee yangan dura sitatam Iesu on sabu ifouris On sibigibubunuai a baigibubunuotis on sigaraba bag ibibapataitois men John ba .
43004002	( Baise Iesu Toun on sabu men iyafan tani ibapataitoai on ; ab On an baigibubunuotis wat on sabu sibapataitois . )
43004003	Iesu atonio dura sibikakafun on itatam , ato On Judea tafanam ikirir imatabir men inai au Galilee tafanamai nan ;
43004004	On etai ibib i’nan on itan samaria itgat weie itrabon itan au Galilee .
43004005	On inat mafam gagamin Samaria amonai wabin seyoyorai Sychar on nan igat , on mafam gagamin on motob ato Jacob ainau ainau bag natun Joseph ibitai on bisinai nan .
43004006	Jacob motob dogu isar an sareu iboai min nan ato Iesu etai ibi i’nan isuweigan on nan sareu ato dogu emon igeg on nan imair imama . Ato wera min aiyet nanaba .
43004007	Samaria jever inat sareu itsun mes , ato Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Sareu eiteu antoman . ”
43004008	( Iesu on ekesin sareu doguai nan imama ato On an baigibubunuotis on sinai mafam gagaminai nan bayu sittobonen mes . )
43004009	Jever iyafotai iyau , “ Om on Jew Orot ato yau on Samaria emon — mamaba mes Om yau auriu sareu mes ufefeyan i ? ” ( Jew yangan on men ato ramo kaitamomai nan Samaria yangan bayu sam setotom on nan sinam on . )
43004010	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om utsagob God mamaba siwar sabu ebites on , ato Yau on Iyafan on aurim sareu mes abifefeyanim , om Yau utifefeyaniu ato arimon sareu yayawasin on atitem . ”
43004011	Jever iyau , “ Bada , Om aurim sareu tatar ambin abifanai unsun , sareu on babanai bag . Ato Om sareu er awan auman erereben on menan nan unboai i ?
43004012	Ot agirit Jacob atonio sareu dogu emon egeg on itei ; on nanatun mat a an foro bobaitu engon on atonio sareu sitoman . Ato Om dura ebikakafun on Om gagamim bag men Jacob ba i ? ”
43004013	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Iyai iyafan atonio sareu intoman on arimon anjon intein men ,
43004014	baise iyai iyafan Yau sareu anbibitai intotoman on , arimon men anjon intein men . Yau sareu ato anbibitai on arimon on aurin on sareu ayayin dogu emon egeg ba on usin amonai sareu yayawasin iniyai ato on yawas mama wantoanin inboai . ”
43004015	Jever iyau , “ Bada , atonio sareu on eiteu ! Namon yau arimon men anjou intein men , a yau arimon men annat nin sareu ansun men . ”
43004016	Iesu iyawur iyau , “ Om unan awam unyorai ato rum wonmatabir men nin wonnat . ”
43004017	Jever iyafotai iyau , “ Yau men er awau auman on . ” Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om dura bag uyau , om men er awam auman on .
43004018	Om orot engon nim uyawanis , ato om ari orot tani rum womama , on men dura bag om awam on . Dura aifan ato uyawureu on dura bag . ”
43004019	Jever iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , Om on aubairuruotim .
43004020	Yau wawau agiriu Samaria yangan on God atonio oyauai nan sikwakwafirai , baise omi Jew yangan wau on , Jerusalem on efan on nan God tatkwafirai . ”
43004021	Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Jever Yau eitutumeu , wera arimon innat sabu on men nin oyauai o Jerusalem nan Tamau sinkwafirai on .
43004022	Omi Samaria yangan on men wosagob iyafan wokwakwafirai ; baise wei Jew yangan on wasagob Iyafan on wakwakwafirai yabin God an baiyawas on Jew yangan emon inat .
43004023	Baise wera on enat ato on inat nono , sabu dura bag sekwakwafirai yangan on arimon Tamau aurin on ayuai a dura maiauinai nan sinkwafirai . Atonio osi sabu kwafirotis on Tamau egogoi osi On sinkwafirai .
43004024	God on Ayu , ato osi iyabon On sekwakwafirai on Ayu an faiwarai a dura maiauinai nan sinkwafirai . ”
43004025	Jever On aurin iyau , “ Yau asagob Orot Rurubinin ( on seyoyorai Keriso ) on arimon innat , ato On innanat on bobo engon tutufin auris on inkasonet . ”
43004026	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Yau Tou on om rut tabikakafun . ”
43004027	Wera men weromin ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis simatabir men sinat ; ato osi sigaturai On jever rus sibikakafun on men sunub siduduran . Baise osi men iyafan tani jever aurin iyau , “ Om aifan egogoi ? ” o Iesu sitetemai siyau , “ Om aibo mes jever rum wobikakafun ? ”
43004028	Namon jever an sareu simom ikirir ato imatabir men inai au mafam gagamin , ato sabu auris iyau ,
43004029	“ Omi wonat Orot wonitai , On yau ainau au bobo aifan engon tutufin afofour on ikasoneu . Tait On min Keriso bait ? ”
43004030	On mes osi mafam gagamin sikirir ato sinai Iesu aurin .
43004031	On an werai baigibubunuotis on Iesu sibifefeyanai si’yau , “ Baibebeotim , wei wagogoi Om bayu unam ! ”
43004032	Baise On iyafotes iyau , “ Yau auriu bayu yen on anam , ato on bayu on omi men wosagob . ”
43004033	On mes baigibubunuotis on sibosuruf tous sanasi on sibitetem bonen si’yau , “ Sabu fani aurin bayu sibo sinat bait ? ”
43004034	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Yau au bayu on On Iyafan an gogoiai Ibiyafareu on aurin anifonabo a On an bobo ibiteu on anisawarai mes .
43004035	Sabu ra fufur sau sebikakafun ba , ‘ Roke bat sen on arimon bayu tankuwain . ’ Baise Yau awurem , matam woneit masau woninateteai tiwag ; bayu on ari simari ato ibotitiwag nono kuwainin mes !
43004036	Orot iyafan bayu ekukuwain on sebibaiyanai ato bayu eboai eruruayoen yawas mama wantoanin aurin on ; on mes orot fesi ebofefes a orot iyafan bayu ekukuwain on arimon rus engon kaita siniyasisir .
43004037	Sabu dura ra fufur sebikakafun on dura bag , ‘ Orot tani fesi ebofefes ato orot tani on bayu ekukuwain . ’
43004038	Yau aiyafarem ato masauai nan bayu wotkukuwain mes ato omi on masauai on men bobo woboen on ; sabu fani on nan siboen , ato osi bobo wawanin sibobo emon on omi asir nouasin bayu wat wokuwain . ”
43004039	Sabu engon tutufin on Samaria mafam gagamin emon on Iesu situtumai yabin jever iyau , “ Bobo aifan afofour on engon tutufin ikasoneu . ”
43004040	On mes Samaria yangan sinat Iesu aurin sigat ato sifefeyanai nan mat sitama mes , ato Iesu on nan mat ra ruam sima .
43004041	On an dura emon on sabu sigaraba maiau situtum ,
43004042	ato osi jever siyawur siyau , “ Wei ari wabitutum , men ato on dura aifan u’yau aurin on baise wei toui tainaii on watatamai , ato wei wasagob On on dura bag tafanam an Baiyawasotin . ”
43004043	Iesu nan ra ruam mat sima ato On ikirires inai au Galilee tafanamai nan .
43004044	Yabin Iesu On Toun iyau nono , “ Aubairuruotin Toun an tafanamai on men sekakafai on . ”
43004045	Baise On inai Galilee tafanamai igat mom , sabu nan on tefan nafur sirab sikakaiwai yabin osi sinai Jerusalem nan Baisobon an Forag aurin ato On forag amonai bobo engon tutufin ifofouren on sit .
43004046	Namon Iesu imatabir men inai au Cana mafam gagamin Galilee tafanam amonai nan , on efanai nan on Iesu sareu ifourai wine imatar . Gawan orot gagamin on nan ato natun on Capernaum mafam gagaminai nan isawau imama .
43004047	On dura itatam Iesu on Judea tafanam emon inat au Galilee , ato On aurin inai ato ifefeyanai isosoan kwakwan On itan au Capernaum mafam gagaminai nan natun itiyawasai mes , on fifi on kafakakai mom itarab .
43004048	Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Omi sabu on men wotiteu bobo buburis a bobo baiduduranis atfofour on omi arimon men wotitutumeu on . ”
43004049	Orot gagamin iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , enat rut tanai weie natu inarab . ”
43004050	Iesu orot aurin iyau , “ Enai , om natum arimon yawasin inmama ! ” Orot on Iesu an dura itutumai ato inai .
43004051	Ra itom ato orot ibib i’nan au go ato an agirotis on dura sibo sinat sinefotai ato siyawur siyau , “ Om natum on arimon inyawas men ! ”
43004052	On itetemis iyau , wera aifanai nan on natu iyawas men , ato osi siyafotai siyau , “ Rarab wera aiyet nanaba on nan sawau isawar . ”
43004053	Namon fifi taman on inos , on wera fofonin on nan Iesu iyawur iyau , “ Natum on arimon inyawas . ” On mes on awan nanatun mat on engon situtum .
43004054	Iesu on Judea tafanam emon inat au Galilee ato nan bobo buburin bairuin ba ifour .
43005001	On gibunai , Iesu inai au Jerusalem Jew yangan asi tafaror an forag aurin .
43005002	Jerusalem amonai furi wabin seyoyorai , Foro Sheep An Metewan Awan , on bisinai on sareu una on nan i’yen , on nan on arod engon nim siyonen ; Hebrew yangan fonasi on seyoyorai Bethzatha .
43005003	Sabu sawauis kuayo gagamin on nan arodai si’yen , osi sabu on matas fotis a ass raguraguis . ( Osi nan sareu simomousin toun wat itikibubur itag mes ,
43005004	yabin ra fufur Bada an anea isusur sareu unaiai nan sareu yan igagamatabir . Orot iyafan ainau isusur ato sareu yan igagamatabir igeg nan i’yeib on an sawau ato i’boai , on emon on iyayawas . )
43005005	Orot tani nan sawau iboai on kwanda orot kaitamom auyotoat sasagis nimtereban baitonin nanaba isawar .
43005006	Iesu on orot it nan i’yen ato On isagob on orot on sawau men ari ibo on ; on mes On itetemai iyau , “ Om egogoi unyawas i ? ”
43005007	Orot sawauin iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , men iyafan tani nin emama arimon inboeu sareu yan egagamatabir on nan inrebeniu aneib on ; yau afofourtobon sareuai ansur mes , ato orot tani on ainau nan sareuai esusur . ”
43005008	Iesu aurin iyau , “ Om emisir , am ire ebogai ato ebib . ”
43005009	Ra kaita orot iyawas ; an ire ibogai ato ibib . Atonio bobo on Sabat ra nan imatar ,
43005010	on mes Jew babadis on orot ato iyayawas on siyawur siyau , “ Ari on Sabat , ato ot ati Baifafaro iyau on sofafar gagamin men am ire unboai unan . ”
43005011	On iyafotes iyau , “ Orot iyafan yau ibiyawasiu on iyawureu iyau , ‘ Am ire ebogai ato ebib . ’ ‘ N ’ ”
43005012	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Orot iyafan on iyawurem am ire ebogai ato ebib i ? ”
43005013	Baise orot ato iyayawas on men isagob on iyafan yabin sabu kuayo on efanai on irat bag ato Iesu on osi sabu amosi isanoan inai .
43005014	On gibunai Iesu on ato orot tafaror goai nan igaturai ato iyawur iyau , “ Eite , om uyawas nono . Om men unbokomas men , ato ambin on , arimon bobo komasin bag aurim inmatar . ”
43005015	Namon orot inai ato Jew babadis iyawures iyau , Iesu on On yau iyawasiu .
43005016	On yabinai osi sibosuruf Iesu baikokosar sibitai yabin On Sabat ra nan orot iyawasai on mes .
43005017	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau Tamau on ra fufur bobo ebobo , ato Yau mat on eb bobo anabo . ”
43005018	Atonio dura ibikakafun on iyamai Jew babadis sidura bag sitasubun mes yabin On men Sabat ra wat iyastob on , baise On iyau , On Toun Taman on God ato on etaiai on Toun iyamai God rus fofonin wat .
43005019	On mes Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : Natun on men Toun an gogoi wat bobo efofour on , On Taman bobo efofour eitai on wat on nanaba efofour . Taman bobo mamaba ebobo on nanaba Natun mat bobo ebobo .
43005020	Yabin Taman on Natun inuaboai ato On Toun bobo aifan engon efofour on nanaba iyoboai . On arimon bobo gagamis bag iniyoboai inabo men atonio ari efofour ba , ato omi arimon woniduduran .
43005021	Mat Tamau on sabu rabobis ebobaimisires ato yawas ebites , on eta kaitamomai Natun an gogoiai nanaba sabu iyabon auris on yawas ebites .
43005022	Mat Yau Tamau Toun on men orot jever tani ebigurubabanai on . On Natun baibad engon tutufin itai on sabu inigurubabanis mes ,
43005023	onai sabu engon tutufin on arimon Natun sinifain siniduduranai , on eta kaitamomai on bobo nanaba sefofour on osi Tamau sebifain sebiduranai ba . Iyai iyafan men Natun ebifain ebiduranai on , Tamau ato Ibiyafareu on men ebifain ebiduranai on .
43005024	“ Yau awurem dura bag : Iyai iyafan au dura etatam ato Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on aurin mat ebitutum , on yawas mama wantoanin inboai . On arimon men baigurubaban inboai baise on rabob emon on iniseirai nono inat yawas aurin igat .
43005025	Yau awurem dura bag : Wera enat — wera on inat nono — on sabu rabobis arimon God Natun fonan sintatam , ato osi iyabon On fonan sintatamai on arimon sinyawas sinama .
43005026	Mat Tamau Toun on yawas ann bokwakwarin , on eta kaitamomai On Natun ifourai inat yawas ann bokwakwarin imatar .
43005027	Ato On Natun baibad itai sabu inigurubabanis mes yabin On on Orot Natun .
43005028	Atonio dura abikakafun aurim on men woniror mes ; wera inat on arimon sabu engon tutufin sirabob rasi doguai sen on On fonan sintatam ,
43005029	ato osi arimon rasi dogu emon sinag . Osi sabu iyabon bobo obis sifofour on sinmisir sinama men , ato osi sabu iyabon bobo komasis sifofour on sinmisir ato sinimakies . ”
43005030	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Yau men arimon Tou au baibadai on bobo anafour on ; Yau on God inawureu on sabu anigurubabanis , on arimon au baigurubaban on totorin wat yabin Yau men afofourtobon Tou au gogoiai anafour on , baise On Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on an gogoiai nanaba anafour .
43005031	“ Yau Tou auriu dura ankurereb on , ato dura aifan anbikakafun on omi men arimon wonboai on dura bag on .
43005032	Baise orot tani on Yau auriu on dura ekurereb ato asagob on Yau auriu dura ebikakafun on dura bag .
43005033	Omi ami dura bobibotis woiyafares sinai John aurin ato on aifan Yau auriu dura maiauin on ikakafun .
43005034	Yau men agogoi John an duraiai ibikakafun on iniyamai inidura bag Yau on Iyafan ; Yau atonio dura abikakafun onai omi wonitutum ato God on omi iniyawasim .
43005035	John on tafa ba iyoyour a itatagawai ato omi wera dibon wat on wogogoi kwakwan a woiyasisir kwakwan on an tafa aurin .
43005036	Bobo aifan abobo on ato Tamau ibiteu on abobo , bobo aifan abobo on ebi dura bag , on ebiyoboem Yau on Tamau iyafareu . On mes bobo fani on arimon gagamis bag sinmatar men ato John Yau auriu ibikakafun ba .
43005037	Ato Tamau On ibiyafareu mat on Yau auriu on ebikakafun . Omi On fonan on men meyan wotatam a On magin on men woit on ,
43005038	ato omi on men On an dura wobo nunuamui woyeyeinin on , yabin omi on men wobitutum God on Yau iyafareu omi aurim anat .
43005039	Omi God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on woiyab yabin omi wononosin osi dura amosi on arimon yawas mama wantoanin wonboai . Ato atonio dura buk amonai sigagayam engon on Yau auriu on ebikakafun !
43005040	Baise omi on men wogogoi wonnat Yau auriu onai omi yawas wonboai .
43005041	“ Yau on men afofourtobon sabu anboes Yau sinifaiu aurin on .
43005042	Baise Yau asagob omi sabu on mamaba , ato Yau asagob omi nunuamui on men ami nuabo tani God aurin yen on .
43005043	Yau on Tamau anbaibadai nan anat , ato omi on Yau men woboeu on ; baise orot tani toun an baibadai innat aurin inbikakafun on omi arimon on fonan wonboai .
43005044	Omi ami gogoi on tuturam mat wonbifaim bonen , baise omi men wofofourtobon woniyamai God ekesin on omi inifaim ; on mes omi mamaba Yau wonitutumeu ?
43005045	Baise omi men wonnos Yau arimon Tamau nanai nan omi aniubarem on . Omi ami baitutum on Moses an baifafaro dura aurin woyein , on arimon omi iniubarem .
43005046	Omi dura bag Moses an baifafaro dura wotbitutumai on , omi arimon Yau wotitutumeu yabin Yau auriu on Moses dura buk amonai igayam .
43005047	Baise omi men woitutum ato dura aifan Moses igagayam on , ato omi on mamaba wonitutumeu Yau dura aifan abikakafun on ? ”
43006001	Ra fani gibunai , Iesu imatabir men Galilee kamit irabon ( o on kamit mat on seyoyorai Tiberias kamit ) .
43006002	Sabu kuayo gagamin on On sibigibubunuai yabin osi sit On bobo buburis ifouren sabu sawauis on ibiyawasis .
43006003	Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat sigai oyau tefanai ato nan simair .
43006004	Jew yangan asi Baisobon an Forag ra on inat iufin .
43006005	Iesu iyeit ato sabu kuayo gagamin ites on , On aurin si’nat , on mes On Philip aurin iyau , “ Ot menan nan bayu tantobonen atonio osi sabu engon tutufin tanibayues i ? ”
43006006	( On atonio dura ikakafun on Philip itrutobonai mes ; ato Iesu on isagob nono bobo mamaba itafour weie Philip itetemai . )
43006007	Philip iyafotai iyau , “ Bayu tanabo sabu engon tutufin auris gugud gugud tanfasararam sinboboai on rafi sarar an baiyan on arimon agim 200 kina on tefanai nanaba tantobonen ato baise arimon men fofonin tanibayues on . ”
43006008	On an baigibubunuotin tani wabin Andrew , Simon Peter tain on iyau ,
43006009	“ Fifi tani atonio nin on aurin rafi sarar nim a iyan ruam on sen . Baise on bayu on men fofonin sabu engon tutufin sinam on ? ”
43006010	Iesu iyawures iyau , “ Sabu wawures sinmairirin . ” ( On efanai nan on engon wayo wat . ) On mes sabu engon tutufin nan simairirin ; on sabu amosi orot wat on engon 5,000 .
43006011	Iesu rafi sarar ibo God aurin ikakaiu ato sabu nan simama on iraramis . On bobo kaitamom nanaba on iyan aurin ifour , God aurin ikakaiu ato osi engon tutufin asi gogoi mamaba on iraramis .
43006012	Osi engon tutufin siyam siyakokor weie , On an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Bayu tam tuturis sen on engon wonabo ; men tuturis fani wonikiriren mes . ”
43006013	Rafi sarar nim emon siyam ato tuturis on siboen kaifet engon auyotoat sasagis ruam on awas sibonuen .
43006014	Sabu nan on Iesu sit bobo buburin ifour ato siyau , “ Dura bag atonio Orot on aubairuruotin , On tamomousin itnat au tafanam mes ! ”
43006015	Iesu isagob osi on kafakakai mom sitnat sitboai , ato asi gogoi nan sitiyamai itiaiwab mes ; on mes On ekesin mom inai men oyauai nan .
43006016	Ibirabirabi ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis on sisur sinai kamitai nan ,
43006017	osi wa tefanai sikaruge ato simatabir men sirabon sinai au Capernaum . Awam ifom ato Iesu on oyauai nan , On men inat auris igat on .
43006018	Namon yabat wawanin isisin ato kamit iyamai nufur ibogagai .
43006019	Baigibubunuotis on wa siboi sinai , an weromin on kilomita nim o nimtereban kaita on nanaba ato osi sit Iesu kamit tefanai ibib inat wa aurin iufin ; ato osi on men sunub siber on .
43006020	Iesu iyawures iyau , “ Omi men wonaber mes , nin on Yau ! ”
43006021	Namon osi yasisirai wat Iesu sibo wayai siwan , ato ra kaita wa mutfon menan siyein si’nan on sinat on efanai nan sigat .
43006022	Ra itom sabu kuayo ato kamit reban emon simama on sit on wa kaitamom wat on nan iyoyot . Osi sisagob Iesu on men an baigibubunuotis mat wayai sinai on , ab osi ekesis wat sinai .
43006023	Wa fani Tiberias emon sinat toreai nan , on efan bisinai nan on Bada rafi sarar ikakaiu ato sabu kuayo gagamin ites siyam .
43006024	Sabu kuayo sit Iesu a an baigibubunuotis on men nan on , osi ato wa siyoyot on tefasi sikaruge ato sinai au Capernaum mafam gagaminai nan sinunuen .
43006025	Sabu on Iesu nan kamit reban emon sigaturai ato aurin siyau , “ Baibebeotim , Om meyan unat nin ugat ? ”
43006026	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : Omi Yau wonunueniu yabin omi rafi sarar ami gogoi on ato wam woiyakokor , men ato Yau bobo buburis afofour on woit woitutum on .
43006027	Omi men bayu ato inkomas aurin on wonabo mes ; baise omi bayu ato yawas mama wantoanin inen on aurin on wonabo . Atonio bayu on arimon Orot Natun initem yabin God Taman on an kufofot On aurin iyein , On aurin idura bag . ”
43006028	On mes osi sitetemai siyau , “ Wei mamaba wanafour onai wei God an bobo wanabo i ? ”
43006029	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi atonio bobo on God egogoi wonabo : Orot ato God Ibiyafarai on wonitutumai . ”
43006030	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Om abi bobo buburin unafour onai wei wanitai ato wanitutumem ? Om abi bobo unafour i ?
43006031	Ot wawat agirit on efan koiteterinai nan bayu wabin manna on siyam , on nanaba dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ Moses on rafi sarar safam emon on ites siyam . ’ ”
43006032	Iesu iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : rafi sarar ato Moses ibitem on men safam emon on ; Yau Tamau on rafi sarar maiauin safam emon on item .
43006033	Yabin rafi sarar ato God ibitem on , On Iyafan safam emon isusur on yawas sabu tafanamai ebites . ”
43006034	Osi sifefeyanai siyau , “ Bada , atonio rafi sarar on ra fufur unitei . ”
43006035	Iesu iyawures iyau , “ Yau on rafi sarar yayawasin . Iyai iyafan Yau auriu innat on men bitanan ingiai on ; iyai iyafan Yau inbitutumeu on men anjon sareu intein on .
43006036	Baise awurem , omi on basit Yau bobo buburis afour matamui woiteu ato omi arimon men wonitutumeu on .
43006037	Sabu engon tutufin Yau Tamau ibiteu on arimon sinnat auriu . Yau men arimon iyafan tani anisisiweiai ato osi sinnanat auriu on ,
43006038	yabin Yau safam emon asusur on men Yau Tou au gogoiai anafour on , baise Iyafan ato ibiyafareu on an gogoiai anafour mes .
43006039	On Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on egogoi atonio bobo anafour mes : sabu ato engon tutufin ibiteu on men tani anisiwanai mes baise ra kanfounai on engon tutufin anbobaimisires men sinyawas .
43006040	Yabin aifan Tamau an gogoi on atonio : sabu engon tutufin Natun sinitai a On sinbitutumai on , osi yawas mama wantoanin sinboai ; ato Yau arimon ra kanfounai on anbobaimisires men sinyawas . ”
43006041	Jew yangan on sibosuruf Iesu aurin on sigagam sibikakafun yabin On iyau , “ Yau on rafi sarar on safam emon isur . ”
43006042	On mes osi siyau , “ Atonio Orot on Iesu , Joseph natun . Ot on On ayon taman tasagobis . Mamaba mes On ari ebikakafun yau , “ On safam emon isur i ? ”
43006043	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi toum sanamui wogagam bonen on wonikirir .
43006044	Omi men iyafan tani auriu innat ab Tamau On ibiyafareu on inboai auriu innat ; ato ra kanfounai on Yau arimon anbobaimisirai men inyawas .
43006045	Aubairuruotis dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ God arimon sabu engon tutufin inibebeyes . ’ Iyai iyafan Tamau aurin tainan erereben a On emon esasagob on auriu innat .
43006046	Yau abikakafun au , omi men iyafan tani Tamau matanai it ab Iyafan God emon i’nat On ekesin mom Tamau it .
43006047	Yau awurem dura bag : iyai iyafan ebitutum on yawas mama wantoanin inboai .
43006048	Yau on rafi sarar yayawasin .
43006049	Omi wawam agirim on bayu manna on efan koiteterinai nan siyam baise osi sirabob .
43006050	Baise rafi sarar ato safam emon isur on magin tani , ato iyai iyafan on i’nanin on men inarab .
43006051	Yau on rafi sarar yayawasin on safam emon isur . Iyai iyafan on rafi sarar i’nan on wantoan inama . Rafi sarar ato anbibitai on Yau biou on abitai , onai sabu tafanamai semama on yawas sinboai . ”
43006052	Jew yangan sibosuruf tous amosi yatatabai sigagam bonen . Osi sibitetem si’yau , “ Mamaba mes atonio Orot Toun bion on initet tanan mes i ? ”
43006053	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : omi men Orot Natun bion wonanin a an tara wontotoman , on men arimon toum amomui yawas wonboai on .
43006054	Iyai iyafan Yau biou inan a au tara intoman on yawas mama wantoanin inboai , ato ra kanfounai on anbobaimisirai men inyawas .
43006055	Yabin Yau biou on bayu maiauin ; Yau au tara on sareu maiauin .
43006056	Iyai iyafan Yau biou i’nan a au tara intoman on Yau amoui inama ato Yau on amonai anama .
43006057	Tamau Yayawasin Iyafareu yabin On emon on Yau mat ifouriu amama . On eta kaitamomai , iyai iyafan Yau inaniu on anfourai inama .
43006058	Atonio rafi sarar on safam emon isur ; atonio rafi sarar on men ato wawam agirim siyanin ba on , ato gibui sirabob . Iyafan atonio rafi sarar inanin on arimon wantoan inama . ”
43006059	Iesu Capernaum mafam gagaminai nan bayoi goa amonai sabu ibibebeyes on atonio dura ikakafun .
43006060	On an baigibubunuotis sigaraba atonio dura sitatam ato siyau , “ Atonio baibebe on iwani kwakwan . Iyafan On an dura intatam mes i ? ”
43006061	Iesu on men sikasonai baise On isagob osi atonio dura aurin on sigagamois , on mes On osi auris iyau , “ Omi atonio baibebe iyamem on ami baitutum ifeu i ?
43006062	Omi arimon Orot Natun wotitai itmatabir men itag itan ato an efan menan ainau imama on nan itgat on , omi arimon mamaba wotnos i ?
43006063	God an Ayu on yawas ebitem , sabu tous on men fofonin atonio bobo sinafour on . Dura ato awurem on God an Ayu — an yawas ebitem .
43006064	Baise omi sabu fani on men wobitutum . ” ( Iesu anai bag on isagob nono , sabu iyabon on men sinitutumai ato iyafan on inkaseirai . )
43006065	Ato On an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Atonio yabinai on awurem , Tamau on aurin inibasitai on fofonin innat au baigibubunuotin inmatar . ”
43006066	On yabinai Iesu an baigibubunuotis sigaraba on sikirir simatabir , men fofonin On mat nana sitabib on .
43006067	On mes Iesu on an baiyoyobotis auyotoat sasagis ruam on auris iyau , “ Ato omi mat - wogogoi wonan i ? ”
43006068	Simon Peter iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , wei on iyafan aurin wanan ? Om am dura on yawas mama wantoanin initei .
43006069	Wei ari on wabitutum a wasagob Om on Kakafotim , God emon unat . ”
43006070	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi sabu auyotoat sasagis ruam on Yau arubinem au baigibubunuotim mes . Baise omi sanamui tani on afaguban ! ”
43006071	On min Judas , Simon Iscariot natun aurin on ibikakafun . Yabin Judas on baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis ruam on tani , ato on arimon Iesu inkaseirai .
43007001	On gibunai , Iesu on Galilee tafanam amonai ibib ; On men igogoi Judea tafanam amonai itabib yabin Jew babadis nan on si’gogoi sitasubun mes .
43007002	Jew yangan asi Guwi An Forag an ra ibiufin ,
43007003	on mes Iesu taitain on On aurin siyau , “ Om atonio efan on unikirir ato unan au Judea tafanamai nan onai Om am bobo efofour on am baigibubunuotis min sinitem .
43007004	Iyai iyafan egogoi an bobo wasai inafour sabu sinitai on , on bobo men bubuniai inafour mes . Om atonio osi bobo efofour nono on , uniyamai sabu engon tutufin tafanamai sinsagobim . ”
43007005	( On taitain mat on men meyan situtumai on . )
43007006	Iesu on osi auris iyau , “ Yau au wera bag on men inat on . Wera fufur on engon omi ami wera wat .
43007007	Sabu tafanamai on men omi sinisisiweiim on , baise osi Yau sebisisiweiiu , yabin Yau nana awures osi asi eta mamaba sefofour on komasin .
43007008	Omi wonan forag aurin . Yau on men anan atonio forag aurin on yabin Yau au wera bag on men inat auriu on . ”
43007009	On atonio dura ikakafun ato On ra fani nana Galilee tafanamai ima .
43007010	On taitain sinai forag aurin weie Iesu on gibui inai , baise On men rerebai inai on , ab On bubuniai inai .
43007011	Jew babadis on forag amonai on On sinunuen . Osi sitetem siyau , “ On menan nan i ? ”
43007012	Sabu sigaraba kuayo gagamin amonai nan on tous wat sibidurusof bonen . Sabu fani on si’yau , “ On Orot obin , ” ato sabu fani on si’yau , “ Ambin , ” ato sabu fani on si’yau , “ On sabu ekukuyoyois . ”
43007013	Baise men iyafan tani On aurin on dura wasai ikakafun mes yabin osi on Jew babadis auris siber .
43007014	Forag inai ibabasun , ato on amonai on Iesu inai au tafaror goa nan ibosuruf sabu ibibebeyis .
43007015	Jew babadis on men sunub siduduran ato siyau , “ Atonio Orot on men inai igayam on , ato On mamaba mes isagob kwakwan i ? ”
43007016	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau aifan abibebe on men Yau Tou au baibebe on , baise God emon enat , On Yau ibiyafareu on .
43007017	Iyai iyafan egogoi God angogoi nanaba infofour on , arimon insagob Yau atonio abibebe on God emon enat o Yau Tou au baibadai nan dura abikakafun .
43007018	Iyai iyafan toun an baibadai dura ebikakafun on efofourtobon toun wabin inbogaiai aurin . Baise on iyafan egogoi ato Iyafan ibiyafarai On Wabin inbogagaiai on , on orot aurin on dura maiauin , on aurin on men baisigo tani yen mes .
43007019	Moses on dura bag Baifafaro dura item . Baise omi men iyafan tani Baifafaro dura aurin ifonabo on . Omi aibo mes wofofourtobon Yau wonasubuniu mes i ? ”
43007020	Sabu kuayo gagamin on On siyafotai siyau , “ Om dau tefamui emama ! Iyafan efofourtobon Om inasubunim mes i ? ”
43007021	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau bobo buburin gagamin kaitamom afour on , ato omi engon tutufin woiduduran .
43007022	Yabin Moses on askibubu an baifafaro item nanatum orot wotiaskibubues mes ( ato on men Moses askibubu item on , baise omi wawam agirim on sibosuruf ) , on mes omi on fifi Sabat ra nan wobiaskibubuai .
43007023	Omi fifi Sabat ra nan wobiaskibubuai onai omi on men Moses an Baifafaro dura wastob on , ato omi on aibo mes Yau auriu wobiyatatab , yabin Yau orot Sabat ra nan aiyawasai on fasinai i ?
43007024	Omi men sawar an itinai nan wonitai wonigurubabanai mes , baise omi yawas totorinai nan wonigurubabanen . ”
43007025	Sabu fani Jerusalem simama on siyau , “ Atonio Orot on babadis sefofourtobon sinasubun mes .
43007026	Woit ! On wasai nan dura ebikakafun ato osi men On an dura tani sebigaraminai on ! Omi wononosin babadis on dura bag sisagob On min Keriso i ?
43007027	Baise Keriso innanat on men iyafan tani arimon insagob On men emon inat . Ato ot engon tasagob atonio Orot on men emon inat . ”
43007028	Iesu on nana tafaror goa amonai sabu ibibebeyes ato fonan gagaminai iyau , “ Omi min dura bag Yau wosagobiu a omi wosagob Yau on men emon anat i ? Baise Yau men Tou au baibadai anat on . Baise On Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on dura maiauin . Omi On men wosagobai on ,
