43007029	baise Yau On asagobai , yabin Yau On emon anat a On Yau iyafareu . ”
43007030	Namon osi sifourtobon sitfatumai mes baise men iyafan tani iman On usinai iyein , yabin On an rabob an wera on men inat on .
43007031	Baise sabu sigaraba kuayo amonai on On situtumai ato siyau , “ Keriso innanat on arimon bobo buburis sigaraba infouren , men atonio Orot bobo ifofouren ba ? ”
43007032	Pharisee yangan on sitatam sabu kuayo on atonio osi bobo auris on Iesu aurin sibidurusof , on mes osi Pharisee yangan a priest aiwabis on sabu tafanam an baifafaro kaifarotis siyafares sinai On sitfatumai mes .
43007033	Iesu iyau , “ Yau arimon kafakakai weromin mat tanama ato iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on aurin anan .
43007034	Omi arimon Yau wonnueniu baise omi arimon men wongatureu on , yabin Yau on efanai anmama nan on omi men fofonim wonnat on . ”
43007035	Jew babadis tous amosi siyau bonen , “ On efan menan inan on ot men tangaturai i ? On arimon inan Greek mafam gagamis ato Jew sabu semama nan , ato nan Greek yangan inibebeyes i ?
43007036	On ebikakafun yau , ot arimon On tannuen , ato men tangaturai on a On efan menan enan on ot men fofonit tanan on . On an dura yabis on abifan i ? ”
43007037	Forag ra an kanfoun on ra gagamin bag , on ra nan on Iesu imisir ato fonan gagaminai iyau , “ Iyai iyafan anjon sareu eteteinin on innat Yau auriu ato sareu intoman .
43007038	God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ Iyai iyafan Yau ebitutumeu on , sareu dogu emon egeg yawas ebitem on arimon on nunuanai indebur insur . ’ ”
43007039	Iesu atonio dura ibikakafun on God an Ayu aurin ikakafun , osi sabu iyabon On sinbitutumai on arimon God an Ayu sinboai . On an werai on Ayu on men sitem on , yabin Iesu on men imatabir men igai au safam sifourai inat God ba imatar on .
43007040	Sabu sigaraba on kuayo amonai On an dura ibikakafun sitatam ato siyau , “ Atonio Orot on dura bag aubairuruotin ! ”
43007041	Sabu fani siyau , “ On on Keriso ! ” Baise sabu fani siyau , “ Keriso on men Galilee tafanam emon innat on !
43007042	God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , Keriso on arimon aiwab David an warar emon innat ato arimon Bethlehem nan inarat , mafam gagamin menan David imama nan . ”
43007043	Iesu fasinai on mes sabu kuayo sanasi on kuseseb imatar .
43007044	Sabu fani on sigogoi Iesu sitfatumai mes baise men iyafan tani iman On usinai iyein on .
43007045	Tafanam an baifafaro kaifarotis simatabir men sinai ato priest aiwabis a Pharisee yangan on sitetemis siyau , “ Omi aibo mes On men wobo wonat i ? ”
43007046	Tafanam an baifafaro kaifarotis on siyau , “ Atonio Orot dura ibikakafun on men iyafan tani ainau dura ibikakafun ba ! ”
43007047	Pharisee yangan on sitetemis siyau , “ On totor omi mat isigoem ?
43007048	Omi min wosagob babadis tani o Pharisee tani on itutumai i ?
43007049	Atonio osi sabu kuayo on Moses an Baifafaro dura on men sisagob , on mes osi on God inaudabis ! ”
43007050	Pharisee tani nan imama wabin Nicodemus ; on orot on ainau inai Iesu aurin . On osi babadis fani auris iyau ,
43007051	“ Ot ati baifafaro dura iyau nanaba Orot men tanimakiai on , ab ainau an dura tantatam a tansagob On abi bobo ifour . ”
43007052	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Om mat min Galilee tafanam emon unat i ? God an dura buk amonai sigayam on eiyab ato om arimon unsagob on , men aubairuruotin tani on Galilee tafanam emon inat on . ”
43007053	( Namon osi engon sinai au go . )
43008001	[ Namon sabu engon sinai au go baise Iesu on inai au Olive Oyauai nan .
43008002	Ra itom fomenei On imatabir men inai au tafaror goa . Sabu kuayo gagamin engon siruayo On sikufifinai ato On imair ibosuruf sabu ibibebeyes .
43008003	Baifafaro an baibebeotis a Pharisee yangan on jever ibireg nan on sibo sirui sabu engon tutufin nasi nan sitawarai .
43008004	Osi Iesu aurin siyau , “ Baibebeotim , atonio jever ibireg nan on ra kaita sigaturai .
43008005	Ot ati baifafaro dura Moses itet on jever atonio bobo nanaba infofour on agimai tanasubun . Ato Om arimon mamaba unau i ? ”
43008006	Osi atonio dura siyau on nan Iesu sitrutobonai onai On dura mamaba i’tau on sitiubarai mes . Baise Iesu on ikwafir motobai nan imanai ibigagayam .
43008007	Osi sabu on nan nana sitawar sibitetemai , ato On koun itotorai imair ato auris iyau , “ Omi iyafan tani nan men ibokomas on , agim ainau inboai jever aurin inreben . ”
43008008	Namon On ikwafir men motobai ibigagayam .
43008009	Osi atonio dura sitatam mom on kakaita kakaita si’nan , sabu kawian on ainau sinai . Iesu on nan ekesin sikirir imair imama ato jever mat nan nana itatawar .
43008010	On koun itotorai ato jever aurin iyau , “ Jever , sabu menan sinai i ? Osi men iyafan tani emama arimon inimakiem ? ”
43008011	Jever iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , ambin , men iyafan tani . ” Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Basit , Yau mat men animakiem on . Om unan baise men unbokomas men . ” ]
43008012	Iesu on sabu auris ikakafun men iyau , “ Yau on tafanam an tafa . Iyai iyafan Yau inigibubunueu on arimon yawas an tafa inboai ato on arimon men womanai inabib on . ”
43008013	Pharisee yangan on On aurin siyau , “ Om Toum aurim on ebikakafun ; ato Om dura aifan ubikakafun on men an yabin tani auman on . ”
43008014	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Ambin , basit Yau Tou auriu on dura abikakafun , ato dura aifan abikakafun on dura maiauin yabin Yau asagob on men emon anat a Yau asagob on menan a’nan . Omi men wosagob Yau men emon ne anat o Yau menan anan .
43008015	Omi on usit maiauin an etaiai nan wobigurubaban ; ato Yau men iyafan tani abigurubabanai on .
43008016	Baise Yau atbigurubaban on , arimon au baigurubaban on dura maiauin , yabin Yau men ekesiu atonio bobo atafour on . Tamau ato On Yau ibiyafareu on bisiwui .
43008017	Omi ami baifafaro dura sigayam siyau , on sabu ruam sinibasit on dura aifan sebikakafun on dura bag .
43008018	Yau Tou auriu dura abikakafun ato Tamau On Yau ibiyafareu on mat Yau auriu on dura ebikakafun . ”
43008019	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Om Tamam min menan nan i ? ” Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi on Yau men wosagobiu a Tamau mat men wosagobai . Omi Yau wotsagobiu mes on arimon Tamau mat wotsagobai . ”
43008020	Iesu tafaror goa amonai siwar an didiwag an efan menan i’yen on nan sabu ibibebeyes on atonio osi dura engon auris on ikakafunen . Sabu men iyafan tani On itfatumai yabin On an rabob wera on men inat .
43008021	Iesu osi auris iyau men , “ Yau arimon anan ; ato omi arimon Yau wonnueniu ; baise omi arimon ami bokomas auman wonarab . Yau a’nan nan on omi men fofonim nan wonan on . ”
43008022	On mes Jew babadis siyau , “ On iyau , On enan nan on ot men fofonin nan tanan on . On dura ebikakafun yau on arimon Toun inasubun bait ? ”
43008023	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi on atonio tafanam tamama on emon wonat , baise Yau on aiyetun emon anat . Omi on atonio tafanam emon wonat baise Yau on men atonio tafanam emon anat on .
43008024	On fasinai Yau awurem au , omi arimon ami bokomas auman wonarab . Ato omi men wonbitutum , ‘ Yau Orot Tou , omi arimon ami bokomas auman wonarab wonan . ’ ”
43008025	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Om on iyafan i ? ” Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau on Orot Tou on nanaba on anai bag min awurem nono .
43008026	Yau on bobo sigaraba auris on omi aurim anikakafun a bobo sigaraba auris on anigurubabanim . Baise , ato Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on dura maiauin , ato dura aifan On emon atatam on wat on sabu tafanamai auris dura abikakafun . ”
43008027	Osi men sisagob Iesu on Taman aurin on osi auris dura ibikakafun .
43008028	On mes Iesu on osi auris iyau , “ Omi Orot Natun wonbogai nabai wondudun on arimon wonsagob on , ‘ Yau Orot Tou ’ ; namon omi wonsagob Yau men Tou au baibadai nan bobo afofour on , baise Tamau dura aifan auriu ebibebeyiu on nanaba wat aurim abikakafun .
43008029	Ato On Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on bisiwui ; On men ikirireu ekesiu on yabin Yau ra fufur bobo obinai wat afofour on abiyasisirai . ”
43008030	Sabu sigaraba osi Iesu sitatamai bobo sigaraba auris ibikakafun on engon tutufin situtumai .
43008031	On mes Iesu on Jew sabu On sibitutumai on auris iyau , “ Omi Yau au baibebe aurin wonifonabo on omi dura bag wonnat Yau au baigibubunuotim wonmatar ;
43008032	Omi arimon dura maiauin wonsagob ato dura maiauin on arimon inrufanim . ”
43008033	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei on Abraham wawan agirin ato wei on men iyafan tani wabiagirai on . ” Om atonio dura ukakafun uyau , ‘ Omi arimon sinrufanim , ’ on an yabin on aifan i ? ”
43008034	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : omi sabu engon tutufin iyafan ebokomas on , on min bokomas aurin ebiagir .
43008035	Agirotin on men nana wantoan orot awan nanatun mat goai sinama on , baise Natun on osi ininoanis nana inama au wantoan au wantoan .
43008036	Ato God Natun omi inrufanim on , omi arimon dura bag aunam aunam worufanim .
43008037	Yau asagob omi on Abraham wawan agirin . Baise omi nana wofofourtobon wonasubuniu mes yabin Yau au baibebe on men fofonin wonboai on .
43008038	Yau Tamau aifan ibiyoboeu aitai on aurim abikakafun baise omi tamam mamaba ikakasonem on nanaba wofofour . ”
43008039	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei tamai on Abraham . ” Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi on dura bag Abraham nanatun mes on , bobo aifan ifofour on nanaba on wotafour .
43008040	Bobo aifan afofour on dura maiauin God emon atatam on engon tutufin akasonem . Baise omi on nana wofofourtobon Yau wonasubuniu mes . Abraham on men bobo atonio nanaba ifour on .
43008041	Omi tamam bobo mamaba ifofour on nanaba wofofour . ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wei men gabur fifirig ato Om ba on ; God ekesin mom on dura bag wei Tamai , ato wei on dura bag On nanatun . ”
43008042	Iesu on osi auris iyau , “ Omi dura bag Tamam God mes on , omi Yau wotinuaboiu yabin Yau on God emon anat ato Yau on ari atonio . Yau men Tou au baibadai anat on , baise On Yau iyafareu anat .
43008043	Omi aibo mes men wosagob dura aifan abikakafun on i ? Yabin omi men wogogoi au dura wontatam .
43008044	Omi tamam on Afaguban ato omi on , on nanatun , a omi tamam an gogoi nanaba on wobigibubunuai . Ainau anai bag on , on sabu iyasububunues ato on men dura maiauin aurin etatawar on yabin on aurin dura maiauin on men yen on . On dura ebisigogo on an yawas mamaba aurin yen , on nanaba on efofour yabin on baisigogo’otin a on on baisigogo engon tamas .
43008045	Baise Yau dura bag awurem on mes omi men Yau wobitutumeu on .
43008046	Omi iyafan tani isagob Yau on bokomas afour i ? Yau dura bag anawurem mes on , omi aibo mes men woitutumeu ?
43008047	On Iyafan God emon i’nat on God an dura etatam . Baise omi on men God emon on , on mes omi arimon men dura wontatam on . ”
43008048	Jew yangan on Iesu siyafotai siyau , “ Wei on basit wau , Om on Samaria Orot a Om on dau tefamui emama . ”
43008049	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau men dau tefaui emama on , Yau on Tamau abifain abogagaiai baise omi on Yau woyeyeireu .
43008050	Yau on men afofourtobon Tou anifaiu anbogagaiiu mes on . Baise Orot tani on egogoi Yau inifaiu inbogagaiiu mes a On arimon obinai wat inibasiteu .
43008051	Yau awurem dura bag : iyai iyafan Yau au dura aurin ebifonabo on arimon men inarab . ”
43008052	Jew yangan On aurin siyau , “ Wei ari weie wasagob dura bag Om on dau tefamui emama ! Abraham irabob a aubairuruotis sirabob , baise Om ebikakafun yau on , iyai iyafan Om am dura aurin inbifonabo on arimon men meyan inarab .
43008053	Ot tamat Abraham on irabob ; ato Om ebikakafun on Om on gagamim bag men Abraham ba i ? Aubairuruotis mat sirabob . Ato Om on Iyafan i ? ”
43008054	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau Tou atbifaiu atbogagaiiu on ato on baifaiu bogagaiu amonai on yabin wagan wat . On Iyafan Yau ebifaiu ebogagaiiu , On Yau Tamau — On Orot kaitamom aurin wobikakafun min omi ami God .
43008055	Omi on men meyan On wosagobai baise Yau On asagobai . Yau ari anau Yau On men asagobai on ato Yau on baisigo’otiu omi ba . Baise Yau On asagobai ato Yau On an dura aurin abifonabo .
43008056	Omi tamam Abraham on iyasisir kwakwan ato au wera innat ititai aurin on ; ato au ra inat it on iyasisir . ”
43008057	Jew yangan On aurin siyau , “ Om on men meyan am kwanda orot ruam auyotoat ibo mes — ato Om on Abraham matamui ut ? ”
43008058	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : ‘ Yau Tou on amama weie Abraham irat . ’ ”
43008059	Namon osi agim sibogagaien On aurin sitrebenen mes ; baise Iesu iyob mom tafaror goa ikirir igat inai .
43009001	Iesu on nana ibib i’nan ato On iyeit orot matan fotin auman irat on it .
43009002	On an baigibubunuotis on sitetemai siyau , “ Baibebeotim , iyafan an bokomas emon iyamai on matan fotin auman irat i ? On toun an bokomas emon o ayon taman asi bokomas emon ? ”
43009003	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ On matan ifofot on men toun an bokomas emon o ayon taman asi bokomas emon . On matan ifot onai God an faiwar on orot usinai inbobo on sabu sinitai .
43009004	Rai wat on ato Iyafan ibiyafareu on an bobo on nana tanabo ; ato awa efofom on men iyafan tani bobo inabo on .
43009005	Yau nin tafanamai amama on Yau on tafanam an tafa . ”
43009006	On atonio dura iyau gibunai Iesu motobai ikan ato kanuai nan motob iyamai teteu imatar ato teteu ibo nan orot matan igos ,
43009007	ato iyawur iyau , “ Om enai Siloam una sareuai nan magim unsou . ” ( Atonio wab Siloam an yabin min , “ Siyafarai inai . ” ) On mes orot inai magin isou , ato matan iyeit auman imatabir men inat .
43009008	On tuturan a sabu on ainau sit sabu auris i’kafefeyan ato osi tous wat sibitetem bonen si’yau , “ Atonio orot kaitamom min on imair sabu auris i’kafefeyan i ? ”
43009009	Sabu fani siyau , “ On orot are , ” baise sabu fani siyau , “ Ambin men on , ato atonio orot an itin min on ba . ” On mes orot toun iyau , “ Yau orot min atonio . ”
43009010	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Om mamaba ufour ato matam uyeit i ? ”
43009011	On iyafotes iyau , “ Orot Wabin seyoyorai Iesu on motob iyamai teteu imatar ato mataui igos , ato iyawureu atan Siloam nan magiu atsou . On mes Yau anai ato magiu asou mom on , yau matau iyeit . ”
43009012	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ On Orot min menan nan i ? ” On iyafotes iyau , “ Yau men asagob . ”
43009013	Namon osi orot matan fotin on sibo sinai Pharisee yangan auris .
43009014	Ato on ra ato Iesu motob iyamai teteu imatar nan orot matan ibiyawasai min Sabat an ra nan .
43009015	Pharisee yangan on orot sitetemai men , mamaba matan iyeit aurin on . On iyawures iyau , “ On teteu ibo mataui iyein weie magiu asou , ato ari matau ait . ”
43009016	Pharisee yangan fani siyau , “ Orot atonio bobo ifofour on men God emon on , yabin On Sabat an baifafaro aurin on men ifonabo on . ” Baise sabu fani on siyau , “ Orot bokomasotin on mamaba mes atonio osi bobo buburis on inafour i ? ” Ato osi tous wat sanasi on kuseseb imatar .
43009017	On mes Pharisee yangan on ra kaitamom ba orot sitetemai men siyau , “ Om uyau on On om matam fotin on iyawasai , ato om On aurin on mamaba wat unau i ? ” On iyafotes iyau , “ On aubairuruotin . ”
43009018	Baise Jew babadis on men sigogoi sititutum on matan fotin ato ari on matan iyeit , on mes osi on fifi ayon taman siyores
43009019	ato sitetemis siyau , “ Atonio fifi on omi natum i ? Omi wau on matan fotin irat ; ato mamaba mes on ari matan iyeit ? ”
43009020	Fifi ayon taman siyafotes siyau , “ Wei wasagob on fifi on wei natui a wei wasagob on matan fotin irat .
43009021	Baise wei men wasagob on ari mamaba mes matam iyeit o wei men wasagob iyafan on matan iruseren . Omi toum woitetemai ; on orot gagamin , on toun arimon awanai iniyafotem ! ”
43009022	On ayon taman atonio dura sikakafun yabin osi on Jew babadis auris siber , Jew babadis on sibasitai nono iyai iyafan dura inkurereb inau , Iesu on Keriso , on arimon bayoi goa emon sinrukou ingat .
43009023	On fasinai fifi ayon taman siyau , “ Omi toum woitetemai , on orot gagamin ! ”
43009024	Wera bairuin orot matan fotin auman irarat on siyor men inat ato aurin siyau , “ Om God matanai unaumatan on dura bag wat unikakafun ! Wei wasagob atonio Orot ibiyawasim on bokomasotin . ”
43009025	Orot iyafotes iyau , “ Yau men asagob on orot on bokomasotin o ambin . Bobo kaitamom yau asagob on : Yau matau fotin on ari matau iyeit . ”
43009026	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Om matam fotin aurin on abi bobo ifour ? ” On mamaba ifour matam iruseren i ? ”
43009027	On iyafotes iyau , “ Yau ainau akasonem nono , ato omi dura men wotatam on . Omi aibo mes wogogoi dura wontatam men i ? Tait , omi mat on wogogoi On an baigibubunuotim wonmatar bait ? ”
43009028	Osi on orot aurin dura komasis sikakafun ato siyau , “ Om on ato Orot an baigibubunuotin ; baise wei on Moses an baigibubunuoti .
43009029	Wei wasagob God on dura Moses aurin ikakafun ; baise atonio Orot on wei men wasagob On men emon inat ! ”
43009030	Orot iyafotes iyau , “ Yau on abiduduran kwakwan ! Omi men wosagob On men emon inat , baise yau matau fotin on iyamai iyeit !
43009031	Ot tasagob God on men sabu bokomasotis fonas etatam on ; On sabu ato osi iyabon On sekakafai a On an gogoi mamaba sefofour on fonas etatam .
43009032	Tafanam anai bag imamatar on men iyafan tani dura itatam on orot tani matan ifourai iyeit on .
43009033	Atonio Orot on men God emon ittananat on , On men bobo aifan tani nanaba itafour on . ”
43009034	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Om urarat nenei on ari am bokomas on nana yen — ato om efofourtobon wei unibebeyei mes i ? ” Ato osi bayoi goa emon sirukou igat .
43009035	Iesu dura itatam osi on orot sirukou igat . Iesu orot igaturai ato itetemai iyau , “ Om min Orot Natun ebitutumai i ? ”
43009036	Orot iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , ekasoneu On Orot min Iyafan , onai yau On anitutumai ! ”
43009037	Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Om min ainau toum matamui ut nono , ato On min ari rum wobikakafun . ”
43009038	Orot iyau , “ Bada , yau abitutum , ato on Iesu nanai sindan irou . ”
43009039	Iesu iyau , “ Yau anat atonio tafanamai sabu anigurubabanis mes , onai sabu matas fotis on matas sineit a osi iyabon matas seit on matas sinafot . ”
43009040	Pharisee yangan fani on nan atonio dura aifan ibikakafun on sitatam ato sitetemai siyau , “ Om dura ebikakafun on wei mat min matai fotis i ? ”
43009041	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi matam fotis mes on , arimon men wotbokomas ; baise omi wau on matam siyeit , on an yabin min omi ami bokomas on nana sen . ”
43010001	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : Orot iyafan men foro sheep asi goa metewanai erur , baise on goa kounai fafaiai nan ekakayam erur on , on min bainauotin a yakeotin .
43010002	Orot iyafan metewan awanai erur on foro sheep asi kaifarotin .
43010003	Orot metewan an kaifarotin on aurin metewan eruruseren ; ato On an foro sheep wabisi bag eyoyores on , fonan setatam ato ebinetewaris segat .
43010004	On iboes segat mom , On ainau nasi enan ato foro sheep on sebigibubunuai yabin osi On fonan sitatam sisagob .
43010005	Osi men fetag orot tani sinigibubunuai on ; baise osi arimon ato orot nanaba on sinayai kirir yabin osi on orot fonan men sitatam sisagob on . ”
43010006	Iesu atonio dura kawen on auris idudur , baise On dura ibikakafun on osi dura an yabin on men sisagob on .
43010007	On mes Iesu dura ikakafun men iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : Yau on foro sheep an metewan .
43010008	Sabu engon tutufin osi ainau Yau nawui si’nat on bainauotis a yakeotis , baise foro sheep men osi fonas sitatam on .
43010009	Yau on metewan . Iyai iyafan Yau amoui inar on arimon God iniyawasai ; on arimon inar a ingat wayo ingaturen .
43010010	Orot bainauotin enat on foro sheep inbainauis , inasububunues a inikomasis mes . Yau anat onai osi yawas sinboai mes , osi auris on yawas awan inbonu inkadedebur mes .
43010011	“ Yau on foro sheep Kaifarotiu obiu , foro sheep Kaifarotin on egogoi fofonin foro sheep auris on inarab .
43010012	Orot agimai sebibaiyanai ebobo mom on men foro sheep kaifarotin a foro sheep on men on ebinoanai on , on kuke tutuenin innanat initai on foro sheep nan inikirires ato inayai inan ; ato kuke tutuenin on foro sheep inrasis ato osi fetag fetag sintagege .
43010013	Orot agimai sebibaiyanai ebobo mom on inayai inan yabin on asir agimai sebibaiyanai ebobo mom ato on men foro sheep auris iniamari on .
43010014	Yau Tou on foro sheep kaifarotiu obiu . Yau Tamau isagobiu a Yau Tamau asagobai , on eta kaitamomai Yau au foro sheep on asagobis a osi foro sheep on Yau sisagobiu . Ato Yau agogoi fofoniu osi auris anarab .
43010015	
43010016	Foro sheep fani mat Yau ebinoaniu ato osi on men nin foro sheep asi goai on . Yau osi mat anboes annat ; osi arimon Yau fonau sintatam , ato osi arimon sinnat kuayo kaitamom sinmatar ato asi kaifarotin min kaitamom wat .
43010017	“ Tamau on Yau inuaboiu yabin Yau agogoi au yawas ankutetai mes , onai Yau au yawas anboai men .
43010018	Men orot iyafan tani fofonin au yawas inboseir . Yau Tou au gogoi fofoniu on asir ankutetiu mom . Yau au baibad yen au yawas ankutetai , a Yau au baibad yen au yawas anboai men . Atonio dura nanaba on Tamau iyafareu anafour mes . ”
43010019	Atonio duraiai on sabu tous sanasi on kuseseb imatar men .
43010020	Sabu sigaraba on si’yau , “ On dau tefanai emama ! On ikokok ! Omi aibo mes On an dura on wotatamai i ? ”
43010021	Baise sabu fani on si’yau , “ Orot tefanai dau semama on men atonio dura nanaba inikakafun on ! Mamaba mes dau on sabu matas fotis infouris matas sineit i ? ”
43010022	Kwanda an ra ato Jerusalem amonai nan tafaror goa Sikutetai an Ra aurin on sifoforag .
43010023	Iesu on tafaror goa an metewan awan seyoyorai , Solomon an Tebo on nan ibibib ,
43010024	Jew yangan siruayo Iesu sikufifinai mom ato sitetemai siyau , “ Om wera weromin maiau nana men dura ekakasonei on ? Om dura bagai wat unkasonei : Om min Keriso i ? ”
43010025	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Yau ainau awurem nono , baise omi men wogogoi wotitutumeu on . Bobo ato Tamau an baibadai abobo on , ebiyoboem Yau on Iyafan on omi aurim abikakafun ,
43010026	baise omi arimon men wonitutum yabin omi on men Yau au foro sheep on .
43010027	Yau au foro sheep on fonau setatam ; Yau osi asagobis a osi Yau sebigibubunueu .
43010028	Yau yawas mama wantoanin abites ato osi arimon men meyan sinarab a men iyafan tani osi Yau imaui sinabarueu on .
43010029	Yau Tamau on Gagamin bag a Faiwarin men sabu fani ba , On foro sheep ibiteu on men iyafan tani Tamau iman emon inabaruai on .
43010030	Yau Tamau rui on kaitamom wat . ”
43010031	Namon Jew yangan agim sibogagaien men On aurin sitreben mes .
43010032	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Yau Tamau bobo ibiteu on omi namui bobo obis sigaraba maiau afouren ; atonio bobo tani obin aurin on wogogoi agimai wonrabiu i ? ”
43010033	Jew yangan siyafotai men siyau , “ Wei on men Om bobo obis efofour aurin on agimai wanrabim on , baise Om on God ebigigimai on mes ! Om on asir Orot maiauim wat baise Om efofourtobon Toum uniyamem unnat God unmatar ! ”
43010034	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi ami Baifafaro an buk amonai sigayam , God iyau , ‘ Omi on god . ’
43010035	Wei wasagob dura aifan buk amonai sigagayam on dura bag , nana wantoan yen ; ato God osi sabu auris iyores god , sabu ato osi On an dura ibites on .
43010036	Ato Yau auriu on , Tamau on Yau irubineu ato iyafareu anat atonio tafanamai . Ato omi mamaba mes wau on Yau abigigim , yabin Yau aikakafun au , Yau on God Natun ?
43010037	Yau men Tamau angogoi atafour on omi men wotitutumeu on .
43010038	Baise Yau osi bobo afofour on , basit omi men wobitutumeu baise Yau au bobo aurin wat on wotitutumai , onai omi wotsagob Tamau on Yau amomui a Yau on Tamau amonai . ”
43010039	Osi sifourtobon Iesu sitfatumai men mes baise On osi imasi emon isiwan inai .
43010040	Iesu imatabir men inai Jordan Sareu irabon efan menan ainau John sabu ibibapataitois on nan , ato On nan ima .
43010041	Sabu sigaraba maiau sinat aurin . Osi siyau , “ John on men bobo buburis ifouren on , baise on bobo engon tutufin atonio Orot aurin ibikakafun on dura maiauin . ”
43010042	Ato sabu engon tutufin nan on situtumai .
43011001	Orot wabin Lazarus on Bethany nan imama on isawau . Bethany mafam gagaminai nan on Mary tain tuan Martha rus simama .
43011002	( Atonio Mary on ainau fio yanden ninibin on ibo Iesu annai idebur isur ato toun tefanai nan ann isafanen , on jever robun Lazarus on isawau . )
43011003	On rorobun jeverig on dura Iesu aurin siyafar siyau : “ Bada , Om turam am nuabo on isawau . ”
43011004	Iesu on dura itatam mom On iyau , “ Atonio sawau on men iniyamai Lazarus inarab on . Ambin on atonio bobo imatar on God an faiwar inboai ingat sabu sinitai , ato on emon on God Natun arimon faiwar inboai . ”
43011005	Iesu on Martha a tain tuan Mary a Lazarus mat on inuabois .
43011006	Baise Iesu on Lazarus isasawau an dura itatam , ato On efan menan imama on nan nana ra ruam ba ima .
43011007	Namon On an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Ot tanmatabir men tanan au Judea tafanam aurin . ”
43011008	Baigibubunuotis siyafotai siyau , “ Baibebeotim , wera men weromin amonai Jew sabu sigogoi agimai sitrabim ato Om ebinonotim nan unmatabir men unan mes i ? ”
43011009	Iesu iyau , “ Ra kaitamom itom amonai wera auyotoat sasagis ruam nanaba yen . On mes orot rai nan inabib on men arimon ann inrugedan inafeu on yabin on atonio tafanam an ratafinai eitai ebibib on mes .
43011010	Baise on fom amonai ebibib on ann inrugedan inafeu yabin on aurin tafa ambin . ”
43011011	Iesu atonio dura ikakafun ato On nana an dura ibotein iyau , “ Turat Lazarus on yenbubur , baise Yau anan on arimon anibaban inmisir . ”
43011012	Baigibubunuotis siyafotai siyau , “ Bada , on inembubur mes on arimon inyawas men . ”
43011013	Lazarus irabob aurin on Iesu ibikakafun baise baigibubunuotis sinos on asir enbubur maiau aurin ebikakafun bait .
43011014	On mes Iesu on dura totor wat ikasones iyau , “ Lazarus on irabob ,
43011015	baise Yau abiyasisir omi aurim , yabin Yau on men bisinai , onai omi Yau wonitutumeu . Ot tanan Lazarus aurin . ”
43011016	Thomas on ( seyoyorai Sisiru ) on baigibubunuotis tuturan auris iyau , “ Ot engon ati baibebeotin mat tanan , onai ot engon On mat tanarab ! ”
43011017	Iesu inai igat mom , On isagob Lazarus on sigarobai nono ra bat nanaba isawar .
43011018	Bethany inai au Jerusalem on eta men weromin bag kilomita ton nanaba ,
43011019	ato Jew sabu sigaraba on Jerusalem emon sinat Martha a Mary rus sitites sitkubainunubes mes ato tuas orot irarabob aurin on .
43011020	Martha dura itatam Iesu i’nat on , on imisir igat inai On itnefotai mes ; baise Mary on goa amonai ima .
43011021	Martha on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Bada , Om nin utmama on , yau tuau orot on arimon men itarab on !
43011022	Baise yau asagob Om on God aurin unbifefeyan on arimon initem . ”
43011023	Iesu on jever iyawur iyau , “ Om tuam orot on arimon inmisir inyawas men . ”
43011024	Jever iyafotai iyau , “ Yau asagob on arimon ra au kanfoun inmisir inyawas men . ”
43011025	Iesu jever aurin iyau , “ Yau Tou on sabu abobaimisires a sabu yawas abites . Iyai iyafan Yau inbitutumeu on arimon inama basit on irabob min on ;
43011026	ato iyai iyafan yawasin emama a Yau ebitutumeu on arimon men inarab . Om atonio dura aurin min ebitutum i ? ”
43011027	Jever iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , dura bag , Yau abitutum Om on Orot Rurubinin God Natun On inat au tafanam . ”
43011028	Martha atonio dura iyau gibunai on imatabir men inai tain tuan Mary aurin nan sunubai aurin iyor . On iyawur iyau , “ Baibebeotin atonio inat , ato Om aurim ebitetem . ”
43011029	Mary atonio dura itatam on imisir ato gagariwat igat inai itnefotai mes .
43011030	( Iesu on men inat mafamai irui on , baise On on efan menan Martha inenefotai on nan . )
43011031	Jew sabu iyabon Mary mat goa amonai simama sikubainunubai on sit on imisir ato yagiginai nan iyayai igat ato osi on sigibubunuai sigat . Osi sinos on enan au rasi nan inatou bait .
43011032	Mary inai Iesu aurin igat , ato on iyeit On i’tai mom on , nanai sindan irou . On iyau , “ Bada , Om nin utmama on tuau orot arimon men itarab on ! ”
43011033	Iesu on jever it itotou a On it Jew sabu on mat sinat on sitotou ; ato On nunuan amonai wat on men sunub iya komas ato iyababan kwakwan .
43011034	Iesu itetemis iyau , “ On menan nan wogarobai i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Bada , Om enat unitai . ”
43011035	Iesu itou .
43011036	On mes Jew sabu siyau bonen , “ Woit , On orot inuaboai kwakwan on mes ! ”
43011037	Baise sabu fani siyau , “ On Orot matan fotin ifourai matan iyeit . Ato On aibo mes men bobo aifan tani ifour itiyamai Lazarus on men itarab mes ? ”
43011038	Iesu nunuanai on men sunub iyababan men , ato On inai au rasi , on rasi min oyau anai bag nan dogu sisar , ato agimai nan on dogu awan siyafotai .
43011039	Iesu dura wawaninai sabu iyawures iyau , “ Agim woboseir ! ” Orot rabobin robun Martha on iyafotai iyau , “ Baise Bada , on sigarobai i’yen on ra bat isawar , ato yanden on arimon inkomas kwakwan ! ”
43011040	Iesu on jever aurin iyau , “ Om min awurem nono , om unbitutum on arimon God an faiwar on unitai . ”
43011041	Osi agim siboseir . Iesu au safam itage ato iyau , “ Tamau , abikakaiwim Om Yau fonau utatam .
43011042	Yau asagob Om ra fufur fonau etatam , baise sabu atonio nin auris on mes atonio dura abikakafun , onai osi sinitutum on Om Yau uiyafareu . ”
43011043	Iesu atonio dura iyau isawar gibunai On fonan gagaminai iyor iyau , “ Lazarus , om emisir egat ! ”
43011044	Lazarus on ire goru auman imisir igat , on ann a iman on rasi an beberai sikikimanai a on magin on eb beberai sikikimanai . Iesu sabu iyawures iyau , “ On usinai beber worufanen , ato wonikirir inabib inan . ”
43011045	Jew sabu sigaraba sinat Mary sifafasiuai on sit Iesu bobo aifan ifofour on , ato osi On situtumai .
43011046	Baise sabu fani on simatabir sirui Pharisee yangan auris ato sikasones bobo aifan Iesu ifofour on .
43011047	On mes Pharisee yangan a priest aiwabis on Jew babadis Rurubinis on mat sinat siruayo kuayo kaitamom imatar ato siyau , “ Ot aifan taniyamai i ? Woit , Orot bobo buburis engon efofour on !
43011048	Ot ato nanaba tanikirir bobo buburis nana inafour innanan on , arimon sabu engon tutufin On sinitutumai a Rome yangan asi babadis on arimon sinnat ati tafaror goa a ati tafanam engon tutufin sinikomasen ! ”
43011049	Orot tani wabin Caiaphas , on kwanda amonai on sikutetai Priest Ainauin imama on iyau , “ Omi not men aifan tani wosagob on !
43011050	Iyobin Orot kaitamom wonboai inarab sabu auris , men sabu engon tutufin sinikomasis mes , baise omi bobo atonio on men wosagob ! ”
43011051	Baise Caiaphas on men toun an notai on dura ikakafun on ; ab on kwanda on Priest Ainauin imama ato on God an dura on aurin ibo igat ibikakafun on Iesu inarab Jew yangan auris ,
43011052	ato men osi ekesis wat auris , baise God an sabu engon fetag fetag sitagege semama on mat inboes sinnat sinikaita kuayo kaitamom sinmatar .
43011053	On ra nan on Jew babadis asi bainonot siyamai Iesu sitasubun mes .
43011054	On mes Iesu on men wasai nan Judea tafanam amonai ibib on , baise On efan ikirir ato inai efan koiteterin bisinai nan , On inai mafam gagamin wabin Ephraim on nan an baigibubunuotis mat sima .
43011055	Jew yangan asi Baisobon An Forag an Ra ibiufin ato sabu sigaraba on tafanam ta ta emon sigai au Jerusalem nan tous sitiyames God matanai sitgumidar weie Forag itbosuruf .
43011056	Osi nan Iesu sinunuen , ato osi nan tafaror goai siruayo ato tous wat sibitetem bonen siyau , “ Omi mamaba wononosin i ? Dura bag On men arimon innat forag aurin on ! ”
43011057	Priest aiwabis a Pharisee yangan on dura wawaninai sabu siyawures on , iyafan insasagob Iesu menan nan on , wonkasonei wansagob ato osi On sifatumai .
43012001	Ra nimtereban kaita si’yen on nanai on Baisobon an ra itgat , Iesu on inai au bethany , menan Lazarus imama nan , on orot on Iesu rabob emon ibobaimisirai .
43012002	Osi on rabirabi an bayu on nan Iesu aurin sibotitiwag , ato Martha on ibaisis bayu iteteb ; Lazarus on osi sabu mat sanasi imair Iesu mat kemai bayu si’yam .
43012003	Namon Mary on fio yanden ninibin an baiyan gagamin on kibub auman ibo inat ato Iesu annai idebur isur ato toun tefanai on ann isafanen . Fio yanden ininib on goa amon engon ibonu .
43012004	Iesu an baigibubunuotin tani wabin Judas Iscariot — on min Iesu itkaseirai mes — on iyau ,
43012005	“ Om aibo mes atonio fio yanden ninibin an baiyan 300 kina nanaba on men sabu auris uttobon ato agim utboai sabu kokoianis utites i ? ”
43012006	On atonio dura ikakafun on men sabu kokoianis kaifares aurin on , baise on toun on bainauotin . On orot on baibad sitai agim an kukufet ikakaifarai auman iboai ibibib , ato agim turin ibabainau auman .
43012007	Baise Iesu iyau , “ Jever eikirir mom ! Bobo aifan ifofour on innonosin ato au garob an ra ingat .
43012008	Omi arimon ra fufur sabu kokoianis mat wonama baise omi men ra fufur Yau mat tanama on . ”
43012009	Sabu kuayo gagamin dura sitatam Iesu on Bethany nan , on mes osi sinai nan , osi men sinai Iesu wat aurin on , baise Lazarus mat sititai , ato Iesu rabob emon ibobaimisirai on .
43012010	On mes priest aiwabis asi bainonot on sidudurai Lazarus mat sitasubun mes ,
43012011	yabin atonio bobo Lazarus aurin imamatar emon on Jew yangan on osi Jew babadis sibisisiweiis ato Iesu on sibitutumai .
43012012	Ra itom sabu kuayo gagamin on sinat Baisobon an Forag aurin on nan dura sitatam on Iesu enat au Jerusalem .
43012013	On mes osi yafi rorous siyaburutoben sigat sinai Iesu sitnefotai mes , osi sibiyoku si’yau , “ God tanifain ! God On inimomoginai on Bada Wabinai enat ! God on Israel yangan asi Aiwab inimomoginai ! ”
43012014	Iesu foro donkey igaturai ato tefanai igai imair ato God an dura buk amonai sigayam si’yau ba ,
43012015	“ Zion mafam gagamin , omi men wonaber mes ! Omi ami Aiwab on atonio foro donkey boboun tefanai igai imair enat . ”
43012016	On an baigibubunuotis on atonio bobo aurin on ainau men sisagob ; baise on an rai God on Iesu rabob emon ibobaimisirai iAiwabai weie , osi on nan sinos On aurin on God an dura buk amonai sigayam ato osi atonio bobo On aurin sifour .
43012017	Sabu kuayo on Iesu mat nan an rai on Lazarus rabob emon ibobaimisirai ato iyawur rasi emon ibib igat , ato bobo aifan imamatar aurin on sabu sikasones .
43012018	On fasinai sabu kuayo on sinai Iesu sinefotai — yabin osi dura sitatam On atonio bobo buburin faiwarin ifour .
43012019	Pharisee yangan on tous wat siyau bonen , “ Omi woit , ot bobo tafofour wat men fofonin tanyafotai on ! Woit , sabu tafanam au engon tutufin on On sebigibubunuai ! ”
43012020	Sabu fani on si’nan au Jerusalem on Greek sabu fani on amosi on mat sinai Jew yangan asi Forag an rai sitkwafir mes , on mat nan .
43012021	Osi sinai Philip aurin ( on min Bethsaida mafam gagamin Galilee tafanam emon ) ato siyau , “ Bada , wei wagogoi Iesu wanitai . ”
43012022	Philip on inai Andrew iyawur , ato osi rus sinai Iesu sikasonai .
43012023	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Wera ari inat on sabu engon tutufin sinsagob Orot Natun on God ba .
43012024	Yau awurem dura bag : Sawareg inafeu motobai ato inafim , on arimon sawareg uwas sigaraba sinou . Ato sawareg men inafim on arimon kaitamom nana inen .
43012025	Iyai iyafan toun an yawas ebinuaboai on arimon inisiwanai ; iyai iyafan atonio nin tafanamai toun an yawas ebisisiweiai on arimon yawas mama wantoanin inbotan .
43012026	Iyai iyafan egogoi Yau iniagireu on Yau inigibubunueu , onai Yau menan nan annanan on arimon au agirotin rui wanan . Ato iyafan Yau inbiagireu on Tamau arimon inifain . ”
43012027	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Ari on Yau nunuau ebiyababan — ato Yau abi dura anau ? Yau anau , ‘ Tamau , men atonio wera unikirir innat auriu mes ’ ? Baise Yau on fasinai anat — onai Yau atonio werai on anikokosariu mes .
43012028	Tamau , Om Wabim duram gagamin on ebo egat sabu eiyoboes ! ” Namon fonan safam emon ikakafun iyau , “ Yau Tou Wabiu durau gagamin on abo agat , ato Yau on arimon bobo anafour men . ”
43012029	Sabu kuayo gagamin nan sitatawar on fonan sitatam ato sabu fani siyau , “ Wanferer irab . ” Ato sabu fani siyau , “ Anea aurin ikakafun ! ”
43012030	Baise Iesu on osi auris iyau , “ Atonio fonan ibikakafun on men Yau auriu on , baise omi aurim on ikakafun .
43012031	Ari wera on God tafanam inigurubabanai ; ato on arimon atonio tafanam an bainetewarotin on ari inreberirai insur .
43012032	Yau atonio tafanam emon sinbogaiiu anag nabai anarab on , Yau arimon sabu engon tutufin anboes sinnat auriu . ”
43012033	( Iesu atonio dura ikakafun on ebiyoboet an rabob mamaba inboboai aurin on . )
43012034	Sabu kuayo gagamin on siyafotai siyau , “ Ot ati Baifafaro dura ikasonet on Orot Rurubinin on arimon inama au wantoan . Ato Om mamaba uyau on Orot Natun on sinbogaiai inag nabai inarab ? Ato atonio Orot Natun on Iyafan i ? ”
43012035	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Tafa on men weromin arimon omi sanamui inen on . Tafa bisimui yen on nana wonabib wonnanan , onai wouman on men intaragabuem mes ; iyafan ato woumanai ibib enan on men isagob menan nan ibib enan .
43012036	Tafa bisimui yen on On wonitutumai onai omi on arimon tafa an sabu wonmatar . ” Iesu ato dura iyau gibunai on , osi sabu ikirires inai mabinai nan iyob .
43012037	Basit Iesu on atonio osi bobo buburis engon osi sabu nasi ifouren min on , baise osi On men situtumai on ,
43012038	onai aubairuruotin Isaiah dura aifan i’yau on inat idura bag : On iyau , “ Bada , wei dura wabikakafun on iyafan intatam initutum ? Sabu iyabon auris on Bada an faiwar rerebai ibo igat iyoboes i ? ”
43012039	On yabinai osi engon tutufin men fofonin sititutum yabin Isaiah mat iyau ,
43012040	“ God on osi matas ibofofoten a nunuas irufofoten onai osi men matas siteit men , a osi nunuas on men fofonin sitsagob . God iyau , osi men fofonin Yau auriu sinrutabir aniyawasis on . ”
43012041	Isaiah atonio dura iyau yabin on Iesu an Aiwab it on God ba ato on aurin ikakafun .
43012042	Baise Jew babadis sigaraba on Iesu situtumai ; ab Pharisee yangan auris siber on mes osi men fofonin On aurin on wasai nan dura sitikakafun on , ari osi bayoi goa emon sityatetis sitgat on mes .
43012043	Osi asi nuabo on sabu ra engon osi sinbifais , ato osi men segogoi God osi inifais on .
43012044	Iesu fonan gagaminai iyau , “ Iyai iyafan Yau ebitutumeu on men Yau ekesiu wat , ab Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on mat ebitutumai .
43012045	Iyai iyafan toun matanai Yau i’teu on ato Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on mat toun matanai eitai .
43012046	Yau on tafa ba nin anat au tafanam onai iyai iyafan Yau inbitutumeu on men womanai inama mes .
43012047	Iyai iyafan Yau au dura etatam ato men ebifonabo , on men arimon anigurubabanai on . Yau anat tafanamai on men sabu anigurubabanis mes , ab Yau sabu aniyawasis mes .
43012048	Iyai iyafan Yau ebisisiweiiu a men egogoi au dura inboai on ato dura on inmisir inigurubabanai . Dura ato aikakafun on arimon ra kanfounai on on orot inigurubabanai !
43012049	Atonio on dura bag yabin Yau men Tou au baibadai dura aikakafun on baise Tamau On ibiyafareu on dura wawaninai iyawureu mamaba dura anau a anikakafun .
43012050	Ato Yau asagob On an dura wawanin aifan i’yau on yawas mama wantoanin ibo inat . Yau Tamau dura mamaba iyawureu atikakafun mes on ato aikakafun . ”
43013001	Ra itatom on Baisobon an Forag ra . Iesu isagob on an wera inat atonio tafanam inikirir ato inan Taman aurin . On Toun an baigibubunuotis iyabon atonio tafanamai mat simama on ra fufur ibinuabois ato On inuabois inat an yawas kanfounai igat .
43013002	Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat on rabirabi an bayu si’yam . Afaguban on ainau Judas , Simon Iscariot natun on iyamai inonot on Iesu itkaseirai mes .
43013003	Iesu isagob Taman on faiwar tutufin itai ; On isagob on God emon inat ato On inan God aurin .
43013004	On mes Iesu on kema emon imisir itawar ato an beber tefanai ibitakwakwarai on iboseir ato beber usi sasafan weromin on ibo nenenai imetan .
43013005	Namon On agirotin ba sareu ibo sosouen an ramoai irir ato ibosuruf baigibubunuotis ass isosouen a beber usi sasafan nenenai iyous i’yen on ibo nan ass isasafanen .
43013006	Iesu inat Simon Peter aurin igat ato on iyau , “ Bada , Om min yau auu unsouen i ? ”
43013007	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Ari bobo ato afofour on om men usagob baise om gibui weie unsagob . ”
43013008	Peter on men isagob Iesu on bobo aifan ifofour ato on dura wawaninai nan iyau , “ Ambin , Om men meyan auu unsouen mes ! ” Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Yau men amm ansosouen on om arimon men Yau au baigibubunuotim on . ”
43013009	Simon Peter iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , Om men auu wat unsouen mes , ab yau imau a uniu mat unsouen ! ”
43013010	Iesu iyau , “ Iyai iyafan sareu i’yeib on igumidar , men arimon toun inibin men ab ann wat on insouen . Omi engon tutufin on gumidarim — ab orot kaitamom wat on men gumidarin on . ”
43013011	( Iesu isagob nono iyafan on arimon inkaseirai ; on mes On iyau , “ Omi men engon tutufin gumidarim on . ” )
43013012	Iesu ass isouen isawar gibunai , On an beber tefanai ibitakwakwarai on ibo iwanai men ato imatabir men inai kemai , an efan menan imama nan . On itetemis iyau , “ Omi min wosagob Yau ari bobo mamaba aurim afofour on i ?
43013013	Omi woyoyoreu Baibebeotim a Bada , on min dura bag wat wobikakafun yabin Yau on Baibebeotiu a Bada .
43013014	Yau on omi ami Bada a ami Baibebeotim , ato Yau ato arimon amm asouen . Omi mat on eb nanaba toum amm wonsouen bonen .
43013015	Yau on baiyoboen afour omi aurim , onai omi mat on eb Yau afofour ba on nanaba wonafour .
43013016	Yau awurem dura bag : agirotin on men gagamin bag toun an bada ba , a dura bobibotin on men gagamin bag ato Orot iyafan ibiyafarai ba .
43013017	Omi ari on atonio bobo wosagob ato iyafan atonio bobo nanaba infofour on , on arimon yasisir gagamin bag inboai !
43013018	“ Yau men omi engon tutufin aurim abikakafun on ; Yau ato osi sabu arurubinis on asagobis . Baise God an dura buk amonai sigayam si’yau on inat inidura bag , dura ato nanaba sigayam siyau , ‘ Orot iyafan Yau rui bayu wam on inat au ragit orot imatar . ’
43013019	Yau ari atonio dura on awurem weie bobo inmatar onai bobo inmamatar mes on , omi arimon wonitutum on ‘ Yau Orot Tou . ’
43013020	Yau awurem dura bag : iyai iyafan Yau au dura bobibotin abiyafarai eboai on , on min Yau mat eboeu ; ato iyai iyafan Yau eboeu min , God Yau ibiyafareu on mat eboai . ”
43013021	Iesu atonio dura iyau gibunai On nunuan iyababan kwakwan ato rerebai ikakafun iyau , “ Yau awurem dura bag : Omi sanamui tani on arimon Yau inkaseiriu . ”
43013022	Baigibubunuotis on tous wat siruruai bonen ato osi men sisagob On iyafan aurin on dura ebikakafun .
43013023	Baigibubunuotin tani , menan Iesu an nuabo on , Iesu bisinai bag imair imama .
43013024	Simon Peter on imanai wat atonio baigibubunuotin aurin ikakafun iyau , “ Om eitetemai tait , On iyafan aurin ebikakafun . ”
43013025	On mes on baigibubunuotin on Iesu aurin imadudun irui dogaranai iyenbar ato itetemai iyau , “ Bada , on orot on iyafan i ? ”
43013026	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Yau arimon rafi sarar anboai sosof ramoai anitakokous anbibitai on ; on orot min on . ” On mes On rafi sarar turin ibo ramoai iwan nan sosofai itakokous ato Judas , Simon Iscariot natun itai .
43013027	Judas rafi sarar ibo mom Afaguban on nunuanai irui . Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Om bobo aifan egogoi uniyamai mes on sasasan wat unafour ! ”
43013028	Sabu ato nan kemai simair simama on men sisagob Iesu on aibo mes atonio dura on orot aurin ikakafun .
43013029	Judas on baibad sitai agim an kukufet auman on ikakaifarai ato baigibubunuotis fani sinos on Iesu iyawur itan asi gogoi bayu aifan on ittobon Forag aurin o Judas on rafi sarar aifan tani itboai sabu kokoianis itites mes .
43013030	Judas rafi sarar turin ibo ato ra kaita igat inai . On min fom amonai nan .
43013031	Judas igat inai gibunai , Iesu iyau , “ Ari on Orot Natun Wabin duran gagamin on irerebai , ibo egat sabu sinitai ; Orot Natun emon on God Wabin duran gagamin on ari rerebai ibo egat sabu sinitai .
43013032	Ato Orot Natun emon on God Wabin duran gagamin inboai ingat sabu sinitai on , ato God Toun on arimon Orot Natun Wabin duran gagamin inboai ingat ato On arimon ra kaita inafour .
43013033	Yau nanatu , Yau arimon wera dibon wat on omi mat tanama . Omi arimon Yau wonnueniu ; baise Yau ari dura aifan awurem on nanaba on Jew yangan awures nono , ‘ Yau a’nan nan on omi men fofonim wonan . ’
43013034	Ato ari on baifafaro dura boboun on abitem : omi toum woninuaboim bonen . Ato Yau abinuaboim ba on , on mes omi toum woninuaboim bonen .
43013035	Omi toum woninuaboim bonen on sabu engon tutufin arimon sinsagob omi on Yau au baigibubunuotim . ”
43013036	Simon Peter on Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Bada , Om on menan nan enan i ? ” Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Yau menan anan on om men fofonim Yau unigibubunueu on ; baise om arimon gibui weie Yau unigibubunueu . ”
43013037	Peter itetemai iyau , “ Bada , mamaba mes yau ari bag on men anigibubunuem on i ? Yau abotitiwagiu nono Om aurim anarab ! ”
43013038	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om min dura bag ubotitiwagim Yau auriu unarab i ? Yau awurem dura bag : om arimon ra ton unisosoufiu unau , yau On Orot on men asagobai weie kokorerek inatou . ”
43014001	Iesu iyawures iyau , “ Omi men woniyababan a men nunuam sinkomas mes , omi on God wonitutumai a Yau mat wonitutumeu .
43014002	Efan sigaraba maiau Tamau an goai sen ato Yau a’nan omi ami efan anbotitiwagen weinem . Atonio on men dura bag mes on , Yau dura men atawurem on .
43014003	Ato Yau anan efan omi aurim anbotitiwag on , Yau arimon anmatabir men Tou anboem tanan onai on Yau menan amama on nan wonama .
43014004	Omi wosagob eta ato inai on efanai i’gat on nan a’nan . ”
43014005	Thomas on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Bada , wei men wasagob Om menan nan enan ; ato wei eta mamaba wansagob ato nan wanan ? ”
43014006	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Yau on eta , Yau on dura maiauin , a Yau on yawas ; men iyafan tani inan Tamau aurin , ab Yau emon weie . ”
43014007	On iyawures iyau , “ Omi ari on Yau wosagobiu ato omi on Tamau mat wonsagobai ; ato ari on omi On wosagobai a omi On matamui woit . ”
43014008	Philip on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Bada , wei Tamam men wait on , eiyoboei wanitai , on wat on wagogoi . ”
43014009	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Philip , wera weromin maiau Yau omi engon tutufin mat tama ; baise om men usagobiu ? Iyai iyafan matanai Yau iteu on , on min Tamau it . Om aibo mes uyau , ‘ Tamam eiyoboei wanitai i ? ’
43014010	Philip om men ebitutumeu Yau ba min Tamau ato Tamau ba min Yau ? ” Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris iyau , “ Dura ato aikakafun on men Yau emon inat on . Tamau ato Yau amoui emama , On Toun an bobo ebobo .
43014011	Omi Yau wonitutumeu ato aikakafun au , Yau on Tamau amonai ato Tamau on Yau amoui . Ambin on , omi wobitutumeu yabin Yau on bobo buburis afofour on mes .
43014012	Yau awurem dura bag : iyai iyafan Yau ebitutumeu on ato bobo afofour on nanaba inafour — dura bag on arimon bobo gagamis bag inafour yabin Yau a’nan Tamau aurin .
43014013	Ato om Yau Wabiui unbifefeyan on arimon anafour onai Tamau an Itin on Natun emon iniyoboes sinitai .
43014014	Om Yau Wabiui aifan mes unbifefeyan on arimon aurim anafour . ”
43014015	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi Yau wonbinuaboiu on omi arimon au dura aurin wonifonabo .
43014016	Yau arimon Tamau anifefeyanai ato On arimon Baibaisotin tani initem , On arimon wantoan bisimui inama .
43014017	On min Ayu , On God an dura maiauin ibo egat . Sabu tafanamai on men fofonin sitboai yabin osi On men sit a osi On men sisagobai . Baise omi On wosagobai yabin On omi amomui emama ato On arimon omi amomui inama .
43014018	“ Yau on anan ato arimon men anikirirem ekesim gagan ba wonama ; Yau arimon anmatabir men aurim annat .
43014019	Wera dibon wat on sabu tafanamai on arimon men siniteu baise omi on arimon woniteu , yabin Yau amama on mes omi wonama .
43014020	Ra innat on , omi arimon wonsagob Yau ba min Tamau ato omi ba min Yau ato Yau ba min omi .
43014021	“ Iyai iyafan Yau au baifafaro dura eboai ato on aurin ebifonabo on , on orot jever on Yau ebinuaboiu . Yau Tamau arimon on ininuaboai ; on iyafan Yau ebinuaboiu on ; Yau mat arimon on aninuaboai a Yau Tou on rerebai anboeu angat aniyoboai . ”
43014022	Judas ( men Judas iscariot on ) on iyau , “ Bada , mamaba mes wei auri wat on Toum rerebai unboem ungat uniyoboei wanitem ato sabu tafanamai on men sinitem i ? ”
43014023	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Iyai iyafan Yau ebinuaboiu on arimon au baibebe aurin inifonabo . Yau Tamau on arimon ininuaboai , ato Yau a Tamau rui on arimon wannat ato on mat wanama .
43014024	Iyai iyafan Yau men ebinuaboiu on men au baibebe aurin ebifonabo on . Omi baibebe ato wotatam on men Yau noau on , baise Tamau emon enat , On Yau ibiyafareu on .
43014025	“ Yau nin mat tamama nan on atonio dura on awurem .
43014026	Baibaisotin , Ayu Kakafotin , On Tamau arimon Yau Wabiui on iniyafarai on bobo engon tutufin auris on inibebeyim a bobo engon tutufin auris abikakafun on iniyamem wonnoskikin .
43014027	“ Tuf on omi aurim abikirir ; Yau Tou au tuf on abitem . Yau men abitem ato tafanamai sabu sefofour ba . Omi men woniyababan a nunuam men sinkomas mes ; omi men wonaber mes .
43014028	Omi Yau au dura abikakafun on wotatam nono , ‘ Yau on anan baise arimon anmatabir men annat omi aurim . ’ Omi Yau woninuaboiu on , omi wotiyasisir Yau on anan Tamau aurin ; On on gagamin bag men Yau ba .
43014029	Yau ari atonio dura engon tutufin awurem weie bobo inmatar onai on bobo inmamatar on , omi arimon wonitutum au dura on dura maiauin .
43014030	Yau men dura weromin mat tanikakafun mes , yabin atonio tafanam an bainetewarotin on enat . On an faiwar Yau auriu on ambin bag ,
43014031	baise sabu tafanamai sinsagob on Yau Tamau ainuaboai ; on fasinai On an dura aifan engon iyawureu on afofour . “ Omi womisir atonio efan on tanikirir tanan . ”
43015001	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Yau Tou on wengar wine maiauin bag , ato Tamau on masau bo’otin .
43015002	Yau fafameu fani uwas men sou on yaburutoben , a fafameu fani uwas men sou tiwag on yasutuenen a ebubunagen onai osi arimon rererebis wat sinen a uwas sigaraba sinoubibiro .
43015003	Yau au baibebe dura abitem nan on omi wobubunagim nono .
43015004	Omi nana Yau usiui wonikaita wonama ato Yau arimon omi usimui anikaita anama . Famen toun wat on men fofonin uwan inou ; famen on wengarai inen on arimon uwam inou . On eta kaitamomai omi nana usiui wonmama on arimon uwam sinou .
43015005	“ Yau on wengar wine , ato omi on fafamen . Iyai iyafan Yau usiui inama a Yau on usinai anama on arimon uwan sigaraba inoubibiro ; baise on Yau inikirireu on , on men bobo aifan tani inafour on .
43015006	Iyai iyafan men Yau usiui inama on ato wengar famen ba on sinreben ingat nan inkimeu ; osi wengar fafames nanaba on sinruayois ato wairafai sinrebenen nan sinaraten .
43015007	Omi on Yau usiui wonama a Yau au dura on ari usimui inama on , omi ami gogoi aifan auriu wonbifefeyan on arimon wonboai .
43015008	Omi uwam si’nou nan on Tamau Wabin duran gagamin on wonboai wongat ; ato on etaiai on omi wonnat Yau au baigibubunuotim wonmatar .
43015009	Yau on omi ainuaboim ato Tamau omi ibinuaboiu ba ; omi on Yau au nuabo amonai wonama .
43015010	Omi Yau au dura aurin wonifonabo on omi arimon au nuabo amonai wonama , ato Yau Tamau an dura aurin abifonabo ba , a On an nuabo amonai amama ba .
43015011	“ Yau on atonio osi bobo auris awurem onai Yau au yasisir kaitamom on wonboai ato omi ami yasisir on arimon inarat awan inbonu inkadedebur .
43015012	Yau au baifafaro dura on atonio : omi tuturam mat woninuabo bonen ato Yau abinuaboim ba .
43015013	Orot iyafan tuturan auris inarab on ebiyoboet on an nuabo tuturan auris on gagamin bag yen .
43015014	Ato omi on Yau tuturau , omi bobo ato awurem on nanaba wonfofour on .
43015015	Yau men arimon gibui anyorem agirotim men yabin agirotin on men isagob an bada on abi bobo ebobo . Baise Yau ayoyorem tuturau yabin Yau dura Tamau emon a’tatam on engon tutufin akasonem .
43015016	Omi on men Yau worubineu on ; Yau on omi arubinem a bobo aitem wongat uwam sigaraba sinoubibiro mes , on uwam on arimon nana inen au wantoan . Ato omi mamaba Yau Wabiui nan Tamau aurin wonbifefeyan yabin omi Yau au baigibubunuotim on mes , on arimon initem .
43015017	Atonio on Yau au baifafaro dura on awurem : omi tuturam mat woninuabo bonen . ”
43015018	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Sabu tafanamai omi sinbisisiweiim on , omi asir wonnos mom ainau on Yau sisisiweiiu .
43015019	Omi atonio tafanam itbinoanim on , ato sabu tafanamai on omi sitinuaboim sitboem osi itinoanis . Baise Yau atonio tafanam emon on arubinem ato omi on men tafanam ebinoanai on ; on fasinai sabu tafanamai on omi sebiragitem .
43015020	Yau dura aifan awurem on wonnonosin : ‘ Agirotin on men gagamin bag on an bada aurin . ’ Osi Yau baikokosar sinbibiteu on , osi arimon omi mat baikokosar sinitem ; ato osi Yau au baibebe aurin sinbifonabo on , osi arimon omi mat ami baibebe aurin sinifonabo .
43015021	Baise osi arimon atonio osi bobo engon tutufin on omi aurim sinafour yabin omi on Yau ebinoaniu on mes ; yabin osi on men sisagobai On Iyafan on Yau iyafareu .
43015022	Yau men atnat osi auris dura maiauin atikakafun on , osi men asi bokomas aurin sitnos on nana yen on ; baise ari on osi asi bokomas aurin on men siniyoi on .
43015023	Iyai iyafan Yau ebisisiweiiu on , Tamau mat ebisisiweiai .
43015024	Yau on bobo buburis osi sanasi afofour on men iyafan tani nin ifofour ba , ato Yau osi bobo men atfofour on , osi men asi bokomas aurin sitnos on nana yen , baise osi matasi siteu bobo afouren , ab osi nana Yau Tamau rui sebiragitei .
43015025	Baise atonio bobo imatar onai ato Baifafaro dura sigagayam on itnat itidura bag : Atonio nanaba sigayam siyau , ‘ Osi on men er yabinai Yau sebiragiteu on . ’
43015026	“ Baibaisotin on arimon innat — On min Ayu maiauin , On God an dura maiauin on rerebai inboai ingat ato On min Tamau emon innat . Yau arimon Tamau emon on aurim aniyafarai ato omi aurim inikakafun .
43015027	Ato omi mat on Yau auriu wonikakafun yabin anai bag omi on Yau mat .
43016001	“ Yau atonio osi dura awurem onai omi ami baitutum on men inafeu mes .
43016002	Osi arimon bayoi goa emon sinrukouim wongat . Ato wera innat on iyafan inasubunuem on innos on , atonio bobo efofour on God ebiagirai .
43016003	Sabu atonio osi bobo on arimon aurim sinafour yabin osi men sisagob menan on Tamau o menan on Yau .
43016004	Baise Yau atonio dura awurem onai wera innat osi atonio bobo sinfofour on , omi arimon wonnos Yau dura mamaba awurem on . ” Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Anai bag Yau mat tamama nenei on men atonio osi bobo auris akasonem on .
43016005	Baise ari on Yau a’nan ato Orot Iyafan Yau ibiyafareu on aurin , ato omi men iyafan tani itetemiu iyau , ‘ Yau on menan nan anan ? ’
43016006	Ato ari ato dura awurem on , omi nunuam on sebiyababan .
43016007	Baise Yau awurem dura bag : Omi ami obin aurin on Yau a’nan yabin Yau men annanan on , Baibaisotin on men arimon innat omi aurim on . Baise Yau annanan on arimon On aniyafarai innat aurim .
43016008	Ato On innanat on , sabu tafanamai on iniyoboes sinsagob bokomas an yabin on mamaba , a yawas totorin an yabin on mamaba a God an baigurubaban an yabin on mamaba .
43016009	Ayu arimon iniyoboes bokomas an yabin on mamaba yabin osi on men Yau sebitutumeu on ,
43016010	Ayu arimon iniyoboes yawas totorin an yabin on mamaba yabin Yau on anan Tamau aurin ato omi arimon men woniteu men ;
43016011	Ayu on arimon iniyoboem baigurubaban an yabin on mamaba yabin atonio tafanam an bainetewarotin on sigurubabanai nono .
43016012	“ Yau auriu on dura sigaraba sen aurim anikakafun baise omi aurim on arimon men fofonin wonboai on .
43016013	Baise Ayu Kakafotin maiauin innanat on , On God an dura maiauin on rerebai inboai ingat , On ininetewarim wonan dura maiauin engon wonsagob . On arimon men Toun an baibadai nan dura inikakafun on , baise On dura aifan itatam on nanaba inikakafun a bobo aifan arimon senat aurin on inkasonem .
43016014	On arimon omi iniyoboem Yau on God ba yabin Yau dura aifan abikakafun on inboboai ato omi inkakasonem .
43016015	Bobo engon Tamau bisinai sen on Yau ebinoaniu ; on fasinai Yau aikakafun au , Yau bobo aifan ato Ayu Yau abitai on wat on inboai ato omi inkasonem . ”
43016016	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Wera dibon wat on omi arimon men woniteu ato wera men weromin gibunai on omi arimon woniteu men . ”
43016017	On an baigibubunuotis fani on tous wat sanasi sibitetem bonen si’yau , “ Atonio dura an yabin on abifan i ? On iyawuret wera dibon wat on men tanitai , ato wera men weromin gibunai on tanitai ; a mat On iyau , ‘ Yabin Yau on anan Tamau aurin . ’
43016018	Osi sitetem siyau , “ Atonio dura ‘ wera dibon wat ’ on an yabin on abifan i ? Ot men tasagob On abi dura ebikakafun ! ”
43016019	Iesu isagob osi sigogoi sititetemai mes , on mes On osi auris iyau , “ Yau aikakafun au , ‘ Wera dibon wat on omi arimon men woniteu ato wera men weromin gibunai on omi arimon woniteu . ’ Atonio dura aurin on omi toum sanamui wobitetem bonen i ?
43016020	Yau awurem dura bag : Omi arimon wonatou woniyababan baise tafanamai sabu on arimon siniyasisir ; ato omi arimon woniyababan baise omi ami yababan inikitabirai on yasisir inmatar .
43016021	Jever an wera idib toub aurin on ebiyababan yabin on an baikokosar an wera on inat baise fifi irat an werai on an baikokosar aurin on ebinosfotai yabin on ebiyasisir fifi irat tafanamai on mes .
43016022	On eta kaitamom nanaba on omi aurim : omi ari on woniyababan baise Yau arimon anitem men , ato omi nunuam on arimon yasisir wat inibonuem , atonio yasisir on men iyafan tani arimon omi emon inboai inan on .
43016023	“ Ra innat ingat on omi men arimon sawar tani aurin on Yau wonifefeyaniu mes . Yau awurem dura bag : omi Yau Wabiui nan Tamau aurin wonbifefeyan on arimon initem .
43016024	Ainau bag on men aifan tani Yau Wabiui sawar tani aurin woifefeyan on ; omi wonifefeyan ato wonboai , onai omi ami yasisir arimon inarat awan inbonu inkadedebur . ”
43016025	Iesu an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Yau on dura kawenai nan atonio osi bobo auris on aurim abikakafun . Baise wera innat on Yau men arimon dura kawenai anikakafun on , ab Tamau aurin on Yau dura rerebai wat omi aurim anikakafun .
43016026	On ra innat on , omi Yau Wabiui on On aurin wonifefeyan ; ato Yau men aikakafun au , omi weinem on Yau On aurin anifefeyanai ,
43016027	yabin Yau Tamau Toun on omi inuaboim . On omi inuaboim yabin omi on Yau woinuaboiu a woitutumeu Yau on God emon anat .
43016028	Yau on Tamau emon anat , ato Yau anat au tafanam ; ato ari on Yau tafanam abikirir ato anan Tamau aurin . ”
43016029	Namon On an baigibubunuotis on aurin siyau , “ Eite Om ari on dura rerebai wat ebikakafun , Om men dura kawenai nan ebikakafun on .
43016030	Wei ari wasagob Om on bobo engon tutufin usagob ; Om men egogoi arimon iyafan tani initetemim on yabin sabu asi bainonot on engon usagob nono . Atonio etaiai on iyamai wei wabitutum Om on God emon unat . ”
43016031	Iesu iyafotes iyau , “ Omi ari weie wobitutum i ?
43016032	Wera on enat ato on inat nono , ato omi arimon engon tutufin wontagege , omi kakaita kakaita arimon wonan toum ami goa auris , ato omi arimon Yau ekesiu wonikirireu . Baise Yau men arimon ekesiu wat on yabin Tamau on bisiwui .
43016033	Yau atonio dura awurem onai omi tufai wat Yau amoui wonikaita wonama . Sabu tafanamai on arimon siniyamem wonikokosarim . Baise omi wontawar wonfaskikin ! Yau tafanam abomerubai nono ! ”
43017001	Iesu atonio dura iyau isawar gibunai On au safam itage ato iyau , “ Tamau , wera inat nono Om am Itin ba on Natum unitai , onai Natum on On an Itin ba mamaba on sabu iniyoboes sinitai .
43017002	Yabin Om baibad Natum utai sabu engon tutufin auris onai Om sabu engon tutufin ubitai on yawas mama wantoanin itites .
43017003	Ato yawas mama wantoanin an yabin min atonio : sabu on Om sinsagobim , Om ekesim mom on God maiauin , a sabu on Iesu Keriso sinsagobai ato Om ubiyafarai on .
43017004	Yau on Om am Itin ba on rerebai abo agat au tafanam ; Om bobo ato uteu abobo on aisawarai nono .
43017005	Tamau ! Ari om namui atatawar on am Aiwab eiteu , Om am Aiwab kaitamom min on rut tafasararam nono weie tafanam ufourai .
43017006	“ Yau on sabu ato tafanam emon ubiteu on afouris sinat Om sisagobim . Osi sabu min Om ebinoanim , ato osi sabu min Yau imaui uyagai . Osi sabu on Om am dura aurin sifonabo ,
43017007	ato ari osi sabu on sisagob ato bobo engon tutufin ubiteu on Om emon sinat .
43017008	Om dura ubiteu on sabu engon tutufin akasones ato osi on dura sibo sibokikin ; osi sisagob on dura bag Yau on Om bisimui emon anat , a osi sebitutum on Om Yau uyafareu .
43017009	“ Yau osi auris ababayoi . Yau men sabu tafanamai auris ababayoi on baise sabu ato ubiteu on , yabin osi on Om ebinoanim .
43017010	Sabu engon tutufin ato Yau ebinoaniu on Om noam a sabu engon tutufin Om ebinoanim on Yau noau ; ato Yau au Itin Om ba on sabu ato osi emon sibo sigat .
43017011	Ato ari on Yau a’nat Om aurim ; Yau arimon men tafanamai anama on , baise osi sabu on arimon tafanamai sinama . Tamau Kakafotim ! Om Wabim an faiwarai nan unnrufafares , faiwar ato Om ubiteu on , onai osi on kaitamom wat sinmatar , ato Om Yau rut tabikaita ba .
43017012	Yau osi sabu mat amama on , Om Wabim an faiwarai nan arufafares , faiwar ato Om ubiteu on . Yau arufafares ato men iyafan tani isiwan on , ab orot kaitamom on enan wairaf an efan komasinai inar , on ekesin mom on isiwan — onai God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on innat inidura bag .
43017013	Ato Yau ari a’nat Om aurim ato Yau atonio osi dura tafanamai abikakafun onai osi Yau au yasisir gagamin bag on sinboai nunuasi sinyein inag awan inbonu inkadedebur .
43017014	Yau on Om am dura on aites ato sabu tafanamai on osi siragites yabin osi on men tafanam ebinoanis on ato Yau ba , Yau on men tafanam ebinoanai on .
43017015	Yau men abifefeyanim osi tafanam emon unboseiris mes on , baise Yau abifefeyanim ato Ayu Komasin emon on unrufafares .
43017016	Ato Yau ba , Yau on men tafanam ebinoanai on , osi men tafanam ebinoanai on .
43017017	Om am dura maiauinai nan ebotitiwagis Toum aurim ekutetis ; Om am dura on dura maiauin .
43017018	Yau on osi aiyafares sigat au tafanam , ato Om Yau ubiyafareu au tafanam ba .
43017019	Osi fasisi emon on Yau Om aurim Tou akutetiu ; onai osi mat on dura maiauinai wat Om aurim on tous sinkutetis .
43017020	“ Yau men atonio osi sabu Yau bisiwui wat auris ababayoi on , baise Yau ababayoi ato osi sabu mat auris iyabon Yau auriu on dura sinkurereb a osi sabu dura aurin sinbitutum on .
43017021	Yau ababayoi osi engon tutufin on sinnat kaitamom wat sinmatar . Tamau ! Yau ababayoi osi sabu engon tutufin on sinnat rut amoti kaitamom sinmatar ato Yau Om amomui ba a Om Yau amoui . Yau ababayoi osi kaitamom wat sinmatar onai sabu tafanamai sinitutum on Om Yau uyafareu .
43017022	Om am Aiwab ubiteu on kaitamom min on aites onai osi kaitamom wat sitmatar ato Om Yau rut tabikaita ba :
43017023	Yau on osi amosi ato Om on Yau amoui onai osi initutufin kaitamom sinmatar ato sabu tafanamai sinsagob on Om Yau uiyafareu a Om osi uinuabois ato Yau ubinuaboiu ba .
43017024	“ Tamau ! Osi sabu on Yau uteu , ato Yau menan nan on agogoi osi sabu mat on nan Yau bisiwui onai osi sabu on Yau au Aiwab sinitai , au Aiwab ato Om ubiteu on ; yabin Om Yau uinuaboiu weie tafanam ufourai .
43017025	Tamau am yawas totorin bag ! Sabu tafanamai on Om men sisagobim baise Yau on Om asagobim a atonio osi sabu sisagob on Om Yau uiyafareu .
43017026	Yau Om Wabim on abo agat atonio osi sabu auris sisagob , ato Yau arimon on bobo on nana anafour Wabim anboai angat onai Om am nuabo Yau auriu yen on osi mat amosi inen a Yau mat on osi amosi anama . ”
43018001	Iesu atonio bayoi iyamai isawar gibunai , On an baigibubunuotis mat sinai Kidron sareu esusur on sirabon rebanai nan . On efanai nan on masau nan i’yen , ato Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat on masauai nan sirui .
43018002	Judas , kaseirotin on isagob efan menan nan , yabin wera sigaraba maiau Iesu an baigibubunuotis mat on nan siruruayo .
43018003	On mes Judas on Rome yangan asi wou yangan asi kuayo a tafaror goa an kaifarotis on iboes sinat nan masauai sirui . Osi sabu on priest aiwabis a Pharisee yangan on siyafares ; osi on asi baigagam sawar , ramef a tafa on siboen auman sinat .
43018004	Iesu on isagob bobo engon tutufin on arimon On aurin sinmatar , on mes On kafakakai wat auris itawadudun ato itetemis iyau , “ Omi iyafan wonunuen i ? ”
43018005	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Iesu Nazareth emon . ” On iyafotes iyau , “ Yau min atonio . ” Judas kaseirotin min mat nan sitatawar .
43018006	Iesu iyawures iyau , “ Yau min atonio , ato osi augib simatabir ato motobai sifeu .
43018007	Iesu itetemis men iyau , “ Omi iyafan wonunuen i ? ” Osi siyau , “ Iesu Nazareth emon . ”
43018008	Iesu iyau , “ Yau min ainau awurem nono , Yau min atonio . Omi Yau wonnunueniu mes on ato , atonio osi sabu fani on wonikirires sinan . ”
43018009	( On atonio dura iyau onai dura aifan ainau i’yau ibikakafun on itnat itidura bag : “ Tamau , sabu ato ubiteu on men meyan tani aisiwanai on . ” )
43018010	Simon Peter on seri i’botan , on irou ato Priest Ainauin an agirotin tainan asumaiauai nan iyasutin itutu . On agirotin wabin min Malchus .
43018011	Iesu on Peter aurin iyau , “ Om am seri ebo an efanai eyein men ! Om enonosin Yau Tamau baikokosar an viga ibiteu on men fofonin antoman i ? ”
43018012	Namon wou yangan asi kuayo , asi bainetewarotin mat a Jew yangan asi kaifarotis mat on Iesu sifatumai ato siyoustatanai ,
43018013	ato ainau sibo sinai Annas aurin . On orot min Caiaphas rawan orot ato on kwanda amonai on Caiaphas min Priest Ainauin imama .
43018014	Caiaphas min on Jew babadis iyawures on , iyobin orot kaitamom on itarab sabu engon tutufin auris .
43018015	Simon Peter a baigibubunuotin tani rus on Iesu sibigibubunuai sinai . Priest Ainauin on atonio baigibubunuotin tani on isagobai tiwag on mes on Iesu mat sirui Priest Ainauin an goa kounai nan ,
43018016	ato Peter on kounai nan furi awanai itatawar . Namon baigibubunuotin tani imatabir men igat inai ato agirotin jeverei furi awanai itatwar on iyawur ato Peter ibo rus sirui furi amonai nan .
43018017	Jeverei ato furi awanai itatawar on Peter aurin iyau , “ Om mat on ato Orot an baigibubunuotin tani i ? ” Peter iyafotai iyau , “ Ambin , men yau mat on . ”
43018018	Nuba yagur isusur on mes agirotis a kaifarotis on wairaf siyasir nan sikufifinai wairaf iraranis . On mes Peter on inai ato mat nan sitawar wairaf iraranai .
43018019	Priest Ainauin on Iesu an baigibubunuotis a an baibebe aurin on itetemai .
43018020	Iesu iyafotai iyau . “ Yau on ra fufur wasai nan sabu engon tutufin auris dura abikakafun ; Yau au baibebe engon tutufin on bayoi goa a tafaror goa amosi nan Jew yangan engon si’nat siruruayo on nan abibebeyis . Yau men dura tani aibuni mom aikakafun on .
43018021	Om aibo mes yau ebitetemiu i ? Sabu iyabon Yau au dura si’tatam on eitetemis . Om osi eitetemis tait , Yau abi dura awures on — osi sisagob Yau dura mamaba aikakafun . ” Iesu atonio dura iyau mom , ato kaifarotin tani nan itatawar on Iesu rereban
43018022	iyasfarai ato iyau , “ Om men dura nanaba Priest Ainauin aurin unikakafun mes ! ”
43018023	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Yau ari dura komasin tani atau on , om sabu engon tutufin atonio semama on unawures on abi bobo komasin afour . Baise Yau dura obin wat aikakafun on aibo mes urabiu i ? ”
43018024	Namon Annas on Iesu iyafarai inai Priest Ainauin Caiaphas aurin . Iesu usinai on nana uramai siyous i’yen .
43018025	Peter on nan nana itawar wairaf iraranai . Ato sabu fani on aurin siyau , “ Om min ato Orot on an baigibubunuotin tani i ? ” Baise Peter isosouf . On iyau , “ Ambin , men yau mat . ”
43018026	Priest Ainauin an agirotin tani min nan , on agirotin tani tain tuan min Peter ato imisir tainan iyasutin itutu , on ikakafun . On itetemai yau , “ Yau nan masauai min om rum aitem i ? ”
43018027	Peter iyau men , “ Ambin . ” — ato ra kaita kokorerek itou .
43018028	Fomenei fomenei Iesu on Caiaphas an goai emon sibo sinai gawan an goa ann werominai nan . Jew babadis on men goa ann weromin amonai sirui yabin osi sigogoi nana gumidaris sitama onai osi Baisobon an bayu sitam mes .
43018029	On mes Pilate igat au koun ato itetemis iyau , “ Atonio Orot on abi bobo komasin ifour mes on wobiubarai i ? ”
43018030	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ On men bobo komasis itfofour on , wei men om aurim watboai watnat on .
43018031	Pilate osi auris iyau , “ Omi toum wobo ato ami baifafaro iyau nanaba on woigurubabanai . ” Jew yangan siyafotai siyau , “ Wei on men fofonin orot jever tani wanirabobai on . ”
43018032	( Atonio bobo imatar onai Iesu an rabob mamaba inboboai aurin i’yau on itnat itidura bag . )
43018033	Pilate imatabir men irui goa ann werominai nan ato Iesu iyor inat . On itetemai iyau , “ Om min Jew yangan asi Aiwab i ? ”
43018034	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Atonio baitetem on om toum am notai ebitetemiu o Yau au dudur on sabu fani siyawurem i ? ”
43018035	Pilate iyafotai iyau , “ Om enonosin Yau min Jew orot i ? Atonio on Om am sabu asi priest aiwabis mat on Om siboem Yau imaui siyagai . Om abi bobo ufour i ? ”
43018036	Iesu iyau , “ Yau au baiaiwab on men atonio tafanam ebinoanai on ; ato Yau au baiaiwab atonio tafanam itbinoanai mes on Yau au baigibubunuotis on arimon sitigagam sitbotaniu , men arimon Jew babadis imasi atag on . Ambin , Yau au baiaiwab on men atonio tafanam ebinoanai on ! ”
43018037	On mes Pilate itetemai iyau , “ Om min Aiwab i ? ” Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om ukakafun yau , Yau on Aiwab . Yau on arat ato atonio bobo yabinai on anat au tafanam , dura maiauin aurin on anikakafun mes . Iyai iyafan dura maiauin ebinoanai on Yau au dura etatam . ”
43018038	Pilate itetemai iyau , “ Atonio dura maiauin an yabin on aifan i ? ” Namon Pilate imatabir men igat kounai Jew sabu auris ato iyau , “ Atonio Orot aurin on men dura yabin tani agaturai on animakiai .
43018039	Baise ami kik iyau nanaba on , yau ra fufur Baisobon an ra on fafatum orot tani arurufanai e’gat weinem . Omi wogogoi yau Jew yangan asi Aiwab on an rufanai ingat weinem i ? ”
43018040	Osi baiyokuai nan siyafotai siyau , “ Ambin men On ! Wei wagogoi Barabbas ! ” ( Barabbas min yakeotin . )
43019001	Namon Pilate on Iesu ibo ato dura wawaninai wou yangan iyawures urouwawanai nan siyaswabirai .
43019002	Wou yangan on wengar aisikis fafames on siboen nigir siyamai uninai siyein ; namon osi beber mururin on sibo siyotai ;
43019003	osi sinai aurin ato sikoboai siyau , “ Jew yangan asi Aiwab , mama wantoanin ! ” Ato osi Iesu rereban siyasfarai .
43019004	Pilate imatabir men igat au koun ato sabu kuayo auris iyau , “ Omi woit , On nin anboai angat aurim wonitai , ato yau on men an yabin tani agaturai on animakiai . ”
43019005	On mes Iesu on igat au koun , On uninai on nigir siyein a beber mururin siyotai auman . Pilate on osi sabu auris iyau , “ Omi woit ! Orot atonio ! ”
43019006	Priest Ainauis a tafaror goa ankaifarotis on Iesu sit on siyoku siyau , “ Nabai ekubarai ! Nabai ekubarai ! ” Pilate on osi auris iyau , “ Omi toum wobo ato nabai wokubarai . Yau on men an yabin tani agaturai on animakiai . ”
43019007	Jew sabu kuayo on siyafotai men siyau , “ Wei ai baifafaro iyau on asir inarab mom , yabin On Toun eyoyorai God Natun . ”
43019008	Pilate atonio dura itatam on iber kwakwan .
43019009	On imatabir men irui goa ann weromin amonai ato on Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Om men emon ne unat i ? ” Baise Iesu men abi dura tani iyafotai on .
43019010	Pilate on Iesu aurin iyau , “ Om aibo mes men auriu dura ebikakafun i ? Om unsagob , Yau au baibad yen anau Om sinrufanim a mat anau Om sinboem nabai sinkubarem . ”
43019011	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Om am baibad Yau auriu yen yabin atonio on God om item . On mes orot iyafan Yau iboeu om imamui iyayagai on an bokomas on irat kwakwan , komasin bag yen . ”
43019012	Pilate atonio dura itatam on , ifourtobon eta inuen Iesu itrufanai mes . Baise sabu kuayo siyoku men siyau , “ Om On unrurufanai on , om on men Caesar turan on ! Iyai iyafan toun eyoyorai Aiwab on , Caesar aurin ebiragit ! ”
43019013	Pilate atonio dura itatam mom on , Iesu ibo igat au koun ato Pilate on baigurubaban an mamageai imair , on efan seyoyorai , “ Baigurubabanotis asi mamage . ” ( Hebrew yangan fonasi on seyoyorai , “ Gabbatha . ” )
43019014	On ra itatom on Baisobon an ra ato wera kafakakai mom aiyet itboai . Pilate sabu auris iyau , “ Omi ami Aiwab ato ! ”
43019015	Osi siyoku men siyau , “ Yasubun ! Yasubun ! Nabai ekubarai ! ” Pilate itetemis iyau , “ Omi wogogoi yau ami Aiwab nabai ankubarai i ? ” Priest aiwabis siyafotai siyau , “ Wei ai aiwab on Caesar ekesin mom ! ”
43019016	Namon Pilate on Iesu osi imasi iyagai nabai sitkubarai mes . On mes osi Iesu sibo sibonanawai sinai .
43019017	On igat Toun an nab iyabar ato sinat efan wabin seyoyorai , “ Tekwakwan an Efan , ” ( Hebrew yangan fonasi on seyoyorai , “ Golgotha . ” )
43019018	Osi nan nabai sikubarai ; mat osi orot ruam on eb nabai sikubares , orot tani rebanai a orot tani rebanai ato Iesu on basunai .
43019019	Pilate atonio baiyoboen dura on wengarai igayam ato an wou yangan iyawures nab tefanai sidudun . On dura atonio nanaba igayam , “ Iesu Nazareth emon , Jew yangan asi Aiwab . ”
43019020	Sabu sigaraba on atonio dura siyab yabin efan menan Iesu nabai sikukubarai on mafam gagamin bisinai bag . Atonio baiyoboen dura on Hebrew , Latin a Greek yangan fonasi sigayam .
43019021	Priest aiwabis on Pilate aurin siyau , “ Om men ungayam unau , ‘ Jew yangan asi Aiwab , ’ baise om ungayam , “ Atonio orot iyau , Yau on Jew yangan asi Aiwab . ’ ”
43019022	Pilate iyafotes iyau , “ Dura aifan agayam on agayam , nana inen . ”
43019023	Wou yangan Iesu nabai sikubarai isawar weie , osi On an beber on siboen ato sikuseseb matas bat simatar , wou orot kakaita on beber matas kakaita kakaita siboen . Mat osi On an beber ato amonai ibitakwakwarai on sibo , on beber on kaitamom weromin tefanai isur inai babanai igat on nanaba sisagir .
43019024	Wou yangan on tous wat siyau bonen , “ Ot beber men tansafef mes ; ot barom tanyoai nan tansagob iyafan on inboai . ” Atonio bobo imatar onai God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on inat itidura bag : Dura ato nanaba sigayam siyau , “ Osi tous sanasi nan Yau au beber on sikuseseb a au beber amonai abitakwakwariu on sibo asi kwarer siyamai onai barom siyo . ” Ato wou yangan min on bobo nanaba sifour .
43019025	Iesu ayon giya , Mary , orot Cleopas awan , a Mary Magdalene , on Iesu an nab bisinai sitatawar .
43019026	Iesu iyeit ayon a baigibubunuotin On an nuabo on nan sitatawar ites ; on mes On ayon aurin iyau , “ Jever , atonio on om natum orot . ”
43019027	Namon On an baigibubunuotin aurin iyau . “ Atonio on om ayom . ” On gibunai on jever ibo inai an goai nan ikaifarai .
43019028	Iesu isagob ari on bobo engon tutufin isawarai ; onai itiyamai God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on itnat itidura bag . On iyau , “ Yau anjou eteteinin . ”
43019029	Ramo amonai on sareu wine riribin awan bonuin nan i’yen ; ato osi beber samisamin on sibo nan sareu wine amonai sikutub ato wengar wabin hyssop on famenai nan siyein ato siyotogai giburunai nan siyein .
43019030	Iesu sareu wine itoman ato iyau , “ Itutufin nono ! ” Namon On uson itur ato irabob .
43019031	Namon Jew babadis on Pilate sifefeyanai on itibasit ato sabu nabai sikukubares on ass sitastoben gariwat sitarab ato usis on nab emon sityeires sitsur . Osi atonio bobo aurin on sifefeyan yabin friday on botitiwag an ra on mes ato osi men sigogoi usis on Sabat ra nan nana nabai sitroror yabin ra itatom on Sabat Kakafotin an ra gagamin .
43019032	On mes wou yangan sinai orot ainau on ann siyasotoben a orot tani aurin ba sinai ann siyasotoben ato Iesu mat sikukubares on .
43019033	Baise osi sinat Iesu aurin on sit On irabob nono , on mes osi men ann siyasotoben on .
43019034	Baise wou orot tani on iyo ibo Iesu sesebinai iyo ato ra kaita tara a sareu iyawadebur isur .
43019035	( Orot iyafan atonio bobo imamatar matanai i’tai on aurin ikakafun , onai omi mat wonitutum . On dura aifan i’yau on dura bag ato on isagob on dura maiauin wat ebikakafun . )
43019036	Atonio bobo imatar itiyamai God an dura buk amonai sigagayam on itnat itidura bag : “ On men arimon an rarik tani arimon inturutob on . ”
43019037	Ato God an dura tani buk amonai sigayam siyau , “ Orot iyoai siyoyoai on sabu arimon matas On aurin sineit . ”
43019038	On gibunai , Joseph on Arimathea mafam gagamin emon , on Pilate ifefeyanai fofonin arimon Iesu usin itboai . ( Joseph on Iesu an baigibubunuotin tani , baise on bubuniai nan ibobo yabin on Jew babadis auris ibeber on mes . ) Pilate on Joseph iyawur usin itboai mes , on mes on inai ato usin ibo inai .
43019039	Nicodemus , on orot on ainau fom tani inai Iesu ititai mes , on Joseph rus sinai , on fio yanden ninibin on ibo a fio fani keris on mat sikaita sisutatabir , on fio kiman an bit on orot kaitamom auyotoat nanaba on iboen mat sinai .
43019040	Osi orot ruam on Iesu usin sibo ato garob an beberai nan fio yanden ninibin on usinai sidebur ato sikiman , Jew asi kik iyau nanaba , rabobis usis on nanaba sebotitiwagis weie segagarobis .
43019041	Iesu nabai sikubarai an efanai nan on masau i’yen ato on amonai nan on rasi dogu i’yen , ato on rasi dogu on men iyafan tani ainau nan sigarobai on .
43019042	Ra itatom on Sabat ra a yabin on rasi dogu on auwatin on mes Iesu usin on nan siyein .
43020001	Sunday fomenei fomenei ra gugubanai nan Mary Magdalene on inai au rasi doguai nan ato iyeit agim it on ainau dogu awan emon sifiruruai inai i’yen .
43020002	On iyayai inai Simon Peter a baigibubunuotin tani Bada an nuabo on , osi rus auris igat ato iyawures iyau , “ Sabu on Bada rasi dogu emon sibo sinai ato ot men tasagob osi menan nan siyein ! ”
43020003	Namon Peter a baigibubunuotin tani on rus sinai au rasi doguai nan .
43020004	Osi rus on si’yai baise baigibubunuotin tani on iyayai kwakwan Peter igiseirai ato on ainau iyayai inai rasi doguai nan igat .
43020005	On ikwafir ato garob an beber wat on si’yen iten , baise on men dogu amonai irui .
43020006	Simon Peter on gibui inat ato on totor irui rasi dogu amonai nan . On iyeit garob an beber nan si’yen iten
43020007	a beber ato Iesu unin sikikimanai on mat nan i’yen it . Beber ato Iesu unin sikikimanai on men garob an beber mat kaita si’yen on baise on beber on toun inu mabinai i’yen .
43020008	Namon baigibubunuotin tani on ainau inat rasi doguai i’gat on , on mat dogu amonai irui ; it ato itutum .
43020009	( Osi nana men sisagob , God an dura ato buk amonai sigayam siyau , On rabob emon inmisir men . )
43020010	Namon baigibubunuotis simatabir men sinai au go .
43020011	Mary imatabir men inai rasi dogu kounai itawar itotou . On nana itotou ato on ikwafir rasi dogu itinateteai mes
43020012	ato nan anea ruam beber kakakaiis wat simonag on ites , nan Iesu usin menan siyein on nan simama , tani uninai tani annai .
43020013	Osi sitetemai siyau , “ Jever , om aibo mes etotou i ? ” On iyafotes iyau , “ Sabu on au Bada sibo sinai ato yau men asagob On menan nan siyein ! ”
43020014	On atonio dura iyau isawar on irutabir ato Iesu it nan itatawar ; baise on men isagob on Iesu .
43020015	Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Jever , om aibo mes etotou ? Om iyafan enunuen ? ” Jever inos on orot masau bo’otin , on mes on aurin iyau , “ Bada , om On unboai unnanan mes on , ekasoneu om menan nan uyein , ato yau anan anboai . ”
43020016	Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Mary ! ” Ato jever On aurin irutabir ato Hebrew fonasi iyau , “ Rabboni ! ” ( Atonio dura an yabin min , “ Baibebeotim . ” )
43020017	Iesu iyawur iyau , “ Om men usiu unbokikin yabin Yau men amatabir anai Tamau aurin on . Baise om unan taitaiu auris ato Yau auriu on unawures unau , Yau amamatabir men Yau Tamau a osi Tamas , Yau au God a osi asi God aurin . ”
43020018	On mes Mary Magdalene inai ato baigibubunuotis ikasones on Bada matanai it a On mamaba iyawur on engon ikasones .
43020019	On sunday ibirabirabi bag ato baigibubunuotis on siruayo ato goa metewan engon sirufofoten sikuabinen yabin osi on Jew babadis auris siber on mes . Namon Iesu irui ato sanasi itawar . On iyau , “ Tuf aurim inama . ”
43020020	On atonio dura iyau gibunai , On iman a sesebin iyoboes . Baigibubunuotis ato Bada si’tai on siyasisir kwakwan .
43020021	Namon Iesu osi auris iyau men , “ Tuf aurim inama . Tamau on Yau iyafareu , on mes on eta kaitamomai Yau omi abiyafarem au tafanam wongat . ”
43020022	On atonio dura ikakafun isawar ato On osi auris yabat ibabain ato iyau , “ Omi Ayu Kakafotin wobo .
43020023	Omi sabu asi bokomas wonbinotbur on , arimon sinnotbures ; ato omi men woninotbures on , osi arimon men sininotbures on . ”
