43020024	Baigibubunuotis auyotoat sasagis bairuin tani wabin Thomas ( on seyoyorai Sisiru ) , on men mat nan an rai on Iesu an baigibubunuotis fani wat auris irobotet .
43020025	On mes baigibubunuotis fani on siyawur siyau , “ Wei on Bada mataii wait ! ” Thomas on osi auris iyau , “ Yau men anitutum on ab yau iman ato sidudun efenis on afas aneit a imau anboai osi afasi anaya a imau on sesebinai aniwan inar on arimon anitutum . ”
43020026	Tafaror kaitamom isawar gibunai ato baigibubunuotis on goa amonai siruayo men ato ari weie Thomas on mat nan sanasi . Metewan on sikuabinen baise Iesu on irobotet nan sanasi itawar ato iyau , “ Tuf aurim inama . ”
43020027	Namon On Thomas aurin iyau , “ Imam nin eyein , imau eiten ; namon imam yotet egat sesebiui eiwan erui . Om men uninonot sisit mes baise unitutum ! ”
43020028	Thomas iyafotai iyau , “ Yau au Bada a yau au God ! ”
43020029	Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Om ututum yabin om matamui bag Yau uteu on mes i ? Osi sabu iyabon Yau men matasi siteu baise sebitutum , osi auris on yasisir gagamin ! ”
43020030	Iesu on bobo buburis fani sigaraba an baigibubunuotis matasi ifofour on men atonio buk amonai sigayamen on .
43020031	Baise atonio osi sigagayamen onai omi wonitutum Iesu on Orot Rurubinin God Natun ato omi On wonitutumai on Wabinai yawas wonboai .
43021001	On gibunai , Iesu irobotet men an baigibubunuotis auris Tiberias kamitai nan . On bobo atonio nanaba ifour .
43021002	Simon Peter , Thomas ( on seyoyorai Sisiru ) , Nathanael ( ato Cana mafam gagamin Galilee tafanam emon i’nat on ) , Zebedee nanatun a Iesu an baigibubunuotis ruam on engon nan .
43021003	Simon Peter on osi auris iyau , “ Yau anan an bosag . ” Osi siyawur siyau , “ Wei wannat mat tanan . ” On mes osi sinai wayai sikaruge ; baise on fom weromin on osi men iyan tani siyonai on .
43021004	Wera igeg mom , Iesu on toreai nan itatawar baise baigibubunuotis on men sisagob on Iesu .
43021005	Namon On itetemis iyau , “ Jorig omi men iyan tani woiyonai i ? ” Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Ambin bag . ”
43021006	On osi auris iyau , “ Omi ami uwat on wa auasumaiauai nan woreben egat ato arimon iyan woniyonen . ” On mes osi uwat sireben igat ato men fofonin uwat sittein men itar on yabin osi iyan sigaraba bag siyonen on mes .
43021007	Baigibubunuotin on Iesu an nuabo on Peter aurin iyau , “ Nan on Bada ! ” Peter on dura itatam on Bada , on an beber tefanai ibitakwakwarai on iyot men ( yabin on an beber min iboseseiren ) ato kamitai isobit .
43021008	Baigibubunuotis fani on wa siboi sirui au tore , uwat amonai iyan sigaraba bag siyonen on auman siteteinin . Osi sirui tore aurin siufin on an weromin on 100 mita nanaba .
43021009	Osi wa emon sigat sisur toreai sitawar mom , osi sit wairaf iyoyour on nan iyan siteterai a rafi sarar on mabisi si’yen .
43021010	Namon Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi iyan fani ato arimon wororout on woboen wonat . ”
43021011	Simon Peter wa tefanai ikaruge ato uwat amonai iyan gagamis sigaraba on engon 153 tefanai auman on nanaba si’yonis on itein irui , basit iyan on sison kwakwan ato uwat on men isafef on .
43021012	Iesu osi auris iyau , “ Omi wonat wam . ” Baigibubunuotis on men iyafan tani igogoi ititetemai itau , “ Om on iyafan ? ” yabin osi sisagob on Bada .
43021013	On mes Iesu inai rafi sarar ibo ato ites ; iyan aurin on eb bobo kaitamom nanaba ifour .
43021014	Atonio on wera baitonin Iesu an baigibubunuotis auris Toun iyoboes ato God rabob emon ibobaimisirai gibunai on .
43021015	Bayu siyam isawar gibunai Iesu on Simon Peter aurin iyau , “ Simon , John natun , om min Yau uinuaboiu kwakwan men atonio osi sabu fani ba i ? ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Dura bag Bada , Om usagob yau on Om ainuaboim . ” Iesu aurin iyau , “ Om au foro sheep bobous unkaifares . ”
43021016	Iesu on dura bairuin ba on aurin iyau men , “ Simon , John natun , om min Yau uinuaboiu i ? ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Dura bag Bada , yau on Om ainuaboim . ” Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Om au foro sheep unkaifares . ”
43021017	Iesu on wera baitonin ba aurin iyau men , “ Simon , John natun , om min Yau uinuaboiu i ? ” Peter on iyababan yabin Iesu on wera baitonin nanaba itetemai iyau , “ Om min Yau uinuaboiu i ? ” On mes Peter on Bada aurin iyau , “ Bada , Om bobo engon tutufin usagob ; Om usagob yau min Om ainuaboim ! ” Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Om au foro sheep unkaifares .
43021018	Yau awurem dura bag : Om jorei boboum umama on om ubotitiwagim am gogoi nanaba on menan menan ubibib baise om uiorot on om imam unotet ingat ato orot tani inousim , ato men om agogoi efan nan utan , on nan inboem unan . ”
43021019	( Iesu atonio dura iyau , on iyoboai Peter mamaba inarab God inbiduduranai aurin on . ) Namon Iesu on aurin iyau , “ Om Yau eigibubunueu ! ”
43021020	Peter irutabir ato baigibubunuotin tani Iesu an nuabo on kounai it — on orot min Iesu mat rabirabi Bada an bayu si’yam nan dogaranai iyenbar ato itetemai iyau , “ Bada iyafan Om inkaseirim mes i ? ”
43021021	Peter on it ato Iesu itetemai iyau , “ Bada , ato atonio orot on mamaba i ? ”
43021022	Iesu iyafotai iyau , “ Yau angogoi on nana inama ato Yau anmatabir men , ato om aibo mes on ebinonotai i ? Om Yau eigibubunueu ! ”
43021023	On mes on Iesu an baigibubunuotis sanasi dura irat on atonio baigibubunuotin on men inarab . Baise Iesu on men iyau on men inarab ; On iyau , “ Yau angogoi on nana inama weie , Yau anmatabir men , om aibo mes on ebinonotai i ? ”
43021024	On baigibubunuotin on atonio osi bobo auris on ikakafun ; on min on buk amonai mat igayamen ; ato ot tasagob atonio dura aifan i’yau on dura maiauin .
43021025	Bobo sigaraba maiau Iesu ifour . Atonio osi bobo kakaita kakaita auris on buk amonai sitgagayamen on , anonosin tafanam au engonai on arimon buk wat on itfafar .
44001001	Arie Theophilus : Au buk ainauinai on bobo engon tutufin Iesu ibobo a ibibebe on agayam , ato ainau anai bag On an bobo ibosuruf nan ,
44001002	ato inat ari ra God On ibo igai au safam . On Ayu Kakafotin an faiwarai on sabu irubinis On an baiyoyobotis mes simatar on iyawures bobo mamaba sinbobo aurin on , weie God Iesu ibo igai au safam .
44001003	On irabob gibunai , ra orot ruam amonai On ra sigaraba maiau sabu auris Toun irerebai iyoboes , ato on etaiai sabu sibiyoi on auris itidura bag , On on yawasin ; ato osi On sit a osi On mat God an Baiaiwab aurin on sikakafun .
44001004	Ato osi engon sinat siruayo ato , On atonio dura wawaninai iyawures iyau , “ Omi men Jerusalem wonikirir mes , baise omi wonmousin Tamau siwar aurin iyaumatan on omi initem mes , on aurin min ainau akasonem nono .
44001005	John on sareuai ibapataitoim , baise ra men weromin amonai on omi arimon Ayu Kakafotinai wonibapataito . ”
44001006	Baiyoyobotis on Iesu mat siruayo ato osi On sitetemai siyau , “ Bada , Om ari wera amonai on Om arimon Baiaiwab Israel unitai men ? ”
44001007	Iesu on osi auris iyau , “ Wera o ra on Tamau ekesin Toun an baibadai nan osi bobo eyaya , ato osi bobo meyan sinmamatar auris on omi men arimon wonsagob on .
44001008	Baise Ayu Kakafotin omi aurim innanat on omi arimon faiwar wonboai ato omi arimon Yau au dura wonboai wongat wonkurereb nan , Jerusalem , Judea tafanam amonai engon , a Samaria tafanamai a inai tafanam kanfounai i’gat nan . ”
44001009	On atonio dura iyau isawar gibunai , osi On siruruaiai matasi , ato God On ibo igai au safam ; ato kasakasau inat matasi ibofotai .
44001010	On igai inai isawar , ato osi nana matas on safam wat si’tai , ra kaita orot ruam beber kakakaiis wat simonag nan sesebisi sitawar .
44001011	Osi siyau , “ Galilee sabu , omi aibo mes nan wotawar matam on au safam wat wotatage ? Atonio Iesu on omi emon God ibo igai au safam , ato omi ari ato woit igeg au safam on , on eta kaitamomai nanaba On arimon inmatabir men innat . ”
44001012	Namon baiyoyobotis Olive Oyau emon simatabir men sinat au Jerusalem , on efan on men weroromin bag kilomita kaitamom nanaba mafam gagamin bisinai .
44001013	Osi sinai Jerusalem mafam gagamin amonai sirui ato sigai goa ann werominai , menan osi simama nan : Peter , John , James a Andrew , Philip a Thomas , Bartholomew a Matthew , James , Alphaeus natun , Simon , tafanam an rufafarin an orot a Judas , James natun .
44001014	Osi on ra fufur siruruayo sibikaita ato sibabayoi , jever fani mat nan a Mary Iesu ayon a Iesu taitain min si’nat nan mat sibabayoi .
44001015	Ra fani sisawar gibunai baitutumotis fani ba siruayo , osi sabu on engon orot nimtereban kaita on tefanai nanaba , ato Peter imisir dura ikakafun .
44001016	On iyau , “ Yau taitaiu tutuau , God an dura buk amonai sigayam , Ayu Kakafotin on David ibonuai ato on Judas aurin on ikakafun iyau , on arimon sabu inbonanawaiis sinan Iesu sinfatumai , ato on dura min ari inat idura bag .
44001017	Judas on ot ati kuayo an orot tani , yabin on sirubinai ot bobo tabobo nanaba on ibobo . ”
44001018	( Judas on bobo komasin ifofour an agim sibibaiyanai on ibo ato motob itobon , ato on motobai nan anjon konat iyein ifeu irabob ; ato yan itaseb amon an sawar on engon rerebai sigat sifeuen .
44001019	Sabu engon Jerusalem simama on duran sitatam , on mes osi asi durai on ato motob aurin siyor siyau , Akeldama , on an yabin min , “ Tara an motob . ” )
44001020	Peter an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Buk Psalm amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ On an goa on arimon sinikirir wagan wat inen , men iyafan tani arimon on goa amonai inama on , ’ mat dura sigayam siyau , ‘ Orot tani arimon on an efan inboai bobo inabo . ’
44001021	“ On mes orot tani on ot sanati inar mat Iesu Keriso rabob emon imisir aurin on an dura tankurereb . On orot min osi sabu iyabon ot ati kuayo amonai ra fufur Bada Iesu mat tabibib on tani wonrubinai , a ainau anai bag John on bapataito aurin dura ibibino on nana inat ato ari ra igat God Iesu ibo igai au safam . ”
44001022	
44001023	On mes osi orot ruam wabis sibatonen : Joseph , on orot on seyoyorai Barsabbas ( mat on orot wabin tani seyoyorai Justus ) , a Matthias .
44001024	Namon osi sibayoi siyau , “ Bada , Om sabu engon tutufin nunuas on usagoben . On mes Bada , Om eiyoboei atonio orot ruam amosi on menan on urubinai ,
44001025	on efan inboai baiyoyobotin mes inmatar bobo inabo ato Judas ibikirir on ato on bobo komasin ifour on fasinai on toun an efan irubin on nan inai . ”
44001026	Namon osi barom siyo ato osi orot ruam wabis sibobo on orot iyafan on sitrubinai on bobo itboai mes . Ato osi wab sirubinai on Matthias , ato baiyoyobotis auyotoat sasagin kaita simama on amosi sibo siwan siyamai asi kuayo irat .
44002001	Pentecost an ra gagamin inat , ato baitutumotis engon tutufin on sinat efan kaitamomai nan siruayo .
44002002	Ra kaita safam emon rarabin inat , on rarabin on yabat wawanin isisin ba , ato isur sabu efan menan simama on nan goa amonai engon tutufin ibonuai .
44002003	Namon osi sit wairaf wamemeran on sabu sigaraba fafes , ba itareremot auris i’gat i’tagege ; ato fafen igat sabu kakaita kakaita nan simama on usisi sitog .
44002004	Osi sabu engon tutufin on Ayu Kakafotin ibonues ato osi sibosuruf sabu touman fonasi nan dura sibikakafun , Ayu Kakafotin ifouris on dura nanaba sibikakafun .
44002005	Jew Yangan nan Jerusalem simama , osi sabu on God sekwakwafirai yangan on tafanam engon tutufin emon sinat .
44002006	Osi atonio fonas wafararabis sitatam mom on , sabu kuayo gagamin bag on engon tutufin siruayo . Osi engon sinonot wat , yabin osi sabu kakaita kakaita sitatam baitutumotis on osi fonasi nan dura sibikakafun .
44002007	Osi on siduduran a sinonot wat ato siyau , “ Osi sabu atonio dura sibikakafun on — engon tutufin Galilee yangan !
44002008	Ato mamaba mes on ot engon tatamis osi on ot ati dura bag on sibikakafun ?
44002009	Ot on tafanam Parthia , Media a Elam emon tanat a Mesopotamia , Judea a Cappadocia emon tanat ; Pontus a Asia emon tanat ,
44002010	ot on Phrygia a Pamphylia emon tanat , Egypt emon a Libya tafanam Cyrene bisinai on emon tanat ; ot sabu fani on Rome emon tanat ,
44002011	ot on Jew yangan a sabu men Jew yangan on sinat Jew yangan mes simatar ; ot sabu fani on Crete nua a Arabia tafanam emon tanat , — baise ot engon tatatam , osi on ot tout ati dura on sibikakafun mamaba God bobo gagamis ifofour auris on ! ”
44002012	Osi on siduduran a sitagogois auman nana sibitetem bonen si’yau , “ Atonio bobo an yabin on abifan ? ”
44002013	Baise sabu fani on baitutumotis auris sikobois si’yau , “ Atonio osi sabu on sareu wawanin sitoman sikokok ! ”
44002014	Namon Peter on imisir itawar baiyoyobotis auyotoat sasagin kaita mat ato on fonan aumiet bag nan sabu kuayo gagamin auris ibosuruf dura ikakafun iyau : “ Yau au sabu Jew yangan , a omi sabu engon tutufin nin Jerusalem womama on au dura wontatam , ato atonio bobo an yabin on ankasonem .
44002015	Atonio osi sabu on men sareu wawanin sitoman sikokok on , omi wononosin on nanaba ; ato ari on fomenei wera nimtereban baibatin nanaba .
44002016	Baise aubairuruotin Joel on atonio bobo ari imamatar aurin on ikakafun :
44002017	God iyau : ‘ Ra kanfounai on Yau arimon atonio bobo nanaba anafour , Yau arimon au Ayu on sabu engon tutufin auris an debur . Omi nanatum orot a jeverig on arimon God an dura inboai ingat auris ato osi sabu auris dura sinkurereb ; omi nanatum jorig on arimon God an dura maiauin on rerebai inboai ingat iniyoboes matasi bomomoutai ba sinitai , ato nanatum sabu kawian on bomomoutai nan God an dura maiauin on sineit .
44002018	Dura bag , on an rai on Yau arimon au Ayu on au agirotis orot a jever on auris andebur , ato osi God an dura auris inboai ingat sinkurereb .
44002019	Yau arimon safam aiyetunai nan bobo buburis anafour , a bobo baiduduranis on nin tafanamai anafour . Arimon tara , wairaf a bakur babadoan on sinmatar ,
44002020	ato wera matan on arimon inwouman , ato roke on arimon matan mururin tara ba inmatar , weie Bada an Ra gagamin bag on innat .
44002021	Ato iyai iyafan Bada Wabin ebaton eyoyor on arimon inyawas . ’
44002022	“ Omi Israel yangan , atonio dura wontatam ! Iesu Nazareth emon on omi aurim God irubinai on rerebai bobo buburis , bobo baiduduranis , a bobo buburis ta ta on , God Toun Natun emon on ato bobo rerebai ifouren , ato omi toum on wosagob ; ato ari bobo min nin sanamui bag imatar .
44002023	God , Toun an gogoiai a an sagobai on inonotai nono on Iesu omi imamui ityagai ; ato omi wasubun , sabu bokomasotis sibaisim nabai sidudun .
44002024	Baise God On rabob emon ibobaimisirai men ; On rabob an babanis emon on irufanai , yabin rabob on men fofonin arimon itbotan itfatumai on .
44002025	Yabin David min On aurin iyau , ‘ Yau ra fufur Bada on nawui nan aitai ; On yau au asumaiauai nan etatawar , onai yau men arimon komasin angaturai on .
44002026	On yabinai yau nunuau ebiyasisir a yau on yasisirai wat dura abikakafun ; ato yau on asir orot maiauiu wat , ato orot fani ba , ato yau on yaterabobai nan amomousin God auriu inafour mes ,
44002027	yabin Om men arimon ayubiu unikirir nin rasiai inen mes ; Om am agirotin Kakafotin on men unikirir rasiai inafim mes .
44002028	Om on eta ato inai yawas aurin i’gat on uyoboeu , ato Om yau bisiwui emama on mes , yau abiyasisir . ’
44002029	“ Yau taitaiu tutuau : Yau on dura bag wat anawurem ato agirit David aurin on . On irabob sigarobai , ato on an rasi on ari ot bisiti i’yen inat ari ra igat .
44002030	David on aubairuruotin , ato God on aurin aifan iyaumatan on isagob : God iyaumatan ifaro iyau on David an dam an warar amonai arimon orot tani iniyamai innat iniAiwab , ato David ba .
44002031	David it God arimon bobo mamaba inafour , on mes on Keriso an bobaimisir aurin ikakafun iyau , ‘ On men arimon rasiai nan inikirir on ; On usin bion on arimon men inafim . ’
44002032	God on , atonio Iesu on rabob emon ibobaimisirai , ato wei engon tutufin On mataii wait , on mes wei omi aurim dura wakurereb .
44002033	God on Iesu ibobaimisirai ato On an asumaiauai emama , ato Taman mamaba Ayu Kakafotin aurin iyaumatanai on itai ; ato ari aifan matamui woitai a dura wotatam on nan On an siwar on ato ot aurit idebur isur .
44002034	David toun on men igai au safam on ; baise on iyau , ‘ Bada on yau au Bada aurin iyau : Om nin au asumaiauai emair ,
44002035	ato Yau am ragit anboes sinsur om am baibad babanai sinama . ’
44002036	“ Omi Israel sabu engon tutufin wonsagob dura bag , atonio Iesu omi nabai wodudun on , God ifourai inat Bada a Keriso imatar ! ”
44002037	Sabu atonio dura sitatam mom on nunuas iyo kwakwan , ato simisir Peter a baiyoyobotis fani auris siyau , “ Wei taitai tutuai , wei on mamaba wanafour i ? ”
44002038	Peter on osi auris iyau , “ Omi sabu kakaita kakaita on ya baikitabir wonboai , ato Iesu keriso Wabinai wonibapataito , onai God omi ami bokomas innotbur ; ato omi God an siwar , Ayu Kakafotin on wonboai .
44002039	Yabin God an aumatan on omi a nanatum auris iyaumatan , ato omi iyabon nanenei womama on — omi engon aurim on ati Bada God eyoyorem . ”
44002040	Peter on dura sigaraba maiau osi auris ibo igat ikakafun , ato on osi sabu auris isosoan iyau , “ Baimaki atonio sabu komasis auris enat on , on emon on toum woniyawasim ! ”
44002041	Sabu sigaraba maiau Peter an dura aurin on situtum ato sibapataito ; on ra nan on sabu 3,000 nanaba on sinat asi kuayo amonai sirui .
44002042	Osi asi wera siyein ato baiyoyobotis simisir sibebeyes , mat siruruayo sibikaita , rafi sarar siyabaseseb baitutumotis engon kaitanei , si’yam a engon Bada aurin sibabayoi .
44002043	Baiyoyobotis on bobo buburis a bobo baiduduranis on sigaraba sifouren , ato on bobo iyamai on sabu asi kakaf on gagamin siyein .
44002044	Baitutumotis engon on nana siruruayo sibikaita , ato asi sawar on siraram bonen .
44002045	Osi asi motob a asi sawar on sabu fani auris sitobonen ato agim siboai sabu kakaita kakaita asi gogoi on sibaisis siraram bonen .
44002046	Osi ra fufur nana siruruayo tafaror goai sibikaita , a osi sabu kakaita kakaita asi goai nan siruruayo sibikaita rafi sarar siyabaseseb ato osi nunuas on kaitamomai a yasisirai bayu si’yam ,
44002047	osi God sibifain a sabu engon tutufin osi auris on men sunub sigogoiis on a auris sibiyasisir . Ra fufur sabu sigaraba maiau on yawas si’boai ; ato Bada on osi sabu iboes baitutumotis asi kuayo amonai ibiwanis .
44003001	Ra tani , rabirabi wera ton nanaba Peter a John rus sinai tafaror goai sitbayoi mes , on wera nanaba on sabu engon seruruayo sebabayoi .
44003002	On tafaror goa metewan on seyoyorai , “ Metewan Obin , ” on efanai on orot ann raguraguin auman irat , on nan imama . Sabu on ra fufur on orot on siboai si’nat atonio metewan awanai nan siyeyeirai imama ato , sabu au tafaror goa si’nan on auris agim mes ikafefeyan .
44003003	On iyeit Peter a John rus ites au tafaror goa sirur ato on ifefeyanis sawar aifan tani on sititai mes .
44003004	Osi matas on totor wat on orot aurin siyeit sit , ato Peter iyau , “ Om matam yeit wei eitei ! ”
44003005	On mes on matan totor iyeit osi ites , ato ibinonot on sawar aifan tani osi emon itboai mes .
44003006	Peter on orot aurin iyau , “ Yau auriu on agim ambin bag , baise yau auriu aifan yen on anitem : Iesu Keriso Nazareth emon Wabinai dura wawaninai awurem , om emisir unabib ! ”
44003007	Namon on iyof orot iman asumaiauai ibo ato ibaisin imisir itawar . Ra kaita orot ann a ann afukumin on siwani ;
44003008	on iroboge annai itawar ; ato ibosuruf ibibib . Namon on osi orot ruam mat sibib sirui au tafaror goai , on ibib iroroboge God ibifain .
44003009	Sabu kuayo gagamin on orot sit ibibib a God ibifain ;
44003010	osi on orot sit sisagob on kafefeyanotin nan tafaror goa awan wabin , “ Metewan Obin ” , on nan imama on , osi engon tutufin siduduran a sinonotis wat ato bobo aifan orot aurin imamatar on .
44003011	Orot kafefeyanotin on iman iyof Peter a John rus ibokikines mat sibibib on , sabu engon siduduran ato siyayai sinai tafaror goa amonai efan wabin seyoyorai , “ Solomon An Tebo , ” on nan auris sigat .
44003012	Peter sabu ites mom ato on osi auris iyau , “ Israel sabu , omi aibo mes atonio bobo woit on woiror , ato omi aibo mes wei woruruaii ? Omi wononosin on wei ai faiwarai a wei on obi wat God matanai , on mes onai ato orot wabogaiai ebibib ?
44003013	Abraham , Isaac a Jacob asi God a wawat agirit asi God , On an agirotin Iesu Wabin gagamin itai On baifain baiduduranin mes . Omi wobo babadis imasi woyagai , ato omi Pilate nanai On woisisiweiai , baise Pilate on gibui inonotai On ityatetai mes .
44003014	On Orot on Kakafotin a an yawas on totorin wat , baise omi woisisiweiai , ato angaramin on omi Pilate woifefeyanai ami gogoi on ifour , orot asububunenotin on irufanai igat weinem .
44003015	Ato omi Orot ato sabu ibinetewaris yawas siboai on wasubun . Baise God On rabob emon ibobaimisirai — ato wei On aurin on ato an dura wakurereb .
44003016	Iesu Wabin an faiwar emon on ato faiwar orot raguraguin itai . Omi bobo aifan matamui woitai a wosasagob on wei ai baitutum On Wabinai wayein ; on mes bobo imatar ; wei ai baitutum Iesu aurin wayein on ato omi engon namui ato iyawas .
44003017	“ Ato yau taitaiu tutuau . Yau asagob omi a omi ami babadis mat on atonio bobo aifan Iesu aurin wofour , yabin omi on men wosagob .
44003018	God ainau bag dura ikakafun aubairuruotis engon auris ato osi dura sikurereb , on Keriso arimon inikokosarai ; atonio etaiai on bobo engon ifour inat idura bag .
44003019	Omi ya baikitabir wonboai ato God aurin wonrutabir , ato On arimon ami bokomas insouen ,
44003020	ato Bada an Ayu faiwarin on inibobounim , onai Iesu iniyafarai , On ainau omi aurim on sirubinai nono , On min Keriso .
44003021	On nan nana safamai inama , ato an wera innat weie bobo engon infouren bobous sinmatar , God atonio dura on ainau bag ikakafun nono , an aubairuruotis kakafotis auris , ato osi sabu sikasones .
44003022	Yabin Moses iyau , ‘ Bada am God on arimon aubairuruotin tani iniyafarai , ato yau ibiyafareu ba , on orot min arimon omi toum sanamui emon . On dura aifan engon inawurem on aurin wonifonabo .
44003023	Iyai iyafan aubairuruotin an dura inbikakafun aurin men inifonabo , on arimon God an sabu emon on inkusebai mabinai nan sinikomasai . ’
44003024	Aubairuruotin Samuel a aubairuruotis fani mat a aubairuruotis fani iyabon osi gibui si’nat on , engon dura God ites , ato ari ra bobo semamatar auris on ainau dura sikurereb nono .
44003025	Omi aurim on God an dura aubairuruotis auris iyaumatan , ato God an dura bobaibasit wawat agirit auris ibiyamai on wobo . On Abraham aurin iyau , ‘ Omi wawam agirim emon on Yau sabu engon tutufin tafanamai on animomogines . ’
44003026	On mes God On an Agirotin irubinai ato ainau omi aurim iyafarai , inimomoginem a omi sabu engon tutufin ami yawas komasis wofofour emon on inibaisim wonikirir mes . ”
44004001	Peter a John rus on nana sabu auris dura sibikakafun ato priest a tafaror goa kaifarotis asi orot gagamin a Sadducee yangan , osi sinat auris .
44004002	Osi babadis on yas sitatab kwakwan yabin baiyoyobotis ruam on Iesu rabob emon imisir men an dura on sabu sibibebeyes , on dura an yabin ebidura bag sabu rabobis on arimon sinmisir men .
44004003	On mes Jew asi babadis simisir Peter a John rus sifatumes , ato wera isofafir on mes osi siboes fafatum goai sireberues , ra itatom weie sititetemis .
44004004	Baise sabu engon tutufin atonio dura sitatam on situtum ; sabu on dura aurin sibitutum on 5,000 nanaba .
44004005	Ra itom Jew babadis , sabu kawian , a Baifafaro an baibebeotis , osi engon Jerusalem nan siruayo .
44004006	Jew asi Priest Ainauis wabis Annas a Caiaphas , John , Alexander a sabu fani osi on eb Priest Ainauis asi dam turin emon , osi engon tutufin nan mat kaita siruayo .
44004007	Osi sabuis on baiyoyobotis ruam siboes nasi sitawaris ato sitetemis siyau , “ Omi abi faiwarai a iyafan wabinai , on atonio bobo nanaba wofour ? ”
44004008	Peter Ayu Kakafotin ibonuai ato iyafotes iyau , “ Omi sabu asi babadis a sabu kawian :
44004009	Wei ari nin namui watatawar on ato bobo obin wafour orot raguraguin aurin a mat on mamaba iyayawas aurin on omi wei wobitetemi ,
44004010	ato omi babadim a Israel yangan engon wonsagob tiwag . Atonio orot omi namui etatawar on Iesu Keriso Nazareth emon on Wabin an faiwarai iyawas — On Orot min omi nabai wokubarai ato God rabob emon ibobaimisirai .
44004011	Iesu aurin on God an dura buk amonai sigayam siyau , ‘ Omi goa baigoyonotim , matan ainau arir woit wonos on men obin on mes woisisiweiai , baise omi gibui wosagob , on arir on iyobin bag , mat gagamin bag arir engon tefasi . ’
44004012	Yawas on , On ekesin emon wat tangaturai ; men iyafan tani atonio tafanamai On Wabin God itai sabu auris , ab Iesu ekesin mom on ot iniyawasit . ”
44004013	Jew babadis Rurubinis on siduduran kwakwan ato sit Peter a John rus dura totor wat osi auris sibikakafun on , osi men siber mes , ato osi gibui sisagob ato orot ruam on men sigayam on , osi asir mafam sabu wat . Osi sisagob orot ruam on Iesu tuturan ainau On mat siboen sibib .
44004014	Ato osi men fofonin arimon abi dura tani sitikakafun on , yabin osi sit orot raguraguin on iyawas nan Peter a John mat sitatawar .
44004015	On mes osi simisir orot ruam siyawures ato Jew babadis Rurubinis asi efan emon on sigat au koun ato osi Jew babadis Rurubinis wat tous amosi sidudurai mamaba on bobo sitiyamai mes .
44004016	Osi tous wat sitetemis siyau , “ Atonio osi orot ruam on mamaba tanfouris ? Sabu engon tutufin nin Jerusalem amonai semama on sisagob mamaba osi bobo buburin gagamin sifour on , ato ot men fofonin dura tanibuni on .
44004017	Baise ot atonio bobo on tanyafotai weie dura inarat ingat sabu engon tutufin sinsagob , ot atonio osi orot ruam on dura wawaninai tanawures men gibui Iesu Wabinai dura sinikakafun mes . ”
44004018	On mes osi orot ruam siyores men sirui ato dura wawaninai siyawures siyau , “ Omi men meyan gibui Iesu Wabin aurin on sabu auris dura wonikakafun o wonibebeyes men . ”
44004019	Baise Peter a John rus on siyafotes siyau , “ Omi toum woitetemim tait , bobo menan on obin God matanai , wei omi aurim wanifonabo o wei God aurin wanifonabo .
44004020	Wei on bobo aifan toui mataii wait a dura watatam on men meyan wanikirir mes , wei on nana sabu auris dura wanbikakafun . ”
44004021	Jew babadis Rurubinis simisir dura wawaninai nan orot ruam siyau beberues ato sikirires sinai . Jew babadis Rurubinis on men sisagob mamaba arimon sitimakies , yabin sabu engon tutufin on God sibifain ato bobo aifan imamatar matasi sitai on .
44004022	Ato orot raguraguin aurin bobo buburin sifour iyayawas on an kwanda orot ruam nanaba .
44004023	Jew babadis Rurubinis on Peter a John rus sikirires sigat mom , osi simatabir men sinai asi kuayo baiyoyobotis tuturas auris nan dura engon sikasones mamaba Jew asi priest aiwabis a sabu kawian osi auris dura siyawures on .
44004024	Baiyoyobotis on dura sitatam isawar , osi engon siruayo sikaita ato fonas sibogai God aurin sibayoi siyau , “ Bada , Om safam , tafanam , kamit a sawar aifan ato amosi sen on engon ufouren !
44004025	Am Ayu Kakafotinai am dura ukakafun wei agiri David aurin , on min Om am agirotin , on ato nanaba ikakafun iyau , ‘ Aibo mes sabu men Jew yangan on sebiyatatab kwakwan ? ; aibo mes sabu bobo komasis Bada aurin sinfouren mes on sebitarasisib , ato baise osi sebitarasisib on yabin ambin .
44004026	Tafanam asi aiwabis on sebotitiwag sinigagam mes , ato tafanam asi bainetewarotis on siruayo asi bainonot on sebidudurai mamaba Bada a On an Orot Rurubinin rus auris siniragit mes . ’
44004027	Dura bag Herod , Pontius Pilate , sabu men Jew yangan a Israel sabu fani osi engon atonio Jerusalem mafam gagaminai siruayo Om am agirotin Iesu Kakafotin , Om ufourai inat Orot Rurubinin imatar , on siniragitai mes .
44004028	Om am gogoiai am faiwarai ainau atonio bobo ubotitiwag i’yen , on ari sabu siruayo on bobo sefofour inmatar .
44004029	Ato Bada osi asi dura aifan sebikakafun on etatamis , osi dura komasis wei auri sebikakafun sau beberuei , ato wei on Om am agiroti , baibais eitei onai wei Om am dura engon totor faiwarinai wat wankurereb , men wanaber mes .
44004030	Ato God Om am faiwar eiyoboei , onai Om am agirotim Iesu Kakafotin Wabinai wei on sabu sawauotis waniyawasis , a bobo baiduduranis a bobo buburis on wanfouren . ”
44004031	Osi sibayoi isawar ato efan menan siruruayo on nan iyuwe . Ato osi engon tutufin on Ayu Kakafotin ibonues ato osi sibosuruf God an dura on totor wat sikakafun , men siber mes .
44004032	Sabu baitutumotis engon tutufin on asi not a nunuas engon kaitamom wat . Men iyafan tani an sawar on toun aurin wat ibo inoanai mes , ab asi sawar aifan auris siyen on engon tutufin siraram bonen .
44004033	God an faiwarai , Bada Iesu rabob emon imimisir men aurin on baiyoyobotis on dura nana faiwarinai sikurereb , ato Bada an baimomogin gagamin on osi engon tutufin auris idebur isur .
44004034	Osi sabu amosi nan on men iyafan tani sawar aifan auris iyababan mes . Osi sabu iyabon auris motob , o goa si’yen on sabu fani auris sitotobon , ato agim siboai si’nat ,
44004035	ato baiyoyobotis nasi siyeyeinin , ato osi on agim min siboai sabu iyabon auris sawar ambin on siraramis .
44004036	Ato orot wabin Joseph , baiyoyobotis on wabin tani seyoyorai Barnabas ( on an yabin min “ Orot Kufaiwarotin . ” ) on orot on Levi an dam emon , on min Cyprus nua on nan irat ,
44004037	on an motob ibinoanai on sabu fani auris itobon ato agim ibo inat baiyoyobotis nasi iyein .
44005001	Baise orot tani wabin Ananias , on awan wabin min Sapphira . Osi rus on asi motob ibinoanis on turin sitobon ,
44005002	baise Ananias agim turin ibo on noan mes ato awan jever min isagob ato agim turin wat on ibo inai baiyoyobotis nasi iyein .
44005003	Peter on aurin iyau , “ Ananias , om aibo mes Afaguban uikirir nunuamui irui ato ifourim Ayu Kakafotin uisigoai , om am motob utobon ato agim turin on om ubo inoanim ?
44005004	Motob on om noam weie ubo utobon , ato on motob utobon gibunai , agim ubo on eb om noam . Ato om aibo mes nunuamui uinonot on bobo nanaba ufour ? Om on men orot jever wat uisigoes on — ab om on God mat uisigoai ! ”
44005005	Ananias on dura itatam mom on ra kaita ifeu irabob ; ato sabu engon tutufin on dura sitatam on siber kwakwan .
44005006	Namon jorig sinat orot usin sikiman ato sibo sinai sigarobai .
44005007	Wera ton nanaba isawar gibunai , awan jever ba inat , baise jever on men isagob bobo aifan imatar .
44005008	Peter on jever aurin iyau , “ Om ekasoneu , awam Ananias rum motob wototobon min ami agim tutufin on nanaba wobo i ? ” Jever iyafotai iyau , “ Dura bag , motob an baiyan tutufin on nanaba wabo . ”
44005009	On mes Peter on jever aurin iyau , “ Om aibo mes awam rum wogogoi Bada an Ayu wotrutobonai mes ? Eite ! Sabu osi awam sigagarob min ato metewan awanai setatawar , ato osi min arimon om ba sinboem sinan ! ”
44005010	Ra kaita jever on Peter nanai ifeu irabob . Jorig sirui , sit on irabob nono , on mes osi jever sibo sinai awan orot sesebinai sigarobai .
44005011	Ekalesia yangan a sabu fani engon on dura sitatam on , men sunub siber .
44005012	Baiyoyobotis on bobo buburis a bobo baiduduranis on sigaraba maiau sabu sanasi sifouren . Baitutumotis engon tutufin on efan wabin seyoyorai , “ Solomon An Tebo , ” on nan siruayo .
44005013	Sabu fani ato kuayo kounai on siber men fofonin arimon baitutumotis amosi sitar on , ab osi auris on sibifais , dura obis wat auris sibikakafun .
44005014	Baise sabu sigaraba bag on sirur asi kuayo amonai — orot a jever kuayo gagamin on Bada sibitutumai .
44005015	Baiyoyobotis asi bobo sibobo duran sitatam on , osi sabu sawauotis siboes sinat etai nan asi ire siyabaren a enbubur sawar sibotitiwagen nan siyeinis si’yen ato Peter itabib itananan on , an gugubai wat on sabu fani usisi itag .
44005016	Ato sabu kuayo sigaraba on mafam gagamis fani ato Jerusalem amonai , on nan sabu sawauotis a sabu osi iyabon ayu komasis tefasi simama on siboen sinat ; ato osi engon siyawas .
44005017	Namon Priest Ainauin a on tuturan engon mat , Jew asi babadis kuayo fani wabis Sadducee , osi on men sunub siboboar baiyoyobotis auris on ; on mes osi sinonot bobo tani sitafour mes .
44005018	Osi baiyoyobotis sifatumes ato wasa an fafatum goai nan sireberues .
44005019	Baise on fom on Bada an anea on fafatum goa an metewan iruseren ato baiyoyobotis ibonanawaiis sigat au koun , ato osi auris iyau ,
44005020	“ Omi wonan tafaror goai wontawar ato atonio yawas boboun aurin on sabu wonkasones . ”
44005021	Baiyoyobotis on sifonabo ato fomenei fomenei on tafaror goa amonai sirui , ato baibebe sibosuruf . Priest Ainauin a on tuturan mat on Jew sabu kawian engon siyawures siruayo ato siyamai Jew babadis Rurubinis engon tutufin sikaita ; ato sabu siyafares sinai fafatum goai nan baiyoyobotis sitboes sitnat nasi sittawar mes .
44005022	Baise babadis sinai on baiyoyobotis men fafatum goai simama sigatures on ; on mes osi simatabir men Jew babadis Rurubinis engon auris ato dura ato nanaba sikasones siyau ,
44005023	“ Wei wanai fafatum goai on metewan sikuabinen tiwag si’yen , ato fafatum goa kaifarotis engon on metewan awas on sikakaifaren ; baise wei metewan waruruserenen on men iyafan tani wagaturai on ! ”
44005024	Tafaror goa an kaifarotis asi bainetewarotin a priest aiwabis on dura sitatam mom on osi sinonotis , bobo aifan imatar baiyoyobotis auris .
44005025	Namon orot irui ato osi auris iyau , “ Omi wontatam ! Sabu ato woboes fafatum goai worereberues on , nan tafaror goai sitawar sabu sebibebeyes ! ”
44005026	On mes tafaror goa kaifarotis asi bainetewarotin on an sabu mat sinai ato baiyoyobotis siboes simatabir men . Osi men asi faiwar tutufinai nan siboes on , yabin osi siber sabu ari agimai sitborarabis mat .
44005027	Osi baiyoyobotis siboes sirui ato Jew babadis Rurubinis on nasi sitawar , ato Priest Ainauin itetemis .
44005028	On iyau , “ Wei dura wawaninai wawurem men atonio Orot Wabin on sabu auris wonibebeyes mes , baise omi bobo aifan wofofour on woit ! Omi ami baibebe wobiyamai on Jerusalem amonai engon ibonu ato omi ami duraiai wobiyamai on , On Orot an rabob aurin on wei ubar wobitei ! ”
44005029	Peter a baiyoyobotis fani on siyafotes siyau , “ Wei on God aurin wanifonabo , men orot jever auris .
44005030	Omi Iesu wasubun ato nabai wodudun , ato gibui ot tatamat asi God on rabob emon ibobaimisirai .
44005031	God ibobaimisirai ato On an asumaiauai emama , ato inat Bainetewarotin a Baiyawasotin imatar , onai Israel sabu iniyames ya baikitabir sinboai ato God asi bokomas innotbur .
44005032	Wei atonio osi bobo simatar waiten — Ayu Kakafotin mat ekakasonei on dura bag , ato God atonio siwar sabu ites iyabon On aurin sebifonabo on . ”
44005033	Jew babadis Rurubinis atonio dura sitatam on , yas sitatab kwakwan ato sigogoi baiyoyobotis sitasububunues mes .
44005034	Baise osi amosi orot Pharisee tani wabin Gamaliel , on min Baifafaro an baibebeotin ato sabu engon on sikakafai , on Jew babadis Rurubinis sanasi imisir itawar . On dura wawainai sabu iyawures baiyoyobotis sitboes sitgat mes ,
44005035	namon on Jew babadis auris iyau , “ Israel sabu , omi ami bainonot mamaba atonio osi sabu auris wonfofour on , wonkaifarem tiwag .
44005036	Omi wononosin , ainau wera faniai nan Theudas irobotet , on toun aurin ibikakafun on , orot gagamin bag ; ato sabu 400 nanaba on , on sibigibubunuai . Baise on siyasubun , ato on an baigibubunuotis on fetag fetag sitagege ato on bobo min irabob isawar .
44005037	On gibunai , Judas , Galilee orot ba irobotet , on an wera on bobo tani sibiyamai sabu wabis sibiyab nan ; on mat on sabu kuayo iboes on sibigibubunuai , baise on orot mat siyasubun ato an baigibubunuotis on fetag fetag sitagege .
44005038	On mes ari awurem , omi men bobo aifan tani atonio osi sabu auris wonafour mes . Omi asir woikirires mom , atonio bobo orot jever tous asi bainonotai sefofour on , basit on bobo on arimon insawar ,
44005039	baise on bobo on God emon innanat on , omi arimon men fofonin wonbomerubes on . Omi arimon toum wongaturem on God mat wobigagam ! ” Jew babadis Rurubinis on Gamaliel an dura aurin sifonabo .
44005040	Osi baiyoyobotis siyores sirui , ato sabu siyawures urouwawanai siyaswabires ato dura wawaninai siyawures men gibui Iesu Wabinai dura sinikakafun men ; namon osi sikirires sigat sinai .
44005041	Baiyoyobotis on Jew babadis Rurubinis sikirires mom , on osi siyasisir kwakwan yabin God isagob osi on fofonis arimon Iesu Wabin aurin on mamai a baikokosar sinboai .
44005042	Ato osi ra fufur tafaror goai a sabu asi goai nan on sabu auris nana sibibebeyes a Iesu Keriso an Wasagobin aurin on dura sikurereb .
44006001	Wera fani sisawar gibunai , sabu baigibubunuotis asi kuayo on nana irarat , ato Jew yangan iyabon Greek fonasi sibikakafun a Jew yangan iyabon men Greek fonasi sibikakafun , osi sanasi on gamo imatar . Jew yangan iyabon Greek fonasi sibikakafun on siyau , ra ra bayu seraram on asi kekena on men senonosis .
44006002	On mes baiyoyobotis auyotoat sasagis ruam on sabu baigibubunuotis on engon tutufin siyores siruayo ato siyawures siyau , “ Men iyobin wei bobo ato God an dura wakurereb on wanikirir ato wanrutabir ato bayu on wanfasararam .
44006003	On mes wei taitai tutuai , omi sanamui sabu engon nimtereban ruam nanaba on wonrubines , ato osi sabu on gigiboanotis bag a Ayu Kakafotinai ebinetewaris semama yangan , ato wei baibad wanites on bobo sinkaifarai .
44006004	Wei toui on ai wera tutufinai wanyein wanbayoi a dura wankurereb . ”
44006005	Sabu kuayo gagamin on siyasisir kwakwan baiyoyobotis asi bainonot aurin ; on mes osi sabu sirubinis , Stephen , on orot on an baitutum gagamin a Ayu Kakafotin ebinetewarai emama , a Philip , Prochorus , Nicanor , Timon , Parmenas , a Nicolaus , on orot on Antioch emon inat ato on men Jew orot on , baise on inat Jew orot mes baitutumotin imatar .
44006006	Sabu kuayo ato sirurubines on baiyoyobotis sites , ato osi sabu auris sibayoi a imas tefasi siyagagaien .
44006007	Ato God an dura on nana irarat . Sabu baigibubunuotis nan Jerusalem amonai asi kuayo on irat ato irat bag , a priest yangan auman on sigaraba bag situtum .
44006008	Stephen , on orot on God an baimomogin tutufin a faiwar tutufin on itai , on bobo buburis a bobo baiduduranis gagamis sabu sanasi ifouren .
44006009	Baise sabu fani on men sigogoiai ; osi min bayoi goa an sabu fani ( ato seyoyores ) , Sabu Sirufanis , a Jew yangan mafam gagamin Cyrene a Alexandria emon sinat yangan , osi min mat nan . Osi sabu a Jew yangan ato Cilicia a Asia tafanam emon si’nat , on sibosuruf Stephen mat sigagam .
44006010	Baise Ayu ato Stephen gigiboan itai nan auris dura ibikakafun on , osi men fofonin awanai sitiyafotai on .
44006011	On mes osi simisir sabu fani auris agimai sitaram mom ato siyawures on nanaba siyau , “ Wei on watatamai Moses aurin a God aurin on dura komasis ibikakafun ! ”
44006012	On etaiai on osi sabu a sabu kawian a Baifafaro an baibebeotis on yas sikubogagaien . Osi sinat Stephen aurin ato sifatumai , sibo sinai Jew babadis Rurubinis nasi itawar .
44006013	Namon osi sabu fani siboes sirui Stephen aurin dura sitkutabir sitisigo mes . Osi siyau , “ Atonio orot on ra fufur ot ati tafaror goa kakafaiin a Moses an baifafaro dura auris ebikakafun .
44006014	Wei watatamai on iyau , atonio Iesu Nazareth emon on arimon tafaror goa ingoros insur a Moses an kik ibitet on engon inikitabiren mes ! ”
44006015	Sabu engon Jew babadis Rurubinis asi kuayoai simama on matas siyeit Stephen sit , ato on magin si’tai an itin on anea magin ba .
44007001	Priest Ainauin Stephen itetemai iyau , “ Sabu ato dura siyawurem min dura bag i ? ”
44007002	Stephen iyafotai iyau , “ Yau taitaiu tutuau , tatamau , omi wontatamiu ! Ati God Faiwarin on irobotet agirit Abraham aurin , on Mesopotamia tafanamai imama nan , weie itan Haran nan itama ,
44007003	ato God on Abraham aurin iyau , ‘ Om am dam warar a am tafanam unikirir ato unan tafanam aniyoboem on nan ungat . ’
44007004	On mes on Chaldea tafanam ikirir ato inai Haran ima . Abraham taman irabob weie , God on iyafarai inai atonio efan ari nin womama nan .
44007005	God on men atonio motob turin Abraham itai on itinoanai on , men motob kafakakai tani mes ; baise God on aurin iyaumatan on tafanam initai , ato on itinoanai a wawan agirin on gibunai senat auris . On an werai Abraham nanatun ambin an rai , on God aurin iyaumatan .
44007006	God on dura atonio nanaba on aurin iyau , ‘ Om wawam agirim on arimon tafanam toumanai sinama , nan agirotis sinmatar ato kwanda 400 amonai on sabu fani arimon yawas komasis bag on auris sinafour .
44007007	Baise Yau arimon sabu ato osi sebiyames sebiagir on animakies , weie gibui osi on tafanam sinikirir singat ato , atonio tafanamai nan Yau sinkwafireu . ’
44007008	Namon God on Abraham aurin dura bobaibasit iyamai , on dura bobaibasit min askibubu aurin baigube iyamai ato Abraham on askibubu aurin on ibasitai . On mes Isaac irat tafaror kaitamom isawar ato Abraham on natun iaskibubuai ; Isaac on natun Jacob iaskibubuai , ato Jacob on nanatun auyotoat sasagis ruam on iaskibubues , ot wawat agirit gagamis on .
44007009	“ Wawat agirit gagamis on tais Joseph aurin siboboar , ato Egypt yangan auris sitobonai asi agirotin mes imatar . Baise God on Joseph bisinai ,
44007010	ato on yawas wawanis komasis sigaraba i’gaturen emon on , obinai ikaifarai tiwag . Joseph igai Egypt asi aiwab Pharaoh nanai itatawar on , God an baibais a not gigiboan on itai . Pharaoh on Joseph baibad itai inat tafanam an gawan a aiwab an goa engon auris on kaifarotin imatar .
44007011	Namon gomar imatar tafanam Egypt a Canaan engon ibo , on bobo nanaba iyamai on baikokosar gagamin imatar . Wawat agirit on bayu men tani sigaturai on .
44007012	Ato Jacob dura itatam on sawareg nan Egypt sen , ato on nanatun iyafares , asi bib ainauin min on nan sinai , osi min ot wawat agirit .
44007013	Osi asi bib bairuinai nan on Joseph toun rerebai tutuan auris iyoboes , ato Pharaoh min Joseph tutuan isagobis .
44007014	On mes Joseph on dura taman Jacob aurin iyafar , ikasonai on nanatun engon mat sitnat au Egypt ; osi dam warar amonai on sabu engon orot ton , auyotoat , sasagis nim nanaba .
44007015	Namon Jacob isur inai au Egypt , ato on nan irabob a ot wawat agirit mat nan sirabob .
44007016	Osi usis on siboes simatabir men sinai Shechem nan rasiai sigarobis , on rasi on Abraham ato Hamor nanatun auris agim an baiyan gagaminai itotobon on .
44007017	“ God , ainau Abraham aurin iyaumatan nono on an wera inat ibiufin , ato ati sabu nan Egypt amonai simama on kuayo irat ato irat bag .
44007018	Kanfounai on orot tani boboun igai iaiwab , ato on Joseph men isagobai , on orot on ibosuruf Egypt ibinetewar .
44007019	On ot ati sabu isigoes a on an yawas komasis on wawat agirit auris ifour , on dura wawaninai iyawures nanatus gugudis siboen sigat goa kounai siya nan sitarab mes .
44007020	On an werai on Moses irat ato God matanai on fifi momogin bitan imatar . On sibo sinai goa amonai sikakaifarai mom roke ton nanaba isawar ,
44007021	ato on an goai emon sibo sigat au koun on , Pharaoh natun jeverei ibo ibobaituai irat on natun mes imatar .
44007022	On Egypt yangan asi gigiboan engon sibebeyai , ato on irat orot faiwarin bag imatar , an duraiai a an boboai .
44007023	“ Moses irat an kwanda orot ruam nanaba , ato on inonot itabib an sabu Israel yangan itfasiues mes .
44007024	On iyeit Egypt orot it , on imisir turan Jew orot aurin bobo komasin ifofour , on mes on inai turan ibaisin igaraminai ato imisir Egypt orot iyasubun .
44007025	( On inos on toun an sabu on sitsagob God on on orot iniyamai osi sabu inboseiris ingat mes ; baise osi on men sisagob . )
44007026	Ra itom , on iyeit Israel orot ruam ites sibigagam , ato on igogoi basusi tuf itiyamai mes . On iyau , ‘ Omi orot ruam wontatam , omi on ainauan gigiawan ; aibo mes toum turam rum wobigagam ? ’
44007027	Baise orot tani imisir orot turan aurin isosowar on Moses irukouai ato iyau , ‘ Om iyafan baibad item on wei uninetewari a unigurubabani mes ? ’
44007028	‘ Om egogoi yau unasubunueu , ato Egypt orot rarab uyasubun ba ? ’
44007029	Moses atonio dura itatam mom on , Egypt emon iyayai igat inai Midian tafanamai nan imama . On nan itabin ato nanatun ruam sirat .
44007030	“ Kwanda orot ruam isawar gibunai , Moses on nan efan koiteterinai Sinai Oyau bisinai . Anea on Moses aurin irobotet regai wairaf iyoyour amonai .
44007031	Moses ato bobo i’tai on iduduran , ato inai rega bisinai nan auwatin ititai tiwag mes . Baise on Bada fonan itatam , Bada dura ato nanaba iyau :
44007032	‘ Yau on wawam agirim asi God , Abraham an God , Isaac a Jacob asi God . ’ Moses on iber ann iman sibiror ato men igogoi iteit ititai men .
44007033	Bada on aurin iyau , “ Om amm kikiman on eboseir , efan ato etatawar on motob kakafaiin .
44007034	Yau ait au sabu aites Egypt nan , osi sabu yawas komasis auris sefofour sebikokosar on . Yau osi asi tou on atatam ato asur aniyawasis mes . Om enat , Yau aniyafarem unan au Egypt . ’
44007035	“ Moses , min on ainau Israel yangan men sigogoiai . Osi sitetemai siyau , ‘ Om iyafan baibad item wei uninetewari a unigurubabani mes ? ’ On orot on God iyafarai ininetewar a sabu iniyawasis mes , anea mat an baibais emon aurin igat ato wairaf regai iyoyour nan .
44007036	Moses on sabu Egypt emon ibonanawaiis sigat , on bobo buburis a bobo baiduduranis on Egypt a Red Sea nan ifouren , a efan koiteterinai nan kwanda orot ruam amonai on osi bobo ifouren .
44007037	Moses min on Israel sabu auris ikakafun iyau , ‘ God arimon ami aubairuruotin iniyafarai , ato yau ibiyafareu ba , on orot min arimon omi toum sanamui emon . ’
44007038	Atonio Moses min on Israel sabu mat nan efan koiteterinai siruayo ; on orot on wawat agirit mat nan ato anea on Sinai Oyauai nan aurin ikakafun , on God an dura yayawasin ibo ato ot aurit itet .
44007039	“ Baise ot wawat agirit on men sigogoi on aurin sitifonabo ; osi on Moses men sigogoiai , ato sabu sigogoi on sitmatabir men sitan au Egypt .
44007040	On mes osi Aaron aurin siyau , ‘ Om god fani efouren weinei osi arimon wei sinbonanawaii . Wei men wasagob bobo aifan imatar Moses aurin , on Egypt emon iboei wa’gat on . ’
44007041	On mes osi baiyuyur on siyamai foro tona boboun ba imatar , ato on aurin sirifu sikutetai , a bobo aifan ato tous imasi sifourai aurin on sibo sitab siyam sibiyasisir .
44007042	On mes God koun on osi auris iyein , ato ifouris safam an siribod on sikwakwafiren , ato mamaba aubairuruotis asi buk amonai sigagayam on nanaba imatar , God iyau , ‘ Israel sabu ; omi kwanda orot ruam amonai efan koiteterinai nan womama on men Yau auriu bobaitu worou sirifu wokuteten on .
44007043	Omi on god Moloch an guwi on wabar , a siribod an itin on god Rephan ba , on wabar wobibib ato osi engon on baiyuyur wofouren , on wokwakwafiren . On mes Yau ankusiweiim wonan Babylon tafanamai wongat . ’
44007044	“ God on Moses iyawur eta mamaba ibiyoboai , on nanaba fofonin on Guwi iyon . Ato wawat agirit nan efan koiteterinai on Guwi ato ebiyoboes God on nan emama , on siyabar sibibib .
44007045	Gibui emon , ot wawat agirit , osi tatamas bisisi emon guwi si’boai on siyabar auman Joshua mat sinai ato God on ainau sabu touman asi tafanam emon ifafaitanis si’gat weie osi si’nan tafanam si’boai . Ato on guwi min nan nana i’yen mom inat David an werai igat .
44007046	God on David aurin iyasisir , ato David on God ifefeyanai itibasitai Jacob an God on an goa ityon mes .
44007047	Baise Solomon on God an goa iyon .
44007048	“ Baise God Aiyetunenei Bag on men ato orot jever goa seyoyon on nan emama on ; ato aubairuruotin i’yau ba ,
44007049	Bada iyau , ‘ Safam on Yau au mamage , ato tafanam on Yau auu on nan antawar . Abi goa on Yau wonyon weineu ? Yau auriu efan menan nan anmian ?
44007050	Yau Tou on atonio osi bobo engon tutufin afouren ! ’
44007051	Stephen an dura nana ikakafun iyau , “ Omi sabu on nunuam wawanis ! Omi nunuam on ato eteni sabu God men sisasagobai osi nunuas ba , a tainam on fotis , men fofonin God an dura wontatam ! Omi sabu on wawam agirim ba : Omi mat on ra fufur Ayu Kakafotin wobisisiweiai !
44007052	Omi wawam agirim on aubairuruotis engon tutufin siyames sikokosaris . Osi God an dura bobibotis engon siyasububunues , osi sabu on ainau bag dura sikurereb ato an Agirotin an yawas totorin innanat aurin on . Ato ari on omi wokaseirai ato wasubun .
44007053	Omi sabu on God an baifafaro dura wobo , ato anea Moses sibitai on — baise omi men baifafaro dura aurin woifonabo on ! ”
44007054	Jew babadis Rurubinis Stephen an dura sitatamai on yas sitatab kwakwan aurin was sitafoforen .
44007055	Baise Stephen , Ayu Kakafotin ibonuai auman , itage au safam ato God an kudidirin it a Iesu mat on nan God an asumaiauai itatawar it .
44007056	On iyau , “ Woit ! Yau safam ait iruseren ato Orot Natun ait God an asumaiauai etatawar ! ”
44007057	Jew babadis Rurubinis on imas siboen tainas sikufofoten ato aumeit bag siyoku . Namon osi engon Stephen aurin on ra kaita siyayai sinai ,
44007058	ato osi Stephen sibo mafam gagamin emon sirebetet igat au koun ato agimai siborarab . Sabu iyabon Stephen sikukutabirai on asi beber Jorei boboun wabin Saul , on bisinai sikiriren ikakaifaren weines .
44007059	Osi sabu on nana Stephen agimai siborarab ato on Bada aurin iyor iyau , “ Bada Iesu , yau ayubiu ebo ! ”
44007060	On sindan irou ato Bada aurin fonan aumiet bag iyor iyau , “ Bada ! Atonio bobo sefofour auriu on asi bokomas men unnos mes ! ” On atonio dura iyau , ato irabob .
44008001	Ato Stephen siyasubun aurin on Saul ibasitai . On ra nan on ekalesia nan Jerusalem amonai simama on sibosuruf baikokosar komasin si’boai . Baitutumotis engon on siyames fetag fetag sitagege sinai Judea a Samaria tafanamai nan , baise baiyoyobotis on nan nana Jerusalem sima .
44008002	Sabu God sikwakwafirai yangan on Stephen sibo sinai sigarob ato fonas aumiet bag sitotou sibiyababan .
44008003	Baise Saul on ifofourtobon ekalesia yangan itikomasis mes ; on fasinai on inai goa goa igeg , orot jever baitutumotis on iteteinis si’gat ato fafatum goai nan irereberues .
44008004	Baitutumotis osi iyabon sitagege tafanam ta ta sinai , on nan dura sikurereb .
44008005	Philip on inai Samaria mafam gagamin nan Keriso aurin on nan sabu auris dura ikurereb .
44008006	Philip dura ibikakafun on , sabu kuayo on an dura on sitatam tiwag . osi engon on sitatamai , ato bobo buburis ifofour on sit .
44008007	Ayu Komasis on fonas aumiet bag sibiyoku weie sabu sigaraba tefasi emon sibikirires si’gat ; sabu ass imas raguraguis mat on engon siyawas .
44008008	On mes Samaria mafam gagamin amonai on yaisisir gagamin bag imatar .
44008009	On mafam gagamin amonai on orot wabin Simon on nan imama , on orot on nan Samaria imama ifafarum on sabu engon tutufin sibiduduran . On toun iyoyorai on orot gagamin bag ,
44008010	ato sabu engon tutufin nan mafam gagaminai simama , sabu gugudis sabu gagamis on engon on orot fonan wat sitatamai . Sabu si’yau , “ On orot on God an faiwar ibo , on faiwar wabin seyoyorai , ‘ Faiwar Gagamin . ’ ”
44008011	On wera weromin maiau osi sabu auris on ifafarum , ato sabu on an dura wat on sitatam tiwag .
44008012	Baise osi Philip an dura ato God an Baiaiwab an Wasagobin a Iesu Keriso Wabin aurin ikurereb si’tatam on situtum , ato orot jever engon sibapataito .
44008013	Simon toun mat on itutum ; ato gibui ibapataito , on Philip bisinai ima , ato on iduduran kwakwan ato bobo baiduduranis a bobo buburis ifofour on .
44008014	Baiyoyobotis nan Jerusalem simama on dura sitatam , Samaria yangan on God an dura sibo ; on mes osi Peter a John rus nan siyafares sinai .
44008015	Osi sinai sigat mom , ato osi simisir baitutumotis auris sibayoi Ayu Kakafotin sitboai mes .
44008016	Yabin Ayu Kakafotin on men isur orot jever tani aurin on ; baise osi asir Bada Iesu Wabinai sibapataito mom .
44008017	Namon Peter a John rus on imas sabu tefasi siyagagaien ato Ayu Kakafotin sibo .
44008018	Simon on bobo it , ato baiyoyobotis on imas sabu tefasi siyagagaien ato Ayu si’boai . On mes Simon agim ikutetai Peter a John rus auris ,
44008019	ato iyau , “ Atonio faiwar on yau mat woiteu , ato yau imau orot jever tefanai anyayagai on Ayu Kakafotin inboboai . ”
44008020	Baise Peter iyafotai iyau , “ Om a am agim mat on wotarab itsawar , yabin om enonosin God an siwar on agimai untobon mom !
44008021	Om men wei ai bobo turin amonai unabo on , yabin om nunuam on men obin God matanai .
44008022	Om am bainonot komasin emon on ya baikitabir unboai ato Bada aurin unbayoi ato am bainonot komasis emon on innotburem .
44008023	Yau om aitem on , om nunuam on er dorem a baiboboar auman , ato om am bokomas emon on ifatumem . ”
44008024	Simon on Peter a John rus auris iyau , “ Arie , omi Bada aurin wonbayoi weineu ato dura ato ubikakafun on men auriu inmatar mes . ”
44008025	Peter a John rus on Iesu sisasagobai an dudur a Bada an dura on sikasones isawar gibunai , osi simatabir men sinai au Jerusalem . Osi si’nan eta nenenai mafam gugudis sigaraba Samaria tafanam amonai sen on nan auris Wasagobin sikurereb .
44008026	Bada an anea on Philip aurin ikakafun iyau , “ Om ebotitiwagim ato unan eta ato Jerusalem inai Gaza mafam gagaminai i’gat on nan ungat . ” ( Atonio eta on ari men nan sebibib on . )
44008027	On mes Philip ibotitiwagai ato inai . On etaiai on Ethiopia orot ato yasfun fofous siboseseiren , on etai ibib i’nat au go . Atonio orot on orot gagamin , ato on Ethiopia an aiwab jever an agim goa on ikakaifarai a on jever min on an baibad wabin seyoyorai , “ Candace . ” On orot on inat Jerusalem nan God ikwakwafirai on imatabir men an motob wa wabin carriage on tefanai i’nat . On orot on motob an wa tefanai imair iyayai i’nat ato aubairuruotin Isaiah an buk on ibiyab .
44008028	
44008029	Ayu Kakafotin on Philip iyawur iyau , “ Om enai ato motob an wa wabin carriage , on bisinai ebib unnanan . ”
44008030	Philip iyayai irabon ato on itatam , orot on aubairuruotin Isaiah an buk on ibiyab ; on mes Philip on orot itetemai iyau , “ Om min usagob abifan ebiyab i ? ”
44008031	Orot gagamin iyafotai iyau , “ Orot tani auriu inau bubunag , on arimon an sagob . ” Ato orot on Philip iyawur igai wa carriage tefanai ato bisinai imair .
44008032	On buk amonai dura ibiyab min atonio : “ On foro sheep ba sibo sinai siyasubun ; On foro sheep kafakakai ba usin bubunin siyasutin on men iwaf mes ; On men abi dura tani iyau on .
44008033	On simamaiai , ato men eta totorinai sigurubabanai on . On wawan agirin auris on , men iyafan tani inkasonet tantatam , yabin On an yawas tafanamai on inat au kanfoun isawar . ”
44008034	Orot gagamin Philip aurin iyau , “ Om ekasoneu , aubairuruotin min iyafan aurin ebikakafun ? On toun aurin ebikakafun o orot tani aurin ebikakafun ? ”
44008035	Philip ibosuruf dura ikakafun ; atonio dura buk amonai sigagayam on , anai bag ibosuruf , ato Iesu an Wasagobin aurin on iyawur .
44008036	Osi etai siyayai sisusur ato sinat sareu i’yen on nan sigat , ato orot gagamin iyau , “ Sareu atonio . Ato bobo aifan on arimon inyafoteu men anibapataito i ? ”
44008037	( Philip on orot aurin iyau , “ Om nunuam tutufinai unbitutum on arimon unibapataito . ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Yau abitutum , yau abitutum Iesu Keriso on God Natun . ” )
44008038	Orot gagamin on ato motob wa i’yai on ibotan ; Philip a orot gagamin , osi rus sisur sareuai nan , ato Philip imisir on ibapataitoai .
44008039	Osi sareu emon sigai mom , Ayu Kakafotin on Philip ibo siwanai . Orot gagamin on men Philip magin it men , baise on iyasisir kwakwan nana etai iyayai inai .
44008040	Philip on Ashdod mafam gagaminai nan irobotet ; ato on inai mafam gagamis engon amosi nan Wasagobin ikurereb mom , inai Caesarea mafam gagaminai nan igat .
44009001	Baise Saul on nana Bada an baigibubunuotis itirabobis auris on i’yau beberues . On inai Priest Ainauin aurin ,
44009002	ato ifefeyanai , fef itgayamen Saul an bobo mamaba ebobo aurin on , Jew bayoi goa an babadis nan Damascus mafam gagaminai sebobo auris on itawures , ato on nan sabu iyabon orot o jever ato Bada an Eta sebigibubunuai yangan itgagatures on itfatumes ato itboes itmatabir men au Jerusalem .
44009003	On etai ibib inan au Damascus , ato on inat mafam gagamin aurin ibiufin , ato ra kaita ratafin safam emon isur ato usin engon itagawai .
44009004	On motobai ifeu ato fonan itatam aurin ibikakafun i’yau . “ Saul , Saul ! Om aibo mes Yau baikokosar ebiteu ? ”
44009005	On iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , Om Iyafan ? ” Fonan iyau , “ Yau on Iesu , om Yau baikokosar ebiteu .
44009006	Baise om emisir ato unan au mafam gagamin , nan arimon sinawurem bobo mamaba unbobo aurin on . ”
44009007	Sabu iyabon Saul mat sibib si’nan on nan sitawar , osi men abi dura tani siyau ; osi fonan on sitatam , ato men iyafan tani sit on .
44009008	Saul motob emon imisir ato matan ikurarau , baise on men fofonin sawar aifan tani ititai on . On mes Saul imanai sibo mom sibonanawai sinai au Damascus .
44009009	Ra ton amonai on men fofonin sawar aifan tani ititai , a on werai on men bayu iyam a sareu itoman mes .
44009010	Baigibubunuotin tani wabin Ananias , on Damascus nan imama . On orot aurin on God an dura rerebai ibo igat iyoboai it , Bada on aurin iyau , “ Ananias ! ” On iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , yau atonio . ”
44009011	Bada on aurin iyau , “ Om ebotitiwagim ato unan eta wabin Eta Totorin on nan ungat ato Judas an goai nan orot tani Tarsus mafam gagamin emon inat wabin Saul on aurin unitetem . On nan ebabayoi ;
44009012	ato God an dura rerebai ibo igat iyoboai it on , orot wabin Ananias irui goa amonai ato iman tefanai iyagai , onai on matan iteit men . ”
44009013	Ananias iyafotai iyau , “ Bada , sabu sigaraba maiau ato orot aurin sikasoneu , mamaba bobo komasis am sabu nan Jerusalem semama auris efofour on .
44009014	Ato on priest aiwabis baibad sitai inat Damascus ato am sabu iyabon Om Wabim sebaton yangan on infatumes mes . ”
44009015	Bada on aurin iyau , “ Om enai , on orot on Yau arubinai au bobo inabo weineu , on Yau Wabiu iniyamai inarat ato osi sabu men Jew yangan auris , aiwabis a Israel sabu auris .
44009016	Yau Tou on arimon aniyoboai , Yau auriu on gagamin bag inikokosarai . ”
44009017	On mes Ananias inai goa amonai irui ato iman ibogai Saul tefanai iyein . On iyau , “ Yau taiu tuau Saul , Bada iyafareu anat — Iesu Toun on om etai ubib u’nat nan aurim irobotet . On iyafareu anat onai om matam uneit men a Ayu Kakafotin inibonuem . ”
44009018	Ra kaita sawar tani iyan an konag ba on Saul matan emon sifeu ato on matan iyeit men . On imisir ato sibapataitoai ;
44009019	ato on gibunai , on bayu iyam weie an faiwar ibo men . Ra dibon wat on Saul Damascus nan baitutumotis bisisi ima .
44009020	Saul on totor inai bayoi goai irui ato Iesu aurin on ibosuruf dura ikurereb . On iyau , “ On Orot on God Natun . ”
44009021	Sabu engon tutufin an dura sitatam on siduduran ato sitetem siyau , “ Atonio orot on Jerusalem nan sabu iyabon atonio Wab sibaton aurin on iyasububunues . On nin inat on sabu infatumes ato inboes inmatabir men priest aiwabis auris . ”
44009022	Baise Saul an dura ikurereb an faiwar on irat kwakwan , ato on an bobo aifan ifofour on idura bag Iesu on Keriso , ato Jew yangan Damascus simama on men fofonin sitiyafotai .
44009023	Ra sigaraba sisawar gibunai , Jew yangan siruayo ato asi bainonot on sidudurai Saul sitasubun mes ;
44009024	ato sabu mamaba asi bainonot sibidudurai on sikasonai isagob . Fom ra on osi sabu mafam gagamin an Metewan awan on sibinateteai mamaba sitasubun mes .
44009025	Baise fom tani Saul an baigibubunuotis on Saul sibo sinai ato kaifetai siwan , nan goa aiyetun emon kifa masarai siyaronai igat ato fafa siyaronai siyeirai isur au gabur .
44009026	Saul inai au Jerusalem ato ifourtobon baigibubunuotis mat sitikaita mes . Baise osi men situtum on inat baigibubunuotin imatar , ato osi engon tutufin min on sibeberuai .
44009027	Namon Barnabas ibaisin , ibo inai baiyoyobotis auris . On baiyoyobotis auris iyau bubunag mamaba Saul etai nan Bada i’tai on a mat Bada mamaba aurin ibikakafun on . Mat on ikasones mamaba Saul Damascus nan Iesu Wabinai dura totor faiwarin wat ikurereb aurin on .
44009028	On mes Saul nan osi mat sima ato inai Jerusalem amonai engon Bada Wabinai dura totor faiwarai wat ikurereb men iber mes .
44009029	Mat on ra fufur Jew yangan ato Greek fonasi sibikakafun on mat sibikakafun a sigagam , on mes osi sifourtobon sitasubun mes .
44009030	Saul taitain tutuan baitutumotis atonio dura sisagob mom on , osi sisur au Caesarea mafam gagaminai ato siyafarai inai au Tarsus mafam gagamin .
44009031	Ekalesia engon tutufin nan Judea , Galilee , a Samaria tafanamai on asi wera obin sibo tufai sima . Ayu Kakafotin an baibaisai on sabu baitutumotis on irarat ato irarat bag , ato asi yawasai siyamai on Bada sikakafai tiwag .
44009032	Peter on tafanam au engon ibib , ato ra tani on inai God an sabu Lydda mafam gagaminai nan simama on itfasiues mes .
44009033	Orot tani wabin Aeneas , on nan igaturai , on orot on raguraguin ato kwanda nimtereban baitonin nanaba on asir ireai i’yen mom .
44009034	Peter on orot aurin iyau , “ Aeneas , Iesu Keriso iniyawasim . Om emisir ato am ire enu . ” Ra kaita Aeneas ire emon imisir .
44009035	Sabu engon tutufin Lydda mafam gagamin a Sharon gewos efanai simama on , ato orot iyayawas si’tai on engon Bada situtumai .
44009036	Joppa amonai jever baitutumotin wabin Tabitha , on nan imama . ( On wabin ato Greek fonasi on seyoyorai , Dorcas , on an yabin min , “ foro deer ” . ) Jever an wera tutufinai iyein ra fufur an bobo obis wat ifofour a sabu kokoianis on ibibaisis .
44009037	On an werai on sawau ibo ato irabob . On jever usin sibososouai ato goa ann werominai siyein nan i’yen .
44009038	Joppa inai Lydda mafam gagaminai i’gat on eta men weromin bag , ato baigibubunuotis Joppa nan simama on Peter duran sitatam on inat Lydda nan , ato osi orot ruam siyafares atonio dura on sibo sinai , “ Arie , om wagogoiim gariwat unnat auri , men unmousin mes . ”
44009039	On mes Peter ibotitiwagai ato mat sinai . Peter inai igat mom on , sabu sibo sigai goa ann werominai . Kekena jever engon on sinat sikuayo Peter sikufifinai , ato Dorcas yawasin imama an rai , on imanai usit an baitakwakwaren isasagiren , on siboen sibiyoboai auman sitotou .
44009040	Peter on sabu engon tutufin goai emon iyawures sigat au koun , ato on sindan irou ato ibayoi ; namon on irutabir jever usin i’yen aurin ato iyau , “ Tabitha , emisir ! ” Jever matan ikurarau iyeit Peter it mom on , imisir sifunai imair .
44009041	Peter on jever aurin inai ato ibaisin ibogaiai . Namon Peter on baitutumotis a kekena jever iyores sirui goa amonai ato iyoboes jever on yawasin .
44009042	Atonio bobo imamatar an dura on Joppa tafanam engon ibonu , ato sabu sigaraba maiau Bada situtumai .
44009043	Peter on Joppa nan , orot wabin Simon , on bobaitu korofis bo’otin on bisinai ra sigaraba ima .
44010001	Orot tani Caesarea mafam gagaminai imama , wabin Cornelius , on orot on Rome asi wou yangan asi bainetewarotin , ato on wou yangan wabis min seyoyorai , “ Italy Yangan Asi Wou An Kuayo Gagamin . ”
44010002	On orot on God anyawasai ifaskikin tiwag ; ato on awan nanatun engon mat on God sikwakwafirai . On nunuan tutufinai an siwar iboai Jew yangan asi sabu kokoianis on ibites , a on ra fufur God aurin ibabayoi .
44010003	Rabirabi tani wera ton nanaba ato God an dura ibo igat aurin , on rerebai God an anea it , inat aurin an goai irui ato iyawur iyau , “ Cornelius ! ”
44010004	Ato Cornelius on iber auman anea wat inateteai ato iyau , “ Bada , abifan egogoi ? ” Anea iyafotai iyau , “ God on om am bayoi itatam a am siwar sabu kokoianis ubibaisis aurin on God inosim .
44010005	Ato om ari sabu fani uniyafares sinan Joppa nan orot tani aurin , on wabin tutufin seyoyorai , Simon Peter .
44010006	Peter on orot wabin Simon , bobaitu korofis bo’otin , on an goa ato kamit rewanai iyoyonin on nan emama . ”
44010007	Namon anea on Cornelius aurin ibikakafun on inai , ato Cornelius on an goa an agirotis ruam a on an wou orot tani on aurin ebobo , on orot on God an yawasai ifaskikin tiwag , osi siyores sinat .
44010008	Cornelius on bobo aifan aurin imamatar on iyawures ato iyafares sinai au Joppa .
44010009	Ra itom , ato osi sinai Joppa aurin sibiufin ato wera aiyet nanaba on Peter igai goa tefan tayabarin , on nan itbayoi mes .
44010010	Peter on bitanan igi , ato igogoi bag aifan itan , ato bayu sibotitiwag an rai on God an dura rerebai ibo igat aurin .
44010011	On it safam iruseren ato sawar tani on safam emon isusur , an itin on beber gagamin ba , sitau sabu on ususus bat sibotanen mom ato au tafanam siyeirai isusur .
44010012	On sawar amonai on bobaitu magis magis , rega mota a kiwiu .
44010013	Fonan on aurin iyau , “ Peter , om emisir ; bobaitu yasubunuen yam ! ”
44010014	Baise Peter iyau , “ Bada , ambin bag ! Yau au yawasai bayu dumais a men gumidaris on men meyan am tobon . ”
44010015	Fonan inat men , aurin ikakafun iyau , “ God atonio bayu on ifouren sigumidar , men unnos osi bayu on dumais . ”
44010016	Atonio bobo on ra ton nanaba imatar ; ato sawar sibo sigai men au safam .
44010017	Peter on God an dura rerebai ibo igat ibiyoboai an yabin on mamaba , on ima ibinonotai . Baise Cornelius ato sabu ibiyafares on , sinai sabu sitetemis ato eta siyoboes sinai Simon an goai sigat , nan furi awanai sitatawar .
44010018	Osi siyoroge ato sitetem siyau , “ Orot tani wabin Simon Peter , on min nin emama i ? ”
44010019	Peter on nana ifofourtobon itsagob ato God an dura rerebai ibo igat ibiyoboai on an yabin abifan , ato Ayu iyau , “ Om etatam ! Sabu ton on om senunuenim .
44010020	On mes emisir ebotitiwagim ato esur au gabur , ato osi sabu mat unan , om men uninonot sisit mes , yabin osi sabu on Yau aiyafares . ”
44010021	On mes Peter isur au gabur , ato sabu auris iyau , “ Omi orot wonunuen min Yau atonio . Omi aifan aurin wonat ? ”
44010022	Osi siyafotai siyau , “ Wou yangan asi bainetewarotin wabin Cornelius , on iyafarei wanat . On orot on obin , on God ekwakwafirai a Jew yangan engon on men sunub sekakafai on . On God an anea dura ikasonai , on om ebibebegim unnat an goai nan unfasiuai mes , ato om dura aifan unbikakafun on intatam mes . ”
44010023	Peter sabu ibebegis sirui goa amonai ato nan mat fom kaita siyen . Ra itom , on ibotitiwagai ato mat sinai ; ato osi taitais tutuas fani Joppa simama on mat sinai ,
44010024	Peter on osi mat si’nan eta nenenai awam ifom ato ra itom on osi sinai Caesarea sigat , menan Cornelius an dam warar , a tuturan bag , osi ibebegis sinat mat engon nan simomousin .
44010025	Peter on inat goai itar mes ato Cornelius igat inefotai , nanai sindan irou ato ikwafirai .
44010026	Baise Peter on Cornelius ibogaiai . On iyau , “ Om emisir , yau tou on asir orot maiauiu wat . ”
44010027	Peter on nana Cornelius aurin dura ibikakafun ato irui goa amonai , ato nan sabu sigaraba siruayo simama igatures .
44010028	Peter on osi auris iyau , “ Omi toum wosagob tiwag , wei Jew yangan ai baifafaro iyau on , wei men fofonin omi sabu men Jew yangan aurim wannat wanfasiuem a wei men fofonin omi mat tani kaita on . Baise God iyoboeu on yau men annos omi orot jever tani on dumain o men gumidarin .
44010029	On mes om am sabu auriu uiyafares si’nat on , yau men dura na ne aikakafun mes . Yau abitetemim , om aibo mes uiyafares auriu sinat ? ”
44010030	Cornelius iyau , “ Wera atonio nanaba ra ton isawar nono , on nan on irabirabi wera ton nanaba on au goa amonai ababayoi . Ra kaita orot an beber kudidirin imonag , on nawui itawar ,
44010031	ato iyau : ‘ Cornelius ! God am bayoi itatam ato om am siwar sabu kokoianis auris ubibaisis on inosim .
44010032	Om orot tani uniyafarai inan , orot wabin tutufin seyoyorai Simon Peter aurin , On nan orot wabin Simon , bobaitu korofis bo’otin , on an goa ato kamit rewanai nan iyon emama on . ’
44010033	On mes ra kaita ato osi aiyafares sinai om aurim , ato iyobin bag om unat . Ari on , ot engon atonio nin God nanai tanmousin mamaba Bada i’yawurem on , unikakafun wantatam . ”
44010034	Peter dura ibosuruf ikakafun : “ Yau ari asagob dura bag , Bada on yawas an eta kaitamomai wat on sabu engon tutufin auris efofour .
44010035	Iyai iyafan On ebeberuai , a bobo obis wat efofour on ebibasitai , basit on tafanam touman emon inat min on .
44010036	Omi wosagob , On dura iyafarai inai Israel sabu auris , dura min tuf an Wasagobin Iesu Kerisoai on sikurereb , On Orot on sabu engon tutufin asi Bada .
44010037	Omi wosagob , bobo gagamin aifan imatar Israel tafanam tutufin engon amonai , ato on bobo on Galilee nan ibosuruf , John ainau igat bapataito aurin on , dura ikurereb .
44010038	Omi wosagob Iesu Keriso Nazareth emon , mamaba God On aurin Ayu Kakafotin a faiwar aurin idedebur on . On tafanam engon ibib , bobo obis auris ifofour a sabu iyabon Afaguban an faiwar babanai simama on engon ibiyawasis , yabin God on wantoan On bisinai imama .
44010039	Wei on mataii wait , On bobo engon tutufin ato Jew yangan auris a Jerusalem tafanam amonai ifofour on . Osi sirabobai ato nabai nan sidudun .
44010040	Baise ra baitoninai God On rabob emon ibobaimisirai men , ato ifourai wei auri irobotet irerebai ,
44010041	men sabu engon auris , baise wei wat auri , wei iyabon God irubinei nono an dura wankurereb aurin on . On rabob emon imisir men weie wei mat bayu wam watom .
44010042	Ato On dura wawaninai iyawurei Wasagobin sabu auris wankurereb , ato sabu wankasones on , On Orot on ekesin mom God irubinai sabu rabobis a yawasis inigurubabanis mes .
44010043	Aubairuruotis engon tutufin On aurin sikakafun siyau , iyai iyafan On inbitutumai on , On Wabin an faiwarai on an bokomas innotbur . ”
44010044	Peter on dura nana ibikakafun , ato Ayu Kakafotin on isur sabu tefasi , osi iyabon nan dura sitatam on .
44010045	Jew sabu baitutumotis , osi iyabon Peter mat Joppa emon si’nat on siduduran , ato God an siwar Ayu Kakafotin on sabu men Jew yangan mat auris idedebur on .
44010046	Yabin osi sitatamis on sabu touman fonasi nan dura sibikakafun a God sibifain si’yau , “ God on gagamin bag . ” Peter ikakafun iyau ,
44010047	“ Atonio osi sabu on Ayu Kakafotin sibo , mamaba ot mat taboai ba . Iyafan fofonin arimon osi sabu inyafotes men sareuai sinibapataito ? ”
44010048	On mes on iyawures , Iesu Keriso Wabinai sibapataito . Namon osi sifefeyanai ra fani wat on nan mat sitama mes .
44011001	Baiyoyobotis a taitais tutuas nan Judea tafanam engon sitatam on sabu men Jew yangan mat on God an dura sibo .
44011002	Peter igai Jerusalem nan on , ato Jew baitutumotis , osi iyabon askibubu aurin sebitutum , on dura wawaninai nan sitetemai siyau ,
44011003	“ Om unai orot men Jew a on men sibiaskububuai , on bisinai umama a om osi mat engon kaita bayu wam ! ”
44011004	On mes Peter ato bobo mamaba anai bag imamatar aurin , on engon tutufin osi auris idudur :
44011005	“ Yau on Joppa mafam gagaminai nan ababayoi , ato God an dura on rerebai ibo igat iyoboeu ait . Yau sawar tani ait , an itin on ato beber gagamin ba , sitau sabu on beber ususus bat nan sibotanen ato safam emon siyeirai isusur , ato on sawar on inat bisiwui bag nan itawar .
44011006	Yau auwatin bag ainaru ato sawar amonai engon aiten , osi min bobaitu , rega an ragit tutuenis , umar a kiwiu .
44011007	Namon yau fonan atatam auriu ibikakafun , ‘ Peter , om emisir bobaitu yasububunuen yam . ’
44011008	Baise yau aikakafun au , ‘ Bada , ambin bag ! Yau au yawas amonai bayu dumais a men gumidaris on men am tobon . ’
44011009	Fonan safam emon inat men iyau , ‘ God on atonio osi bayu ifouren sigumidar , om men unnos osi bayu on dumais . ’
44011010	Atonio bobo on ra ton nanaba imatar auriu , ato kanfounai on sawar engon tutufin sibo sigai men au safam .
44011011	Ra kaita , sabu ton on yau auriu Caesarea mafam gagamin emon sibiyafares on , sinat goa menan amama on nan sigat .
44011012	Ayu iyawureu on men atinonot sisit mes , asir totor wat wanai mom . Atonio taitait tutuat nimtereban kaita on Joppa emon simisir mat wanai au Caesarea , ato wei engon wanai Cornelius an goa amonai warui .
44011013	On ikasonei mamaba anea irui an goa amonai itawar ato aurin iyau , ‘ Om orot tani uniyafarai inan au Joppa ato orot wabin tutufin seyoyorai Simon Peter on inawur .
44011014	On dura aurim inbikakafun on om awam , nanatum , am dam warar engon mat on yawas wonboai . ’
44011015	Ato yau abosuruf dura abikakafun on , Ayu Kakafotin on osi auris isur , mamaba anai bag ot aurit imamatar ba .
44011016	Namon yau anos mamaba Bada iyau , ‘ John on sareuai ibibapataitoim , baise Yau arimon Ayu Kakafotinai ani bapataitoim . ’
44011017	Wei rerebai wasagob God on sabu men Jew yangan auris on , siwar kaitamom min on ites , ato ot Bada Iesu Keriso tabitutumai ibitet ba ; ato yau on iyafan on atafourtobon God atyafotai ! ”
44011018	Osi sabu atonio dura sitatam mom on , ra kaita baitetem sikirir ato God sifain si’yau , “ God on sabu men Jew yangan mat auris ibasites osi ya baikitabir sinboai ato sinama ! ”
44011019	Sabu Stephen siyasubun an rai on , sibosuruf baitutumotis auris baikokosar sibites , ato osi sitagege mabis mabis sinai . Baitutumotis fani on sinai Phoenicia tafanamai , Cyprus nuaiai a Antioch mafam gagamin an faratai nan , ato dura on Jew yangan auris wat sikurereb .
44011020	Baise baitutumotis fani on sabu ato Cyprus nua a Cyrene mafam gagamin emon si’nat on , sinai au Antioch nan sabu men Jew yangan auris mat dura sikurereb , Bada Iesu an Wasagobin on sikakasones .
44011021	Bada an faiwar on osi bisisi , ato sabu sigaraba maiau on situtum ato Bada aurin sirutabir .
44011022	Atonio bobo sifofour an dudur on inai ekalesia yangan Jerusalem simama on auris igat , on mes osi Barnabas siyafarai inai au Antioch .
44011023	Barnabas inai igat it mamaba God sabu ibimomogines aurin on iyasisir , ato ikufaiwaris , sabu engon tutufin on Bada aurin sinidura bag ato nunuas tutufinai sinitutum .
44011024	Barnabas on orot obin , on baitutumotin a Ayu Kakafotin ebibonuai emama . Sabu sigaraba maiau siyames ya baikitabir sibo sinat Bada sisagobai .
44011025	Namon Barnabas inai Tarsus nan Saul itnuen mes .
44011026	Barnabas inai Saul igaturai mom on , ibo inat au Antioch . Kwanda kaitamom tutufin on osi orot ruam on nan ekalesia mat sima , ato sabu kuayo gagamin on sibebeyes . Baigibubunuotis ato Antioch nan simama , osi matan ainau bag siyores , Iesu an baigibubunuotis .
44011027	On an werai on aubairuruotis fani on Jerusalem emon sinai au Antioch .
44011028	Orot tani wabin Agabus , on imisir itawar , ato Ayu Kakafotin an faiwarai ikakafun iyau , gomar arimon tafanam engon tutufin inboai . ( Claudius on Caesar imama an rai on atonio bobo imatar . )
44011029	Baigibubunuotis sinonotis on osi kakaita kakaita asi siwar on siniyafaren taitais tutuas nan Judea semama on sinibaisis .
44011030	Osi atonio bobo sifour , ato agim sibo Barnabas a Saul rus sites ato osi ekalesia asi orot kwatus auris sibo inai .
44012001	On an werai Aiwab Herod ibosuruf ekalesia yangan fani on baikokosar ibites .
44012002	Herod on dura wawaninai iyau , James sibo , seriai siyasubun , on orot min John tuan .
44012003	Herod on Jew yangan ites atonio bobo ifour aurin on siyasisir , on mes on Peter ba ifatumai . ( Atonio bobo on Forag wabin Rafi Sarar Men Fio Yist Auman on aurin sifoforag an rai nan imatar . )
44012004	Peter sifatumai ato sibo sinai fafatum goai sireberuai , nan wou yangan engon babat babat , on asi kuayo engon bat mabis mabis nan siyeinis sikakaifarai . Herod inonotai on Baisobon ra gibunai weie wasai nan on nanai it’tawar ititetemai .
44012005	On mes Peter on nana fafatum goai si’botan , baise on aurin on ekalesia sabu on nana God aurin faiwarinai sibabayoi .
44012006	On fom kaitamom wat ato Herod on Peter itboai itgat sabu auris , ato Peter on sabu kaifarotis ruam on sanasi iyenbubur . On fatum engon ruam nanaba on nan siyous tatan , ato sabu kaifarotis on nan fafatum goa an metewan awan on sikakaifarai .
44012007	Ra kaita Bada an anea on nan itawar , ato an ratafin on fafatum goa amonai itagawai . Anea on Peter abaranai ibaban imisir , ato iyawur iyau , “ Om gariwat emisir ! ” Ra kaita fatum ruam on Peter iman emon sifeuen .
44012008	Namon anea iyau , “ Om am kaid ebo nenem egig ato amm kikiman ebo eiwanim . ” Peter on bobo nanaba ifour gibunai , anea iyau , “ Om am beber ebo eitakwakwarim ato eigibubunueu . ”
44012009	Peter on anea igibubunuai fafatum goa emon sigat . Baise Peter on men isagob , anea on dura bag efofour o on inos on ebomomout .
44012010	Osi sinat sabu kaifarotis asi kuayo ainauin on sikirires ato sinai kuayo bairuin ba sikirires , ato sinat au kanfoun on agim iron metewan ato inai mafam gagaminai i’gat , on nan sigat . Metewan awan on toun wat osi auris iruseren ato osi sigat au koun . Osi etai sibib si’nan ato ra kaita anea on Peter ikirir .
44012011	Namon Peter on isagob ato bobo on aifan aurin imatar ato iyau . “ Yau ari asagob atonio bobo imamatar on dura bag ! Bada an anea iyafarai ato Herod an faiwar emon a bobo engon tutufin aurin ato Jew yangan sinonosin on itafour , ato osi emon on iyawasiu . ”
44012012	On atonio bobo aurin on inonotai mom , ato on inai John Mark ayon Mary , on an goai . Sabu engon nan siruayo ato sibabayoi .
44012013	Peter metewan koun emon irugegedan ato agirotin jeverei wabin Rhoda on inai metewanai ititai itsagob iyafan erugegedan .
44012014	Peter ibikakafun on fonan itatam isagob ato iyasisir kwakwan on men metewan iruseren on , baise on iyayai imatabir men osi auris ato dura ikurereb iyau , Peter on goa kounai etatawar .
44012015	Osi siyawur siyau , “ Om ebikokok bait ! ” Baise agirotin jeverei on nana ibikakafun i’yau on dura bag . On mes osi siyafotai siyau , “ Nan anea bait . ”
44012016	Baise Peter on nana metewan irugegedan . Au kanfoun on osi metewan siruseren ato Peter si’tai on siduduran .
44012017	Peter imanai wat auris ikakafun , on osi awas sitafot mes , ato ikasones mamaba Bada fafatum goa emon ibo i’gat on . On iyawures iyau , “ Atonio dura on James a ot taitait tutuat fani mat wonkasones , ” namon on ikirires ato inai efan taniai iyob .
44012018	Ra itom fomenei on baitagogoi gagamin bag ato fafatum goa an kaifarotis sanasi imatar ; osi tous amosi sibitetem bonen si’yau , abi bobo imatar Peter aurin i ?
44012019	Herod dura wawaninai iyau Peter sitnuen mes , baise osi men fofonin sitgaturai . On mes on sabu fafatum goa an kaifarotis itetemis ato dura wawaninai iyau sitasububunues mes . Atonio bobo isawar gibunai Herod on Judea emon inai au Caesarea , nan ra kafakakai itama mes .
44012020	Herod on yan itatab kwakwan Tyre a Sidon mafam gagamis an sabu auris ; on mes osi mafam gagamis ruam an sabu on sikuayo weie sinai Herod sititai mes . Osi on orot wabin Blastus , on ainau sibo osi bisisi itawar , on orot on Herod an aiwab goa aurin on baibad itai ikakaifarai . Namon osi sinai Herod sitetemai , osi tuf sitiyamai mes , yabin osi asi tafanam on aiwab orot an tafanam emon bayu gagamin sibo fasinai .
44012021	Herod ra tani irubin ato nan an aiwab beber itakwakwarai ato on an mamageai imair sabu auris dura ikakafun .
44012022	Osi siyoku siyau , “ Atonio on men orot ebikakafun on , baise on god ebikakafun ! ”
44012023	Ra kaita Bada an anea Herod irab ifeu , yabin on men God ibifain on . Momot gugudis on usin si’yam mom irabob .
44012024	God an dura on nana irarat ato igat sabu engon tutufin auris .
44012025	Barnabas a Saul rus asi bobo Jerusalem nan sisawarai ato osi John Mark sibo mat engon simatabir men sinai au Antioch .
44013001	Ekalesia nan Antioch simama amosi on aubairuruotis a baibebeotis fani simama : Orot wabin Barnabas Simeon ( on orot seyoyorai Gugugurin ) , Lucius on ( Cyrene mafam gagamin emon inat ) , Manaen ( on Gawan Herod , tafanam an bainetewarotin osi rus situes sirat ) a Saul mat .
44013002	Osi on Bada sikwakwafirai a bayu sikirir sibifofour , ato Ayu Kakafotin on osi auris iyau , “ Omi on Barnabas a Saul rus Yau auriu wonrubines , osi rus ayoyores au bobo sinabo mes . ”
44013003	Osi bayu sikirir sifofour a sibayoi , ato osi imas tefasi siyagagaien ato siyafares sinai .
44013004	Barnabas a Saul rus on Ayu Kakafotin iyafares sisur sinai Seleucia mafam gagaminai nan ato osi nan wa sibo sirabon sinai Cyprus nua on nan .
44013005	Osi sinat Salamis mafam gagaminai sigat mom , ato sirui Jew yangan asi bayoi goa amonai nan God an dura sikurereb . Osi rus on John Mark sibo mat sinai itibaisis mes .
44013006	Osi rus sibib nua engon sikibubuai sirabon sinai Paphos mafam gagaminai nan sigat , on nan on orot farumotin tani wabin Bar-Iesu on sigaturai , on min Jew orot ato toun iyoyorai on aubairuruotin .
